[\[1a\]]
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D3939}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shik+Sha sa muts+tsha ya kA ri kA/_bod skad du/_bslab pa kun las btus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
[\[1b.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di ltar bdag dang gzhan dag kyang /_/'jigs dang sdug bsngal mi 'dod na/_/bdag dang bye brag ci yod na[#]/_/gang de bsrung la gzhan mi bsrung /_/sdug bsngal mthar 'byin
[\[1b.3\]]'dod pa dang /_/bde ba'i mthar yang 'gro 'dod pas/_/dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan bya ste[#]/_/byang chub la yang blo brtan bya/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ni/_/rgyas par theg pa che las 'byung /_/gang
[\[1b.4\]]gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ba'i[#]/_/gnad kyi gnas rnams 'dir rig bya/_/bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dang /_/dge ba dus gsum skyes pa rnams/_/sems can kun la btang ba dang /_/de bsrung
[\[1b.5\]]dag pa spel ba'o/_/sems can rnams kyis longs spyad phyir/_/lus la sogs pas [#]bsrung bar bya/_/ma bsrungs longs spyod gang las 'ong /_/gar mi spyod pa ci zhig sbyin/_/de bas sems
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]can longs spyod [#]phyir/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtong [#]zhing /_/mdo sde dag la rtag blta bas/_/lus la sogs pa bsrung bar bya/_/de la lus bsrung gang zhe na/_/gnod par 'gyur ba spang ba ste/_/
[\[2a.2\]]de kun gang gis 'thob ce na/_/'bras bu med pa'i byed spangs pas/_/de yang rtag tu dran pas 'grub/_/dran pa shin tu gus las 'byung /_/gus ni zhi ba'i che ba nyid/_/shes par gyur nas brtun pas skyed/_/mnyam gzhag [# ]
[\[2a.3\]]yang dag ji bzhin du/_/shes par 'gyur zhes thub pas gsungs/_/phyi rol g.yo ba bzlog pa yis[#]/_/sems ni zhi las mi g.yo zhing [#]/_/kun du mi rgod 'jam pa dang /_/ran cing mnyen par smra ba yis/_/skal can skye bo
[\[2a.4\]]'dun par 'gyur/_/gzung bar 'os pa'ang skye bar 'gyur/_/'di ni gzung 'os ma yin na/_/'jig rten rgyal ba'i myu gu brnyas/_/thal bas g.yogs pa'i me bzhin du/_/sems can dmyal la sogs par sreg_/de phyir rgyal
[\[2a.5\]]bas sdom pa'i mdor/_/gang gis sems can ma dad 'gyur/_/de ni bsgrims te rnam spang [#]zhes/_/dkon mchog sprin las bka' stsal to/_/'di ni bdag lus bsrung ba ste/_/sman dang gos la sogs bcas pas/_/bdag
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]la sred pas longs spyad na/_/nyon mongs bcas pa'i ltung bar 'gyur/_/legs spyad dag la brtsam par bya/_/thams cad la yang tshod rig bya/_/de ltas bslab pa'i gzhi 'di las/_/de yi longs spyod bsrung mi dka'/_/rang don rnam smin sred spangs pas/_/
[\[2b.2\]]dge ba kun du bsrung bar 'gyur/_/'gyod par yang ni mi bya ste/_/byas par gyur kyang bsgrag mi bya/_/rnyed dang bkur stis 'jigs bya zhing /_/khengs pa rtag tu spang bar bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' dad bya zhing /_/chos la yid gnyis spang bar bya/_/lus ni rnam par sbyang
[\[2b.3\]]byas na/_/phan pa'i longs spyod 'gyur ba ste/_/'bras chan legs par tshos pa dang /_/gzegs [#]med lus can phan pa 'dra/_/ji ltar lo tog btsas khebs na/_/nad kyis zhum zhing rgyas mi 'gyur/_/de ltar sangs rgyas myu gu yang /_/nyon mongs khebs na rgyas mi
[\[2b.4\]]'gyur/_/lus kyi dag pa gang zhe na/_/sdig dang nyon mongs rnam sbyong yin/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs tshul du/_/'bad pa med na ngan 'gror [#]'gro/_/bzod bya thos pa bcal bar bya/_/de nas nags su gnas par bya/_/mnyam par gzhag [#]la brtson bya zhing /_/mi sdug
[\[2b.5\]]la sogs bsgom par bya/_/yang dag 'tsho ba sbyangs pa yis/_/longs spyod dag par shes par bya/_/stong pa snying rje'i snying po can/_/bskyed [#]pas bsod nams dag par 'gyur/_/gzung bar bya ba rab mang la/_/'di ni nyung na 'dis ci bya/_/shin tu ngoms pa skyed ma yin/_/
[\[2b.6\]]de phyir 'di ni 'phel bar bya/_/de la [#]lus 'phel [#]gang zhe na/_/le lo med dang stobs skyed yin/_/stong dang snying rje'i snying po can/_/sbyin pas longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/_/brtson dang bsam pa brtan [#]par yang /_/dang po nan tan byas nas ni/_/snying rje mdun du
[\[2b.7\]]bzhag nas ni[#]/_/dge ba spel la nan tan bya/_/bzang po spyod pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/phyag 'tshal la sogs gus par bya/_/dad pa la sogs rtag tu bsgo/_/byams dang sangs rgyas sogs dran bya/_/dus rnams kun du sems can don/_/chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]med/_/byang chub sems ni mdor bsdu na/_/bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu yin no/_/'grub pa yang dag spong rnams te/_/bag yod pa dang ma bral zhing /_/dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang /_/tshul bzhin du ni sems pa'o[#]/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa'i tshig
[\[3a.2\]]le'ur byas pa/[ #]mkhan po zhi ba lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D3940}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shik+Sha [#]sa muts+tsha yaH[# ]bod skad du/_bslab pa kun las btus pa/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
[\[3a.3\]]lo/_/gang ma thos pas dmyal ba la sogs g.yang sar ni/_/bsreg [#]la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad mtha' yas dag_/sems ma zhi ba khyed kyis yang yang myong gyur pa/_/de ni mnyan phyir gus pa shin tu rgya cher bsten/_/gang thos nas kyang g.yeng ba med pa'i bdag can
[\[3a.4\]]gyis/_/sdig spong sngon byas mang po ma lus zad byed la/_/sngon chad ma thob pa yi bde ba'ang rab 'thob cing /_/bde ba las ni nam yang nyams par mi 'gyur dang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i [#]bde mchog mi zad dang /_/sangs rgyas go 'phang mnyam med phun tshogs
[\[3a.5\]]thob byed pa/_/shin tu rnyed dka'i rin chen chos [#]de deng thob na/_/legs par brjod pa 'di la dal thob gus par nyon/_/khams gsum phan mdzad gcig po de [#]gsung mnyan bya'i [#]phyir/_/lha dang klu dang grub pa [#]dri za gnod sbyin dang /_/mkha' lding lha min mi'am ci dbang 'dre la sogs/_/
[\[3a.6\]]dgar [#]bcas nyan par mos shing yid dang 'dir shog shig_/bder gshegs chos kyi sku mnga' sras bcas dang /_/phyag 'os kun la'ang gus par phyag 'tshal te/_/bde [#]gshegs sras kyi sdom la 'jug pa rnams/_/mdor bsdus don gyi ngag gis brjod par bya/_/sngon
[\[3a.7\]]chad [#]ma byung ci yang 'dir brjod med/_/sdeb sbyor mkhas pa'ang bdag la yod min te/_/de phyir gzhan gyi don du bdag mi 'bad/_/rang gi yid la bsgom phyir ngas 'di brtsams[#]/_/dge ba bsgom phyir bdag gi [#]dad pa'i shugs/_/'di dag gis kyang re zhig 'phel
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]'gyur la/_/bdag dang skal ba mnyam pa gzhan gyis kyang /_/ji ste 'di dag mthong na don yod 'gyur/_/dal 'byor shin tu rnyed par dka' ba dang /_/skyes bu'i don bsgrub 'di ni rnyed gyur pas/_/gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsams na/_/phyis 'di [#]yang dag 'byor par ga la
[\[3b.2\]]'gyur/_/ji skad du 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdor 'phags pa rgyal ba'i drod kyi skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa las mi khom pa brgyad las ldog pa yang rnyed par dka'/_mir 'gyur ba [#]yang rnyed par dka'/_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag pa yang rnyed
[\[3b.3\]]par dka'/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang rnyed par dka'/_dbang po ma tshang ba med pa yang rnyed par dka'/_sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyan pa yang rnyed par dka'/_/skyes bu dam pa dang 'grogs pa yang rnyed par dka'/_yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang
[\[3b.4\]]rnyed par dka'/_yang dag pa'i tshul rjes su bstan pa nye bar sgrub pa yang rnyed par dka'/_yang dag par 'tsho ba [#]yang rnyed par dka'/_mi'i 'jig rten na [#]chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa yang rnyed par dka' na zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de'i phyir
[\[3b.5\]]rnam pa [#]de lta bu dang phrad pa la brten [#]nas/_/sems can chen po gang la gang tsho bdag dang gzhan dag kyang /_/'jigs dang sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa/_/de tshe de srung gzhan mi [#]gang /_/bdag dang bye brag ci [#]zhig yod/_/snyam pa de lta bu'i so sor spyod [#]pa skyes nas des [#]bdag
[\[3b.6\]]dang sems can gyi khams rnams kyi/_sdug bsngal mthar 'byin 'dod pa dang /_/bde ba'i mthar yang 'gro 'dod pas/_/dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan byas te/_/byang chub la yang blo brtan bya/_/'di ltar dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs [#]las/_rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad
[\[3b.7\]]gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed pas[#]/_/byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas/_/skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o/_/dad pa sngon 'gro ma ltar bskyed pa ste/_/yon tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed/_/dogs pa sel zhing chu bo rnams las
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]sgrol/_/dad pa bde legs grong khyer mtshon byed cing /_/dad pa rnyog pa med cing sems dang byed/_/nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin/_/dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog_/lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin/_/dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar
[\[4a.2\]]byed/_/dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed[#]/_/dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed/_/sangs rgyas go 'phang ston [#]cing thob byed yin/_/dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed/_/dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi brdzi zhing /_/nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi
[\[4a.3\]]rten yin/_/dad pa rang byung yon tan rnams kyang tshol/_/dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags pa med/_/mi dal spong [#]zhing dal ba mchog cig yin/_/dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing /_/thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin/_/sa bon ma rul yon tan rnams
[\[4a.4\]]kyi rgyu/_/dad pa byang chub shing ni rnam par skyed[#]/_/ye shes khyad par yon tan 'phel bar byed/_/dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston byed [#]yin/_/gang dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dad gus bcas/_/de dag tshul khrims bslab [#]pa yongs mi 'dor/_/gang dag tshul khrims bslab pa mi
[\[4a.5\]]'dor ba/_/yon tan ldan de yon tan ldan pas bstod[#]/_/gang dag rtag tu chos la dad gus bcas/_/de dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan ngoms pa med/_/gang dag rgyal ba'i chos nyan mi ngoms pa/_/de dag chos la mos pa bsam mi khyab/_/gang dag rtag tu dge 'dun dad gus bcas/_/
[\[4a.6\]]de dag mi ldog dge 'dun dad pa yin/_/gang dag mi ldog dge 'dun rab dad pa/_/de dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog 'gyur/_/gang dag dad pa'i stobs kyis mi ldog pa/_/de dag dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal/_/gang dag dbang po rno zhing rab gsal ba/_/de dag sdig pa'i
[\[4a.7\]]grogs po rnam par spangs/_/gang dag sdig pa'i grogs po rnam [#]spangs pa/_/de dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs su bzung /_/gang dag chos ldan grogs kyis yongs bzung ba/_/de dag dge ba rgya chen sogs par byed/_/gang dag dge ba rgya chen sogs byed pa/_/bdag
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]nyid chen po de dag rgyu stobs ldan/_/bdag nyid chen po rgyu stobs gang ldan pa/_/de dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya chen 'gyur/_/gang dag mos pa'i khyad par rgya che ba/_/de dag rgyal ba kun kyis rtag byin brlabs/_/gang dag rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa/_/de dag byang chub don du
[\[4b.2\]]sems kyang skye/_/gang dag byang chub don du sems skye ba/_/de dag drang srong chen po'i yon tan brtson/_/drang srong chen po'i yon tan gang brtson pa/_/de dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs su skye/_/gang dag rigs mtho sangs rgyas rigs skyes pa/_/de dag mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi
[\[4b.3\]]sbyor spangs/_/mnyam zhing sbyor dang mi sbyor gang spangs pa/_/de dag dad dang bsam pa rnam par dag_/gang dag dad dang bsam pa rnam dag pa/_/de dag lhag pa'i bsam pa dam pa mchog_/gang dag lhag bsam dam pa mchog ldan pa/_/de dag rtag tu pha rol phyin pa
[\[4b.4\]]spyod/_/gang dag rtag tu pha rol phyin spyod pa/_/de dag theg pa chen po 'di la zhugs/_/gang dag theg pa chen po 'dir zhugs pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas rnams la sgrub pas mchod/_/gang dag sgrub pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed
[\[4b.5\]]'gyur/_/gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi phyed pa/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong /_/gang dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba/_/de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/_/gang la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/_/de dag bar skabs
[\[4b.6\]]chos las nyams mi 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /_dad pa'i rtsa ba can gyi yon tan rgya chen po mtha' [#]yas pa zhig der [#]gsungs te/_/de rdzogs nas yang mdor bsdus te gsungs pa/_'di 'dra chos ni gang dag dad gyur pa/_/sems can so so skye bo'i tshogs
[\[4b.7\]]na dkon/_/gang dag dge bsags bsod nams byas gyur pa/_/de dag rgyu yi stobs kyis [#]'di la dang /_/gang gA zhing bcu'i rdul snyed sems can la/_/bde ba kun gyis bskal par bsnyen bkur yang /_/chos 'dir dad pa'i [#]bsod nams ci 'dra ba/_/bsod nams khyad
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]par de 'dra de la med/_/ces gsungs pa yin no/_/de skad du chos bcu pa'i mdo las kyang /_gang gis 'dren pa nges 'byung ba/_/dad pa theg pa mchog yin te/_/de'i [#]phyir blo dang ldan pa'i mis/_/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bsten/_/ma dad pa yi mi dag la/_/
[\[5a.2\]]dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/_/sa bon me yis tshig pa las/_/myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas ni [#]'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /_kun dga' bo dad pa la sbyor bar bya ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'o zhes
[\[5a.3\]]bstan to/_/de skad du/_seng ges zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_dad pas mi khom spang [#]bar 'gyur/_/zhes bka' stsal pa yin no/_/de ltar dad pa'i rtsa ba brtan par byas la/_bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i phyir na [#]byang chub kyi sems brtan par bya'o/_/ji skad du seng
[\[5a.4\]]ges zhus pa las/_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal bu seng ges zhus pa/_chos rnams thams cad bsdu ba ni/_/chos gang gis ni thob par 'gyur/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/sems can rnams ni dga' ba 'thob[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can
[\[5a.5\]]thams cad thar bya'i phyir/_/byang chub don du sems btud pa/_/des ni chos rnams bsdu ba 'thob/_/des ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de skad du/_'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas
[\[5a.6\]]kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o/_/'jig rten thams cad rten pas sa lta bu'o zhes bya ba nas/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su srung bas pha lta bu'o zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_
[\[5a.7\]]de bzhin du sbyar te dbul ba thams cad yang dag par gcod pas rnam thos kyi bu lta bu'o/_/don thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs/_
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa'i dgra pham par bya ba la mdung thung lta bu'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'gebs pas go cha lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i mgo lhung bar byed pas ral gri lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i shing gcod pas sta re lta bu'o/_/'tshe [#]ba thams cad las skyob pas mtshon cha
[\[5b.2\]]lta bu'o/_/'khor ba'i chu'i nang na gnas pa steng du 'byin pas mchil pa lta bu'o/_/sgrib pa dang khebs pa'i rtsa ba [#]thams cad rnam par 'thor bas rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam thams cad bsdus pa'i phyir mdor bstan pa lta bu'o/_/
[\[5b.3\]]lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la mchod rten lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub kyi sems ni yon tan [#]de dag dang /_yon tan gyi bye brag tshad med pa gzhan dang yang ldan no zhes brjod do/_/so so'i skye bo la yang byang chub kyi sems skye ste/_'di tshig tsam ni [#]ma
[\[5b.4\]]yin no zhes bya bar [#]ji ltar shes she na/_mdo sde du ma mthong ba las te/_re zhig 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/_'jig tshogs la lta ba ri rab dang mnyam pa dran [#]nas byang chub kyi sems skye zhing de las [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnam par skye'o zhes ji skad du
[\[5b.5\]]bstan pa dang /_dkon mchog za ma tog gi mdo las kyang /_/so so'i skye bo la yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar shes te/_ji skad du 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na ka la bing+ka'i phru gu sgo nga'i sbubs kyi nang na 'dug pa sgo nga ma brtol zhing sbubs nas ma byung yang ka la bing
[\[5b.6\]]ka'i sgra nyid du 'byin to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs kyi nang na 'dug pa bdag tu lta ba ma brtol zhing khams gsum las ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi sgra 'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i sgra [# ]
[\[5b.7\]]'byin to zhes gsungs so/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros la sas bar mthongs phye nas de 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung [#]ste/_de ni stong pa nyid la ma dad cing stong pa nyid
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]du smra ba la khong khro ba byas pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/nges pa dang ma nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_/phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang zhe na/_'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi
[\[6a.2\]]zhing lnga'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'da' bar 'dod nas/_des phyugs kyi shing rta la zhon te lam du zhugs nas/_de yun ring pos lam ring por dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa las/_de der rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen pos bzlog nas dpag tshad [#]khrir ded de
[\[6a.3\]]phyir phul na skyes bu des phyugs kyi shing rtas 'jig rten gyi khams de dag 'da' ba'am bskal pa las brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par yang 'jig rten kyi khams gcig kyang 'da' bar nus sam gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/
[\[6a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin du gang la la zhig gis byang chub tu sems bskyed la theg pa chen po mi 'dzin mi klog par/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams la brten [#]cing de dag dang lhan cig tu sten par byed nyan thos kyi theg pa klog cing kha ton byed dpyod
[\[6a.5\]]cing khong du chud par byed la/_gzhan dag kyang klog tu 'jug pa nas/_khong du chud par byed pa'i bar du byed pa ni[#]/_de ni des shes rab rtul por 'gyur te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi lam nas slar drangs nas phyir ldog [#]go/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i byang chub kyi sems
[\[6a.6\]]bsgoms [#]pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi mig gang yin pa de yang rtul por 'gyur [#]zhing nyams par byed de 'di ni phyugs kyi shing rta lta bus 'gro ba'i byang chub sems dpa'o zhes bshad do/_/de bas na de ltar [#]de dag gi stong pa nyid la mos pa dang
[\[6a.7\]]theg pa chen po la mngon par dga' ba ni/_mos pas spyod pa [#]yongs su ma rdzogs pa la yang sbyar bar [#]snang na/_mos pa rab la spyod [#]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la [#]lta ci zhig smos/_de ni dkon mchog sprin las byis pa'i spyod pa dang log par 'jug pa thams cad las 'das
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]par brjod cing /_ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang rnam par thar pa dang mngon par shes pa dang rig pa grangs med pas rnam par rol pa/_chos mtha' yas pa la dga' zhing mos pas zang zing med pa phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub pa'i
[\[6b.2\]]dga' ba'i shugs kyis [#]snang ba thob pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dpag tu med par theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i bsgom pa sna tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa gzhan gyi don gyi nan tan tshar phyin pa/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa
[\[6b.3\]]grub pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba brgya stong phun sum tshogs par brjod do/_/ci ste 'di drang ba'i don yin na/_ci'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gzhan sa 'di la mi 'dod/_'dir 'dod pa tsam gyis drang ba'i don du byed pa'i bye brag gi rtags kyang mi rnyed do/_/mos pas spyod pa
[\[6b.4\]]chen po'i chos nyid du gsungs pa las kyang /_mos pas spyod pa 'bring dang chung ngu'i rnam pa yang ci nas yod pa nyid du rtogs so/_/yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las/_ji skad du bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu sems bskyed pa su'i lags/_rgyal po chen po
[\[6b.5\]]gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pa ma 'khrugs pa'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das su'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ma 'khrugs [#]bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po gang gi snying rje chen po skye ba'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das su'i snying rje chen po skye/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
[\[6b.6\]]stsal pa/_rgyal po [#]chen po gang gi [#]sems can thams cad la yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems skye ba'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ba lags/_bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po nam bdag bde ba btang ba yin no
[\[6b.7\]]zhes gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ci zhig yin zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems tsam gyis chog par 'dzin pa rnams snying rje la dga' ba skyed [# ]pa'i phyir 'di gsungs te/_dper na gang la rnal 'byor med pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung [#]ba ma yin no zhes
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du 'dir yang byang chub kyi sems gzhan smad par rig par bya'i/_byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gzhan du mi skye ba ni ma yin no/_/ji skad du chos bcu pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rigs la gnas
[\[7a.2\]]pa byang chub tu sems ma bskyed na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis [#]bskul zhing skyo bar byas/_yang dag par 'dzin du bcug ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni byang chub kyi sems la mos pa'i rgyu dang po'o/_/
[\[7a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub bam byang chub kyi sems kyi bsngags pa brjod pa thos nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni rgyu gnyis pa'o/_/sems can mgon med pa dang skyabs med pa dang dpung gnyen med pa rnams mthong nas snying rje'i sems
[\[7a.4\]]nye bar gzhag [#]ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'di ni rgyu gsum pa'o/_/des de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog yongs su rdzogs pa mthong nas dga' ba bskyed de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
[\[7a.5\]]bskyed pa 'di ni rgyu bzhi pa'o zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/byang chub kyi sems de ni rnam pa gnyis te/_byang chub tu smon pa'i sems dang byang chub tu chas pa'i sems so/_/ji skad du sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[7a.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa de dag ni sems can gyi khams na dkon no/_/de bas kyang gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chas pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de la byang chub tu smon pa'i sems ni ngas
[\[7a.7\]]sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes sems smon pa las skyes pa yin te/_'phags pa dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo las/_g.yo byas te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi rgyur gsungs na dge ba sna 'ga' byas te sems bskyed pa lta ci smos zhes gsungs
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]so/_/ji skad du bskal pa bzang po'i mdo las/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ba lang rdzir gyur pas ba gu [#]la'i me tog phul nas dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa klog [#]gi sgron
[\[7b.2\]]ma zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa thag par gyur pas ras kyi kha tshar phul te/_dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin du [#]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa 'od 'phro can grong khyer kyi sprang por gyur pas rtsa'i sgron ma phul
[\[7b.3\]]te [#]dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon brten [#]zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa thub dka' shing thun du gyur pas so shing phul te dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'jam dpal grags zhes bya ba
[\[7b.4\]]la de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal mtshan sman pa'i rgyal por gyur pas skyu rur cig phul nas dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no/_/des kyang 'khor ba'i bde ba mtha' yas pa bskyed pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems spyod pa
[\[7b.5\]]dang bral ba la yang brnyas par mi bya ste/_ji skad du 'phags pa byams pa'i rnam par thar pa las/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na [# ]rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang /_gser gyi rgyan khyad par du 'phags pa thams cad zil gyis gnon cing rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi 'dor la dbul ba
[\[7b.6\]]thams cad kyang rnam par zlog go/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che nan tan dang bral yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi gser gyi rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon cing byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dor
[\[7b.7\]]la 'khor ba'i dbul ba thams cad kyang rnam par zlog go zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'di las kyang spyod pa dang mi [#]ldan yang byang chub kyi sems ni phan par 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_gang gi phyir rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las/_rgyal po chen po 'di ltar khyod [# ]
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]bya ba mang byed pa mang ste/_nyin mtshan du thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang [#]bslab pa nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la bslab par mi nus te/_de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod yang dag par
[\[8a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dun pa dang dad pa dang don du gnyer ba dang smon pa/_'gro yang rung 'greng yang rung 'dug kyang rung nyal yang rung sad kyang rung za yang rung 'thung yang rung rtag par rgyun du dran par gyis la yid la zung ste sgoms shig_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[8a.3\]]dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang so so'i skye bo thams cad dang bdag gi [#]'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus shing gzhal te rtsis [#]la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog nas/_nam mkha'
[\[8a.4\]]dang 'dra ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_mtshungs pa'i bar gyis [#]rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/rjes su yi rang nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa [#]bya bar phul cig_/phul nas sems can
[\[8a.5\]]thams cad dang thun mong du gyis shig_/de nas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du thob par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar nyin gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig_/_
[\[8a.6\]]rgyal po chen po khyod [# ]de ltar zhugs na rgyal srid kyang byed la rgyal po'i bya ba yang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_byang chub kyi tshogs kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/mdo sde de nyid las de'i rnam par smin pa yang gsungs pa ni/_rgyal po chen po khyod yang
[\[8a.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/_lan du mar lha'i nang du skyes lan du mar mi'i nang du skyes te/_lha dang mir skyes pa na thams cad du yang dbang po byed par gyur kyang /_da dung rgyal po chen po khyod kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las la bri ba'am/_gang bar mi mngon no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te 'on kyang rgyal po chen po [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems gcig gis kyang /_sems can thams cad bsgral bar dmigs pa dang /_sems can
[\[8b.2\]]thams cad dgrol bar dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad dbugs dbyung bar dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla [#]bar dmigs pa'i phyir/_dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med dpag tu med pa sogs par 'gyur na/_gang de ltar mang du
[\[8b.3\]]byed pa lta ci smos zhes bya ba yin no/_/byang chub kyi sems de yang gzugs kyi sku mthong ba las skyes par de las [#]sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa las 'byung ste[#]/_de lta [#]na re zhig smon pa byang chub kyi sems su rig par bya'o/_/ca [#]sar ma chud pa la yang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom
[\[8b.4\]]pa'i dbang du bya ba yod dam med ces bya ba [#]'di brjod par bya'o zhe na yod par rig par bya ste/_nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo las/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i rgyu las rtsa ba'i ltung bar gsungs pa'i phyir[#]/_sa bcu pa'i mdo las ni sa dang po la/_bdag gis [#]sems can 'di dag
[\[8b.5\]]la yo byad mang po thams cad nye bar sbyin no snyam pa ma gtogs par su las kyang bkur sti ci yang mi 'dod do zhes bstan to/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' ba la mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang de bzhin
[\[8b.6\]]gshegs pa'i rigs su nges shing rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin du gzhol ba yin no zhes kyang gsungs so/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa yang de la med na theg pa chen po lta ga la yod ces gsungs la/_de bzhin du/_'phags pa drag shul
[\[8b.7\]]can gyis [#]zhus par/_ser snas yongs su dkris [#]pa la yang bslab pa'i gnas bcas pa dang rab tu dga' ba'i sa la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang bral [# ]bas bdag la chags pa'ang med na/_yo byad thams cad la chags pa lta ga la yod ces gsungs so/_/de bzhin du
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]mgo la sogs pa sbyin pa yang gsungs te/_de lta bu [#]la sogs pa mdo sde dag tu sar ma chud pa la [#]bslab pa bcas par snang ngo /_/gang du byang chub sems dpa'i dbang du byas nas phyir [#]bstan pa der yang goms par byar mi rung ba'am/_dgag pa'i ngag gis [# ]
[\[9a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas bslab par mi bya bar 'gyur te/_de gnyis med na ni thams cad la bslab par bya'o/_/de la yang bslab pa gcig sgrub [#]pa na bslab pa gzhan bsrung ma nus kyang ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_de skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas [#]bstan pa'i mdo
[\[9a.3\]]las/_sbyin pa'i dus na tshul khrims la brtul ba btang snyoms la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa yin no/_/'di la lhod par yang mi bya ste/_lhag ma gzhan la mi sgrub [#]pa yang ma yin gyi/_ci nus ci 'os su de bzhin nyid du sgrub po zhes sa bcu pa'i mdo las gsungs pa'i
[\[9a.4\]]phyir ro/_/sdom pa 'di ni bud med nyon mongs pa chung ngu sems byang chub tu mos pa la'ang 'grub ste/_gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las/_shA ri'i bu chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i bden par smra ba yin no zhes bya ba nas brtsams te/_shA
[\[9a.5\]]ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i don du brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa dang zhes gsungs pa yin no/_/'di las brtsams te lung nod pa
[\[9a.6\]]thams cad dang /_sdom pa bzung ba yang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas la goms pa lhur byed pa sdom pa dang ldan pa las bya ste[#]/_de ltar byas na de bslab pa las 'das na rab tu ngo mtshar [#]bar 'gyur zhes bla ma la bslus par dogs pa'i 'jigs pa skye ba'am
[\[9a.7\]]de la nan tan bya mi dgos par dga' ba dang gus pas grub par [#]'gyur ro/_/de bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar bslab pa [#]'di'i nang nas/_bslab pa gang yang rung ba grub par 'dod pas yang dag par len par byed do/_/de ltar
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]na 'di ni sdom pa'i spyi'i chos yin no/_/yang na de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen med na phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon [#]du bsgoms nas/_sdom pa dang bdag [#]gi stobs dang yang sbyar nas blang ste/_de ltar ma yin na sangs rgyas dang
[\[9b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bslus par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las/_chung zad cig bsams [#]nas mi sbyin pa ni yi dgas su skye [#]la/_dam bcas nas mi sbyin pa ni sems can dmyal bar
[\[9b.3\]]'gro'o zhes gsungs na/_'gro ba ma lus pa'i bla na med pa'i don dam bcas nas sgrub par mi byed pa lta ci smos/_de bas na chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang /_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bden pa lhur byed par 'gyur bar bya ste/_rigs kyi bu bden pa yang dag par
[\[9b.4\]]brjod pa ni chos yang dag par brjod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la bden pa gang zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas sems de srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhing /_sems can rnams la yang log par mi byed pa 'di ni byang
[\[9b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i bden pa'o/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la sems de phyis yongs su gtong zhing /_sems can rnams la'ang log par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brdzun [#]du smra ba tha ma yin no zhes
[\[9b.6\]]gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las kyang /_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di lta ste dper na rgyal po'am rgyal po'i blon pos chen pos grong khyer gyi skye bo thams cad [#]sang zan sbyin no zhes mgron du bos nas yal bar dor [#]te/_bza' ba dang btung ba mi sbyar nas [#]des
[\[9b.7\]]skye ba'i [#]tshogs de dag thams cad bslus pa yin te/_de dag kyang bza' ba dang btung ba ma thob pas 'phya zhing slar 'dong ba de bzhin du blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' ma rgal ba bsgral ba dang /_ma grol ba [#]dgrol ba dang dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung ba dang yongs
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]su mya ngan las ma 'das pa yongs su mya ngan las bzla [#]ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la [#]dbugs phyung la/_mang du thos pa dang de las gzhan pa dge ba [#]byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la yang brtson par mi byed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni ji skad
[\[10a.2\]]smras pa de bzhin du [#]byed pa ma yin te/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba yin no/_/de lta bu [#]sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis [#]mthong na 'phya zhing gzhogs 'phyas byed la rnam par smod de/_gang dag [#]mchod sbyin bya bar dam bcas pa nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa'i
[\[10a.3\]]mchod sbyin gyi bdag po de dag ni dkon no/_/blo gros rgya mtsho de lta bas na tshig gang gis lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten slu bar 'gyur ba'i tshig de lta bu byang chub sems dpas smra bar mi bya'o/_/blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang gang [#]la la zhig gis/_byang chub sems
[\[10a.4\]]dpa' gang la chos kyi don bya bar gsol ba btab pa de la byang chub sems dpa' [#]kho bos khyod kyis [#]chos kyi don 'di yongs su thob par bya'o/_/zhes tshig smras par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpas de la lus ni yongs su gtang [#]bar bya'i sems can slu bar ni mi bya'o zhes gsungs
[\[10a.5\]]so[#]/_/de bas na rang gi [#]mthu dang sbyar te dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig tsam yang yang [#]dag par blangs la bsrung bar bya ste/_'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mdo las [#]ji skad du/_dge ba'i lam bcu po 'di dag gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi gang gis [#]ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tha na dge ba'i las
[\[10a.6\]]kyi lam gcig tsam yang mi srung la/_'on kyang tshig 'di skad du nga ni theg pa chen po pa ste nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshol lo zhes zer na/_gang zag de ni shin tu tshul 'chos pa brdzun [#]chen po smra ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar 'jig
[\[10a.7\]]rten la slu bar byed pa chad par smra ba ste/_de rmongs bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed cing log par ltung [#]bar 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/dus ji srid du nus pa de srid du yang [#]dge ba yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya ste/_'di ni sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi rgyal po'i mdo las blta
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/sems can chen po gang de lta bu thos nas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba [#]shes rab kyis rtogs par byas nas/_skye bo ma lus pa sdug bsngal las bskyab par khur khyer bar spro ba des ni [#]phyag bya ba dang mchod pa dang /_sdig pa bshags pa dang /_bsod
[\[10b.2\]]nams la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_sangs rgyas la bskul ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_byang chub tu bsngo ba byas la/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la gsol ba gdab ste/_de'i tshig gi [#]rjes su brjod pa'am/_yang na bdag nyid kyis brjod pas/_slob dpon dgongs su gsol/_
[\[10b.3\]]bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhes smos la/_ji ltar 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis [#]sngon gyi tshe'i rtogs pa brjod pa las spyod pa dang ldan par byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du sems
[\[10b.4\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/des 'di skad ces/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa yi/_/sngon gyi tha ma ji srid pa/_/de srid sems can phan don du/_/spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bgyi/_/'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/_/'gro ba
[\[10b.5\]]thams cad mgron gnyer nas/_/de dag dbul zhing phongs las dgrol/_/de ring phan chad gal te yang /_/bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed nas[#]/_/phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i/_/sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par 'gyur/_/byang chub nam zhig thob bar du/_/
[\[10b.6\]]tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang /_/phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang /_/de ring phan chad mi bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis [#]spyad/_/sdig pa'i [#]'dod pa yongs su gtang [#]/_/tshul khrims sdom dang nges pa la/_/sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya/_/bdag 'dir [#]byang
[\[10b.7\]]chub rings [#]tshul du/_/'tshang rgyar mos shing spro ba med/_/phyi mthar thug gi bar du yang /_/sems can gcig phyir spyad par bgyi/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bgyi/_/phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du/_/bdag gi ming ni
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]grags par bgyi/_/lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang /_/rnam pa kun du bdag gis sbyang /_/yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bgyi/_/mi dge'i [#]las ni spyad mi bgyi/_/zhes brjod do/_/'di la dus thams cad du sdom pa bzung ba las tshe rabs gzhan du ltung ba
[\[11a.2\]]'byung ba'i [#]dogs par yang mi bya ste/_mdo 'di nyid las mi 'khrugs pa'i smon lam snang [#]ba'i phyir ro/_/de las 'di skad du/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na tshig 'di skad du/_gal te bdag tshe rabs thams cad du rab tu ma
[\[11a.3\]]byung na bdag gis sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par 'gyur ro zhes brjod de/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' [#]mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe rabs thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste/_de
[\[11a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung ma byung yang rung /_gdon mi za bar [#]khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnyed pa'i mchog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_chung ma dang
[\[11a.5\]]bu dang bu mo la de chags par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/ji ltar tshe rabs gzhan du nyes pa 'dir mi 'gyur ba de ltar ni 'di nyid du 'chad par 'gyur bas [#]des na re zhig gzhag go/_/de [#]ltar sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba la ltung ba'i mtshan nyid gang gis [#]brjod pa'i dngos po
[\[11a.6\]]bdag nyid kyis brtags te spong ba dang /_ltung ba'i gzugs brnyan dang ltung ba ma yin pa'i gzugs brnyan la rmongs par mi 'gyur bar ltung ba [#]spyi'i mtshan nyid brjod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba
[\[11a.7\]]thams cad zhi bar bya ba dang /_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i phyir/_g.yo med par lus dang ngag dang yid brtson pas nan tan mi byed pa dang /_de'i rkyen tshogs pa mi tshol ba dang /_de'i bar du gcod pa'i gnyen po la mi 'bad pa dang /_sdug
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba chung ngus sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba chen po'i gnyen por 'gyur ba mi skyed pa dang /_don chen po sgrub pa'i phyir don chung ngu nyams par mi byed pas/_skad cig gcig tsam yang yal bar bor na ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/mdor na rang gi nus pa'i
[\[11b.2\]]yul ma yin pa'i bya ba rnams la ltung ba med de/_don dam [#]pa nyid kyis de la bslab pa bcas pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/gzhan la ni rang bzhin gyis [#]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa nyid du gzung ba kho na'o/_/rang gi nus pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa gang zhig la brtson [#]par byed na ltung bar 'gyur
[\[11b.3\]]te/_de ni bsam mi dgos par spyir sdig pa bshags pa'i nang du 'dus pas de las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni mdor na/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i khog pa yin te/_rgyas par ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa mtha' yas par bshad du yod do/_/yang [#]mdor na byang
[\[11b.4\]]chub sems dpa'i ltung ba rnam pa gnyis te/_ci nus par rigs [#]pa dang ma [#]rigs pa [#]ma brtags par rtsom pa'am rtog [#]pa'am btang snyoms su 'jog pa ni ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/brtags te gar 'os pa las 'da' bar byed na/_tha na gdol pa'i bran gyis dpyas na
[\[11b.5\]]yang ltung ba dang bcas pa yin no/_/'di gang las shes she na/_lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las gsungs pa las shes [#]te/_byams pa rgyu bzhis sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i spobs par rig par bya'o/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_byams pa 'di la spobs pa
[\[11b.6\]]don dang ldan pa yin te don med pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /_chos dang ldan pa yin te chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang /_nyon mongs pa 'bri bar byed pa yin te nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa ma yin pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan dang phan yon ston pa
[\[11b.7\]]yin te 'khor ba'i yon tan dang phan yon ston pa ma yin pa ste 'di bzhis so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te byams pa gang la la rgyu 'di bzhis spobs sam/_spobs par 'gyur ba de la rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dag gis sangs rgyas su 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/ston par
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]'du shes byas te dam pa'i chos mnyan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa gang cung zad legs par smras pa [#]de thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa yin no/_/byams pa de la su spobs pa 'di dag la [#]sangs rgyas kyis [#]bshad pa ma yin no zhes spong
[\[12a.2\]]ba dang gang zag de la zhe sdang ba'i phyir[#]/_de dag la ri mo [#]mi byed na/_des [#]sangs rgyas kyis [#]bshad pa'i spobs pa thams cad spangs par 'gyur ro/_/chos spangs pas chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang mthun pa'i las kyis ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/yang
[\[12a.3\]]gang zhig goms pa'i don du 'di shes par 'dod pa des bslab pa kun las btus pa 'di la spyod pa'i sgo tsam bslab pa'i phyir brtson par byas te/_bslab pa la brtson pa 'bras bu shin tu [#]che ba'i phyir ro/_/rab tu zhi ba'i rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mdo las/_'jam dpal
[\[12a.4\]]gang gis[#]/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams las/_sangs rgyas re re la yang gang gA'i [#]klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal pos rab tu bkang ste dbul ba phul la de ltar 'bul bas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par dbul
[\[12a.5\]]ba phul ba [#]bas/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang gis [#]rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas phyogs gcig tu song ste 'di ltar sems kyis mngon par rtog cing /_'di lta bu'i chos la bslab par bya'o zhes slob par 'dod na/_des ma bslabs su zin kyang bsod
[\[12a.6\]]nams ches mang du bskyed [#]de/_byang chub sems dpa' nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po sbyin pa'i bsod nams ni de lta bu [#]ma yin no zhes ji skad du gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de bas na de lta bu'i phan yon mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpas [#]ci nas kyang phyir mi ldog par bya ste/_de nyid
[\[12a.7\]]las 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can de dag las/_sems can re re nas 'dzam bu'i gling la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyis [#]tshig 'di skad ces/_bdag
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]cag gis [#]gang theg pa chen po len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de'i sha las nyi ma re re zhing yang srang lnga lnga sen mos gcad par bya ste/_de tshul de lta bus srog dang dbral lo zhes smra ba la/_'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' de de skad
[\[12b.2\]]smra bas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur te/_tha na skrag pa'i sems gcig kyang mi skyed [#]zhum pa med gang [#]ba med the tshom med la phyir zhing chos yongs su gzung [#]ba la brtson te/_klog pa dang kha ton byed pa la brtson par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni/_'jam dpal
[\[12b.3\]]byang chub [#]sems dpa' [#]sbyin pa la dpa' ba/_tshul khrims la dpa' ba/_bzod pa la dpa' ba/_brtson 'grus la dpa' ba/_bsam gtan la dpa' ba/_shes rab la dpa' ba/_ting nge 'dzin la dpa' ba zhes bya'o/_/'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa'
[\[12b.4\]]de gsod pa'i mi de dag la mi khro zhing tha ba dang zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshangs pa dang mtshungs pa/_dbang po dang mtshungs pa mi g.yo ba yin no zhes ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no/_/'di las kyang da ltar gyi dus na bslab pa la gus
[\[12b.5\]]par byed pa 'bras bu rnam par smin pa che ba yin te/_zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las[#]/_/bskal pa bye ba gang gA'i bye snyed du/_/sangs rgyas dag ni bye ba khrag khrig la/_/gdugs dang ba dan mar me'i [#]phreng ba dang /_/zas dang skom gyis dad sems mchod byas pas[#]/_/gang gis
[\[12b.6\]]dam pa'i chos 'di 'jig pa'i tshe/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'gag pa na/_/nyin zhag dus [#]ni bslab pa gcig bzung ba/_/de bas bsod nams 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/zhes gsungs te/_de bas na bslab pa la gus par bya'o[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[12b.7\]]kyis mdo dag las byang chub sems dpa' bslab pa'i gzhi rnams gsungs te/_'phags pa [# ]dkon mchog sprin las/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' [#]rnams byang chub sems dpa'i bslab [#]pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dpa' 'di ltar dpyod de so sor thar pa'i sdom pa tsam gyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyang [#]/_de bzhin gshegs pas gang 'di mdo sde [#]do dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang
[\[13a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas bcas pa gang yin pa de dag la bdag gis bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar rgya cher gsungs pas/_bdag lta bu blo zhan pas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa shes par dka' bas na[#]/_
[\[13a.3\]]de la ji ltar byang chub [#]rigs she na/_/gang gis ltung bar mi 'gyur ba/_/gnad kyi gnas rnams 'dir rig bya/_/gnad kyi gnas de dag kyang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_/bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dang /_/dge ba dus gsum skyes pa rnams/_/sems can kun la btang
[\[13a.4\]]ba dang /_/de bsrung dag pa spel ba'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bsdus pa yin te/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsgom [#]pa glod na yang ltung bar 'gyur ba ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa'i mdo las gsungs pa bzhin te/_byang chub
[\[13a.5\]]sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi phyir/_sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ba'i lam gang bzung ba de/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dzin cing gnas pas bskal pa bye ba 'das nas/_tha na 'dug pa tsam gyis bde ba 'dod pa'i sems cig skyes na yang /_de la yang [# ]
[\[13a.6\]]byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag 'di ltar 'dug pa ni sems can thams cad la gnong skur [#]ro zhes so/_/'dul ba yongs su dag pa'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu mtshams med pa gang dag dang ldan na[#]/_byang
[\[13a.7\]]chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa [#]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i mtshams med pa ni 'di lta ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_lha'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]bskyed nas bar ma dor nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar sems mi bskyed na lha'i bu 'di ni mtshams med pa dang po'o/_/bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang [#]bar sems bskyed la bar ma dor ser sna'i sems dang lhan cig mi gnas pa 'di ni lha'i bu mtshams med pa gnyis
[\[13b.2\]]pa'o/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis bskyab par bya'o zhes de ltar sems bskyed la bar ma dor [#]zhum par mi byed pa 'di ni lha'i bu mtshams med pa gsum pa'o/_/chos thams cad ma skyes ma 'gags par khong du chud par bya'o zhes de ltar sems bskyed la bar ma dor lta
[\[13b.3\]]bar gyur pa'i nang du ma ltung [#]ba 'di ni lha'i bu mtshams med pa bzhi pa'o/_/skad cig ma [#]gcig dang [#]ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes de ltar sems bskyed la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par [#]bar ma dor mi 'dug cing rgyun mi
[\[13b.4\]]gcod pa 'di ni lha'i bu mtshams med pa lnga pa'o zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/de lta bas na lus dang longs spyod dang bsod nams rgyun mi 'chad par gtang ba dang bsrung ba dang dag pa dang spel ba ci rigs par bsgom par bya'o/_/de la re zhig gtang ba'i phyir yongs su 'dzin pa'i nyes pa bsgom
[\[13b.5\]]pa'i sgo nas 'dod chags dang bral ba bskyed cing gtong ba'i phan yon yang bsgom [#]mo/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/_/rul par gyur pa'i lus 'di dang /_/srog kyang g.yo ba dbang med cing /_/rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra ba la/_/byis pa 'di dag chags pas na/_/shin tu
[\[13b.6\]]ma rungs las byas te/_/sdig pa'i dbang du song ba dang /_/mi mkhas 'chi bdag bzhon pas song /_/de dag mi bzad sems dmyal 'gro/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de skad du sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs las kyang /_sems can gang dag kha cig rtsod
[\[13b.7\]]'gyur ba[#]/_/de yi gzhi rtsa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/_/de ltas gang la sred par 'gyur ba spongs/_/sred pa spangs ba [#]byas na gzungs su 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las kyang /_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni chos
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]thams cad la gzhan gyi [#]'du shes bskyed de [#]dngos po ci yang mi len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_len pa ni 'jigs pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa [#]las kyang /_gang byin pa de ni yang bsrung bar bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/gang khyim
[\[14a.2\]]na gzhag pa de ni bsrung bar bya ba'o[#]/_/gang byin pa de ni srid [#]pa zad par 'gyur ba'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni srid [#]pa rnam par 'phel ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni
[\[14a.3\]]'jigs pa med pa'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni bdud kyi phyogs nye bar ston pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni zad mi shes pa'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag par gyur [#]pa de ni
[\[14a.4\]]zad par gyur pa'o[#]/_/gang byin pa de ni bde ba'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni kun bsrung dgos pas sdug bsngal ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni nyon mongs pa spong bar 'gyur ba'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni nyon mongs pa 'phel bar byed pa'o/_/gang byin pa de ni longs spyod chen por
[\[14a.5\]]'gyur ba'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni longs spyod chen por mi 'gyur ba'o/_/gang byin pa de ni skyes bu dam pa'i las so/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni skyes bu dam pa'i las so/_/gang byin pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad [#]kyis bsngags pa'o/_/gang khyim na gzhag pa de ni byis
[\[14a.6\]]pa'i skye bos bsngags pa'o zhes bya ba nas/_gal te des bu la lhag par sdug pa bskyed la de bzhin du sems can gzhan la ma yin na des spyo ba gsum gyis rang gi sems la spyo bar bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_byang chub ni sems snyoms pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi
[\[14a.7\]]sems mi snyoms pa'i ma yin no/_/byang chub ni yang dag par sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi ldog [#]par sbyor ba [#]ni ma yin no/_/byang chub ni tha dad pa med par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin gyi tha dad du spyod pa [#]ni ma yin pa ste [#]spyo ba gsum po 'di dag gis rang gi sems
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]la spyos nas/_bu de la mi sdug pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/'di ni [#]mi sdug pa ste/_bdag gi snying du sdug pa yin na/_gang bdag gis [#]de'i don du bu de la ni lhag par sdug pa bskyed la sems can gzhan la ni de lta ma yin pas sangs rgyas kyis bka' stsal pa'i bslab pa dang 'gal
[\[14b.2\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba la yang gnod pa byas srog la yang bag med de gnod par 'gyur bas 'di ni bdag la gnod par byed pa'o/_/bdag de'i phyir byang chub kyi lam dang mi mthun pa'i lam la spyod pas/_'di ni bdag la phyir rgol ba'o snyam du
[\[14b.3\]]'du shes gsum po de dag bskyed par bya'o/_/des bu de rgyur byas te/_ji lta ji lta bur bu de la sdug par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pa bskyed pa dang /_bdag phangs par sems pa dang ldan pa bzhin du byams pa bskyed pa/_de lta [#]de lta bur de sems
[\[14b.4\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/de yang 'di ltar 'di yang gud [#]nas 'ongs la bdag kyang gud nas 'ongs mod kyi sems can thams cad kyang sngon bdag gi bur gyur la bdag kyang sems can thams cad kyi bur gyur te/_'di la ni bdag gi'am gzhan gyi'am [#]su'i sems can gang yang med do
[\[14b.5\]]snyam du tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/_/khyim bdag de ltar byang chub sems dpas dngos po gang la yang bdag gi snyam du yongs su gzung [#]bar mi bya chags par mi bya'o/_/g.yo dang sred pa'i bag la nyal mi bya'o/_/khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'i drung du
[\[14b.6\]]slob pa [#]'ongs la/_dngos po zhig bslangs [#]pa las/_gal te des dngos po ma btang na/_des 'di ltar dngos po 'di btang yang rung ma btang yang rung ste/_bdag ni dngos po 'di dang gdon mi za bar 'bral bar yang 'gyur te[#]/_mi 'dod bzhin du 'chi bar yang 'gyur zhing
[\[14b.7\]]dngos po 'dis bdag 'dor/_bdag gis kyang dngos po 'di 'dor gyis/_dngos po 'di btang la yid dga' ba dang /_snying po blangs te 'chi ba'i dus bya'o/_/'di yongs su btang na bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sems kun nas zin te gnas par mi 'gyur te/_'dis ni
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]bdag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang rangs pa dang 'gyod pa med pa skye bar 'gyur snyam du sems nges par bsam par bya'o/_/gal te de ltar bsams [#]kyang /_dngos po de [#]gtong ma nus na des [#]slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis
[\[15a.2\]]go bar bya ste/_bdag ni da dung mthu chung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin te/_theg pa chen po la las dang po ba dang bdag ni ma [#]gtong ba la sems kyi dbang du gyur pa dang bdag nyid [#]ni nye bar len pa'i lta ba dang bcas pa dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang [#]bdag gir 'dzin pa la gnas pa
[\[15a.3\]]lags kyi[#]/_skyes bu dam pa bzod par mdzad cing [#]yongs su gdung bar mi mdzad du gsol/_ji ltar khyod dang sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag gis bgyi'o/_/de ltar bsgrub po/_/de ltar brtson 'grus brtsam mo zhes khyim bdag de
[\[15a.4\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong ba la kun go bar bya ba gsum gyis go bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/slong ba la kun go bar byed pa 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' de la ma dad pa'am byang chub sems dpa' la slong ba ma [#]dad par gyur pa'i [#]nyes pa gzhan spang ba'i [#]phyir gsungs
[\[15a.5\]]par zad kyi/_ser sna'i kha na ma tho ba med pa ni ma yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di smod do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las ji skad du/_shA ri'i bu chos 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la med do[#]/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_byang
[\[15a.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnams la g.yo med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ser sna med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phrag dog dang phra ma med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu [#]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [# ]
[\[15a.7\]]mi nus snyam pa'i zhum pa'i sems med do/_/shA ri'i bu gang la chos bzhi po 'di dag yod pa de la ni mkhas pa rnams kyis/_kye ma'o 'di ni tshul 'chos pa'o[#]/_/kye ma'o 'di ni kha gsag [#]can no/_/kye ma'o 'di ni chos las nyams pa'o/_/kye ma'o 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]chos can no/_/kye ma'o 'di ni 'jig rten gyi zang zing lhur byed pa'o[#]/_/kye ma'o 'di ni zas dang gos [#]ched cher byed pa'o zhes rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams [#]ni sems dpa' ba yin te/_lag pa'i bar du yongs su gtong ba yin/_rkang pa yongs
[\[15b.2\]]su gtong ba dang /_sna yongs su gtong ba dang /_mgo yongs su gtong ba dang /_yan lag dang nying lag yongs su gtong ba dang /_bu yongs su gtong ba dang /_bu mo yongs su gtong ba dang /_chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang /_dga' ba yongs su gtong ba dang /_nor yongs su gtong
[\[15b.3\]]ba dang /_bde ba yongs su gtong ba dang /_khyim yongs su gtong ba dang /_gnas yongs su gtong ba dang /_yul yongs su gtong ba dang /_rin po che yongs su gtong ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de skad du sred med kyi bus zhus pa las kyang /_
[\[15b.4\]]dngos po gang la de gtong ba'i sems mi skye ba dang gtong ba'i blo mi 'jug pa'i dngos po de bsrel bar mi bya'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pa gang la spang [#]ba'i sems mi skye ba'i/_yongs su 'dzin pa de yongs su gzung [#]bar mi bya'o/_/gang slong ba de [#]dag gis bslangs [#]na yongs su gtong [# ]
[\[15b.5\]]ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba'i g.yog de lta bu bcang bar mi bya'o/_/rgyal srid de gzung [#]bar mi bya'o/_/longs spyod de dag dang rin po che de dag bcang bar mi bya'o/_/dngos po gang la [#]byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba yin na/_nor gyi dngos po gang yang
[\[15b.6\]]rung ba'i bar du bcang bar mi bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_bdag gi lus 'di yang sems can thams cad la byin zhing yongs su btang na/_phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams lta ci smos te/_sems
[\[15b.7\]]can gang dang gang la ci dang [#]ci dgos par 'gyur ba de dang de dag la de dang de sbyin no/_/yod de yod na lag pa 'dod pa la lag pa sbyin no/_/rkang pa 'dod pa la rkang pa/_mig 'dod pa la mig sbyin no/_/sha 'dod pa la sha/_/khrag 'dod pa la khrag/_/rkang 'dod pa la rkang /_yan
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]lag dang nying lag 'dod pa la yan lag dang nying lag_/mgo 'dod pa la mgo yongs su btang ste[#]/_phyi rol gyi dngos po dag [#]'di lta ste/_nor dang 'bru dang gser dang [#]dngul dang rin po che dang rgyan dang rta dang glang po che dang shing rta dang bzhon pa dang grong dang grong khyer dang
[\[16a.2\]]grong rdal dang ljongs dang rgyal srid dang yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor dang [#]tshong dus dang bran pho smos [#]dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang bu dang bu mo dang g.yog rnams lta ci smos te/_sems can gang dang gang la gang dang gang gis [#]ci dang ci dgos par 'gyur ba/_
[\[16a.3\]]sems can de dang de dag la de dang de yod pa sbyin no/_/ci nas sems can 'di dag yongs su bsdus pas/_bdag byang chub thob pa'i chos shes par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_sems can la phan gdags pa dang sems can la snying rje ba dang sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_
[\[16a.4\]]'gyod pa med cing mya ngan du [#]mi byed pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la re ba med par yongs su gtong [#]ngo /_/chags pa med par sbyin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu dper na/_rtsi'i sdong po ni [#]rtsa ba nas blangs kyang rung /_sdong po las blangs kyang rung /_yal ga las blangs kyang
[\[16a.5\]]rung /_shun lpags las blangs kyang rung /_lo ma las blangs kyang rung /_me tog dang 'bras bu dang snying po las blangs kyang rung ste/_de 'di ltar bdag rtsa ba nas blangs so/_/bdag gi rtsa ba nas blangs so/_/bdag gi snying po'i bar du blangs so snyam du rnam par rtog pa mi
[\[16a.6\]]'byung mod kyi/_rnam par rtog pa med bzhin du sems can rab 'bring tha ma rnams kyi nad med par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i [#]lus 'di la rtsi'i sdong po bzhin du 'du shes bskyed cing sems can
[\[16a.7\]]gang dang gang dag la ci dang ci dgos pa khyer te/_lag pa 'dod na lag pa rkang pa 'dod na rkang pa khyer cig ces snga ma bzhin du gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang /_lus 'di bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod pa de [#]la dengs par
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]bya ste/_dper na sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i khams dang rlung gi khams dang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sgo sna tshogs dang rnam grangs sna tshogs dang dmigs pa sna tshogs dang yo byad sna tshogs dang longs spyod sna tshogs kyis [#]sems can rnams nye bar longs spyod par [#]byed pa de bzhin du/_
[\[16b.2\]]bdag gis kyang 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i khog pa'i lus 'di sgo sna tshogs dang rnam grangs sna tshogs dang dmigs pa sna tshogs dang yo byad sna tshogs dang longs spyod sna tshogs kyis rgya cher sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bya'o snyam ste/_de don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas/_lus
[\[16b.3\]]sdug bsngal bar yang so sor rtog la sems can la blta [#]ba'i phyir lus sdug bsngal bas kyang yongs su mi skye'o zhes bstan to//_//[#]bam po gnyis pa/_bdag dang longs spyod dang bsod nams btang ba ni/_'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo las gsungs
[\[16b.4\]]so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid sems can thams cad la gtong ba ni[#]/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis [#]phan 'dogs pas sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis [#]sems par byed pa dang /_bdag nyid mar me dang 'dra bar [#]sems can thams cad la nye bar
[\[16b.5\]]gzhag pa dang /_bdag nyid bde ba dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_bdag nyid chos kyi skye gnas dang 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par 'dzin pa dang /_bdag nyid snang ba dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /_bdag nyid
[\[16b.6\]]'gro ba thams cad kyi gzhir 'gro [#]ba dang /_bdag nyid dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rkyen du gyur par mthong ba dang /_bdag nyid 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /_bdag nyid mdza' bo dang 'dra bar sems can thams cad la nye bar [#]sbyor ba dang /_bdag nyid sems can thams cad la lam
[\[16b.7\]]dang 'dra bar ston pa dang /_bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad du yongs su sbyor ba dang /_bdag nyid nyi ma dang 'dra bar 'jig rten kun du mtshungs par byed pa dang sems can thams cad la bdag nyid de lta bu'i chos dang ldan par rab tu sbyin par byed pa dang /_
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]'jig rten thams cad na bdag nyid ci 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba la dbang du gyur par mthong bas 'jig rten kun tu bdag nyid mchod rten gyi mchog tu 'gyur bar bya ste bdag nyid 'gro ba thams cad kyi mchod rten du mthong ba dang /_'jig rten kun du sems mnyam
[\[17a.2\]]par bsgrub pa dang /_bdag nyid 'gro ba kun du yo byad thams cad kyi mu stegs su mthong ba dang /_bdag nyid 'jig rten thams cad la bde ba sbyin par so sor rtogs [#]pa dang /_bdag nyid 'gro ba kun gyi sbyin bdag tu mos pa dang /_bdag nyid 'jig rten kun gyi [#]shes pa dang
[\[17a.3\]]'dra bar byas pa dang /_bdag nyid byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang ldan par bskyed [#]pa dang /_bdag nyid ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa la 'jug pa dang /_bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa'i go cha bgos par so sor rtogs [#]pa dang sngon mgron du gnyer ba'i sems can rjes su
[\[17a.4\]]skyong ba dang /_bdag nyid nan tan la gnas par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i sems yid la byed cing sems can thams cad la bdag nyid skyed mos tshal dang 'dra bar lta ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad la bdag nyid chos kyi dga' ba dang 'dra bar ston
[\[17a.5\]]pa dang /_bdag nyid sems can thams cad la yid bde ba sbyin pa nyid du gnas pa dang /_bdag nyid dga' ba mtha' yas pa bskyed par 'gro ba thams cad la gtong zhing 'jig rten kun du bdag nyid dkar po'i chos skye ba'i sgo lta bur yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_bdag nyid
[\[17a.6\]]sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sbyin par smon lam 'debs pa dang /_skye dgu thams cad la bdag nyid pha dang 'dra bar 'jug pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad du yo byad thams cad ma tshang ba med par bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid rab tu gnas pas [#]yin no/_/de
[\[17a.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid g.yog tu sbyin par byed pa na/_slong ba dag la dga' ba yid la byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa[#]/_sa la stan 'ding ba'i stan lta bu'i [#]sems dang ldan par bya ste/_sa dang 'dra bar sdug bsngal thams cad bzod pa yid la byed pa bsgrub cing /_sems
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]can thams cad kyi rim gro bya ba la ngal ba med pa'i yid dang ldan pa/_byis pa'i skye bos sbyar ba'i nyes byas dang du blang ba la brtan zhing sran thub pa'i rang bzhin can legs par gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la mngon par brtson zhing sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi [#]rim gro bya ba la rab tu
[\[17b.2\]]zhugs pas [#]yin no/_/slong ba 'ongs pa dag la rna ba'am sna yongs su gtong ba na/_byang chub sems dpa'i [#]spyod pas zin cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyis [#]rigs mtho ba las byung ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjes su dran pa'i gnas
[\[17b.3\]]pa las byung ba dang /_'jig rten gsum po thams cad snying po med pa las snying por rtog pa dang /_rang gi lus la ma chags pa'i rgyu [#]dang ldan pa dang /_gnas med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su dran pa la gnas pa dang /_snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang ba'i [# ]
[\[17b.4\]]bsam pa dang ldan pas yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' lce blangs ma thag tu tshig 'jam zhing dga' bar 'gyur ba byams par spyod pa'i sems kyis [#]rgyal po la 'os pa'i seng ge'i khri bzang po la bzhag nas/_slong ba de la mngon par smra ste/_sems ma khros par byas/_
[\[17b.5\]]sems ma smas pa [#]dang /_sems ma nyams pa dang /_sems bdag nyid chen po'i rigs kyis mtho ba dang /_sems sangs rgyas kyi gdung las byung ba dang /_sems ma rnyogs [#]pa'i rgyud dang mthu stobs chen po bskyed pa dang /_sems lus la ma chags pa dang /_sems kha
[\[17b.6\]]bzhin la mngon par ma zhen cing /_pus mo'i lha nga [#]btsugs pa'i lus su byas te/_rang gi kha nas lce phyung la slong ba'i lus la gtad de tshig 'jam zhing mnyen la dga' bar 'gyur ba byams pa nye bar spyod pa 'byin cing /_khyod nga'i [#]lce khyer la ji ltar khyod dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /_yid dga'
[\[17b.7\]]ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_rab tu dga' zhing rangs pa dang /_mos pa skye bar 'a[#]gyur bar ci 'dod pa bzhin gyis shig ces zer ro/_/de mgo yongs su gtong ba na chos thams cad kyi mchog [#]mgo lta bu'i ye shes la 'jug cing /_sems can thams cad kyi [#]yongs su bskyab pa'i mgos [# ]
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]byang chub khong du chud par byed pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi mchog dpe med pa'i ye shes mgo lta bu mngon par 'dod pa dang /_kun mkhyen pa'i mgo thob pa[#]/_ye shes kyi rgyal po la mos par byed pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi mgo mtha' yas pa
[\[18a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'dod cing /_slong ba mtha' yas pa dga' bas yongs su khyab pa'i sems kyis yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' slong ba dag la lag pa dang rkang pa yongs su gtong ba na dad pa'i lag pa dang ldan pa dang /_rjes su phan 'dogs par spyod pa dang /_
[\[18a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rtsal gyis gtong ba'i lag pa brkyang zhing /_sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar lag pa yongs su gtong ba dang /_rten chen po la rkang pa 'dor ba dang [#]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mos pa dang /_chor bas ma nyams pa'i sbyin pa'i mthus sems bskyed [#]pa dri
[\[18a.4\]]ma med par gnas shing /_ye shes yongs su dkris pa med pa dang /_chos kyi lus rgyun mi 'chad pa mi shigs pa mi chod pa'i lus dang ldan pa/_bdud thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa/_sems dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis [#]nye bar brtan zhing 'phel ba/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[18a.5\]]thams cad dang /_spyod pa gcig tu gnas shing gtong ba gcig pus nges par 'byung bas yin no/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lus dral te slong ba dag la khrag 'byin [#]pa na/_byang chub kyi sems kyis [#]rab tu dga' ba dang /_sems byang chub kyi spyod pa 'dod pa dang /_sems
[\[18a.6\]]tshor bas yongs su ma zin pa dang /_sems slong ba thams cad 'dod pa dang /_sems yongs su len pa thams cad la mi sdang ba dang /_sems byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba'i lam thams cad du [#]zhugs pa dang /_sems rang gi lus la mi lta zhing mi ldog la rgyun mi 'chad
[\[18a.7\]]pas rang gi lus kyi khrag sbyin par byed do[#]/_/ye shes kyi skye mched kyi sems theg pa chen po la zhugs pa/_yid ches pa dang /_yid 'dod pa dang /_yid tshim pa dang /_yid rangs pa dang /_yid mgu ba dang /_yid dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_yid dang bar gyur te/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]rab tu dga' zhing mos pa dang /_rangs pa dang /_yid bde ba skyes pas [#]yin no/_/slong ba rnams la rang gi lus las [#]sha yongs su gtong ba na dge bar gtong ste/_slong bar [#]'dod pa'i tshig gis khyed nga'i lus las [#]sha dang rkang cig dgos pa sbyin[#]/_khyer cig ces slong ba de [#]dag la smra
[\[18b.2\]]zhing /_dga' ba mtshungs pa med pa rnam par spel ba'i gtong ba'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' [#]mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis [#]bsten pa'i dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi grogs su gyur pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dri ma bsal ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog rab dang /_byang chub
[\[18b.3\]]sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis brin [#]pa'i sbyin pa rtsom pa chen po yid kyis [#]'dod par gyur pa [#]dang /_slong [#]ba thams cad yi mi chad [#]par sbyin pa btang [#]ba'i dngos po dag gis shin tu so sor brtags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rkyen dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon du
[\[18b.4\]]'gyur ba'i [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan bkod pa'i mchod pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la [#]mngon du phyogs pa'i snying rje chen pos yongs su skyob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon du gyur pa'i stobs bcu rnam par spyod pa dang /_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i byang chub
[\[18b.5\]]sems dpa' thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis rim gror [#]bya ba dang /_mi 'jigs pa thams cad mngon du gyur pa'i khyu mchog dang seng ge'i sgrar [#]sgrogs pa dang /_dus gsum mngon du gyur pa'i dus thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang /_'jig rten
[\[18b.6\]]thams cad mngon du gyur pa phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bskal par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang /_yongs su yi ma [#]chad pa mngon du gyur pa'i mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pas yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' slong ba dag la rang gi snying gtong ba na/_sems
[\[18b.7\]]sbyin pa'i rigs la [#]bslabs pa dang /_sems pha rol tu phyin pa la sgrub pa dang /_sems byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa thams cad la mi rgod [#]par shin tu gnas pa dang /_sems rten du gyur bas [#]slong ba thams cad la ri mor byed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyong ba dang /_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam chen po la zhugs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug cing smon lam ma btang [#]bas yin no/_/de slong ba dag la rgyu ma dang /_mkhal
[\[19a.2\]]ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba sbyin pa ni[#]/_slong ba la rab tu dang ba dang /_dga' ba'i rnam pa'i mig dang /_byang chub sems dpa' las byung ba'i byams pa dang /_mi ngal ba'i yid la byed pa'i gtong ba dang /_snying po med pa'i lus las legs par brtags [#]pa'i snying po
[\[19a.3\]]len pa'i sems dang /_mthar dur khrod du 'gro bar lus rjes su dran pa'i yid la byed pa dang /_lus gzhan la rag las par yid la bya ba dang /_mi rtag pa nyid kyis zin pa'i lus dang /_gzhan gyi zas su sems pas lus la sbyang ki dang /_ce sbyang dang /_wa dang /_khyi'i
[\[19a.4\]]zas su rtog cing /_de ltar chos yid la byed pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'/_slong ba de dag la mig mi 'dzums shing sems 'di ltar bskyed de/_gal te bdag gis slong ba 'di la lus las rgyu ma dang /_mkhal ma dang /_mchin pa dang /_glo ba byin kyang rung gal te ma
[\[19a.5\]]byin kyang rung ste/_mthar tshe zad na 'di ni [#]mi rtag ste tha ma dur khrod du 'gro'o zhes de ltar yid la byed par [#]tshim par byed [#]pa'i rgyud dang /_de lta bu'i chos shes pa'i bsam pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi [#]'du shes su gnas pas slong ba la lta ba dang /_snying po med pa'i lus las
[\[19a.6\]]snying po len 'dod pa [#]yin no/_/chos 'dod pas rang gi sha sen mo dang bcas pa gtong ba na yang /_de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/lus btang ba byas nas/_longs spyod dang bsod nams btang ba ni [#]de nyid las byung ba[#]/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' [#]sbyin
[\[19a.7\]]gnas dang len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang /_slong ba phongs pa dang bkren pa mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la [#]re ba'i skabs kyis 'ongs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]pa dang sngon gyi smon lam thos pa rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa dang smon lam gyi [#]sems kyis mgron du gnyer ba rnams dang /_thams cad gtong du re ba'i yid can rnams 'ongs pa mthong nas/_slong ba la ri mor [#]bya bas mi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs
[\[19b.2\]]pa rnams la bzod pa gsol ba'i sems dang ldan pas bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu song la khyed 'ongs pa'i [#]nyon mongs par mi [#]'gyur bar ri mor bya ba zhig na zhes des spyi bos gtugs [#]te bzod pa gsol lo/_/slong ba thams cad la bzod pa gsol khrus byas lus ngal sos [#]par
[\[19b.3\]]byas nas/_yo byad ci 'os pa sbyin par byed de/_'di lta ste/_nor bu'i shing rta 'dzam bu'i gling na bzang ba'i na chung rin po ches yongs su gang ba dang /_'di lta ste/_gser gyi shing rta yul gyi na chung rin po che rnam par dag pas yongs su gang ba dang /_'di lta ste bai DUr+ya'i shing rta glu
[\[19b.4\]]dbyangs dang sil snyan rjes su mthun pa len pas gang ba dang /_de bzhin du shel gyi shing rta bu mo rin po che bzhin bzang zhing cha byad sdug gus shin du brgyan pa gzugs blta na [#]sdug cing tshul mkhas pas gang ba dag sbyin par byed do zhes gsungs pa dang /_de bzhin du de nyid las/_nor bu'i
[\[19b.5\]]shing rta glang po che cang shes rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas g.yogs pa dang ldan pa phrugs su mthun pas 'dren pa dag rab tu sbyin par byed/_tsan+dan gyi shing rta rin po che'i 'phang [#]lo dang rtsibs sbyar ba/_rin po che'i seng ge'i khri btsugs pa/_rin po che'i gdugs sna tshogs kyis
[\[19b.6\]]khebs pa/_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyis phyogs bzhir brgyan pa/_spos sna tshogs kyis shin tu bdugs [#]shing spos kyi snying po'i byug pa thams cad kyis legs par byugs pa me tog gi bkod pa rnam par [# ]bkram pa/_bu mo brgya [#]stong rin po che'i tha gus 'dren pa/_mi ldog mi 'gyur
[\[19b.7\]]bar 'gro zhing drag thal [#]ma khyer bar 'byor ba nas/_spos kyi dad yid du 'ong zhing rjes su mthun pa dang /_bu dang bu mor bcas pa'i smra ba nye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa/_spos kyi phye ma sna tshogs gtor bas gtsang sbrar [#]byas pa dag sbyin par byed do zhes gsungs pa dang /_de bzhin du
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gzhan yang de nyid las/_bdag nyid sems can thams cad la gtong ngam/_sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gror [#]bya bar 'bul [#]lam/_rgyal srid yongs su gtong ngam/_mkhar ram/_grong khyer ram/_rgyal po'i pho brang rgyan thams cad kyis [#]rnam par spud
[\[20a.2\]]pa'am/_g.yog thams cad kyang slong ba rnams la ci rigs par yongs su gtong ngam/_slong ba dag la bu dang bu mo dang chung ma sbyin par byed dam/_khyim thams cad btang [#]ba nas/_longs spyod dang longs [#]su spyod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do[#]/_/de bzhin du skom sbyin pa dang /_
[\[20a.3\]]ro'i sbyin pa yang byang chub sems dpas [#]sbyin par byed pa na/_bzang zhing rnam pa sna tshogs pa rgya che ba gtsang ba rnam pa tha dad pa kha ba dang tsha ba dang bska ba dang /_lan tshwa'i ro mchog sna tshogs dang ldan pa shin tu tshim par byed pa'i ro bro ba [# ]mang po dang ldan pa dang /_khams 'khrugs
[\[20a.4\]]pa snyoms par byed pa/_lus dang sems kyi stobs ston [#]pa/_dga' ba dang mos pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /_bde ba skyed par byed [#]pa nas/_pha rol gyi gnod par byed pa sel ba/_nad thams cad zhi zhing nad med pa bskyed pa dag sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du gos sbyin pa dang /_
[\[20a.5\]]me tog sbyin pa dang /_spos [#]sbyin pa dang /_byug pa sbyin pa dang /_phreng ba sbyin pa dang /_mal cha sbyin pa dang /_gnas sbyin pa dang /_rten sbyin pa dang /_mar me sbyin pa dang /_na ba'i gsos sman sbyin pa dang /_yo byad nas kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs yo lang [#]cher bshams pa dag byang chub sems
[\[20a.6\]]dpas sbyin par byed do/_/bzo sna tshogs su byas pa'i sder gyi snod sna [#]tshogs pa tshad med pas spras pa rnam pa du ma dang /_dbyig dang gser dang dngul gyi phye ma rnams/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag [#]la dbul ba na/_sbyin pa'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab par mos so/_/'di dag
[\[20a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' [#]dkon mchog la dbul na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen shin tu rnyed dka' bas sems bskyed pas dbul la[#]/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun la 'bul [#]na sangs rgyas kyi chos nye bar brten [#]pa'i phyir dbul lo/_/gang zag gam nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas dag
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]la 'bul [#]na/_'phags pa'i yon tan la shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis 'bul [#]lo/_/pha ma la sbyin na bla ma la sri zhu dang rim gro bya ba'i sems kyis sbyin no/_/slob dpon dang bla ma dang sbyin pa'i gnas de dang de dag la 'bul [#]na/_bla ma'i tshogs kyis bstan pa bslab pa la 'jug go/_/
[\[20b.2\]]dbul po dang phongs pa dang slong ba dag la gos dang zas sbyin pa na/_sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i mig dang /_byams pa yongs su bsgoms pas sbyin par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' glang po che cang shes yan lag bdun rab tu gnas
[\[20b.3\]]pa/_lo drug [#]lon pa so [#]drug yod pa spu mdog pad+ma 'dra ba/_gdong rnam par dag pa gser gyi [#]rgyan gyis [#]brgyan pa/_lus gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa/_sna rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis g.yogs pa/_bkod pas spras pa/_gser gyis [#]g.yogs pa/_blta [#]na sdug pa dpag
[\[20b.4\]]tshad stong du mi ngal bar 'gro zhing rgyu ba sbyin par byed do[#]/_/rta cang shes pa [#]zhon na bde zhing lus bde ba dang ldan pa/_bang phun sum tshogs pa/_phyogs bzhir bgrod pa bkur ba'i mgyogs pa dang ldan pa/_zas phun sum tshogs pa/_lha'i mtshungs pa med pa'i rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa
[\[20b.5\]]dag sbyin par byed do/_/de dag sbyin zhing gtong ba na gus pas skye bo bla ma dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang pha ma dang dbul po dang phongs pa dang slong ba dang len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la lhug par gtang [#]ba'i sems dang gzung ba med pa'i sems nas/_snying rje chen pos phyogs su khyab pa'i
[\[20b.6\]]rgyud kyis [#]gtong ba chen po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan dag la nan tan byed pa dang /_rigs btsun pa byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su spyod cing sbyin par byed do/_/de ltar sems can dag la stan sbyin zhing gtong na rgyal po'i khri bzang po bai DUr+ya'i rkang pa can[#]/_
[\[20b.7\]]seng ges brten [#]pa gser gyi tha gu dang rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re dang gos 'jam po du ma bting ba nye 'khor spos kyi snying po thams cad kyis shin tu dri zhim par byas pa/_nor bu'i rgyal po sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan du ma bsgreng ba/_rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i rgyan [#]bkod pa/_
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]gser gyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_gser gyi dril bu g.yer kha'i [#]dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs 'byung ba/_rin po che'i 'bru bye ba khrag khrig phrag bcus kun nas bskor te rnam par phye bas shing tu [#]'phags shing blta na mdzes pa/_srog chags bye
[\[21a.2\]]ba khrag khrig grangs med pas kun nas blta [#]ba/_gdugs kheb [#]gcig gis sa chen po thams cad skyong bar dbang bskur ba rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i stan du bya ba/_de la 'dug cing 'khor lo thogs pa med pas bskyad ba dang chis [#]bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad
[\[21a.3\]]nyams pa med par nyan pa de lta bu'i sten [#]gyi rnam pa [#]sbyin par byed do/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' gdugs rnams sbyin pa na/_rin po che chen po'i bkod pas rab tu brgyan pa/_rin po che'i yu ba can dril bu g.yer kha'i [#]dra bas kun nas khebs pa rin po che'i srad bu dang rna rgyan dang
[\[21a.4\]]mgul rgyan gyi phreng bas khugs can du gyur pa/_nor bu dang [#]bai DUr+ya'i phreng ba mngon par dpyangs pa/_nye 'khor na dga' ba'i dbyangs dang yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba/_gser gyi dra ba rnam par dag pas nang logs khebs par byas pa/_rin po che'i thur ma'i rgyan brgya stong bres
[\[21a.5\]]pa nor bu rin po che'i mdzod kun du 'dzin pa/_a ka ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_spos kyi dam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas nye 'khor dri zhim por [#]bsgos shing bdugs pa/_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser ltar 'od gsal zhing dag pa/_rgyan bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pas brgyan
[\[21a.6\]]pa'i gdugs de 'dra ba rnams dang /_de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i gdugs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang [#]/_/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sems kyis sbyin par byed cing /_sems can thams cad kyi [#]gtso bo mngon du gyur pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
[\[21a.7\]]pa'i mchod rten brgyan pa'i phyir ram/_chos btsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam/_byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba btsun par bya ba dag gam/_pha dang ma'am dge 'dun dkon mchog gam sangs rgyas thams cad kyis [#]bstan pa nas/_len
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]pa po thams cad kyi bar dag la 'bul [#]ba dang yongs su gtong ba dang ster bar byed pa dang /_sbyin par byed pa [#]na/_de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba ste zhes gsungs pa dang [#]/_re zhig ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba dang por/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi [#]skabs nas ji skad du/_
[\[21b.2\]]smon lam 'di lta bu yang 'debs te/_ci nas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag rnam par dag par [#]chos kyi mtha' klas par 'gro ba thams cad la nye bar 'tsho ba dang phan par gyur cig_/des na dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sems can thams cad kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ngan song rgyun chad par gyur
[\[21b.3\]]cig_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ba'i phung po rnam par log par gyur cig ces smon [#]lam 'debs so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na[#]/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag
[\[21b.4\]]sdug bsngal gyi phung po bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gyur cig_/nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir sems can thams cad [#]kyi skyob par gyur cig_/'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su
[\[21b.5\]]gyur cig_/sa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rten du gyur cig_/shin tu grub pa dang bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen du gyur cig_/rab rib med pa'i ye shes kun du bstan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la snang bar
[\[21b.6\]]gyur cig_/ma rig pa'i mun pa bzlog pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi sgron mer gyur cig_/shin tu rnam par dag pa la rab tu dgod pa'i phyir sems can thams cad la gsal bar byed par gyur cig_/chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gzud pa'i phyir sems can thams
[\[21b.7\]]cad kyi 'dren par gyur cig_/sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phung po nye bar bstan pa'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi [#]yongs su 'dren par gyur cig_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de yang bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su bsngo ba'i tshig tsam gyis ni [#]ma yin no/_/de yang dga' ba'i
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o[#]/_/mgu ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/dang ba'i sems dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems dang /_mnyen [#]pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/byams pa'i sems dang /_mdza' ba'i sems dang /_phan gdags pa'i
[\[22a.2\]]sems dang /_phan pa'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems kyis yongs su bsngo'o/_/de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba rnam par dag par gyur cig_/skye ba rnam par dag par gyur cig_/bsod nams kyi che ba'i
