[\[22a.3\]]bdag nyid yongs su dag par gyur cig_/zil gyis mi non [#]par gyur cig_/yongs su zad pa med par gyur cig_/thub par dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur cig_/brjed pa med par gyur cig_/rtogs [#]pa dang blo gros dang /_nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/blo tshad
[\[22a.4\]]med pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/lus kyi las dang ngag gi las dang yid kyi las yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur cig_/mnyes
[\[22a.5\]]par byas nas kyang mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la dad pa mi phyed pa thob par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag las chos bstan pa nyan par gyur cig_/mnyan nas
[\[22a.6\]]kyang the tshom thams cad rnam par ldog [#]par gyur cig_/ji ltar thos pa bzhin 'dzin par gyur cig_/bzung [#]nas kyang sgrub pa rdzogs par byed par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad sten par byed par gyur cig_/sems las su rung ba yang thob par gyur cig_/_
[\[22a.7\]]kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed par [#]gyur cig_/bdag nyid dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rnams la 'jog par gyur cig_/shin tu dbul ba thams cad rnam par bzlog par gyur cig_/nor bdun rnyed pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]thams cad kyi rjes su slob par gyur cig_/dge ba'i dbang po thob pa rtogs par gyur cig_/rgya chen po la mos pa mnyam pa nyid yongs su sgrub par gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi go skabs thob par gyur cig_/'gro ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i mig
[\[22b.2\]]skyed par gyur cig_/mtshan thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan [#]pa'i lus rdzogs par [#]yongs su thob par gyur cig_/yon tan thams cad kyi rgyan dang ldan pa'i ngag yongs su dag pa yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig_/dbang po bsdams pa dang /_stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i sems dge
[\[22b.3\]]ba yang dag pa bsgrub [#]par gyur cig_/mi rten [#]par gnas pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas thams cad bde ba'i yo byad gang dang ldan pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de sems can thams cad kyis [#]thob par gyur cig ces bstan pa dang /_de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba drug pa las gsungs
[\[22b.4\]]pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba [#]ste/_sems can thams cad chags pa med par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan zhing ye shes kyi zas can du gyur cig_/zas la zhen pa med cing zas yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_dga' ba za zhing zang zing med pa'i zas [#]dang ldan pa nas/_'dod
[\[22b.5\]]pa la sred pa rab tu ldog pa'i bar du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi khu shugs dang ldan pa'i sprin las char 'bebs pa dang /_chos kyi dga' ba bla na med pas sems kyi rgyun [#]tshim par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ro bro ba thams cad la chags pa med cing ro la
[\[22b.6\]]mtshan mar mi 'dzin par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sems 'jug pa dang /_theg pa ma nyams pa dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa mchog dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa dam pa dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa myur ba dang ldan pa dang /_theg pa stobs chen po [#]dang ldan par gyur
[\[22b.7\]]cig/_sangs rgyas la dga' ba 'thob [#]cing sems can thams cad kyis [#]mthong na ngoms mi shes par gyur cig_/[#]sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing sems kyi rgyud la gnod pa med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyi [#]dug sel ba'i sman gyi rgyal po lta bur [#]
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]snang zhing sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug bzlog [#]par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyi mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog sel ba'i phyir/_sems can thams cad kyis [#]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba lta bur mthong bar gyur cig_/ces [#]de ltar bdag
[\[23a.2\]]nyid nges par brtags nas rang gi bsam pa dang mthun par brjod par bya ste[#]/_sems can thams cad mngon par mdzes pa mthong bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi dri dang ldan pa dang mi chod pa'i tshul khrims dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i [#]pha rol
[\[23a.3\]]tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad gtang [#]ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba can du gyur te sbyin pas bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i sems rnyed cing bzod pas bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams
[\[23a.4\]]cad brtson 'grus chen po'i go bgos shing brtson 'grus kyis [#]bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas [#]mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing bsam gtan gyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' [#]yongs
[\[23a.5\]]su bsngo bas bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dkar po'i chos thams cad kyis bsgos par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ye shes chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing lha'i mal cha thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad so
[\[23a.6\]]so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyis bsgos pa'i [#]phyir 'phags pa'i mal cha thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'khor bar gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bde ba'i mal cha thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos la
[\[23a.7\]]reg pa dang ldan zhing nyams bde ba'i mal cha thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yon tan gyi gnas dang legs par ldan zhing gnas dang [#]gnas las bskyod de sangs rgyas kyi gnas bla na med pa dang mi 'bral zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa snang ba [#]la gnas par
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la nye bar brten cing gnas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba mtha' yas pa thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad gcig tu rgyas par 'gengs shing
[\[23b.2\]]thogs pa med pa'i snang ba can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thob cing lus la nad med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad rnam par mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur cing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'gro
[\[23b.3\]]ba gso ba la zhugs shing thogs pa med pa'i sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad [#]mkhyen pa'i nad med pa thob cing nad dang zug rngu 'gags par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman sbyor byed par gyur cig_/'gro
[\[23b.4\]]ba thams cad kyi sman la mkhas par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad mthu dang stobs yongs su mi zad pa'i lus dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad khor [#]yug gi ri ltar brdzi [# ]
[\[23b.5\]]ba med pa'i lus kyi stobs dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad stobs thams cad kyis brtan pa la chog mi shes par yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad snod tshad med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad nam mkha'i khams ltar rgya che ba dang /_dran
[\[23b.6\]]pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshig thams cad bzung zhing blang ba la dran pa rmongs pa med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i [#]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la dad pa mi phyed pa mchog
[\[23b.7\]]'dzin cing dge ba rnam par dag pa'i snod du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyis kun du 'gro ba 'thob cing dga' dgur 'gro bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sems can kun la khong khro ba med pa dang ldan pa'i sems su gyur cig_/sems can thams cad
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su khyab par 'gro zhing sems kyi skad cig gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad non par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad ngal ba med pa'i yid kyi [#]lus thob cing ngal ba dang dub pa med par 'jig rten gyi
[\[24a.2\]]khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rjes su tshol zhing bde bar 'gro ba la 'jug par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa rjes su skyong bas [#]dge ba'i bshes
[\[24a.3\]]gnyen mi gtong ba'i sems mi 'dor bar gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mthun par 'dzin pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang don gcig par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten [#]pa phun sum tshogs pa [#]la gnas pa sems [#]su 'jug
[\[24a.4\]]pa'i dge ba'i bsam pa can du gyur cig_/sems can thams cad smon lam gcig tu gyur te dge ba'i [#]bshes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad theg pa chen po la zhon [#]zhing yang dag par zhugs [#]nas thogs pa med
[\[24a.5\]]par thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar 'gro bar shog shig_/sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas shin tu khebs shing sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon sum [#]du bsrung ba dang yongs su sba ba thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad yon tan dang ye shes kyis [#]mngon par
[\[24a.6\]]khebs shing nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad las ldog par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad legs par byas pa rnam par ma 'khrugs shing dkar po'i chos can du gyur la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi [#]rgyun nyams pa med par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad
[\[24a.7\]]stobs bcu'i bla re dang ldan zhing gdugs lta bur gyur cig_/sems can thams cad byang chub kyi khri stan shin du thob par gyur cig_/sems can thams cad sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i seng ge'i gdan khri thob cing 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta ba'i 'os su gyur cig ces gsungs
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]pa yin no/_/'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las kyang /_bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'am chos la mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur bar ma gyur cig ces gsungs so/_/'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa [#]ba btang ba ni/_
[\[24b.2\]]'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las/_dge ba'i sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rjes su dran la rjes su dran nas kyang byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa 'di ni 'das pa la mkhas pa'o/_/gang ma 'ongs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nges par sems shing byang chub la
[\[24b.3\]]mngon du phyogs pa'i las la sems pas [#]bdag la dge ba'i sems bskyed pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar goms pa'i sems las byung bas thams cad btang ba la mos pa yongs su
[\[24b.4\]]rdzogs nas gtong ba'i sems kyi shugs dang 'brel pas lus yongs su btang bas yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad gtong [#]ba ni/_yongs su 'dzin pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i sred pa'i sdug bsngal las rnam par grol ba la grol ba [#]zhes bya'o/_/bar du yang bskal pa gzhal du
[\[24b.5\]]med cing grangs [#]med par 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas pa yang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rang gi lus la sogs pa [#]mchil pa'i gzan lta bur bdag longs spyod par mi 'dod pa des
[\[24b.6\]]kyang gzhan dag drangs nas sgrol lo/_/de'i phyir 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las kyang sbyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//de ltar lus la
[\[24b.7\]]sogs pa btang ba 'di dag kyang bsrung bar bya ste/_de [#]ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar/_/sems can rnams kyis longs spyad phyir/_/lus la sogs pa sbyin par bya/_/ma bsrungs longs spyod ga las 'ongs/_/gang mi spyod pas ci zhig sbyin/_/de bas sems can longs spyod [#]phyir/_/
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]lus la sogs pa bsrung bar bya/_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las/_shA ri'i bu gzhan bsrung ngo snyam na bdag bsrung [#]bar bya'o/_/[#]de bzhin du shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phan pa 'dod pa dang ldan pas srog gi phyir yang sdig
[\[25a.2\]]pa'i las mi byed do zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/khyim bdag dpal phyin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_khur gyi don du shing rta ltar chos kyi blo 'ba' zhig gis gzung bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas [#]bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /_
[\[25a.3\]]sems can la lta [#]bas lus kyi sdug bsngal gyis [#]yongs su mi skye'o zhes gsungs so/_/lus la sogs pa de ltar bskyang [#]zhe na/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtang [#]zhing /_sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa dpal 'byung gis ji skad bstan pa lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu
[\[25a.4\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni ngan 'gror mi ltung ngo /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsams [#]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal bar mi byed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
[\[25a.5\]]gyis bskyangs pa'i [#]byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags pa yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni spyod pa thams cad la mi brjed par spyod pa yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su
[\[25a.6\]]bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis thub par dka' ba yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bya ba dang [#]bya ba ma yin pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'o/_/bag med pa'i gnas las yang dag par [#]bzlog pa'o/_/'khor ba'i grong khyer nas 'don
[\[25a.7\]]pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de ltar yid la bya ba rgyun mi 'chad [#]pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi [#]drung du 'gro bar bya'o/_/khur thams cad bkur bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir sa lta bu'i sems dang /_mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]kyis mi bsgul ba'i phyir khor yug lta bu'i sems dang /_las thams cad nyams su blang ba la mi smod pas 'jig rten gyi bran lta bu'i sems dang /_nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal rnam par spong bas phyag dar blta bu'i sems dang /_khur lci ba bkur bas theg pa lta bu'i sems dang /_mi khro
[\[25b.2\]]bas khyi lta bu'i sems dang /_'gro zhing 'ong bas yongs su mi skyo bas gru lta bu'i sems dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor lta bas bu mdzangs [#]pa lta bu'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis [#]rang la ni nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par
[\[25b.3\]]bya'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sman pa'i 'du shes dang /_rjes su bsten [#]pa la ni sman gyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan nyams su blangs pa la ni nad 'tsho ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rang la ni 'jigs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/dge ba'i
[\[25b.4\]]bshes gnyen la ni dpa' bo'i 'du shes dang /_rjes su bstan pa la ni mtshon cha'i 'du shes dang /_nan tan la ni dgra sel ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/yang de nyid las dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ma'i rnam par thar pa las kyang /_rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen
[\[25b.5\]]gyis rjes su bstan pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thugs mnyes par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi [#]tshig dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la thams cad mkhyen pa nye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes
[\[25b.6\]]gnyen gyi tshig la the tshom med pa la dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams nye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba la don thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de nyid kyi phyir 'phags pa nor bzangs kyis [#]dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa
[\[25b.7\]]gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan brgya stong du mar [#]bskor ba byas nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas/_yang dang yang blta zhing yang dang yang mngon par blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_rab tu 'dud pa dang /_gus par bya ba dang /_rim gror bya ba dang /_
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]yid la bya ba dang /_bsam pa dang /_bsgom pa dang /_yongs su bsgom pa dang /_ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang /_ngo mtshar du bya ba dang /_yon tan mngon du bya ba dang /_rjes su bsngags pa dang /_rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_brtan
[\[26a.2\]]par bya ba dang /_mi gtong [#]ba dang /_yid la bsam pa dang /_nye bar 'brel par bya ba dang /_smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /_mthong bas [#]dga' ba dang /_dbyangs kyi mtshan ma [#]gzung ba dang /_gzugs kyi rjes su bsam pa dang /_ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su song ba'i
[\[26a.3\]]sems dang ldan par bya ba dang /_kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang /_ye shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang /_smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang /_spyod yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba
[\[26a.4\]]dang /_ye shes kyi snang ba yongs su gzung bar [#]byed cing dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo /_/de bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par blta zhing gdang [#]mchi mas gang bar dus te/_dra byi la sprin la lan brgya stong
[\[26a.5\]]du mar bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing dra byi la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las kyang /_shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni/_mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus pas gang yongs su mi gtong pa'i rin po che de
[\[26a.6\]]'jig rten na med do/_/gang lus kyis [#]rim gro mi bya ba de med do/_/gang rkang pas gtong [#]ba la mi spro ba de med do/_/gang ngag gi las la mi spro ba de med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos 'di ni 'ching ba thams cad gcad par 'gyur ba'o/_/chos 'di ni skye ba
[\[26a.7\]]dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba gcod par 'gyur ba'o snyam nas rin po che'i sems bskyed do/_/chos 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi nad nye bar zhi bar byed par 'gyur bas bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad kyi
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]nad nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'dod par bya'o snyam mo zhes gsungs so/_/khyim bdag drag shul can gyis [#]zhus pa las kyang khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung klog pa dang kha ton bya ba don du gnyer bas sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus
[\[26b.2\]]dang bsam gtan dang shes rab dang ldan pa'am byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs stsogs [#]pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su [#]bcad pa su las mnyan tam lung mnos sam blangs pa'i slob dpon de la des chos kyi gus pa bya'o/_/ming dang tshig dang yi ge ji snyed kyi tshigs
[\[26b.3\]]su bcad pa de [#]bstan pa de snyed kyi bskal par gal te slob dpon de la g.yo med par rnyed [#]pa dang bkur sti dang mchod pa thams cad kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur byas kyang khyim bdag da dung slob dpon la slob dpon gyi gus pa [#]yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin na chos kyi gus pa lta ci smos zhes gsungs
[\[26b.4\]]so[#]/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las kyang /_rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya'o/_/phangs par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi yon tan dag dang bla ma la
[\[26b.5\]]gus pa yid la byed pa dag dang ldan pas song nas [#]mthar gyis grong khyer gzhan zhig tu phyin pa dang /_de'i grong bar gyi tshong 'dus kyi dbus su phyin nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ltar bdag gi lus btsongs la/_de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
[\[26b.6\]]'phags [#]la bkur sti bya'o/_/yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong zhig cing zad de btsongs so/_/'khor ba dpag tu med pa nas [#]'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i rgyus yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram 'di lta bu'i
[\[26b.7\]]sems can chen po dag [#]la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus grong bar gyi tshong 'dus kyi dbus su 'dug ste/_mi su 'dod mi su 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis thos par bos so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mi su 'dod mi [#]su nga nyo bar 'dod ces zer ba'i sgra mi thos par 'gyur ba de lta bur yongs su bsgribs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'
[\[27a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed pa de'i tshe phyogs gcig tu song nas mchi ma phyung ste 'di ltar bdag gi [#]lus btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya snyam na/_lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/_kye ma bdag
[\[27a.3\]]ni thob pa ngan pa thob bo snyam nas[#]/_de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/_de [#]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lus yongs su gtang [#]bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa/_
[\[27a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' [#]chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam ste/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis [#]bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba der song ste 'ongs nas/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[27a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar yid mi dga' zhing yid gdung la mchi ma 'byung ba ci nyes/_des smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u nga [#]ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/_chos la mchod pa [#]bya bar 'dod na/_lus nyo ba de ngas [#]ma
[\[27a.6\]]rnyed nas de la nga 'di snyam du [#]sems so/_/kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par [#]bya ba dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na bdag gi lus nyo ba ma
[\[27a.7\]]rnyed do snyam mo/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu nga la mis ni bya ba med kyi/_nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de der mi'i snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang dag nga la dgos na de rin gyis nyor byin cig ces
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]byas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te gang bdag gis [#]bram ze'i khye'u des/_snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni bdag gis [#]rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do/_/bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs
[\[27b.2\]]mkhas pa la yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro snyam nas/_des sems dga' ba dang sems bde ba dang sems [#]rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/_bram ze'i khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'di las khyod gang 'dod pa sbyin no/_/des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[27b.3\]]rigs kyi bu khyod rin du ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas [#]pa dang /_des de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis gang yongs su gtang [#]ba de nga la byin cig_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po thogs nas/_lag pa g.yas pa phug
[\[27b.4\]]ste khrag gzags so/_/brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs [#]nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa des/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu brla'i [# ]sha med par btogs [#]nas/_rus pa gcog
[\[27b.5\]]tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na tsha byed pa bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu ga la ba deng song ste
[\[27b.6\]]phyin nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu [#]la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na tsha dag byed/_khrag dang rus pa dang rkang 'dis ci zhig bya/_rtag tu ngus bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u 'di
[\[27b.7\]]la bcongs te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o/_/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' [#]chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya'o/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]rigs kyi bu khyod 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang khrag dang rus pa dang rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur sti bya bar 'dod pa/_khyod la yon tan gyi rnam pa ci zhig 'grub par 'gyur/_des de la smras pa bu mo rigs kyi bu de gang la ngas bslab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha
[\[28a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la [#]mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/_de la ngas bslabs na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub [#]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de nas tshong dpon gyi [#]bu mo des byang chub sems
[\[28a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis [#]'di ltar chos rgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar te/_rigs kyi bu chos 'di lta bu re re'i phyir yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed [#]ngu lus yongs su gtang [#]bar bya ba yin na gcig
[\[28a.4\]]lta ci smos te/_de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i gser ram nor bu'am mu tig gam bai DUr+ya'am zhes bya ba nas bdag kyang khyed kyis [#]stsal ba'i g.yog mo
[\[28a.5\]]lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig tu chos 'phags la mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du rgya cher sbyar ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/_bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang zhes bya ba nas/_lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge
[\[28a.6\]]'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs te zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu yang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung /_gnod sems kyi rtog pa ma byung /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung /_ro la brkam [#]pa ma skyes te/_gzhan du ni [#]byang chub
[\[28a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar gyur[#]/_bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bshams na/_bdag gis [#]sa phyogs 'di chag chag
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]ma btab kyis [#]legs par byugs [#]la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/_sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der [#]legs par byug par bya'o snyam mo/_/tshong dpon gyi bu mo la
[\[28b.2\]]sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya [#]de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis [#]dus 'da' bar byed pa [#]bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' [#]chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i sgra thos te/_byang
[\[28b.3\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni [#]zhag bdun na ting nge 'dzin las langs te[#]/_langs nas kyang grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste chos stan par 'gyur ro zhes grag [#]nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu lha'i sgra de thos pa dang /_dga' mgu yid [# ]
[\[28b.4\]]rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang /_sa phyogs de phyags nas/_chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spras pa bshams so/_/de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phud de stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[28b.5\]]dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sa phyogs der chag chag gdab par 'dod na/_bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/_ci nas byang chub sems dpa'
[\[28b.6\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus chu ma rnyed nas yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang /_mchod pa de yang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir chu de dag mi snang bar byas nas/_kun du chu btsal na ma rnyed do/_/de nas byang chub
[\[28b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gi [#]lus phug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab po/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/_rdul gyi khams [#]'di nas byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung na[#]/_bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/_bdag gi [#]lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni bla'i/_nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i gzhis [#]'khor ba dag na bdag gi lus brgya stong
[\[29a.2\]]mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig [#]pa ni cir yang mi rung ngo snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus mtshon rnon po blangs te/_bdag gi [#]lus kun du phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de khor yug tu chag chag btab bo/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[29a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btab ste/_gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar
[\[29a.4\]]chad bya bar glags rnyed [#]par mi 'gyur bas [#]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bu mo de dag sems gzhan du 'gyur ba med do zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na chos bzhi pa'i mdo las kyang /_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes
[\[29a.5\]]gnyen srog gi phyir yang yongs su gtang [#]bar mi bya ba dang /_zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi btang bas bdag la sogs pa bsrung ba la sogs pa bya'o/_/mdo sde dag la [#]blta bas kyang ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ni phal cher mdo
[\[29a.6\]]sde dag las snang ste/_mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i kun du sbyang pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bcas so zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na de ma bltas [#]na ltung ba 'byung ba [#]yang mi shes pas mi spong bar 'gyur bas rtag tu mdo sde blta
[\[29a.7\]]ba la gus par bya'o/_/des na 'dis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtang [#]ba dang /_mdo sde blta bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung [#]bar brjod pa yin no/_/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu 'on kyang yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig gang dag gis brjod du med
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]pa 'dus ma byas kyi chos de bsnyad [#]pa'i yi ge'i nges pa'i tshig de dag gang len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_ston pa dang /_rab tu shes par byed pa dang /_'jog pa dang /_rnam par 'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed pa dang /_gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par rab tu ston pa 'di ni dam
[\[29b.2\]]pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos smra ba gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang /_ston pa dang sgrub pa snying por byed pa'i chos smra ba de dag la gang bsnyen pa dang brten pa [#]dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang ldan pa dang rim gro byed pa dang /_gus par
[\[29b.3\]]byed pa dang /_zhes byed pa dang /_bsti stang byed pa dang /_kun tu srung [#]ba dang /_sbed pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gos dang zas dang mal cha dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad sbyin pa dang /_legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa dang /_rje bo ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang /_dge ba kun tu bsrung ba
[\[29b.4\]]dang /_bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_mi snyen [#]pa 'chab pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rtsod pa med pa lhur len pa dang /_chos ma yin pas rtsod pa rnams chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su
[\[29b.5\]]'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang zhe sdang med pa'i rgyud dang /_sems can thams cad bsdu ba dang rab tu thar bar bya ba'i [#]blo dang zong [#]zing med pa'i sems kyis gzhan dag la chos sbyin pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
[\[29b.6\]]gang chos mnyan pa'i rgyu'am chos bstan pa'i rgyur tha na gom [#]pa gcig 'dor ram tha na dbugs gcig 'byin tam rngub kyang rung ste/_'di yang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang chos thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin cing mi len pa 'di yang dam pa'i chos
[\[29b.7\]]yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu kye ma'o sems 'di ni phyin ci log gi yul la rab tu 'phyar ba ste/_gang de zlog pa dang yongs su bsrung ba dang rtse gcig tu 'gyur ba dang dul ba dang zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba dang /_'dul ba 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]'dzin pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar ro[#]/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gang gis [#]chos gang 'byung ba'i chos de yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang mi len pa 'di ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de la chos smra ba [#]la
[\[30a.2\]]brten pa la sogs pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtang [#]ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mtshan nyid ni bshad zin to/_/de'i phyir dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa 'di med na/_srung bar mi 'gyur dag par mi 'gyur/_'phel bar mi 'gyur la/_de'i phyir de yang byang chub
[\[30a.3\]]sems dpar mi 'gyur bas/_nges par dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/dpal phreng seng ge [#]sgra'i mdo las kyang /_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gang gA'i [#]klung gi bye ma snyed gang lags pa de dag ni smon lam chen po gcig gi nang du 'ub cing
[\[30a.4\]]'dus te rjes su zhugs pa lags te 'di lta ste dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar na dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni yul chen po lags so zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_lha mo 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu stobs chen po dang ldan pas/_
[\[30a.5\]]gnad du mi drag par bsnun na yang gnod par 'gyur zhing mi bde bar byed do/_/lha mo de bzhin du dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa chung ngus kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing mya ngan skyed de smre sngags 'don par byed par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo 'di ltar dam pa'i chos yongs su
[\[30a.6\]]'dzin pa chung ngus kyang bdud sdig can la gnod par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal bskyed de/_smre sngags 'don par byed pa de [#]lta bu'i chos gzhan ni ngas gcig kyang ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs so/_/yang de las/_lha mo 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi gnam 'phang dang zheng rgyas ri nag
[\[30a.7\]]po thams cad zil gyis mnan nas kun du thal le zhing mngon par thal le 'dug go/_/lha mo de bzhin du theg pa chen po pa lus dang srog la mi lta ba gzung ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas kyang /_theg pa chen po pa theg pa la gsar du yang dag par
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]zhugs pa lus dang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa rnams kyi dge ba'i chos thams cad zil gyis gnon [#]no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/de skad du 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis
[\[30b.2\]]yongs su gzung [#]bar 'gyur/_/lha dang klu dang mi'am ci rnams dang /_/bsod nams ye shes kyis ni yongs su gzung [#]/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/dran ldan blo gros ldan zhing blo ldan 'gyur/_/shes rab rgya chen kun nas ye shes ldan/_/mkhas pa
[\[30b.3\]]bag chags bcas pa'i nyon mongs spong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de la bdud kyis [#]skyon chags rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de la 'gyod dang de bzhin dogs pa med/_/de la bcings med sgrib pa cung zad med/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin
[\[30b.4\]]pa/_/zhing stong dag tu nam yang mi skye ste/_/skye ba kun du des ni rgyal ba mthong /_/mthong nas de la dad pa rab tu 'thob/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/chos kyi [#]bdag nyid chen po skye dran 'gyur/_/yang dang yang du rab tu 'byung ba thob[#]/_/spyod pa yongs
[\[30b.5\]]dag sgrub pa snying por byed/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/tshul khrims thob pas 'phags pa'i chos spyod pa/_/mkhas pa [#]mngon shes lnga la [#]myur du reg_/ma sman [#]bsam gtan rnam par thar pa thob[#]/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam
[\[30b.6\]]pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni zab chos rtogs par khong du chud/_/sangs rgyas spyod yul stong nyid the tshom med/_/sems can bdag med par yang mos par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni so so yang dag rig pa 'thob/_/'jigs med shes
[\[30b.7\]]rab rno zhing chags med dag_/de ni srog chags kun gyi the tshom gcod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/mkhas pa de ni gzungs rnams thob par 'gyur/_/bskal pa brgyar yang gang thos chud mi za/_/spobs dang ldan zhing chags pa med par 'gyur/_/
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de la mkhas pa rtag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/lha dang lha min mi ci'i yid du 'ong /_/de la sangs rgyas bu gcig bzhin du bstod[#]/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/brgya byin tshangs pa
[\[31a.2\]]de bzhin 'jig rten skyong /_/'khor los sgyur dang mi yi rgyal por 'gyur/_/bde dang yid bdes byang chub de 'tshang rgya/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de lus sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing /_/mkhas pa yan lag smad pa med par 'gyur/_/de la lta
[\[31a.3\]]bas [#]ngoms par yong ma [#]'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/gang yang [#]chos kyi phyag rgya 'di ston pa'i/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen de la dkon mi 'gyur/_/chos mdzod zad mi shes pa nyan par byed/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/
[\[31a.4\]]lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rnam par dag_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par dag_/rnam grol ye shes shin tu rnam par dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa/_/de ni byang chub sems brjed 'gyur ba med/_/pha rol phyin pa [#]spyod dang 'gal mi 'gyur/_/dge ba
[\[31a.5\]]brgya [#]rnams kyis kyang rab tu gzung [#]/_/zhes 'byung ngo /_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u las/_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//_//gsum po rnams kyi [#]bsrung ba la sogs pa'i thabs ni spyir bshad zin te/_bsrung ba la
[\[31a.6\]]sogs pa brjod par bya'o/_/de la lus bsrung [#]gang zhe na/_gnod [#]'gyur spong ba gang yin pa'o/_/de la zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin par gnas pa ni/_ji ltar gzhan nyams par mi byed pa de ltar de'i lus bsrung ba dpyad par bya ba yin no[#]/_/gnod par 'gyur ba spong ba 'di
[\[31a.7\]]yang 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las/_byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la brtson pa rnams kyis/_/bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das slad bdag cag rnams/_/lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste/_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung [#]bar spro/_/rnyed
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]dang bkur sti spangs nas su/_/rten [#]pa kun kyang rab spangs te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes ston byed pa'i/_/chos 'di yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung [#]slad du/_/gshe dang mi snyan 'tshe [#]ba dang /_/ngan du smra ba'i tshig rnams kyang /_/bzod pas de dag dang du blang /_/
[\[31b.2\]]tshul 'di rab tu bzung [#]nas su/_/co 'dri ba dang bsdigs pa dang /_/mi bsngags pa dang mi snyan pa[#]/_/de dag thams cad bzod par bgyi/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dge slong rgyal po rab 'khrug cing /_/de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa/_/rnam par 'jig tshe sems can phyir/_/bdag
[\[31b.3\]]cag dam chos gzung bar bgyi/_/mdo sde gang dag rab zab cing /_/rnam grol 'bras bur ldan pa rnams/_/rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de[#]/_/de dag sna tshogs gtam rnams bgyid/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_/tshul 'di rab tu bzung [#]nas su/_/gang dag chos la mi [#]gnas pa'i/_/
[\[31b.4\]]sems can rnams la byams par bgyi/_/de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi/_/sems can rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong nas su/_/de yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur zhes/_/mchi ma'ang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi/_/dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa/_/de dag 'phral du
[\[31b.5\]]mthong na [#]yang /_/de dag gshe bar mi 'gyur bas[#]/_/ring nas byams pa btsal bar bgyi/_/rab tu bsdams nas ngag gi las/_/nyams kyis [#]ci nus bsrung bar bgyi/_/sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa/_/de la glo bur gtam mi bgyi/_/nor sbyin de bzhin bsti stang gis/_/mi rnams
[\[31b.6\]]yongs su smin bgyis nas/_/yang dag sdig med spyod yul gyi[#]/_/slad kyis [#]de dag bskul bar bgyi/_/khyim dang sten pa kun spangs te/_/don nyung ba dang bgyid nyung ba/_/bas mtha' dgon pa'i spyod yul la/_/ri dgas bzhin du 'gyur ba [#]bgyi/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_/dul ba dang
[\[31b.7\]]ni zhi ba dang /_/grol nas [#]grong du zhugs nas kyang /_/sems can gang dag chos tshol ba/_/de la bdag cag chos bstan to/_/chos 'dod par ni rtogs nas su[#]/_/shin tu ring du'ang mchi bar bgyi/_/chos la dga' zhing mos rnyed nas/_/lus can rnams kyi don kyang bgyi/_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po/_/de dag mngon du mthong nas kyang /_/chos dang des pa [#]rab gnas nas/_/bdag la rab tu brtag [#]par bgyi/_/bsti stang bgyis dang ma bgyis pa[#]/_/ri rab lta bur gyur nas su/_/'jig rten gyis ni mi gos pa/_/'jig rten
[\[32a.2\]]'dren par 'gyur bar bgyi/_/dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyi/_/mi snyan pa dag rtogs nas kyang /_/las ni bdag gir bya bar bgyi/_/de dag las ni smin ma 'gyur[#]/_/chos rnams la ni gnas pa la[#]/_/deng la de 'dra'i chos rnams ni/_/ji lta bur yang yod med ces/_/gshed
[\[32a.3\]]ma dag kyang 'gyed par 'gyur/_/bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste/_/dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes/_/yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang /_/mdo sde 'di ni spong bar 'gyur/_/sna dang rna chad de dag ni/_/me long dga' bar mi 'gyur ltar/_/yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang /_/de dag dam chos
[\[32a.4\]]spong bar 'gyur/_/dge slong gang dag dam pa'i chos/_/rab tu 'dzin pa 'byung 'gyur ba[#]/_/de dag de bzhin tshul 'chos te/_/gang yang chos 'di mi nyan to/_/rgyal po rnams kyang bslu bar bgyid[#]/_/skye bo chen po 'byed 'gyur yang /_/sangs rgyas kyis [#]ni byin brlabs kyis/_/
[\[32a.5\]]sems can de dag chos nyan 'gyur/_/dus ngan de tshe bdag cag rnams/_/sems can dag la phan slad du/_/lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/_/dam pa'i chos ni gzung [#]bar bgyi/_/zhes brjod pa yin no//_//bam po gsum pa/_'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad ma
[\[32a.6\]]dkar po las kyang /_/cho ga spyod yul bsrung bya zhing /_/'du 'dzi med la gtsang bar bya/_/rgyal po dang ni rgyal bu dang /_/'dres byed rtag tu spang bar bya/_/rgyal po'i zhabs 'bring gang yin dang /_/gdol pa zol ba chang 'tshong dang /_/mu stegs can ni de dag dang /_/rnam pa kun du 'dris mi
[\[32a.7\]]bya/_/dge slong 'dul dang lus gnas la[# ]/_/dgra bcom snyam du sems [#]byed cing /_/nga rgyal can rnams brten [#]mi bya/_/tshul khrims 'chal rnams rnam par spang /_/dgod cing smra ba'i spyod yul can/_/dge slong ma rnams rtag tu spang /_/mi brtan par ni mngon pa yi/_/dge bsnyen
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]rnams kyang spang bar bya/_/bud med ma ning sems can gang /_/de dang 'dris byed [#]rnam par spang /_/khyim rnams su ni mna' ma dang /_/gzhon nu ma rnams spang bar bya/_/khams dang legs par dri byed pa/_/de dag nam du'ang dga' mi byed/_/phag 'tshong [#]pa dang shan pa dang /_/'dris
[\[32b.2\]]par byed pa rnam par spang /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_/gang dag bud med gso byed dang /_/gar mkhan gyad dang sil khrol ba/_/gang gzhan de dang 'dra ba spang [#]/_/de dag rnams dang 'dris byed spang /_/res ma'i gtso mo bsten mi bya/_/ji snyed longs spyod 'tsho ba gzhan/_/shin tu dga' ba
[\[32b.3\]]de dag kyang /_/rnam pa kun du yongs su spang [#]/_/mkhas pas [#]bud med rnams la yang /_/gang gi dus na chos 'chad pa/_/der ni gcig pu mi 'gro ste/_/dgod cing 'dug par mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'di ni gnod pa gzhan yin te/_'di lta ste bdud kyi las so/_/shes
[\[32b.4\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' [#]theg pa la yang dag par zhugs nas ring po ma lon pa de la bdud sdig can shin tu brtson [#]par byed ces gsungs pa dang /_de nyid las/_kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
[\[32b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa la brtson [#]par byed pa de'i tshe/_bdud sdig can rnams ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di nur ba dang spu zing zhes byed par 'gyur zhig gu/_gang gis na [#]'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las sems bskyed pa gcig tsam la yang
[\[32b.6\]]'bri bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' mtho btsams [#]pa nye bar sgrub po/_/'jigs pa kun du ston te/_phyogs phyogs su skar mda' gtong ngo /_/phyogs sreg pa 'byin zhing kun du ston to zhes bya ba dang /_gzhan yang rnam par shes pa la 'du shes pas yi ger 'dri
[\[32b.7\]]ba nas kun chub par byed pa'i bar du byed cing 'di la bdag cag gis ro myang ba mi rnyed do/_/zhes stan las langs te 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du [#]glal ba dang /_steg pas [#]kun chub par byed pa'i bar du byed par 'gyur ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/de bzhin du ljongs dang grong
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]la sogs pa la rnam par rtog pa dang /_de bzhin du mkhan po dang slob dpon dang pha ma dang blon po dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin du [#]chom rkun yid la byed pa dang /_de bzhin du gos la sogs pa yid la byed pa 'byung ngo /_/gzhan
[\[33a.2\]]yang chos smra ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yi ger bri ba nas/_bklag pa'i bar la 'dun par gyur la/_chos nyan pa ni le lo can du gyur pa dang /_de las bzlog pa dang /_chos smra ba ni yul gzhan du 'gro bar 'dod la chos nyan pa ni de lta [#]ma yin pa yang de bzhin du sbyar
[\[33a.3\]]ro/_/chos smra ba ni 'dod pa che la chos nyan pa ni 'dod pa chung ba yang de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/mdor na chos smra ba dang chos nyan pa gnyis kyis [#]mi 'dzom par 'gyur ba [#]de dag thams cad bdud kyi las yin no zhes gsungs so[#]/_/'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las kyang /_de
[\[33a.4\]]ltar mi dge ba'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang dge ba'i chos spong ba de dag thams cad ni bdud kyi las so zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa par gyur te/_bas mthar gnas
[\[33a.5\]]mal bca' bar mngon par dga' zhing 'dod pa chung la chog shes pa ste [#]rab tu dben pa/_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang mi 'dre la de don nyung ba dang bgyi ba nyung bas bde bar gnas te g.yo [#]ma mchis kyang /_mang du thos pa yongs su btsal ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par
[\[33a.6\]]bgyi ba dang /_chos nyan pa la brtson pa mi gnas pa dang /_chos kyi gtam dang don rnam par nges pa'i gtam gyi bar [#]la rgyun dgum par sems te yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ma lags/_dge ba ci zhig tshol ba la mi brtson/_de dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_gcig pur dga'
[\[33a.7\]]bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun du mi rgyu ste/_de kun nas ldang ba gnon [#]pa tsam gyis dga' ba thob cing bag la nyal yang dag par gzhom pa'i slad du lam [#]bsgom par mi bgyid de/_de ni [#]bdag gi don dang /_gzhan gyi don gyi slad du brtson par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa'i dgon pa la gnas pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bdun pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po gang dag de la [#]bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_sems can
[\[33b.2\]]yongs su smin par bgyid pa las 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang /_don chung zhing bgyid pa nyung ba la sbyor ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i bka'
[\[33b.3\]]mchid de la rgyun du mang du ston pa dang /_theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la bsnyen cing bsten te/_bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben par gnas pas theg pa chen po las ldang ba'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi
[\[33b.4\]]za bar zhal ta byed par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor ba dang /_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor ba de'i tshe dben pa la sbyor zhing de la 'di skad du byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin gyi le lo can
[\[33b.5\]]ni ma yin no/_/gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [#]mi nus so zhes mchi la/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[33b.6\]]de la byang chub sems dpa' gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis nas[#]/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu pa'o/_/de las gzhan pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg [#]pa'i
[\[33b.7\]]gang zag dag bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa chos ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' ba rnyed pa dang de dag kyang de bzhin du de'i rjes su 'jug par gyur pa dang /_de dman pa la bsten [#]cing khyad par dang bral bas 'di lta ste/_zhan pa'i 'gro ba blun pa 'on pa lkugs pa'i 'gro ba [#]'gro ba dman
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]pa nyid du mchi bar 'gyur te 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu bcu gcig pa'o zhes gsungs te/_gang gis de ltar brtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa skyo bar gyur pas/_rtag tu byang chub sems dpa'i dngos po nyid du [#]mi 'gyur ba'o/_/de bas na dkon mchog sprin las/_
[\[34a.2\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa'i [#]spyod lam thams cad du [#]brtson 'grus rtsom [#]pa na/_ci nas lus skyo bar mi 'gyur ba dang sems skyo ba [#]mi 'gyur ba de ltar rtsom [#]ste 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rtag pa'i brtson 'grus [#]zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/gang gis skyo bar 'gyur ba'i brtson
[\[34a.3\]]'grus te [#]ci 'dra ba zhig yin [#]zhe na/_gang 'di stobs chung ba las lci ba'am dus ring por rtsom [#]pa'am mos pa yongs su ma smin pa rnams bya dka' ba'i las rtsom pa ste dper na rang gi sha sbyin pa la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/'dis sems can rnams la lus byin zin mod kyi/_'on kyang dus
[\[34a.4\]]ma yin par yongs su spyad [#]pa las bzlog par zad de/_gzhan du na sems can de dag la byang chub sems dpa' skyo bar gyur pas[#]/_byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon chud za ba'i phyir 'bras bu'i phung po chen po chud za bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo
[\[34a.5\]]las/_dus ma yin par 'dod pa ni bdud kyi las so zhes gsungs so/_/dus ma yin zhes te lus gtang [#]ba'i sems mi bskyed pa nyid kyang ma yin te/_goms pa ma brtsams pa'i phyir nam yang sbyin par mi bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag nas byang
[\[34a.6\]]chub kyi sems yongs su smin pa dang 'gal ba dang gti mug gis [#]rang gi don la gnod pa dang /_sha za ba dang las byed pa rnams la lus bsrung bar bya'o/_/dper na sman shing ljon pa blta [#]sdug pa/_/rtsa ba la sogs spyad 'os sa bon ni/_/sbyin [#]yang dus min spyad las bsrung bya
[\[34a.7\]]ba/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman shing de bzhin no/_/mdor bsdu na bdud kyi las 'di ni gnod pa yin no/_/'di rnam par spang ba ni dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las[#]/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi las yongs su spong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na/_
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo /_/mi mthun pa'i yul na gnas pa dang 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig bsten cing sgom pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang mchod pa dang rim gro la chags pa thams cad nas
[\[34b.2\]]thams cad du yongs su spong ngo /_/nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang gzhan dag byang chub kyi phyogs kyi lam gyi bar du gcod pa de dag kyang [#]thams cad nas thams cad du [#]yongs su spong ngo /_/de dag gi gnyen po yang bsten to [#]zhes gsungs so/_/de nyid las mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi
[\[34b.3\]]mtshan nyid gsungs pa/_tshul khrims nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pas sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du lta ba nyams pa dang cho ga nyams pa dang 'tsho ba nyams pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba'i gang
[\[34b.4\]]zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_le lo can gyi gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_'khor ba la dga' ba'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_byang chub la rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i gang zag rnam par spangs pa dang /_khyim pa dang bsten pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po
[\[34b.5\]]yongs su spangs [#]par rig par bya ste/_rigs kyi bu des de dag yongs su spong ba'i tshe/_gang zag de dag la sdang ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o[#]/_/khong khro ba'i sems dang brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o [#]des 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sems can rnams ni/_/
[\[34b.6\]]khams so so ba [# ]bsten te/_bsten par gyur nas chud za bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to[#]/_/de bas na bdag gis [#]bsten pa yongs su spangs par [#]sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems brjod pa 'di [#]yang gnod pa yin te/_de'i rgyu ni dkon mchog brtsegs
[\[34b.7\]]pa las/_'od srungs [#]byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi [#]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mkhan po dang slob dpon dang bla ma dang /_sbyin gnas la slu ba dang /_gzhan 'gyod pa med par dag la 'gyod pa nye bar sgrub [#]pa dang /_theg pa chen po
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la bsngags pa ma yin pa dang mi snyan pa dang brjod pa ma yin pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa 'byin pa dang /_sgyu dang g.yos gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[35a.2\]]'di rnam par spang ba yang de nyid las/_'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na [#]skye ba thams cad du skyes ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems mngon du 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor brjed par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_srog gi phyir
[\[35a.3\]]ram tha na bzhad [#]gang gi phyir yang shes bzhin du brdzun [#]gyi tshig mi smra ba dang /_sgyu dang g.yo med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes skyed cing de dag gi yang dag pa'i bsngags [#]pa phyogs
[\[35a.4\]]bzhir brjod pa dang /_sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de dag thams cad kyang nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/_'od srungs bzhi po de dag go zhes gsungs so/_/seng ges
[\[35a.5\]]zhus pa las kyang /_gang zhig chos kyi sbyin pa las/_/nam yang bar chad mi byed pa/_/de ni des na rab myur ba dang /_/'jig rten mgon dang phrad par 'gyur/_/de bzhin du/_chos kyi sbyin pas skye ba dran/_/gzhon nu de ltar shes par gyis/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_de skad du
[\[35a.6\]]de nyid las/_skye ba kun du byang chub sems/_/rmi lam na yang sems de ni/_/'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe/_/smos ci [#]'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/_/bka' stsal pa/_grong dang grong khyer rnams su yang [#]/_/gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/_/byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/_/des na sems
[\[35a.7\]]'dor mi 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i mdo las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam mi 'dor ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]spangs pa yin/_pha rol gyi 'byor pa mthong na yid dga' ba yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_dkon mchog brtsegs pa de nyid las/_spyod lam thams cad du byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba dang byang chub kyi sems [#]sngon du 'gro ba dang zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa 'di ni
[\[35b.2\]]'dir byang chub kyi rgyur shin tu gsal ba nyid do/_/de skad du zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_khyed la mos bya khong du chud par bya/_/ji ltar ji ltar mang du mis brtags na/_/de la gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa des/_/de lta de ltar de la sems gzhol 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[35b.3\]]spro ba med pa yang gnod pa [#]ma yin te/_/de spang ba ni dkon mchog sprin las mthong ste/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du mir gyur pas [#]ni byang chub thob par dka' la/_bdag gi brtson 'grus 'di yang chung zhing zhan te/_bdag ni le lo can no/_/byang chub ni mgo dang gos la
[\[35b.4\]]me 'bar ba bzhin du bskal pa mang po bskal pa brgya phrag mang po bskal pa stong phrag mang po bskal pa brgya stong phrag mang [#]por bsgrub dgos pas bdag ni de lta bu'i khur bkur bar mi spro'o snyam du sems mi bskyed de/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
[\[35b.5\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag dang /_gang dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag dang /_gang dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang /_tshul 'di 'dra ba dang lam 'di 'dra ba dang brtson 'grus 'di
[\[35b.6\]]'dra bas [#]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs par gyur pa sha stag las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gyis/_bdag [# ]
[\[35b.7\]]kyang ci nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i [#]sems can thams cad dang thun mong gi brtson 'grus dang /_sems can thams cad la dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyis [#]bdag gis kyang de lta de ltar brtsal [#]lo 'bad do zhes
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]gsungs so/_/gzhan yang gnod pa ni dkon mchog brtsegs pa las mthong ste/_sems can yongs su smin par ma byas pa rnams la yid rton pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /_sems can snod du ma gyur pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po
[\[36a.2\]]ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /_rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams la theg pa dman pa ston pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa dang /_yang dag par nye bar gnas pa'i sems can tshul khrims dang ldan pa dge ba'i chos can rnams la brnyas shing tshul khrims
[\[36a.3\]]'chal pa [#]sdig pa'i chos can sdud pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'khrul pa zhes bya'o[#]/_/mos pa med pa yang gnod pa yin te/_/'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gi mdo las kyang /_/sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min la/_/chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med/_/bslab dang
[\[36a.4\]]sbyang ba [#]rnams la de mi mos/_/sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa/_/de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas/_/las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs/_/dmyal ba'am 'on te dud 'gro'i 'gro [#]rnams sam/_/yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed/_/ces ji
[\[36a.5\]]skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de rnam par spangs pa ni dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las mthong ste/_chos zab mo gang dag de'i blos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing /_sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos
[\[36a.6\]]bstan pa 'jug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen gyi bdag gis ni mi shes te/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dbang du gyur pa yin no zhes byas nas mi spong ngo zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/zhal ta byed pa'i tshe don ma yin pa rnam par spang ba la mkhas par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor
[\[36a.7\]]thar pa las/_chos dang mthun pa dang chos nyan pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la zhal ta bya bar bstan to/_/de la zhal ta bya ba gang yin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'i mdo las gsungs te/_de la dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong gi [#]dge 'dun thams cad kyi sems mgu bar
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]bya'o/_/de la dge slong dgon pa pa [#]bas mtha'i gnas mal bsten pa gang yin pa de dag ni dge slong zhal ta byed pas thams cad du las su bsko bar mi bya'o/_/gal te dge slong dgon pa pa la dge 'dun gyi bya bar gtogs pa slob pa'i las res bab na/_dge slong zhal ta byed pa des las
[\[36b.2\]]de bdag gis bya'o/_/yang na dge slong gzhan zhig bskos [#]la las de byed du gzhug ste/_dge slong dgon pa pa la gnod par mi bya'o/_/de la dge slong bsod snyoms spyod pa gang yin pa de la dge slong zhal ta byed pa des kha zas bsod pa bgo bsha' bya'o/_/'od srungs de la dge slong
[\[36b.3\]]gang rnal 'byor spyod pa gang yin pa de dag la/_dge slong zhal ta byed pas mthun pa'i 'tshog chas dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad rnams sbyin par bya'o/_/dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa des phyogs gang la gnas pa'i sa phyogs der dge slong zhal ta byed pa des sgra chen po dang skad drag po
[\[36b.4\]]mi dbyung [#]zhing byed du'ang mi gzhug go/_/dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa de bsrung zhing mal cha yang sbyar bar bya'o/_/kha zas bsod pa dang yi [#]gar 'ong pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang mthun pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams sbyin par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_
[\[36b.5\]]dge slong gang dag mang du thos par byed pa la brtson pa de dag spro ba bskyed par bya zhing /_de dag la bsrung ba'i bar du bya'o/_/chos smra ba'i dge slong gang yin pa de dag las su mi bsko bar bya'o/_/chos nyan pa la brtson par 'gyur ba'i bar du bya'o/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor bsham
[\[36b.6\]]par bya'o/_/'bel ba'i gtam gyis [#]dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang bar bya ba nas de la legs so zhes bya ba mang bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dngos po gang la yang dbang bya ba'i 'du shes bskyed par mi bya'o[#]/_/bya ba ji tsam du chung ba yang dge 'dun gyi gros bzhin
[\[36b.7\]]bya zhing rang dgar mi bya'o/_/dge 'dun gyi [#]phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dang mi bsre ba'i bar du bya ste/_bzlog pa yang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du mchod rten gyi dang phan tshun bsre ba yang bkag go/_/gal te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la [#]brel phongs su gyur la dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]che bar gyur na dge slong zhal ta byed pa des dge slong gi [#]dge 'dun bsdus la gros mthun par bgyis te/_dge 'dun gyi rnyed pa las phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshug par bya'o/_/mchod rten zhig ral du gyur na yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag
[\[37a.2\]]la gsol ba thob la mchod rten gso [#]bar bya'o/_/'od srungs gal te mchod rten gyi rnyed pa ji ltar mang du gyur du zin kyang de [#]dge slong zhal ta byed pas dge 'dun dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la bshug par mi bya ste[#]/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dad cing dang ba mang po dag gis [#]mchod rten 'phul ba
[\[37a.3\]]ni tha na ras kyi kha tshar gcig tsam gang yin pa de yang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi [#]mchod rten yin na/_rin po che'am rin po cher smos pa dag lta smos kyang [#]ci dgos/_/mchod rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang nyi ma dang char bas
[\[37a.4\]]dengs kyang bla'i mchod rten la phul ba'i gos dang [#]zong gser du bsgyur du mi rung ste/_mchod rten la ni mchod rten gyi zong [#]cis kyang brel phongs pa med do/_/'od srungs dge slong gi zhal ta byed pa gang la la zhig tshul khrims dang ldan pa sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la sems khros sam dbang byed
[\[37a.5\]]cing bsgo blag byed na de mi dge ba'i las des sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi'i 'jig rten du 'ongs na yang bran dang gzhan gyi las byed par 'gyur ba dang khu tshur dang thal lcag dang lag cha bsnyems pas brdegs [#]pa dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dge
[\[37a.6\]]slong la chad pas gcod pa dang /_'jigs par byed pa dang bsdigs pa dang /_dus ma yin par mngag pa dang dus ma yin par [#]bsgo bar byed na/_de mi dge ba des nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba phur pa mang po zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur te/_phur pa stong gi bar dag gis [#]lus la zug cing /_
[\[37a.7\]]'bar rab tu 'bar la/_kun tu rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lce'i tshad dpag tshad brgya bar 'gyur zhing de'i lce'i dbang po de la lcags phur brgya stong kun tu 'bar ba dag gis [#]'bugs par 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs dge slong zhal ta byed pa gang la las dge 'dun
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]gyi rnyed pa 'dus shing 'dus pa gzhag ste dus dus su mi sbyin zhing mtho btsams la gces [#]nas sbyin pa dang kha cig la ma [#]byin na de mi dge ba'i rtsa ba des yi dgas kyi skye gnas rgyag 'jim [#]byin pa nub ces bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro/_/der yi dgas gzhan gyis kha zas blangs te [#]de la
[\[37b.2\]]bstan na/_de [#]bstan pa'i tshe/_mig gnyi ga mi 'dzums [#]par zas de la blta zhing bkres pa dang skom pas nyen pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong gi lo brgya stong du yang [#]zas de ni thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ste brgya la brgya lam na zas de thob kyang ngan skyugs dang rnag khrag tu 'gyur ro
[\[37b.3\]]zhes gsungs so/_/dge 'dun bsrungs [#]kyi rtogs pa brjod pa las kyang gnod pa gsungs te/_dge 'dun bsrungs [#]khyod kyis sems can rtsig pa lta bu gang dag mthong ba de rnams ni sngon dge slong yin te/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi rtsig ngos la ngar snabs kyis [#]ma rungs par byas
[\[37b.4\]]pas las de'i rnam par smin pas rtsig pa dang [#]'dra bar gyur to/_/dge 'dun bsrungs [#]khyod kyis sems can ka ba 'dra ba gang dag mthong ba de rnams kyang sngon dge slong yin te/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi ka ba ngar snabs kyis [#]ma rungs par byas pas de'i phyir ka ba 'dra bar gyur to/_/
[\[37b.5\]]dge 'dun bsrungs [#]khyod kyis sems can shing lta bu dang lo ma lta bu dang me tog lta bu dang 'bras bu lta bu gang dag mthong ba de rnams kyang sngon dge slong yin te/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi shing dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu rnams gang zag gis yongs su spyad par spyad pas na
[\[37b.6\]]de'i phyir shing dang lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu lta bur gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can thag pa lta bu dang phyags ma lta bu gang dag mthong ba de rnams kyang sngon dge slong yin te/_de dag gis dge 'dun gyi thag pa dang phyags ma gang zag gis yongs su spyad par spyad pas na de'i phyir
[\[37b.7\]]thag pa lta bu dang phyags ma lta bur gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can gzhong pa lta bu gang mthong ba de sngon dge tshul ba [#]yin te/_de gzhong pa 'khru [#]zhing 'dug pa dang /_dge slong dag cig [#]glo bur du lhags te/_de dag gis [#]de mthong nas dris pa dge tshul pha [#]ci deng dge 'dun la skom lta
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]yod dam/_de [#]ser snas non pa'i sems kyis smras pa/_ci gzhong pa bkrus [#]pa'ang ma mthong ngam skom 'thungs zin to/_/de dag gis [#]dus yol zin pa lta snyam du bsams nas re ba chad de dman zhing yi [#]bsad pa'i bzhin gyis dong ngo /_/de ni las de'i rnam
[\[38a.2\]]par smin pas gzhong pa lta bur gyur to/_/khyod kyis [#]sems can gtun lta bu gang mthong ba de yang sngon dge slong yin te/_de la lhung bzed kyi las shig byung ba de'i tshe/_dge tshul pha [#]dgra bcom pa gcig cig [#]la dam gzhag pa'i las res bab nas de la des smras pa/_dge tshul
[\[38a.3\]]pha [#]tshigs ma cung zhig rdungs [#]la kho bo la byin/_des smras pa gnas brtan bdag brel gyis cung zhig gzhes shig_/slad kyis [#]brdungs te gsol lo zhes byas pa dang /_de khros nas smras pa/_dge tshul pha [#]gal te kho bo gtun [#]la reg tu rung na ni/_khyod nyid kho bos gtun gyi nang du
[\[38a.4\]]bcug ste brdungs na tshigs ma nyung zad [#]brdungs pa lta ci smos/_/dge tshul pha [#]des de kun nas dkris pa drag pos dkris [#]par rig nas/_gal te bdag gis [#]de la lan blan na de bas kyang khros par 'gyur ro snyam nas kha rog ste 'dug go/_/gang gi tshe de kun nas dkris [#]pa dang bral
[\[38a.5\]]bar gyur pa de'i tshe de'i gan du song nas smras pa/_gnas brtan [#]khyod kyis kho bo su lags mkhyen tam/_des smras pa shes te khyod ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i dge tshul lo[#]/_/kho bo ni dge slong gnas brtan no/_/dge
[\[38a.6\]]tshul phas [#]smras pa/_de lta yin du zin kyang kho bos ni rab tu byung nas bya ba gang yin pa de byas so/_/ci zhig byas/_nyon mongs pa spangs so/_/'ching ba mtha' dag bcad do/_/bcings pa las rnam par grol lo/_/khyod kyis ni zhe gcod pa'i ngag gi las smras kyi [#]nyes pa la
[\[38a.7\]]nyes par mthol cig_/'on tang las de yongs su byang zhing bsrabs te/_yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/des kyang nyes pa la nyes par bshags so/_/las des na gtun lta bur gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can phru chen lta bu gang dag mthong ba de dag ni sngon dge slong rnams kyi
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]rim gro ba rung ba byed pa yin te/_de dag sman 'tshed pa'i tshe dge slong rnams kyis mi snyan pa smras pas de dag sems 'khrugs nas phru chen bcag [#]pas de'i phyir phru chen lta bur gyur to/_/khyod kyis sems can rked par chad la skud pas thogs par gang mthong ba de yang sngon dge slong yin
[\[38b.2\]]te/_/rnyed pa 'dzin par byed pa ni[#]/_/de ser snas non pas dus bsnor te dbyar gyi gang yin pa de ni dgun gyir byas dgun gyi gang yin pa de ni dbyar gyir byas pas las de'i rnam par smin pas rked par chad la skud pas thogs shing 'gro'o zhes bya ba'o/_/chos smra ba [#]la sogs pa bsrung
[\[38b.3\]]ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//gzhan yang mdo sde dag las gnod pa chen po dag gsungs te/_re zhig 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba lnga ste/_rtsa ba'i ltung ba de dag gis rgyal rigs
[\[38b.4\]]spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa thams cad thal bar rlog ste/_pham par gyur cing lha dang mi'i bde ba'i gnas thams cad las lhung nas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mchod rten gyi rdzas
[\[38b.5\]]'phrog gam dge 'dun gyi dang phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba 'phrog gam 'phrog tu [#]'jug pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang po'o/_/gang yang chos spong zhing 'gog [#]tu 'jug ste/_nyan thos nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas [#]nges par 'byung ba bshad pa'am/_
[\[38b.6\]]theg pa chen po'i nges par 'byung ba bshad pa spong zhing 'gog tu 'jug pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba gnyis pa'o/_/gang yang nga'i [#]phyir rab tu byung ste skra dang kha spu bregs nas gos ngur smrig gyon pa/_bslab pa gzung yang rung ma gzung [#]yang rung /_tshul khrims 'chal pa yang rung tshul
[\[38b.7\]]khrims dang ldan pa yang rung ste/_de'i gos ngur smrig 'phrog gam khyim na gnas par byed du 'jug gam lus la lag chas bsnun nam btson [#]rar 'jug gam srog dang bral bar byed du 'jug pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba gsum pa'o/_/rgyal rigs gang yang ched du bsams te/_ma'i [# ]
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]srog gcod pa dang pha dang bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]nyan thos dgra bcom pa'i srog gcod pa dang /_dge 'dun mthun pa 'byed [#]pa dang /_ched du bsams te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ngan sems kyis [#]khrag 'byin pa ste/_mtshams med pa'i las lnga po
[\[39a.2\]]'di dag las gang yang rung ba'i las byed pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi pa'o/_/rgyal rigs gang yang [#]rgyu med par smra bar gyur la/_'jig rten pha rol pa [#]g.yel te/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par bzung nas gnas shing sems can gzhan mang po dag kyang mi dge ba
[\[39a.3\]]bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste/_'dul zhing 'dzud la [#]'god pa 'di ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba lnga pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te gang yang grong 'joms pa dang ljongs 'joms pa dang grong khyer 'joms pa dang /_yul 'khor 'joms par byed pa 'di yang rtsa ba'i ltung
[\[39a.4\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa [#]las dang po pa rnams kyi rtsa ba'i ltung ba brgyad de rtsa ba'i ltung ba de dag gis theg pa chen po la [#]yang dag par zhugs pa las dang po pa 'khrul pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon
[\[39a.5\]]bskyed pa thams cad thal bar rlog ste pham par gyur cing [#]/_lha dang mi'i [#]theg pa chen po'i bde ba'i gnas las lhung nas ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/_yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khor bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_sems
[\[39a.6\]]can gang dag sngon nyes par spyad pa'i rgyus snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skyes pa de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas theg pa chen po mchog tu zab pa 'di nyan to/_/rigs kyi bu blo chung ngu de dag
[\[39a.7\]]kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par byed la de dag gi nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i las dang po gang dag stong pa nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde mchog tu zab pa 'di nyan pa dang lung nod pa dang klog pa dang kha ton byed pa de dag ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar chub
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]par byas pa de [#]bzhin du/_snga ma'i blo dang 'dra ba gzhan dag gi mdun du/_don bzang po dang tshig 'bru bzang po rgyas par dran par byed cing rab tu ston la/_de dag ni nan tan tu ma sbyangs pa'i [#]byis pa so so'i skye bo dag ste/_mnyan nas skrag cing dngang ste dngang bar 'gyur zhing /_de dag
[\[39b.2\]]dngangs [#]nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las phyir log ste nyan thos kyi byang chub la smon na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba dang po ste/_rtsa ba'i ltung ba des rigs kyi bu de dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon skyes [#]pa thams cad thal bar rlog ste pham
[\[39b.3\]]par gyur cing mtho ris dang thar pa'i bde ba'i gnas las ltung ba dang de'i byang chub kyi [#]sems kyang bslus shing ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan dag dang [#]gang zag gzhan rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal shes par byas la/_bsam pa
[\[39b.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la bags kyis [#]chos bstan par bya ste/_dper na rgya mtsho chen por bags kyis 'jug pa bzhin du bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' [#]las dang po pa kha cig la 'di skad du khyod kyis [#]pha rol tu sbyin [#]pa drug la spyod pa spyad
[\[39b.5\]]par mi nus/_khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus kyi[#]/_khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par [#]myur du sems skyed cig dang /_des na khyod 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ngo zhes smras pa 'di ni byang chub sems
[\[39b.6\]]dpa' las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba gnyis pa ste/_gong du ji ltar smos pa'i bar du'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa kha cig la 'di skad du kye so sor thar pa dang 'dul ba'i tshul khrims la legs par bsrungs pas ci zhig bya/_khyod myur du bla na med pa yang
[\[39b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed [#]la theg pa chen po lhogs shig dang /_des na khyod kyis [#]nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis mi dge ba'i las gang bsgrubs pa de dag rnam par smin par mi 'gyur bar dag par 'gyur ro zhes smra ba [#]'di ni byang chub
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]sems dpa'i las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba gsum pa ste gong du ji skad smos pa'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas kha cig la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dag khyed nyan thos kyi theg [#]pa'i gtam ma nyan cig_/ma klog cig_/_
[\[40a.2\]]gzhan dag la lung ma 'bogs shig[ #]/nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam chobs shig_/des ni khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po rnyed par mi 'gyur zhing gzhi des ni khyed kyis [#]nyon mongs pa mthar 'byin par mi nus kyi[# ]/_theg pa chen po'i gtam 'di nyid la dad par gyis shig_/theg pa chen
[\[40a.3\]]po nyon cig_/theg pa chen po lhogs shig_/gzhan dag la yang lung phog shig dang des na khyed kyis [#]ngan 'gro dang ngan song gi lam thams cad zhi bar 'gyur bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes smras la/_gal
[\[40a.4\]]te de dag gis de'i tshig bzhin du mnyan te 'di 'dra ba'i lta bar gyur pa [#]blangs na gnyis ka la yang rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa dag lce gnyis byed pa yin te/_
[\[40a.5\]]gzhan du ston cing brjod pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa dang [#]'thob pa dang bkur sti'i phyir theg pa chen po 'di tshig tu 'don pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_klog pa dang ston pa dang /_thos pa tsam gzhan la yang ston la/_'di skad du bdag ni theg pa chen po pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no
[\[40a.6\]]zhes smra zhing /_gzhan dag gis pha rol po gang dag las longs spyod dang yongs su spyod pa rnyed par 'gyur ba de'i rkyen gyis/_'thob pa dang bkur sti'i phyir de dag gzhan la [#]phrag dog byed de/_de dag 'khrugs par 'gyur zhing /_de dag gi bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod do/_/smod do/_/
[\[40a.7\]]bshung ngo /_/rnam par smod do/_/de dag la 'dud pa de rnams la yang phrag dog gi rgyus bdag bstod cing mi'i chos bla ma bdag nyid la sgrogs so/_/de'i phyir de dag dngos po des pham par 'gyur zhing theg pa chen po'i bde ba las lhung ste/_de dag la lci ba chen po'i ltung ba de 'byung zhing /_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]des na ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na mi la la zhig rin po che'i gling du 'gro bar 'dod nas gru las rgya mtshor zhugs la/_de rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du bdag nyid kyis gru bshig nas de nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa theg pa chen po'i rgya
[\[40b.2\]]mtshor 'jug par 'dod pa gang dag phrag dog gi rgyus de dang de smra ste [#]de'i rkyen gyis de dag [#]dad pa'i gru zhig [#]nas shes rab kyi srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa byis pa de dag la phrag dog gi rgyu dang brdzun gyi rkyen gyis lci ba chen po'i ltung ba 'byung
[\[40b.3\]]ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyim na gnas pa dang rab tu byung ba las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag byang chub sems dpa' nan tan du sbyangs pa mkhas pa [#]skyes bu chen po [#]gzungs dang
[\[40b.4\]]bzod pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi [#]sa la legs par sbyang ba [#]byas pa rnams kyi spyod yul mdo sde [#]zab mo stong pa nyid dang ldan pa gang yin pa theg pa chen po'i mdo sde de dag 'dzin cing tshig tu 'don la kha ton [#]byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher klog cing rab tu ston to[#]/_/chos 'di dag ni kho bo nyid kyi [# ]
[\[40b.5\]]blos rtogs nas kho bo snying rje bas de bzhin du khyod la bstan gyi [#]khyod kyis kyang ci nas 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo rnams la mngon sum du 'gyur ba de ltar sgoms shig_/de ltar byas nas [#]khyod da ltar kho bo bzhin du ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes smra'i 'di skad du kho bos mdo
[\[40b.6\]]sde zab mo zab pa 'di lta bu 'di bklags [#]pa tsam gyis bstan par zad kyi mngon sum du byas nas [#]ni ma yin no zhes ni mi smra ste rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir bdag 'tshong zhing /_de'i rkyen gyis [#]dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[40b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi spyan sngar nyes pa dang bcas pa yin te lci ba chen po'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen pos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bslus par 'gyur ro/_/de ni nyan thos kyi theg par yang mi
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]'gyur na theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i [#]khyad par 'thob pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos dper na mi la la zhig 'brog dgon pa chen por chas la bkres pa dang skom pas nyen nas [#]de der kha zas
[\[41a.2\]]kyi phyir 'bras bu chen po'i shing la 'dzegs la/_dri phun sum tshogs pa dang ro phun sum tshogs pa ma myangs par 'bras bu chen po'i shing bor te/_dug gi shing la 'dzegs nas dug shing [#]gi 'bras bu zos la zos nas kyang 'chi ba'i dus byas pa ltar gang zag de yang de dang 'dra'o zhes smra'o/_/
[\[41a.3\]]de [#]dag rnyed par dka' ba'i mi rnyed la rnyed nas kyang [#]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te theg pa chen po la 'jug par 'dod la/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i rgyus bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod [#]pas lci ba chen po'i ltung ba 'di lta bu 'di byung ste/_ltung ba phyi lci [#]ba des mkhas pa thams cad kyis smad par
[\[41a.4\]]gyur pa [#]ngan song du 'gro ba'i mi gang zag de lta bu ni rgyal rigs dang bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs thams cad kyis bsten par bya ba ma yin no/_/gang de la brten pa de ni mkhas pa thams cad kyis spang bar [#]'gyur te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung
[\[41a.5\]]ba drug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_rgyal rigs rnams kyi mdun na 'don gdol pa dang /_blon po gdol pa dang shor ba gdol pa dang blon po mkhas pa'i [#]nga rgyal can nor che ba longs spyod che ba dag 'byung ste/_de dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya
[\[41a.6\]]ba'i dngos po rnam pa mang po dag la snang ste/_gtong bas rgyags shing dregs pa de dag nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pa dang [#]/_rgyal rigs dang dge sbyong dang [#]rgyal rigs rnams 'byed pa'i dbyen [#]byed cing de dag rgyal rigs la brten [#]nas dge sbyong rnams la chad pas gcod du 'jug
[\[41a.7\]]chad pas nor 'phrog [#]tu 'jug ste/_gnod pa des dge sbyong de dag gang zag gi'am dge 'dun gyi'am phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi'am mchod rten gyi dag dge sbyong rnams rkur bcug nas de dag la gsug [#]tu 'bul lo/_/gdol pa de dag gis kyang rgyal rigs de dag la 'bul
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]bar 'gyur te de dag gnyi ga [#]la rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba bdun pa'o/_/rgyal rigs gdol pa de dag kyang dge sbyong rnams la rab tu sdang bar 'gyur te/_chos 'di lta bu ni chos ma yin par 'dogs shing chos spangs nas chos ma yin pa la 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[41b.2\]]mdo sde [#]dang 'dul ba dang bslab pa la mi lta zhing /_nag po bstan pa [#]dang chen po bstan pa spangs te/_snying rje [#]chen po'i tshul dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab [# ]pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i bslab pa dang mdo sde gzhan dag las bslab pa bstan pa de dag kyang spangs nas chos 'di
[\[41b.3\]]lta bu dang ldan pa'i dge slong rnams la gtso ba'i phyir bka' khrims gang gis dge slong rnams la gnod par 'gyur ba dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong dang mthun pa'i rnal 'byor yid la byed pa 'dor bar byed pa dang /_'phya ba dang gnod pa [#]mang du 'gyur ba'i khrims 'cha' bar byed do/_/
[\[41b.4\]]rgyu des na dge slong rnams nye bar ma zhi ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams nye bar zhi bar mi 'gyur bslabs [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe dge slong de dag bsam pa nyams par 'gyur/_tshul khrims nyams par 'gyur/_tshig nyams par 'gyur/_lta ba nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe
[\[41b.5\]]na/_sgyid lug par 'gyur ba [#]dang /_bya ba mang bar 'gyur ba [#]dang /_dge sbyong ma yin par dge sbyong du khas 'che ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin par tshangs par spyod par khas 'che zhing lung bong ltar spyod pas so/_/reg par bya ba'i chos ston pa de dag lhag par rgyal rigs 'khor dang
