[\[41b.6\]]bcas pas bkur sti byas par 'gyur rim gro dang mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de dag kyang khyim pa rnams la dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi [#]bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs 'khor dang bcas pa de yang dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams la rab tu sdang bar
[\[41b.7\]]'gyur 'phya bar 'gyur te/_des na dge slong spong ba la brtson pa rnams kyi longs spyod dang nye bar spyod pa gang yin pa de dge slong kha ton byed pa la dga' ba rnams la byin [#]par 'gyur te/_de dag gnyi ga la yang rtsa ba'i ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge slong bsam gtan pa ni
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]zhing dam pa yin gyi/_klog pa dang zhal ta byed pa la gnas pa dang klog pa la brtson pa ni ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang bzod pa'i sa rnams kyi snod du gyur pa'am shin tu sbyin gnas su gyur pa'am[#]/_snod du gyur pa dang /_'jig rten la snang bar byed pa'am lam nye
[\[42a.2\]]bar ston par byed pa'am las kyi zhing dang nyon mongs pa'i zhing las sems can rnams sgrol ba dang mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam la 'jog pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/'di dag gis [#]nges par 'byung ba yang
[\[42a.3\]]mdo 'di las gsungs pa ni/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i ming thos nas ngan song du ltung bas 'jigs pa'i phyir mthong bar 'dod cing rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'chags par 'dod la/_gal te de dag byang chub sems
[\[42a.4\]]dpa' [#]nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal zhing de'i ming yang brjod na/_rigs kyi bu de dag gi mdun du skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du de rang gi gzugs kyis [# ]gnas par 'gyur te/_bram ze'i gzugs nas bu mo'i gzugs kyi bar gyis [#]mdun du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems
[\[42a.5\]]dpa' las dang po pa de la ltung ba ji lta bu byung ba de dag 'chags su 'jug go/_/de thabs la mkhas pa zab mo dang /_theg pa chen po la spyad pa'ang nye bar ston to/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i bar la yang rab tu 'jog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gal te de la gsol ba 'debs
[\[42a.6\]]pa gang yin pa de dag la mngon du ston par mi byed na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa nyes pa dang bcas pa des tho rangs langs la shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug la bdug pas bdug par bya/_lha'i bu skya rengs la gsol ba gdab par bya ste/_tshig 'di skad du skya rengs skya rengs
[\[42a.7\]]snying rje chen po skal ba chen po khyod 'dzam bu'i gling du shar ma thag tu snying rjes bdag la khebs par mdzad du gsol/_/nam mkha'i snying po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa la yang bdag gi tshig gis myur du bskul te thabs gang gis bdag ltung ba 'chags par 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]chen po 'phags pa la thabs dang shes rab 'thob par 'gyur ba'i thabs de dag bdag gi [#]rmi lam du bstan du gsol zhes smras pa[#]/_de'i tshe de mal du gnyid log par bya ste 'dzam bu gling 'dir skya rengs shar ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang
[\[42b.2\]]phrad par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa de'i rmi lam du de'i gzugs mdun du 'dug ste rtsa ba'i ltung ba de dag 'chags su 'jug go/_/de la theg pa chen po'i thabs kyi [#]thabs shes pa 'di lta bu yang bstan [#]te/_thabs shes pa la mkhas pa des byang chub
[\[42b.3\]]sems dpa' las dang po pa des de [#]nyid du byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob po/_/theg pa chen po la brtan por gnas par yang [#]'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no/_/yang na mdo sde de nyid las [#]gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags [#]sngar smos pa gang yin pa
[\[42b.4\]]des cho ga 'di byas te de las 'di skad du byung ngo /_/dgon pa'am nags 'dab bam bla gab [#]med par a ka ru'am rgya spos sam dus kyi rjes su 'brang bas bdugs la thal mo sbyar te phyogs dang phyogs mtshams [#]kun du yan lag lngas phyag byas la/_sngags kyi tshig 'di dag brjod
[\[42b.5\]]par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_su smri sha su smri sha/_kA ru Ni ka_/tsa ra tsa ra/_bi tsa ra bi tsa ra[#]/_sany+tsa ra/_kA ru Ni ka_/mu ra mu ra be ga [#]d+hA ri/_mA tsa le/_b+hu dzA [#]sha ta/_kA ru Ni ka_/_tsin+ta [# ]ma Ni pU rA [#]ya/_kA ru Ni ka sarba sha [#]me s+thA pa ya/_A dz+nyA d+hA [#]rI s+phu gung s+phu gung /_ru ti bi be ka gu/_dri Sh+Ti [#]bi be kaM gu/_
[\[42b.6\]]pU ra ya kA ru Ni ka_/pU ra yan tu ma ma sarba [#]A sha_/sarba pa thaM [#]tsa/_a sho ka ga ti swAhA/_cho ga ni snga ma bzhin no/_/nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'jigs pa thams cad dang yo byad kyis [#]phongs pa thams cad bsal [#]ba dang 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa'i phyir bya'o/_/gal te rgyal rigs
[\[42b.7\]]la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' yin na ji ltar de dag gi ltung ba nges shing gzhan dag [#]ni ma nges ji ste de dag sdom pa can ma yin na ni/_de dag gis [#]ltung bar ji ltar rnam par gzhag cing /_sdom pa can dag nyes pa des zin par yang ji ltar 'gyur zhe na/_'di ni nyes pa med de [#]gang du
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]gang dag la mang du 'byung ba de dag la der rang gi ming nas smos te bstan nas 'jigs pa bskyed pa'i phyir bzlog go/_/thams cad kyis kyang phan tshun du ltung ba thams cad sprang bar [#]bya'o/_/rang bzhin gyis [#]kha na ma tho ba che bas na gang gi [#]yang dag par ma
[\[43a.2\]]blangs ba [#]na yang skal ba med pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'chad par 'gyur ba des sdom pa can la shin tu ches 'gyur te de ltar dpyad pas chog go/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las kyang rtsa ba'i ltung ba gsungs te/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' so sor thar pa'i bslab pa la
[\[43a.3\]]slob cing bskal pa brgya [#]stod du rtsa ba dang 'bras bu za bar [#]gyur la/_sems can rnams kyis legs par smras pa dang nyes par smras pa bzod kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas [#]gnas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba lci ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste
[\[43a.4\]]dper na nyan thos kyi theg pa can la rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung na phung po de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i skal ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du ltung ba ma bshags shing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas yid la byed pa de ma spangs na sangs rgyas kyis la yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
[\[43a.5\]]skal ba med do zhes 'byung ngo /_/rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'di dag bde blag tu gzung ba dang 'ga' zhig gi lugs [# ]gnas par bya ba'i phyir bsdu ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa dag brjod par bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor 'phrogs [#]pa/_/phas pham pa yi ltung bar 'dod/_/dam pa'i chos ni spong
[\[43a.6\]]byed pa/_/gnyis par thub pas gsungs pa yin/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa'i dge slong la'ang /_/ngur smrig 'phrog [#]dang brdeg pa dang /_/btson rar 'jug par [#]byed pa dang /_/rab tu byung las 'bebs pa dang /_/mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang /_/log par lta ba 'dzin pa dang /_/
[\[43a.7\]]grong la sogs pa 'jig pa yang /_/rtsa ba'i ltung bar rgyal bas gsungs/_/blo sbyangs ma byas sems can la/_/stong pa nyid ni brjod pa dang /_/sangs rgyas nyid la zhugs pa dag_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub zlog pa dang /_/so sor thar pa yongs spangs te/_/theg pa chen [#]la sbyor ba dang /_/
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]slob pa'i theg pas chags la sogs/_/spong bar 'gyur ba min zhes 'dzin/_/pha rol dag kyang 'dzin 'jug dang /_/rang gi yon tan brjod pa dang /_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti dang /_/tshigs bcad rgyu yis gzhan smod dang /_/bdag ni zab mo bzod pa'o zhes/_/log pa nyid ni smra ba
[\[43b.2\]]dang /_/dge sbyong chad pas gcod 'jug dang /_/dkon mchog gsum gyi [#]sbyin byed dang /_/sbyin pa len par byed pa dang /_/zhi gnas 'dor bar byed pa dang /_/yang dag 'jog gi longs spyod rnams/_/kha ton byed la sbyin pa rnams/_/de dag rtsa ba'i ltung ba ste/_/sems can dmyal ba
[\[43b.3\]]chen po'i rgyu/_/rmi lam 'phags mkha' snying po yi[#]/_/mdun du 'dug ste bshags par bya/_/byang chub sems ni yongs 'dor dang /_/chags dang ser sna mi zad [#]pas/_/slong la sbyin par mi byed dang /_/bsgrims te dga' bar byed pa na/_/sems can la ni mi bzod par/_/khros
[\[43b.4\]]pas sems can brdegs [#]pa dang /_/nyon mongs pa dang gzhan mthun pas/_/chos ltar bcos pa brjod pa'o/_/'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_tshangs pa chen po gang de'i [#]phyir rab tu byung ba/_tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa spyod pa'i/_dge slong mdongs [#]pa
[\[43b.5\]]shing rul pa lta bur gyur pa/_dge sbyong ma yin pa [#]la dge sbyong du khas 'che ba[#]/_tshangs par spyod pa ma yin pa la tshangs par spyod par khas 'tshe ba/_nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis bshig pa ltung ba pham pa yin yang tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa spyod pa'i dge slong de de'i tshe na
[\[43b.6\]]yang lha thams cad dang mi rnams kyi bar dang bsod nams kyi gter dag gi bar ston pa dang [#]dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/de snod du gyur pa ma yin du zin kyang /_skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig [#]bgos pa dang spyod lam bstan pa'i rgyu des kyang sems can mang po dag gi dge
[\[43b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs ston par byed pa dang bde 'gro'i lam ston pa yin no/_/de lta bas na nga'i phyir rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am tshul khrims 'chal pa yang rung ste/_gang nga'i phyir rab tu byung ba la 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang chos dang mthun pas kyang lus la chad
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]pas gcod pa dang btson rar 'jug pa dang yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa dang srog gcod du mi gnang na chos ma yin pa lta ci smos/_chos 'dul ba la shi ba lta bur brjod du zin na [#]gang zag de gi wang dang gla rtsi dang mtshungs so [#]zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid
[\[44a.2\]]las/_nga'i [#]phyir rab tu byung ba snod du gyur tam snod du ma gyur kyang rung ba rnams la gang dag 'tshe ba de dag thams cad ni dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu nyes pa dang bcas pa yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa dang rgyud tshig pa dang mnar med par gzhol
[\[44a.3\]]ba yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang de nyid las/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gos ngur smrig 'di ni thar pa'i rgyal mtshan yin no zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang de nyid las de'i tshe nyan thos khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dang /_byang chub sems
[\[44a.4\]]dpa' khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag sngon byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das la 'chags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung rab la snod du gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa rnams dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[44a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la smad do/_/bshungs so khros so/_/bsngags pa ma lags pa dang mi snyan pa'i bka' mchid brjod do/_/las kyi sgrib pa des na bdag cag ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa rnam
[\[44a.6\]]pa mang po myong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag cag las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma de da ltar bcom ldan 'das la 'chags so/_/kha cig ni bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams la tshig gis bsdigs so/_/spyos brgyad [#]do zhes 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni bdag
[\[44a.7\]]cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos snod du gyur pa dang /_snod du ma gyur pa rnams la brdegs[#]/_bsnun to zhes 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi gos phrogs so zhes 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis [# ]
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]nyan thos rnams kyi longs spyod pa [#]dang yongs su spyod pa rnams phrogs so zhes 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir rab tu byung ba rnams khyim par phab ste/_gnas ma lags pa thob par bgyis so zhes 'dzer to/_/kha cig ni bcom ldan
[\[44b.2\]]'das bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams [#]kyi nyan thos snod du gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa nongs pa ma mchis pa rnams khri mon du stsal te bdag cag las kyi sgrib pa des bskal pa mang por ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal drag po mi bzad pa rnam pa mang po myong
[\[44b.3\]]ngo zhes 'dzer to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag cag da ltar las kyi sgrib pa'i lhag ma de bcom ldan 'das la 'chags so/_/slan chad kyang sdom par bgyid do/_/bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gzung du gsol/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[44b.4\]]kyis bdag cag ngan song mi bzang pa las gdon du gsol zhes rgya cher gsungs so//_//bam po bzhi pa/_rab tu byung ba'i bar du gcod pa'i mdo las kyang gnod pa gsungs [#]te/_ming chen khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na skye ba de dang der mi dal ba rnyed par
[\[44b.5\]]'gyur/_dmus long dang blun pa dang lce med pa dang gdol par 'gyur/_nam du yang bde bar mi 'gyur/_skur pa 'debs pa mang bar 'gyur/_za ma dang ma ning dang /_rtag par bran dang bud med du 'gyur/_khyi dang phag [#]dang bong bu dang rnga mo dang /_sbrul gdug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[44b.6\]]bzhi gang zhe na/_ming chen 'di la khyim pa sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par [#]byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi mngon [#]par 'byung ba'i sems dang rab tu 'byung ba'i sems dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi sems kyi bar chad byed pa 'di ni dang po'o/_/gzhan yang nor la chags shing bu
[\[44b.7\]]la chags nas las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches te/_bu'am bu mo'am chung ma'am nye du'i tshogs dbang phyug gi gnas la 'khod pa rab tu 'byung ba'i bar chad byed pa 'di ni gnyis pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan gnyis ni dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_dge sbyong dang
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]bram ze rnams la khong khro ba'o/_/mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi gnod pa ni dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las/_rnam par smin pa drag po gsungs pa lta bur blta ste/_de las cung zad tsam zhig brjod par bya'o/_/srog gcod pa'i rnam par
[\[45a.2\]]smin pa nyung zad cig smos pa 'di lta ste/_me lce la rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i bya ni gang dag me'i rtse mo la gnas kyang mi 'tshig pa ste/_shin tu dga' zhing sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi mgo brtol nas khrag 'thung ngo /_/thod pa'i phrag na rgyu ba zhes bya ba'i bya ni gang dag glad [#]pa brtol nas rab
[\[45a.3\]]tu 'bar zhing glad [#]rgyas 'thung ba'o/_/lce'i sha za [#]zhes bya ba'i bya ni gang dag lce dral nas mngon du za ba ste/_lce de zos shing zos nas yang skye ste/_pad ma'i 'dab ma bas kyang 'jam mo/_/de ltar don dang mthun pa'i ming can no/_/so 'byin zhes bya ba dang /_mgul ba'i ming pa 'dren
[\[45a.4\]]zhes bya ba dang /_glo ba la gnas pa dang /_pho ba za ba dang /_mchin pa bzlog [#]pa dang /_rgyu ma'i nang spri [#]za ba dang /_sgal [#]tshigs la dga' ba zhes bya ba dang gshis kyi gsang ba pa zhes bya ba'i bya rnams ni [#]gang dag gshis thams cad phye ste gshis kyi bu ga brtol nas bu gar zhugs te du bzhin
[\[45a.5\]]pa rnams kyi rkang [#]gi snying khu 'thung ba'o[#]/_/khab kyi bu ga zhes bya ba'i bya ni gang dag khab lta bu'i mchus khrag 'thung ba'o/_/de bzhin du rus pa'i phrag na gnas pa dang /_pags pa dag za ba dang /_sder mos 'brad pa dang /_tshil za ba dang /_rgyus pa 'don pa dang /_skra shad 'dzings pa
[\[45a.6\]]zhes bya ba'i bya rnams ni gang dag skra rtsa [#]nas 'don pa'o/_/de ltar de mnar med pa'i phyogs gcig na bya 'dab 'jigs zhes bya ba dpag tshad sum 'bum par gyur te bya de dag dang sems can dmyal ba'i bya gzhan dag dang lhan cig tu de la lo brgya stong du mar za yang yang skye'o/_/de brgya la
[\[45a.7\]]zhig na de las [#]thar kyang de sdug bsngal mang por [#]bskor te/_sa phyogs gnyis pa g.yang sa'i ngam grog ces bya ba der 'gro zhing mgon tshol skyabs tshol [# ]dpung gnyen tshol [#]lo/_/[#]khor yug tu me'i phung po bcu gcig gis bskor te/_las kyi zhags pas bcings shing grogs med la/_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]dgra rnams kyis khor yug tu bskor te dgon par phyin te/_de sngar gyi sems can dmyal ba'i tshogs thams cad pas ches lhag pa'i sdug bsngal rnyed cing ngam grog rab lhung zhes bya ba'i g.yang sa'i phyogs su rgyug ste/_ltung [#]nas rkang pa shin tu zhu'o/_/bteg na ni yang shin tu
[\[45b.2\]]gzhon zhing shin tu 'jam par skye la tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa rnams kyis nyen to/_/de ltar 'jigs pas dkrugs pa'i bzhin du gyur nas rkang lag dang yan lag dang nying lag thams cad rab tu zhu ba de la sa phyogs der ngam grog ces bya ba'i g.yang sa 'byung ste/_de phyogs dar lhung
[\[45b.3\]]zhing ngam pa nas dpag tshad sum 'bum du yang g.yang du lhung zhing /_yang las kyis [#]byas pa'i rlung gis 'debs [#]so/_/de lhung ba na bya kang ka dang khwa dang /_bya rgod dang 'ug pa rnams [#]za'o/_/de ltar de bteg cing lhung ba ni [#]lo brgya stong phrag du ma 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la
[\[45b.4\]]zhig na [#]de nas thar kyang yongs su bskor ba'i 'khor lo'i mtshan ma'i phrag ces bya ba'i phyogs su rgyug ste/_sa [#]phyogs der yang 'khor lo rdo rje'i ste ba can me lce rnon po 'bar ba myur du bskor ba'i 'khor lo stong 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de der song ma thag tu lus la 'khor lo de dag
[\[45b.5\]]bab nas 'khor ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_yan lag so so thams cad kyang bshig nas bsreg go/_/de'i rkang mthil nas ni gsal shing gis 'bigs so/_/de ltar gnad 'joms pa'i ri la gnad 'joms pa'i srog chags su [#]gyur pa rnams kyis phyi nang [#]rdul phra
[\[45b.6\]]rab tsam yan chad kyang [#]zos par 'gyur ro/_/zos shing zos nas kyang yang shin tu gzhon par skye'o/_/shin tu gzhon sha can nyid kyis kyang sdug bsngal drag po 'byung bar 'gyur te/_zos shing zos nas kyang de la sha ches che bar skye bar 'gyur te/_srog gcod pa byas shing bsags pa
[\[45b.7\]]de'i 'bras bu ni de yin no/_/ma byin par len pa'i rnam par smin pa gsungs pa/_nyes par byas pa'i las kyi mtha' byed pa de/_mgal me bskor ba dang sprul pa dang dri za'i grong khyer dang smig rgyu lta bu'i nor gyi rnam pa chen por gyur pa rin po che dang gos dang nor dang 'bru mang po mthong ste/_
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]chags pas zil gyis non cing las kyis rmongs par gyur pa de [#]'di ni bdag gi [#]yin no snyam du sems te/_de ltar rmongs pa sdig pa byed pa de/_me mdag dang lci skam gyi me rab tu 'bar ba 'bogs nas/_nor yod pa der brgyugs pa dang /_der gshin rje'i mi las
[\[46a.2\]]kyis byas pa rnams kyis bzung [#]nas mtshon cha 'bar ba'i nang du khrid de yan lag dang nying lag thams cad gshegs gtubs nas/_bsregs te rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byed de/_de lta bu'i gnas su [#]son kyang de'i chags pa thog ma med pa nas zhugs pa de yongs su 'bri bar mi 'gyur ro
[\[46a.3\]]zhes bya ba'o/_/'dod pas [#]log par g.yem ba'i dbang du byas te/_de ltar sdig pa byed pa de mtshon cha'i nyam nga ba de las thar nas me mdag dang lci skam gyi mer 'bogs te/_las kyis [#]bskos pa'i sa phyogs log par mthong ba zhes bya ba gzhan du 'gro'o/_/der yang dran pa nyams
[\[46a.4\]]par gyur pa des sngon gang dag mthong ba lta bu'i bud med las kyis byas pa dag mthong ste/_mthong nas kyang de'i 'dod chags thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i me 'byung ngo /_/de bud med de dag ga la ba der brgyugs pa dang /_las kyis byas pa'i [#]lcags kyi rang bzhin gyi mi de dag
[\[46a.5\]]gis de bzung ste/_bzung nas kyang kha'i mchu la sogs pa ci [#]nas lus de la lhag ma yungs 'bru tsam yang mi lus pa de ltar za yang yang skye'o [#]yang za'o/_/de tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa [#]myong yang 'dod chags kyi me de las mi ldog ste bud med de dag ga la ba der yang rgyug [#]go/_/
[\[46a.6\]]de'i gnod pa de ni 'dod chags kyi me ji lta ba de ltar mi [#]gnod pa ma yin no/_/rdo rje dang lcags kyi bud med de dag kyang lus rab tu 'bar zhing me lce 'khrug pas mi de bzung nas sems can dmyal ba pa de'i lus thams cad bye ma bcangs pa bzhin du bkrum yang slar 'byung ste snga ma bzhin no/_/
[\[46a.7\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_/rnam pa kun tu nor 'jig dang /_/ngan song rtsa ba bud med yin/_/mi gang dag ni bud med 'dod/_/de dag bde bar ga la 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba nas/_/bud med phung [#]bar byed pa ste[#]/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol phung [#]/_/gal te bdag la phan 'dod na/_/de bas
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]bud med rnam par spang /_/zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/brdzun du smra ba'i dbang du byas te/_de gshin rje'i mi de dag gis bzung ste/_bzung nas kyang de'i kha phye nas de nas lce 'dren te/_las kyi dbang dang brdzun [#]du smra ba de'i 'bras bus lce dpag tshad lnga brgya par 'gyur te[#]/_de'i
[\[46b.2\]]lce 'byung ba'i dus na gshin rje'i mi [#]dag gis lcags kyis rab tu 'bar ba la bldag tu 'jug go/_/las kyis byas pa'i gshin rje'i [#]thong lcags 'bar ba dang ldan pa stong yang 'byung zhing glang bu stobs dang ldan pa rnams kyis de'i lce la rmo bar 'gyur te/_der rnag dang [#]khrag dang srin bu
[\[46b.3\]]'dzag pa'i chu [#]'bab par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te lce de [#]yang lha rnams kyi mig ji lta ba de [#]bzhin du shin tu [#]gzhon pa nas/_de tshor bas nyam thag pa zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/_'khun cing ngu la ku co 'don kyang de la sdug bsngal [(]sal [,]sel [)]ba su yang med do/_/zhes rgya cher gsungs pa dang /_
[\[46b.4\]]de ltar tshor ba drag po myong ba lce [#]de la lo brgya stong du mar lce rmo bar 'gyur zhing de'i lce de ji ste na dmyal ba pa'i kha'i nang du chud par 'gyur ro/_/de 'jigs pas dkrugs pa'i bzhin du gyur cing gar bab bab tu 'bros so/_/me mdag dang lci skam gyi me'i nang du nub cing tshig la de de ltar sdug
[\[46b.5\]]bsngal gyis [#]nyam thag pa na/_skyabs med dpung gnyen med cing gshin rje'i mi lag na tho ba dang ral gri thogs pa dag 'byung ste/_de dag gis [#]mi de'i glad pa nas rkang pa'i bar du phye mar rlog go zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin no/_/phra ma byed pa'i rnam par smin pa ni brdzun du [#]smra ba dang
[\[46b.6\]]mthun no/_/lce dpag tshad sum brgya par 'gyur te[#] zhes bya ba ni bye brag ste/_gshin rje'i mi snying rje med pa de dag gis lce rab tu 'bar ba la bzung nas gshegs [#]par byed do/_/wa dag kyang phyogs gzhan nas za zhing mchog tu drag [#]pa'i sdug bsngal myong la du zhing ku co 'don to[#]/_/lce
[\[46b.7\]]med pas sgra mi gsal lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/ngag rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa gsungs pa ni/_de dag gis de'i kha phye nas lce bzung ste/_bzung nas kyang mtshon rnon pos bcad de/_de nyid kyi zas su slar yang khar bcug [#]la de yang bkres pas nyam thag cing bkres pa'i
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]rang [#]bzhin gyis rang gi khrag dang kha chu 'dzag pa dang lce de nyid za'o/_/lce de yang bcad cing bcad nas kyang las kyi dbang gis slar yang skye zhing /_de sdug bsngal gyis [#]nyam thag pas sa la 'dre ldog cing ku co 'don to/_/de ltar sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing
[\[47a.2\]]mig gi 'bras bu yongs su 'gyur [#]la sdug bsngal gyis [#]nyam thag pa dman pa grogs med pa gcig pur gyur pas rang gis byas pa la spyod pa de la gshin rje'i mi rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/_khyod kyis lce yi gzhu yis ni[#]/_/rtsub mo zhes ni gang
[\[47a.3\]]brjod pa/_/ngag gi mda' rnon 'phangs gyur pas/_/de yi [#]'bras bu 'di 'ongs so/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/tshig 'khyal [#]ba'i rnam par smin pa gsungs pa ni/_de'i lce de zangs [#]rab tu 'bar bas bsreg go/_/lce bsregs nas mgul pa bsreg go/_/mgul pa bsregs [#]nas snying bsreg go/_/
[\[47a.4\]]snying bsregs [#]nas rgyu ma bsreg go/_/rgyu ma bsregs [#]nas pho ba bsreg go/_/pho ba bsregs nas kyang thur du 'byung ngo /_/gshin rje'i mis tshigs su bcad pa/_snga phyi'i tshig ni ma 'brel cing /_/don med pa dang 'chal gyur la/_/ma 'brel khyod kyis gang smras pa/_/de yi 'bras bu 'dir
[\[47a.5\]]'ongs so/_/gang dag [#]bden bar mi smra [#]zhing /_/kha ton lhur len mi byed pa/_/de la mkhas pas lcer mthong gi_/sha dum nyid du min nam ci/_/zhes bya ba'o/_/brnab sems kyi rnam par smin pa gsungs pa ni/_de la [#]las kyis byas ba'i rdzas gzhan gyis [#]yongs su bzung ba gsob
[\[47a.6\]]gsog snying po med pa mthong nas las kyis bskul ba rmongs pa de 'di snyam du 'di ni bdag gi yin no snyam du sems te/_de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de rdzas ga la bder brgyug go/_/sems can dmyal ba [#]des nor gang mthong ba de ni brnab sems zhes bya ba yid kyis mi dge ba kun
[\[47a.7\]]tu bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas pa de'i 'bras bu yin te/_de ltar mthong ba na brnab sems mang ba de'i lag nas mtshon cha 'byung ste/_des der brgyugs pa dang sems can dmyal ba pa gzhan de dag gi lag nas kyang mtshon cha rnams 'byung ste/_de dag dang de mtshon chas 'thab pa
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]la [#]ci nas lus la sha yungs 'bru tsam yang mi [#]lus pa de ltar bzhar te keng rus nyi tshe lus par byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_/gzhan dag [#]'byor pa mthong nas ni/_/bdag gir gyur cig snyam bsams [#]pa/_/brnab sems yang dag bskyed gyur pa/_/las de'i 'bras bu 'ongs pa yin/_
[\[47b.2\]]zhes bya ba'o/_/gnod sems kyi 'bras bu gsungs pa ni/_las kyis bskyed pa'i seng ge dang gzig dang sbrul khro bas zil gyis non pa rnams de'i mdun na 'dug pa de dag gis de 'jigs skrag [#]nas gar bab bab tu bros kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis de 'bros ji ltar nus/_de dag gis de bzung
[\[47b.3\]]ste [#]bzung nas kyang thog mar glad pa la [#]za ba nas sbrul mche [#]ba gdug pa rnams kyis rtsib logs kyi bar du bzung zhing za la stag rnams ni rgyab nas za bar 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa ni mes bsregs so/_/gshin rje'i mi rnams kyang rgyang ring po nas mda' 'phen to zhes rgya cher ro/_/log par lta ba'i
[\[47b.4\]]'bras bu ni dpag tu med pa gsungs te mdor bsdus nas brjod pa ni mtshon cha'i char dang /_mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /_rdo rje'i char dang /_gnam lcags dang /_rdo'i char rnams kyis btab cing me'i phung po bcu [#]rnams dang kha nas bkres pa dang skom pa'i me 'byung bas kyang rgyun tu sreg go zhes
[\[47b.5\]]bya'o/_/'dod pa ni gnod pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba ste/_de dag gis shin tu yid 'byung bar bya'o/_/ji ltar 'di nyid las/_me thab [#]ces bya ba'i sems can dmyal ba yod de/_der las gang gis sems can rnams skye zhe na/_gang dge sbyong ma yin pa la [#]dge sbyong du khas 'che zhing bud med kyi
[\[47b.6\]]glu dang gar dang rgyan rnams kyi sgra thos pa dang dgod pa [#]dang 'jo ba dang rtse ba rnams thos nas/_tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phangs pa'i blos khu ba 'chor [#]par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_der [#]sems can dmyal ba pa de dag lcags kyi char pas yan lag dang nying lag
[\[47b.7\]]thams cad phye mar rlog la me ma mur gyi char gyis kyang sreg cing 'tshig [#]go zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de ltar sngon 'dod pa nyams su blangs pa dran pas pad ma zhes bya ba'i sems can dmyal ba gsungs te/_myong ba rmi lam du dran pas kyang der sems can dmyal ba
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]pa de dag phru ba rnams su btso zhing gzhong khong [#]du lcags kyi gtun [#]rnams kyis brdung ngo zhes rgya cher ro/_/de de ltar lha'i bu mo 'dod pa'i phyir tshangs par [#]spyod pa yongs su bsngo bas na/_pad ma chen po zhes bya ba'i sems can dmyal bar [#]gsungs te/_de na tsha sgo can gyi 'bab
[\[48a.2\]]chu dba' rlabs can zhes bya ba 'bab ste/_'bab chu de la nya gang yin pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba pa de dag go/_/rus pa gang yin pa de dag ni rdo ba'o/_/'jim pa [#]gang yin pa de dag ni skra'o/_/'dam rdzab gang yin pa de dag ni sha'o/_/chu gang yin pa de dag ni ro nye bskol ba'o zhes
[\[48a.3\]]bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/de bzhin du skyes pas skyes pa la 'khrig pa log par bcug pa'i chad pa'i bye brag dpag tu med par brjod do/_/de bzhin du byis pa rnams la [#]log par 'jug pa yang tsha sgo can gyi [#]chus khyer ba'i khye'u dag mthong nas de dag gis de la bos pa dang /_de byis pa de dag
[\[48a.4\]]la shin tu sdug par sems pa dang ldan zhing mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi shugs kyis [#]chu der 'jug go/_/ba dang rta rgod ma dang ra mo dang lug mo la sogs pa la [#]yang de bzhin te/_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa ni rang bzhin gyis [#]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa rnam par smin pa shin tu drag par
[\[48a.5\]]gsungs so/_/dud 'gro la 'dod pa bsten [#]pa de ni mi dge bas sprul pa'i lcags kyi ba dang rta rgod ma la sogs pa 'bar ba de dag nyid kyi skye gnas kyi lam nas 'jug ste de dag gi ltor [#]me mdag rab tu 'bar ba'i phung pos yongs su gang bar de [#]lo brgya stong mang por 'tshed cing sreg go zhes te
[\[48a.6\]]rgya cher de nyid du blta'o/_/de bzhin du gzhan gyis nyal po byas zin pa'i dge slong ma rnams la log par zhugs pa rnams kyi chad pa yang sems can dmyal ba chen por bshad do/_/rang gi chung ma la skye gnas kyi lam ma yin par byas pa yang de bzhin no/_/gzhan gyi chung ma la nan gyis
[\[48a.7\]]byas pa dang mi dbang ba'i bu mo la byas pa yang de bzhin no/_/bsnyen gnas [#]la gnas pa rnams la byas pa [#]yang de bzhin no/_/bla ma rnams kyi chung ma la [#]byas pa yang de bzhin no/_/gnyen du 'thams pa rim gro byas pa rnams la log par zhugs pa'i chad pa yang drag cing dpag tu
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]med de/_sems can dmyal ba chen po yin par bshad do/_/'khrig pa bdun dang ldan pa'i mdo las kyang /_bram ze 'di la kha cig bdag tshangs par spyod par khas 'che zhing de bud med dang gnyis kyis [#]gnyis mi sbyor yang bud med [#]la mig gis [#]gzugs la nges par sems shing blta ste/_
[\[48b.2\]]des de'i ro myong zhing rtog la zhen te/_lhag par zhen nas gnas pa 'di ni bram ze tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin gyi mi ldan pa ma yin te/_tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag par spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin du bud med dang lhan cig rtse ba dang ca co 'don pa nyams su len
[\[48b.3\]]pa yang tshangs par spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_bud med kyis [#]bsnyen bkur byas pa nyams su len pa yang de bzhin no/_/rtsig pas chod pa'am yol bas chod pa'i bud med kyi rgyan dang glu dang [#]gar la sogs pa'i sgra nyams su len pa'ang de bzhin du 'khrig
[\[48b.4\]]pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes gsungs so[#]/_/pha rol po 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa la bltas nas nyams su len pa yang de bzhin no/_/lha la sogs pa'i gnas su tshangs par spyod pa yongs su bsngo ba yang de bzhin te [#]'khrig pa'i chos dang ldan pa yin gyi mi ldan pa ma [#]yin no
[\[48b.5\]]zhes gsungs so/_/de'i phyir de ltar dran pa dang smon pa'i yul du gyur pa 'dod pa de dag ni gnod pa byed pa nyid do/_/de'i phyir 'dod pa la gdams pa'i mdo las/_dge slong 'dod pa rnams las sems zlog shig_/lam 'di ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'o/_/rab tu 'jigs pa dang
[\[48b.6\]]bcas pa'o/_/tsher ma dang bcas pa'o/_/thibs po dang bcas pa'o lam gol ba'o/_/lam ngan pa'o/_/lam kha brag go/_/skyes bu dam pa ma yin pas bsten pa'o/_/khyod 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams ni ro myong ba chung ba ste[#]/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang sdug bsngal mang ba gnod
[\[48b.7\]]pa mang ba 'khrugs [#]pa mang ba ste 'di la ni nyes dmigs mang ngo /_/dge slong dag 'dod pa rnams ni nad dang 'bras dang zug rngu dang sdig pa dang srid [#]pa'i rtsa ba dang sha dang bcas pa'i mchil pa lta bu yin la/_'dod pa dag ni 'chi ba mi rtag pa sogs [#]brdzun pa slu ba'i chos can te/_'dod
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]pa rnams ni [#]rmi lam lta bu yin zhing 'di dag ni byis pa 'drid pa'o zhes gsungs pa snyam du mi sems sam/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_dper na ri dgas bshor [#]ba'i khog tshe dang /_bya bshor [#]ba'i rgya dang /_nya bshor [#]ba'i dol dang /_spre'u bshor [#]ba'i rnyong dang /_phye ma leb bshor [# ]
[\[49a.2\]]ba'i me'i phung po ji lta bar 'dod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'dod pa tshol zhing spyod pa na yun ring por seng ge rnams kyi khar chud pa'i mtha' yang mi mngon pa nas ba lang gsod cing ba lang gi sha za ba rnams kyi khar chud pa'i bar gyi mtha' yang mi mngon no/_/sbal pa
[\[49a.3\]]dag tu gyur nas sbrul rnams kyi khar chud pa'i bar gyi mtha' yang mi mngon no/_/yun ring por 'dod pa bsten pa na [#]chom rkun yin zhes bzung nas mgo bcad pa'i mtha' yang mi mngon no/_/gzhan gyi chung ma la 'phyo ba dang rkun po dang grong 'joms pa dang ljongs 'joms pa dang [#]mdud pa
[\[49a.4\]]'grel ba'i bar yin no zhes bzung nas mgo bcad [#]pa'i mtha' yang mi mngon no/_/sdug bsngal drag pa rtsub pa mi bzad pa nyams su myong ba'i khrag gzags [#]shing bab pa ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi'i chu bas kyang mang ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lus nyes dmigs mang ba 'di ni rus pa
[\[49a.5\]]'dus pa/_chu rgyus kyis sbrel ba/_shas glan pa/_pags pas dkris shing phyi rol g.yogs [#]pa/_bu ga che chung can/_srin bu'i tshogs gnas pa/_sems can rnams [#]la gnod pa/_nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams kyi gnas yin no/_/lus 'di la nad kyi rnam pa 'byung ba 'di
[\[49a.6\]]lta ste/_mig nad dang rna nad nas gzhang 'brum dang phol mig dang mtshan bar rdol gyi bar dag go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lus kyi kun tu gdung ba rnams dang [#]/_lus kyi sdug bsngal dang /_lus kyi 'khogs pa dang /_sgu ba [#]dang /_sgur ba dang /_spyi cer dang /_skra skya dang /_gnyer
[\[49a.7\]]ma mang ba dang /_dbang po rnams yongs su smin pa dang /_yongs su 'jig pa dang /_'du byed rnams rnyings [#]par gyur pa dang /_shag shig tu gyur pa nas 'dzag pa dang /_rab tu 'dzag pa dang /_smad pa'i bar gyi lus 'di lta bu 'di ni bsten [#]pa'i 'os ma yin no/_/de bzhin
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]du sbyar te/_dge slong khyod kyis [#]'dod pa dag yod pa gang yin/_khyod gang la rab tu chags/_khyod ji ltar bcings shing brgyal te zhen cing lhag par zhen par gyur/_nam nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing dam pa'i chos kyang nub par gyur la/_khyod kyang 'dod pa rnams bsten
[\[49b.2\]]nas rnam par ltung bar song ba na nam zhig dga' [#]ba dang 'chi ba las bdag thar par gyur[#]/_dge slong chog gi 'dod pa rnams las sems zlog shig_/'di ni 'dod pa btsal ba'i dus ma yin gyi chos btsal ba'i dus yin no zhes gsungs so/_/khyim bdag drag shul
[\[49b.3\]]can gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_des 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spang bar bya ste/_bdag gi [#]chung mas chog par 'dzin pa dang /_gzhan gyi chung ma la 'dod pa med pa dang /_ma chags pa'i mig gis blta ba dang yid byung [#]ba'i yid dang 'dod pa dag ni shin tu sdug bsngal
[\[49b.4\]]ba'o snyam du ma chags pa'i yid la byed pa la brtson par bya'o/_/de gang gi tshe rang gi chung ma la rnam par rtog pa byung ba de'i tshe yang nyon mongs pa'i dbang du gyur pas [#]na/_des rang gi chung ma la mi sdug par rjes su lta ba dang /_skrag pa'i yid kyis [#]'dod pa bsten par bya'i zhen pas
[\[49b.5\]]zin bzhin du ni ma yin te/_rtag tu mi rtag pa dang [#]/_bdag med pa dang mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes su bya'o/_/des de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag nas ci nas yid kyi dgu la yang 'dod pa spyad par mi bya na/_mtshan gnyis [#]sprad pa'am yan lag ma yin par 'jug pa lta ci smos te/_
[\[49b.6\]]bdag gis [#]de ltar bya'o snyam mo zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang de nyid las byang chub sems dpas rang gi chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ni dga' zhing rtse ba'i grogs yin gyi [#]'di 'jig rten pha rol gyi grogs ni ma yin no/_/'di ni bza'
[\[49b.7\]]ba dang btung ba'i grogs yin gyi/_'di las kyi rnam par smin pa myong ba'i grogs ni ma yin no/_/'di ni bde ba'i grogs yin gyi 'di [#]sdug bsngal gyi grogs ni [#]ma yin no snyam pa'o zhes bya ba nas yang gsum ste/_tshul khrims kyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa dang /_ting
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]nge 'dzin gyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa dang /_shes rab kyi bar du gcod par 'du shes pa'o/_/yang gsum ste/_chom rkun du 'du shes pa dang /_btson srung du [#]'du shes pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i srung [#]mar 'du shes pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/bu mo
[\[50a.2\]]zla mchog gis zhus pa las kyang bshad de/_de nas bu mo zla mchog gis [#]skye bo phal po che brgyug [#]pa de mthong ma thag tu/_de'i tshe nam mkha' bar snang la shing ta la'i srid du mngon par 'phags te 'dug nas/_skye bo phal po che de la tshigs su bcad [#]de smras pa/_gser gyi kha dog
[\[50a.3\]]lta bur rab 'bar zhing /_/yid du 'ong ba'i bdag lus 'di la ltos/_/kye ma rab tu lus mdzes 'di lta bu/_/chags pa'i sems dang ldan la yod re skan/_/gang dag yul rnams la ni chags med cing /_/me mdag lta bur 'dod pa rab [#]spong dang /_/dbang po drug po sdom
[\[50a.4\]]pas bsdams pa dang /_/gang dag tshangs spyod rnam par dag spyod dang /_/gang dag gzhan gyi chung ma mthong gyur na/_/ma dang sring mo'i 'du shes skyed byed pa/_/de dag mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang /_/rtag par mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/grong khyer 'di la kun du gsal
[\[50a.5\]]bltas [#]dang /_/bdag spu khung nas spos ngad gang byung ba/_/bdag gis [#]'dod chags sems kyis [#]de ma bsgrubs[#]/_/'di ni sbyin dang dul ba'i 'bras bu yin/_/bdag la 'dod chags sems ni skye ba med/_/'dod chags bral ba la yang chags mi skyed/_/ji ltar bden
[\[50a.6\]]par shes kyi log min par/_/bdag gi mdun bzhugs thub dbang 'di dpang yin/_/khyod ni sngon chad bdag gi phar gyur cing /_/bdag kyang khyed cag rnams kyi mar gyur la/_/ming sring dag dang phar yang gyur gyur na/_/ma la 'dod chags sems ni su zhig skyed/_/
[\[50a.7\]]bdag gis sngon [#]chad khyed rnams thams cad bsad/_/bdag kyang khyed kyis sngon [#]chad gshegs shing gtubs[#]/_/kun kyang phan tshun dgra dang gsod pa yin/_/khyed cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems kyang skyed[#]/_/'dod chags can ni gzugs dang ldan mi 'gyur/_/
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]'dod chags sems ldan bde 'gror 'gro ma yin/_/'dod chags sems ldan mya ngan 'das mi 'gro/_/de lta bas na 'dod chags yongs su spang /_/'dod pa'i rgyus ni sems can dmyal bar ltung /_/'dod chags kyis ni yi dgas dud 'gror 'gyur[#]/_/gang dag 'dod
[\[50b.2\]]chags sems ni ldan pa rnams/_/grul bum gnod sbyin lha mi sha zar 'gyur/_/'dod chags kyis ni mi sdug gzugs can dang /_/lce med pa dang gyol dang zhar [#]bar 'gyur/_/gang dag smad pa'i spyad pa spyod byed pa/_/de dag rnam pa sna tshogs skyon ldan 'gyur/_/'khor los [#]sgyur
[\[50b.3\]]ba nyid ni [#]thob pa dang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang phyug brgya byin dang /_/tshangs dang dbang ldan dbang sgyur gang yin pa/_/de ni tshangs spyod rgya chen spyad pas [#]gyur/_/'dod la brkam pa rtag tu dmus long dang /_/'on pa glen pa phag dang rnga mo dang /_/lung bong spre'u [#]dang glang chen ba lang dang /_/
[\[50b.4\]]stag dang rta dang phye leb sbrang mar 'gyur/_/gang dag tshangs spyod rgya cher spyad pa ni/_/rgyal po [#]dga' dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur/_/tshong dpon khyim bdag blon po rnams su'ang 'gyur/_/bde dang yid bde ba yang 'phel bar 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i khol po rnams ni gshegs shing [#]gtub/_/
[\[50b.5\]]du bas bdug cing bcing [#]dang brdeg pa dang /_/bsdigs dang mgo dang rna ba lag pa dang /_/mig dang sna dang rkang pa'ang bcad phyung 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bad sa'i rgyal po 'char byed kyis zhus pa las kyang smad de/_/rma mthong nas ni sbrang ma brgyug [#]pa dang /_/mi gtsang
[\[50b.6\]]mthong nas lung bong brgyug [#]pa dang /_/phyugs kyi sha phyir khyi yang brgyug pa ltar/_/mi mkhas bud med dga' ba de bzhin brgyug_/byis pa rnams ni ma rig bsgribs/_/mun pa'i phung pos kun tu bsgribs/_/bud med chags pa de bzhin rmongs/_/ngan skyugs [#]gnas la bya
[\[50b.7\]]khwa bzhin/_/ngan 'gror gang dag zhugs pa dang /_/myong ba'i 'du shes chags byed de/_/ngan skyugs gnas su srin bu 'dra/_/de dag bdud kyi spyod yul yin/_/ngan skyugs bum pa ri mo can/_/gang dang gang du snang ba yang /_/gcin dang bshang bas gang ba dang /_/rkyal
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa rlung gis gang ba bzhin/_/snabs dang mchil ma kha chu dang /_/bad kan rnag dang glad [#]rgyas dang /_/byis pa rnams kyi lus las [#]ni/_/dring 'dzag ste sbrang rtsi bzhin/_/rus pas rgyas gyur kha sgo can/_/pags dang [#]sha la sogs pas dkris[#]/_/lus 'di phol
[\[51a.2\]]mig 'dra ba ste/_/smad pa yin zhing dri nga can/_/dper na phol mig rma kha ni/_/srog chags sna tshogs rnams kyis gang /_/de bzhin du ni lus 'di yang /_/mi gtsang sna tshogs snod yin no/_/lto ni gnye mas gang ba ste/_/mtsher pa dang ni glo ba dang /_/mkhal ma khrag dang mkhris
[\[51a.3\]]pa dang /_/glad [#]rgyas rus pa rkang gis gang /_/gang dag khong na gnas pa ni/_/srin bu'i grong khyim brgyad khri yin/_/gti mug dra bas bsgribs pas na/_/byis pa rnams kyis mi shes so/_/bu ga'i sgo ni dgu dag nas/_/mi gtsang rnag dang dri nga 'dzag_/smra ba dang ni mthong bas
[\[51a.4\]]kyang /_/byis pa dag ni mtshan mar 'dzin/_/byis pa ngan skyugs spyod yul can/_/mchil ma dang ni snabs za ba/_/chags par 'gyur [#]nas phyogs gang zhing /_/kun tu smad pa mi shes so/_/sbrang ma rnams kyis rma mthong ltar/_/smad pa'i gnas la chags par byed/_/mchan
[\[51a.5\]]khung gnyis nas rdul 'dzag cing /_/btsog pa'i dri ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang gis ngan 'gror 'gro ba yi/_/nyes par byed pa'i las byed cing /_/'dod pa dman pa bsten pa dang /_/dman pa'i chos rnams sten byed pa/_/shes rab 'chal pa mnar med song /_/sdug
[\[51a.6\]]bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/ngan skyugs bzhin du dri nga zhes/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]bud med smad/_/de lta bas na dman pa ni/_/bud med dman pa rnams dang 'dre/_/byis pa gang zhig ngan skyugs kyi[#]/_/rkyal pa thogs nas khyim du 'gro/_/las ni ci 'dra byed
[\[51a.7\]]pa yi[#]/_/'bras bu yang ni de 'dra thob[#]/_/ces gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_sdug bsngal bas btsal ba'i longs spyod bdag [#]rang gso ba'i phyir bsgrubs pa dag [#]dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams dang /_bkren pa dang sdug phongs pa [#]dang slong ba rnams la sbyin pa
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]gtong bar mi nus te/_bud med kyi dbang du gyur cing /_bud med kyi thul 'og tu chud la bud med kyis tshar chod pa bud med kyis 'khol ba rnams ni/_bud med la dga' ba de nyid kyis de gso ba'i phyir sbyin pa gtong bar mi nus tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin mi nus so/_/de de
[\[51b.2\]]la chags pas bud med kyis spyo pa'ang bzod bsdigs shing lta ba dang brgyad [#]pa'ang bzod do/_/bud med kyis bsdigs pa'i mi de zhum zhing sro [#]shi la de'i gdong du blta ste 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhi'i dbang du song ba yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ni 'dod pa la brkam [#]pa ngan
[\[51b.3\]]skyugs kyi sgo la gdu ba mi gtsang ba la dga' ba shes bzhin med par [#]spyod pa'i mi'i skyon yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di 'dra thos kyang skyo ba dang /_/yid 'byung mi 'gyur de dag ni/_/rab tu rmongs nas bud med dang /_/phyir zhing sten par byed par 'gyur/_/btsog cing
[\[51b.4\]]shin tu smad bya ba/_/'dod pa sdug bsngal sten byed cing /_/chos thos nas ni rab rmongs shing /_/legs par [#]smras zhes smra bar byed/_/de yi sems ni mo phyir song /_/byi ba la ni byi la bzhin/_/rgyal bas bshad pa thos nas ni[#]/_/yud tsam zhig ni yid 'byung 'gyur/_/
[\[51b.5\]]de nas de ni yang 'khrug ste/_/dper na drag po'i dug dang 'dra/_/ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig_/sdang [#]shing skrag par gyur [#]kyang ni/_/ngan skyugs mthong bar gyur pa dang /_/de ni brkam [#]pa skyed pa bzhin/_/de ltar byis pa bde 'dod pa/_/rgyal ba'i bstan [#]pa spangs nas su/_/
[\[51b.6\]]gang gis ngan 'gror 'gro ba yi/_/'dod pa dman pa sten par byed/_/'dod pa rnams la chags zhen nas/_/shin tu sdig [#]pa'i las byas te/_/tshul khrims ldan la skur ba ni/_/phyi nas ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/skyes bu gang zhig chos tshul 'di 'dra ba/_/rigs [# ]
[\[51b.7\]]nas bud med rnams la bag byed pa/_/des ni mtho ris lam yang rtag par sbyangs/_/de la byang chub rab mchog dkon ma yin[#]/_/dal rnyed shes rab ldan gyur cing /_/'di 'dra ba yi chos thos pa/_/'dod pa thams cad 'dir spangs te/_/mkhas pa rab 'byung mngon par
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mdo las kyang gnod pa gzhan gsungs te/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad kyi srog bcad [#]dam de dag gi [#]bdog
[\[52a.2\]]pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo [#]gang gzhan zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis [#]sems bskyed pa/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba la zan changs cig sbyin pa [#]dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byas
[\[52a.3\]]na/_de de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas 'byung ba skyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed par gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la gzhan gyi khyim rnams su byang chub sems dpa' la phrag dog
[\[52a.4\]]dang ser sna byed na/_des de'i tshe gzhi de las 'jigs pa chen po gsum shes par bya ste/_gsum gang zhe na sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i 'jigs pa dang /_dmus long gis [#]'jigs pa dang /_yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba'i 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'o/_/yang gsungs pa/_/
[\[52a.5\]]mi gang de la dga' bar mi byed cing /_/yod pa min dang bsngags pa mi smra dang /_/mi gang khros nas mi snyan smra ba'am/_/yang na de la 'khrug pa byed pa dag_/sems can dmyal bar skye 'gyur te/_/lus ni chen por gyur nas su/_/de yis [#]sdug bsngal myong 'gyur te/_/yid rab
[\[52a.6\]]mi bde ma rungs 'gyur/_/dpag tshad lnga brgya'i tshad tsam du/_/de yi lus ni skye bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las kyis rtag tu khyi/_/bye bas bskor nas za bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa dag ni du mar yang /_/lus ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar 'gyur/_/de la mgo yang lnga brgya ste/_/de
[\[52a.7\]]las nyung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/mgo rnams re re dag la yang /_/lnga brgya'i lce las mi nyung ste/_/lce gcig la yang thong gshol ni/_/lnga brgyar tshang ste mi nyung ba/_/'bar bas de la rmo byed de/_/skur 'debs brdegs [#]pa'i las kyis so/_/tshig rtsub dag ni smras pas ni[#]/_/shin tu tsha
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]bar sreg par 'gyur/_/gang dag sdom par mi byed cing /_/byang chub sems dpa' gnod byed pa/_/de ni sems can dmyal rnyed de/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas 'gro bar 'gyur/_/tshul 'di spong bar byed pa ni/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang /_/brgya dang khrag khrig
[\[52b.2\]]rnams su yang /_/mnar med par ni sdug bsngal rnyed/_/de nas shi 'phos rab gdug cing /_/shin tu mi bzad sbrul du 'gyur/_/bkres shing skom pas mngon gzir [#]kyang /_/shin tu mi bzad las rnams byed/_/bza' ba rnyed kyang sdig pa yis/_/nam yang tshim
[\[52b.3\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te de nas shi 'phos nas/_/mi yi nang du skyes na yang /_/yid mi gzhungs shing dmus long 'gyur/_/gnod par sems shing sdom pa med/_/nyes pa'i [#]tshig rnams smras nas ni/_/'phags pa mnyes par mi byed pa/_/mi yi nang nas shi 'phos
[\[52b.4\]]nas/_/slar yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/nam yang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa'am/_
[\[52b.5\]]brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa ji tsam pa de snyed kyis [#]bskal par byang chub sems dpa' des sems can dmyal ba pa rnams su gnas par go cha bgo bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa btab pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan
[\[52b.6\]]gang gis kyang log par ltung bar [#]mi nus so/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na nor bu rin po che [#]rdo rje ni rdo rje nyid ma gtogs par shing ngam bong ba'am dbyug pa'am rdo ba'am mtshon chas bcag par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
[\[52b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' la skur ba btab pa ma gtogs par las gzhan gyis log par ltung bar byed mi nus so zhes gsungs so/_/dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis [# ]
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]khros nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad btson ra mun nag dag tu bcug pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la khros te byang chub sems dpa' la rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug nas ma rungs pa 'di mi blta'o/_/
[\[53a.2\]]zhes zer na 'di ni de bas sdig pa ches [#]grangs med par [#]skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis [#]'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi bdog pa thams cad phrogs pa bas/_gzhan gang gis byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bu yang rung ba la
[\[53a.3\]]smad na 'di ni [#]de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed do zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis mchod rten gang gA'i [#]klung gi bye ma snyed bshig pa dang bsregs pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan
[\[53a.4\]]gang zhig gis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la gnod sems dang tha ba dang khro ba'i sems bskyed de gshe ba [# ]dang mi snyan par smra na [#]'di ni de bas ches sdig pa grangs med par skyed [#]do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' las sangs rgyas bcom
[\[53a.5\]]ldan 'das rnams nges par 'byung la/_sangs rgyas las mchod rten rnams dang lha'i rigs thams cad kyi [#]bde ba'i yo byad thams cad 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' la bsti stang ma byas pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang ma byas pa yin no/_/byang chub
[\[53a.6\]]sems dpa' la bsti stang byas pa ni [#]sangs rgyas thams cad la bsti stang byas pa yin no/_/sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bla na med pas mchod pa byed 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams mchod par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar [#]mchod pa'i rnam par smin pa ni
[\[53a.7\]]rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mdo las kyang [#]/_gang zhig chos dang ldan pa ni[#]/_/chos smra de dag srung byed pa/_/ngan 'gro rnams ni kun spangs nas/_/brgya byin rdzu 'phrul chen por 'gyur/_/tshangs pa dga' ldan 'thab bral dang /_/dbang byed par yang de 'gyur ro/_/
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]gal te mir ni gyur na yang /_/rtag tu 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/tshong dpon dang ni khyim bdag 'gyur/_/rtag tu skyid cing nor chen [#]'gyur/_/ji ltar gang ga'i bye snyed kyi/_/bskal pa de snyed rtag tu yang /_/'jigs med dran pa phun sum tshogs/_/bde dang ldan zhing
[\[53b.2\]]gnod pa med/_/ces gsungs so/_/phan pa byed pa dang gnod pa byed pa bsam pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gi dbang du byas she na/_so so'i skye bo nyid kyi dbang du byas pa ste/_dad pa'i stobs skyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las ji skad du/_'jam dpal
[\[53b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis [#]sems can 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed [#]dag la bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa [#]byin pa bas rigs kyi bu'am
[\[53b.4\]]rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi brten pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa zhig la/_'di ni [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bslab pa la bslabs pa'o snyam du bsams [#]nas nyin gcig [#]zan cig byin na 'di ni de bas ches bsod
[\[53b.5\]]nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dge bsnyen ston pa gzhan la mi brten pa dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag la/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du
[\[53b.6\]]nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa [#]bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis [#]dge slong gcig la nyin gcig zan cig byin na/_'di ni de bas ches [#]bsod nams grangs med par skyed do zhes
[\[53b.7\]]gsungs pa bzhin no/_/nges pa dang ma nges pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/_gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi mig phyung bar gyur la/_yongs su brtag pa
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]nye bar bzung ste rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis byams pa'i sems kyis [#]sems can de dag thams cad la mig de dag bskyed [#]pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis [#]theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems
[\[54a.2\]]dpa' la dad pa'i sems kyis blta [#]na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las phyogs bcu'i sems can btson rar bcug pa thams cad btson ra nas bton te/_'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i
[\[54a.3\]]bde ba'am tshangs pa nyid kyi bde ba la bkod pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis [#]theg pa chen po la mos pa la dang ba'i sems kyis lta 'dod [#]par gyur cing de'i bsngags [#]pa yang brjod na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
[\[54a.4\]]med par [#]skyed do zhes gsungs so/_/de skad du sa'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal rigs dge ba'am blon po dge ba'am shor ba dge ba'am dge sbyong dge ba'am bram ze dge ba gang zhig gzhan srung ba dang bdag srung ba dang 'jig rten pha rol srung
[\[54a.5\]]ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]bstan pa dang /_nyan thos snod du gyur pa dang snod du ma gyur pa yang rung skra bregs nas gos ngur smrig gi tshal bu bgos [#]pa yongs su srung ba dang /_nyan pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi gtam dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam dang [#]/_
[\[54a.6\]]theg pa chen po'i gtam nyan pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan gyis phyug pa grol ba dang /_rigs [#]pa'i spobs pa can dag la mchod pa dang /_de dag dang lhan cig tu dga' ba dang rtse ba dang yangs su 'dri ba dang
[\[54a.7\]]yongs su 'drir 'jug pa dang de dag las mnyan cing bya'o snyam du sems zhes [# ]bya ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_de'i sdig pa ji tsam zhig 'byang bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig skyes la/_des 'dzam
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]bu'i gling thams cad rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa [#]rnams la dbul ba phul la nyi ma gung gi dus su yang de bzhin phye ma red kyi dus su yang de bzhin 'bul [#]zhing /_rnam grangs 'dis lo brgya stong du 'di ltar dbul ba phul na/_
[\[54b.2\]]'di ji snyam du sems mi de bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi de bsod nams kyi phung po mang po [# ]grangs ma mchis dpag tu ma mchis pa skyed do[#]/_/de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par gzhan gang
[\[54b.3\]]gis kyang tshad gzung [#]bar nus pa ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal rigs dge ba'am zhes bya ba nas gong du ji skad smos pa'i bar du de bzhin du sbyar te/_de bsod nams kyi [#]phung po shin tu mang du skyed pa nas/_bsod nams kyi phung po shin tu
[\[54b.4\]]yangs pa dang shin tu tshad med pa dang shin tu grangs med pa'i bar du skyed do/_/gang zhig lnga brgya pa tha ma la nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul srung ba de ni bdag srung ba dang gzhan srung ba dang 'jig rten pha rol srung ba dang nga'i bstan pa srung ba dang /_nyan thos snod du gyur pa'am [#]snod
[\[54b.5\]]du ma gyur pa yang rung skra bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos pa rnams yongs su srung ba [#]dang /_mi 'tshe ba nas rang gi yul 'khor dang gzhan gyi yul [#]'khor gyi bar du 'phel bar byed pa dang /_ngan song zad par byed pa dang /_lha'i gnas 'phel bar byed pa dang /_tshe ring du skyong
[\[54b.6\]]ba dang /_rang gi nyon mongs pa dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs pa rnams sel ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi lam pha rol tu phyin pa drug ston pa dang /_ngan song thams cad rnam par spong ba dang /_'khor ba ni [#]ring du mi 'khor ba dang /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang
[\[54b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang phrad cing /_rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang [#]mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bsams [#]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ring po mi thogs par bla na med pa yang
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i dbang po thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa nas sha za'i dbang po'i [#]bar du 'khor dang bcas pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das gal ba de [#]logs su
[\[55a.2\]]thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma'i bar du rgyal rigs dge ba rnams dang khyim bdag dge ba'i bar dag dang de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar dam pa'i chos srung ba dang de ltar dkon
[\[55a.3\]]mchog gsum gyi rigs 'bar bar bgyid pa'i rgyal rigs dge ba nas khyim bdag dge ba'i bar de dag la bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis kyang rnam pa bcu'i bar gyis bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang [#]bar bgyi 'phel bar bgyi'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[55a.4\]]de'i tshe 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /_tshe'i bar chad kyang chos kyis [#]bzlog par bgyi ba dang /_bro nad ma mchis pa dang /_'khor dang bcas pa dang [#]/_chos kyi phung po dang /_longs spyod pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_snyan pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang /_shes rab phun
[\[55a.5\]]sum tshogs pa yang 'phel bar bgyi ba ste/_bcu po de dag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/zhes rgya cher gsungs so/_/de ltar na sar ma chud pa rnams la yang rnam par smin pa 'di rgya cher blta bar bya'o/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi mdo las kyang /_/srog chags kun la
[\[55a.6\]]phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/_/'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/_/su zhig skor bar [#]byed pa ni/_/skye ba dag ni thams cad du/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_/dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/_/bsod nams ldan zhing 'jigs med 'gyur/_/
[\[55a.7\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs nas bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas sras po de dag la/_/mi gang mi dga' byed pa der[#]/_/lha dang mi ni spangs nas su/_/de dag sems dmyal spyod yul 'gyur/_/zhes rgya cher gsungs so/_/gong ma bzhin du 'dir yang khyad par gyi rgyu gang
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]yang bstan par mi nus te/_de ltar [#]dpyad pas chog go/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i mdo las kyang /_sgrib pa'i sgra ni gnod par gsungs te/_'jam dpal sgrib pa zhes bya ba ni/_'dod chags sgrib pa/_zhe sdang sgrib pa/_gti mug sgrib pa/_sbyin pa sgrib pa/_
[\[55b.2\]]tshul khrims sgrib pa/_bzod pa sgrib pa/_brtson 'grus sgrib pa/_bsam gtan sgrib pa/_shes rab sgrib pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams sbyin pa byin pa'i tshe ser sna can rnams la ma dad par byed de/_de dag
[\[55b.3\]]ma dad pa des khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa nas[# ]/khong khro ba'i tha ba'i skyon des sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su skye'o/_/de dag tshul khrims srung ba'i tshe 'chal pa'i tshul khrims can la smod cing gshe la de dag gis mi snyan par smra'o/_/de dag las de dag gi
[\[55b.4\]]skyon thos nas skye bo mang po ma dad par byed do/_/de dag ma dad pa des na ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag bzod pa sgom pa'i tshe bdag cag ni bzod pa dang ldan pa yin/_de dag gzhan ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa yin no snyam du bzod pa'i rgyags pas
[\[55b.5\]]bag med par 'gyur te/_bzod pa'i rgyags pas bag med pa de dag bag med pa'i rtsa ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal rnams myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i tshe dge slong 'di dag ni le lo can du gnas pa mngon par mi brtson [#]pa dad pas byin pa yongs su spyod
[\[55b.6\]]pa ste/_'di dag ni chu phor gang gi 'os kyang ma yin no snyam du bdag la bstod de/_de dag brtson 'grus rtsom [#]pa des bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod pa de dag ni byis pa yin no zhes nga smra'o/_/de dag bsam gtan la mnyam par 'jog pa'i tshe bsam gtan dang snyoms
[\[55b.7\]]par 'jug pa des 'dod pa skyed cing de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa yin/_dge slong 'di dag gzhan ni sems g.yeng bar gnas pa yin te/_'di dag ni sangs rgyas su ga la 'gyur zhes rgya cher ro/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]med par bstan pa las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' la ltung bas gleng na byang chub dang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa yang [#]yongs su 'dzin to/_/phrag dog [#]gis gleng na byang chub dang ring bar 'gyur ro/_/spyod lam gyis [#]gleng na byang chub dang ring bar 'gyur
[\[56a.2\]]ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas [#]byang chub sems dpa' la dman pa'i 'du shes dang bdag la rgya che ba'i 'du shes bskyed pa [#]bdag smas pa dang las kyi sgrib pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gal te de byang chub yongs su mi gtong na 'di la byang chub sems dpas [#]byang chub sems
[\[56a.3\]]dpa' la gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa'i tshe ston pa'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag ste gdams par bya/_rjes [#]su bstan par bya'i byang chub sems dpas [#]byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa'i sems bskyed [#]par ni mi bya'o/_/lha'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' cig shos
[\[56a.4\]]la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chad [#]pa de lta bu ni gang na yang med do zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub tu sems ma bskyed [#]pa'i sems can byang chub kyi skal ba can la yang brnyas [#]pa bkag na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta smos [#]kyang ci dgos/_dpa'
[\[56a.5\]]bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las/_blo gros brtan pa/_de la byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par lung bstan pa gang zhe na/_blo gros brtan pa 'di la gang zag la la zhig 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor bar yang na [#]sems can dmyal ba'am/_yang na dud 'gro'i skye gnas sam/_
[\[56a.6\]]yang na gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/_yang na lha'am/_yang na mir skyes par gyur la/_gang zag de yang dbang po rno ba rgya chen po la mos pa yin no[#]/_de la de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu mkhyen te/_skyes bu gang zag 'di ni bskal pa 'di snyed bskal pa brgya phrag 'di snyed
[\[56a.7\]]bskal pa stong phrag 'di snyed bskal pa brgya stong phrag [#]'di snyed bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'di snyed na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_blo gros brtan pa de ni byang chub tu sems ma bskyed [#]par lung bstan pa
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag deng slan chad sems can thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i phyir [#]zhe na/_sems can gang la byang chub tu yongs su
[\[56b.2\]]smin pa'i dbang po rnams mchis pa dang gang la ma mchis pa 'tshal bar 'jug pa de bdag cag la ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la 'tshal ba ma mchis pas sems can de lta bu dag la smin [#]pa'i 'du shes bskyed na/_des bdag cag smas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[56b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs legs so [#]legs so/_/tshig 'di ni legs par smras pa'o/_/'od srungs ngas [#]don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas dge slong dag nga'am nga dang 'dra bas gang zag gi [#]drod gzung gi_/gang zag gis [#]gang zag la drod mi gzung ngo [#]/_/dge
[\[56b.4\]]slong dag gang zag gis gang zag la drod bzung [#]na smas par 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig ces khyod [#]la de lta bu'i chos bstan te/_'od srungs bstan pa des byang chub sems dpa' 'am nyan thos kyis 'di na [#]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag yid [#]du 'ong zhes sems
[\[56b.5\]]can thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/des na der bdag [#]bsrung bar bya'o zhes ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no/_/gang la nges par byang chub 'thob pa'i mtshan ma yod pa de la brnyas [#]pa shin tu bsrung bar bya ste/_dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i mdo las/_
[\[56b.6\]]sa dang so phag las ni brtsigs pa yi/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten dga' bzhin byas pa dang /_/de phyir sa rdul phung po dag las kyang /_/mya ngan dgon pa dag tu byas pa dang /_/byis pas rtsed mor de dang de dag tu/_/gang gis [#]rgyal ba de phyir mchod rten dag_/bye ma las ni phung
[\[56b.7\]]por byas pa yang /_/de rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes bya ba nas/_gang gis [#]rtsig nges gzugs kyi ri mo dag_/bsod nams brgya [#]mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku/_/bdag gis bris sam 'dri ru bcug kyang rung /_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]par 'gyur/_/skyes bu rgan nam [#]'on te gzhon nu'ang rung /_/gang dag la la de ni slob pa'i tshe/_/rtsed mo dga' dang bsang ba byed pa na/_/rtsig ngos sen mo shing bus gzugs bris pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur[#]/_/zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/
[\[57a.2\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir/_/gang dag lcags kyi sil khrol brdung bcug dang /_/chu la brdabs dang thal mos brdabs pa dang /_/yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i glu dbyangs dang /_/ring bsrel de dag rnam mang mchod byas pa/_/de dag
[\[57a.3\]]thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/bde gshegs ring bsrel la ni chung zad dang /_/sil snyan gcig brdungs pa yi sgra phyung ngam/_/me tog gcig [#]tsam gyis ni mchod pa dang /_/bde gshegs gzugs dang rtsig ngos bris pa la/_/'khrug bzhin pa yi sems kyis mchod
[\[57a.4\]]na [#]yang /_/de dag rim gyis sangs rgyas bye ba mthong /_/mchod rten de la gang gis thal mo sbyar/_/yongs su tshangs pa'am thal mo ya gcig gam/_/yang na mgo bo skad cig btud pa dang /_/de bzhin lan cig lus kyang btud pa dang /_/gang gis [#]ring bsrel gnas pa de dag
[\[57a.5\]]la/_/g.yeng ba'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas zhes/_/tshig gcig lan 'ga' brjod par byas pa yang /_/de dag kun gyis [#]byang chub mchog 'di thob/_/de tshe bde bar gshegs pa de dag ni/_/mya ngan 'das sam yang na bzhugs kyang rung /_/sems can gang
[\[57a.6\]]gis chos 'di'i [#]ming thos pa/_/de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/zhes ji skad gsungs pa bzhin no/_/snying rje chen po'i mdo las kyang /_'di lta ste dper na nya pa mchil pa thogs pas nya bshor ba'i phyir mchil pa gzan ma dang bcas pa mtsho chen por bcug la de
[\[57a.7\]]bcug pa de nyas mid par gyur na/_nya de mtsho chu'i nad na 'phyo yang de srad bu sra ba yu ba skam sa la btags [#]pas brtod pa zhes brjod par bya ste/_nya ba mchil pas 'chor bar [#]'ongs nas srad bu thangs zhes [#]byed pa las nya zin par shes te des srad bu drangs nas de skam la phyung ste dga'
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]mgur spyod do/_/de bzhin du sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems kyis [#]dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed na/_tha na dad pa'i sems gcig bskyed [#]na yang sems can de dag nyes par byas pa'i las kyi sgrib pas mi dal ba rnams su skyes su zin kyang sangs rgyas
[\[57b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bsdu ba'i dngos po'i srad bus sems can de dag bzung [#]nas 'khor ba'i mtsho chu las bton te mya ngan las 'das pa'i thang la 'jog go zhes gsungs so/_/de lta bas na de dag la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par
[\[57b.3\]]bya'o/_/pha rol phyag 'tshal ba'i tshe 'di gsar bu yin yang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi [#]stobs bskyed pas phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no snyam du bsams [#]la yid kyis phyag byas te/_dper na dra byi la sprin byang chub sems dpa' chen po yin yang gsar bu 'phags pa nor bzangs [# ]
[\[57b.4\]]la lus thams cad kyis [#]gtugs nas phyag byas pa lta bu dang lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba la sogs pa las kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad la phyag bya bar gsungs pa lta bu yin te/_'di ni nges pa'i don yin no/_/phyag bya ba dang phyag
[\[57b.5\]]byed pa gnyis gcig la bsdu [#]ba ji ltar mi 'gal zhe na/_phan tshun phyag bya bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/nyams su blangs pa med pas bsod nams ma yin par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/ci sangs rgyas rnams kyang de lta'am zhe na ma yin te/_thug pa med pa dang gcig
[\[57b.6\]]dma' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/'phags pa [#]rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo las kyang gnod pa gsungs te/_'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni phra'o/_/'jam dpal gang la la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos las/_la la
[\[57b.7\]]ni bzang bar 'du shes la la ngan par 'du shes na dam pa'i chos spong pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos spangs pas de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa yin/_dge 'dun la ngan du brjod pa yin no/_/'di ni rigs pa'o 'di ni mi rigs pa'o zhes zer na de [#]dam pa'i chos spong ba
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]yin no ngas 'di na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa [#]dang ldan pa'am theg pa chen po dang ldan par chos tha dad par bstan pa gang yang med na/_mi blun po de dag nga'i chos 'di la 'di ni nyan thos rnams la bshad pa 'di ni rang sangs rgyas
[\[58a.2\]]rnams [#]la bshad pa'o zhes tha dad du 'byed de/_de tha dad pa'i 'du shes kyis [#]dam pa'i chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ma yin no zhes zer na dam pa'i chos spong ba yin no/_/chos smra ba la spobs pa yod
[\[58a.3\]]do zhe'am/_spobs pa med do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos ni chos ma yin par ston to zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba med par gzungs thob pa med do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos smra ba la gzungs thob pa med do zhes zer na chos
[\[58a.4\]]spong ba yin no[#]/_/chos smra ba'i spyod pa la sun 'byin [#]na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos smra ba sgrub pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/bag med par gleng na chos spong ba yin no/_/spyod lam gyis [#]gleng na chos spong ba yin no/_/spyod pa dang tshul
[\[58a.5\]]khrims nyams pas gleng na chos spong ba yin no/_/spobs pas go bar mi byed do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos rnams kyi snang ba legs par ma bshad do zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/khong du ma chud pas tshig dang tshig tu 'gal bar byas so zhes zer na chos
[\[58a.6\]]spong ba yin no/_/yi ge'i ming gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la 'jug go zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/mdo sde dang mdo sder [#]'gal bar byas so zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no tshigs su bcad pa dang tshigs su bcad pa 'gal bar bya'o [#]zhes zer na chos
[\[58a.7\]]spong ba yin no/_/don la la la mos shing [#]la la la ma mos so zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/chos 'chad pa'i tshe gtam gzhan du bsgyur [#]na chos spong ba yin no/_/dkrugs [#]ma byed na chos spong ba yin no/_/kun du rtog pas smra na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di la
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]spyad [#]'di la mi spyad [#]ces zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'di ni legs par gsungs pa 'di ni legs par gsungs pa ma yin no zhes zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dam tshig smras so 'dis ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi dam tshig ma smras so zhes
[\[58b.2\]]zer na chos spong ba yin no/_/'jam dpal de ltar na ji tsam du cung zad 'gal bar byed pa de tsam du chos spong ba yin no/_/dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen mas chos smras pa [#]la 'di ni 'di [#]'dra'o zhes sems sam smra na thams cad dam pa'i chos
[\[58b.3\]]spong ba yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa na 'ga' zhig mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston par byed pa na 'khor de las [#]sems can kha cig ba [#]spu zing zhes byed dam
[\[58b.4\]]kha cig mchi ma 'byung ba de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus gyur pa yin no/_/de la skyes bu blun po byang chub sems dpa' ma yin par byang chub sems dpar khas 'che ba dang [#]byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin pa chos rku ba tshul 'chos pa de dag 'di skad ces [# ]
[\[58b.5\]]ston pa rnams la 'dis ci zhig rtogs zhes zer ba la sogs pa la [#]yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brnyas pa de dag ni sems can dmyal ba na gnas pa'i [#]mthar phyin par nga mi smra'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang byang chub sems dpa' chos
[\[58b.6\]]sma ba la brnyas pa de ni sangs rgyas la smod pa yin no/_/de ni chos spong ba yin no/_/de ni dge 'dun la bshung ba yin no/_/gang chos smras pa [#]la smod pa de ni [#]sangs rgyas la mi gus pa yin no/_/gang chos smra ba la mi gus pa de sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin no/_/
[\[58b.7\]]gang chos smra ba mthong bar mi 'dod pa de sangs rgyas la mi snyan par brjod pa yin no/_/gang chos smra ba la mi snyan par brjod pa de sangs rgyas yongs su gtong ba yin no/_/gang sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro ba'i sems su byed pa yang de bzhin du
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]sbyar ro/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyi [#]phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrub [#]pa gang yin pa de la mi blun po de dag 'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid byang chub sems dpas bslab par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin
[\[59a.2\]]pa lhag ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing /_de dag pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la sun 'byin par sems na/_ma pham pa 'di ji snyam du sems/_ka shi'i rgyal por gyur pas phug ron gyi phyir khra la rang gi sha byin pa de 'chal pa'i shes rab can yin nam/_byams
[\[59a.3\]]pas gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa ngas byang chub sems kyi spyod pa spyad pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag sgrub [#]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi [#]gnod par gyur tam/_byams
[\[59a.4\]]pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa khyod kyis bskal pa drug cur sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrubs/_bskal pa drug cur tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bskal pa
[\[59a.5\]]drug cur bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bskal pa drug cur brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bskal pa drug cur bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bskal pa drug cur shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa de la/_mi gti mug can de dag
[\[59a.6\]]'di skad du/_'di lta ste/_byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul du tshul gcig pa yin no zhes zer na de dag spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo /_/le'u bzhi pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_gnod pa mdo tsam bshad zin te/_
[\[59a.7\]]de rnams spang bar bya ba'i thabs ni lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las/_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gnod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thos nas skrag ste/_yi dam blangs par gsungs pa de bzhin du bya'o/_/de dag gis ni 'di skad ces bcom
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar yi dam 'di lta bur bca' bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis [#]deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa [#]pa'i gang zag gi ltung ba mad dam mi mad kyang rung ste/_glang na bdag cag
[\[59b.2\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis [#]deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la brnyas sam de la mi snyan par brjod pa na bdag cag
[\[59b.3\]]gis [#]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis [#]deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim pa'am rab tu byung ba yang rung ste/_'dod pa'i yon
[\[59b.4\]]tan lnga la rtse zhing yongs su spyod pa mthong nas ma dad par bgyid dam ma rangs pa'i sems bskyed dam ma gus pa'i sems bskyed dam de la ston par 'du shes ma bskyed na/_bdag cag gis [#]de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te
[\[59b.5\]]bdag cag gis deng slan chad mdza' bshes kyi khyim mam/_slong [#]mo ster ba'i khyim gyi rgyus byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams kyi lus la gnod pa'am/_sems la gnod pa bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[59b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag mthong na yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig gcig tsam zhig smras na yang bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag
[\[59b.7\]]gis deng slan chad nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag la phyag ma bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad brtul zhugs de yang dag par
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]blang ba'i slad du rgyal srid thob pa'am nor thob pa'am lus dang srog kyang yongs su ma btang na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis [#]deng slan chad nyan thos kyi theg pa [#]pa'am
[\[60a.2\]]rang [#]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag la brnyas te bdag cag ni ches drag gi_/de dag ni de lta [#]ma yin no snyam na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad dma' ba'i [#]sems dang gdol
[\[60a.3\]]ba'i sems [#]dang khyi'i sems lta bur gnas par ma bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smad na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus
[\[60a.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad gnod sems dang /_rtsod pa'i 'jigs pas bskul ma thag tu dpag tshad dam dpag tshad brgyar ma byol na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[60a.5\]]gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad bdag nyid tshul khrims dang ldan par khas 'che'am/_mang du thos pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'am yon tan gang yang rung ba zhig gis bdag brjod na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bslus par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[60a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag cag gis deng slan chad dge ba mi spyoms shing sdig pa mi 'chab par gnas par [#]ma bgyis na bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bslus par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[60a.7\]]du sbyar te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang [#]las kyi sgrib pa [#]spang bar 'dod pas/_ji ltar rigs kyi bu 'di dag gis [#]byas pa de bzhin du yi dam
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]du [#]bca'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa bstan pa las kyang /_nyin dang mtshan mo de bzhin lan gsum du/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'dod bzhin spyad pa spyod pa na/_/de dag 'khrul pa tsam
[\[60b.2\]]yang mi btsal lo/_/gang tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtse mthong /_/de las 'khrul pa ci yang mi btsal te/_/byang chub spyod mchog yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/de la de dag re zhig reg [#]snyam bsam/_/rigs pa'i rim dang bya ba'i rim gyis ni/_/rgyal bar 'gyur gyi thang
[\[60b.3\]]cig gis [#]mi 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang zhig na/_/de dag go cha 'jug 'gyur gzhan du min/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nyid las rigs kyi bu gang dag las kyi sgrib pa 'di lta bu [#]gnod par 'gyur ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' cig shos kyi bslab pa
[\[60b.4\]]thams cad log par mi [#]bsgrub par mi bya'i de'i bya ba thams cad la mos par byas te/_'di snyam du sems can gyi spyod pa ni shes par dka' bas bdag gis pha rol gyi sems mi shes so snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang
[\[60b.5\]]'di gzigs nas gang zag gis gang zag gi drod mi gzung gi_/nga'am gang [#]nga dang 'dra bas gang zag gi drod [#]gzung ngo zhes de skad du [#]chos ston to[#]/_/rigs kyi bu gang bdag [#]bsrung bar 'dod pa de [#]su'i spyod pa [#]yang rnam par dbye bar mi byed do/_/'di ni 'di 'dra'o 'di ni 'di 'dra'o
[\[60b.6\]]zhes gzhan la dpyas par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos la nyin mtshan du chos kyis [#]yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis [#]brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de skad du sa'i snying po'i mdo las kyang /_de nas de'i mod la sems can mkhas pa brgya stong mang po stan las langs te/_
[\[60b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'di skad ces [# ]'tshal te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag yun ring po [#]ji srid du 'khor ba na 'khor ba [#]de srid
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]du/_bzod pa ma thob par rgyal po'i gnas 'thob par ma gyur cig_/blon po'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/grong khyer gyi gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/grong gi gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/grong rdal gyi gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/mdun
[\[61a.2\]]na 'don gyi gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/shor ba'i gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/ded dpon gyi gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/mkhas pa'i [#]gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/dge sbyong gi [#]gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/khyim bdag gi [#]gtso bo'i gnas su
[\[61a.3\]]ma gyur cig_/khab so pa'i gtso bo'i gnas su ma gyur cig_/bdag cag bzod pa ma thob kyi bar du bdag cag gzhi gang las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bstan pa la las shin tu mi bzad pa 'di lta bu 'phel bar gyur pa[#]/_sems can rnams kyi bdag po'i bar gyi
[\[61a.4\]]gnas dag thams cad du thob par ma gyur cig ces rgya cher gsungs so/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_gzhon nur gyur pa de dag ni/_/sdig pa mi byed [#]yongs med de/_/phyi ma'i dus na de dag dang /_/khyod ni sten par ma [#]byed cig_/smra ba dang ni gtam gyis la/_/
[\[61a.5\]]de dag la ni ri mor gyis/_/byang chub dam pa'i [#]don gyi phyir/_/zhum pa med par bkur sti gyis/_/lo grangs du lon kun dris la/_/de dag rgan par gyur na yang /_/de la ri mo legs kyis la/_/rkang pa la yang mgos phyag 'tshol[#]/_/byang chub snying po rnams
[\[61a.6\]]bltas [#]na/_/de dag 'khrul pa mi blta'o/_/de la khong khro mi bskyed [#]cing /_/rtag tu byams pa'i sems su bya/_/gang gi 'khrul pa ci mthong yang /_/de dag nyes pa mi bsgrag ste/_/ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/_/'bras bu de 'dra thob par 'gyur/_/zla ba'i bzhin
[\[61a.7\]]ni 'dzum bzhin du/_/rgan rabs dang ni gsar bu la/_/rtag tu gsong por smra ba dang /_/des shing nga rgyal bcom par bya/_/gos rnams dang ni zas dag gis/_/de dag la ni phan gdags shing /_/'di dag thams cad 'dren 'gyur zhes/_/de ltar khyod kyis [#]sems zhog shig/_
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]ces gsungs so/_/byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la gang zhig dad pa dang gus pa mi bskyed pa des bdag ngan 'gror ltung bas 'jigs pa [# ]las bsrung ba dang tshe 'di dang tshe gzhan la mchog tu dga' ba myong bar bya ba dang /_rang gi sems kyi rnyog pa gdang ba [#]dang sems dge
[\[61b.2\]]ba dang las su rung ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las[#]/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa byams pas 'phags pa nor bzangs kyi [#]ched du byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i yon tan ji skad brjod pa de [#]bzhin du bsgom par bya ste/_'dis ni rga dang nad kyis [# ]
[\[61b.3\]]mnar ba yi/_/srog chags sdug bsngal brgya yis gtses pa rnams/_/skye shi mya ngan 'jigs pas gdungs mthong nas/_/de dag don du snying rje'i sems kyis spyod/_/'gro ba rgyud lnga'i 'khor lo'i [#]dkyil 'khor du/_/sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor btsir ba'i 'gro
[\[61b.4\]]mthong nas/_/sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor 'khor lo 'joms pa yi/_/ye shes rdo rje sra ba 'di tshol lo/_/'dod chags zhe sdang rtsa sdong tsher ma can/_/lta chags rtsa mang yongs su 'dzin pa yi/_/sems can zhing ni yongs su sbyang ba'i [#]phyir/_/shes rab
[\[61b.5\]]gshol brtan bzang po 'di tshol lo/_/gti mug ma rig thibs po'i bsam pa can/_/'gro ba shes rab mig stor dmigs med pa/_/de la phyogs bde ston pa'i mthu yod pa'i/_/'gro ba'i ded dpon bzang por 'di 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa'i go bgos rnam thar bzhon
[\[61b.6\]]pa zhon/_/shes rab ral gri mya ngan dgra 'joms pas/_/mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i dpa' bor gyur pa 'di/_/'gro ba rnams kyi lam ston 'gyur ba yin/_/'di ni chos kyi gru rab sbyor ba ste/_/ye shes rgya mtsho'i lam la bslabs pa'o/_/zhi ba rin chen mchog gi gling skyel
[\[61b.7\]]ba/_/'di ni khams gsum mtsho yi [#]skya ba 'dzin/_/ye shes 'od zer smon lam dkyil 'khor can/_/sems can kun gyi gnas su snang byed pa'i/_/chos dbyings mkha' la 'od chen rab ldan par/_/'di ni sangs rgyas nyi mar 'char bar 'gyur/_/byams pa'i
[\[62a\]]
