[\[81b.5\]]ba bstan [#]pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpas gang khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba des chos la brten [#]par bya ste/_des de la mngon par brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so[#]/_/gzhan du na sems can gcig bsdu ba'i phyir sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /_sems can des
[\[81b.6\]]kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyar [#]bar bya ba'i bar chad [#]byas pas/_don chen po dmas [#]par byas par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na dge ba'i phyogs rgya chen po rnam par spangs pas ma bsrungs pa zhes bya'o[#]/_/de ltar re zhig gtong ba bkag go/_/mi gtong ba dgag pa ni/_'phags pa
[\[81b.7\]]blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'i rnyed pa mang po ji skad gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/bdag gi [#]cho gar bstan pa gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa' [#]gzhan la yang bsgrub [#]par bya'o zhes bya bar ci mngon zhe na/_'phags pa drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i mdo
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]las bstan pa'i phyir te/_gzhan gyi bya ba byas shing [#]rang gi bya ba yongs su gtang [#]bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de skad du dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /_'khor ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pas ci la brten par bya/_smras pa/_'jam dpal 'khor
[\[82a.2\]]ba'i 'jigs pas skrag pa'i byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la brten par bya'o/_/smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la gnas par 'dod pas ji [#]ltar gnas par bya/_smras pa/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid la gnas par 'dod pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas par
[\[82a.3\]]bya'o/_/smras pa/_sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas par 'dod pas [#]gang du gnas par bya/_/smras pa/_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar bya ba la gnas par bya'o zhes [#]gsungs so/_/de skad du chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon gyis
[\[82a.4\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma kho nar sems can thams cad byang chub par 'tshal bar bgyi ste bdag nyid ni ma lags so zhes bya ba nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos yang dag par brjod pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/gtang bas [#]de'i rang
[\[82a.5\]]gi don bya ba med par grub mod kyi/_'on kyang sems can gyi don nyams pas 'jigs pa'i phyir skal ba med pa'i sems can la rang gi khur khas 'chi bar mi byed do/_/gang du sems can gyi don nyams par ma mthong ba der rang gis byas sam gzhan gyis [#]'gro ba la phan par spyad par bye brag ci yod na/_
[\[82a.6\]]de byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyi dge ba sgrub [#]pa'i phyir/_rang gi dge ba mi 'dor/_ci ste bdag ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs na cig shos kyang sdug bsngal de nyid kyis 'jigs so/_/ji ste de sdug bsngal bas bdag la gnod pa med do snyam du yal bar 'dor na gong du smos pa'i
[\[82a.7\]]mdo rnams las 'byung ba bzhin du [#]nyes pa dang bcas par 'gyur ro/_/yang dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/_'od srungs bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' ltar bcos pa'o zhes bya ba las brtsams te/_bdag gis bde ba don du gnyer ba yin te sems can gyi sdug bsngal
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]bsal ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/de lta bas na drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i tshul ltar snga ma yin [#]bzhin du bdag la smad par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa 'di ni chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa rtsom [#]pa med kyis ji skad bstan pa lta
[\[82b.2\]]bu ste/_rigs kyi bu sgrub pa la gnas par ji ltar rig [#]par bya/_smras pa/_gang sems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa'o/_/smras pa/_sems can rnams la log par mi sgrub pa ji lta bu/_smras pa/_gang sems can rnams la byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po mi 'don ba'o/_/
[\[82b.3\]]rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byams pa chen po gang yin/_smras pa/_gang lus dang srog dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la sbyin zhing lan du phan 'dogs par re ba yang med do[#]/_/smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rje chen po gang
[\[82b.4\]]yin/_smras pa/_gang thog ma kho nar sems can thams cad byang chub par 'dod kyi bdag ni ma yin pa'o zhes bya'o[#]/_/yang de nyid las/_snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi rtsa ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' don du gnyer ba gang yang rung bas don du gnyer
[\[82b.5\]]bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir na/_gang gis sbyin pa po yon gnas chen pos don chen po sbyin pa las bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho'i [#]phung po chen po snang bar 'gyur ba 'di ni gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_gdon mi za bar bstan to zhes bya bar yong [#]nges pa yin te/_de lta ma yin na ni
[\[82b.6\]]phongs pas 'chi bar 'gyur [#]ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do/_/rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi mdo las/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis lo stong gi 'god pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad bsdoms te/_dge slong gcig la byin par gyur cing /_de bzhin du thams cad dge slong thams cad la so sor byin par gyur la/_
[\[82b.7\]]gang yang lung 'bogs [#]pa dang kha ton la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gus pa dang bcas pa chos 'dod pa zhig gis dad pas byin pa chen po la 'os pa blangs te/_'di ltar sbyin pa 'dis bdag gis chos yongs su btsal ba brtsam mo snyam du sems bskyed na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la gtang [#]bar bya
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]ba'i chos yongs su gtang [#]ba des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes gang bstan pa de [#]ni khyim gyi bde ba la chags pa'i dbang du byas nas gsungs pa ste/_sngar bstan pa'i tshul gyis nyes pa ci yang med do/_longs spyod bsrung [#]ba mdo tsam bstan zin to/_/bsod nams bsrung ba
[\[83a.2\]]brjod par bya ste/_de la/_rang don rnam smin sred spangs pas/_/dge ba kun tu bsrung [#]bar 'gyur/_/sred med kyi bus zhus pa las ji skad du/_de rgyal srid kyi phyir tshul khrims mi srung /_mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/_brgya byin gyi phyir ma yin/_tshangs pa'i phyir ma yin/_longs spyod kyi phyir ma yin/_dbang phyug
[\[83a.3\]]gi phyir ma yin/_gzugs kyi phyir ma yin/_kha dog gi phyir ma yin/_snyan pa'i phyir ma yin no/_/de bzhin sbyar ro/_/dmyal ba'i 'jigs pas 'jigs nas [#]tshul khrims bsrung [#]ba ma yin/_de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyis 'jigs skrag pas tshul khrims bsrung ba
[\[83a.4\]]ma yin te/_gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi tshul la dgod pa'i phyir tshul khrims bsrung ba nas/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba [#]grub pa dang bde ba don du gnyer bas tshul khrims srung [#]ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te[#]/_tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de chos bcu
[\[83a.5\]]las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid las yongs su mi nyams te de la yang bag yod cing byang chub 'dod pa yin/_brgya byin las yongs su mi nyams te de la yang bag yod cing byang chub 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod
[\[83a.6\]]pa yin/_de bzhin du tshangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba mi phyed pa thob pa dang /_chos nyan pa las yongs su mi nyams pa nas ji ltar thob [#]pa'i chos bsgrub pa la nan tan byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yi dam gyi bar las yongs su mi nyams pa dang /_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang /_dge
[\[83a.7\]]ba'i chos thams cad don du gnyer ba dang /_bsam gtan las yongs su mi nyams pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha rnams kyis rtag tu phyag byas pa yin/_klu rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yin/_
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu phyag byas pa yin/_dri za rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa yin/_klu'i dbang po dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis rtag tu rjed [#]pa yin/_bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang tshong dpon dang khyim bdag rnams kyis [#]rtag tu gsol ba yin/_mkhas pa rnams kyis [#]rtag tu 'gro bar
[\[83b.2\]]bya ba yin/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis ston pa dang mtshungs par bkur ba yin/_sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/'gro ba bzhir mi 'gro ste/_bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_sems can yongs su smin par
[\[83b.3\]]bya ba ma gtogs par mi khom pa'i 'gro bar mi 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i zhing gi [#]'gro bar mi 'gro ba dang /_log par lta ba can gyi rigs su skye ba'i 'gro bar mi 'gro ba dang /_ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba thams cad du mi 'gro ba'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de ltar sngar btang ba'i bsod nams nyon mongs pa'i
[\[83b.4\]]dbang gis yang len pa bsrung bar bya'o/_/bsod nams byin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de las gzhan gyi don las ma gtogs pa rnam par smin pa mi 'dod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang bsod nams bsrung bar 'dod pas/_'gyod par yang ni mi bya ste/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa [#]las ji skad du/_byin nas
[\[83b.5\]]'gyod pa'i sems bskyed par ni mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste/_mjug mthu chung bar byas pas mthu chung bar 'gyur te/_'gyod pas sdig pa zad pa bzhin du bsod nams kyang zad par 'gyur bar dgongs pa'o/_/byas par gyur kyang bsgrags mi bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]rnam grangs du mar dge
[\[83b.6\]]ba mi spyoms pa dang /_sdig pa bshags pa gsungs so/_/de la yid mi bde ba'i phyir sdig pa ni/_bshags pas zad par 'gyur ro/_/bsod nams ni de ltar zad par mi 'gyur te/_yid bde ba'i phyir yang mi zad de/_sems can gyi don gyi phyir zang zing med pa'i sems kyis bsgrags pa ni nyes pa
[\[83b.7\]]med do[#]/_/dkon mchog sprin las ji skad du/_sman pa'i dpes bdag [#]bstod pa nyes pa med par bstan pa lta bu'o/_/yang bsod nams bsrung bar 'dod pas/_/rnyed dang bkur stis 'jigs bya zhing /_/khengs pa rtag tu spang bar bya/_/byang chub sems dpa' [#]dang bya zhing /_/chos la yid gnyis spang bar
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]bya/_/'di ni dkon mchog brtsegs pa las rab tu bstan te[#]/_'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i chos skyes shing byung ba rnams yongs su zad par 'gyur te dge ba'i chos de dag gis [#]rgyas par mi 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mngon pa'i
[\[84a.2\]]nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang 'phen [#]pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen pas khyim la lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par sdang [#]zhing skur ba 'debs pa dang /_ma thos pa dang ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams spong ba'o [#]zhes bstan to/_/'phags pa thams cad yod par smra
[\[84a.3\]]ba rnams kyi gzhung las kyang /_dge slong dag dge slong gis [#]'di ltar skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te sems dang bar byed pa la ltos/_/btsun pa de lta lags so/_/dge slong dag dge slong 'dis sa ji tsam zhig non pa'i 'og dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong na
[\[84a.4\]]yod pa'i [#]gser gyi 'khor lo la thug pa'i bar na bye ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed du dge slong 'dis 'khor los sgyur [#]ba'i rgyal srid stong 'gyur du longs [#]spyod par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas de nas tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la
[\[84a.5\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]dge slong gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bur che bar gsungs na bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gang du [#]bsrabs pa dang yongs su byang ba dang yongs su zad par 'gyur/_nye ba [#]'khor ji ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas tshangs pa [#]mtshungs par spyod
[\[84a.6\]]pa la rma byung ba dang rmas par byas pa de lta bu ni ngas ma mthong ste/_nye ba [#]'khor des dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'di dag bsrabs pa dang yongs su byang ba dang yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/nye ba [#]'khor de lta bas na ci nas 'gal ba la yang sems kyis gnod par mi bya na rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus lta smos
[\[84a.7\]]kyang ci dgos zhes 'don to/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa'i mdo las[#]/_khong khro ba khong khro ba zhes bya ba ni bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pas de'i phyir khong khro ba zhes bya'o zhes [#]gsungs so/_/'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/_mtshan mo'i lha mo sems
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]can kun skyob pa'i dpal gyis sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa bsnyad pa las kyang /_de dag phan tshun brnyas pa'i mi dge ba [#]'dus pas tshe'i tshad kyang [#]nyams par 'gyur/_kha dog dang stobs dang bde ba las kyang yongs su nyams par 'gyur zhes gsungs so/_/'dir ni brgya lam na yang khengs par mi bya'o
[\[84b.2\]]zhes rab tu bstan [#]pa'i phyir rtag tu zhes brjod do/_/rnyed pa dang bkur [#]sti ni ji ste na khas blang bar bya ste/_dkon mchog sprin las ji skad du/_'di [#]la byang chub sems dpa'i [#]rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam thob na yang len to/_/dngos po ngan pa zhig thob na yang len to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de 'di ltar
[\[84b.3\]]sems te sems can 'di dag ni ser sna can brkam pa 'dod pas bkol ba 'jungs pa yin te/_rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des chu'i phung po chen pos non pa bzhin du 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byung nub byed pa de dag la yun ring por don dang phan pa dang bde ba chen por [#]'gyur ro snyam ste/_de blangs nas bdag gir mi
[\[84b.4\]]byed chags pa'i sems mi bskyed do/_/gzhan du na sems can thams cad dang thun mong du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dag [#]la yang bya ba byed do/_/sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams la yang phan par byed [#]do/_/sbyin pa'i bdag po de yang gzengs bstod pa dang shin tu dga' bar byed do zhes
[\[84b.5\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du de nyid las/_sbyin pa des khengs par yang mi 'gyur zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_gal te yang rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi des grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa zhig byung yang des khengs par mi 'gyur nga rgyal mi skye rgyags pa mi skye ste de 'di snyam
[\[84b.6\]]du sems so/_/ring por mi thogs par grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa 'di su la nye bar gnas pa dang /_su dag gis nye bar gnas par byas pa dang /_grags pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa gang zhig nye bar gnas pa 'di gsum gang yang thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur na de
[\[84b.7\]]la mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig mi rtag cing mi gnas pa'i chos mi brtan pa yid brtan du mi rung ba dag la dga' ba'i sems bskyed pa'am/_khengs par 'gyur ba'am/_nga rgyal dang rgyags pas dregs par 'gyur snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang grags
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]pa dang sgra dang tshigs su bcad pa rnams la dran pa shin tu nye bar gzhag cing gnas so zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang dman pa'i yid kyis gdol bu lta bur 'jig rten na spyod pa yin/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod snyoms slong ba'i 'du shes nye bar gzhag pas dman zhing
[\[85a.2\]]dman pa'i yid kyis nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang dregs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no zhes gsungs so/_/yang gsungs pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ste rab tu byung nas bdag gi grogs po dang blon po dang gnyen bshes [#]dang snag gi gnyen mtshams la
[\[85a.3\]]shi ba dang 'dra'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag gi gzugs mi sdug par khas blangs shing bdag gis [#]gos kha dog mi sdug pa bgos [#]te tshul gzhan du bsgyur ro zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_sprang ba'i rgyu sprang ba'i [#]phyir mgo bregs shing lag na lhung bzed thogs nas grong nas grong du 'gro'o zhes nga
[\[85a.4\]]rgyal bcom pa yin/_gdol bu dang 'dra bar dman pa dman [#]pa'i sems kyis [#]bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag ni bsod snyoms pa ste bdag gi 'tsho ba gzhan la rag lus so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_brnyas pa'i bsod snyoms ngan ngon len to zhes nga rgyal
[\[85a.5\]]bcom pa yin/_bdag gis slob dpon dang bla ma dang sbyin pa'i gnas rnams mnyes par bya dgos so zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_bdag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la 'di lta ste/_cho ga dang spyod yul dang kun spyod pa de dang des mgu bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_sangs
[\[85a.6\]]rgyas kyi chos ma thob pa rnams thob par bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin/_sems can khros pa dang gnod sems rnams kyi [#]nang na bzod pa mang bar bya'o zhes nga rgyal bcom pa yin no zhes gsungs so//_//bam po bdun pa/_'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_
[\[85a.7\]]de lus yongs su dag pa yin te/_lus mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang /_lag pa dang rkang pa 'jam zhing mnyen pa dang /_bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa'i lus [#]shin tu rnam par phye ba dang /_dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang /_yan lag dang nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin yang /_
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gzugs kyis [#]rgyags shing dregs pa med pa yin te/[. ]lus che [#]ba'i tshul dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/de chos gzung bar bya ba'i phyir sems can ci tsam du dman pa gzugs ma tshang ba rnams la yang 'dud do rab tu 'dud do zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gang
[\[85b.2\]]gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchis par 'gyur ba [#]de'i tshe gzhol ba'i phyogs na mchis par 'gyur ro/_/de gzhol ba'i slad du chu klung thams cad dang chab mig dang 'bab chu thams cad tshegs chung ngus der 'bab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa bla ma dang sbyin gnas la
[\[85b.3\]]gus pa la yang tshogs chung dus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grag par 'gyur zhing dran pa la yang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/_bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la kun du mi 'dud cing 'dud
[\[85b.4\]]par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nga rgyal gyi lcags kyus zin par rig par bgyi'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u las kyang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nga
[\[85b.5\]]rgyal gyi las so/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bla ma dang sbyin gnas dang slob dpon dang pha ma dang dge sbyong dang bram ze dang yang dag par song ba dang yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la mi gus pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/chos smra ba dang /_khyad par can gyi chos khong du chud pa dang /_chos rgya chen po ston
[\[85b.6\]]pa dang theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul shes pa dang /_gzungs dang mdo sde la shin tu byang ba rnams la mi 'dud de/_khengs shing 'gying la chos dang chos smra ba la gus pa mi skyed cing sri [#]zhu dang zhes mi byed pa ni/_nga rgyal gyi las so/_/chos mnyan pa dang yang dag pa'i gtam
[\[85b.7\]]bya bar 'dug pa na/_chos kyi shugs rgya chen po skyes kyang la la zhig 'di la dad pa skyes par 'gyur du 'ong snyam ste chos smra ba la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal bskyed nas bdag gi [#]gzengs bstod cing pha rol khyad du gsod pa dang bdag shes pa
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]la mi 'jug cing sems kyi nges par sems pa mi skyed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/lhag pa'i nga rgyal bskyed nas shes shing rtogs bzhin du bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa 'chab pa dang mi snyan par brjod cing gzhan gyi yon tan bsngags pas yid mi
[\[86a.2\]]dga' bar 'gyur ba ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/'di ni chos so/_/'di ni 'dul ba'o/_/'di ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no zhes bya bar yang dag par [#]shes la/_gang zag la zhe sdang zhing chos la zhe sdang ba dang dam pa'i chos spong ba dang gzhan dag kyang rtsod du 'jug cing ldog
[\[86a.3\]]par byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/stan mthon po 'dod pa dang gces te las su mi bsko ba'i chos tshol [#]ba dang gzhan gyi rim gro bya bar sdod cing mngon par dga' ba dang gnas brtan rgan po tshangs par spyod pa yun ring du spyad pa rnams la mi ldang zhing mi su [#]ba dang bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni nga rgyal gyi las
[\[86a.4\]]so/_/bzhin khro gnyer can du byas shing mi 'dzum pa dang /_tshig 'jam zhing mnyen pa med la rtag tu khengs pa'i sems kyis glags lta [#]skabs tshol ba ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du lhung zhing mkhas pa'i gan du mi 'gro mi bsnyen mi bsten [#]bsnyen bkur mi byed yongs su
[\[86a.5\]]mi 'dri [#]zhing dge ba ni ci mi dge ba ni ci/_ci byas na yun ring por [#]don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur/_ci byas na yun ring por gnod pa dang mi phan pa dang mi bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ste/_de rmongs pa las ches rmongs par gyur nas/_gti mug gis [#]blong zhing nga rgyal gyis [#]brgyal te 'byung ba mi mthong ba
[\[86a.6\]]ni nga rgyal gyi las so/_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis [#]zil gyis non pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed pa dang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zad par byed pa dang gsar [#]mi skyed pa dang /_bshad par mi bya ba 'chad pa dang 'thab [#]mo byed cing rtsod pa mang bar gyur [#]te/_'di lta bu'i chos la gnas pas 'dod rgyal
[\[86a.7\]]chen por lhung ba'i gnas su gyur kyang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs skyed pas dbang phyug thob par 'gyur yang /_des bskal pa brgya stong du sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang mi mthong na chos nyan par lta ga la 'gyur te 'di ni nga rgyal gyi las bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dag gis [# ]
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]nga rgyal gyi las bcu po de lta bu de dag yongs su spangs nas/_ye shes kyi las bcu thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so[#]/_/de nyid las sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa zhes ye shes kyi las legs par bshad do/_/'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_rmongs
[\[86b.2\]]pa de dag nga rgyal dbang gis na[#]/_/ngan song pa [#]dang mi khom skye ba dang /_/dbul dang dman pa'i rigs su skye ba dang /_/dmus long mdog ngan mthu chung nyid 'dzin byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/chos yang dag par sdud pa las kyang /_sems can gyi zhing ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
[\[86b.3\]]ste/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'thob par 'gyur ba de la log par bsgrub pa mi rigs so snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du legs par spyad pa dang nyes par spyad pa thams cad ni sems can la brten nas 'byung ngo /_/nyes par spyad pa la brten nas ni ngan song rnams 'byung
[\[86b.4\]]ngo /_/legs par spyad pa la brten nas ni lha dang mir 'gyur ro snyom mo zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs las kyang /_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' [#]las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la thog ma nyid du sems rnam pa
[\[86b.5\]]bcu bskyed de/_rnam pa bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_phan pa'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_snying [#]brtse ba'i sems dang /_mnyen pa'i sems dang /_sdug pa'i sems dang /_phan [#]gdags pa'i sems dang /_kun du srung ba'i sems dang /_snyoms pa'i sems dang /_slob dpon gyi sems dang /_
[\[86b.6\]]ston pa'i sems te/_sems rnam pa bcu po 'di dag bskyed do zhes gsungs so/_/dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las/_bdag nyid ni sems can thams cad kyi slob mar khas len pa la gnas shing sems can gzhan dag kyang slob mar khas len pa la gzhag go snyam du
[\[86b.7\]]dbugs dbyung ba rnyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rnam par 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa la gzhag go snyam du dbugs [#]dbyung ba rnyed do/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la rnam par 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa ni sems can thams cad la nga rgyal med pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa dri ma med par grags
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pas bstan pa las kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par [#]skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la ston pa ltar gces par byed ces gsungs so/_/stan 'ding [#]ba dang rkang pa 'khru ba la sogs pa'i las byed pa na yang 'jig rten ma dad par 'gyur ba bsrung ba'i
[\[87a.2\]]phyir/_sems kyis [#]gces pa dang gus par bsam pa goms par bya'o/_/'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las kyang gsungs te/_des seng ge'i khri chen po de la 'dug ma thag tu skye bo mang po de dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te thal mo sbyar nas rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin du
[\[87a.3\]]sbyar te/_rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi [#]dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrogs pa des slong mo pa de dag mthong ba'i mdo de la de'i rgyus ches dga' bar gyur [#]gyi/_bskal pa tshad med pa'i mthas klas par zhes bya ba nas/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i rnam par thar pa zhi ba'i bde ba la gnas pa
[\[87a.4\]]thob pas [#]ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na/_skyes bu sred pa la spyod pa pha ma dang phu nu dang bu sring dang mdza' bo dang blon po dang gnyen bshes dang bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang yun ring mo zhig tu bral ba la [#]'brog dgon par 'khyams te/_de dag mthong bar 'dod pa las
[\[87a.5\]]de dag dang phrad na de dag mthong bas mi ngoms shing dga' ba dang chags pa chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du rgyal po chos thams cad kyi nga ro'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu sgrogs pas slong mo pa de dag mthong bar gyur pa'i mod la dga' ba'i shugs chen po skyes so/_/sems kyi
[\[87a.6\]]dga' ba'i ro bde ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/sems spro ba'i shugs rab tu byung ngo zhes bya ba nas/_slong mo pa de dag la bu gcig pa'i 'du shes skyed pa'i phyir ro/_/pha ma'i 'du shes dang sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang /_dkon pa'i [#]'du shes dang /_dka' ba byed
[\[87a.7\]]pa'i 'du shes dang /_gces spras byed pa'i 'du shes dang /_phan 'dogs pa dam pa'i 'du shes dang /_byang chub kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i 'du shes dang /_mkhan po'i 'du shes dang /_ston pa'i 'du shes skyed pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i thabs gzhan med na sems can
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]gyi gan du 'gro ba dang rim gro byed pa'i tshe thams cad du gtang ba dran par bya ste/_bdag gi lus 'di ni 'di dag gi yin gyi/_bdag bde ba'i don du sa byi dor byed pa dang bsku ba la sogs pa byed pa bzhin du 'di la ci dgar spyod cig snyam du bsam mo[#]/_/yang na rje [#]bo mi dga' bas 'jigs pa [#]de
[\[87b.2\]]dga' bar 'dod pas des bsgo ba bsgrubs pa [#]ltar yid la bya'o/_/rten gzhan med pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis rim gro mdzad pa yang dge slong nad pas nyams su blangs so/_/dge slong gi bya ba rgyas pa las ji skad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ma 'jigs shig_/_
[\[87b.3\]]dge slong ngas khyod kyi rim gro bya'o/_/dge slong khyod kyi gos rnams tshur byin cig ngas bkru'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong nad pa 'di'i gos mi gtsang bas 'bags pa rnams
[\[87b.4\]]mi bkru bar gsol lo[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das de [#]bdag gis bkru bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis dge slong 'di'i gos rnams khrus shig_/de bzhin gshegs pas ni chu blugs so/_/[#]de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos [#]dge slong
[\[87b.5\]]nad pa de'i gos bkrus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chu blugs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong nad pa de shin tu legs par blangs te phyi rol du phyung nas bkrus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ni chu blugs so zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/yang smras pa/_
[\[87b.6\]]gang dag mgu bas che nyid dang /_/ma mgus mi bzang rgud 'gyur ba/_/de dag srog kyang yongs btang nas/_/mgu bar bya bar rigs pa yin/_/gang dag mgu byas mang po rnams/_/grub de sems can 'di dag nyid/_/'jig rten na ni sems can las/_/grub pa'i zhing gzhan yod ma yin/_/'di
[\[87b.7\]]dag yid bzhin nor bu dang /_/bum bzang 'dod 'jo'i ba dang ni/_/bla ma dang ni lha 'dra ba/_/des na 'di dag mgu bar bya/_/gzhan yang g.yo med gnyen gyur cing /_/phan pa dpag med mdzad rnams la/_/sems can mgu bya ma gtogs par/_/gzhan 'ga' [#]zhig gis lan lon 'gyur[#]/_/
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]ral pa'i nang gnas sems can rnams/_/'bad pas g.yo ba med par ni/_/ji ltar bzhen [#]bzhin mgon pos sngon/_/dbu yis bzung bar gyur pa yin/_/gang phyir sku gtong mnar med 'jug pa la/_/de la byas pas lan lon nyid 'gyur ba/_/des ni [#]gnod chen
[\[88a.2\]]byed kyang de dag la/_/legs pas [#]thams cad rab tu spyad par bya/_/re zhig bdag gi rjer gyur nyid kyang ni/_/gang phyir rang gi sku la'ang [#]mi gzigs pa/_/rje bo de dang de la ji ltar bdag_/nga rgyal byed cing bran gyi dngos mi byed/_/gang dag bde bas thub rnams dgyes 'gyur zhing /_/gang
[\[88a.3\]]la gnod na mi dgyes 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de dag dga' bas thub dbang kun dgyes shing /_/de la gnod byas thub la gnod pa byas/_/ji ltar lus la kun nas me 'bar ba/_/'dod pa kun gyis yid bder mi 'gyur ba/_/de bzhin sems can gnod pa byas na yang /_/thugs rje che rnams
[\[88a.4\]]dgyes pa'i thabs med do/_/de bas bdag gis 'gro la gnod byas pas/_/thugs rje che kun mi dges [#]gyur pa gang /_/sdig de di ring so sor bshags bgyi yis/_/mi dges [#]gang lags de thub bzod par gsol/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bgyid slad deng /_/bdag nyid kun
[\[88a.5\]]gyis 'jig rten bran du mchi/_/'gro mang bdag 'di'i mgo la rdog bsnun nam/_/yang na gnod [#]par byed bzod 'jig rten mgon/_/'gro ba 'di kun thugs rje'i bdag can des/_/bdag tu mdzad pa 'di la the tshom med/_/sems can ngo bor mthong ba 'di dag ni/_/mgon de bdag [#]nyid ci phyir
[\[88a.6\]]gus mi byed/_/'di nyid de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes byed yin/_/rang don yang dag sgrub byed 'di nyid yin/_/'jig rten sdug bsngal sel ba'ang 'di nyid de/_/des na bdag nyid rtag tu de nyid bya/_/dper na rgyal po'i mi 'ga' zhig_/skye bo mang la gnod byed kyang /_/skye bo mig rgyang ring po dag_/_
[\[88a.7\]]nus kyang slar gnod mi byed de/_/'di ltar de gcig ma yin gyi/_/rgyal po'i mthu stobs de yi mthu/_/de bzhin gnod byed nyam chung ba/_/'ga' yang khyad du gsad mi bya/_/'di ltar dmyal ba'i srung ma dang /_/thugs rje ldan rnams de yi dpung /_/des na dmangs kyis [#]rgyal gtum bzhin/_/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]sems can rnams ni mgu bar bya/_/rgyal po lta zhig khros na yang /_/sems can mi mgu byas pa yis/_/myong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa/_/dmyal ba'i gnod pa des byed dam/_/rgyal po lta zhig mgu na yang /_/sems can mgu bar byas pa [#]yi/_/thob par 'gyur ba [#]gang yin pa/_/sangs
[\[88b.2\]]rgyas nyid sbyin mi srid do/_/sems can mgu [#]las byung ba yi/_/ma 'ongs sangs rgyas 'grub lta zhog_/tshe 'di nyid la dpal chen dang /_/grags dang skyid gyur cis ma mthong /_/mdzes pa nyid dang nad med dang /_/rab dga' yun ring 'tsho ba dang /_/'khor los sgyur ba'i bde rgyas ni/_/'khor tshe
[\[88b.3\]]bzod pas thob par byed/_/byams sems ldan la mchod byas [#]gang /_/de ni sems can che ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas dang ba'i bsod nams gang /_/de ni sangs rgyas che ba nyid/_/de lta bas na zlo ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_byams pa [#]bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu brjod de/_/mchod pa tshad med rnam [#]mang
[\[88b.4\]]ji snyed pa/_/zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig gtams snyed du/_/skyes bu mchog la mchod pa de byas pas/_/byams pa'i sems la grangs dang char mi phod/_/ces bya ba'o[#]/_/de lta bas na sbyin pa'i gnas chen po de lta bu dag la khengs pa rtag tu spang bar bya/_khengs pa 'di ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid
[\[88b.5\]]la byed pa las byung ba'i phyir de la mi 'jug par sgrim par bya ste/_dkon mchog sprin las ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu [#]klog tu song ste/_rab tu dben par gnas
[\[88b.6\]]shing /_'di ltar bdag ni ma 'dres par gnas pa ste/_bdag ni rab tu dben pa na gnas pa'o/_/bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la zhugs pa'o/_/dge sbyong [#]ngam bram ze gzhan gang yin pa dag ni kun kyang 'dres pas gnas pa/_'du 'dzi mang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos
[\[88b.7\]]'dul ba las nyams pa'o snyam du sems mi skyed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/yang de nyid las 'di la byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni [#]brtson 'grus de'i ro myong [#]bar mi byed de/_brtson
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'grus des gzhan la mi smod bdag la mi stod [#]do/_/de 'di snyam du shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig bdag gi las la brtson pas gzhan la smod snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsnyems pa med pa'i brtson 'grus can
[\[89a.2\]]yin no zhes gsungs so/_/bsod nams bsrung ba mdor bsdus pa ni 'di yin te/_byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'o/_/ji skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las/_dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar
[\[89a.3\]]du bar mdor 'ga' yang zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na chu'i thigs pa rgya mtsho chen por lhung ba ni bskal pa'i mthar [#]thug gi bar du bar mdor zad pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las longs spyod dang bsod nams bsrung ba'i le'u ste
[\[89a.4\]]bdun pa'o//_//lus la sogs pa gsum bsrung ba bshad zin te/_da ni dag pa brjod par bya'o/_/ci'i don du zhe na/_lus ni rnam par sbyang [#]byas na/_/phan pa'i longs spyod 'gyur ba ste/_/'bras chan legs par tshos pa dang /_/gzeg [#]med lus can phan pa 'dra/_/'phags
[\[89a.5\]]pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las ji skad du gang yang grong khyer chen po dag gi dur khrod chen po srog chags brgya stong du mas gang bar gyur pa der yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bdag gi lus chen po shi zhing dus las 'das par ston to/_/der [#]sems can dud 'gro'i
[\[89a.6\]]skye gnas su gyur pa de dag gis [#]ji tsam 'dod par sha la zos nas tshe'i mthar phyin te 'chi ba'i dus su gyur cing shi nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye ba dang /_de dag gi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur ba gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon
[\[89a.7\]]lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/_sems can gang dag gis [#]bdag 'chi ba'i dus su gyur pa'i sha zos pa de dag la de nyid mtho ris su skye ba nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyi rgyur gyur cig ces gang gis [#]yun ring po nas smon lam btab ste tshul khrims dang ldan pa de'i bsam pa grub pa
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]dang don du gnyer ba grub pa dang smon lam grub pa yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/yang de nyid las de chos kyi skus rab tu phye bas na mthong bas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/thos pa dang reg pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do/_/zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste dper na/_sman
[\[89b.2\]]pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis rtsi thams cad bsdus te rtsi [#]shing mang po las bu mo'i gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa blta [#]na sdug pa legs par byas te legs par zin cing legs par byi dor byas pa de 'ong ngam 'gro'am 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal yang rtog pa med [#]cing rnam par rtog pa med do/_/der
[\[89b.3\]]nad pa gang dag [#]btsun pa btsun pa rgyal po'am [#]rgyal po'i blon po [#]chen po'am rgyal po'i bu'am tshong dpon nam khyim bdag gam blon po'am rgyal phran gang dag 'ong ba de dag sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis [#]sman gyi bu mo de dang de dag [#]phrad ma thag tu nad thams cad byang ste nad med cing bde ba las
[\[89b.4\]]nyams pa med par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros sman pa gzhan la med pa [#]sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis [#]'jig rten gyi nad gso ba'i shes pa la ltos[#]/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi skus rab tu phye ba yang sems can bud med dang skyes pa dang[#] khye'u dang bu mo 'dod
[\[89b.5\]]chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis yongs su gdungs pa ji snyed pa de dag gi [#]lus la reg na/_reg ma thag tu de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro/_/lus yongs su gdung ba dang bral bar yang shes so/_/'di ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyi sngon gyi smon lam
[\[89b.6\]]shin tu yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te[#]/_de'i don du lus sbyang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang /_ji ltar lo thog rtsas [#]khebs na/_/nad kyis [#]zhum zhing rgyas mi 'gyur/_/de ltar sangs rgyas myu gu yang /_/nyon mongs khebs na rgyas mi 'gyur/_/gnyen pos bsal na 'phel bar 'gyur/_/
[\[89b.7\]]zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/lus kyi dag pa gang zhe na/_sdig dang nyon mongs rnams sbyang [#]yin/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs tshul du/_/'bad pa med na nga song 'gro/_/de la sdig pa sbyang ba ni chos bzhi bstan pa'i mdo las bsten te/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro[#]/_/bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rnam par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa dang /_gnyen po kun tu spyod pa dang /_nyes pa las zlog pa'i stobs dang /_rten gyi stobs so/_/de la rnam
[\[90a.2\]]par sun 'byin pa kun tu spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i las spyod pa de la 'gyod pa mang ba yin no/_/de la gnyen po kun tu spyod pa ni mi dge ba'i las byas nas kyang dge ba'i las la [#]shin tu brtson pa'o/_/de la nyes pa las zlog pa'i stobs ni sdom pa yang dag par blangs pas mi byed pa'i sdom pa
[\[90a.3\]]thob pa'o/_/de la rten gyi stobs ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba dang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/_de stobs dang ldan pa la brten pas sdig pas zil gyis gnon par mi nus so/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de [#]dag
[\[90a.4\]]dang ldan na sdig pa byas shing [#]bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/_/de la rnam par smod pa kun tu spyod pa ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/_gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las ji skad bstan pa lta bu ste/_sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag_/thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/_/
[\[90a.5\]]gang dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/bzhugs [#]pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag gis sngon [#]chad sdig pa'i las/_/shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/_/stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mchis nas ni/_/de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin dang /_/sangs rgyas
[\[90a.6\]]rnams su mi 'dzin dang /_/dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/_/sdig pa bdag gis gan bgyis dang /_/phyug pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa dang /_/rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang /_/gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/nyes pa'i dmigs
[\[90a.7\]]su ma mthong bas/_/nyes pa bgyis pa'i las dang ni/_/nyes par bsags shing nyes smras pa'i/_/sdig las bdag gis gang bgyis dang /_/byis pa'i blo yis [#]'jug pa dang /_/mi shes mun pa'i sems dang ni/_/sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang /_/nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]dang /_/rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang /_/mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang /_/nor gyis ma [#]chog nyes pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/'phags min skye bo 'dre ba dang /_/phrag dog ser sna sgyu dang ni/_/g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis
[\[90b.2\]]dang /_/phongs dang rgud pa'i dus kyi tshe/_/'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang /_/phyug po [#]ma yin gyur pa yis/_/bdag gis [#]sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang /_/'dod dang khro ba'i [#]dbang dag dang /_/bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis/_/bdag gis [#]sdig pa
[\[90b.3\]]gang bgyis dang /_/bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang /_/bud med rgyu dang gos kyi phyir/_/nyon mongs gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/_bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi [#]sdig_/nyes spyad rnam par gsum bsags ni/_/'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa/_/de dag thams
[\[90b.4\]]cad bdag 'chags so/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams dang /_/de bzhin nyon thos rnams la yang /_/gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang /_/gus pa ma lags
[\[90b.5\]]bgyis pa rnams/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/dam chos smra ba rnams la yang /_/gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang /_/chos la'ang gus par [#]ma bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas/_/dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang /_/pha ma
[\[90b.6\]]rnams la ma gus dang [#]/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/blun pa [#]dang ni byis pa dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs [#]bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/bdag gis [#]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/_/stobs bcu rnams
[\[90b.7\]]la mchod par bgyi/_/bdag gis [#]phyogs bcu'i sems can rnams/_/sdug bsngal kun las gdon par bgyi/_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun/_/sa bcu la ni dgod par bgyi/_/sa bcu la ni gnas nas kyang /_/thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig_/ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]las/_/de kun mthar bgyi nus srid du/_/sems can re re'i phyir yang ni/_/bskal pa bye bar spyad par bgyi/_/gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/_/las rnams thams cad byang bgyid pa/_/zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di/_/sems can de dag bstan par bgyi/_/gang
[\[91a.2\]]gis [#]bskal pa stong rnams su/_/sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis/_/lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis/_/de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_/gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams/_/myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba/_/gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis[#]/_/bshags pa 'di dag bshags
[\[91a.3\]]nas ni/_/rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/_/sa bcu la ni gnas par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas yon tan snang bar bgyi/_/srid pa'i mtsho las bsgral bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang /_/yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de/_/sangs rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis/_/thams cad
[\[91a.4\]]mkhyen du rdzogs par bgyi/_/ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang /_/gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis/_/stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar bgyi/_/dgongs pa'i thugs kyis [#]sangs rgyas rnams/_/bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/_/
[\[91a.5\]]thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/nongs par rab tu gzung du gsol/_/bdag gis [#]bskal pa brgya rnams su/_/sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/_/de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems/_/phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir/_/sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyi/_/yid ni rtag tu dman
[\[91a.6\]]par gyur/_/gang dang gang du spyod [#]bgyid pa/_/bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rje ldan/_/'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs sel bas/_/nongs par rab tu gzung [#]du gsol/_/'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod/_/bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi/_/dri
[\[91a.7\]]ma de bzhin gshegs pas sol[#]/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis [#]bdag la ni/_/snying rje'i chu yis bkru bar gsol/_/sdig pa thams cad bshags par bgyi[#]/_/sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang /_/de ltar bdag gi sdig pa gang /_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/nongs
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun/_/slan chad mi bgyid bsdams [#]par bgyi/_/bdag gis nongs par bgyis pa gang /_/sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/_/de dag thams cad
[\[91b.2\]]bdag 'chags so/_/lus kyis [#]bgyis dang ngag gi las/_/yid kyis [#]rnam par bsams pa dang /_/las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/mi dge'i [#]las bcu spangs nas su/_/dge ba bcu po bsten [#]bgyis te/_/sa bcu la ni bdag gnas bgyi/_/
[\[91b.3\]]stobs bcu mchog tu 'gyur bar bgyi/_/bdag gi [#]sdig pa'i las gang dag_/mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/_/de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag gang [#]/_/'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu/_/gang rnams
[\[91b.4\]]dge ba'i las bgyid pa/_/de dag kun la yi [#]rang ngo /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang /_/bdag gis [#]bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/_/bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_/byang chub mchog la reg par bgyi/_/srid mtsho nyam ngar byis pas [#]blo yis ni/_/shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang
[\[91b.5\]]bgyis pa/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyan sngar [#]mchis nas ni/_/sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/_/skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang /_/'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar/_/lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so/_/
[\[91b.6\]]byis pa blun byas nyon mongs nyam nga dang /_/sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang /_/srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug mun pa nyam nga dang /_/dal ba'i [#]nyam nga dus kyi [#]nyam nga dang /_/bsod nams bsgrub pa nyam nga dag gis kyang /_/rgyal ba yang dag mngon sum
[\[91b.7\]]mchis nas ni/_/sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/_/zhes gsungs so/_/khyad par du na [#]byang chub sems dpa'i ltung ba lci ba dang yang ba rnams bshags pa ni 'phags pa nye ba [#]'khor gyis zhus pa las gsungs pa gang yin pa'o/_/ltung ba lci ba yang gang yin zhe na/_spyir de las
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]gsungs pa ni/_nye ba [#]'khor gal te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i ltung ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung la/_gang zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i [#]ltung ba gang yin pa ni gcig byung na byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[92a.2\]]theg pa brtsan par bya na/_de gnyis las gang zhe sdang dang ldan na ltung ba de ni shin tu lci'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nye ba [#]'khor zhe sdang gis ni sems can yongs su gtong bar byed la/_'dod chags ni sems can sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/nye ba [#]'khor de la nyon mongs pa gang sems can sdud
[\[92a.3\]]par 'gyur ba de la ni byang chub sems dpa' 'dzem pa'ang med 'jigs pa yang med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_nye ba [#]'khor de lta bas na khyod la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i ltung ba thams cad ni ltung ba ma yin par bshad do zhes bya'o/_/'di la dgongs pa gang zhe na/_sems can sdud pa nyid de
[\[92a.4\]]sngar bye brag tu byas pa'i phyir ro/_/bstan pa 'di ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang snying brtse ba dang ldan pa las yin te/_de nyid las de ma thag tu nye ba [#]'khor/_de la gang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni 'dod chags dang ldan pas 'jigs kyi zhe sdang dang ldan pas ni ma yin
[\[92a.5\]]no/_/nye ba [#]'khor byang chub sems dpa' gang dag thabs la [#]mkhas pa de dag ni zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i ltung bas 'jigs kyi 'dod chags dang ldan pas ni ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/thabs mkhas pa yang gang zhe na/_gang dag shes rab dang snying rje gnyis kyis sems can gtong ba [#]las
[\[92a.6\]]zlog pa'o/_/gnyi ga ltar yang sems can gtong bar 'gyur te/_shes rab gcig pus ni [#]sdug bsngal stong pa nyid du khong du chud pa'i phyir dang /_snying rje gcig pus ni nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis ring por [#]mi thogs par snying rje nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo
[\[92a.7\]]las kyang /_rigs kyi bu dper na/_gsang sngags dang rig sngags 'dzin pa'i mi'i rgyal pos bzung ste/_thag pa lnga'i bcing bas bcings su zin kyang de gang gi tshe 'gro ba 'dod pa de'i [#]tshe gsang sngags dang rig sngags kyi stobs bskyed pa gcig gis bcings pa thams cad
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]gtubs te 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa yang gang gi tshe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las dga' bar myong zhing de dag dang lang long du gyur pas [#]gnas kyang gang gi tshe 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe shes rab kyi stobs bskyed pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
[\[92b.2\]]kyi sems gcig gis 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad bcom nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o zhes gsungs so/_/zhe sdang la yang de ltar ci'i phyir 'dod par mi byed ce na/_rang bzhin gyis [#]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i phyir dang snying rje dang bral bas [#]na thabs nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro/_/yang
[\[92b.3\]]na gzhan gyi don grub pa rang gi [#]don las shin tu lci bar lhag par mos pa na/_khro ba la gnas pas kyang gzhan la rjes su bstan nas gdung ba sngon du 'gro bas de ma thag tu phyin chad mi byed pa'i sdom pa 'thob bo/_/gnod pa las bzlog pa'i phyir khros pa la nyes pa ci yod ce na[#]/_skabs phye
[\[92b.4\]]na de'i bag chags gsos par 'gyur bas snying rje nyams pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro/_/de bcad na rtsa ba 'chad par 'gyur ro zhes 'og nas bstan par bya'o/_/gal te sems can de la phan du zin kyang byang chub sems dpa' snying rje nyams pas sems can gyi don chen po'i rgyun nyams par
[\[92b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/'phags pa bden pa po'i le'u'i dpes ni [#]snying rje la gnas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/der ha cang snying rje [#]bkag pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten gyi don la mkhas pas 'jig rten pa [#]'dun par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/zlog pa [#]na yang gal te phan par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems
[\[92b.6\]]dpa' la khong khro bar gyur na/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin par 'gyur zhing gnyi ga la gnod par 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags kyang nyes pa yin te/_'dod pa dag la brten pa'i mi/_/ldongs 'gyur pha ma gsod par 'gyur/_/'dod bsten tshul khrims ldan pa'ang gsod/_/des na [# ]
[\[92b.7\]]rtag tu spang bar [#]bya/_/zhes bstan te/_bdag bde ba la chags pas ni gzhan gyi sdug bsngal yal bar 'dor bar mthong ngo [#]zhe na/_gang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bdag gi sdug bsngal du ma goms pa de la ni mthong ba bden te/_gang shin tu goms pa de la ni nyes pa gnyi ga mi 'byung ngo /_/zla ba
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/_dper na 'di la skyes bu la la zhig rkang pa [#]nas spyi bo'i bar du 'bar bar gyur [#]te rab tu 'bar zhing me lce gcig tu gyur pa de la/_skyes bu la la zhig der nye bar 'ongs te/_'di skad du kye skyes bu tshur shog/_/
[\[93a.2\]]lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par rtses shig [#]dga' bar gyis shig [#]dga' mgur spyod cig ces zer na kun dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/_skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par 'gyur te rtse ba dang dga' ba dang
[\[93a.3\]]dga' mgur spyod par byed dam/_kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo yongs su brtag pa bzung ste skyes bu de lus la me 'bar ba ma zhi bar 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang phrad cing ldan par 'gyur te/_rtse ba dang
[\[93a.4\]]dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyod du zin kyang de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sems can rnams ngan song gsum gyis [#]sdug bsngal bar gyur cing dbul ba dag mthong nas yid bde ba'am sems bde ba [#]ma byung ngo zhes rgyas par gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'jig rten na
[\[93a.5\]]yang bu gsal shing la bskyon [#]pa mthong ba [#]na pha ma la [#]rang gi tshul dang mthun par snying rje ba'i dbang gis rang gi bde ba la mi chags par snang ngo /_/dben pa zhig tu byas na khyo yod pa'am/_mgo gtsang ma [#]rigs dang chos dang rgyal mtshan gyis bsrungs pa la yang rung ste 'dod pa la log par g.yem par
[\[93a.6\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can gyi don du 'gyur la [#]sems can la yang mi gnod pa bsgrubs [#]na nyes pa med do/_/yang dag par tshangs par spyod pa rnams ni don byas pa'i phyir de dag lam srid la sogs pa bzhin du ring du spang zhing [#]mchod do/_/de lta na ni dge slong gis kyang bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta ma
[\[93a.7\]]yin te/_de bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa'i rnam pas sems can gyi don bsgrub pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las/_des dus dang dus ma yin pa btang snyoms su [#]bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/ci ste de las sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba lhag pa mthong na bslab pa
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]dbul lo/_/bskal pa mang por goms pas bdag nyid du gyur pa'i snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'dod chags kyis [#]bar du gcod par byed par 'gyur ram ci 'di ni mi srid pa nyid do/_/
[\[93b.2\]]thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las kyang bstan te/_bram ze'i khye'u skar ma lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs par spyod pa'i dbang du byas nas des gom pa bdun pa [#]la gnas te snying rje skyes nas bdag gi brtul zhugs 'di bshig ste/_sems can dmyal bar song bar gyur kyang sems can
[\[93b.3\]]dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de myong bar bzod kyi/_bud med 'di shir 'ong gis [#]bde bar gyur cig ces rigs kyi bu bram ze'i khye'u skar ma de slar log ste bud med de la lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas sru mo khyod ci 'dod pa bya'i [#]longs shig ces de skad ces [#]smras so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs
[\[93b.4\]]kyi bu nga 'dod pa ngan pa dang ldan pa'i snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba phyir bsnyil te spangs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan [#]gang dag sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba des byang chub sems dpa' thabs la [#]mkhas pa tshangs pa'i 'jig
[\[93b.5\]]rten du skyes pa la ltos zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bar [#]'gyur ba lta na/_ltung ba ji lta bu byung ba [#]bskal pa brgya stong du sems can dmyal bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i ltung ba byung yang bcom ldan 'das
[\[93b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba byung ba dang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de la spro ba nyid du bgyi ste[#]/_sems can gcig po de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btang ba dang yongs su bri bar ni mi bgyi'o zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[93b.7\]]thabs mkhas pa brgya la la la zhig tu sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gis nyes pa byung na de 'di ltar slob ste/_gal te bdag gis [#]phung po 'di dag gis [#]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya na ni bdag gi sems yongs su gdung ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur [#]gyis 'di ltar bdag gis sems can
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par gnas pa de lta bu'i go cha bgos la/_bdag gi [#]sems la gdung bar ni mi bya'i/_ji lta ji ltar 'khor bar 'khor bar [#]'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bgyi'o/_/ltung ba 'di yang chos
[\[94a.2\]]bzhin du gso bar bya'o/_/phyis nyes par [#]mi bya'o snyam du sems so/_/rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag [#]pa bzung na gal te rab tu byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po thams cad zhig par gyur kyang /_thabs la mkhas pa 'dis sel bar byed pa lta na/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[94a.3\]]la ltung bar mi 'gyur bar nga smra'o zhes gsungs so/_/'di ni dkon mchog sprin las kyang gsal ba nyid de/_mtshams med pa byed par 'dod pa'i mi gsad par gnang ba'i phyir ro/_/nyan thos kyi 'dul ba las kyang /_rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i gnas nyid la snying rje bas ri dgas la sogs pa btang bas
[\[94a.4\]]nyes pa med par gsungs so/_/gang byang chub sems dpa' la [#]'dod chags skyes nas bde 'gro 'thob [#]pa 'di ni 'dod chags yon tan can yin te khro ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/'phags pa thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las ji skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed la bu mo dpal yon can
[\[94a.5\]]gyi mchog chags par gyur ba'i dbang du byas nas/_/dga' byed smon lam phyi phyir 'debs pa ni/_/bud med gang dag chags sems kyis blta ba/_/de ni bud med lus kyang yongs spangs te/_/skyes bu spangs [#]pa'i sems can 'gyur bar [#]shog_/gang gis sems can gzhan dag dmyal 'gro
[\[94a.6\]]ba/_/des ni dpa' bo dag la chags bskyed na/_/mtho ris 'gro zhing skyes pa nyid 'gyur ba/_/de yi yon tan 'di 'dra kun dga' ltos/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_/su zhig rtsi rgyal grags pa chen po yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la zhe sdang skyed/_/de dag nyon mongs las kyang bde sbyin na/_/
[\[94a.7\]]de la bkur sti byed pa smos ci dgos/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar sems can gyi don gyi thabs gzhan med na/_'dod chags las byung ba'i nyes pa yang nyes pa ma yin par bshad do/_/thabs la mkhas pa'i mdo las kyang /_smad 'tshong ma ltar don byed [#]nas byang chub sems dpa' btang
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]snyoms rjes [#]su byed de sems can de 'dor ro zhes rgyas par gsungs so/_/sa thob pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyad pa la 'di bsam par bya'i gzhan la ni ma yin no/_/de ltar zhar la 'ongs pa yin te re zhig gzhag go/_/de'i phyir zhe sdang [#]skabs dbye bar mi bya'o/_/nye ba [#]'khor gyis zhus pa
[\[94b.2\]]las kyang bka' stsal [#]te/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i ltung ba gnyis te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' dang pos thog ma'i ltung ba sde bcu las lci ba
[\[94b.3\]]rnams bshags par bya'o/_/ltung ba yod pa sde lnga las lci ba rnams bshags par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu bud med kyi lag [#]nas 'dzin pa dang /_mig gis blta ba dang /_gnod sems kyang ltung ba ste gang zag gcig gam gnyis la yang bshags par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ltung ba dang /_
[\[94b.4\]]bud med las ltung ba byung ba dang lag pa las ltung ba byung ba dang khye'u las ltung ba byung ba dang /_mchod rten las ltung ba byung ba dang /_dge 'dun las ltung ba byung ba dang /_de las gzhan pa'i ltung ba lci ba [#]rnams ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa lnga la gcig pos nyin mtshan du ltung ba lci ba
[\[94b.5\]]rnams [#]bshags par bya'o/_/de la ltung ba bshags pa ni 'di lta ste/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas la skyabs [#]su mchi'o/_/chos la skyabs su mchi'o/_/dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o[#]/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la
[\[94b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdo rje snying pos rab tu 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin chen 'od 'phro la phyag 'tshal lo/_/klu dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo'i sde la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpal dgyes la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin chen me la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin chen zla 'od la phyag
[\[94b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/mthong ba don yod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin chen zla ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dri ma med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpas [#]byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshangs pas byin la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chu lha'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]dpal bzang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tsan+dan dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzi brjid mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mya ngan med pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sred med kyi bu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/me tog dpal la
[\[95a.2\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pas mngon par mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nor dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dran pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal
[\[95a.3\]]lo/_/mtshan dpal shin tu yongs bsgrags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa
[\[95a.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kun nas snang ba bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rin chen pad mos rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che [#]pad+ma la rab tu bzhugs te ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[95a.5\]]de dag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na [#]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed [#]bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/gang bdag gis [#]skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dag [# ]
[\[95a.6\]]thog ma ma mchis pa'i skye ba nas 'khor bar 'khor ba na/_sdig pa'i las bgyis pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_mchod rten gyi dang dge 'dun gyi dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi nor phrogs [#]pa dang /_'phrog tu stsal ba dang 'phrog pa la rjes su yi rang bar
[\[95a.7\]]gyur ba dang /_mtshams ma mchis pa'i las bgyis pa dang bgyid du stsal ba dang bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang /_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bzung ste spyod pa dang spyod du stsal ba dang rjes su yi rang bar gyur pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs nas [#]sems can dmyal
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]bar mchi ba'am/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i yul du mchi [#]ba'am/_yul mtha' 'khor gyi kla klo rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'am/_lha tshe ring por skye bar 'gyur [#]ba'am/_dbang po ma tshang bar 'gyur ba dang /_log par lta ba yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba la [#]mnyes par
[\[95b.2\]]mi bgyid pa'i las kyi sgrib [#]pa de dag [#]thams cad ye shes su gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa dpang du gyur pa tshad mar gyur pa'i [#]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen cing gzigs pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor bshags so/_/mthol lo/_/mi 'chab bo/_/slan chad kyang sdom par bgyi'o/_/sangs
[\[95b.3\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/gang bdag gis skye ba 'di dang skye ba gzhan dang thog ma ma mchis pa'i skye ba nas 'khor bar [#]'khor ba'i tshe[#]/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa la zan chang cig [#]tsam sbyin pa stsal ba dang /_tshul khrims bsrungs par gyur pa
[\[95b.4\]]dang /_gang [#]bdag gis tshangs par spyad par gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_gang bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bgyis pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang gang bdag gis byang chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_gang bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag [# ]
[\[95b.5\]]thams cad gcig tu bsdus/_gcig tu spungs bcal te/_mngon par bsdus nas/_bla ma'i yang bla ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yongs su [#]bsngos pa dang /_
[\[95b.6\]]ji ltar ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su bsngo ba de [#]bzhin du bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo'o/_/sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags so/_/bsod nams thams
[\[95b.7\]]cad kyi rjes su yi rang ngo /_/sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab bo/_/bdag bla na med pa'i ye shes su gyur cig_/mi mchog rgyal ba gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa dang /_/gang dag 'das pa dag [#]dang de bzhin gang ma byon/_/yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas rgya mtsho 'dra kun la/_/
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]thal mo sbyar ba [#]bgyis te skyabs su nye bar mchi/_/byang chub sems dpa'i [#]gang dag snying rje'i stobs ldan zhing /_/dpa' bo sems can rnams la phan phyir spyod byed pa/_/de dag rnams kyis skyabs med sdig byed bdag la skyobs/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnams la
[\[96a.2\]]bdag skyabs mchi[#]/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'[#]/_sangs rgyas sum cu so lnga 'di dag la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i yid la byed pas sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya'o/_/de de ltar sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pas/_
[\[96a.3\]]sems can rnam par [#]thar bar bya ba'i phyir de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams [#]zhal nye bar ston to/_/de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khrul pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshig 'bru sna tshogs rnam par [#]nye bar ston kyang chos kyi dbyings las mi g.yo'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar ro/_/
[\[96a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' [#]nyin mtshan du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi mtshan 'dzin pa dang yongs su brjod pa dang phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs klog pas ltung ba 'gyod pa las byung [#]ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin kyang thob pa gang yin pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
[\[96a.5\]]thams cad kyis [#]ltung ba 'gyod pa'i gnas rnam par sbyang bar mi nus so zhes gsungs so/_/rnam par sun 'byin pa kun du spyod pa bshad zin to/_/gnyen po kun du spyod pa bshad par bya ste/_de la mdo sde zab mo la brten pas kyang [#]sdig pa zad par 'gyur te/_rdo rje gcod pa las ji skad du rab
[\[96a.6\]]'byor rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'di lta bu'i mdo sde tshig 'di dag len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa de dag ni mnar bar 'gyur [#]shin tu mnar bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can de dag gi tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba'i
[\[96a.7\]]las ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ba dang mthun pa byas pa gang dag yin pa'i tshe rabs snga ma'i mi dge ba'i las de dag tshe 'di la mnar bas 'byang [#]bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/stong pa nyid la mos pas kyang sdig pa dag par 'gyur te/_de
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]mdzod kyi mdo las gsungs pa[#]/_'od srungs gang gis [#]pha yang yin la/_rang sangs rgyas kyang yin pa de [#]srog bcad na de'i [#]srog gcod pa'i [#]nang nas ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_dkon mchog gsum gyi dkor rku ba [#]'di ni ma byin par len pa'i nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/
[\[96b.2\]]'di lta ste ma yang yin la dgra bcom ma yang [#]yin pa de la log [#]par spyad pa 'di ni 'dod pa la log par spyod pa rnams kyi nang na [#]ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa 'debs pa 'di ni brdzun du smra ba'i nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun
[\[96b.3\]]la mi snyan pa brjod pa 'di ni phra ma'i nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste 'phags pa rnams la gnod pa 'di ni tshig rtsub po'i nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste chos 'dod pa rnams rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa 'di ni tshig kyal [#]pa'i nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste mtshams med pa byed par
[\[96b.4\]]shom pa 'di ni gnod sems kyi nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_yang dag par song ba rnams kyi rnyed pa 'phrog [#]pa'i sems 'di ni brnab sems [#]kyi nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/'di lta ste lta bas gzings pa 'di ni log par lta ba'i nang na ma rungs pa ste/_'od srungs 'di ni mi dge ba bcu'i
[\[96b.5\]]las kyi lam 'di ni kha na ma tho ba chen po [#]dang bcas pa'o/_/'od srungs gal te sems can gcig cig mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa 'di dag dang ldan par gyur la/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pas rgyu dang rkyen dang [#]ldan pa'i chos ston pa la 'jug ste/_'di
[\[96b.6\]]la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gang zag gam/_gang byed pa'am/_gang myong ba ni gang yang med do snyam nas/_chos thams cad ni byas pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'dus byas pa med pa dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa [#]med pa'i chos nyid dang /_
[\[96b.7\]]rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos nyid la 'jug cing /_chos thams cad gdod ma nas dag par yid ches te mos na/_sems can de dag [#]ngan song du 'gro bar nga mi smra'o zhes gsungs so/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i mdo las kyang /_'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]gang gis [#]ltung ba la ltung ba ma yin par mthong ba dang 'dul ba ma yin pa la 'dul bar mthong ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa la rnam par byang bar mthong ba dang /_'khor ba'i khams la mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mthong ba des las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag
[\[97a.2\]]pa thob po zhes gsungs so/_/dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po las kyang /_sdig pa'i gnyen po kun du spyad par gsungs te/_mig btsums la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems kyis yi ge brgya pa lan stong phrag brgyad bzlas brjod byas na[#]/_mig btsums
[\[97a.3\]]bzhin du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur/_sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na mchod rten la skor ba byed cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas par bya'o/_/sku gzugs dang dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gang yang rung ba zhig mdun du bzhag nas kyang [#]bskor zhing lan stong bzlas par
[\[97a.4\]]bya ste cho ga ni 'di nyid do zhes gsungs so/_/skul byed ma'i gzungs las kyang /_ji srid du sdig pa byad pa'i mtshan ma mthong ba de srid du bzlas brjod bya ste/[ #]rmi lam na zas ngan pa [#]skyug pa dang /_zho dang 'o ma la sogs pa 'thungs pa dang /_skyugs [#]pa dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba mthong ba dang /_nam mkha'
[\[97a.5\]]la 'gro ba dang /_me 'bar ba dang ma he dang mi nag po thub pa dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthong ba dang /_'o ma 'byung ba'i shing dang glang po dang khyu mchog dang /_ri dang seng ge'i khri dang khang bzangs kyi [#]steng du 'dzeg [#]pa dang /_chos nyan pa rmis na sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur te/_sdig pa byang bar
[\[97a.6\]]shes par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]gzungs kyi le'u las kyang gnyen po kun du spyod par [#]gsungs te/_dper na mi zhig ngan skyugs kyis [#]reg pa las legs par bkrus te khrus byas nas spos kyis byugs [#]na/_de'i dri nga ba med cing bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du
[\[97a.7\]]mtshams med pa lnga byed [#]pa'i sdig pa [#]de byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang yang mi dge ba [#]bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur la/_de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa rnyed nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku gzugs byed na de'i sdig pa yang mi mngon par 'gyur[#]/_bye brag tu ni byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]dang /_bye brag tu ni khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/me tog brtsegs pa'i gzungs las kyang gsungs te/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i [#]sangs rgyas pa lo
[\[97b.2\]]gcig gam lo brgya'am lo stong yang rung ste/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyis [#]yang dag par zin pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la me tog 'ga'
[\[97b.3\]]'bul [#]lam chu snyim pa gang tsam 'thor ram/_byug pa'i thig le 'dri 'am/_me tog gi [#]nyal nyil 'phyag [#]gam/_byug pa 'bul lam/_me tog [#]'bul lam/_bdug spos 'bul lam/_mar me 'bul te phul nas dga' ba'i sems kyis gom [#]pa'i gar stabs 'ga' bor te/_sangs rgyas
[\[97b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smra ba de dag ni/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba bskal par ram bskal pa brgya'am bskal pa stong du'am/_bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar [#]'gyur ba de'i gnas med do zhes gsungs so/_/sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i [#]mdo las
[\[97b.5\]]kyang /_gang dag yang bslab pa'i gzhi lnga po dag 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi bcu po dag 'dzin pa dang /_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa bslab pa'i gzhi bzhi brgya po dag 'dzin pa dang /_khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba'i dge slong gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi nyis brgya lnga bcu po
[\[97b.6\]]dag 'dzin pa dang /_dge slong ma gang dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga brgya po dag 'dzin pa ste/_gang dag ji ltar yongs su bzung ba'i bslab pa'i sdom pa de dag gi nang nas/_bslab pa'i gzhi gang yang rung ba zhig las nyams par gyur te/_ngan 'gro ngan song gis [#]'jigs skrag pa de dag bcom ldan
[\[97b.7\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla baiDUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/_de dag la ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o/_/bud med gang [#]la la bu btsa' [#]ba'i dus na sdug bsngal ma rungs pa drag po byung ba des/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de la mchod na de myur du yongs su thar bar 'gyur/_bu yang yan lag yongs su tshang bar btsa' zhing gzugs bzang ba dang mdzes pa dang /_blta na sdug pa dang /_dbang po rno ba dang /_blo dang ldan pa dang /_nad med cing gnod pa nyung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[98a.2\]]de la mi ma yin pas mdangs 'phrogs [#]par mi nus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo gang gi phyir nga [#]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs byed na/_de dag la ngan
[\[98a.3\]]song gsum gyi sdug bsngal med par shes par bya'o/_/[#]yon tan brjod par khyod dad dam yid ches sam/_yang na khyod sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo 'di la yid gnyis sam som nyi'am/_the tshom za ba [#]med dam de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol
[\[98a.4\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos rnams la yid gnyis sam som nyi'am the tshom 'tshal ba ma lags [#]so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi kun du spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' ba'i
[\[98a.5\]]slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gdugs dang dgung zla 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di gnyis ni dog sa la ltung yang gda'/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni gnas nas 'pho yang gda'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' ni gzhan du mi 'gyur lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags kyis kyang /_sems
[\[98a.6\]]can dad pa'i dbang po dang bral ba dag mchis te/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di thos na de dag 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar shin tu yon tan dang phan yon du 'gyur snyam nas de dag mi dad cing yid mi ches te
[\[98a.7\]]spong bas yun ring por gnod pa dang mi sman pa dang [#]yid mi bde ba dang rnam par ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan su'i rna lam du grag [#]par gyur pa de/_ngan 'gro ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ni gnas med de go [#]skabs
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]ma yin no/_/kun dga' bo sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ni yid ches par dka'o/_/kun dga' bo khyod dad cing yid ches par gyur pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin par blta'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams
[\[98b.2\]]ma gtogs par 'di nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la nye bar gnas te/_lo gcig gam zla ba gsum du bslab pa'i gzhi rnams
[\[98b.3\]]'dzin cing /_gad dag gi bsam pa 'di lta bus/_bdag gi [#]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nub phyogs gang na de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar shog shig ces smon lam de lta bu btab pa dag las/_gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
[\[98b.4\]]gshegs pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od de'i mtshan thos par gyur pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brgyad rdzu 'phrul gyis lhags [#]nas lam ston par 'gyur te/_de dag der pad+ma tshon kha dog sna tshogs rnams las rdzus [#]te skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la dag lha'i 'jig rten du
[\[98b.5\]]skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni/_der skyes nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de zad par mi 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas shi 'phos nas kyang [#]mi'i 'jig rten 'dir gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur te/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dge ba
[\[98b.6\]]bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par 'gyur ro/_/yang gzhan dag ni rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur/_bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag [#]dang /_khyim bdag shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim dag [#]dang /_nor dang 'bru dang mdzod dang bang ba mang po 'byor
[\[98b.7\]]pa'i khyim dag tu skye bar 'gyur te/_gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa dang /[# ]g.yog phun sum tshogs pa dang dpa' ba dang rtul [#]phod pa dang tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]mtshan thos shing bzung ba de'i bud med kyi dngos po de tha ma yin par shes par bya'o zhes gsungs so//_//bam po brgyad pa/_'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan las kyang /_ye shes bla ma 'od kyi tog_/de bzhin smon
[\[99a.2\]]lam blo gros dang /_/dbang po zhi dang 'jam dbyangs la/_/bdag ni gus pas [#]phyag 'tshal lo/_/su zhig byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa de [#]bud med kyi dngos por mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/gnyen po kun tu spyad pa mngon par bstan zin to/_/da ni nyes pa las bzlog pa'i
[\[99a.3\]]stobs brjod par bya ste/_'phags pa sa'i snying po'i mdo las ji skad du [#]gsungs pa lta bu ste/_srog gcod pa spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin te/_skrag par mi byed 'khrug [#]par mi byed spu zing zhes 'gyur bar mi byed do/_/de dge ba'i las kyi
[\[99a.4\]]rnam par smin pa de dang [#]srog gcod pa spong ba'i 'khor lo des sngon gyi mtha'i mu nas 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor lor zhugs shing 'khor ba'i chu ngos [#]khyer nas/_srog gcod pa'i rgyus lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi sgrib pa dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang chos kyi sgrib pa byas pa dang byed du bcug pa dang rjes su yi
[\[99a.5\]]rang ba gang yin pa thams cad 'joms te/_ma lus par [#]rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/_/de la rigs mthun pa'i lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/nad med pa dang tshe ring bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji srid 'tsho'i bar
[\[99a.6\]]du ma byin par len pa spangs par gyur cing sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin la gzhan la 'gran pa med pa dang 'khrug pa med par [#]rang gi rnyed pas chog shes shing /_chos ma yin pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des ma byin par len pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bar gyi las kyi sgrib
[\[99a.7\]]pa 'joms so/_/rab tu 'joms so/_/ma lus par [#]rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ba'i bar du byed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyis [#]rang gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs mi dge ba rnams 'joms par gsungs so/_/de skad du zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_gnod sems
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]spangs pas sdig pa zad par 'gyur ba 'byung ste/_ji skad du/_/'dir ni yang dag ma lags par/_/byis pa rnams kyis mtshang brus [#]dang /_/spyod [#]pa dag ni bzod bgyi ste/_/smod pa'ang 'dren pa dang du blang /_/byang chub sems dpas gzhan dag la/_/bdag gis gnod sems bskyed pa
[\[99b.2\]]dang /_/sngon [#]chad bdag gis [#]sdig pa'i las/_/bgyis pa rnams ni sbyang bar bgyi/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/nyes pa las zlog [#]pa'i stobs bshad zin to/_/rten gyi stobs brjod par bya ste/_'dir phag gi rtogs pa brjod pa dper bya'o/_/gang dag sangs rgyas skyabs dong ba/_/de
[\[99b.3\]]dag ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/mi yi lus ni spangs nas su/_/de dag lha yi [#]lus thob po/_/zhes gsungs te/_de bzhin du chos dang dge 'dun gyi dbang du byas te gdon to/_/'phags pa byams pa'i rnam par thar pa las kyang /_byang chub kyi sems kyis [#]sdig pa rnam par dag par [#]gsungs
[\[99b.4\]]te/_nyes pa byas pa thams cad bsregs pas sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me lta bu'o/_/mi dge ba'i chos thams cad zad par byed pas sa'i 'og lta bu'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dngul chu'i rigs gser du snang ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni srang gcig gis
[\[99b.5\]]kyang lcags srang stong gser du 'gyur ro/_/dngul chu srang gcig pa da [#]ni lcags srang stong po des zad par byas pa'am [#]lcags su bsgyur bar mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dngul chu'i khams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang ye shes kyis [#]bzung ba
[\[99b.6\]]gcig gis [#]las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i lcags thams cad zad par byas te/_chos thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu byed kyang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i dngul chu'i khams gcig po de ni las dang nyon mongs pa'i lcags thams cad kyis
[\[99b.7\]]kyang kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'am zad par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mar me gcig gis khyim mam khang bu ji lta bur bcug kyang rung ste bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags pa'i mun pa yang rnam par sel cing snang bar byed do/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]sems bskyed pa'i [#]mar me gcig gis kyang sems can gyi bsam pa'i thibs po ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ldan pa ji lta bu yang rung bar zhugs na zhugs ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong brjod du med par bsags pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang mun pa thams cad
[\[100a.2\]]rnam par sel zhing ye shes kyi snang ba skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i [#]cod pan thogs pa'i klu'i rgyal po chen po rnams la gzhan gyis [#]gnod par bya ba'i 'jigs [#]pa med do/_/de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje chen po'i nor bu rin po che'i [#]yid
[\[100a.3\]]bzhin gyi rgyal po'i [#]cod pan thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang /_ngan song dang ngan 'gros gnod par [#]bya ba'i 'jigs pa med do zhes bya ba'o/_/'phags pa nye ba [#]'khor gyis zhus pa las kyang gsungs te[#]/_nye ba [#]'khor 'di la theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub
[\[100a.4\]]sems dpa' gal te snga dro'i dus na [#]ltung ba byung ba [#]yang /_phyi dro'i dus na thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar gnas te/_de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po mtha' med do/_/gal te phyi dro'i dus na ltung ba byung ba [# ]
[\[100a.5\]]yang /_phye ma red [#]kyi dus na thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar gnas te/_de ltar na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mtha' med do/_/gal te phye ma red [#]kyi dus na ltung ba byung ba [#]yang srod la thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
[\[100a.6\]]dang mi 'bral bar gnas te/_de ltar na tshul khrims kyi phung po mtha' med do/_/gal te srod la ltung ba byung ba [#]yang nam phyed na thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar gnas te/_de ltar na tshul khrims kyi phung po mtha' med do/_/gal te nam phyed na ltung ba byung na yang tho rangs thams
[\[100a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar gnas te/_de lta [#]na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po'i mtha' med do/_/nye ba [#]'khor de lta na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]rung ba yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' 'gyod pas [#]kun nas ldang ba de skyes na ha cang yang [#]mi dga' bar mi bya'o/_/nye ba [#]'khor de la gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa [#]pa'i gang zag la/_ltung ba yang dang yang byung na/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po nyams par rig
[\[100b.2\]]par bya'o [#]zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las sdig pa sbyang ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs s+ho[#]//_//des na de ltar rgyun mi 'chad par sdug bsngal mang po dang ldan pa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims skye ba
[\[100b.3\]]bsrung zhing de ltar las kyi sgrib pa'i gegs sel ba des nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong ba la 'bad par bya'o/_/de la thog mar re zhig bzod par bya'o[#]/_/mi bzod pa ni skyo ba ni sron [#]mi nus pa'i phyir thos pa la sogs pa la brtson pa nyams par 'gyur zhing /_thos pa dang mi ldan pas ni bsam gtan
[\[100b.4\]]gyi thabs dang nyon mongs pa rnam par sbyong ba'i thabs kyang mi shes te/_de bas na skyo [#]ba med par thos pa btsal bar bya/_shes su zin kyang 'dren mar spyod pas mnyam par gzhag dka' bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir/_de nas nags su gnas par bya/_/der yang rnam par g.yeng ba zhi bar bya ba la
[\[100b.5\]]mi brtson pas sems mnyam par 'jog par mi 'gyur bas/_/mnyam par gzhag la brtson bya zhing /_/mnyam par bzhag pa'i 'bras bu ni nyon mongs pa sbyangs pa [#]ma gtogs pa ci yang med pas de'i phyir/_mi sdug la sogs bsgom par bya/_/de ltar 'di dag ni re zhig sdig [#]pa sbyong ba
[\[100b.6\]]bstan pa'i tshig go/_/da [#]ni bshad pa brjod do/_/de la bzod [#]pa ni/_chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las/_sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa dang chos la nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang gzhan gyis gnod pa [#]byas pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa'o zhes rnam pa gsum gsungs
