[\[100b.7\]]so/_/de la sdug bsngal nyams su len pa'i bzod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ni/_sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa nyid mi 'dod pa byung ba dang phrad pa dang /_rang gi bde ba la mngon par chags pa nyid 'dod pa'i gegs byed pa dang phrad pa ste/_de dag las yid mi bde zhing /_de las ni
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]sdang ba'am zhum pa nyid do/_/de bas na zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_bde ba la mi chags pa dang /_/sdug bsngal la mi skyo ba'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las kyang /_gang nang gi mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi
[\[101a.2\]]bde ba dang 'khrug pa de dag bzod cing dang du len to zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa drag shul can gyis [#]zhus pa las kyang /_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pas 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad la mnyam pa nyid thob par bya'o/_/des
[\[101a.3\]]longs spyod rnyed dam chung ma dang bu rnyed dam nor dang 'bru dang rdzas rnyed kyang khengs par yang mi bya'o/_/thams cad ma 'byor yang de zhum par yang mi bya yi mug par yang mi bya'o/_/des 'di ltar brtag par bya ste/_'dus byas thams cad ni sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu rnam par bsgrub [#]pas so sor nye bar
[\[101a.4\]]gnas pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/'di lta ste/_pha ma dang chung ma dang bran dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang mdza' bshes dang blon po dang nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams de dag ni las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin te/_bdag dbang ba ma yin la nga yang 'di dag gi ni [#]ma yin no zhes gsungs
[\[101a.5\]]so/_gzhan yang /_gal te bcos su yod na ni/_/de la mi dga' ba [#]ci dgos/_/de ste bcos su med na ni/_/de la mi dga' byas ci phan/_/bcos kyang yid mi bde [#]na ni/_/khro bas rgyal bas [#]'thad pa'am/_/zhum pa'i phyir na spro nyams pas/_/rgud pa chen pos zin par 'gyur/_/de la
[\[101a.6\]]yang dang [#]yang sems pas/_/tshe yang thung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de lta bas na goms pa las/_/gnod pa bzhin du don med spang [#]/_/yid mi bde ba spang ba [#]yang ji ltar goms par bya zhe na/_yang ba dang snyi ba'i sems spangs pa las te/_drag shul can gyis [#]zhus pa las ji skad du/_shing bal
[\[101a.7\]]gyi 'da' ba lta bu'i sems dang bral bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las kyang /_bu mo khyod kyis [#]nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub par dka' ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/mngon par zhen pa thams cad gzhom [#]pa'i phyir gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]sems bskyed par bya'o/_/mi mthun pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rgya mtsho'i glong 'khyil ba [#]lta bu bab pa rnams la mi 'khrugs [#]pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/goms par gyur na dka' ba cung zad kyang med de[#]/_'di ltar re zhig shin tu blun pa khur rtsa [#]ba dang nya pa dang zhing pa
[\[101b.2\]]la sogs pa dag kyang sdug bsngal la goms pa las 'bras bu shin tu chung ngu dang ldan pa'i dngos po la yang yun ring po nas rmad [#]du gyur pa'i mtshan ma can gyi sems mkhrang ba dang [#]/_sgyid lug pas zil gyis mi non na/_'khor ba'i bde ba thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa'i bde ba thams cad
[\[101b.3\]]dang bla na med pa'i go 'phang thob pa'i 'bras bu can gyi las la smos su yod dam ci/_'di ltar phal pa dag kyang cung zad gnod pa byed pa bdag gi nyes par byas pas bcom zhing rang nyid 'chi ba rnams la brdeg pa'i ched du/_drag tu brdegs [#]pa myong yang g.yul du 'jug na/_dus shin tu ring
[\[101b.4\]]por gnod pa byed pa dka' bas bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i nor bag tsam pa'i [#]rkun po dmyal ba nyid kyi gsod sar gsad bya'i gshed mar gyur pa srid pa'i btson [#]ra'i srung mar nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi phyir phyogs ma rung bar [#]byed pa rjes su mthun pa 'dra yang gnod pa drag po byed pa gnod pa ma byas par
[\[101b.5\]]dgrar gyur pa/_thog ma med pa'i bskal pa las [#]dam du 'brel ba'i sha 'khon can[#]/_nyon mongs pa'i dgra rnams la gzhom par spro ba'am sdug bsngal bzod par go ji ltar mi 'gyur te/_sa gsum las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir chas shing bdud kyi ri khrod pa'i bdag pos zin pa'i 'gro ba
[\[101b.6\]]gnang btson [#]thar bar bya ba'i phyir g.yul ngor zhugs pa ni khyad par du yang 'gyur ba kho na'o/_/de la sdug bsngal chung ngu la goms par bya ba sngon du btang na/_dka' ba dang shin tu dka' ba la yang goms pa 'grub ste/_dper na goms pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad sdug
[\[101b.7\]]bsngal la [#]bde bar 'du shes pa de bzhin du sdug bsngal 'byung ba thams cad la bde bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag pa goms pas bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'di'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu ni chos thams cad bde bas non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa yin no/_/
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]yab dang sras mjal ba'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la [#]bde bas non pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/_ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag
[\[102a.2\]]myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la sdug bsngal yang ma lags/_bde ba yang ma lags pa yang mi myong ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang /_mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar
[\[102a.3\]]gnas pa dang /_lag pa bcad dam rkang pa bcad dam/_rkang lag bcad dam/_rna ba'am/_sna'am/_rna [#]ba dang sna gtubs kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_sba lcag gis gzhus sam/_sba lcag phyed tshal lam/_lcag gis [#]gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
[\[102a.4\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_btson rar bcug gam/_lcags [#]sgrog dang shing sgrog tu bcug gam/_btson cha dam po la rgyas btab bam/_byis pa'i gtsug phud ltar bcings sam/_dugs kyi snod [#]ltar bdugs sam/_bu ram shing brdungs pa ltar brdungs sam[#]/_'dam bu gzhom [#]pa ltar bcom mam/_
[\[102a.5\]]'bru mar gyi mar me ltar [#]'bar bar byas sam/_mar gyi mar me dang /_zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_me'i nang du bor ram/_seng ge'i khar bstabs sam/_stag gi khar bstabs sam[#]/_de bzhin du sbyar te/_skam dril [#]bya ba ltar [#]dril tam/_
[\[102a.6\]]byi bo'i chad pa lta bus bcad dam/_nyes [#]pa byung ba bsgrags pa [#]ltar bsgrags sam/_kAR+Sha pa Na [#]tsam du gtubs sam/_'bras phye btso ba [#]ltar btsos sam/_glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_mig phyung ngam/_gsal shing gi rtse mo la
[\[102a.7\]]gzhag gam/_gsad pa'i gnas su khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo bcad kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te bde ba yang ma lags mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo /_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' [#]sems
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]dpa' chen po des/_yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_smon lam 'di ltar btab ste gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig_/gang gis bdag la skom blud pa de dag dang /_gang gis bdag la rim gror [#]byas pa dang bkur sti byas pa dang bsti
[\[102b.2\]]stang byas pa dang mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig_/gang yang bdag la gshe bar byed pa dang mi bde ba [#]byed pa dang rdeg pa dang mtshon gyis [#]'debs pa dang rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba
[\[102b.3\]]thob cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab ste/_de yid la bya ba [#]de dag dang ldan zhing /_de lta bu'i las dang de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la brten
[\[102b.4\]]zhing [#]bsnyen la bsgom zhing mang du byed de/_de las de'i rnam par smin pas chos thams cad la bde bas non pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob po/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bde bas non pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe bdud kyi las thams cad kyis mi
[\[102b.5\]]'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par 'gyur ro zhes rgyas par gsungs so/_/sbyor ba 'di ni gtong ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_bya bar dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad bsgrubs [#]pa dang /_bzod pa thams cad brtan [#]par byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus thams cad la nur ba med par
[\[102b.6\]]byed pa dang /_bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi yan lag gi tshogs thams cad la sbyor ba yin no zhes gsungs pa[#]/_de lta bas na rtag tu dga' bar bya ste/_zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las/_gus dang bcas shing yid ni rtag tu dga' bar bya[#]/_/zhi ba'i lta ba la ni rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/_/zhes ji skad
[\[102b.7\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las kyang gsungs so[#]/_/de la dga' ba chen po gang zhe na/_gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dran pa dang rjes su dran pa dang dga' ba dang /_dad pa dang mchog tu dga' ba dang sems ma gong zhing mi brdzi [#]ba dang srid pa
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]med pa dang /_'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad gtong ba dang /_chos kyi dga' ba thams cad kyi rten dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /_lus rab tu sim pa dang /_sangs rgyas la dga' zhing yid 'phar ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dga' zhing mos pas
[\[103a.2\]]mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po'i rkyen tshol ba la mkhas pa dang /_dge ba'i chos mnyan pas mi skyo ba dang /_de kho na'i chos la brten pa'i nan tan dang /_dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa dang rab tu dga' bas chos la mos pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can rnams la khong khro ba
[\[103a.3\]]med pa'i blo dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba la 'dun pa dang /_chos la 'dun pa de yang mi 'dor ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po la mos shing rnam par grol ba dang /_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa dang ma 'dres pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_ser sna med pas ma zhum par sems bskyed pa dang /_nor
[\[103a.4\]]gang sems kyis [#]sbyin 'dod pa de sbyin zhing byin nas kyang [#]'khor gsum dag par yongs su sbyangs pa dang /_sbyin pa la dga' ba dang /_tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la rtag tu dang ba dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa rjes su 'dzin cing byams pa dang /_bdag gi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /_ngan
[\[103a.5\]]'gro'i 'jigs pa thams cad las shin tu 'das par dbugs 'byin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi [#]bsngo ba dang /_brtan zhing mi phyed pa dang /_pha rol gyis ngan par brjod pa dang ngan par smras pa'i tshig gi lam la khong khro ba med pa'i sems nyid dang /_bzod cing nges pa dang /_
[\[103a.6\]]nga rgyal med pa dang /_bla ma la 'dud cing rim gro byed pa dang /_rtag tu bzhin 'dzum pa dang /_khro gnyer med pa dang /_sngon du gsong por smra ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa med pa dang /_kha gsag med pa dang /_thob kyis [#]'jal ba med pa dang /_bsam pa dag pa dang /_sems la brlang ba med pa dang /_gya
[\[103a.7\]]gyu [#]med pa dang /_thams cad la legs par lta [#]ba dang /_skyon med par lta ba dang /_ltung ba mi gleng ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa ltar phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_chos rnams la bdag bzhin [#]phangs par
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]'dzin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams [#]la srog bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_bla ma la pha ma bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_sems can rnams la bu bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon la sangs rgyas bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_nan
[\[103b.2\]]tan la yan lag gi dam pa mgo bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rkang lag bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_chos smra ba rnams la rin po che thams cad bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yid bzhin gyi nor bu bzhin du [#]phangs
[\[103b.3\]]par 'dzin pa dang /_rjes su bstan pa la dga' ba'i rtsed mo bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_chog shes pa la nad med pa bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_chos tshol ba la sman bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_skul zhing dran par byed pa la sman pa bzhin du phangs par 'dzin pa ste/_de ltar gang
[\[103b.4\]]dbang po thams cad la dbang po ma gong ba 'di ni dga' ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/'di la bslabs [#]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/_'phags pa sprin chen po'i mdo las/_sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal
[\[103b.5\]]ba'i 'gro ba la sems shing rtag tu bsam pa gtong ba'i ngang tshul can du'ang 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i tshong rdal gyi tshong par yang 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i 'thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba'i me la sems rgyas par 'gyur zhes
[\[103b.6\]]gsungs pa'i tshig 'dis brgyan [#]par byed do/_/sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa bshad zin to/_/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang bzod pa rnam pa gsum bstan [#]te/_blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la byang chub sems dpa' [#]sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen par sems
[\[103b.7\]]bskyed pa rin po che de ltar bskyed nas/_'phags pa ma yin pa tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams sam/_bdud rnams sam/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams sam/_bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams sam/_bdud kyi pho nya rnams kyis [#]gtses sam rnam par gtses sam bskyod
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]dam kun tu bskyod dam/_dkrugs [#]sam kun tu dkrugs sam/_spyos [#]sam bsdigs sam brdegs [#]kyang /_byang chub tu bsam pa'i sems [#]bskyed pa de las mi phyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu thar bar byed pa'i snying rje chen pos/_/brtson 'grus
[\[104a.2\]]brtsams pa las mi phyed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi [#]rigs mi 'chad par bya ba la brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sbyor ba las mi phyed pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su bsgrub par 'gyur ba'i [#]bsod
[\[104a.3\]]nams kyi tshogs bsags pa las mi phyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba mngon par bsgrub par brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /_lus dang srog 'dor zhing dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par mngon par brtson pa las mi phyed pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba
[\[104a.4\]]la mngon par brtson zhing bdag bde ba la mi chags pa las mi phyed pa ste/_de de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas/_sems can thams cad kyis [#]co dris kyang bzod/_thing slad byas pa dang /_smad pa dang /_bshung ba byas kyang bzod/_/sems can thams cad kyis
[\[104a.5\]]mtshang brus sam spyos sam/_bsdigs sam/_ngan du brjod dam/_ngan du smras pa'i tshig gi lam kyang [#]bzod/_sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa yang bzod/_sems can thams cad kyi khur yang bzod/_sgrol bas kyang skyo ba med/_zhum pa med/_kun du zhum pa med/_sgyid lug pa med/_yi [#]chad
[\[104a.6\]]pa med/_stobs nye bar ston par byed/_mthu skyed par byed cing brtson 'grus rtsom par byed [#]la/_brtul bas brtul [#]bar byed de de [#]spro ba skyed cing rmongs pa'i sems mi 'dzin to/_/mtshang brus kyang slar mtshang mi 'bru ba dang /_brdegs [#]kyang slar mi rdeg[ #]/khros kyang slar mi khro/_/gshe ba la slar mi
[\[104a.7\]]gshe ba ste/_de ltar sems 'grang ba'i go cha gyon no/_/'di lta ste theg pa chen po'i mdo 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'i theg pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can de dag ni rgyun gyi rjes su 'gro ba dag go/_/bdag ni rgyun las ldog par rtsol bar 'dod pa'o/_/sems can de dag ni
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]phan tshun mi mthun pa dag go/_/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi mi mthun pa spang pa'i phyir go cha ba gos pa'o/_/sems can de dag ni gnod sems la dpa' bdag go/_/bdag ni [#]bzod pa dang des pa yongs su tshol ba'o/_/sems can de dag ni gcig la gcig 'drid cing yongs su
[\[104b.2\]]'drid par [#]gnas pa dag go/_/bdag ni shes rab kyis ngoms pa yongs su tshol ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/[# ]gal te phyogs bcu'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu phye ba'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/_ral gri dang shag ti dang mdung thung dang mtshon rtse gnyis pa la sogs pa lag na thogs te
[\[104b.3\]]bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang yang sa phyogs gang du 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag gam nyal yang rung ste byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_sbyin pa'i sems sam/_tshul khrims kyi sems sam/_bzod pa'i sems sam/_brtson 'grus kyi sems sam/_bsam gtan gyi sems sam/_
[\[104b.4\]]shes rab kyi sems sam/_thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der bdag [#]lus rgya shug gi lo ma'i brgya cha tsam du gtubs sam rnam par gtor ram/_rnam par bcom mam/_sems can de dag thams cad las gzhan mi byed par rgyun du gshe'am/_bsdigs
[\[104b.5\]]sam/_smod dam/_bshung ngam/_tshig ngan pa dang /_ngag rtsub po smra bar gyur kyang bdag gis [#]sems can 'ga' la yang 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon gyi mtha' nas 'khor ba tshad med par byas te/_gang du bdag gi lus 'di sems can dmyal bar song ngam/_dud
[\[104b.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas su song ngam/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du song ngam/_mir gyur kyang rung ste/_'dod pa'i zas kyi dri mas dri ma can du gyur nas chos thos pa dang mi ldan zhing /_yang ba'i 'tsho ba'i spyod yul don med pas 'tsho ba can du 'gyur te/_yan lag dang nying lag rnam pa brgyar gshegs shing
[\[104b.7\]]gtubs te phye zhing phral la bya ba rnam pa mang po byas kyang bdag gis [#]gzhi de las bdag gi don byas kyi/_gzhan gyi don ma byas kyi [#]gal te sems can de dag thams cad kyis phyi ma'i [#]mthar bdag gi lus gshegs [#]gtubs rnam par gtor rnam par [#]bcom pa de lta bur gyur kyang bdag gis [# ]
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/dge ba'i chos 'dod pa yongs su mi gtong [#]ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lus gtubs pa'i lus kyi gnod pa 'di thams cad kyis [#]ni sems can dmyal ba [#]pa'i sdug bsngal gyi
[\[105a.2\]]brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/bdag ni sems can dmyal bar gnas par [#]spro'i bdag gis [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos gtang [#]bar ni mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang gi gzhi las gnod sems byung ba'i chos de bdag gis [#]spang bar bya'o snyam mo/_/chos de gang
[\[105a.3\]]zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus la dga' ba dang lus la gnas pa dang lus la chags pa ste/_lus gtang [#]na gnod sems kyang gtong ngo /_/blo gros rgya mtsho de ltar chos 'grang ba la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi gnod pa bzod de mi skyo [#]mi khro'o/_/_
[\[105a.4\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_blo gros rgya mtsho de la thabs mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros rgya mtsho ji ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus gcod pa na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs
[\[105a.5\]]su rdzogs par 'gyur zhe na/_gang lus 'dor ba dang lus yongs su gtong ba dang lus la mi lta ba 'di ni/_de'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus gcod pa na sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa dang /_tshor ba rnams kyis mi 'phrogs [#]pa 'di ni de'i tshul khrims kyi pha
[\[105a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus yongs su gcod pa na gang dag de'i lus gcod pa de dag nyid rab tu thar bar bya ba'i phyir bzod [#]cing sems kyis rma mi [#]'byin te/_bzod pa'i stobs nye bar ston pa 'di ni de'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/brtson 'grus gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa de la 'dod pa mi 'dor
[\[105a.7\]]zhing sems kyi stobs bskyed pa yang rab tu 'dzin la/_'khor ba'i rjes su yang 'brang zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba brtsam pa yang rtsom pa 'di ni/_de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus rnam par 'dor ba na thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed [#]pa rin po che de mi brjed cing byang chub nyid la lta ba
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]dang /_zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba la so sor rtog pa 'di ni de'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/gang lus gcod pa na lus la rtswa dang rtsig pa dang shing dang rdo dang mig yor lta bur so sor rtog cing /_lus la sgyu ma'i chos nyid du 'jug pa dang yang dag par na mi rtag pa nyid dang yang dag par na sdug
[\[105b.2\]]bsngal ba nyid dang yang dag par na bdag med pa nyid dang /_yang dag par na zhi ba nyid du lus la rtog pa 'di ni/_de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzhan yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can [#]'di ni le lo can dge ba'i chos dang bral ba ste/_de ni bdag la mtshang 'bru [# ]
[\[105b.3\]]zhing gshe ba'o/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus brtsam par bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su btsal bar brtson pa la mi ngoms par bya ste/_sems can 'di byang chub kyi snying por sngar je 'dug par byas la/_phyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/_/
[\[105b.4\]]snyam du de ltar go cha gyon pa 'di ni/_de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems can ma dul ba/_ma zhi ba/_ma sbas pa/_nye bar ma zhi ba/_'di lta bu 'di dag gi don du bdag gis [#]go cha chen po bgos te/_'di ltar sems nges par sems su gzhug go snyam pa 'di ni/_de'i
[\[105b.5\]]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bdag ni chos nyid la brten par bya'o snyam nas/_de la gshe ba dang khro ba su yin zhes des yongs su tshol ba na gang gshe ba dang khro ba'i chos de mi dmigs so/_/de bdag dang gzhan mi dmigs pas dmigs par lta ba dang bral bar bzod pa
[\[105b.6\]]'di ni/_de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang gsungs te/_'di ltar bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad kyi rtsod pa dor bar bya ba yin no[#]/_/bdag nyid rtsod par byed dam/_bdag gang smra ba la slar smra na ni/_bdag gis ma rnyed pa dang nyes pa
[\[105b.7\]]rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bdag gis [#]ni sems can thams cad kyi zam pa lta bur bya [#]na/_bdag gzhan la khyod ces bya ba'i tshig gam tshig rtsub po smra bar bya ba'am/_'di ni bdag gis smra bar mi bya ste/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa'i nang du bdag gis bem po lta bu dang /_lug ltar lkugs pa lta bur bya'o/_/_
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gzhan gyis ngan du smras pa dang ngan du brjod pa'i tshig gi lan [#]thos na sems kyi kun du gnod sems su mi bya'o/_/bdag gis gzhan dag la gang gzhan gyis nyes pa gzhan skyes [#]na de ni bdag la legs pa ma yin pa dag gi cha ma yin no/_/gang bdag gis gzhan dag gi [#]nyes
[\[106a.2\]]pa gzhan mnyam par bsams pa de ni bdag gi cha ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis [#]bsam pa rnam par 'khrugs [#]par mi bya'o/_/'di ltar bdag gis ni sems can thams cad bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bya zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu [#]mngon par
[\[106a.3\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar [#]bya ste/_mya ngan las 'das par bya ba yin na/_de la bdag gnod sems su byed dam/_shin tu nyes pa byas kyang gzhan dag la gnod sems mi bya ba yin na de la bdag gti mug tu 'gyur ram/_'di ni bdag gis bya ba'i cha yin te/_brtul ba brtan par brtul bar bya'o/_/srog
[\[106a.4\]]gi bar chad byed kyang bdag gis 'khrugs par mi bya'o/_/bdag gis [#]khro gnyer can gyi bzhin dbyung bar mi bya'o zhes de ltar sems bskyed do zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las kyang /_sems can gang dag khros pa de dag la dbugs 'byin to yid phebs par byed do bzod
[\[106a.5\]]pa gsol lo rjes su mthun par byed do/_/chos kyis tshim par byed do zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las/_bzod pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de ltar bzod pa la gnas nas thos pa la brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_gzhan du na de'i thos pa chud za ba nyid du 'gyur te/_zla
[\[106a.6\]]ba sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/_ji snyed chos rnams mang po chub byas kyang /_/thos pas rgyags nas tshul khrims mi srung [#]ba/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa ngan 'gror gang 'gro ba/_/de la mang du thos pas skyob mi nus/_/zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/mang du thos pa'i bsngags pa ni sred med kyi bus zhus pa'i
[\[106a.7\]]mdo las gsungs te/_'di ltar rigs kyi bu thos pa dang ldan na shes rab 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/shes rab dang [#]ldan na nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/nyon mongs pa med pa la bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/de las yang drang srong chen po bla ma'i skyes pa'i rabs [#]rgya cher mdzad
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]nas gsungs te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gus pa dang bcas pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag zhal nye bar ston to/_/chos kyang thos par mdzad do/_/dri ma med
[\[106b.2\]]pa'i gzi brjid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dod pa dag [#]la ni chos kyi gter ri sul dang shing gi nang du bcug pa dang chos kyi glegs bam du gyur pa mtha' yas pa dag kyang lag mthil du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[106b.3\]]dpa' [#]chen po chos 'dod pa rnams la sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams spobs pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_tshe yongs su zad na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang lha rnams tshe dang stobs nye bar sgrub po/_/de dag sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs [#]dang lha'i byin gyi rlabs [#]kyis
[\[106b.4\]]'dod na lo stong du yang gnas so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_bskal pa'am bskal pa'i lhag ma nas ji tsam du 'dod pa de tsam du gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la gus pa bskyed [#]pa rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rga ba yang sel bar mdzad do/_/nad kyang sel
[\[106b.5\]]bar mdzad do/_/dran pa nye bar sgrub bo/_/rtogs pa dang dang blo gros dang spobs pa yang nye bar sgrub bo/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lta bar gyur pa yang sel to/_/yang dag par [#]lta ba yang nye bar sgrub bo/_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la gus pa rnams la pha rol gyi
[\[106b.6\]]gnod pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thos pa'i tshogs [#]mkhas pa la mngon par brtson par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/thos pa'i rnam pa ji lta bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba la bsngags she na/_'phags pa blo gros
[\[106b.7\]]mi zad pas zhus pa'i mdo las/_thos pa'i rnam pa ni brgyad cu ste/_'di lta ste/_'dun pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dang /_sbyor ba'i rnam pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rnam pa dang /_nga rgyal med pa'i rnam pa dang /_bag yod pa'i rnam pa dang /_ri mor
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_mthun pa'i rnam pa dang /_bka' blo bde ba'i rnam pa dang /_bsnyen bkur byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_rna blags te nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_yid la byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi g.yeng ba'i rnam pa dang /_gnas kyi [#]rnam pa dang /_rin po cher 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[107a.2\]]sman du 'du shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_dran pa'i snod kyi rnam pa dang /_shes pa rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang /_blo gros rtogs [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_blo la 'jug pa'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos la mi ngoms par nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_gtong ba spel
[\[107a.3\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_dul zhing cang shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_mang du thos pa la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_gus par dga' ba myong [#]bar byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_lus bde ba'i rnam pa dang /_sems rab tu [#]dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /_mi skyo bar nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_don nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_
[\[107a.4\]]nan tan nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_gzhan gyis [#]bstan pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_chos ma thos pa [#]nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par shes pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_rin po che nyan pa'i rnam pa dang [#]/_byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[107a.5\]]sde snod nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa [#]nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_dran pa dang shes bzhin nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi skye ba la mkhas pa nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_mi [#]sdug
[\[107a.6\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_byams pa'i rnam pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam pa dang /_mi rtag [#]pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /_zhi ba'i rnam pa dang /_stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang /_smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang /_mngon par 'du mi byed
[\[107a.7\]]pa'i rnam pa dang /_dge ba'i [#]mngon par 'du [#]byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_bden par [#]byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnam pa dang /_chung mi gzan pa'i rnam pa dang /_rang dbang gi [#]rnam pa dang /_bdag gi [#]sems srung ba'i rnam pa dang /_brtson 'grus mi gtong ba'i rnam pa dang /_chos la nges par rtog pa'i rnam pa dang /_nyon
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]mongs pa'i gnyen po'i rnam pa dang /_bdag gi phyogs srung ba'i rnam pa dang /_pha rol gyi phyogs dang nyon mongs pa tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /_nor bdun la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_dbul ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i rnam pa dang /_mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rnam pa dang /_mkhas pa [#]mngon
[\[107b.2\]]par dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pas kun shes pa'i rnam pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa rnams mos par byed pa'i rnam pa dang /_bden pa mthong ba'i rnam pa dang /_phung po'i nyes pa spang ba'i [#]rnam pa dang /_'dus byas kyi nyes pa yongs su 'jal ba'i rnam pa dang /_don la brten pa'i rnam pa
[\[107b.3\]]dang /_chos la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_ye shes la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la brten pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad mi bya ba'i rnam pa dang /_bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i rnam pa dang /_legs par byas pa'i las kyi rnam pa dang /_mi 'gyod pa'i rnam pa dang /_bye brag
[\[107b.4\]]tu 'gro ba'i rnam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'thob pa'i rnam pa ste/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi [#]thos pa'i rnam pa brgyad cu zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_gang chos kyi tshogs la sbyor ba de ni de'i ye shes kyi tshogs yin no/_/de la chos kyi tshogs su sbyor ba
[\[107b.5\]]gang zhe na/_gang 'di ni don nyung ba dang smra ba nyung ba dang yo byad nyung ba dang srod dang tho rangs la mi nyal zhing rnal 'byor la brtson pas/_thos pa'i don la rtogs pa dang /_yang dang yang tshol ba dang /_sems la rnyog pa med pa dang /_sgrib pa rnams gnon pa dang /_ltung ba rnams las 'byung ba
[\[107b.6\]]shes shing 'gyod pa med pa dang kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /_nan tan snying por byed pa dang /_chos la gzhol pa dang /_chos la 'bab pa dang /_chos la bab pa dang /_mthu dang ldan pa dang /_ye shes tshol ba la mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu dang /_de la ma chags par gnas pa dang /_tshul khrims [#]mi
[\[107b.7\]]lhod pa dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_bye brag tu 'gro ba dang /_'du 'dzi la mi dga' ba dang /_gcig pur [#]dga' ba dang /_dgon pa la mngon par phyogs shing yid la byed pa dang /_'phags pa'i rigs kyis [#]chog shes pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan las mi g.yo ba dang /_chos kyi dga' ba
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]la dga' zhing mos pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i sngags dran par mi byed pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos tshol ba dang /_dran pa nyams pa med pa dang /_don rtogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /_blo gros kyi lam dang mthun pa dang /_bstan [#]pas sdom pa dang /_rkyen gyis ye
[\[108a.2\]]shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba dang /_khrel yod pa dang ngo tsha shes pas brgyan pa dang /_ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba [#]lhur byed pa dang /_mi shes pa sel ba dang /_ma rig pa dang /_gti mug gi mun pa dang rab rib kyi mun pas chod pa bsal ba dang /_shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang /_blo shin tu rnam par dag
[\[108a.3\]]pa dang /_blo rgya che ba dang /_blo ma zhum pa dang /_blo ma gyes pa dang /_mngon sum du shes pa dang /_yon tan gzhan la rag ma lus pa dang /_bdag gi yon tan mi bsnyems pa dang /_gzhan gyi yon tan kun la brjod pa dang /_legs par bya ba'i las byed pa dang /_las kyi [#]rnam par smin pa dang 'gal
[\[108a.4\]]bar mi byed pa dang /_las yongs su dag pa'i ye shes 'di ni/_btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi tshogs mi zad pa zhes 'byung ngo [#]/_/ci mnyan par bya zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]ye shes shin tu rgyas pa'i mdo las/_don dang bcas pa'i gzhon nu rtse ba'i
[\[108a.5\]]bstan bcos [#]rnams bslab par bya'o/_/don med pa rnams yongs su spang bar [#]bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten rgyang 'phen [#]pa'i bstan bcos rnams dang /_chad pa'i tshul gyi [#]bstan bcos rnams dang /_byad stems kyi [#]bstan bcos rnams dang /_smra ba'i rig pa'i bstan bcos rnams dang /_
[\[108a.6\]]gzhon nu rtse ba'i bstan bcos rnams dang /_rmugs byed kyi rig pa'i bstan bcos rnams so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de las gzhan pa gang ci yang rung ste/_rnam par thar pa dang mi mthun pa'i bstan bcos shes pa rmongs par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
[\[108a.7\]]zhugs pas spang bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar thos pa dang ldan pa sems sbyang [#]ba'i phyir dgon par gnas par bya'o/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa la yang khyim gnang ba ji ltar yin zhe na/_'bad pa dang ldan mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/'o na gzhan
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]gyi chung ma la yang ltung ba med par 'gyur ro/_/de ni ma yin te/_de dag la mi nus su zin kyang rang bzhin gyis [#]skyon du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/khyim du gnas pa ni bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las/_brtson 'grus kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//_
[\[108b.2\]]de ltar na drag shul can gyis zhus pa'i tshul gyis khyim gyi [#]skyon rnams bsgoms te dgon pa la gnas par bya'o zhes bya bar gnas so/_/ji skad du zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las/_/'dod pa dag ni rab tu sten byed cing /_/bu dang chung ma dag la sred byed na[#]/_/smad par bya ba'i khyim la brten pa de/_/nam yang bla
[\[108b.3\]]med byang chub mchog mi 'thob/_/gang dag 'dod pa lci skam me bzhin spong /_/bu dang chung ma dag la sred spangs nas/_/khyim gyis skrag ste khyim nas mngon byung ba/_/de dag byang chub mchog 'di rnyed mi dka'/_/gang dag [#]khyim na gnas par byed bzhin du/_/byang chub dam pa mchog 'di 'thob pa yi/_/
[\[108b.4\]]sangs rgyas gang dag sngon chad ma byung ste/_/ma 'ongs pa na'ang mi 'byung gnas pa med/_/rgyal srid mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin spangs nas/_/dben pa 'dod des [#]dgon par gnas byed pa/_/nyon mongs spangs nas bdud ni bcom [#]nas su/_/byang chub rdul med 'dus ma byas 'tshang rgya/_/de bzhin du
[\[108b.5\]]sbyar te/_rab tu byung nas chos spyod ci 'dra ba/_/zas dang skom dang de bzhin gos rnams dang /_/me tog spos dang phreng ba rnams kyis ni/_/khyu mchog rnams [#]la bsnyen bkur byas mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig byang chub rab tu 'dod byed cing /_/'dus byas ngan las yid byung sems can gyi/_/don du dgon
[\[108b.6\]]par phyogs te gom bdun bor/_/'di ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gal te skal ba mi 'dra ba'i sems can la rjes su chags [#]pa dang 'khor 'dod pa dang rnyed pa la sogs pa 'dod pas dben pa'i phyogs na sdod na/_de'i phyir 'di las gsungs pa/_'di dag
[\[108b.7\]]bdag la gnod sems ldan pa zhes/_/mkhas pas [#]byis pa rnams dang rtsod mi byed/_/bsti stang byas te byis pa yongs su spong /_/byis pa'i chos la 'dris par yongs mi byed/_/byis pa ji srid yun rings [#]legs bsten kyang /_/de dag phyir zhing mi mdza' 'gras 'gyur zhes/_/byis pa'i ngo
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]bo nyid kyi [#]rgyus shes nas/_/mkhas pa byis pa dag dang sten [#]mi byed/_/byis pa rang bzhin ngo bo tha dad de/_/so so'i skye bo rnams la mdza' med ces/_/byis pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid shes nas/_/mkhas pa 'dir byis pa rnams la yid mi rton/_/chos dang mthun pa'i tshig gis[ # ]
[\[109a.2\]]smras gyur kyang /_/khro dang zhe sdang yid mi ches ba dag_/rab tu smra ste 'di ni byis pa'i chos/_/don de rnam par shes nas yid mi rton/_/byis pa rnams ni byis pa dag dang mtshungs/_/dper na ngan skyugs dang ni ngan skyugs bzhin/_/mkhas pa rnams ni mkhas pa dang lhan cig ste/_/mar dang mar gyi nyid
[\[109a.3\]]khur mtshungs pa bzhin/_/zhes bya'o/_/de skad du yang de nyid las/_/gang dag dga' dang mi dga' cung zad med/_/de dag mi yi 'jig rten rtag rab bde/_/gang dag nags dang ri sul la dga' ba/_/[#]dge sbyong nyid kyi rab bde myong bar 'gyur/_/gang dag bdag gir byed pa ci yang med/_/gang dag yongs 'dzin
[\[109a.4\]]rnam pa kun tu med/_/bse ru lta bur 'jig rten 'dir gnas pa/_/de dag nam mkha' la ni rlung ltar 'gro/_/gang dag 'jig rten la ni yid mi chags/_/de dag mi yi 'jig rten rab tu bde/_/dga' dang mi dga' la ni chags med pa/_/de dag 'di na [#]rtag tu sems rlung 'dra/_/gang dag mi sdug de phrad
[\[109a.5\]]sdug bsngal te/_/gang dag sdug de dang bral sdug bsngal yin/_/mtha' de gnyi ga rab tu spangs nas su/_/mi gang chos la dga' ba de dag bde/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_nyes pa'i tshogs [#]mang thams cad spangs nas su/_/rnal 'byor can ni rtag tu byed pa nyung /_/rnal
[\[109a.6\]]'byor can brtson nam yang rtsod pa med/_/dgon par gnas pa de yi yon tan 'di/_/de ni rtag tu 'dus byas yid 'byung 'gyur/_/de ni 'jig rten ci la'ang 'dod pa med/_/zag pa dag ni rnam par 'phel mi 'gyur/_/nags na gnas pa 'di yi yon tan 'di/_/de ni nam yang rtsod par mi 'gyur te/_/
[\[109a.7\]]rtag tu zhi zhing dga' la dben par rgyu/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyang rab bsdam [#]'gyur/_/dgon par gnas pa 'di la yon tan mang /_/de ni thar pa'i rjes su mthun pa yin/_/de ni rnam grol zhi ba myur rtogs byed/_/nags na gnas shing rnam grol sten byed na/_/dgon gnas de la yon tan 'di kun
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]'byung /_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_grong dang grong khyer dag la dga' spangs [#]la/_/rtag tu dben zhing nags khrod bsten par gyis/_/bse ru lta bur rtag tu gnyis med byos/_/ring por mi thogs ting 'dzin mchog thob 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa yul 'khor skyong
[\[109b.2\]]gis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_/skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor mi lta/_/des shing yon tan ldan pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul/_/de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed/_/bse ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri
[\[109b.3\]]med dag la dri ma bral/_/de dag thob pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur ma thob yid zhum med/_/'dod pa chung ste ngan ngon tsam la dga' zhing sgyu dang tshul 'chos spongs/_/sems can don phyir brtson 'grus yid ldan sbyin dang dul [#]ba la yang gnas/_/sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan
[\[109b.4\]]brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin/_/lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam [#]spangs te/_/bsam pa rdo rje lta bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor/_/lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med/_/thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu
[\[109b.5\]]brtan 'dir rtsom/_/zhes gsungs so/_/drag shul can gyis [#]zhus pa las kyang /_bdag ni sems can dang 'dre bar mi bya'o/_/bdag gis sems can gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/gal te thos pa dang ldan pa dal ba phun sum tshogs pa 'di rnyed nas
[\[109b.6\]]rnyed pa la sogs pa la [#]chags pa'i sems mi sbyong na de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la slu ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa las kyang [#]/_/'od srungs [#]'di lta ste dper na mi la la zhig rgya mtsho'i chu chen pos khyer la chus skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de [#]bzhin du 'od
[\[109b.7\]]srungs 'di ni [#]dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig chos mang po blangs te kun chub par byas kyang /_'dod chags la sred pa mi sel zhe sdang la srid pa mi sel gti mug la srid pa mi sel ba de dag ni chos kyi rgya mtsho chen pos khyer la/_nyon mongs pa'i skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te/_ngan 'gror 'gro bar
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de lta bas na gdon mi za bar dgon pa la gnas par bya'o/_/gnas de lta bu dag ni 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las kyang /_gnas gang dag na bsod snyoms blang ba'i spyod yul dang ha cang yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /_gnas gang dag na
[\[110a.2\]]chu dang zhing rnyog pa [#]med pa gtsang zhing dri ma med pa tshogs chung ba yod pa dang /_gnas gang [#]na shing phun sum tshogs pa me tog phun sum tshogs pa 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa lo ma phun sum tshogs pa/_gcan gzan khro bo [#]med pa phug dang ldan pa sman gshong dang ldan pa thag thug med pa
[\[110a.3\]]'gron bde ba zhi ba [#]gnyis su med pa'i gnas de 'dra ba dag na gnas so/_/de gnas de dag na gnas shing /_gang des sngon blangs pa dang sngon thos pa de nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du ha cang yang [#]mi che ha cang yang [#]mi chung ba dang /_dbang po mi rgod cing phyi rol du ma song ba'i sems dang dad pas
[\[110a.4\]]nye bar 'tsho zhing tshig nye bar bzung ste/_mtshan mar 'dzin cing gnyid kyis ma log par kha ton byed do/_/gal te dge slong dgon pa'i drung du rgyal po'am blon po'am de ma yin pa gzhan bram ze'am rgyal rigs sam grong pa'am yul gyi [#]mi dag 'ongs na/_des de dag la gus par legs par 'ongs so
[\[110a.5\]]zhes brjod par bya ste/_des rgyal po chen po ji ltar stan bting ba la bzhugs shig ces de skad byas nas gal te 'dug na gnyi ga [#]yang 'dug par bya'o/_/de ste mi 'dug na yang gnyi ga mi 'dug par bya'o/_/gal te dbang po rgod par gyur na rgyal po chen po gang khyod kyis [#]sa phyogs na dge slong dang bram
[\[110a.6\]]ze rnams tshul khrims dang ldan pa yon tan dang ldan pa mang du thos pa dag mi rgod dang spre'u rnams kyis ma gtses par gnas pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes bstan par bya'o/_/de ste brtan zhing dul ba dbang po rab tu zhi ba zhig yin te chos bstan par rung na de la chos sna tshogs bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[110a.7\]]de ste chos sna tshogs bstan pa la mi dga' na de la skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan par bya'o/_/de ste skyo ba dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa la [#]yang mi dga' na de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba rgya che ba dag bstan par bya'o/_/bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang grong pa dang yul gyi [#]mi dag 'ongs na yang
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]ci rigs par bya ba dag bya'o/_/de de ltar mang du thos pas chos nyan pa rnams kyi sems mgu bar byed nus pa yin te/_sems can de dag kyang de la dga' ba dang dad pa dang rangs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so//_//bam po dgu pa/_khyim bdag drag shul can
[\[110b.2\]]gyis zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas 'di ltar bdag ci'i phyir dgon pa la gnas/_dgon pa na [#]gnas pa 'ba' zhig ni dge sbyong ma yin te/_'di na ma byang ba ma sbas pa ma zhi ba ma dul ba mi 'grus pa rab tu mi brtson
[\[110b.3\]]pa/_'di lta ste ri dgas dang spre'u dang bya mang po dang chom rkun dang /_gdol pa dag kyang mang du gnas te/_de dag kyang dge sbyong gi yon tan dang ldan pa ma yin pas/_gang gi phyir bdag dgon pa la gnas pa 'di lta ste/_dge sbyong gi don de yongs su rdzogs par bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o/_/de bzhin
[\[110b.4\]]du sbyar te/_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa na gnas pas bdag ci'i phyir dgon par 'ongs snyam du brtag par bya ste de [#]yang 'di ltar bdag ni 'jigs shing skrag pa'i phyir dgon par 'ongs so/_/ci zhig gis 'jigs shing skrag ce na/_'du 'dzis 'jigs shing skrag
[\[110b.5\]]go/_/'grogs pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang /_'chab [#]pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/chags pa dang phrag dog dang ser snas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg byas
[\[110b.6\]]'jigs shing skrag go/_/phung po'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/nyon mongs pa'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/'chi bdag gi bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/lha'i bu'i bdud kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mi rtag pa la rtag par phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/sdug
[\[110b.7\]]bsngal la bde bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/bdag med pa la bdag tu phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar phyin ci log pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/sred pas 'jigs shing skrag go_/_
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/sgrib pa dang chod pa dang kun nas ldang bas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/'jig [#]tshogs la lta bas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gir 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/rgod pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/'gyod
[\[111a.2\]]pa dang the tshom gyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/sdig pa'i grogs pos 'jigs shing skrag go/_/rnyed pa dang bkur stis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/ma mthong bar mthong ngo snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/ma thos par thos so snyam
[\[111a.3\]]du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/ma dran par dran no snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/bye brag ma phyed par bye brag phyed do snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mi shes par shes so snyam du 'dzin pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/dge sbyong gi dri mas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/
[\[111a.4\]]gcig la gcig gnod par sems pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs kyi khams dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyis 'jigs shing skrag go/_/srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang skye bas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye
[\[111a.5\]]gnas dang yi dgas kyi yul du 'gro bas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mi khom pas 'jigs shing skrag go/_/mdor na mi dge ba'i chos thams cad yid la byed pas 'jigs shing skrag ste/_bdag de lta bu'i 'jigs shing skrag pas 'jigs nas dgon par 'ongs so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_khyim
[\[111a.6\]]bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba [#]'jigs shing skrag nas/_dgon pa la gnas pas 'di la gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag tu 'dzin pa las skyes so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/[ #]bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang /_bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_
[\[111a.7\]]bdag gi gzhi dang bdag la sred pa dang /[ #]bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_bdag gi gnas dang /_bdag tu [#]yongs su rtog pa dang /_bdag bsrung ba las skyes te/_gal te bdag dgon pa la gnas la bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su ma spangs/_
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]bdag tu mngon par chags pa dang /_bdag tu yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_bdag gi gzhi dang /_bdag la sred pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu smra ba nye bar len pa dang /_bdag tu lta ba dang /_bdag gi gnas dang /_bdag tu yongs su rtog pa dang /_bdag srung ba yongs su ma spangs
[\[111b.2\]]na ni/_bdag dgon pa la gnas pa don med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems [#]par bya ste/_bdag tu 'du shes pa la ni dgon pa la gnas pa don [#]med do/_/gzhan du 'du shes pa la yang med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_khyim bdag dgon pa la gnas pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad la mi brten par gnas
[\[111b.3\]]pa'o/_/chos thams cad la mi 'dzin par gnas pa'o/_/mtshan ma thams cad la mi chags par gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzugs thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o/_/sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg pa thams cad la mi brten par gnas pa'o/_/chos thams cad mnyam pa
[\[111b.4\]]nyid dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'o/_/sems shin tu zhi bas shin tu sbyangs par gnas pa'o/_/'jigs pa thams cad spangs pas mi 'jigs par gnas pa'o/_/nyon mongs pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas chu bo las rgal [#]bar gnas pa'o/_/brten [#]par gnas pa'o/_/ngan ngon
[\[111b.5\]]gyis chog shes par 'dzin cing 'dod pa chung bas 'phags pa'i rigs rnams la rab tu dga' bar gnas pa'o/_/dgang sla zhing gso sla bas chog par 'dzin par gnas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi phyir tshul bzhin la sbyor bas thos pa la gnas pa'o/_/rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
[\[111b.6\]]med pa dang smon pa med pa la so sor rtog [#]pas thar par gnas pa'o/_/bcings pa [#]bcad pas rnam par grol bar gnas pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mthun pas ma dul ba rnams nye bar zhi bar gnas pa'o/_/shin tu rnam par dag pas bya ba byas par gnas pa'o/_/khyim bdag 'di lta
[\[111b.7\]]ste dper na/_dgon pa la rtswa dang shing gel ba dang nags tshal gnas kyang 'jigs pa med cing mi skrag skrag par mi 'gyur ro/_/khyim bdag de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba dgon pa la gnas pas kyang lus la [#]rtswa dang shing gel pa dang sman dang rtswig [#]pa dang shing dang mig yor lta bu dang sgyu
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]ma dang mtshungs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/_'di la su zhig 'jigs par 'gyur 'di la su zhig skrag par 'gyur snyam du [#]sems bskyed par bya'o/_/des 'jigs shing skrag par lta na/_'di ltar lus 'di la ni bdag gam sems can nam srog gam skye ba'am gso
[\[112a.2\]]ba'am skyes bu'am gang zag gam shed las skyes pa'am shed bu med de/_'di ltar 'jigs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/_yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags [#]pa yin gyi [#]bdag gis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags pa de la brtag par mi bya'o snyam du lus la tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o/_/des ji
[\[112a.3\]]ltar dgon pa la rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nags tshal gnas pa rnams nga'i ba med pas yongs su 'dzin pa [#]med pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' [#]yang nga'i pa med pa yongs su 'dzin pa med pas chos thams cad dgon pa nyid do snyam du shes nas nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par bya'o/_/de ci'i
[\[112a.4\]]phyir zhe na/_dgon pa la gnas pa de [#]ni nyon mongs pa gcod pa ste nga'i ba med pas [#]yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_khyim bdag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung bas sangs rgyas kyis [#]dgon pa la gnas par bka' stsal par shes nas dgon pa la gnas par bya
[\[112a.5\]]ste/_der dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba [#]nye bar brtan nas/_phyis grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang ljongs [#]dang yul dang pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs te chos bstan par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' rab tu
[\[112a.6\]]byung ba lung dang kha ton mnod [#]pa'i phyir tshogs kyi nang du 'jug na des der gus pa dang bcas par bya ste/_slob dpon dang mkhan po rnams dang /_gnas brtan dang bar ma dang dge sbyong [#]gsar bu rnams la zhe sa dang bcas par bya'o/_/tshul mkhas par bya'o/_/snyom [#]las med par rang gis bya ba [#]dang
[\[112a.7\]]gzhan la gdung ba med par bya'o/_/des bsnyen bkur la gdu bar mi bya'o/_/des 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud dang bcas pa dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]bcas pa dang /_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pas mchod pas[#]/_sbyin gnas su gyur pa de yang sems can thams cad la gang las kyang rim gror bya ba bdag gir mi mdzad na/_bdag cag ma bslabs [#]pa slob dpon 'dod pa rnams lta ci smos te/_bdag gis sems can thams cad la bsnyen bkur bya'i/_
[\[112b.2\]]gang las kyang bsnyen bkur bya ba bdag gir mi bya'o snyam du brtag par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyim bdag dge sbyong [#]bsnyen bkur la gdu [#]ba ni yon tan gyi chos rjes su gzung ba chud gzon pa yin te/_des gang dag sdud pa de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ni bsnyen bkur gyi phyir sdud kyi chos
[\[112b.3\]]kyi phyir ni ma yin no snyam mo zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa pa chos nyan par 'dod dam/_mkhan po dang slob dpon la lta bar 'dod nas/_nad 'dri [#]ba'i phyir grong gi gnas su 'ongs nas/_des dgongs [#]su slar ldog par bya ba'i phyir 'gro
[\[112b.4\]]ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de gal te lung mnod [#]pa dang kha ton bya ba gzhan la rag las te [#]gtsug lag khang na gnas na yang /_des dgon pa la gzhol ba'i sems kyis/_gang dngos po thams cad la dgon par 'du shes pa dang chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa de nyid dgon pa la gnas pa yin no snyam du
[\[112b.5\]]bsam par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rin po che'i phung po'i mdo las kyang /_gal te dge slong dgon pa pa 'bras bu ma thob pa so so'i skye bo'i drung du sdig sbrul dang gcan gzan gtum po dag 'ongs na des de la 'jigs pa dang skrag par mi bya'i[#]/_des 'di snyam du bdag thog ma nyid nas
[\[112b.6\]]lus dang srog bor te dgon pa'i gnas su 'ongs kyang [#]'di la bdag gis 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya'i/_byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya zhe sdang rnam par spang par bya 'jigs pa spang bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gal te de ltar byas nas sbrul dang gcan gzan de dag gis [# ]
[\[112b.7\]]srog gcod cing za na yang des 'di snyam du gcan gzan 'di dag la bdag gis [#]zang zing tsam gyis [#]tshim par byed mi nus kyi/_de dag gis bdag gi sha zos nas bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur la/_bdag gis kyang snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blangs par [#]'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]legs par rnyed do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gal te dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na [#]mi ma yin pa 'ongs na mdog sdug kyang rung mi sdug kyang rung /_de la chags par mi bya khong khro bar mi bya'o/_/gal te sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha dag dge slong dgon pa pa'i gan [#]du
[\[113a.2\]]'ongs te dri ba yongs su 'dri na/_de la dge slong dgon pa pa des ji ltar thos pa bzhin du lha de dag la chos bshad par bya'o/_/ci ste lha de dag zab mo'i dri ba yongs su dris te dge slong dgon pa des lan mi thebs pa lta na/_des nga rgyal med par byas la 'di skad ces ma bslabs pa la brnyas par mi
[\[113a.3\]]bya ste sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la lung mnos [#]nas 'bad de khong du [#]ma chud pa'i chos rnams khong du chud par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na dris pa thams cad kyi lan gdab par bya'o/_/bdag ni chos nyan pa yin gyi [#]khyed spobs par gyis shig ces brjod par bya ste/_'od srungs dge slong dgon pa pa [#]de ltar
[\[113a.4\]]lha de dag la go bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa des rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang nags tshal de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dad ji ltar 'jigs par 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po 'di dag bdag po med pa/_g.yo ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_rgyu dang rkyen
[\[113a.5\]]tshogs pa las 'byung gi_/rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'byung ba ste/_'di la don dam par skye ba dang 'gag pa'i chos gang yang med do snyam du mtshan mar [#]gzung bar bya'o zhes gsungs so[#]/_/yang gsungs pa/[ #]dgon pa'i gnas de na gnas pa na 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_'di ltar bdag ni lam
[\[113a.6\]]ring po nas 'dir 'ongs la gcig pu gnyis su med pa ste/_legs par byas pa'am nyes par byas pa bskul ba'i grogs ni gang yang med kyi/_lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang bdag [#]gi sems kyi [#]bsam pa shes pa dag yod de/_bdag dgon pa'i gnas na gnas
[\[113a.7\]]la mi dge ba'i sems kyi dbang du song na de dag dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs shing gcig pu gnyis su med de/_rten pa med bdag gi med yongs su 'dzin pa med la/_gal te 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog_/gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog_/_
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog gam/_mi dge ba gzhan la rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par gyur na/_gang [#]'du 'dzi dang 'du [#]ba la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can rnams dang bye brag med par 'gyur te/_bdag gis [#]lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za rnams la bslus par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[113b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mi mnyes par byas par 'gyur gyis/_ci nas kyang bdag la lha rnams 'phya bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dgyes par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las/[# ]
[\[113b.3\]]dgon par gnas par [#]brjod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//de ltar dgon pa la gnas nas mnyam par gzhag pa la sbyar bar bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das ma las/_des [#]sems can de dag gi don du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la [#]spyod pas sems g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di
[\[113b.4\]]ltar de 'di snyam du sems g.yeng ba la ni 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bskyed pa'ang dkon na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos/_de lta bas na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma [#]rgyas kyi bar du sems mi g.yeng bar bya'o snyam
[\[113b.5\]]du sems so zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_rab 'byor gzhan yang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas bsam gtan la
[\[113b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug ste/_de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong yang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/gang gi phyir mig gi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams par gnas te/_brnab sems dang yid mi bde ba dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos gzhan la yang sems rjes su 'jug
[\[113b.7\]]pa de dag sdom par byed mig gi dbang po srung bar byed do/_/de bzhin du rna bas sgra thos pa dang /_snas dri tshor ba dang /_lces ro myang [#]ba dang /_lus kyis reg bya la reg pa dang /_yid kyis chos rnam par rig pa na mtshan mar mi [#]'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no/_/gang gi phyir
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]yid kyi dbang po sdom pas ma bsdams te sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams la rjes su 'jug pa de dag sdom par byed yid kyi dbang po srung bar byed do/_/de 'gro'am 'greng ngam 'dug gam nyal lam smra'am mi smra yang rung ste/_mnyam par gzhag par gnas pa dang zhi bar gnas
[\[114a.2\]]pa mi 'dor ro/_/de lag pa mi rgod pa dang /_rkang pa mi rgod pa dang /_mu cor mi smra ba dang /_tshig 'chal ba med pa dang /_dbang po mi g.yeng ba dang /_mi rgod pa dang /_yab yab po ma yin pa dang /_gzu sems can ma yin pa dang /_lus 'khrul pa med pa dang /_sems 'khrul pa med pa dang /_
[\[114a.3\]]lus zhi ba dang /_ngag zhi ba dang /_sems zhi ba dang /_dben yang rung mi dben yang rung ste spyod lam bcos pa med pa yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_chog shes pa dang /_gso sla ba dang /_dgang [#]sla ba dang /_'grogs na bde ba dang /_cho ga dang spyod yul bde ba dang /_'du 'dzi'i nang na yang spyod
[\[114a.4\]]yul dben pa dang /_rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la yang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med pa yin/_khengs pa med cing 'dud pa dang [#]/_de bzhin du bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dang /_bstod pa dang smad pa dang /_snyan pa dang mi snyan pa dang /_'tsho ba dang 'chi ba yang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med pa yin/_khengs pa med cing 'dud
[\[114a.5\]]pa dang [#]/_de bzhin du dgra dang mdza' bo dang /_yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_'phags pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa dang /_sgra dang gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa rnams la yang mnyam zhing 'gyur ba med pa yin/_khengs pa med cing 'dud pa [#]yin/_rjes su chags pa dang mi mthun pa dang
[\[114a.6\]]bral ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong zhing byung ba med pa dang rdzogs pa med pa dang /_mngon du grub pa med par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes rgya cher gsungs so/_/de la yid zhum na dga' ba bsgom pas gzengs [#]bstod par bya'o/_/rgod par gyur na mi
[\[114a.7\]]rtag pa yid la bya bas rab tu zhi bar bya'o/_/gnyi ga'i gnyen po'i don du ni/_'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis [#]brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dran par bya ste/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che/_/bskal pa bye mang brgya lam 'byung bar 'gyur/_/da lta dal ba dam pa rnyed pa la/_/gal te
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]thar 'dod bag med spong [#]bar gyis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du/_'di ni [#]sgyu ma lta bur bden pa min/_/'dus byas rmi lam mtshungs par brtags [#]nas ni/_/'di ni [#]rtag tu sdug pa thams cad dang /_/myur du 'bral bar mi 'gyur gang yang med/_/pha rol phyin dang sa dang stobs rnams la/_/rtag
[\[114b.2\]]tu brtson par gyis la [#]'bad par gyis/_/rdul med byang chub sangs rgyas ma gyur par/_/brtson 'grus nams kyang [#]nyams par gyur ta re/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgya cher rol pa'i mdo las kyang /_srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar/_/'di ni 'chi med rab 'bar mgon med
[\[114b.3\]]pa/_/srid las 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs/_/bum par chud pa'i bung ba 'khor ba bzhin/_/srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang [#]'dra/_/'gro ba'i skye 'chi gar la lta dang mtshungs/_/'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste/_/ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro/_/srid sred ma
[\[114b.4\]]rig dbang gis skye bo rnams/_/mi dang lha gnas ngan song lam gsum po/_/'gro ba lnga po dag tu mi mkhas 'khor/_/dper na rdza mkhan 'phang lo 'khor ba bzhin/_/rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang /_/dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa/_/dus ngan rnyi la 'gro ba 'di dag thogs/_/
[\[114b.5\]]dper na rngon pa'i rnyi la spre'u thogs [#]bzhin/_/'dod pa'i yon tan mya ngan gnod pa mang /_/'jigs bcas rtag tu dgra byed nyon mongs bcas/_/ral gri'i [#]sa 'dra dug sdong lo ma mtshungs/_/ngan skyugs snod ltar 'phags pa'i skye bos [#]spangs/_/'dod pa'i yon tan 'jigs bcas nyon mongs bcas/_/rtag
[\[114b.6\]]tu dran pa brjed byed mun pa byed/_/rtag tu 'jigs pa'i rgyu [#]byed sdug bsngal rtsa/_/srid pa'i sred pa'i [#]'khri shing 'phel bar byed/_/ji ltar me 'bar 'obs nas [#]'jigs bcas pa/_/de ltar [#]'dod 'di 'phags pa'i skye bos rig_/'dam rdzab che 'dra ral gri gshegs gnas [#]'dra/_/ral gri'i so la sbrang
[\[114b.7\]]rtsis bskus dang mtshungs/_/ji ltar sbrul gyi mgo dang ngan skyugs [#]snod/_/de ltar 'dod 'di mkhas pa rnams kyis rig[ #]/bya sha kham bu 'dra zhing gsal shing 'dra/_/ro la khyi ltar dgra dang bcas pa yis[#]/_/'dod pa'i yon tan 'di dag chu zla 'dra/_/gzugs brnyan mtshungs shing brag ca 'dra ba dang /_/
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]mig yor 'dra zhing gar la lta 'dra dang /_/rmi lam mnyam par 'phags pa'i skyo [#]bos rig_/'dod pa'i yon tan skad cig ya ma brla/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra zhing brdzun pa can/_/chu bur dbu ba lta bur yang dag min/_/yongs su brtags las byung bar mkhas pas rtogs[#]/_/na
[\[115a.2\]]tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe/_/phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod/_/rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom [#]nas/_/rnam par spangs te ri [#]dgas klung skam [#]bzhin/_/nor 'bru [#]dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe/_/phangs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod/_/nor nyams
[\[115a.3\]]sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe/_/rnam par spangs te mi yis [#]'phrog stong bzhin/_/ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing /_/de ltar sbyin 'dod mi la dga' bar byed/_/nor nyams rga bas nyen cing spong byed pa/_/de dag dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin/_/rdzas [#]ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po
[\[115a.4\]]bzhin/_/phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed/_/rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad pa/_/de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin/_/rga bas rga byas na tshod yal gyur na/_/sdong po gnam lcags kyi ni bcom pa bzhin/_/rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra/_/rga las 'byung ba thub pa
[\[115a.5\]]myur du smros/_/bud med skyes pa'i tshogs rnams rga bas skyems[#]/_/'khri shing sA [#]la'i nags la rlung dmar bzhin/_/rga bas brtson 'grus rtsal dang shugs 'phrog ste/_/dper na skyes bu 'dam du [#]bying ba bzhin/_/rga bas gzugs sdug gzugs ni mi sdug byed/_/rga bas gzi [#]brjid 'phrog cing mthu stobs
[\[115a.6\]]'phrog_/rga bas [#]bde ba 'phrog cing brnyas [#]par byed/_/rga bas 'chi byed rga bas mdangs kyang 'phrog_/nad brgya mang dang nad 'thibs [#]sdug bsngal gyis/_/'gro ba gces te mi yis [#]ri dgas bzhin/_/rga dang na bas bcom pa'i 'gro ltos la/_/sdug bsngal gyis ni 'byung ba myur shod cig_/dper na
[\[115a.7\]]dgun smad rlung dang kha ba che/_/rtsi shing gel pa nags sman mdangs kyang 'phrog_/de ltar nad 'di 'gro ba'i mdangs 'phrog cing /_/dbang po gzugs dang stobs ni nyams par byed/_/nor 'bru nor chen tha mar zad par byed/_/nad ni rtag tu 'gro ba brnyas [#]par byed/_/gnod pa byed cing sdug la
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]sdang bar byed/_/yongs su gdung byed [#]mkha' las nyi ma bzhin/_/'chi [#]dang 'pho dang 'chi 'pho dus byed pa/_/phangs shing sdug pa'i skye bo rtag tu 'bral[#]/_/phyir mi 'ong zhing phrad par 'gyur ma yin/_/shing las lo 'brul 'dra zhing rlung rgyun mtshungs[#]/_/'chi ba dbang yod pa dag dbang med byed/_/'chi
[\[115b.2\]]bas [#]'phrog byed chu bos shing ded bzhin/_/mi ni gnyis min grogs med gcig pur [#]'gro/_/rang las 'bras bu ldan pas dbang yang med/_/'chi bas srog chags brgya phrag mang 'dzin te[#]/_/'byung po'i tshogs la rgya mtsho'i chu srin bzhin/_/klu [#]la mkha' lding glang chen seng ge 'dra/_/rtsa [#]rtsi 'byung
[\[115b.3\]]po'i tshogs la me dang mtshungs/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las kyang /_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na phyogs bzhi nas ri chen po sra ba/_/brtan pa/[ #]snying po dang ldan pa/_ma zhig pa/_ma gas pa/_'phan [#]med pa/_shin tu mkhregs pa gcig tu stug [#]po bzhi/_gnam la
[\[115b.4\]]reg cing sa zlog [#]ste/_rtswa dang shing gel pa dang yal ga dang lo ma thams cad dang /_sems can srog chags 'byung po thams cad phye mar 'thag cing 'ong ba de dag [#]las ni/_mgyogs par [#]'bros pa'am/_stobs kyis bzlog pa'am/_nor gyis bzlog pa'am/_rdzas dang sngags dang [#]sman rnams kyis bzlog
[\[115b.5\]]par sla [#]ba ni ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du/_'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'ong ste/_de dag las mgyogs pas 'bros pa'am/_stobs kyis bzlog pa'am/_nor gyis bzlog pa'am/_rdzas dang sngags dang sman rnams kyis bzlog par sla ba ma yin no/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_rga ba dang /_nad [#]dang /_
[\[115b.6\]]'chi ba dang /_rgud pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po de rga ba ni dar [#]la bab pa 'joms shing 'ong [#]/_nad ni nad med pa 'joms shing 'ong /_rgud pa ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad [#]'joms shing 'ong /_'chi ba ni srog 'joms shing 'ong ste/_de dag las ni mgyogs pas 'bros pa'am/_stobs kyis bzlog pa'am/_nor
[\[115b.7\]]gyis bzlog pa'am/_rdzas dang sngags dang sman rnams kyis [#]zhi bar sla ba ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_dper na ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge ri dgas kyi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs nas ri dgas bzung ste ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bya ba byed do/_/ri dgas de ni stobs po che'i kha mi bzad [#]pas bzung bas
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]dbang med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du 'chi bdag gi gsal shing gis zug ste/_rgyags pa dang ni bral/_mgon ni med skyabs ni med/_dpung gnyen ni med/_gshis ni 'jigs[#]/_tshigs ni 'bye 'bral/_sha dang khrag ni skam[#]/_lus ni nad kyis gdungs
[\[116a.2\]]skom ni skom/_bzhin ni 'gyur/_rkang lag ni g.yo ba/_las ni mi nus/_mthu ni med/_kha chu dang snabs dang gcin dang ngan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/_mig dang rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang yid kyi dbang po dag ni 'gag_/skyigs bu ni 'byung /_sgra ngar ngar po ni 'thon/_sman pas ni bor/_/
[\[116a.3\]]sman dang kha zas dang bza' ba dang thug pa thams cad kyis ni kles la bor te/_'gro ba gzhan dag tu 'gro bar mal gyi tha ma la ni nyal/_thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i rgyud du ni nub/_srog ni cung zad cig [#]las/_gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs [#]skrag_/byur gyi dbang du ni
[\[116a.4\]]song /_/dbugs rgyu ba ni chad[#]/_kha dang sna ni gdangs/_so ni gtsegs/_sbyin pa sbyin no zhes de skad gsol ba ni 'debs/_las kyi srid pa nas yang srid pa la ni 'jug_/gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs ni med de/_'jig rten 'di ni 'dor/_'jig rten pha rol du ni 'gro/_/skyas chen po [#]ni
[\[116a.5\]]'debs/_mun pa chen por ni zhugs/_g.yang sa chen por ni ltung /_khrod stug por ni 'jug_/dgon pa chen por ni 'gro/_/rgya mtsho chen pos ni khyer/_las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/_sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro/_/g.yul ngo chen por ni 'jug_/gdon chen pos ni zin/_nam mkha' la
[\[116a.6\]]ni 'chel/_pha ma dang phu nu dang /_sring mo dang bu dang bu mos ni bskor/_dbugs ni 'chad/_nor la [#]bgo bsha' bya zhes ni zer/_kyi hud ma kyi hud pha kyi hud bu zhes ni zer/_skra ni zhig ste/_sbyin pa dang dka' thub dang chos 'ba' zhig grogs su gyur pa na chos ma gtogs par [#]skyabs gzhan med/_
[\[116a.7\]]mgon gzhan med gnas gzhan med dpung gnyen gzhan med do/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe de'i dus na/_chos ni gling dang gnas dang mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang [#]ston par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_grang [#]bas nyen pa la me dang /_mes rab tu gdungs bar gyur
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]pa la [#]me gsod pa dang /_tsha bas [#]nyen pa la bsil ba dang /_'gron po ngal ba la grib ma dang rlung bsil ba dang /_lam du zhugs pa la bzhon pa dang /_nyal ba la mal 'jam po dang /_skom pa la chu grang mo dang /_shin tu bkres pa la zas bzang po dang /_mya ngan gyis [#]non pa la dbugs 'byin
[\[116b.2\]]pa dang /_gdungs pa la sim par byed pa dang /_dgon par lam stor ba la lam mtshon par byed pa dang /_nad kyis btab pa la sman pa dang sman dang nad g.yog byed pa dang /_chus khyer ba la gzings dang /_'dam du bying ba la 'ju sa dang /_rgal dka' ba la zam pa dang /_nyam nga ba la 'bab
[\[116b.3\]]stegs dang /_mun khung na sgron me dang /_rgya mtsho chen po la gru dang /_lhags [#]pas nyen pa la rlung med pa'i gnas dang /_yul gzhan du 'gro ba'i [#]lam rgyags dang /_dbul po la nor dang /_byed par 'dod pa la grogs dang /_gcad par 'dod pa la lag ca dang /_gzhig par 'dod pa la rdo
[\[116b.4\]]rje dang /_g.yul ngor zhugs pa la go cha dang /_'jigs pa la stobs dang ldan pa'i grogs dang /_'thab pa [#]la dpung gnyen dang /_dog pa la go 'byed pa dang /_mu ge la nor dang ldan pa dag mgon dang skyabs dang gnas dang rten du 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_rgyal po chen po 'chi bdag gi gsal shing
[\[116b.5\]]gis [#]zug ste/_rgyags pa dang ni bral/_mgon ni med/_skyabs ni med/_dpung gnyen ni med/_gshis ni 'jig_/tshigs ni 'bye 'bral/_sha dang khrag ni skam[#]/_lus ni nad kyis gdung [#]/_skom ni skom/_bzhin ni 'gyur/_rkang lag ni g.yob/_las ni mi nus/_mthu ni med/_kha chu dang /_
[\[116b.6\]]snabs dang gcin dang ngan skyugs kyis ni lus la gos/_mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang lus dang yid kyi dbang po dag ni 'gag_/skyigs [#]bu ni 'byung /_sgra ngar ngar po ni 'thon/_sman pas ni bor/_sman dang kha zas dang bza' ba dang /_thug [#]pa thams cad kyis ni kles la bor te/_'gro ba
[\[116b.7\]]gzhan dag tu 'gro bar mal gyi tha ma la ni nyal/_thog ma med pa'i skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i 'khor ba'i [#]rgyud du ni nub/_srog ni cung zad cig las[#]/_gshin rje'i mis ni 'jigs skrag_/byur gyi dbang du ni song /_dbugs rgyu ba ni 'chad/_kha dang sna ni gdangs/_so ni gtsegs/_sbyin pa ni sbyin
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]no zhes de skad gsol ba ni [#]'debs/_las kyi srid pa nas yang srid pa la ni 'jug_/gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs ni med de/_'jig rten 'di ni 'dor/_'jig rten pha rol du ni 'gro/_/skyas chen po ni 'debs/_mun pa chen por ni zhugs/_g.yang sa chen por
[\[117a.2\]]ni ltung /_khrod stug por ni 'jug_/dgon pa chen por ni 'gro/_/rgya mtsho chen pos ni khyer/_las kyi rlung gis ni bdas/_sa tshugs med pa'i phyogs su ni 'gro ba na chos ma gtogs par mgon gzhan med/_skyabs gzhan med/_dpung gnyen gzhan med do/_/rgyal po chen po chos ni
[\[117a.3\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na/_gling chen po dang gnas dang mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang ston par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de'i tshe/_'di snyam du sems te/_kyi hud gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/_phyogs gar 'gro bar 'gyur/_gang du yongs su 'dzin par byed par 'gyur/_bdag gi mar ni su zhig
[\[117a.4\]]'gyur snyam pa las/_des sems can dmyal bar skye bar mthong bar 'gyur na 'di lta ste/_mnar med pa dang /_tsha ba dang /_rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa'i sems can dmyal ba rnams su lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po lo brgya stong phrag mang por sdug bsngal chen po sdug bsngal mi bzad pa drag pa
[\[117a.5\]]rtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba myong ste/_ji srid du sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du zad cing byang bar ma gyur pa de srid du 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skye ba mthong bar gyur na/_'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho chen
[\[117a.6\]]po'i nang du nya rlon dang nya rlon mid la sogs pa srog chags gcig gis gcig gsod [#]pa dang 'tshe ba dang dbang med par skye'o/_/bdag yi dwags kyi nang du [#]skye bar mi 'gyur ram snyam na/_'di lta ste/_lo mang po dang lo brgya phrag [#]mang po dang lo brgya stong phrag mang por chu'i sgra yang mi thos na mthong ba lta ci
[\[117a.7\]]smos par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis [#]mi rtag par blta zhing zad pa dang [#]dengs par blta bar bya ste/_'chi bas 'jigs skrag par bya'o/_/chos kyis [#]rgyal srid kyis shig_/chos ma yin pas ni mi bya'o/_/khyod chos dang mthun par gyis shig_/chos ma yin pa dang mthun
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]par ni mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyi lus 'di/_'di ltar legs par yongs su bsrungs legs par yongs su btsas pa yang 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/yon tan thams cad dang ldan zhing shin tu yun ring por bza' ba dang /_bca' ba dang myang ba dang ngoms par
[\[117b.2\]]'gyur ba bsod pa dang [#]gtsang ma mang pos tshim par byas te bskyed bskyed pa yang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe/_sman pas bor zhing sman dang kha zas dang bza' ba dang thug pas kyang [#]kles la bor nas bkres pa dang skom pas nyen cing [#]yid mi bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po
[\[117b.3\]]'di ltar khyod kyis lus bkrus shing bskus te bdug pas bsgos me tog dri zhim pos [#]bsgos kyang /_gdon mi za bar 'chi ba'i [#]dus su rang bzhin gyis lhan cig skyes pa'i dri nga ba 'byung [#]bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar gos yul ka shi pa'i ras [#]dang /_srin bal dang /_du gu la dang /_
[\[117b.4\]]dar dang /_'dab ma dang /_bal dang /_gso ras la sogs pa'i gos kyi bye brag gis [#]g.yogs kyang tha ma'i mal na 'dug pa'i tshe/_snum rnam pa mang po dang chus reg cing gos dri ma can gon zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po khyod de ltar bud med kyi nang na 'dug btsun
[\[117b.5\]]mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug ste/_bud med kyi tshogs kyis bskor zhing [#]gar dang glu dang rol mo dang [#]sil snyan byed/_pheg rdob pi bang dang gling bu len/_rnga rdung [#]zhing yid bde bar rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod pa yang 'chi bas 'jigs skrag nas shin tu yid mi bde zhing 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[117b.6\]]rgyal po chen po 'di [#]ltar khyod kyi khyim gyi nang na spos dri zhim po'i [(]bskubs [,]bsku bas [)]ni bskus/_gtan pa ni bcug_/skar khung ni legs par bcad/_byug pa mang pos ni byugs[#]/_'bru mar dri zhim po dang ldan pa'i mar me ni 'bar/_dar gyi lnga ldi mang po ni bres/_me tog dri zhim po'i sil ma mang pos
[\[117b.7\]]ni chal bar bkram[#]/_pog phor nas ni bdugs/_khri'i rtsa ba gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya las ni byas/_pa ti ka dang /_dre'u rdog gi stan dang /_stan nang tshangs can dang /_za 'og gi stan dang /_yul ka ling ka'i [#]stan dang /_steng du gding ba dang /_de'i steng du gding bas [#]ni bkab/_
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]g.yas g.yon du dar mang po'i sngas ni bzhag pa'i khri la nyal ba yang bya rog dang bya rgod dang /_wa dang /_ro dang /_sha dang /_rus pa dang /_skra [#]dang /_khrag dang /_zhag dang /_chu ser dang rnag gi gnas mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba'i dur khrod [#]chen por bor nas lus
[\[118a.2\]]g.yo ba med cing sa la nyal du gdon mi za'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang khyod glang po che'i bya la kha'am rta'i rgyab bam shing rta la zhon te/_dung dang rnga dang rdza [#]rnga dang /_'khar rnga dang /[ #]rol mo'i sil snyan gyi bye brag len pa dang /_gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba
[\[118a.3\]]dan ni bsgreng /_bsil yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang /_rnga yab dang shing tA la las byas pa ni g.yob cing /_glang po che dang rta pa dang dpung bu chung du ma ni phyi bzhin 'brang /_rgyal bu dang bram zes [#]bslab pa phog pa'i blon po dang mdun na 'don pa dang skye bo thal mo sbyar ba brgya stong du mas ni phyag bya zhing rgyal
[\[118a.4\]]bar spyon cig rgyal bar spyon cig ces snyan pa brjod de phyir 'byung [#]myong ba yang ring por [#]mi thogs par g.yo ba med cing mal du shi nas mi bzhis bteg ste/_pha dang ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang chung ma dang bu pho dang bu mo dang /_bran pho dang bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_chal za
[\[118a.5\]]ba dang /_blon po dang /_grong khyer ba'i skye bo dag mya ngan gyi dbang du song ste/_lag pa bteg nas brang rdung [#]zhing mchog tu snying rje bar/_kyi hud bu kyi hud mgon po kyi hud phu bo kyi hud jo bo zhes ngu zhing /_zham 'bring [#]ba dang grong khyer pa'i skye bo dag gis [#]'jigs pa dang bcas par mthong ste/_grong khyer
[\[118a.6\]]gyi lho phyogs kyi sgor phyung nas/_sa'i 'og tu bcug gam/_'brog dgon par sa'i nang du bcug kyang /_bya rog dang bya rgod dang wa la sogs pas zos shing /_rus pa de dag mes bsregs sam chur [#]bskyur ram sa'i 'og tu bcug kyang rlung dang nyi ma dang char pas phye mar byas te/_phyogs
[\[118a.7\]]phyogs su gtor zhing de nyid du rul par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang 'di bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po 'du byed thams cad ni de ltar mi rtag pa de ltar mi brtan pa zhes rgya cher gsungs so/_/de la nyon mongs pa ni [#]gtsor 'dod chags dang zhe
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]sdang dang gti mug rnams te/_de dag gi nang nas gang la mchog tu gnod par byed pa'i gnyen po gang yin pa de thog mar bsgom zhing de'i gzhi yang yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de la re zhig 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las/_de 'dod chags kyi gnyen po la brten cing 'dod chags skye ba'i
[\[118b.2\]]rkyen rnams yongs su spong ngo /_/'dod chags kyi gnyen po de ni gang /_'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen de dag ni [#]gang zhe na/_mi sdug pa bsgom pa ni 'dod chags kyi gnyen po'o/_/yul gyi bzang mo ni 'dod chags skye ba'i rkyen no/_/mi sdug pa bsgom pa de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus 'di la
[\[118b.3\]]skra dang spu dang sen mo dang so dang rdul dang /_dri ma dang /_pags pa dang sha dang rus pa dang rgyus pa dang rtsa dang mkhal ma dang snying dang mchin pa dang glo ba dang rgyu ma dang gnye ma dang pho ba dang sul mangs dang long ka [#]dang mcher pa dang [#]phyi sa dang mchil ma dang rdul dang snabs dang ngar snabs dang zhag dang chu ser dang rkang dang
[\[118b.4\]]tshil dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang rnag dang khrag dang klad [#]pa dang klad [#]rgyas dang gcin dag yod de/_dngos po de dag la byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/_yongs su rtog pa'i rang bzhin can de 'di snyam du byis pa blun po mi gsal [#]ba mi mkhas pa de yang dngos po 'di
[\[118b.5\]]dag shes nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skye [#]na shes rab dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi sdug pa mang du bsgom pa yin no [#]zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[118b.6\]]chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_lus 'di yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na ba lang gi shan [#]pa'am ba lang gi shan [#]pa'i slob mas ba lang bsad de gri rnon pos bag bzhir [#]gshegs nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste so sor rtog go/_/rab
[\[118b.7\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na yang /_lus 'di la yod pa ni sa'i khams dang chu'i khams dang me'i [#]khams dang rlung gi khams so zhes lus 'di la khams kyis [#]yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/_chun pa'i rdzas[#]/_'bras sA lu dang /_'bru dang /_til dang /_'bras dang /_mon sran sde'u dang /_mon sran gre'u dang /_nas dang /_gro dang /_sran chung dang /_yungs kar dang /_'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba de dag la/_skyes bu mig dang ldan pas
[\[119a.2\]]brtags na/_'di ltar 'di dag ni 'bras sA lu'o/_/'di dag ni 'bru'o/_/'di dag ni til lo/_/'di dag ni 'bras so/_/'di dag ni mon sran sde'u'o/_/'di dag ni mon sran sde'u'o/_/'di dag ni nas so/_/'di dag ni gro'o/_/'di dag ni sran chung ngo /_/'di dag ni yungs kar ro zhes bya bar shes so/_/rab
[\[119a.3\]]'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_lus 'di la rkang mthil yan chad klad rgyas man chad sen mo dang spu dang pags pa la thug pa mi gtsang ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gang ba [#]ste/_lus 'di la yod pa ni skra dang /_
[\[119a.4\]]spu dang [#]klad pa dang klad rgyas dang mig gi rngu ma dang rna spabs [#]kyi bar dag go zhes snga ma ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dur khrod du song ste[#]/_dur khrod du bor ba [#]ro'i gnas su bskyal ba shi nas zhag gcig lon pa'am/_
[\[119a.5\]]shi nas zhag gnyis lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag gsum lon [#]pa'am/_shi nas zhag bzhi lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag lnga lon pa'am/_rnam par bam pa'am/_rnam par bsngos pa'am/_rnam par rnags pa'am/_rnam par 'bus gzhigs [#]pa'i ro sna tshogs mthong na/_de lus 'di yang de
[\[119a.6\]]lta bu'i rang bzhin can [#]no/_/de lta bu'i chos can no/_/chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di la [#]yang de dang sbyor [#]ro/_/rab 'byor de ltar [#]na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_de lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas so/_/de bzhin
[\[119a.7\]]du sbyar te/_gzhan yang gang gi tshe shi ba'i ro dur khrod du bor ba/_shi nas zhag drug lon pa'am/_shi nas zhag bdun lon pa'am/_bya rog gis btogs pa'am[#]/_ne'u le'am/_bya rgod dam/_khyi'am/_ce sbyang ngam/_de las gzhan pa srog chags rnam pa sna tshogs kyis za ba mthong na de
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can/_de lta bu'i chos can no/_/chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gzhan yang gang gi tshe shi ba'i ro dur khrod du bor na/_rnam par zos pa/_mi gtsang ba/_dri nga ba mthong na/_de lus 'di
[\[119b.2\]]yang de dang sbyar ro zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_dur khrod na keng rus dang /_sha dang khrag ra ri chags pa chu rgyus brang breng thogs pa mthong na/_de lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe/_dur khrod na keng rus su gyur pa sha dang khrag [#]dang chu
