[\[119b.3\]]rgyus med pa mthong na/_de lus 'di yang zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe dur khrod na rus pa phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba 'di lta ste/_rje ngar gyi rus pa yang gzhan na/_brla'i rus pa yang gzhan na/_'dong mo yang gzhan na/_sgal tshigs kyang gzhan na/_rtsib
[\[119b.4\]]ma yang gzhan na/_mjing tshigs kyang gzhan na/_dpung pa'i rus pa yang gzhan na 'dug pa mthong na/_de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin can no/_/de lta bu'i chos can no/_/chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar [#]ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rab 'byor gzhan
[\[119b.5\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_dur khrod na rus pa lo du ma lon pa rlung dang nyi mas gdugs pa dkar ba dung lta bu mthong na/_de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i chos can no/_/chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes
[\[119b.6\]]lus 'di yang de dang sbyar ro/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na/_dur khrod rus pa lo du ma lon pa thi ba'i mdog ltar sngo ba sob sob por [#]gyur pa zegs pa sa la rdul dang mtshungs shing mnyam par gyur pa mthong na/_
[\[119b.7\]]de lus 'di yang de lta bu'i rang bzhin no/_/de lta bu'i chos can no/_/chos nyid 'di las ma 'das pa'o zhes lus 'di yang de dang sbyar [#]ro zhes gsungs so/_/'di ni re zhig 'dod chags la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po mdor bsdus pa'o/_/zhe sdang gi gnyen po ni byams pa dang mi sdug pa'i sems
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]can mi mthong ba'am de dang lhan cig tu zas la sogs pa don gcig [#]pas dga' ba skye'o/_/de la gzhan la bde ba 'dod pa dang don du gnyer ba dang mos pa dang mngon par dga' ba ni byams pa ste/_'dod pa la 'dod chags dang lan du phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu dag las nyon
[\[120a.2\]]mongs pa can ma yin pa'i chags pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/de ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las/_sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/chos la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni spyod pa la
[\[120a.3\]]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni mi [#]skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o [#]zhes gsungs so/_/yang sangs rgyas la dmigs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang
[\[120a.4\]]sangs rgyas la dmigs pa dang /_sems can la dmigs pa'o/_/de la sems can la dmigs pa ni gang thog mar snying du sdug pa'i sems can la phan pa dang bde ba nye bar bsgrub par bsam par [#]goms par byed cing de dang mthun pa'i byams pa nye bar bsgrub po[#]/_/de'i 'og tu 'dres pa
[\[120a.5\]]rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu tha mal pa rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu nye 'khor ba rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu rang gi grong na gnas pa rnams la'o/_/de bzhin du gzhan gyi grong pa nas phyogs gcig gi bar du mos par byas te khyab [#]par byas nas [#]rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/phyogs bcur yang de
[\[120a.6\]]bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa la dmigs pa la ni sbyor ba 'di med de/_de ni rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba las/_de byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_gzugs yid du 'ong ba'am yid du mi 'ong ba gang ji snyed cig mthong ba dang /_de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg
[\[120a.7\]]bya dang chos yid du 'ong ba'am/_yid du mi 'ong ba'am [#]kha na ma tho ba med pa dag la bde ba rgya che ba 'od gsal ba'am/_gang gis [#]yid bde ba skye ba dang /_bde ba bsgrub pa dang /_dad pa skye pa dang /[ #]dga' ba 'byung ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba la gnas pa dang /_mgu ba 'byung ba dang /_
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]yid mi bde ba ldog pa dang /_sems dge ba 'byung ba dang /_sems las su rung bar 'gyur ba dang /_bsam pa mnyen [#]par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po rab tu tshim par 'gyur ba'i bde ba de [#]myong ba na/_sangs rgyas thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_yongs su bsngo ba 'dis sangs
[\[120b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi ting nge [#]'dzin gyi bde ba mtshungs pa med pas legs par zin par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi bde ba mtha' yas pas rgya cher brtan par gyur cig_/_
[\[120b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i bde ba tshad med pa dang ldan par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gyi bde ba dpag tu med pas legs par zin par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa chags pa med pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas legs par yongs su zin par gyur cig_/sangs
[\[120b.4\]]rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa'i bde ba bsnyen par dka' ba rgyun mi 'chad par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs kyi bde ba dpag tu med pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig_/tshor ba thams cad zhi bar [#]mi skye ba'i bde bas 'gyur ba med par bde bar gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba'i [#]chags pa
[\[120b.5\]]med par gnas par rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa gnyis su [#]kun du mi spyod pas rnam par mi 'khrugs [#]par bde bar gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpas de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su bsngos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo ste/_gang 'di
[\[120b.6\]]bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams yongs su dag par bya ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub kyi
[\[120b.7\]]sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu'i gnas su bya ba dang thams cad mkhyen pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i go cha rgyun mi gcad pa dang /_byang chub kyi sgo'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]sems dpa'i gnas pa thams cad rtogs par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad mngon par shes pa rno bar bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad [#]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du reg par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de de ltar
[\[121a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos nas/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la spyod pa dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste/_sems can gang la la dag se gol cig gtogs [#]pa srid du sangs rgyas kyi sgra nyan
[\[121a.3\]]pa'am/_chos kyi sgra nyan pa'am/_'phags pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos rjes su dran pa
[\[121a.4\]]la sbyor bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun la gus par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu rtogs par bya
[\[121a.5\]]ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/yon tan dpag tu med pa bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi dge ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/chos la yid gnyis zlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi bsten [#]pa la zhugs
[\[121a.6\]]pa rnams dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la yongs su [#]bsngo ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' de [#]sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su bsngo ste/_gang 'di sems can dmyal ba pa'i lam las bzlog [#]pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam
[\[121a.7\]]par gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nye bar gcad pa'i bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/ngan song ma lus pa [#]thams cad kyi 'gro bar skye ba rnam par gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems can de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub la mos pa
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]rnam par spel ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spong ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shin tu bde ba bsgrub [#]par bya ba'i phyir yongs
[\[121b.2\]]su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[121b.3\]]sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la [#]rtag tu brtson pa/_rgyags pa dang bag med pa bzlog pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_nyon mongs pa thams cad la rgyab
[\[121b.4\]]kyis phyogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rjes su slob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam dang zhe ma 'gras pa/_ye shes kyi sa la brten pa/_mkhas pa dang 'grogs par dga' ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_bung ba ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs [# ]
[\[121b.5\]]pa 'gro ba thams cad la [#]skyob pa'i rgyu [#]dang ldan pa/_'dus byas thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa de'i/_gos dang zas dang na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dang 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang /_lus kyi bsnyen bkur dang /_'dug pa la sogs pa rten [#]pa'i gnas la 'jug pa'i las dang /_spyod lam
[\[121b.6\]]gyi gnas dang /_spyod lam rnam par mi 'khrugs pa dang /_lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las [#]legs par spyad pa dang /_dbang po drug sdom pa dang /_rang gi lus g.yogs [#]pa dang /_mnye ba dang bkru ba'i las dang /_zos pa dang /_'chos pa dang /_myangs pa dang /_bskum
[\[121b.7\]]pa dang /_brkyang [#]ba dang /_lta ba dang /_rnam par lta ba dang /_gnyid kyis log pa dang /_gnyid kyis [#]log pa dang /_rang gi lus su gtogs pa'i bsnyen bkur ci gang [#]yang rung [#]ste/_de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma bsngos pa cung zad kyang med do zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]rang gi ba rnams dang de las gzhan dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams la/_'bras chan pho tshum [#]gang ngam zan chang cig [#]tsam yongs su gtong pa yang skye ba de dang de dag tu de dag nyid la phan pa dang de dag [#]nyid yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir de thams cad yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[122a.2\]]sems can de dag dud 'gro'i skye gnas de dang sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho [#]dang sdug bsngal nye bar len pa de dang sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dang /_sdug bsngal nye bar bsags pa de dang /_sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed pa [#]dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gzhi [#]dang /_sdug bsngal gyi
[\[122a.3\]]rtsa ba de dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gnas de las rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de la dmigs pas sems can thams cad la dmigs par byed do/_/sems can rnams la [#]mngon du byed do/_/yid la byed do/_/'di lta ste thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo [#]bar
[\[122a.4\]]byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de la mngon [#]du 'gro bar byed do/_/byang chub sems bskyed pas rab tu 'dzin to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de la sbyor ro/_/'khor ba'i dgon pa las rnam par zlog [#]go/_/sangs rgyas kyi bde ba sgrib pa med pa mngon du byed do/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las 'byin to/_/sangs
[\[122a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos dang ldan pa'i byams pas khyab par byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/gser 'od dam [#]pa las gsungs pa'i byams pa dang snying rje'i snying po can gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gus pa thams cad kyis bsams te/_tha na tshig gis kyang bsgom par bya'o/_/gser
[\[122a.6\]]'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/_/stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/_/ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang /_/dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/'jig rten phongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig_/ji ltar
[\[122a.7\]]thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/_/sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog_/ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/_/'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang ldan pa ltar/_/skye dgu [#]ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi_/yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]mtshor gyur/_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dbyangs ldan gyur[#]/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa [#]mchog reg shog_/chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba skor [#]gyur cig_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog_/'gro la phan
[\[122b.2\]]phyir chos ni [#]ston gyur cig_/nyon mongs 'joms 'gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig_/sems can gang dag ngan song sar gnas te/_/rus pa dang ni lus gdungs [#]rab 'bar ba/_/de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa [#]thos gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas
[\[122b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig smra shog_/sems can kun gyi [#]skye ba brgya dag dang /_/skye ba stong phrag bye ba [#]skye dran shog_/thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig_/de dag gis [#]ni rgya chen gsung thos shog_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/_/sdig
[\[122b.4\]]pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog_/bya ba dge ba rnams ni spyod gyur cig_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang /_/'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi [#]gyur/_/sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams/_/de kun da ltar dbang po tshang bar shog_/_
[\[122b.5\]]gang dag nad btab nyam chung lus nyams [#]dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/_/de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig_/nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog_/gang dag rgyal po chom rkun shor bas bsdigs bsad [#]'os/_/sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs brgya yis
[\[122b.6\]]phongs gyur pa/_/sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/_/'jigs mchog mi bzad brgyad [#]po de las thar gyur cig_/gang dag brdegs shing [#]bcings dang bcings pas gzir/_/phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing /_/nyon mongs stong phrag du mas dkrugs [# ]
[\[122b.7\]]nas kyang /_/'jigs pa mi bzang mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/_/de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cig_/mnar ba dag ni brdegs [#]las thar bar shog_/gsad bya rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur shog[ #]/phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs pa med par shog_/sems can gang dag
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bkres sred skom gyis gzir/_/de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog_/long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig_/'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog_/gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed gyur/_/sems can dbul
[\[123a.2\]]pos gter rnams rnyed par shog_/nor 'bru [#]rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/_/sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog_/gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur/_/sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang /_/gzugs bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog_/_
[\[123a.3\]]rtag tu bde ba du ma stsogs [#]gyur cig_/yid kyis zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag_/bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig_/rdza rnga pheg [#]rnga pi bang sgra snyan dang /_/chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing bu lteng ka dag_/gser gyi pad+ma ut+pal pad+ma can/_/zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig_/_
[\[123a.4\]]rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya/_/de dag bsams [#]ma thag tu grub gyur cig_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra mi [#]'byung /_/sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma 'gyur[#]/_/de dag thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang /_/phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog_/_
[\[123a.5\]]mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/_/de dag bsams [#]pas skye bar de dag gyur/_/bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang /_/bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog_/spos dang phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang /_/gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag_/ljon
[\[123a.6\]]shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog_/sems can mtha' dag len cing dgar gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_/rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang /_/phyogs bcu rnams su mchod
[\[123a.7\]]pa byed par shog_/'gro ba dman pa [#]thams cad spong gyur cig_/mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog_/dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rtag tu mthon po'i gnas [#]su skye bar shog_/nor dang
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig_/snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/_/bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog_/bud med thams cad rtag tu por gyur te/_/dpa' zhing rtul phod [#]mkhas shing gsal bar shog_/de kun rtag [#]tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/_/
[\[123b.2\]]pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog_/phyogs bcu dag na [#]rin chen shing dbang drung /[ #]/sangs rgyas bder [#]bzhugs rin chen bai DUr+ya'i/_/khri la bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig_/chos bstan pa yang bdag gis de thob [#]shog_/ces bya ba'o[#]//_//bam po bcu pa/_gti
[\[123b.3\]]mug gi phra rgyas kyi gnyen po ni rten cing 'brel par [#]'byung ba la lta [#]ba'o/_/de la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni/_/sA [#]lu ljang pa'i mdo las bstan pa ste/_de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu dang 'brel pa gang zhe na/_gang 'di ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba nas
[\[123b.4\]]skye ba'i rkyen gyis [#]rga shi zhes bya ba'i bar du'o[#]/_/gal te ma rig pa ma byung na 'di snyam du bdag gis 'du byed kyang ma mthong [#]zhing /_de bzhin du skye ba ma byung du zin na rga shi'i bar du yang mi mthong ba zhig na[#]/_'on kyang ma rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba nas
[\[123b.5\]]skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]'du byed rnams mngon par bsgrub [#]po snyam du mi sems so/_/'du byed rnams kyang 'di snyam du bdag cag ni ma rig [#]pas mngon par bsgrub po [#]snyam du mi sems pa nas/_
[\[123b.6\]]de bzhin du skye ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]rga shi mngon par bsgrub [#]po snyam du mi sems shing /_rga shi yang 'di snyam du bdag ni skye bas mngon par bsgrub [#]po snyam du mi sems pa'i bar du ste/_'on kyang ma rig pa yod pa las 'du byed rnams mngon par 'grub cing /_'byung bar
[\[123b.7\]]'gyur ba nas/_de bzhin du [#]skye ba yod pa las rga shi'i bar du mngon par 'grub cing 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar na [#]nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i [#]rgyu dang 'brel par blta'o/_/nang [#]gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel ba ji ltar lta [#]zhe na khams drug 'dus [#]pa'i phyir
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]te/_khams drug po gang dag 'dus pa'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa dang chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par shes pa'i khams 'dus pa las nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rkyen dang 'brel par blta'o/_/de la nang gi rten cing 'brel [#]par 'byung ba'i
[\[124a.2\]]sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang 'di 'dus nas lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par 'grub par byed pa 'di ni sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus sdud pa'i bya ba byed pa 'di ni chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus kyi bros pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams [#]'ju bar byed pa 'di
[\[124a.3\]]ni me'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang [#]lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba'i bya ba byed pa de [#]ni rlung gi khams zhes bya'o/_/gang lus kyi nang sbubs yod par byed pa 'di ni nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/gang mdung khyim gyi tshul du lus kyi ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub par byed pa
[\[124a.4\]]rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs su gtogs pa dang zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'di ni rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/rkyen 'di dag med par lus skye bar mi 'gyur gyi nam nang gi sa'i khams tshang zhing de bzhin du chu dang me dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang rnam par
[\[124a.5\]]shes pa'i khams rnams kyang tshang bar gyur [#]la/_thams cad 'dus pa de las lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de la [#]sa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]lus kyi sra ba'i dngos po mngon par bsgrub [#]po snyam du mi sems so/_/chu'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag
[\[124a.6\]]gis lus sdud pa'i bya ba 'di [#]bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/me'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]lus kyis zos pa dang 'thungs [#]pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams 'ju bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/rlung gi khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]lus kyi dbugs phyi nang du rgyu
[\[124a.7\]]ba'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/nam mkha'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi nang skabs yod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis lus kyi ming dang gzugs mngon par bsgrub po snyam du mi sems so/_/lus
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]kyang 'di snyam du bdag [#]ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi [#]sems mod kyi/_'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod na lus skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skye ba po ma yin/_shed las skyes pa ma yin/_shed bu ma yin/_
[\[124b.2\]]bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_ma ning ma yin/_nga ma yin/_bdag gi [#]ma yin/_gzhan su'i yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang
[\[124b.3\]]bdag ma yin/_sems can ma yin/_srog ma yin/_skye ba po ma yin/_shed las skyes pa ma yin/_shed bu ma yin/_bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin/_ma ning ma yin/_nga ma yin/_bdag gi [#]ma yin/_gzhan su'i yang ma yin no/_/de la ma rig pa gang zhe na/_khams
[\[124b.4\]]drug po 'di dag nyid la gang gcig pur 'du shes pa dang /_ril por 'du shes pa dang /_rtag par 'du shes pa dang /_brtan par 'du shes pa dang /_ther zug tu 'du shes pa dang /_bde bar 'du shes pa dang /_bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_skye ba po dang /_gso
[\[124b.5\]]ba dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang shed las skyes pa dang /_shed bur 'du shes pa dang /_nga zhes bya ba dang bdag gi zhes bya bar 'du shes pa ste/_'di lta bu la sogs pa mi shes pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di ni ma rig pa zhes bya'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa yod pas yul
[\[124b.6\]]rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug 'jug ste/_de la yul rnams la 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gang yin pa 'di ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o/_/dngos po so sor rnam par rig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig byung ba
[\[124b.7\]]nye bar len pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni ming dang gzugs so/_/ming dang gzugs la brten pa'i dbang po rnams ni skye [#]mched drug go/_/chos gsum 'dus pa ni reg pa'o/_/reg pa myong ba ni tshor ba'o/_/tshor ba la zhen pa ni sred pa'o/_/sred pa 'phel ba ni len pa'o/_/len pa las
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]skye ba yang srid pa skye ba'i las ni srid pa'o/_/rgyu de las phung po 'byung ba ni skye ba'o/_/skyes nas phung po smin pa ni rga ba'o/_/rgas nas phung po 'jig pa ni 'chi ba'o/_/'chi ba na rmongs pa mngon par chags pa dang bcas pa'i nang gi yongs su gdung ba ni mya ngan to/_/mya
[\[125a.2\]]ngan las byung [#]ba'i tshig tu smre [#]ba ni smre sngags 'don pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa lnga'i tshogs dang ldan pa'i mi bde ba myong ba ni sdug bsngal lo/_/yid la byed pa dang ldan pa yid kyi sdug bsngal ni yid mi bde ba'o/_/gzhan yang 'di lta bu la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa gang yin pa de dag
[\[125a.3\]]ni 'khrug pa zhes bya'o/_/[#]de bzhin du sbyar te/_de la mun pa chen po'i phyir ma rig pa'o/_/mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams so/_/rnam par rig pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o/_rten pa'i phyir ming dang gzugs so/_/skye ba'i sgo'i phyir skye mched drug go/_/reg pa'i phyir reg
[\[125a.4\]]pa'o/_/myong ba'i phyir tshor ba'o/_/skom pa'i phyir sred pa'o/_/nye bar len pa'i phyir len pa'o/_/yang srid pa skyed pa'i phyir srid pa'o/_/phung po 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba'o/_/phung po smin pa'i phyir rga ba'o/_/'jig [#]pa'i phyir 'chi ba'o/_/mya [#]ngan byed pa'i phyir mya ngan to/_/tshig gis [#]smra ba'i
[\[125a.5\]]phyir smre sngags 'don pa'o/_/lus la gnod pa'i phyir sdug bsngal lo/_/sems la gnod pa'i phyir yid mi bde ba'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i phyir 'khrug pa'o/_/gzhan yang de kho na mi rtogs shing log par rtogs pa'i mi shes pa ni ma rig pa'o/_/de ltar ma rig pa yod pa [#]na 'du byed rnam
[\[125a.6\]]pa gsum mngon par 'grub ste/_bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba dang /_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba dang /_mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba ste 'di ni ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams zhes bya'o/_/bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las bsod nams su nye bar 'gro
[\[125a.7\]]ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur/_/bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams la [#]bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur/_mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i 'du byed rnams las mi g.yo bar nye bar 'gro ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid du 'gyur te
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]'di ni 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis [#]rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o/_/ming dang gzugs kyang de bzhin no/_/ming dang gzugs rnam par 'phel bar [#]skye mched drug gi sgo nas bya ba byed pa rnams 'byung ste/_de ni ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya'o/_/skye mched drug pa dag las reg pa'i
[\[125b.2\]]tshogs drug 'byung ste/_de ni skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa zhes bya'o/_/ji lta bur reg pa 'byung ba de lta bur [#]tshor ba 'byung ste/_de ni reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba zhes bya'o/_/tshor ba'i bye brag de dag myong ba dang /_mngon par dga' ba dang lhag par zhen pa dang /_lhag par zhen nas 'dug pa
[\[125b.3\]]de ni tshor ba'i rkyen gyis [#]srid pa zhes bya'o/_/myong ba dang mngon par dga' ba dang lhag par zhen pa dang lhag par zhen nas [#]'dug pa las [#]bdag sdug pa'i ngo bo dang bde ba'i ngo bo dang 'bral bar ma gyur cig snyam du mi gtong ba dang phyir zhing don du gnyer ba 'di ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[125b.4\]]de ltar don du gnyer ba nas [#]yang srid pa skyed pa'i las [#]lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kun nas slong ba de ni len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa zhes bya'o/_/las de las skyes pa'i phung po rnams grub [#]pa gang yin pa de ni srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o/_/skyes nas mngon du grub pa'i phung po rnams
[\[125b.5\]]kyi [#]'phel ba dang yongs su smin pa las 'jigs par 'gyur ba de ni skye ba'i rkyen gyis [#]rga shi zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di dag ni gcig gi rgyu gcig gcig gi rkyen gcig[#]/_rtag pa ma yin mi rtag pa yang [#]ma yin/_'dus byas
[\[125b.6\]]ma yin 'dus ma byas ma yin/_rgyu med pa ma yin rkyen med pa ma yin/_myong ba yod pa ma yin/_zad pa'i chos ma yin/_'jig pa'i chos ma yin/_'gog pa'i chos ma yin te/_thog ma med pa'i dus nas zhugs pa rgyun ma chad par rlung gi rgyun bzhin du [#]rjes su zhugs mod kyi/_'on
[\[125b.7\]]kyang yan lag bzhi po 'di dag ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis po de bsdu bar bya ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa dang sred pa dang las dang rnam par shes pa'o/_/de la rnam par shes pa ni sa bon gyi rang bzhin gyis rgyu byed do/_/las ni zhing
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]gi [#]rang bzhin gyis [#]rgyu byed do/_/ma rig pa dang sred pa ni nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gyis [#]rgyu byed do/_/de la las dang nyon mongs pa dag ni sa bon rnam par shes pa bskyed do/_/de la las ni sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba byed do/_/srid pa ni sa bon rnam
[\[126a.2\]]par shes pa brlan [#]par byed do/_/ma rig pa ni sa bon rnam par shes pa 'debs te rkyen de dag med na [#]sa bon rnam par shes pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de la las kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa'i zhing gi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/sred pa yang 'di snyam
[\[126a.3\]]du bdag gis sa bon rnam par shes pa brlan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/ma rig pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis [#]sa bon rnam par shes pa gdab po snyam du mi sems so/_/sa bon rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis [#]bskyed do snyam du mi sems te 'on kyang sa
[\[126a.4\]]bon rnam par shes pa las kyi zhing la brten pa sred pa'i rlan [#]gyis brlan pa ma rig pas btab pa skye ba na/_skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams [#]sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang der ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par 'grub ste/_ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu de yang bdag gis ma byas gzhan gyis ma byas gnyi
[\[126a.5\]]gas ma byas/_dbang phyug gis ma byas dus kyis ma bsgyur rang bzhin las ma byung byed pa la rag las pa ma yin rgyu med pa las kyang ma skyes te[#]/_'on kyang pha dang [#]ma phrad pa dang dus dang ldan pa dang rkyen gzhan tshogs na bdag po med pa'i chos bdag gi med pa 'dzin pa med pa nam mkha' dang
[\[126a.6\]]mtshungs pa/_sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir skye gnas su nying mtshams [#]sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang der myong ba dang ldan pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par sgrub [#]po/_/'di lta ste/_mig gi rnam par shes pa ni rgyu lnga las 'byung [# ]
[\[126a.7\]]ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_mig la brten pa dang gzugs dang snang ba dang nam mkha' dang de bskyed pa'i yid la byed pa [#]brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo /_/de la mig ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba byed do/_/gzugs ni mig gi rnam par shes pa dmigs pa'i bya ba byed
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]do/_/snang ba [#]ni mngon pa'i bya ba byed do/_/nam mkha' ni mi sgrib pa'i bya ba byed do/_/de bskyed [#]pa'i yid la byed pa [#]ni sems pa'i bya ba byed do/_/rkyen de dag med na mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyi/_nam nang gi skye mched mig ma tshang bar ma gyur la/_de bzhin du gzugs
[\[126b.2\]]dang snang ba dang /_nam mkha' dang de skyed pa'i yid la byed pa dag kyang ma tshang bar ma gyur te/_thams cad 'dus pa de las mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de la mig ni 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi [#]rnam par shes pa'i rten gyi bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/gzugs
[\[126b.3\]]kyang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/snang ba yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi [#]rnam par shes pa'i mngon pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/nam mkha' yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
[\[126b.4\]]mi sgrib pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/de bskyed pa'i yid la byed pa yang 'di snyam du bdag gis mig gi rnam par shes pa'i sems pa'i bya ba bya'o snyam du mi sems so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa yang 'di snyam du bdag ni rkyen 'di dag gis bskyed do snyam du mi sems te
[\[126b.5\]]'on kyang rkyen 'di dag yod pa las mig gi rnam par shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dbang po lhag ma rnams la yang ci rigs su bya'o/_/de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu mi 'pho mod kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur
[\[126b.6\]]mngon par yang yod do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste dper na rab tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang bzhin me long gi dkyil 'khor du ma 'phos mod kyi/_rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir bzhin du mngon pa yang yod do/_/de bzhin du
[\[126b.7\]]'di nas kyang su yang shi 'phos [#]pa med la gzhan du yang ma skyes te/_rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod do/_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong nas 'gro ste/_'on kyang snod chung ngu chus gang bar
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni gnas de nas ma 'phos te/_snod chung ngu chus gang ba'i nang du song ba yang med mod kyi rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba [#]yang yod do/_/de bzhin du 'di nas kyang su
[\[127a.2\]]yang shi 'phos pa med la/_gzhan du [#]yang ma skyes mod kyi rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir las kyi 'bras bur mngon pa yang yod do[#]/_/'di lta ste dper na/_me ni rgyu dang rkyen ma tshang na mi 'bar gyi rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las 'bar ro/_/de bzhin du bdag po med pa'i chos bdag gi med pa
[\[127a.3\]]'dzin pa med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin dag la rgyu dang rkyen rnams ma tshang ba med pa'i phyir skye ba'i gnas nying mtshams [#]sbyor ba ma'i mngal de dang der sa bon rnam par shes pa las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bskyed pa ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu mngon par sgrub
[\[127a.4\]]po/_/de la nang gi rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam pa lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_rtag par ma yin pa dang /_chad par ma yin pa dang /_'pho bar ma yin pa dang /_rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen por 'byung ba dang /_de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o/_/ji ltar rtag par ma yin no [#]zhe na/_gang gi phyir tha ma 'chi
[\[127a.5\]]ba'i phung po rnams kyang gzhan la skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams kyang gzhan te/_tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po gang yin pa de nyid [#]skye ba'i char gtogs pa rnams ma yin gyi[#]/_tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la [#]skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams kyang 'byung bas de'i phyir rtag par
[\[127a.6\]]ma yin no/_/ji ltar chad par ma yin zhe na/_tha ma [#]'chi ba'i phung po rnams 'gags pa las skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams 'byung ba ma yin [#]'gags pa las kyang ma yin gyi tha ma 'chi ba'i phung po rnams kyang 'gags la de nyid kyi tshe skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i phung po rnams srang
[\[127a.7\]]mda'i mthon dman bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur te de'i phyir chad par [#]ma yin no/_/ji ltar 'pho bar ma yin zhe na/_sems can gyi ris mi 'dra ba nas skal ba mnyam pa'i skye bar skye ba mngon par 'grub pas [#]de'i phyir 'pho bar ma yin no/_/ji ltar rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po [#]'byung zhe na/_
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]las chung ngu byas pa las 'bras bu chen po'i rnam par smin pa myong ste de'i phyir rgyu chung ngu las 'bras bu chen po [#]mngon par 'grub po/_/ji ltar myong bar 'gyur ba'i las byas pa de lta bur myong bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa myong bas de'i phyir de dang 'dra ba'i rgyud du'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu rten cing
[\[127b.2\]]'brel bar 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par gsungs pa 'di gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis 'di ltar yang dag pa [#]ji lta ba bzhin du rtag par rgyun du srog med pa dang srog dang bral ba dang /_ji lta ba [#]nyid dang /_ma nor ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma
[\[127b.3\]]byas pa dang /_'dus ma byas pa dang /_thogs pa med pa dang /_dmigs pa med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_'jigs pa med pa dang /_mi 'phrogs pa dang /_mi zad pa dang /_rnam par ma zhi ba'i rang bzhin du mthong ba dang /_med pa dang /_gsog dang /_gsob [#]dang /_snying po med pa dang /_nad dang
[\[127b.4\]]'bras dang /_zug rngu dang /_sdig pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang bdag med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba de ni/_ci bdag sngon gyi dus na byung ba zhig gam 'on te ma byung ba zhig snyam du sngon gyi mtha' la mi rtog go/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na cir [#]'gyur ci lta bur
[\[127b.5\]]'gyur zhes ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' la mi rtog go/_/'di ci zhig 'di ci lta bu zhig ci zhig yod cir 'gyur sems can 'di dag [#]gang nas 'ongs 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes da [#]ltar byung ba [#]la yang mi rtog go zhes bya ba'o/_/'phags pa sa bcu'i [#]mdo las kyang gsungs te/[# ]
[\[127b.6\]]de la ma rig pa dang sred pa dang len pa ni nyon mongs pa'i lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad pa'o/_/'du byed dang srid pa ni las kyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad [#]pa'o/_/lhag ma rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad par rab tu rnam par phye'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed
[\[127b.7\]]rnams zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngon gyi mtha' la ltos [#]pa'o/_/rnam par shes pa nas tshor ba'i bar de ni da ltar byung ba la ltos [#]pa'o/_/sred pa nas srid pa zhes bya ba'i bar de ni phyi ma'i mtha' la ltos [#]pa ste/_de phan chad yang de dag rab tu 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de 'di snyam
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]du sems te/_ldan pa las ni 'dus byas 'byung ngo /_/bral ba las ni 'dus byas mi 'byung ngo /_/tshogs pa las ni 'dus byas 'byung ngo /_/ma tshogs pa las ni 'dus byas [#]mi 'byung ngo /_/ma la de ltar bdag gis [#]'dus byas nyes pa mang po'i skyon chags pa 'di lta
[\[128a.2\]]bu 'di shes par byas la/_'du ba 'di dang tshogs pa 'di'i rgyun gcad par yang [#]bya'o/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 'du byed rnams shin tu zhi bar bya ba thob par yang mi bya'o snyam mo zhes gsungs te[#]/_/'di ni gti mug sbyang ba mdor bsdus pa'o/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa
[\[128a.3\]]las/_sems yongs su sbyang ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//de ltar sems las su rung nas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la 'jug ste/_de la mi sdug pa'i skabs nas lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bshad zin to/_/de nyid dbye ba'i [#]bag tsam zhig [#]chos yang dag par sdud pa'i
[\[128a.4\]]mdo las gsungs te/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar lus 'di ni rkang pa dang /_rkang sor dang /_byin pa dang /_brla dang /_dku [#]do dang /_lto ba dang /_lte ba dang /_sgal tshigs dang /_snying dang /_rtsib logs [#]dang /_sog pa dang /_lag pa dang /_lag ngar dang /_dpung pa
[\[128a.5\]]dang /_thal gong dang /_mjing pa dang /_'gram pa dang /_dpral ba dang /_mgo dang /_mgo'i thod pa 'dus pa tsam ste/_las 'byung ba'i byed pa pos bsags pa/_nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang kun du rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa tha dad pa brgya stong gi gnas su gyur pa'o/_/_
[\[128a.6\]]'dir khams kyi rdzas mang po 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/_skra dang kha [#]spu dang sen mo dang so dang rus pa dang pags pa dang sha dang sha'i spri [#]dang rgyus pa dang tshil dang zhag dang chu ser dang mcher pa dang gcin dang phyi sa dang /_pho ba dang long ka dang khrag dang snabs dang mkhris pa dang /_rnag dang mchil ma
[\[128a.7\]]dang klad pa dang klad [#]rgyas rnams te/_de ltar rdzas mang po 'dus pa yin no[#]/_/'di la lus zhes ji skad du bya snyam du lus dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/de la [#]so sor rtog pa na 'di snyam du sems te/_lus 'di ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs so snyam nas de lus la nam mkha' ltar dran pa nye
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]bar 'jog go/_/de thams cad nam mkha' ltar mthong ngo /_/de lus yongs su shes pa'i phyir [#]gang du yang dran pa nye bar [#]mi 'jog go/_/rnam par mi 'jog [#]go/_/rnam par mi 'phro'o [#]zhes bya ba'o/_/yang gsungs pa/_lus 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' nas kyang ma 'ongs/_phyi ma'i mthar
[\[128b.2\]]yang mi 'gro_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' la yang mi gnas te/_gzhan du na yang dag pa ma yin pa phyin ci log las byung ba/_byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa/_thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa/_rtsa ba gnas pa med pa/_bdag po med pa nga'i ba med pa yongs su 'dzin pa
[\[128b.3\]]med pa ste/_tshogs zhes bya ba dang lus zhes bya ba dang longs spyod ces bya ba dang gnas zhes bya ba dang rten zhes bya ba dang tshang zhes bya ba dang /_skye mched ces bya ba ni glo bur gyi tha snyad rnams kyis [#]tha snyad btags pa'o/_/lus 'di ni snying po med pa ste/_pha dang [#]ma'i khu ba dang khrag las byung
[\[128b.4\]]ba mi gtsang ba rul ba rang bzhin gyis [#]dri mi zhim pa/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'jigs pa dang sgyid lug pa'i rkun pos dkrugs pa/_rtag tu 'jig pa 'bral ba 'brul [#]ba rnam par 'thor ba rnam par 'joms pa'i chos can/_nad tha dad pa brgya stong gi tshang ngo snyam du lus
[\[128b.5\]]la dran pa nye bar 'jog go zhes bya ba'o/_/'phags pa gtsug [#]na rin po che'i mdo las kyang /_kye ma'o lus 'di ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa ste ring por mi gnas pa [#]tha mar 'chi ba yin par shes nas lus kyi phyir mi mthun pa'i 'tsho ba mi spyod cing snying po len to/_/de snying po gsum len te/_
[\[128b.6\]]gsum gang zhe na/_lus kyi snying po dang /_longs spyod kyi snying po dang /_'tsho ba'i snying po'o/_/de lus mi rtag go snyam nas sems can thams cad kyi bran dang slob mar khas blangs te ci bya'o cog la 'bad pa yin[#]/_lus mi rtag go snyam nas lus kyi nyes pa yon po dang g.yo dang tshul
[\[128b.7\]]'chos pa thams cad mi byed do/_/lus mi rtag go snyam nas srog la bag mi ston [#]par 'gyur te srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed do/_/lus mi rtag go snyam nas longs spyod la spyod pa [#]sred cing chags par mi byed de de [#]bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' lus la lus kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa/_bdag gi lus de las sems can thams cad kyi lus nye bar 'dogs shing bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gnas la
[\[129a.2\]]gnas par bya'o snyam ste/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zag pa med pa ltar rang gi lus kyi chos nyid la yang de bzhin du rtog [#]go/_/de zag pa med pa'i chos la mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi lus kyang de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/khyim
[\[129a.3\]]bdag dpas byin gyis [#]zhus pa las kyang /_'di lta ste lus [#]'di mthar gyis 'grub pa dang mthar gyis [#]'jig pa dang rdul phra rab bstsags [#]pa dang khong stong dang dgye gu [#]can dang bu ga dgu dang spu'i khung bu nas zag pa dang /_grog mkhar lngar sbrul gdug pa'i gnas su gyur pa dang /_ma skyes dgra'i
[\[129a.4\]]spre'u ltar grogs la 'khu ba dang /_bshes gnyen ngan pa ltar 'drid pa'i bdag nyid can dang /_dbu ba rdos pa ltar rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba dang /_chu'i chu bur ltar byung nas 'jig cing 'ju ba dang /_smig rgyu ltar slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang /_chu shing ltar bshig na snying po med pa dang /_sgyu ma
[\[129a.5\]]ltar [#]slu ba'i bdag nyid can dang /_rgyal po ltar bsgo blag mang ba dang /_dgra ltar glags lta ba dang /_rkun po ltar yid brtan du mi rung ba dang gshed ma ltar rjes su chags pa med pa dang /_mi mdza' [#]ba ltar mi phan par 'dod pa dang /_gsod pa ltar shes rab kyi srog gi bar chad byed pa dang /_
[\[129a.6\]]grong stong ltar bdag dang bral ba dang /_rdza mkhan gyi snod ltar mthar 'jig pa dang /_rdzing [#]ltar mi gtsang ba sna tshogs kyis [#]yongs su gang ba dang /_sbang ma'i snod ltar mi gtsang ba zag pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_rma ltar bskyod mi bzod pa dang /_zug rngu ltar gnod pa'i bdag nyid can
[\[129a.7\]]dang /_khang rnying [#]ltar bcos legs bya zhing brten [#]pa dang /_gru rnying ltar bcos legs bya zhing spyad pa dang /_bum pa so ma btang ba ltar nan tan gyis bag bya dgos pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_chu 'gram gyi shing ltar g.yo zhing 'gul ba dang /_chu klung chen po'i rgyun ltar mthar 'chi
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]ba'i rgya mtsho la thug pa dang /_glo bur ba'i khyim ltar sdug bsngal thams cad kyi gnas su gyur pa dang /_mgon med pa'i gnas khang ltar yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa dang /_btson srung [#]ltar gsug gis [#]bsgrub par bya ba dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_byis pa chung ngu ltar rtag tu yongs su
[\[129b.2\]]bskyang dgos pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/yang gsungs pa/_'di ltar mi gtsang phung po'i lus la ni/_/gzugs kyi nga rgyal can gang gces 'dzin pa/_/byis pa'i blo can de ni mngon bzhin du/_/mi shes ngan skyugs bum pa thogs shing 'gro/_/de yi sna nas rnag gi rnam pa 'dzag_/kha
[\[129b.3\]]nas dri mi zhim pa rtag tu 'byung /_/skye bo'i [#]kha 'gram mig ni srin bu bzhin/_/de la su zhig chags shing gces par byed/_/dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su/_/'di ni dkar por bya zhes bdar byed kyang /_/dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur zad par 'gyur/_/byis [#]blo phyin ci log
[\[129b.4\]]tu mngon par rlom/_/de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros ldan/_/nga yi [#]lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te[#]/_/bskus phyis 'bab stegs brgyar [#]ni khrus byas kyang /_/'chi bdag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar lus la 'jig [#]pa dang /_bu ga dgu'i
[\[129b.5\]]sgo nas 'dzag par brtag par bya ba nas byang chub sems dpa'i lus la srin bu'i rigs brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnas su brtag par bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_byang chub sems dpa' [#]lus la spyang ki dang ce spyang dang khyi dang rjen sha za ba [#]gzhan gyi zas su brtag par bya/_byang chub
[\[129b.6\]]sems dpa' lus la rus pa dang rgyus pa'i bog res [#]sbrel bas 'khrul 'khor lta bur brtag par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' lus la [#]zas dang skom las byung ba ste rang gi kha na las pa ma yin par brtag par bya'o zhes te rgya cher ni de nyid las shes par bya'o/_/tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag
[\[129b.7\]]pa ni/_re zhig 'phags pa gtsug [#]na rin po che'i mdo las ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsdom pa ni tshor ba [#]bde bar gnas pa'i sems can rnams la [#]snying rje chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]de 'di ltar gang la tshor ba med pa de ni bde ba yin no zhes slob ste/_des sems can thams cad kyi tshor ba spang ba'i phyir tshor ba rnams la tshor ba'i rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom mo/_/de sems can rnams kyi tshor ba 'gog pa'i phyir go cha bgos
[\[130a.2\]]kyang bdag gi tshor ba 'gog par yang mi byed do/_/des tshor ba gang ci myong yang tshor ba de dag thams cad snying rje chen pos yongs su bzung zhing myong bar byed do/_/de nam bde ba'i tshor ba myong ba'i tshe na 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams [#]la snying rje chen po rnyed de bdag gi 'dod
[\[130a.3\]]chags kyi cha [#]bag la nyal ba yang yongs su spong ngo /_/nam sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba'i tshe na zhe sdang la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de bdag gi zhe sdang gi bdag la nyal yang yongs su [#]spong ngo /_/nam bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba myong ba'i
[\[130a.4\]]tshe na gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje chen po rnyed de bdag gi gti mug gi bag la nyal yang rab tu spong ngo /_/bde ba'i tshor ba la [#]rjes su chags par mi 'gyur te rjes su chags pa [#]legs par 'joms par yang byed do/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la khong khro bar yang mi 'gyur
[\[130a.5\]]te/_khong khro ba legs par 'joms par [#]yang byed do/_/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la ma rig pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur te ma rig pa legs par 'joms par yang byed do/_/des tshor ba gang ci myong ba de dag thams cad kyang mi rtag par shes shing myong bar
[\[130a.6\]]byed do/_/sdug bsngal du shes shing myong bar byed do/_/bdag med par shes shing myong bar byed do/_/de bde ba'i tshor ba la ni mi rtag par shes par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba la ni zug rngur shes par 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba
[\[130a.7\]]la ni zhi bar shes par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar na [#]gang bde ba de ni mi rtag pa'o/_/gang sdug bsngal ba de ni sdug bsngal ba nyid do/_/gang bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa de ni bdag med pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no/_/'phags pa blo gros
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang /_sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas reg na ngan song dang mi khom par skyes pa'i sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po bskyed [#]do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_tshor ba ni mngon par zhen pa'o/_/tshor ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/tshor ba ni nye bar len pa'o/_/tshor ba ni
[\[130b.2\]]dmigs pa'o/_/tshor ba ni phyin ci log go/_/tshor ba ni rnam par rtog pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang /_tshor ba myong bar rab bstan [#]pa/_/tshor ba las gzhan tshor ba po/_/gud na yod pa ma yin na/_/gang gis [#]de ni tshor
[\[130b.3\]]bar 'gyur/_/byang chub ci 'dra de bzhin du/_/zhi zhing dag la 'od gsal bar/_/tshor ba 'di la mkhas pa rnams/_/dran pa de ltar nye bar gzhag_/ces gsungs so/_/de [#]ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa mdor bsdus pa'o/_/sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni [#]dkon mchog
[\[130b.4\]]brtsegs pa las ji skad du/_de 'di ltar sems yongs su tshor [#]te/_'dod chags par 'gyur ba'am zhe sdang bar 'gyur ba'am gti mug par 'gyur ba'i sems de dag [#]gang yin/_ci 'das pa'am ma 'ongs pa'am da ltar byung ba zhig yin/_de la sems 'das pa gang yin pa de ni zad
[\[130b.5\]]pa'o/_/ma 'ongs pa [#]gang yin pa de ni ma phyin pa'o/_/da ltar byung ba ni gnas pa med do snyam mo/_/'od srungs sems ni nang na yang [#]med phyi rol na yang med gnyi ga na yang med cing mi dmigs so[#]/_/'od srungs sems ni gzugs med pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa med pa/_
[\[130b.6\]]rten med pa/_snang ba med pa/_rnam par rig pa med pa/_gnas med pa'o/_/'od srungs sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes las chos rnams 'byung ba ma gtogs par/_/sangs
[\[130b.7\]]rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs mi gzigs gzigs par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de'i rgyu ba ci 'dra bar rig par bya zhe na/_'od srungs sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs te yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pas skye ba rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin to/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'od
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]srungs sems ni 'bab chu'i rgyun dang mtshungs te mi gnas pa skyes nas 'jig cing dengs [#]pa'o/_/'od srungs sems ni rlung dang mtshungs te ring du 'gro zhing gzung du med par rgyu ba'o[#]/_/'od srungs sems [#]ni mar me'i 'od 'phro ba dang mtshungs te rgyu dang rkyen las byung [# ]
[\[131a.2\]]ba'o/_/'od srungs sems ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa glo bur ba rnams kyis nye bar nyon mongs [#]pa'o/_/'od srungs sems ni glog dang mtshungs te skad cig gcig [#]tu 'jig cing mi gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'od srungs sems
[\[131a.3\]]ni sdug bsngal thams cad bskyed [#]pa'i phyir mi mdza' ba dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa'i phyir bye ma'i khang pa dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa'i phyir nya'i mchil pa dang mtshungs so/_/
[\[131a.4\]]'od srungs sems na [#]bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa'i phyir rmi lam dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni mi gtsang ba la gtsang bar 'du shes pa'i phyir sbrang ma sngon po dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni gnod pa rnam pa mang po byed pas phyir rgol ba dang mtshungs so/_/'od
[\[131a.5\]]srungs sems ni rtag tu klan ka tshol ba'i phyir gnod sbyin mdangs 'phrog pa dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni rtag tu glags lta bas dgra dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba dang ldan pas rtag tu [#]mtho dman can no/_/'od srungs sems ni dge
[\[131a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rku bas chom rkun dang mtshungs so[#]/_/'od srungs sems ni gzugs la dga' bas phyi byi zhi [#]la'i mig dang mtshungs so/_'od srungs sems ni sgra la dga' bas g.yul gyi rnga dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni phag mi gtsang ba'i dri la dga' ba bzhin du dri la
[\[131a.7\]]dga'o/_/'od srungs sems ni ro la dga' zhing zas kyi lhag ma za ba'i bran mo dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni reg pa [#]la dga' bas sbrang ma 'bru mar gyi snod la chags pa dang mtshungs so/_/'od srungs sems ni kun du btsal yang [#]mi rnyed do/_/gang mi rnyed pa de ni mi dmigs
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]pa'o/_/gang mi dmigs pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin no/_/gang 'das pa yang ma yin ma 'ongs [#]pa yang ma yin da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ni dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pa'o/_/gang dus gsum las yang dag par 'das
[\[131b.2\]]pa de ni yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no[#]/_/'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo las kyang /_de sems kun du tshol bas na sems nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_sems phyi rol na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_
[\[131b.3\]]sems phyi nang na yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_phung po rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong [#]/_khams rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong [#]/_skye mched rnams la yang sems yang dag par rjes su mi mthong [#]/_des sems yang dag par rjes
[\[131b.4\]]su mi mthong bas/_sems gang las byung zhes sems kyi rgyun kun du [#]tshol zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/_dmigs pa yod pa las sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_ci dmigs pa de yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan nam/_'on te dmigs pa
[\[131b.5\]]gang yin pa de nyid sems yin gal [#]te dmigs pa yang gzhan la sems de yang gzhan na ni/_sems de gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/'on te dmigs pa gang yin pa de nyid sems yin na ni sems kyis sems de nyid ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur te/_sems kyis sems mthong bar mi rung ngo /_/'di
[\[131b.6\]]lta ste dper na ral gri'i so de nyid kyis ral gri'i so de nyid gcad [#]par mi nus pa dang sor mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo [#]de nyid la reg par mi nus pa de bzhin du sems de nyid kyis kyang sems de nyid mthong bar mi nus so snyam mo/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang mgyogs pa
[\[131b.7\]]rab tu mgyogs pa mi gnas par rgyu ba spre'u dang rlung dang [#]'dra ba 'bab chu'i rgyun dang 'bru mar gyi mar me dang [#]'dra ba rgyang ring por 'gro ba/_lus med pa/_yul la brkam [#]pa/_skye mched drug la spyod pa/_gzhan dang gzhan gyi shes pa dang ldan pa'i sems/_gnas pa/_rtse gcig pa/_mi 'phro ba/_
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]rnam par mi 'phro ba/_zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa/_g.yeng ba med pa 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya'o [#]zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_bdag gis [#]rnam par bsgrub par bya ba la brtson par bya ste sems kyi chos nyid
[\[132a.2\]]'di yang mi 'dor ro snyam mo/_/de la sems kyi chos nyid ni gang rnam par bsgrub pa [#]ni gang zhe na/_sems ni sgyu ma lta bu ste 'di la gang yang sbyin pa [#]de ni sems kyi chos nyid ces bya'o/_/gang yang bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang ste sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i
[\[132a.3\]]phyir yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni rnam par bsgrub pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/chos rjes su dran pa ni re zhig de nyid las ji skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa ni gang las sangs rgyas kyi chos med pa dang /_gang las byang chub med
[\[132a.4\]]pa dang /_gang las lam med pa dang /_gang las thar pa med pa dang /_gang las nges par 'byung ba med pa'i chos de gang yang mi mthong ngo /_/des chos thams cad 'byung bar shes nas sems can rnams la sgrib pa med par shes par bya ba'i phyir snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thob par
[\[132a.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de [#]chos thams cad dang nyon mongs pa thams cad la yang sgyu mar 'du shes pa thob [#]ste/_chos 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa med pa ste 'di dag ni nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ma yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni nges pa'i don la rtog [#]pa ste/_nyon mongs pa rnams
[\[132a.6\]]la [#]ni tshogs med/_phung por gyur pa med/_'dod chags kyi dngos po med/_zhe sdang gi dngos po med/_gti mug gi dngos po med pa ste/_nyon mongs pa 'di dag nyid rtogs pa'i phyir byang chub po/_/[#]nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyang de yin no zhes de ltar
[\[132a.7\]]dran pa nye bar 'jog go zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa gtsug na rin po che las kyang /_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa 'di snyam du sems te/_skye ba na chas [#]rnams kho na skye/_'gag pa na chos
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]rnams kho na 'gag ste/_'di la bdag gam sems can nam srog gam skye ba po'am gso ba'am skyes bu'am gang zag gam shed las skyes pa'am shed bu'am gang skye ba'am rga ba'am 'chi ba'am/_'pho ba'am skye bar 'gyur ba gang yang med do/_/'di ni chos rnams kyi chos nyid
[\[132b.2\]]do[#]/_/gal te bsgrubs na ni grub po[#]/_/gal te ma bsgrubs na ni mi 'grub ste/_dge ba yang rung mi dge ba yang rung mi g.yo ba yang rung ste ji ltar [#]bsgrubs pa de lta bur 'grub mod kyi/_chos rnams la sgrub par byed pa yang med la/_chos rnams rgyu med par yang gang yang mi skye'o
[\[132b.3\]]snyam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_de gang cung zad chos zab mo la so sor rtog kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi byang chub kyi sems rjes su dran pa de yang mi 'dor zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rgya cher [#]rol pa las kyang /_/'du byed mi rtag [#]brtan pa
[\[132b.4\]]ma yin te/_/rdza so ma btang lta bur 'jig pa'i bdag_/gzhan gyi rdzas ni brnyan po byas dang mtshungs/_/bye ma'i grong khyer lta bur ring mi thogs/_/'du byed 'di dag 'jig pa'i chos can te/_/dbyar gyi zhal zhal ji ltar 'gogs pa bzhin/_/chu ngogs bye ma yod pa 'dra ba ste/_/rkyen
[\[132b.5\]]la rag las rang bzhin nyam chung ba[#]/_/'du byed mar me'i 'od 'gro [#]'dra ba ste/_/myur du 'byung zhing 'gag pa'i chos can yin/_/rlung dang mtshungs par ring du mi gnas la/_/sbu ba lta bur nyam chung snying po med/_/'du byed g.yo ba med cing stong pa ste/_/brtags na chu shing dag gi phung po 'dra/_
[\[132b.6\]]sgyu ma lta bur [#]sems ni rmongs par byed/_/lag bcangs stong pas byis pa 'drid [#]dang mtshungs/_/'dus byas gyur pa thams cad rgyu dag dang /_/rkyen rnams kyis ni rab tu 'byung ba ste/_/gcig gis gcig rgyu byas te brten nas byung /_/byis pa'i skye bos 'di 'dra 'di ma rtogs/_/dper na gres
[\[132b.7\]]ma mun dza brten byas la/_/brtsal ba'i stobs kyis [#]thag par 'gyur ba dang /_/zo chun rgyud mo 'khor 'byung [#]bcas pa yang /_/de dag re res [#]'grub par 'gyur ba med/_/de ltar srid pa'i yan lag kun 'grub [#]pa/_/gzhan dang gzhan tshogs pa la brten nas ni/_/de dag so so re re [#]'grub
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]ba ni/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs/_/sa bon yod na myu gu ji bzhin te/_/sa bon gang yin de nyid myu gu min/_/de las gzhan min de yang ma yin te/_/de ltar rtag min chad min chos nyid de[#]/_/ma rig pa ni 'du byed rkyen yin te/_/'du byed
[\[133a.2\]]de yang yang dag nyid du med/_/ma rig pa dang 'du byed de dag kyang /_/rang bzhin stong ste g.yo ba med pa yin/_/rgya las rgya yi 'bur ni snang mod kyi/_/rgyu [#]de 'phos par dmigs pa'ang yod ma yin/_/de la de med gzhan las ma yin te/_/de ltar 'dus byas rtag med chad pa med/_/
[\[133a.3\]]mig dang gzugs la brten pa byas nas su/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa 'dir byung yang /_/mig ni gzugs la brten pa ma yin la/_/gzugs kyang mig las [#]'pho ba yod ma yin/_/'di dag bdag med mi sdug chos can yin[#]/_/de dag bdag dang sdug par brtags pa ste/_/
[\[133a.4\]]nor pa yang dag ma yin brtags yin yang /_/de las [#]mig gi rnam par shes pa 'byung /_/rnam par shes pa 'gags nas 'byung [#]gyur te/_/mkhas pas skye dang 'jig pa rnam par mthong /_/gang du ma song gang nas 'ong ba [#]min/_/rnal 'byor pas ni stong pa sgyu [#]ltar mthong /_/dper
[\[133a.5\]]na gtsub [#]shing dang ni gtsub stan [#]dang /_/lag pas brtsal [#]ba byas pa gsum tshogs pa/_/de la [#]brten nas me ni 'byung 'gyur te/_/byung nas ring por mi thogs 'gag par 'gyur/_/de nas mkhas pa la las brtags byas te/_/'di ni gang nas 'ongs la [#]gar song zhes/_/phyogs
[\[133a.6\]]dang phyogs mtshams kun du brtags byas na/_/de ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba mi dmigs so/_/phung po dag dang skye mched khams rnams kyi/_/rkyen ni ma rig pa dang sred dang las/_/de dag tshogs pa sems can zhes brjod kyang /_/de ni dam pa'i don du dmigs su med/_/ces bya ba
[\[133a.7\]]la sogs pa gsungs so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o/_/[#]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bshad zin to//_//[#]de ltar sems 'os su gyur nas yang stong pa nyid la 'jug par bya ste/_gang zag stong pa nyid ni
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]de ltar shin tu grub pa yin no/_/de'i [#]phyir rtsa ba chad pas nyon mongs pa thams cad kun du mi 'byung ngo /_/'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa [#]gsang ba'i mdo las ji skad du/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di lta ste/_dper na shing rtsa ba nas bcad na yal ga dang lo ma dang yal ga phra mo thams
[\[133b.2\]]cad skam [#]par 'gyur ro/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba nye bar zhi na nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i phan yon ni mu med do[#]/_/re zhig zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/_de ni nam
[\[133b.3\]]yang bde gshegs rnams kyi bslab mi 'dor/_/dpa' bo de ni nam yang bud med dbang mi 'gro/_/de ni bde gshegs rnams kyi bstan la dga' ba rnyed/_/'di [#]ni chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu zhi ba shes/_/de 'dir ring po [#]mi thogs rkang gnyis dbang por 'gyur/_/de ni bde ba sbyin par
[\[133b.4\]]byed pa'i sman par 'gyur/_/de ni sdug bsngal rnams kyi zug rngu kun du 'byin/_/de ni chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu zhi ba shes/_/mi yi zla ba de ni bzod pa'i stobs kyis 'phags/_/de ni rdo dbyug dag gis bsnun kyang 'khrugs [#]mi 'gyur/_/de yi [#]yan lag nying lag bcad kyang 'khrugs pa
[\[133b.5\]]med[#]/_/de ni chos kyi rang bzhin rab tu zhi ba shes/_/de ni nam yang ngan 'gror skye bar 'gyur ma yin/_/rtag tu gzugs [#]mdzes shing ni [#]mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur/_/des ni rtag tu mngon shes lnga po 'di dag bsgom/_/dpa' de 'dir rtag bde gshegs rnams kyi mdun na gnas/_/
[\[133b.6\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang /_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pa dang /_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu thob
[\[133b.7\]]par 'dod pa dang /_skye ba thams cad du skye ba dran pa dang byang chub kyi sems chud mi za ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ming rjed pa thob par 'dod pa dang /_sdig pa'i bshes [#]gnyen dang sdig pa'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spong [#]bar 'dod pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang byang chub
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]sems dpa' dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad mnyes par bya bar 'dod pa dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad gdul bar 'dod pa dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pa dang /_chos thams cad la bsgrib [#]pa med pa thob par 'dod pas shes
[\[134a.2\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag [#]bzhugs pa de dag bdag gis [#]bsngags pa brjod do snyam na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
[\[134a.3\]]bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed pa gcig gis shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i [#]klung gi bye ma snyed [#]'da' bar 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin du sbyar te/_phyogs bcu thams cad 'da' bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi
[\[134a.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs so/_/de la ji ltar chos thams cad bdag med kyang las dang 'bras bur 'brel pa mi 'gal ba dang /_rang bzhin med kyang ji ltar mthong bzhin pa'i chos thams cad mi 'gal ba de ltar ni/_yab dang sras
[\[134a.5\]]mjal ba'i mdo las bstan te/_rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa/_reg pa'i skye mched drug pa/_yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa zhes gang smras pa de ci la [#]brten te smras she na/_rgyal po chen po khams drug ni 'di dag
[\[134a.6\]]go/_/drug gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams dang [#]/_rgyal po chen po de dag ni khams drug ste/_skyes bu 'di dag ni khams drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa
[\[134a.7\]]de ni de la brten te smras so/_/skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang [#]smras pa de ci la [#]brten te smras she na/_rgyal po chen po reg pa'i skye mched drug ni 'di dag ste/_drug gang zhe na/_gzugs rnams la lta ba'i phyir mig reg pa'i skye mched dang /_sgra rnams la nyan pa'i
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]phyir rna ba reg pa'i skye mched da/_dri rnams la snom pa'i phyir sna reg pa'i skye mched dang /_ro rnams la myang ba'i phyir lce reg pa'i skye mched dang /_reg bya rnams la reg pa'i phyir lus reg pa'i skye mched dang /_chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i phyir yid reg pa'i skye mched do/_/rgyal
[\[134b.2\]]po chen po de dag ni reg pa'i skye mched drug ste/_skyes bu 'di dag ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so/_/rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o zhes gang [#]smras pa de ci la brtan [#]te smras she na/_rgyal po chen
[\[134b.3\]]po yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad ni 'di dag ste/_bco brgyad gang zhe na/_'di la mig gis gzugs mthong na yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur bar gzugs la nye bar spyod do/_/de bzhin du rna ba la sogs pa la [#]yang brjod par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po de
[\[134b.4\]]la gang dag yid bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang /_gang dag yid mi bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang /_gang dag btang snyoms su nye bar spyod pa drug po de dag gcig tu bsdus na yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rgyal po chen po nang gi sa'i khams gang
[\[134b.5\]]zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_lus 'di la nang gi khong na sra ba dang mkhrang ba'i rnam pa dang nye bar gyur pa dang zin pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_skra dang spu dang /_sen mo dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_
[\[134b.6\]]phyi rol gyi sra ba dang mkhrang ba'i rnam pa dang /_nye bar ma gyur pa dang ma zin pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po de la nang gi sa'i khams 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang stsogs [#]par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bud
[\[134b.7\]]med nang du bdag ni bud med do zhes rtog pa'i dus de yod do[#]/_/de nang du bud med ces brtags nas phyi rol du skyes pa la skyes pa zhes rtog go/_/de phyi rol du skyes pa la skyes pa [#]zhes brtags nas chags par gyur te phyi rol gyi skyes pa dang phrad par 'dod do/_/skyes pa yang nang du
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]bdag ni skyes pa'o [#]zhes rtog ste de nang du bdag ni skyes pa zhes brtags nas phyi rol du bud med la bud med ces rtog go/_/[#]phyi rol du bud med la bud med ces brtags nas chags par 'gyur [#]te/_phyi rol gyi bud med dang phrad par 'dod do/_/phrad par 'dod pas
[\[135a.2\]]phrad par 'gyur ro/_/phrad pa'i rkyen gyis [#]mer mer po skye bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/_/rgyal po chen po de la kun du rtog pa gang yin pa dang /_gang [#]kun du rtog pa po gang yin pa de gnyis ka yang med do/_/bud med la ni bud med med do/_/skyes pa la ni skyes pa med do/_/de ltar
[\[135a.3\]]med cing yang dag pa ma yin par kun du rtog pa skye ste/_kun du rtog pa de yang ngo bo nyid kyis [#]med do/_/kun du rtog pa ji lta ba bzhin du phrad pa dang mer mer po yang ngo bo nyid kyis med do/_/gang ngo bo nyid kyis med pa de ji ltar sra ba skyed par 'gyur/_rgyal po chen po de ltar kun du rtog pa
[\[135a.4\]]shes par byas nas sra ba nyid rtog par bya ste/_ci nas sra ba ni skye ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong bar shes par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ltar gang lus 'di dur khrod kyi mthar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do[#]/_/de'i sra ba de 'jig cing 'gag par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_shar phyogs su mi 'gro/_
[\[135a.5\]]lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_steng dang 'og dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams su yang mi 'gro ste/_rgyal po chen po nang gi sa'i khams ni de ltar blta'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di nam mkhar gyur pa la/_tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang rin
[\[135a.6\]]po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa la gnas pa'i dus de yod do[#]/_/rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa byung yang rgyal po chen po de'i sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe gang
[\[135a.7\]]nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/khor yug dang khor yug chen po'i ri rdo rje'i rgyu las grub pa sra zhing brtan la lhun stug pa rnams gnas par gyur kyang de dag gi sra ba de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/ri'i rgyal po ri rab dag [#]dang /_gnya' shing 'dzin dag [#]dang /_mu khyud 'dzin dag [#]dang
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]gshol mda' 'dzin dag dang /_rdo rje 'dzin dag dang /_seng ldeng can dag dang /_rnam par 'dud dag dang /_ri rta rna dag dang /_blta na sdug dag dang /_blta na sdug chen po dag dang /_ther sgre dag dang /_spos [#]kyi dad ldang dag dang /_gangs kyi ri dag dang /_de ma
[\[135b.2\]]yin pa'i ri nag po'i bar dag gnas pa dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gnas pa dag [#]dang /_rngams su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la rgyar dpag tshad drug khri yod pa'i sa chen po gnas par gyur kyang rgyal po chen po sra
[\[135b.3\]]bde 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po 'jig rten 'di 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe sa chen po 'di mes tshig pa'am/_chus bshig pa'am/_rlung gis [#]gtor bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/_/de mes tshig na ni du ba yang mi mngon thal ba'i lhag ma yang mi mngon
[\[135b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_mar ram 'bru mar mes bsregs na du ba yang mi mngon zhing thal ba'i lhag ma yang mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po [#]'jig rten gyi khams 'di mes tshig pa'i tshe du ba yang mi mngon zhing thal ba'i lhag ma yang mi
[\[135b.5\]]mngon par 'gyur ro/_/chus bshig pa'i tshe/_yang lhag ma ci yang mi mngon par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na lan tshwa chu'i nang du zhu ba ni [#]lhag ma cung zad mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chus bshig pa'i tshe lhag ma
[\[135b.6\]]cung zad kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/rlung gis [#]gtor ba'i tshe yang lhag ma cung zad kyang mi mngon par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste dper na rnam par 'thor rlung gis [#]bdas pa'i bye'u [#]ni lhag ma cung zad kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[135b.7\]]khams 'di yang rlung gis [#]gtor ba'i tshe lhag ma cung zad kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar sa'i khams de 'byung ba yang stong /_sa'i khams 'jig pa dang 'byung ba yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po'i [#]sa'i khams ni tha snyad tsam ma gtogs par sa'i
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]khams nyid du mi dmigs te/_tha snyad de yang bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin gyi[#]/_rgyal po chen po de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi [#]shes rab kyis rtogs shig_/rgyal po chen po de la chu'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang [#]dang /_phyi rol gyi'o/_/
[\[136a.2\]]nang gi chu'i khams gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste lus 'di la nang gi khong na chu dang chu'i rnam pa dang chu nyid dang /_rlan pa dang /_rlan pa'i rnam pa dang rlan pa nyid dang gsher ba nyid dang /_nye bar gyur pa dang zin pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_mchi ma dang /_rdul dang /_mchil
[\[136a.3\]]ma dang /_snabs dang /_chu ser dang /_tshil dang /_mkhris pa dang /_ngar snabs dang /_rnag dang /_khrag dang /_'o ma dang /_gcin dang /_gzhan yang gang lus 'di'i [#]nang gi khong na/_chu dang chu'i rnam pa dang chu nyid dang rlan pa dang rlan pa'i rnam pa dang rlan pa nyid dang gsher ba nyid dang /_nye
[\[136a.4\]]bar gyur pa dang zin pa 'di ni nang gi chu'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/[# ]rgyal po chen po'i [#]sdug pa mthong na mchi ma 'byung ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang chos kyi shugs kyis [#]mchi ma 'byung ba dang rlung gis btab bam/_rnam pa gzhan dag gis kyang mchi ma 'byung
[\[136a.5\]]ste/_dpyad byas pas kyang nang gi chu'i khams 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/_rgyal po chen po chu'i khams de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po gang nang gi chu'i khams de yongs su skam par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de[#]/_de yongs su skam zhing
[\[136a.6\]#]'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang nang gi me'i khams shas che bar gyur na/_des nang gi chu'i khams yongs su gdung bar 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/_gdungs pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po chen po de bzhin du nang gi chu'i khams 'byung ba'i
[\[136a.7\]]tshe gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang 'jig rten 'di chags par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di chags par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_nam mkha' 'di la kun du sprin shin tu stug po'i [#]tshogs sum cu rtsa
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]gnyis 'khrigs par 'gyur te[#]/_de dag 'khrigs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad g.yogs [#]par 'gyur te/_de las bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du gshol mda' tsam gyi [#]char gyi rgyun 'bab po/_/bskal
[\[136b.2\]]pa bar ma lnga'i bar du glang po che'i pho mtshan tsam gyi char 'bab po/_/bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i char 'bab po/_/bskal pa bar ma lnga'i bar du thigs pa chen po'i char 'bab po/_/des sa chen po 'di nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du chus khyab par
[\[136b.3\]]gang bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po chu'i phung po chen po de 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gang nas [#]mi 'ong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po gang 'jig rten 'di 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod de[#]/_'jig rten gyi khams 'jig par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_nyi ma gnyis 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_nyi ma
[\[136b.4\]]gnyis 'jig rten du byung bas chu mig dang chu bran rnams [#]skam par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nyi ma gsum 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_nyi ma gsum 'jig rten du byung ba na chu mig chen po dang chu klung chen po rnams skam par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nyi ma bzhi 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_nyi ma bzhi
[\[136b.5\]]'jig rten du byung bas gang nas chu klung chen po bzhi po de dag 'bab pa'i mtsho chen po ma dros pa de de yang thams cad kyi thams cad du skam par 'gyur thim par 'gyur te med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas nyi ma lnga 'jig rten du [#]'byung ste/_nyi ma lnga 'jig rten du byung bas rgya mtsho chen po yang
[\[136b.6\]]dpag tshad gcig tsam gyi chu yongs su zad cing yongs su 'grib [#]par 'gyur ro/_/dpag tshad gnyis dang /_dpag tshad gsum dang /_bzhi dang /_lnga dang /_bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_dpag tshad lnga bcu tsam gyi chu yongs su zad cing yongs su 'grib
[\[136b.7\]]par 'gyur ba nas/_dpag tshad bzhi khri'i bar gyi chu las par 'gyur ba dang /_shing ta [#]la gnyis tsam nas mchan khung nub tsam dang /_ba lang gi rjes kyi chu tsam gyi bar du las par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/_/rgyal po chen po gang rgya mtsho chen po de las zil pa phram phrum [#]tsam
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]las par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/_/rgyal po chen po gang rgya mtsho chen po de la mdzub mo snubs [#]pa tsam gyi chu'ang ma las par 'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/_/rgyal po chen po de tsam du yang chu'i khams de 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro ste/_shar phyogs
[\[137a.2\]]dang /_lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang steng dang 'og dang /_phyogs mtshams rnams su mi 'gro'o/_/rgyal po chen po chu'i khams de ni skye ba yang stong /_'jig pa yang stong /_gnas pa'i tshe yang chu'i khams de rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_rgyal po chen po chu'i khams
[\[137a.3\]]de ni tha snyad tsam ma gtogs par chu'i khams kyis stong zhing mi dmigs pa ste/_tha snyad de yang bud med ma yin/_skyes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no/_/me'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/_nang gi dang /_phyi rol gyi'o/_/nang gi me'i khams gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_
[\[137a.4\]]lus 'di la me dang me'i rnam pa dang /_dro ba dang dro ba'i rnam pa dang /_nye bar gyur pa dang zin pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_gang gis lus 'di gdung ba dang /_kun du gdung ba dang yongs su gdung ba dang /_gang gis zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang /_'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams
[\[137a.5\]]bde zhing legs par zhu bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi [#]shas che na/_rim mo rim mo [#]zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/phyi rol gyi me'i khams gang zhe na/_gang phyi rol gyi me dang me'i rnam pa dang /_dro ba dang dro ba'i rnam pa dang /_nye bar ma gyur pa dang ma
[\[137a.6\]]zin pa ste/_de dag [#]ni mi dag gtsub shing dang [#]ldan pa dang rtswa dang ldan pa'am/_ba lang gi lci ba'i sbur [#]ma'am shing bal gyi 'da' ba dang ldan par byas shing me 'byin te/_de byung nas grong yang tshig grong gi phyogs kyang tshig_/grong khyer ram grong khyer gyi phyogs [#]sam yul lam yul
[\[137a.7\]]gyi [#]phyogs sam/_gling ngam/_rtswa'i gtos [#]sam/_nags sam/_shing ngam/_rtswa'am/_ba lang gi [#]lci ba dag sreg cing 'gro ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po de la phyi rol gyi me'i khams ni 'byung ba'i tshe'ang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_'gag pa'i tshe yang [#]gang du
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]yang mi 'gro ste/_de ni rang bzhin dang bral ba'i phyir med pa/_las yod par 'gyur zhing yod par gyur nas kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/de la nang gi [#]rlung gi khams [#]gang zhe na/_gang lus 'di la rlung dang rlung gi rnam pa dang /_yang ba nyid dang g.yo ba nyid dang /_
[\[137b.2\]]nye bar gyur pa dang zin pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na[#]/_'di lta ste/_gyen du 'gro ba'i rlung dang /_thur du 'gro ba dang /_thad kar 'gro ba dang /_rgyab tu 'gro ba dang /_rgyab na gnas pa dang /_lto na gnas pa dang /_'chad par byed pa dang /_'gas [#]par byed pa dang /_gzer ba dang /_'dar
[\[137b.3\]]bu [#]dang /_sna skad dang /_rlung skran [#]dang /_dbugs 'byung ba dang /_rngub pa dang ldan pa dang /_yan lag dang yan [#]lag la gnas pa'i rlung dag dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/phyi rol gyi rlung de yang shar phyogs kyi rlung yod do/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs kyi rlung yod
[\[137b.4\]]do/_/rdul dang bcas pa dang /_rdul med pa dang chung ba dang che ba'i rlung yod do/_/kun du khyab pa'i rlung dang /_rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung dang /_tshub ma'i rlung dag kyang yod do/_/rgyal po chen po rlung gi phung po chen po langs na [#]shing dag kyang gcog_/rtsig [#]pa'i kha dag dang ri'i [#]rtse mo dag [#]kyang
[\[137b.5\]]bsnyil zhing bsnyil nas rmeg [#]med par 'gyur ba dag dang /_yang sems can dag gos kyi mtha' [#]ma'am sbud pa'am rlung g.yab dag gis rlung g.yob pa'i dus de yod do[#]/_/gzhan yang gang tshul 'di dang 'dra ba de ni phyi rol gyi rlung gi khams zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no//_//_
[\[137b.6\]]bam po bcu gcig pa/_nang gi nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_lus 'di la nang gi khong na nye bar gyur pa dang /_zin pa dang /_nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i rnam pa nang zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba/_ma gang ba dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag gis gang [#]bar bya ba ma
[\[137b.7\]]yin pa'o/_/de yang gang zhe na/_lus 'di la mig gi nang zhe'am/_rna ba dang [#]/_sna'i nang zhe'am/_kha'am [#]kha'i nang zhe'am/_kha'i sgo zhe'am/_lkog ma zhe'am/_mid pa zhe'am/_gang nas kyang mid pa dang /_gang du gnas pa dang /_gang gis zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]dang myangs pa rnams thur du rgyu bar byed pa dang /_gzhan yang gang lus 'di la nang gi khong na nye bar gyur pa dang /_zin pa dang /_phung por gyur pa'am khams su gyur pa'am [#]skye mched du gyur pa dag ni nam mkha'i dang [#]/_nam mkha'i rnam pa dang /_ma gang ba
[\[138a.2\]]dang pags pa dang sha dang khrag gis gang bar bya ba ma yin pa nang gi grangs su 'gro ba khong stong dang bu ga zhes bya ba dag ste/_de dag ni nang gi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams gang zhe na/_gang ci yang rung ste/_phyi rol gyi nam mkha' dang nam mkha'i rnam pa
[\[138a.3\]]dang /_ma gang ba dang /_gzugs su gyur pas gang bar bya ba ma yin pa[#]/_ma 'dres pa khong stong dang bu gar gyur pa 'di ni phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang las kyi rkyen gyis skye mched rnams 'byung ba'i dus de yod do[#]/_/de dag nam mkha'i khams la
[\[138a.4\]]kun nas skor bar byed do/_/de nang gi nam mkha'i khams zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro yang de ni gang las kyang ma 'ongs so/_/rgyal po chen po gzugs zhig na thams cad nam mkha' [#]'gyur ba'i dus de yod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams ni zad mi shes pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[138a.5\]]de lta na nang gi nam mkha'i khams ni gnas shing mi g.yo ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_'dus ma byas de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/_de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams kyang thams cad du song bar blta [#]bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_mi zhig
[\[138a.6\]]gis [#]thang la khron pa'am rdzing bu'am khron rings sam rdzing zhig brkos [#]na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_de'i nam mkha' de ga [#]las 'ongs/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni gang [#]las kyang ma mchis so/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_me des khron
[\[138a.7\]]pa nas rdzing gi bar de dag phyir bkang na rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_de'i nam mkha' de gang du song /_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni gang du yang ma mchis te/_de'i [#]slad du zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams ni 'gro ba'am 'ong bar nye bar gnas pa ma lags/_
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]bud med kyi dngos po dang skyes pa'i dngos por nye bar gnas pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de ltar na phyi rol gyi nam mkha'i khams ni mi g.yo mi 'gyur pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nam mkha'i khams ni nam mkha'i khams kyis stong zhing [#]nam mkha'i
[\[138b.2\]]khams dang bral ba ste/_nam mkha'i khams ni bud med kyi dngos por nye bar mi gnas/_skyes pa'i dngos por nye bar mi gnas kyis/_de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis rtogs shig_/rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa'i khams gang zhe na/_mig
[\[138b.3\]]gi dbang ba ni bdag po/_/gzugs ni dmigs pa/_gzugs so sor rnam par rig pa ste/_sngon po rnam par rig pa'am/_ser po dang dmar po dang khra bo rnam par rig pa'am/_ring po dang thung ngu dang /_sbom po dang phra mo rnam par rig pa ste/_rgyal po chen po de [#]ltar gang ci yang rung /_
[\[138b.4\]]kha dog dang dbyibs rnam par rig pa 'di ni mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du gang ci yang rung /_rna ba'i dbang po ni bdag po nas/_yid kyi dbang po ni bdag po/_/chos ni dmigs pa ste/_sgra rnam par rig pa'am/_dri rnam par rig pa'am/_ro rnam par
[\[138b.5\]]rig pa'am/_rig pa rnam par rig pa'am/_chos rnam par rig pa 'di ni/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar te/_de ltar dbang po drug ni bdag po/_/yul drug ni dmigs pa yin la/_yul rnam par rig pa 'di ni rnam par
