[\[138b.6\]]shes pa'i khams zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni dbang po la mi brten/_yul rnams las ma 'ongs/_bar gyi dbus na mi gnas te/_de ni nang na yang ma yin/_phyi rol na yang ma yin/_gnyi ga [#]med par yang ma yin no/_/rnam par shes pa'i
[\[138b.7\]]khams de ni dngos po so sor rnam par rig nas 'gag ste/_de 'byung ba'i tshe gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/_'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/rnam par shes pa'i khams de 'byung ba yang stong /_'jig pa yang stong ste/_rnam par shes pa'i khams de 'byung ba yang rang bzhin gyis
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]stong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po de ltar na/_tha snyad ma gtogs par rnam par shes pa'i khams de [#]ni rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyis stong ste/_tha snyad de yang skyes pa ma yin/_bud med ma yin gyi/_de ni [#]de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes
[\[139a.2\]]rab kyi sa rtogs shig_/rgyal po chen po de la mig gi skye mched gang zhe na/_de ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba ste/_'di ltar sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams so/_/de la sa'i khams dang ba ni skye mched ma yin no/_/chu'i khams dang ba yang
[\[139a.3\]]ma yin no/_/me'i khams dang ba yang ma yin no/_/rlung gi khams dang ba yang mig gi skye mched ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa'i khams dang ba ni chos gang la yang skye mched dam skye mched thob par bya bar nye bar mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du rlung gi khams kyi bar dang ba ni
[\[139a.4\]]tshes gang la yang skye mched dam skye mched thob par bya bar nye bar mi gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos de dag ni sems pa med cing [#]byed pa med la ci la yang mi nus pa ste/_rgyal po chen po chos rnams ni re re nas btsal na tha snyad tsam [#]ma gtogs par mig gi skye mched mi
[\[139a.5\]]dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sa'i khams dang ba ni sa'i khams dang bas stong /_rlung gi khams dang ba'i bar ni rlung gi khams dang bas stong ste/_chos gang dag rang bzhin gyis stong pa de dag la dang ba'am 'khrugs par 'gyur ba'ang ga la yod de/_gang la yang[#] dang ba'am
[\[139a.6\]]'khrugs pa mi dmigs pa de dag ji ltar gzugs la lta [#]bar 'gyur/_de ltar mig gi skye mched ni mig gi skye mched kyi rang bzhin gyis shin tu stong ste/_de ni 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa'i phyir sngon gyi mtha' yang mi dmigs phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs so/_/rang bzhin med pa'i
[\[139a.7\]]phyir de la gnas pa yang mi dmigs so/_/gang rang bzhin gyis med pa de ni bud med kyang ma yin skyes pa yang ma yin no/_/gang bud med kyang ma yin skyes pa yang ma yin pa de ni des rlom sems su lta [#]ga la 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po rlom sems ni bdud kyi spyod yul lo/_/rlom
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]sems med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad ni rlom sems dang bral ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rgyal po chen po de la rna ba'i skye mched nas lus kyi skye mched kyi bar gang zhe na/_gang 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po de
[\[139b.2\]]ltar na chos thams cad kyi bar ni/_rnam par thar pa la mngon par phyogs pa chos kyi dbyings su nges pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas pa/_gdags su med pa/_tha snyad med pa/_brjod du med pa/_brjod par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po gang la dbang po rnams
[\[139b.3\]]thogs par 'gyur ba de ni yul rnams zhes bya ste/_mig gis [#]gzugs rnams la thogs par 'gyur ba [#]de'i phyir gzugs rnams ni mig gi yul zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du rna ba'i [#]sgra rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/de la mig gzugs rnams la thogs so zhes bya ba 'di
[\[139b.4\]]ni 'bab pa'i thogs par 'gyur bar bstan te/_'di ltar mig ni [#]gzugs rnams la rnam pa gsum du 'bab ste/_mthun pa rnams la sdug pa'i 'du shes kyis 'bab [#]pa dang /_mi mthun pa rnams la khong khro ba'i 'du shes kyis [#]'bab pa dang /_mthun pa yang ma yin mi mthun pa
[\[139b.5\]]yang ma yin pa rnams la btang snyoms kyi [#]'du shes kyis 'bab pa[#]/_/de bzhin du yid ni chos rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste/_yul de dag ni yid kyi spyod yul zhes bya ba [#]ste/_de la yid spyod cing rnam par spyod pas de'i phyir yid kyi spyod yul zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po
[\[139b.6\]]yid de mthun pa'i gzugs rnams la rjes su chags par spyod pa des ni de'i [#]'dod chags skye bar 'gyur/_mi mthun pa'i gzugs rnams la khong khro bar spyod pa des ni de'i zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur/_mthun pa yang ma yin mi mthun pa yang ma yin pa rnams la rmongs par spyod
[\[139b.7\]]pa des ni de'i gti mug skye bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin du sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams la yang chos rnam pa gsum [#]gsum la dmigs pa myong bar 'gyur te snga ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po de la dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu yul rnams ni rmi lam lta bur shes par bya'o/_/
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na yul gyi bzang mo dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod par rmis la/_de nyal ba las sad nas bud med yul gyi bzang mo de rjes su dran par gyur na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam na
[\[140a.2\]]mthong ba'i yul gyi bzang mo de yod dam gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems skyes bu gang rmi lam na yul gyi bzang mo mthong ba'i bud med de dang lhan cig tu rtse ba dang dga' ba dang /_mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba [# ]
[\[140a.3\]]de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam ni [#]mthong ba'i yul gyi bzang mo de ni shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_de dang lhan cig tu yongs su [#]spyod pa lta ga la mchis te gzhan du
[\[140a.4\]]na gang de la zhen pa'i mi de ni shin tu phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis gzugs mthong na yid bde bar 'gyur ba rnams la mngon par zhen par
[\[140a.5\]]'gyur te/_de mngon [#]par zhen [#]nas rjes su chags par 'gyur ro/_/rjes su chags par gyur nas yongs su chags par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su chags par gyur nas 'dod chags las byung ba'i [#]lus kyis ni rnam pa gsum ngag gis ni rnam pa bzhi yid kyis ni rnam pa gsum mngon
[\[140a.6\]]par 'du byed de[#]/_las mngon par 'du byas pa de yang thog ma nyid nas zad cing 'gags la bral zhing rnam par 'gyur ba ste/_shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin/_lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang byang phyogs dang /_steng dang /_'og dang [#]/_phyogs mtshams rnams su
[\[140a.7\]]brten te gnas pa ma yin/_'di na ma yin pha bi [#]na ma yin par [#]bar ma dor ma yin te/_dus gzhan na 'chi ba'i dus dang tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe/_srog gi dbang po 'gags te tshe yongs su zad cing de dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las rnams kyang zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'gags [#]pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste dper na nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i yul gyi [#]bzang mo dang 'dra bar yid kyis [#]dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa tha ma'i dbang dang las dmigs pa de dang rkyen gnyis kyis [#]skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa
[\[140b.2\]]dang po 'byung ste/_yang na ni sems can dmyal bar/_yang na ni dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/_yang na ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/_yang na ni lha ma yin gyi ris su/_yang na ni mi'i nang du/_yang na ni lha'i nang du skye [#]bar 'gyur te/_rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa de/_
[\[140b.3\]]de 'gags [#]ma thag tu bar ma chad par/_gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba mngon pa'i sems kyi rgyud skal ba 'dra bar [#]'byung ngo /_/de la gang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gyur ro/_/gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de la
[\[140b.4\]]ni skye ba zhes bya'o[#]/_/rgyal po chen po de lta na chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'pho ba'ang med la 'chi 'pho dang skye bar mngon pa'ang yod de/_rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa tha ma de skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong /_/'gag pa'i tsho [#]gang du yang
[\[140b.5\]]mi 'gro'o/_/las kyang skye ba'i tshe [#]gang nas kyang mi 'ong 'gag pa'i tshe gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir te[#]/_rnam par shes pa tha ma ni
[\[140b.6\]]rnam par shes pa tha mas stong /_las ni las kyis [#]stong /_rnam par shes pa dang po ni rnam par shes pa dang pos stong /_'chi 'pho ni 'chi 'phos stong /_skye ba ni skye bas stong la[#]/_las rnams 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur zhing rnam par smin pa myong bar mngon pa yang yod de/_
[\[140b.7\]]de la ming gi brda tsam ma [#]gtogs par byed pa po'am za ba po gang yang med do/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na dgra dang 'thab pa zhig rmis la/_nyal ba las sad nas de nyid dran par gyur na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]sems rmi lam du rmis pa'i dgra de'am [#]dgra de dang 'thab pa yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems 'o na skyes bu gang rmi lam gyi dgra la mngon par zhen pa'am/_dgra dang 'thab
[\[141a.2\]]par 'gyur ba de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam na mthong ba'i dgra de nyid kyang shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na de dang 'thab pa lta ga la mchis te gzhan du na gang de la mngon
[\[141a.3\]]par zhen pa'i mi de ni phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis [#]gzugs mthong na yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba rnams la yang mngon par zhen par
[\[141a.4\]]'gyur te mngon par zhen nas khong khro bar 'gyur ro/_/khong khro bar gyur nas zhe sdang bar 'gyur/_zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhe sdang las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni rnam pa gsum ngag gis [#]ni rnam pa bzhi yid kyis ni rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de snga ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po
[\[141a.5\]]'di lta ste/_dper na/_mi zhig gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na 'dres non par rmis te 'jigs pas [#]shin tu rmongs par 'gyur la/_nyal ba las sad nas 'dre [#]dang shin tu rmongs par gyur pa de dran par gyur na/_rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems rmi lam na mthong ba'i 'dre de dang shin
[\[141a.6\]]tu rmongs par gyur pa de yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis [#]so/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems 'o na de ltar rmi lam na mthong ba'i 'dre de la mngon par zhen cing shin tu rmongs par 'gyur ba'i mi de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_gsol
[\[141a.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi 'dra de ni shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na shin tu rmongs pa lta ga la mchis te/_gzhan du na gang de la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ni phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis [#]gzugs mthong na btang snyoms su 'gyur ba rnams la yang mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/_mngon par zhen nas shin tu rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/shin tu rmongs
[\[141b.2\]]nas kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ro/_/kun nas nyon mongs nas gti mug las byung ba'i las lus kyis ni rnam pa gsum ngag gis ni rnam pa bzhi yid kyis ni rnam pa gsum mngon par 'du byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na mi
[\[141b.3\]]zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na yul gyi bud med bzang mo glu len pa'i glu snyan pa dang pi bang len pa'i sgra snyan pa nyan cing de glu dang rol mo'i sgra des yongs su spyod pa rmis la/_nyal ba las sad nas glu dang rol mo'i sgra [#]de nyid dran par gyur na/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems rmi
[\[141b.4\]]lam na mthong ba'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo dang /_glu dang rol mo'i sgra de yod dam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'o na rmi lam na mthong ba'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo de [#]glu dang rol mo'i sgra la [# ]
[\[141b.5\]]mngon par zhen pa'i mi de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_rmi lam na [#]mthong ba'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo de ni shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/_de'i glu dang rol mo'i sgra lta ga la mchis te/_gzhan
[\[141b.6\]]du na gang de la zhen pa'i mi de ni phongs shing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang rna bas sgra thos na yid du 'ong ba rnams la mngon par zhen par 'gyur te zhes bya ba la
[\[141b.7\]]sogs pa snga ma bzhin no/_/de bzhin du dri la sogs pa la yang rnam pa gsum gsum du rig par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis [#]ji ltar na bdag lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi [#]mig dang /_sgron ma dang /_mar me dang /_snang ba dang /_gru dang /_dogs
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dang /_'bab stegs dang /_'dren pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa dang /_ston pa dang /_ded dpon dang /_sngon du 'gro bar 'gyur snyam pa dang /_bdag grol nas dgrol bar bya'o/_/rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o/_/dbugs phyin nas dbugs dbyung bar bya'o/_/
[\[142a.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o snyam du yid la gzhag par bya'o[#]/_/rgyal po chen po dbang phyug lta [#]zhig ni sngon myong bar gyur pa'i mtha' yang mi mngon te/_rgyal po chen po de ltar dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu ste chog mi shes so/_/tshim par
[\[142a.3\]]mi 'gyur ba'o/_/yul rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste tshim par mi nus pa ngoms par mi nus [#]pa'o zhe'o/_/de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po grags pa mtha' yas kyi gtam rgyud las mtho ris nas lhung ste/_de'i tshe rgyal po chen po dang grong khyer pas bskor ba las 'di skad [#]'byung ste/_
[\[142a.4\]]'di lta ste/_dper na/_mar gyi gong bu'am/_mar gsar gyi gong bu bye ma tsha ba la gzhag pa ni 'ju zhing mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du rgyal po chen po grags pa mtha' yas kyang bying zhing mi gnas par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po chen po [#]dga' byed kyis/_rgyal po chen po grags pa
[\[142a.5\]]mtha' yas de ltar bying ba de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po chen po grags pa mtha' yas kyis legs par brjod pa ji skad cig gsungs zhes mchi na bdag gis [#]'jig rten pa rnams la ji skad cig lung bstan par bgyi/_des smras pa/_rgyal po chen po grags pa
[\[142a.6\]]mtha' yas ni gling chen po bzhir rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas shing bsam pa yid bzhin du grub la don med par ma gyur pa'ang myong /_shing thams cad na [#]dus ma yin par yid bzhin du 'bras bu chags pa dang /_gnod pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi [#]yid la
[\[142a.7\]]bsams [#]pa don yod pa dang /_spos chu'i char dbab pa dang /_lha'i yid bzhin gyi gos kyi [#]char dbab pa dang /_dbyig gi char dbab pa dang /_gser gyi char dbab pa dang /_rin po che sna tshogs kyi char dbab pa dang /_yo byad thams cad kyi char dbab pa yang myong bar gyur nas/_gling
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]chen po bzhi dag tu gnas te gling chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byas nas/_brgya byin gyi [#]stan phyed mnan pa la [#]'dod pa chen pos ma btang ste[#]/_'dod pas ma ngoms bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byas so zhes rgyal po chen po khyod kyis [#]lung ston cig_/de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod
[\[142b.2\]]kyi [#]dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu/_yul rnams ni rmi lam lta bu'o zhes de ltar rig par byas nas sems nges par gzhag par bya ste/_gzhan dring mi 'jog par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_smig rgyu'i rang bzhin ni ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do/_/de bzhin du
[\[142b.3\]]gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma byung mi 'byung da ltar yang med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de shes par bya ba yang
[\[142b.4\]]kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden [#]pa 'dir zad do/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs rab tu mkhyen legs par mngon du mdzad pas de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so/_/
[\[142b.5\]]don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/_shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/_ma bstan pa/_rab tu ma bstan pa/_ma thos pa/_thos par ma byas pa/_ma shes pa/_rnam par ma shes pa/_ma bstan
[\[142b.6\]]pa/_ma mthong ba/_ma btags [#]pa/_'dzin du ma bcug pa/_rtogs par ma byas pa/_thob par ma byas pa/_ma thob pa/_nye bar ma bsnyen pa/_ma bor ba[#]/_ma bzhag pa/_ma spangs pa/_bya ba med pa/_byed pa med pa/_rab tu zhi ba med pa/_ma smad pa/_ma bstod pa/_thogs [# ]
[\[142b.7\]]pa ma yin pa/_ma thogs [#]pa ma yin pa/_bde ba ma yin pa/_sdug bsngal ba [#]ma yin pa/_snyan pa ma yin pa/_mi snyan pa ma yin pa/_gzugs ma yin pa/_gzugs med pa [#]ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_gang gi bde bar gshegs la [#]'gro ba rnams/_/
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bde ba'i don du dad pa skye 'gyur ba/_/rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du/_/'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to/_/sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa/_/sems can dmyal dang dud 'gro yi dgas dang /_/lha min ris dang mi dang lha yi
[\[143a.2\]]rnams/_/mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad/_/rigs dmar [#]de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang /_/phyug po'i khyim dang dbul ba'i rigs [#]rnams dang /_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/yang gsungs pa/_gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
[\[143a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig_/ci gzugs sam/_'on te tshor ba'am/_'on te 'du shes sam/_'on te 'du byed dam/_'on te rnam par shes pa zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nas/_
[\[143a.4\]]de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_gzugs ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa nas/_rnam par shes pa'i bar du ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/_byang chub kyang ma skyes pa ste/_ji ltar ma skyes
[\[143a.5\]]pas ma skyes par [#]mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/_de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du shes par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar chos thams cad mi dmigs na/_'di la sangs rgyas ni gang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang /_byang chub ni gang /_lung bstan pa ni
[\[143a.6\]]gang /_gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_de dag ni tha snyad tsam ming tsam brda tsam kun rdzob tsam brjod pa tsam gdags pa tsam ste/_de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i mi cha'o zhe'o/_/yang de nyid las
[\[143a.7\]]'di skad ces gsungs te/_'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis [#]'tshal ba ltar na[#]/_chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang /_mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang /_mi
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma yin [#]pa ni byang chub legs par rig par bgyi'o/_/tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub po/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/_
[\[143b.2\]]mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos can te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_gal
[\[143b.3\]]te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni mya ngan las 'das pa yang 'tshal bar 'gyur na zhes bya ba'o/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis [#]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes gang smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni
[\[143b.4\]]yang dag pa yang ma dmigs na de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis [#]yang dag par [#]dmigs na ni/_mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/_de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o zhes so/_/de nyid las 'di skad du/_mi mjed
[\[143b.5\]]kyi bdag pos ston pa la bstod pa/_/ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas/_/kha zas ro brgya zos pas 'grangs [#]'gyur ba/_/de la bkres med zas med sems can med/_/rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs/_/mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smras na/_/
[\[143b.6\]]dga' bar 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med/_/tshig nyid med cing dgar 'gyur dngos kyang med/_/de mkhyen de la the tshom yang mi mnga'/_/pi wang sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te/_/sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod ma yin/_/de ltar mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na/_/phung po'i rang
[\[143b.7\]]bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mnga'/_/ji ltar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te/_/sgra 'di [#]gang las byung zhes brtags byas kyang /_/rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos de mi dmigs pa/_/mi dbang khyod kyis [#]de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/ji ltar mi zhig bsod pa'i kha zas la/_/yan lag
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]srog phan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na/_/dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te/_/drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na/_/yan lag gzhigs brtags rang bzhin med phyir [#]stong /_/'ja' 'drar
[\[144a.2\]]yan lag de dag stong pa nyid/_/drang srong che khyod de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnams gzigs na/_/grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs/_/grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis [#]de bzhin chos kun
[\[144a.3\]]gzigs/_/skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na/_/dga' ba skyes kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong /_/ji ltar sgra bzhin de yi yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyed kyis [#]de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bus ji skad rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/sgra ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba
[\[144a.4\]]med/_/phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_/mi dbang khyed kyis [#]de bzhin chos kun gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te/_/sgra 'drar de yi yan lag de rang bzhin/_/mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/_/
[\[144a.5\]]skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/sgra de 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa med/_/sgra 'drar de yi yan lag de rang bzhin/_/mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med/_/sgra 'drar
[\[144a.6\]]de yi yan lag de rang bzhin/_/mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/_/skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe/_/[#]sgra de rang dbang ma byung yan lag min/_/ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi [#]yan lag stong /_/mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs/_/zhe'o/_/yang gsungs
[\[144a.7\]]pa/_byams pa dge bsgoms sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal pa[#]/_/sems can rnam par bshig [#]cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen/_/de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan/_/des na bde gshegs
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]rnams [#]brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod par 'tshal/_/bde bar gshegs pas [#]sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun du mi dmigs kyang /_/lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi bar gsungs/_/de ltar rgyal mchog bdag cag rgyal ba'i
[\[144b.2\]]dgongs pa ji bzhin [#]'tshal/_/des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog 'os khyod [#]la mchod par 'tshal/_/thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ni bsal bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la/_/dgyes pa skyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal/_/
[\[144b.3\]]de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal/_/des na [#]mi mchog khyod la mchod nas mnyes pa'i 'bras bu thob par bgyi/_/thub pas sku ni rnam par spangs pas [#]sku btsal mdzad na ma bsnyengs [#]kyang /_/de ltar 'dren pa dran pa [#]ma gsung ma lags
[\[144b.4\]]bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'/_/bde bar gshegs pas lus la song ba'i bsgom pa bsgom par gyis zhes gsungs/_/sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod par [#]bgyis/_/sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lhag mthong lam yang bsgoms [#]zhes
[\[144b.5\]]gsungs/_/bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon mongs bag chags dri ma [#]de dag zhi/_/thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong dri ma thams cad stong pa ste/_/'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod/_/yang gsungs pa/_mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang [# ]
[\[144b.6\]]bral ba/_khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/_chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o/_/gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so/_/gang skye ba ma
[\[144b.7\]]mchis pa de la ni [#]'gag pa ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags dbang po ma lags so/_/gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_'di lta ste dper na/_chad pa stong pa ni
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]brdzun pa yang dag pa ma lags pa ma mchis pa ste/_'di ltar ming du gdags [#]par bas kyi [#]don dam par ni stong par yang mi dmigs chad par [#]yang mi dmigs so/_/de bzhin du mig dang dbang po yang [#]chad pa stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la yang dag pa ma lags
[\[145a.2\]]pa ste/_gsob gsog log pa slu pa'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa glen pa rmongs par bgyis [#]pa ste/_'di ltar ming du gdags [#]par bas kyi don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs [#]zhes bya ba'o/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar/_/de bzhin zag pa
[\[145a.3\]]rnams 'byung bar/_/zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po/_/dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan/_/rmi lam dag na mgo bcad bzhin/_/khyod kyis zag pa zad pa gzigs/_/de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan/_/thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal/_/zhes so/_/'di nyid
[\[145a.4\]]las mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/_/bdag gis ma 'tshal zhes smras pa[#]/_/gal te 'ga' zhig mi stong na/_/rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsungs[#]/_/ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bur/_/rang gi rang
[\[145a.5\]]bzhin gnas gyur nas[#]/_/'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste/_/de la 'phel med 'grib pa med/_/dper na rang bzhin stong pa yi/_/me long dkyil 'khor yongs dag la/_/gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du/_/ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis/_/chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur
[\[145a.6\]]med na/_/mchod pa'i yan lag 'gyur gang zhes/_/yan lag rnams la rtag [#]byos la/_/ljon pa mchod pa 'di la spyod/_/g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams/_/bstan [#]pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa/_/shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang /_/shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs[#]/_/ngas ni
[\[145a.7\]]las kyi rnam pa [#]bstan/_/byed po [#]phyogs bcu rnams na med/_/shing rnams rlung gis [#]bsgul ba las/_/me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no/_/bdag cag me 'di bskyed bya zhes/_/rlung dang shing la sems pa med/_/'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar/_/las kyi byed pa de bzhin no/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]gang yang bsod nams tshogs dang ni/_/byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang /_/legs spyod yod min zhes zer ba/_/de tshul yang dag mnyan par byos/_/mi yi tshe tshad lo brgya ni/_/'tsho ba yin zhes ji skad brjod/_/lo la phung po [#]spungs pa med/_/sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs[#]/_/
[\[145b.2\]]zhes so/_/bcom ldan 'das ma las kyang /_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos ma skyes pa skye'am 'on te skyes pa skye[#]/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod do zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa chos
[\[145b.3\]]yang dag par sdud pa las kyang /_rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni stong pa nyid kyi [#]tshig bla dgas te stong pa nyid [#]ni mi skye mi 'gag go_/smras pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du chos thams cad ni stong pa'o zhes gsungs te/_de bas na chos thams cad ni mi skye mi
[\[145b.4\]]'gag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtsom pa med kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/ji ltar khong du chud pa bzhin te/_chos thams cad ni mi skye mi 'gag go smras pa/_gang 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni skye'o [#]'gag go zhes gsungs na [#]de bzhin
[\[145b.5\]]gshegs pas 'di ci las [#]dgongs te gsungs/_/smras pa rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gnas pa skye ba dang 'gag pa la mngon par chags pas de la de bzhin gshegs pas [#]thugs rje chen pos 'jig rten dang nga pa'i gnas bsal [#]ba'i phyir tha snyad kyi [#]dbang gis skye'o [#]'gag go zhes gsungs te/_
[\[145b.6\]]'di la chos gang yang skye ba dang 'gag pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_bcom ldan 'das de la mig gis [#]gzugs rnams la sgra mi 'byin/_rna bas sgra rnams dang /_snas dri rnams dang /_lces ro rnams dang /_lus kyis [#]reg bya rnams dang /_yid kyis chos rnams
[\[145b.7\]]la sgra mi 'byin pa de ni chos so/_/de la ji ltar na mig gis [#]gzugs rnams la sgra mi 'byin zhe na/_phrad pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/mig ni gzugs la phrad par mi bgyid pa nas/_rna bas sgra la ma lags/_snas dri la ma lags/_lces ro la [#]ma lags/_lus kyis [#]reg
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]bya la ma lags/_yid kyis [#]chos kyi bar la phrad par mi bgyid do/_/gang phrad par mi bgyid pa de ni sgra mi 'byin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gnyis su ma mchis na chos la sgra 'byin pa ma mchis pa'o[#]/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gnyis su ma mchis
[\[146a.2\]]pa ste gcig gis gcig ma 'tshal rnam par ma 'tshal/_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog_/'byung bar mi bgyid 'jig par mi bgyid/_'bri bar mi bgyid/_'phel bar mi bgyid/_chags par mi bgyid mi chags par mi bgyid/_'khor bar mi bgyid/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi
[\[146a.3\]]bgyid de/_'di dag ni su'i yang ma lags/_'di dag gi su [#]yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ni skyo bar yang mi bgyid chags par yang mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ni kun nas nyon mongs par yang mi 'gyur rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[146a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das bdag gis [#]de ltar 'tshal to/_/bdag gis [#]de ltar rtogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang [#]bdag 'di ltar 'tshal 'di ltar rtogs [#]so zhes de ltar mchi ba [#]de ni skye mched rnams kyis 'gyur ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das skye mched rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bdag gi 'gyur
[\[146a.5\]]ba'o snyam du mi sems so/_/gang de ltar 'tshal ba de ni su dang yang mi rtsod do/_/gang mi rtsod pa de dag [#]ni dge sbyong gi chos kyi [#]rjes su 'jug pa'o/_/gang dge sbyong gi chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa de ni gang nas kyang 'jug par mi bgyid mi 'jug par [#]yang mi bgyid/_sbyor bar yang mi bgyid
[\[146a.6\]]mi sbyor ba yang mi bgyid/_'gro bar yang mi bgyid sdod par yang mi bgyid 'bri bar yang mi bgyid 'phel bar yang mi bgyid de/_thams cad chos kyi tshul du mthong ngo /_/thams cad rnam par grol ba'i tshul du mthong ngo /_/chos kyi dbyings nyid du mthong ngo /_/de ltar thams cad
[\[146a.7\]]'byung bar mthong ste/_gang 'byung ba de yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gzhan du na ming tsam dang btags pa tsam dang tha snyad tsam du mthong ba ni ma mchis pa ma lags so/_/ming de yang ming ma mchis pa'o/_/btags pa yang btags pa ma mchis pa'o/_/tha snyad
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]kyang tha snyad ma mchis pa'o/_/chos mthong bas sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can thams cad mthong ngo /_/sems can thams cad mthong bas rgyu dang rkyen mthong ngo /_/rgyu dang rkyen mthong bas stong pa nyid mthong ngo /_/stong pa nyid mthong ba ni mthong ba ma
[\[146b.2\]]mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma [#]mthong ba ni yang dag pa mthong ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/gnas med pa [#]kun rdzob tu ji ltar rung zhe na/_ji ltar mi rung ste/_ji ltar sdong po med na skyes bur 'khrul pa bzhin no/_/gang la [#]brten nas skyes bur [#]'khrul par 'gyur ba
[\[146b.3\]]stong pa nyid du smra ba la sdong po de don dam par [#]ji ltar grub[#]/_chos thams cad ni rtsa ba med pa ste/_yang dag par na rtsa ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro/_/de skad du 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las kyang [#]/_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du [#]rtog pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/_smras pa yang
[\[146b.4\]]dag pa ma yin par kun du [#]rtog pa'i rtsa ba ni phyin ci log gi 'du shes so/_/smras pa phyin ci log gi 'du shes kyi [#]rtsa ba gang yin/_smras pa phyin ci log gi 'du shes kyi rtsa ba ni rten med [#]pa'o/_/smras pa rten med pa'i rtsa ba gang yin/_smras pa 'jam dpal gang rten med pa de'i rtsa bar 'gyur ba
[\[146b.5\]]ci zhig yod/_de ltar chos thams cad ni rten med pa'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'di ni sems sbyang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par bya ba mdor bsdus pa ste/_bsgoms nas kyang nyon mongs pa'i dgra dang 'thab pa la mkhas par bya'i rang gi
[\[146b.6\]]khyim na dpa' bar ni mi bya'o/_/'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_stong pa nyid smra ba ni mi gnas pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis [#]mi 'phrogs te/_rnyed pas dga' ba yang med ma rnyed pas mi dga' ba yang med/_grags pas
[\[146b.7\]]yi [#]sos pa yang med ma grags pas sro shi ba yang med/_smad pas zhum pa yang med bstod pas dga' bar sems pa yang med/_bde [#]bas chags par 'gyur ba yang med sdug bsngal bas yid 'byung bar 'gyur ba'ang med/_gang de ltar 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis [#]mi
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]'phrogs pa de ni stong pa nyid shes pa ste/_de ltar mi 'phrogs pas stong pa nyid [#]khong du chud par bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du stong pa nyid smra ba ni gang du yang chags pa'am mi chags pa med do[#]/_/gang la chags pa dang gang la mi chags pa de stong pa nyid du
[\[147a.2\]]shes pa [#]stong pa nyid du mthong ngo /_/gang gi chos gang la chags pa dang chags pa med pa des ni stong pa nyid du shes so/_/de bzhin du gang la la 'thab cing rtsod par [#]byed pa de ni stong pa nyid mi shes te/_de gang dang 'thab cing rtsod par byed pa [#]de stong pa nyid du shes de [#]stong pa nyid du mthong ngo
[\[147a.3\]]zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/'di ni sems sbyang ba mdor bsdus pa'o/_/gang la 'bad pa byas na myur du sems dag par [#]'gyur zhe na/_bdag [#]bstod pa dang gzhan la brnyas pa spang bas [#]so/_/'di nyid kyi rtsa ba ni bdag dang sems can du lta ba [#]ste/_de yang 'di goms par byas na
[\[147a.4\]]yang [#]sla bar 'gyur te/_gzhan la gus par bya ba dang bdag khyad du bsad [#]pa de ltar bsgom par bya'o/_/gal te sems can phung po rnams/_/rnam pa kun du mnyam gnas na/_/gcig la bdag dang gzhan nyid du/_/'gal bar 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur/_/de ni dmigs pa med par yang /_/
[\[147a.5\]]thog med rtogs [#]pa goms pa yis/_/lus can dag ni kun du spyod/_/goms na dga' [#]ba ci zhig yod/_/de ltar goms pa'i bdag nyid du/_/mtshungs na ci phyir bde ba'i rgyu/_/gzhan la gus byas btang nas ni/_/rang sdug 'gyur ba gzhan 'dod byed/_/yid bzhin nor bu'i
[\[147a.6\]]gtam brjod las/_/gus par [#]bya ba'i rgyu yod do[#]/_/bdag la gus byed skal ngan gyi/_/skye bo las 'dir bde ba'ang med/_/de ltar [#]bdag la chags ldan pa/_/brlang zhing nga rgyal ser sna can/_/kun las 'phags pa'i tshul lta bu/_/de las zlog ste bsgom par bya/_/bdag
[\[147a.7\]]la gus par byed pa 'di/_/bstod smad la sogs chus bcus pas/_/'phel te dmyal ba'i tshil zhag gis/_/btab pas dmyal ba'i me bzhin no/_/re zhig dgra la [#]sems med phyir/_/bdag la bstod do snyam mi srid/_/bdag la gzhan dga' grags snyam pa/_/'di ni
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]bdag gi blo gros 'khrul/_/de mgu ba la bdag dga' ba/_/de ni rtag tu [#]spyir 'gyur mod/_/de bdes bya ba med ce na/_/dga' des bdag la ci zhig bya/_/gzhan nam yang na bdag la'ang rung /_/gzhan dgas bdag la ci zhig bya/_/'di ni gzhan gyi [#]dga' bas bdag_/lus kyis [# ]
[\[147b.2\]]bde ba 'dod ma yin/_/de ltar shes nas gzhi med kyi/_/rnam par rtog pa spang bar bya/_/ma grags smad dang ma bkur ba/_/de lta don med shes par bya/_/phyag 'tshal sogs pas chos mi 'gyur/_/tshe dang nad med stobs mi 'gyur/_/co [#]'dri byed pa'i tshe na ni/_/gzhan gyis[#]lus sgyur
[\[147b.3\]]byed dang mtshungs/_/dga'am 'on te mi dga' yang /_/rnyed dang ma [#]rnyed mtshungs par 'gyur/_/de ltar don med rnam spang ste[#]/_/ri dang mtshungs pa'i yid du bya/_/'dris pa spangs pas sems myur du dag par 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang bsam par bya ste/_/mtshan mar 'dzin pa [#]las
[\[147b.4\]]byung ba'i/_/ngo shes pas ni yang dang yang /_/rjes su chags pa skye bar [#]byed/_/de la [#]khong khro 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang la rjes chags khong khro yod/_/des ni sdig pa bzlog ma yin/_/phrag dog ser sna lhan cig tu/_/skur [#]pa 'debs pa sna tshogs 'byung /_/rnyed la sogs pa 'dod pa dag_/_
[\[147b.5\]]nga rgyal la sogs mang po 'byung /_/des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/_/thub pas 'dris pa yongs su spang /_/'dra [#]phyir 'di ni gzhan yin ya/_/'khrul pas de ni 'di'o zhes/_/rgyun rgyud bzhin du rtog de'i phyir/_/stobs kyis de nyid la gnas bya/_/'dra ba 'di ni dngos med de/_/khyed
[\[147b.6\]]la sdug bsngal bskyed par 'gyur/_/nga dang de dag thams cad kyang /_/ring por mi thogs med par 'gyur/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las lus yongs su dag pa'i le'u ste [#]bcu bzhi pa'o//_//yang dag 'tsho ba sbyangs pa yis/_/longs spyod dag par shes
[\[147b.7\]]par bya/_/khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zhus pa las ji skad du/_khyim bdag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos kyis [#]longs spyod tshol gyi [#]chos ma yin pas ni mi tshol lo/_/mthun pas tshol gyi mi mthun pas ma yin no/_/yang dag pas [#]'tsho ba yin gyi [#]log pas
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]'tsho ba ma yin no zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin par [#]byed pa dang sbyin pa'i bdag po [#]mthong na spyod lam mi 'chos so/_/ji ltar na spyod lam mi 'chos [#]she na/_gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba
[\[148a.2\]]dang /_skyo bar blta ba dang /_sgrim pa med par blta bas gom pas [#]bags kyis dal nas dal nas 'dor zhing 'debs [#]pa ma yin te/_de ltar na lus kyis tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/_/ngag gis [#]tshul 'chos par mi byed do/_/ji ltar ngag gis [#]tshul 'chos par mi byed ce na/_byang chub
[\[148a.3\]]sems dpa' ni rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir gcom bskyungs shing smra ba ma yin 'jam por smra ba ma yin dga' bar smra ba ma yin/_rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig brjod pa ma yin te/_de ltar na ngag gis [#]tshul 'chos pa mi byed do/_/ji ltar na sems kyis tshul 'chos par mi byed ce na/_byang chub sems
[\[148a.4\]]dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa'am sbyin pa'i bdag pos rnyed pa bstan [#]na/_tshig gis 'dod pa chung bar ston cing sems kyis 'dod pa bskyed pa ma [#]yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_tshig gis [#]'dod pa chung la sems kyis rnyed pa 'dod pa 'di ni [#]nang gi gdung ba yin te/_de ltar na sems kyis
[\[148a.5\]]tshul 'chos pa [#]mi byed do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na gzhogs slong gi rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa'am sbyin bdag mthong na bdag gos kyis phongs so bdag lhung
[\[148a.6\]]bzed kyi [#]phongs so/_/bdag na ba'i gsos sman gyis phongs so zhes gzhogs slong [#]mi byed cing /_sbyin pa byed pa'am sbyin pa'i bdag po la mi slong zhing tshig tu mi brjod de[#]/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhogs slong gi [#]rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na thob [#]kyis 'jal
[\[148a.7\]]ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byed pa dang sbyin pa dag mthong na bdag la sbyin pa'i bdag po che ge mo zhig gis dngos po che ge mo zhig byin te/_de la bdag gis kyang phan pa che ge mo zhig byas so/_/'dis [#]kyang bdag la 'di [#]ni tshul khrims dang
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ldan par rig ste mang du thos pa'o 'dod pa chung ba'o zhes 'di dang 'di byin no/_/bdag gis kyang de la snying rje ba'i sems nye bar gzhag ste blangs so zhes de skad kyi tshig mi brjod do/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thob kyis 'jal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub
[\[148b.2\]]sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ni lus la rma byung ba dang sems la [#]rma byung bar rnyed pa tshol ba ma yin no/_/de la lus kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/_rnyed pa'i rgyu rnyed pa'i phyir brgyug [#]pa dang kun du brgyug pa dang /_tshul khrims
[\[148b.3\]]'chal pa la spyod pa'o/_/sems kyi rma ni 'di lta ste/_rnyed pa la smon pa dang tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa gzhan gyi rnyed pa dag la gnod sems mang ba ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi rigs par btsal ba'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos
[\[148b.4\]]ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar [#]byang chub sems dpa' srang la sgyu med pa dang btsal ba la sgyu med pa dang yid brtan pa la gnod par byed pa med pa dang g.yos rnyed pa mi sgrub pa ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ma yin pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba
[\[148b.5\]]yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin zhe na/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang mchod rten gyi dang 'dres pa'am chos kyi dang 'dres pa'am/_dge 'dun gyi dang 'dres pa'am ma byin pa ma gnang ba de dag mi len cing bdag gir mi byed/_
[\[148b.6\]]chags pa'i sems mi skyed de/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su ma dag pa'i rnyed pa dang bral ba yin no/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa la zhen pa med pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnyed pa rnyed kyang bdag gir mi byed/_nor du mi rtsi
[\[148b.7\]]tshogs su mi byed cing /_dus dus su dge sbyong dang bram ze dang pha ma dang mdza' bo dang blon po dang gnyen bshes dang snag gi gnyen mtshams dag la gtong zhing dus dus su bdag kyang yongs su spyod la yongs su spyod pa'i tshe chags pa med pa dang zhen pa med par yongs su spyod do/_/
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]rnyed pa ma rnyed na yang skyo ba'i sems mi skyed cing yongs su yi mi 'chad de/_sbyin pa byed pa dang sbyin bdag rnams [#]ma dad par mi 'dzin pa yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/stong pa snying rje'i snying po can/_/spyod pas bsod nams dag par 'gyur/_
[\[149a.2\]]'phags pa nam mkha'i [#]mdzod kyi mdo las gsungs pa/_'di lta ste/_ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par [#]sbyin pa de sbyin no/_/nga yir 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_mtshan ma rnam par dag par
[\[149a.3\]]sbyin pa de sbyin/_tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin no[#]/_/rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin no/_/ji ltar nam
[\[149a.4\]]mkha' mtha' med pa bzhin du sems can [#]mtha' med par byas te [#]sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing sgrib [#]pa med pa de [#]bzhin du byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de [#]bzhin du gzugs thams cad la mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/_
[\[149a.5\]]ji ltar nam mkha' la tshor ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med pa de bzhin du 'du shes thams cad kyi mdud pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du 'dus byas thams cad med par
[\[149a.6\]]sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa med pa de bzhin du rnam par shes pa la mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la khyab pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji
[\[149a.7\]]ltar nam mkha' sems can thams cad kyi go skabs 'byed pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar nam mkha' la nga'i ba med pa de bzhin du sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/_ji ltar sprul pas
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]sprul pa la sbyin pa [#]sbyin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis grub [#]ste sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar rnam par [#]shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpas [#]sbyin pa
[\[149b.2\]]de sbyin te/_rigs kyi bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni/_shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa yongs su 'dor zhing thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/_rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i sems
[\[149b.3\]]ni byang chub sems dpas [#]sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang /_sems can thams cad la [#]gnod pa'i sbyin pa med pa nas/_ji skad smos pa las bri ba'i sbyin pa med pa'i bar dang /_sems can thams cad
[\[149b.4\]]la sbyin gnas ma yin no zhes brnyas pa'i sbyin pa med pa'i bar dang /_de bzhin [#]du sbyar te/_smre ba'i sbyin pa med do/_/slong ba rnams la gnod pa'i bar gyi [#]sbyin pa med do/_/bsting ba dang brid pa'i sbyin pa med do/_/rgyab kyis phyogs pa'i sbyin pa med do/_/bor ba'i sbyin pa med do/_/brnyas
[\[149b.5\]]pa'i sbyin pa med do/_/rang gis [#]lag ma dar ba'i sbyin pa med do/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_mi rung ba'i [#]sbyin pa med do[#]/_/dus ma yin pa'i sbyin pa med do/_/dug dang mtshon cha sbyin pa med do/_/sems can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba'i sbyin pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/drag shul can
[\[149b.6\]]gyis zhus pa'i mdo las/_des gzhan dag la chang yang sbyin te/_des 'di snyam du 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dus yin te/_gang ci 'dod pa de la de sbyin pa'i dus la bab kyi bdag gis 'di ltar bya ste/_gang dang gang la 'di ltar chang yang byin nas gang 'di 'khrul pa med pa'i
[\[149b.7\]]spyod pa la de dang de dag dran pa dang shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa ni/_chang gi sgo nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' la re thag chad de khong khro ba lci bar 'gyur bas/_'dis sems can bsdu [#]ba nyams par 'gyur te/_
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]gzhan dad par bya ba'i [#]thabs su 'gyur [#]bas chang sbyin no zhes bya bar dgongs pa'o/_/mtshon cha la sogs pa yang gal te gnod par mi 'gyur ba lta na lci yang brtags te/_byin na ltung ba med par 'di nyid kyis [#]mngon no/_/mdo sde las ni spyir bkag pa gsungs so/_/
[\[150a.2\]]sbyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyogs tsam zhig bshad zin to/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ni/_'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las gsungs te/_sems can rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba dang /_tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir nyan thos
[\[150a.3\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/gzhan yang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ni nam mkha' dag pa ste/_tshul khrims de yang dag pa'o/_/nam mkha' dri ma med pa [#]ste tshul khrims de yang dri ma med pa'o/_/nam mkha' zhi ba ste tshul khrims de [#]yang zhi ba'o/_/
[\[150a.4\]]nam mkha' mi mthong [#]ba ste tshul khrims de yang mi mthong [#]ba'o/_/nam mkha' mi dma' ba ste tshul khrims de yang mi dma' ba nas/_nam mkha' mi chod mi phyed pa ste tshul khrims de yang mi chod mi phyed pa la sogs pa'i bar du'o/_/nam mkha' la [#]zhe 'gras pa med de/_sems can
[\[150a.5\]]thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_nam mkha' ni [#]mnyam par sbyor [#]ba ste sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/'di lta ste dper na shing sA [#]la chen po'i tshal yod par la la zhig 'ongs
[\[150a.6\]]te shing sA [#]la bcad na/_de la shing sA [#]la bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad do/_/bdag gis bcad do snyam du mi sems te/_de dag la rjes su chags pa yang med do/_/[#]khong khro ba yang med do[#]/_/mi rtog rnam par mi rtog yongs su mi rtog go[#]/_/de bzhin du gang
[\[150a.7\]]bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i [#]bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa [#]yongs su dag pa'i mchog go zhes [#]so/_/'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo las/_rgya cher smos te gsungs pa 'di ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i yongs su dag pa gang zhe na/_gang
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]lus la mi g.yor dang gzugs brnyan du [#]shes pa/_tshig [#]brjod du med par shes pa/_sems can [#]la shin tu nye bar zhi bar shes pa'o/_/de bzhin du byams pa chen po'i go cha [#]bgos/_snying rje chen po'i gnas la gnas te/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid
[\[150b.2\]]kyi [#]rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pas [#]bsam gtan du byed do/_/de la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa nas thabs ma tshang ba med pa'i bar dang /_byams pa chen po dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms ma tshang ba med pa dang /_
[\[150b.3\]]bden pa shes pa la 'jug pa ma tshang ba med pa dang /_byang chub kyi [#]sems sems can la lta ba ma tshang ba med pa dang /_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sbyor ba ma tshang ba med pa dang /_sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyod [#]pa dang don mthun pa ma tshang ba med pa dang /_dran pa dang shes
[\[150b.4\]]bzhin ma tshang ba med pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma tshang ba med pa dang /_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[150b.5\]]du sbyar te/_rang bzhin gyis [#]nye bar zhi ba la las dang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis nye bar ma [#]zhi ba dang /_chos nyid kyis [#]btang snyoms pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la lta ba/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis bems [#]po dang /_byin gyi rlabs [#]bya ba'i phyir rnam par 'gro [#]ba med pa dang /_rang gi ngang
[\[150b.6\]]gis mi ldog pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang /_nye bar zhi bas bsil bar gyur pa [#]dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bad pa [#]ste/_'di ni [#]rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya ba nas/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
[\[150b.7\]]sems dpa'i [#]bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/'dis [#]shes rab yongs su dag pa yang rig [#]par bya ste/_bsod nams thams cad la yang de bzhin no/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las/_longs spyod dang bsod
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]nams dag pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//_//da ni gsum char gyis [#]'phel ba yang brjod par bya ste/_ci'i don du zhe na/_gzung bar bya ba rab mang la/_/'di ni nyung na 'dis ci bya/_/shin tu ngoms pa bskyed ma yin/_/de phyir [#]'di ni 'phel
[\[151a.2\]]bar bya/_/shin tu ngoms pa ni sangs rgyas nyid de/_de ni nyan thos dang thun mong ba'i dag pa tsam gyis [#]sems can rnams la mi bskyed [#]do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go/_/lus 'phel bya ba gang zhe na/_le lo med dang stobs bskyed yin/_/de la 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las stobs
[\[151a.3\]]gsungs te/_gang byang chub sems dpa'i stobs la stobs kyis brdzi [#]ba'i sems can de ni sems can gyi ris na med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/de bskyed [#]pa ji lta bu zhe na/_gang 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]gsang ba'i mdo las kyang ma skyes dgras[#]/_'phags pa
[\[151a.4\]]lag na rdo rje'i stobs mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur ces zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog ni yongs
[\[151a.5\]]su gtong [#]gi dam pa'i chos ni yongs su mi gtong ba dang sems can thams cad la 'dud cing nga [#]rgyal 'phel bar mi byed pa dang /_sems can mthu chung ba rnams la bzod cing khong [#]khro bar mi byed pa dang /_sems can bkres pa rnams la kha zas bzang po mchog sbyin pa dang /_sems
[\[151a.6\]]can 'jigs pa rnams la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_sems can nad pa rnams la yang dag pa'i gso bar [#]bya bar spro ba dang /_sems can dbul po rnams la longs spyod dag gis tshim par byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rdo thal gyis skud pa dang /_sems can
[\[151a.7\]]rnams la kun tu [#]dga' bar 'gyur ba'i tshig sgrogs pa dang /_sems can dbul po sdug bsngal ba ngal ba [#]chad pa rnams kyi khur khyer [#]ba ste/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na stobs 'di lta bu 'thob po [#]zhes bya ba'o/_/le lo med pa bskyed pa gang zhe na/_
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]gang brtson 'grus bskyed pa ste/_'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brtul ba brtan par brtson 'grus brtsam [#]par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gces [#]pa mi 'dor bar mos pa drag po bya'o/_/
[\[151b.2\]]blo gros rgya mtsho brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dka' ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rgya mtsho gang na brtson 'grus yod pa de na byang chub yod do/_/le lo can la ni byang chub shin tu ring zhing rnam par ring ngo /_/le lo
[\[151b.3\]]can [#]rnams la ni sbyin pa med pa nas shes rab kyi bar du med do/_/le lo can rnams la ni gzhan gyi don med do zhes bya'o[#]/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_/ut+pal chu nang ji bzhin du/_/de nas [#]mthar gyis rnam par 'phel/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/'di ni
[\[151b.4\]]lus 'phel ba mdor bsdus pa'o/_/stong dang snying rje'i snying po can/_/sbyin pas longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rdo rje gcod pa las/[ #]byang chub sems dpa' [#]gang mi gnas par sbyin pa sbyin pa de'i bsod nams kyi [#]phung po tshad gzung bar sla ba ma yin no zhes ji skad du gsungs
[\[151b.5\]]pa bzhin no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po las kyang /_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_sems can thams cad la sbyin pa chung ngu zhig byin la/_thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pas grangs
[\[151b.6\]]med dpag tu med par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/gser dang dngul dang skyed mos tshal dang rgyal srid la sogs pa'i yo byad kyi bar gyis sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yid bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'dod pas shes
[\[151b.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying rje med par ci yang mi spyod do zhes brjod par bya'o/_/'di ni longs spyod 'phel ba mdor bsdus pa'o[#]//_//bam po bcu gnyis pa[#]/_bsod nams
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]'phel ba ni spel [#]ba rnams kyi [#]rtsa ba yin pa des na [#]de'i don du grabs bsham pa brjod par bya'o/_/brtson dang bsam pa brtan pa yang /_/dang por nan tan byas nas ni/_/snying rje mdun du gzhag nas su/_/dge ba spel la nan tan bya/_/sems sbyang ba'i phyir brtson 'grus
[\[152a.2\]]dang por dus su bsgom pa sbyor ba rtsom pa'i tshe yang sngon du byed pas brtan par bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa'o/_/'thob pa'i dus nye bar 'gyur ba'i [#]tshe mtshon cha la mkhas pa la gus pa bzhin du sbyor [#]ba dang dus mnyam du brtan par bya'o zhes lhod par bzlog pa'i phyir dang po zhes bya ba smos so/_/de la
[\[152a.3\]]brtson pa brtan [#]par byed pa ji lta bu zhe na/_ji ltar 'phags pa nor bzangs [#]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su bstan pa de ni rjes su rnam par sems/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i lus mang po yang dag pa'i spyod pa nyams su ma blangs par chud zos pa la bsam pas ni lus kyi stobs rab
[\[152a.4\]]tu brtan [#]par byed/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i lus dang sems yongs su dag kyang don med par 'khor ba'i sems kyi rgyud du gyur pa la bsam pas ni sems dang yid la bya ba shin tu tshar gcod[#]/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i las yang dag pa ma yin pas 'jig rten gyi don du g.yen spyo
[\[152a.5\]]ste don med par sha thang ba la bsam pas ni da ltar byung ba'i don shin tu gces pa la [#]legs par bsgrub par [#]rnam par sems/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pas kun nas bslang ba'i phyin ci log gi kun du rtog pas yang dag par brtan pa'i yid la
[\[152a.6\]]byed pa'i bsam pas ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yang dag pa'i rtog pas mngon par 'du [#]byas pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed/_'das pa'i lus kyis [#]bdag gi don gyi sbyor ba la rtsom pa'i yul la yongs su bsam pas ni sems can thams cad kyi sbyor ba las khyad
[\[152a.7\]]par [#]du 'phags par lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs rab tu brtan [#]par byed/_'das pa'i 'dod pa yongs su tshol ba'i spyod pa ro med pa la yongs su bsam pas ni [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob [#]pa'i sbyor bas dbugs phyin pa chen po 'thob pa'i dbang po'i shugs drag po rnam
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]par 'phel bar byed/_'das pa'i dus kyi bsam pa phyin ci log dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba la yongs su bsam pas ni da ltar byung ba'i dus su phyin ci log med pa dang ldan pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam la yi dam bca' bas sems kyi [#]rgyud yongs su rgyas par
[\[152b.2\]]byed/_sngon gyi mtha'i brtson 'grus brtsams pa mi cha la don ma yin pa dang /_yongs su ma grub pa'i brtson 'grus nyams su blangs pa la yongs su bsam pas ni da ltar byung ba'i dus su sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu ba la sta gon du gnas pa'i brtson 'grus chen po rtsom [#]pa'i
[\[152b.3\]]rnam par gnon pas lus dang sems kyi gzengs mtho ba yang dag par bskyed/_sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i 'gro ba lnga'i rgyud kyi ngan song du bdag dang gzhan bor ba la brtags pas lus 'tsho ba med pa yongs su bzung ba la yang dag par bsam pas ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
[\[152b.4\]]yongs su bsgrub pa dang 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad bsnyen bkur bar [#]nus pa'i lus yongs su bzung bas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba'i shugs drag [#]po rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar byed/_da ltar byung ba'i skye ba mngon par 'grub [#]pa'i rga ba
[\[152b.5\]]dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang mya ngan gyi 'byung gnas su 'gyur te 'du ba dang 'bral ba'i gter du gyur pa'i lus kyang /_phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug pa'i [#]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa la brtson pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu
[\[152b.6\]]bas [#]brtson pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal blta zhing zhing thams cad du rgyu ba dang /_chos smra ba thams cad la rim gro bya ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung ba la brtson pa dang chos thams cad [#]yongs su btsal ba'i grogs su gyur pa dang dge ba'i bshes
[\[152b.7\]]gnyen thams cad mthong bar bya ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang ye shes kyi [#]rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa la bltas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang po dang shugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar byed cing 'phags pa
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]byams pa'i drung du song ba bzhin no/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' ni gcig pu gnyis su [#]med cing grogs med pa [#]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang tu go cha gyon te/_de brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis
[\[153a.2\]]yongs su zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pas/_pha rol gyi [#]skabs mi 'byed par bdag nyid byed do/_/rang gi stobs kyis [#]'phags so/_/de de ltar go cha sra ba bgos pas sems can thams cad kyis [#]yongs su thob par bya ba gang ci yin pa de bdag gis thob par bya'o/_/gang 'phags pa
[\[153a.3\]]thams cad dang theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis [#]thob par mi 'gyur ba de [#]bdag gis yongs su thob par bya'o/_/sbyin pa ni bdag gi grogs ma yin gyi [#]bdag ni sbyin pa'i grogs so/_/tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam
[\[153a.4\]]gtan dang shes rab ni bdag gi [#]grogs ma yin gyi/_bdag ni tshul khrims dang bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab rnams kyi grogs yin no/_/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis bdag la bsnyen bkur mi bya'i/_bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/
[\[153a.5\]]de bzhin du bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yang sbyar ro/_/ji tsam du bdag gcig pu gnyis su med cing grogs med par rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/_bdud stobs dang bcas pa btul nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i
[\[153a.6\]]shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi mdo las kyang /_'di lta ste/_dper na lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba na dmus long gi nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/dri za'i grong khyer gyi [#]nyes
[\[153a.7\]]pas mi 'dug go/_/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa'i rdul gyi nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyi nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/du ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]grib ma tha dad pa'i nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/ri mi mnyam pa'i nyes pas mi 'dug go/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa dang shes bzhin can sems zab cing rgya che ba rnam par ma zhum pa yon tan gyi spyod pa dang ye shes kyi spyod pa mthas [#]gtugs pa ni sems
[\[153b.2\]]na 'khu ba'i ngang tshul can gyi [#]nyes pas mi ldog go/_/sems can dmu rgod kyi nyes pas mi ldog go/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba med par mi gnas so/_/sems can dang lta ba'i snyigs ma'i nyes pas mi ldog go/_/sems can sems 'khrugs pa rnams dang ring bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[153b.3\]]sems can sems ma rung bar [#]gyur pas byang chub kyi go cha rgyun gcod par mi byed do/_/sems can gyi 'thab pa'i rnyog pa rnams kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam rgyun gcod par mi byed do/_/ji tsam du byis pa'i skye bo dang 'grogs pa dang sems can gzhan gyi nyes
[\[153b.4\]]pa rnams kyis [#]skyo bar mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ni 'di lta ste/_'gro ba thams cad rnam par dag par gdul ba'i phyir sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor du 'char ro/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang [#]sems can de dag [#]thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po dang /_sgrib pa sna tshogs dang
[\[153b.5\]]las nye bar gnas pa'i sgrib pa gang dag gis [#]de dag sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_chos nyan par mi 'gyur ba dang dge 'dun shes par mi 'gyur ba de dag [#]gis de dag gi sgrib par 'gyur ba de dag gi [#]las rnam pa gsum bsags pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phung po rang gi lus 'dis
[\[153b.6\]]blang bar bya'o/_/sems can dmyal bar skye ba de dag dang ngan song gi sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad de nas shi 'phos par gyur cig_/bdag gis [#]sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di [#]blang bar bya'o/_/brtson par bya'o/_/spro bar bya'o/_/mi ldog par bya'o/_/mi
[\[153b.7\]]'bros par bya'o/_/mi skrag par bya'o/_/mi 'jigs par bya'o/_/phyir mi ldog par bya'o/_/sgyid mi lug par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis ni sems can thams cad kyi khur bskur [#]bar bya'o/_/bdag ni 'dod dgar byed pa ma yin te/_bdag ni sems can
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]thams cad bsgral ba'i smon lam can yin gyi bdag gis sems can yongs su smin par bya'o/_/bdag gis 'gro ba thams cad bsgral bar byas te/_skye ba'i dgon pa dang /_rga ba'i dgon pa dang /_nad kyi dgon pa dang /_'chi 'pho dang skye ba'i dgon pa dang /_
[\[154a.2\]]ngan song thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_mi khom pa'i dgon pa dang /_'du byed thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_lta ba [#]thibs po thams cad kyi dgon pa dang /_dge ba'i las chud za ba'i dgon pa dang mi shes pa kun nas langs pa'i dgon pa de dag thams cad las/_bdag gis sems can
[\[154a.3\]]thams cad yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/srid pa'i dra bar chud pa/_ma rig pa'i sgrib pas bsgribs pa/_srid pa'i sred pa dang ldan pa/_mthar rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba/_sdug bsngal gyi gzeb tu bcug pa/_'khor ba'i btson ra na gnas pa/_mi mkhas pa/_dam bcas pa dang
[\[154a.4\]]'gal ba/_the tshom za bar gyur pa/_rtag tu yid gnyis za ba/_mi bde ba mthong ba/_'byung ba mi mkhas pa/_srid pa'i rgya mtsho klong 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor na gcig pu rgyu ba'i sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid la dgod pa'i phyir bdag gis spyod pa [#]spyad
[\[154a.5\]]par bya'o/_/bdag ni bdag 'ba' zhig yongs su thar bar bya ba la brtson pa ma yin gyi[#]/bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad thams cad [#]mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyi gzings [#]kyis 'khor ba bgrod [#]dka' ba las bsgral bar bya'o/_/g.yang sa chen po las dbyung [#]bar
[\[154a.6\]]bya'o/_/gnod pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bya'o/_/'khor ba'i rgyun las bsgral bar bya'o/_/bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad kyi [#]sdug bsngal gyi phung po khas blangs so/_/ji tsam gyis [#]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i ngan song thams cad
[\[154a.7\]]kyi sdug bsngal gyi gnas [#]myong bar spro bar bya'o/_/bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis sems can thams cad mi dor [#]bar bya'o/_/bdag ngan song gcig tu yang phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bskal par gnas par brtson par bya'o/_/ngan song gcig la ji lta ba bzhin du 'jig rten gyi
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i ngan song ma lus pa thams cad du gnas pa'i [#]sems can thams cad yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gcig pu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa ni bla'i/_bdag gi sems can thams cad ngan song gi sar rab tu ltung ba ni
[\[154b.2\]]de lta bu [#]ma yin te/_bdag gis 'dir bdag nyid gtar bcug la [#]sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi dgon pa las 'gro ba thams cad blu bar bya'o/_/bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba'i phung po thams cad bdag nyid
[\[154b.3\]]kyi lus 'dis myong bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag nyid sems can thams cad kyi gnya'o/_/bden par smra ba yid ches su rung ba mi slu ba bya bar spro ste bdag gis [#]sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag ni sems can thams
[\[154b.4\]]cad la dmigs nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pa ste/_'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir bdag dga' ba 'dod pa ma yin par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs so/_/bdag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i
[\[154b.5\]]dga' ba myong bar bya ba ma yin/_'dod pa'i yul bsten [#]pa'i phyir ma yin/_bdag ni 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba [#]bkod pa gzhan dang gzhan sgrub pa'i phyir ma yin par [#]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig rten thams cad kyi dga'
[\[154b.6\]]ba 'di ni [#]dga' ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'di lta ste 'dod pa bsten pa 'di [#]ni bdud kyi spyod yul lo/_/'di lta ste 'dod pa bsten pa'i lam 'di ni blo ngan pas bsten pa'o/_/nye bar bsten pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis [#]ma bsngags pa'o/_/de'i phyir nye bar bsten pa 'di ni sdug
[\[154b.7\]]bsngal gyi phung po thams cad 'byung ba nyid yin te/_de nyid las sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams 'byung ngo /_/sems can rnams 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dang mtshang 'bru ba dang 'gyed pa dang /_'khrugs [#]pa dang /_kun du 'khrugs [#]pa rnams 'byung
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]ngo /_/sems can de dag gis 'dod pa bsten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las thag ring du 'gyur ro/_/'dod pa 'di dag ni mtho ris su skye ba'i bar chad du yang 'gyur na bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal srid/_sems can thams cad kyi grub [#]pa dang bde
[\[155a.2\]]ba la lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_de ltar bdag gis [#]'dod pa skyon tshad med pa dang ldan la [#]rab tu 'bar zhing kun du rab tu [#]'bar bar mthong gis[#]/_de lta bas na bdag gzhi de la mi spyod par nan tan bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_ji lta ji ltar sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba dang /_myong
[\[155a.3\]]ba med pa'i bde ba nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba'i bar du thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar/_bdag kha lo sgyur ba/_yongs su 'dren pa bdag sgron ma 'dzin pa/_bdag zhi ba'i 'gro ba ston pa/_bdag dal ba'i 'gro ba thob pa/_bdag thabs shes pa/_bdag don la mkhas pa/_
[\[155a.4\]]bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi grus yul chen po la gnas pa/_bdag yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa/_pha rol ston pa bdag gis [#]de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad [#]yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
[\[155a.5\]]gyi khams snang bar bya ba'i phyir gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyi ma 'char ba ma yin gyi [#]gling bzhi pa snang bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma gcig po 'di kho na 'char ro/_/gang gis de dag [#]nyin mo'i grangs su shes par 'gyur ba dang rang gi bya ba yongs su thob
[\[155a.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_lo tog yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ba dang /_nyin gcig bzhin du skyed mos tshal dang grong khyer rnams su dga' zhing rtse la dga' dgur spyod pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_phyogs mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /_grong dang grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /_yul
[\[155a.7\]]'khor dang rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'ong ba dang 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba gling bzhi par skyes pa'i sems can re re'i lus las 'byung ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_lha'i bu nyi ma 'char ba na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig pu gnyis su med par gling bzhi pa'i khams kyi
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]sems can rnams la snang bar 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrub cing dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba yang 'di ltar sems bskyed de/_sems can 'di dag la ni gang gis 'di dag bdag yongs su skyob par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de med na/_gzhan
[\[155b.2\]]skyob par lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bdag ni sems can thams cad kyi ched du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsgrub par bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad thar bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad la snang bar bya ba dang /_
[\[155b.3\]]sems can thams cad [#]shes par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad bsgral bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa dang /_sems can thams cad rab tu tshim par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi the tshom
[\[155b.4\]]bcad pa'i phyir/_bdag nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur byas te/_gzhan la mi ltos par bya/_gzhan la skabs phye zhing sems can la go cha dor bar mi bya/_sems can thams cad kyi thad du sems can bskyab pa'i brtson pa las ldog par mi bya/_sdug bsngal thams cad bsal ba'i
[\[155b.5\]]yongs su bsngo ba las ldog par mi bya/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu yongs su bzung bar mi bya/_yongs su bsngo ba chung ngus chog par mi bsam mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_de bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu go cha bgo'o/_/
[\[155b.6\]]bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu go cha mi bgo'o[#]/_/zhes bskal pa bgrangs pas [#]byang chub mi tshol gyi bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i go cha gyon par byed do/_/gal te 'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' ji tsam pa de tsam la nyin zhag gcig tu gyur la/_nyin zhag gi tshul de lta bu'i nyi ma bco lngas zla ba phyed
[\[155b.7\]]du gyur la/_nyi ma sum cus zla ba gcig tu gyur te/_zla ba bcu gnyis kyis [#]lo gcig tu gyur [#]la/_lo bgrang ba 'dis lo 'bum la byang chub kyi sems gcig bskyed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig mthong la/_'jug pa
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]'di dang bgrang ba 'dis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems bskyed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas sems can gcig gi sems dang spyod pa shes par gyur la/_'jug pa 'di dang bgrangs pa [#]'dis de snyed kyi sems bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[156a.2\]]mthong bas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rnams shes par gyur kyang /_mi zhum pa'i go cha 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha mi zad [#]pa zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa dang byang chub kyi phyogs dang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams la yang sbyar ro/_/
[\[156a.3\]]'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las kyang /_'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems can dmu [#]rgod sems can gdul dka' bar rig ste/_de rnams kyis [#]yi chad nas 'di lta bu'i dmu rgod 'di lta bu'i [#]gdul dka' ba'i sems can 'di dag gis chog go zhes te[#]/_gzhi de las yongs su
[\[156a.4\]]skyo zhing rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/_gang na sems can 'di lta bu dag gi ming yang mi thos pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par smon lam ni 'debs so/_/sems can gyi don la ma phyogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yang skye bar
[\[156a.5\]]mi 'gyur te/_de la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab can ni 'di ltar sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gang rnams ngan pa brtson 'grus chung ba blun po glen pa lug ltar lkugs [#]pa'i rang bzhin can yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i chos can/_sems can gyi khams ma
[\[156a.6\]]lus pa 'di las bsnyigs pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis [#]spang bar gyur pa yod pa de dag bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus par gyur la/_bdag gis [#]de dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug tu bcug ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[156a.7\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/_byang chub sems dpa' de ltar sems pa'i [#]sems bskyed pa re re la yang bdud kyi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo'o/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyang de'i bsngags [#]pa gsung par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]re zhig bsod nams mngon par spel bar 'dod pas brtson pa brtan par bya'o/_/da ni bsam pa brtan par bya ba brjod par bya ste/_brtan par bya ba 'dis ci bya snyam du rtog pa bsal ba'i phyir/_'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las gsungs pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[156b.2\]]bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa ni chos rnams kyi rtsa ba ste/_gang la bsam pa ma mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ring ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa la ni/_gal te sangs rgyas mi bzhugs na yang nam mkha'i dkyil dang rtsig pa dang shing rnams
[\[156b.3\]]las [#]chos 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa [#]la ni rang gi yid kyi spyod pa nyid las gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gang
[\[156b.4\]]la rkang pa mchis pa de la 'gro ba mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de la [#]sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/_yan lag gi dam pa mgo gang la [#]mchis pa de la 'tsho ba mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de
[\[156b.5\]]bzhin du bsam pa gang la mchis pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gang la 'tsho ba mchis pa [#]de la rnyed pa mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la bsam pa mchis pa de [#]la sangs rgyas kyi rnyed pa mchis so/_/bcom ldan
[\[156b.6\]]'das 'di lta ste/_dper na zhugs shing mchis na zhugs 'bar gyi zhugs shing ma mchis na zhugs mi 'bar ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'bar gyi bsam pa ma mchis pa la mi 'bar ro/_/bcom
[\[156b.7\]]ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na sprin chags na char 'bab kyi sprin ma chags na char mi 'bab po/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bsam pa ma [#]mchis na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'byung gi bsam pa [#]mchis na mi 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na zhugs shing
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]gang rtsa ba nyams pa de las me tog dang 'bras bu rnams mi 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang bsam pa log par zhugs pa de las dge ba'i chos thams cad mi 'byung ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol
[\[157a.2\]]bas rang gi bsam pa shin tu bzung ba dang shin tu bsrung [#]ba dang shin tu sbyang bar bgyi'o zhes bya ba'o/_/bsam pa zhes bya ba 'di ji lta bu zhe /_'phags pa blo gros mi zad [#]pa'i mdo las/_bsam pa de yang ma byas pas na bcos ma ma yin no/_/g.yo med pas na ma byas pa'o[#]/_/rab tu
[\[157a.3\]]rtogs pas na g.yo med pa'o/_/sgyu med pas na rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/dag pas na sgyu med pa'o/_/drang bas na dag pa'o/_/gya gyu med pas na drang ba'o/_/gsal bas na gya gyu med pa'o/_/mi mnyam pa med pas na gsal ba'o/_/sra bas na [#]mnyam pa med pa'o/_/mi phyed pas na sra
[\[157a.4\]]ba'o/_/mkhrang bas na mi phyed pa'o/_/mi g.yo bas na mkhrang ba'o/_/mi gnas pas na mi g.yo ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/'di nyid [#]yon tan lhag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya'o/_/de nyid las ji skad du/_bye brag tu 'gro ba'i phyir rgyal ba'i
[\[157a.5\]]lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa dang /_yang lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams lus [#]nges pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa'o/_/'phags pa rnams la phan par sems pa'o/_/'phags pa ma yin pa la snying rje ba'o/_/bla ma la
[\[157a.6\]]rim gro byed pa'o/_/dpung gnyen med pa rnams la dpung gnyen no/_/skyabs [#]med pa rnams la skyabs so/_/gling med pa rnams la gling ngo /_mgon med pa rnams la mgon no/_/grogs med pa rnams la grogs so/_/gya gyu can rnams la drang ba'o/_/dmu rgod rnams la
[\[157a.7\]]gsal ba'o/_/g.yo [#]can rnams la g.yo med pa'o/_/sgyu can rnams la sgyu med pa'o/_/byas pa mi gzo ba rnams la byas pa gzo ba'o/_/'khu ba rnams la byas pa tshor [#]ba'o/_/mi phan pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa'o/_/log par zhugs pa la bden pa'o/_/pho thegs [# ]
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]can la nga rgyal med pa'o/_/legs par byas pa rnams la mi smod pa'o/_/gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi rtsod pa'o/_/log par zhugs pa rnams la kun du srung ba'o/_/thabs kyi dge ba spyod pa thams cad la nyes par mi lta ba'o/_/sbyin pa'i gnas rnams la rim gro byed pa'o/_/
[\[157b.2\]]bstan pa la mthun par 'dzin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa [#]lta bu'o/_/de ltar brtson pa dang bsam pa la [#]brtan par byas nas/_snying rje mdun du bzhag nas su/_/dge ba spel la nan tan bya/_/chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_de nas bcom
[\[157b.3\]]ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos shin tu mang po la bslab par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gcig rab tu gzung [#]zhing rab tu rtogs par
[\[157b.4\]]bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de'i lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/_/chos gcig pu [#]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po'o/_/bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen pos ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lag
[\[157b.5\]]mthil du mchis pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'khor lo rin po che gang du mchi ba der dpung gi tshogs thams cad mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po gang du mchi ba der sangs rgyas kyi chos
[\[157b.6\]]thams cad mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na gdugs shar na sems can rnams kyi bya ba thams cad shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po gang du shar bar gyur pa der byang chub byed pa'i chos kyi bya ba gzhan rnams kyang shin tu mang bar 'gyur
[\[157b.7\]]ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na yid kyis [#]byin gyis brlabs pa'i dbang po thams cad ni rang [#]rang gi yul 'dzin pa la 'jebs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs pa'i byang chub par byed pa'i [#]chos rnams rang [#]rang gi bya ba la rab tu
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]'jebs par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_dper na srog gi dbang po mchis na dbang po gzhan rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du snying rje chen po mchis na byang chub [#]par byed pa'i chos gzhan rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya
[\[158a.2\]]ba'o/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad [#]pa'i mdo las kyang /_btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_dper na dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa ni/_skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po bsgrub pa'i snying rje chen po yang sngon du 'gro
[\[158a.3\]]ba'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'di lta ste/_dper na tshong dpon nam khyim bdag bu gcig pa la snying thag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po la gnas pa yang sems can thams cad la snying thag pa nas sdug par 'dzin pa yin no zhes
[\[158a.4\]]gsungs so/_/'di ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na/_rang gis [#]sngon myong ba dang myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs [#]pa rnam pa du ma rang gis [#]shin tu mi 'dod pa bsgoms te/_byams pa dang ldan pas sdug pa la sogs pa la [#]byams pa bzhin du bsgom par bya ba'am da ltar byung ba'i
[\[158a.5\]]sdug bsngal gyis [#]nyen pa rnams dang sdug bsngal chen po'i rgya mtsho 'khor ba yun ring po dus tshigs med pa [#]na sdug bsngal dang ldan pa rnams la bsgom par bya'o/_/'phags pa sa bcu pa las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma'o byis pa so so'i skye bo 'di
[\[158a.6\]]dag ni mi shes pa rmongs pa dag ste/_de dag gi lus grangs med pa 'gags la 'gag par 'gyur zhing 'gag bzhin [#]te/_de ltar mchi [#]yang lus la yid 'byung ba mi skyed cing /_sdug bsngal gyi 'khrul 'khor je bas je 'phel du byed/_'khor ba'i rgyud las mi ldog phung po'i gnas
[\[158a.7\]]mi 'dor/_/khams kyi sbrul dag gis skyo bar mi 'gyur/_dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyis rmongs [#]pa rtogs par mi byed/_skye mched kyi grong stong pa la mi lta/_ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i phra rgyas mi spong /_nga rgyal dang lta ba'i zug rngu mi 'byin/_'dod chags dang zhe
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]sdang dang gti mug gi me lce 'bar ba zhi bar mi byed/_ma rig pa'i mun pa mi sel/_sred pa'i rgya mtsho mi skems/_stobs bcu'i ded dpon yongs su mi tshol zhing bdud kyi bsam pa thibs po'i rjes su song ba ste/_'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rnam par rtog pa [#]rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chu srin 'dzin
[\[158b.2\]]khris dkrugs pas yongs su g.yengs pa ngo mtshar che ste/_ma la bdag gis [#]sems can de ltar sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag pa/_mgon med pa/_dpung gnyen [#]med pa/_skyabs med pa/_gnas med pa/_gzhi med pa/_rten med pa/_long bar gyur pa/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i
