[\[158b.3\]]sbubs dang spris g.yogs pa/_mun pas zil gyis non pa de dag gi don du gcig pu gnyis su med par gyur nas/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsag [#]par bya ba rnam pa ji lta bus sems can de dag shin tu rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba nas/_stobs bcu'i stobs
[\[158b.4\]]kyis [#]ye shes chags pa [#]med pa'i bar gyi mthar thug pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i [#]rnam pa de lta bu'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsag [#]par bya'o snyam mo [#]zhes bya'o/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa/_kye ma'o sems can 'di dag ni 'khor ba'i mya ngan gyi lam du zhugs pa/_sems
[\[158b.5\]]can [#]dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i [#]gnas dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi g.yang sa la mngon du phyogs pa/_lta ba ngan pa'i dra ba nyam nga bar zhugs pa gti mug gi [#]thibs pos kun nas yog [#]pa/_log pa'i lam du zhugs pa/_ldongs par gyur pa/_yongs su 'dren pa med pa zhes bya ba nas/_
[\[158b.6\]]de bzhin du sbyar te/_'khor ba rgyun gyis bdas [#]pa/_srid pa'i klung du zhugs pa/_shugs drag pos bdas te blta ba'i mthu med pa [#]'dod pa dang gnod sems dang rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa mang po'i rjes su zhugs pa/_'jig tshogs la lta ba chu srin chen [#]pos zin pa/_'dod pa
[\[158b.7\]]thibs po'i klong du zhugs pa/_dga' ba can dang 'dod chags kyi dkyil du kun du thogs pa/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi thang la 'khyams [#]pa/_dpung gnyen med pa/_skye mched kyi grong nas ma 'phags pa/_sgrol ba la mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa yin gyi[#]/_de dag bdag gis [#]snying
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]rje chen [#]po dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis bton [#]te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i gling 'tshe ba med pa rdul med pa 'jigs pa dang skrag pa thams cad med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o/_/kye ma'o [#]sems can 'di dag ni sdug bsngal ba [#]dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa mang po mang ba[#]/_
[\[159a.2\]]sdug pa dang mi sdug pa dang [#]'brel pa/_mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa dang bcas pa'i rjes su rgyu ba/_sred pa'i sgrog tu bcug/_khams gsum pa'i ma rig pa'i thibs pos kun nas khebs pa yin gyi[#]/_de dag bdag gis [#]khams gsum pa'i gnas thams cad la dben [#]pa/_mya ngan
[\[159a.3\]]las 'das pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o/_/de ltar brtson pa dang bsam pa dang [#]snying rje gcig gis [#]gcig brtan par byas pa de dag gi bsod nams mngon par spel ba rtsom mo/_/de la re zhig bzang po spyod pa'i cho ga bzhin/_/phyag 'tshal la sogs gus
[\[159a.4\]]par bya/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/_gtsang ba dang gos gtsang ma bgos te phung po gsum pa bklag par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la phung po gsum ni sdig pa bshags pa dang /_bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang /_sangs
[\[159a.5\]]rgyas la bskul ba zhes bya ba ste bsod nams kyi phung po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de la phyag 'tshal ba ni sdig pa bshags pa'i nang du 'dus te sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal nas sdig pa bshags so [#]zhes nye ba [#]'khor gyis zhus pa las bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/gsol ba gdab pa ni bskul ba dang [# ]
[\[159a.6\]]don gcig pa'i phyir ro/_/mchod pa ni 'byor pa med pa'i phyir mi rtag pas ma smos so/_/yid dang ngag [#]ni mdo sde gzhan las grags pa'i phyir ma bshad de[#]/_/tshig gsum ni gtso bo yin par shes par bya'o/_/de la phyag 'tshal ba ni sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba [# ]
[\[159a.7\]]lta bu ste/_tshigs su bcad pa bzhi pa [#]dang /_ji ltar ston pa'i bstod [#]pa dang /_bzang po spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa rnams kyis so/_/mchod pa ni 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]me tog gi rnam pa'am 'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa gang yin pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'bul lo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
[\[159b.2\]]bsngo'o/_/de bdug pa'i shing ngam spos kyi shing ngam rin po che'i shing ngam dpag bsam gyi shing ngam me tog gi shing ngam 'bras bu'i shing nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su gzung [#]ba med pa gang yin pa de lta bu de dag kyang nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[159b.3\]]rnams la 'bul lo zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po las kyang thang las skyes pa'i rin po che'i rnams dang chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri rnams dang thang las skyes pa'i rin po che la sogs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa nga [#]yir bya ba med pa yongs su gzung [#]ba
[\[159b.4\]]med pa rnams 'bul lo [#]zhes gsungs so/_/phyogs 'dis sman thams cad dang bcud kyis len thams cad dang chu thams cad dang kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chu'i dkyil 'khor [#]dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams chags pa rnams na ro dang reg pa mchog
[\[159b.5\]]tu [#]phun sum tshogs pa'i sa zhag dang bdud rtsi'i sbu gu dang ma rmos [#]ma btab pa'i 'bras bu sA lu dang byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi [#]gling dang 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa rnams na [#]yod pa mchog tu nyams dga' ba'i longs spyod rnams 'bul lo/_/'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las
[\[159b.6\]]'di skad du/_de mdo sde rnams las mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba rgya chen po [#]gang yin pa de lta bu dag nyan cing /_de dag snying thag pa nas lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gis sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin du mchod pa dang
[\[159b.7\]]rim gro sna tshogs bya ba rjes su sems so zhes gsungs so/_/bshags pa ni sngar brjod pa nyid do/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las ni/_bdag dang gzhan gyi sdig pa bshags pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs su brjod do/_/rjes su yi rang ba ni bzang po spyod pa'i tshigs
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]su bcad pa'am/_zla ba sgron ma'i rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u las so/_/gsol ba gdab pa ni bzang po spyod pa nyid kyis so/_/yongs su bsngo ba ni mtha' dag bzang po spyod pa nyid du rdzogs pa'am/_rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su bsngo ba yang yin par blta'o/_/
[\[160a.2\]]yang na sa bcu pa las gsungs pa'i smon lam chen po rnams te/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas ma lus pa la mchod pa dang /_rim gro lhag ma med pa mtha' dag bya ba'i phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_mos pa rgya chen po [#]rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba
[\[160a.3\]]nam mkha'i khams kyi [#]mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro chen po bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po dang po mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[160a.4\]]thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i chos kyi [#]tshul yang dag par bzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub yang dag par yongs su bzung ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis [#]klas par rgya che ba/_nam
[\[160a.5\]]mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa [#]thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po gnyis pa mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams
[\[160a.6\]]rab 'byam ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thog mar mdzad de/_'pho ba dang gshegs pa dang /_lhums na bzhugs pa dang /_bltam [#]pa dang /_gzhon nu rol pa dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs pa dang /_
[\[160a.7\]]mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyad [#]pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul [#]ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa'i drung du 'gro zhing mchod pa dang
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]chos kyis [#]yang dag par bsdu ba'i sbyor ba sngon du 'gro bas thams cad dus gcig tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas [#]gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar [#]sangs rgyas 'byung ba bgrangs pa [# ]
[\[160b.2\]]thams cad kyi gan du 'gro ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po gsum pa [#]mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad shin tu rgyas pa/_che ba/_tshad med pa/_tha mi dad pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyis [#]bsdus pa/_sa yongs su sbyong ba/_yan
[\[160b.3\]]lag dang /_nye ba'i yan lag tu bcas pa bsgrub pa dang /_mtshan nyid 'dra ba dang /_mi 'dra ba dang /_'du [#]ba dang /_rgyas pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par gyur pa'i sa'i lam thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i gdams
[\[160b.4\]]ngag dang rjes su bstan pa rab tu sbyin pas brtan pa'i sems bskyed pa mngon par bsgrub [#]pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar spyod pa/_bgrangs pa [#]thams cad du
[\[160b.5\]]rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par [#]bsgrub pa'i smon lam chen po bzhi pa mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gzugs can dang /_gzugs med pa [#]dang /_'du shes can dang /_'du shes can ma yin [#]pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med
[\[160b.6\]]min dang /_sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_khams gsum du gtogs pa/_'gro ba drug tu 'dus pa/_skye ba thams cad du gtogs pa/_ming dang gzugs kyis bsdus pa'i sems can ma lus pa
[\[160b.7\]]thams cad yongs su smin par bya bar sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzud pa dang 'gro ba bgrangs pa thams cad gcad [#]pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la [#]rab tu dgod pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis [#]klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]mur thug pa bskal pa bgrang bar sems can gyi khams bgrangs pa [#]thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po lnga pa mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams shin tu rgyas pa dang /_tha gru che ba dang /_tshad med pa dang /_
[\[161a.2\]]phra ba dang /_rags pa dang /_snrel zhi dang /_spyi'u tshugs dang /_ngos phyal ba dang /_'jug pa'i khyim can dang /_mig 'phrul ltar rnam par phye ba dang /_phyogs bcu rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par 'byed pa la 'jug pa la ma lus pa/_ye shes kyi khong du chud par bya zhing mngon du 'gyur bar bya
[\[161a.3\]]ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis [#]klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi [#]mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i [#]mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar [#]'jig rten gyi khams bgrangs pa thams cad du 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po drug pa mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_
[\[161a.4\]]zhing thams cad zhing gcig dang /_zhing gcig zhing thams cad du yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba yongs su sbyong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag 'od dang rnam par bkod pa'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i lam dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa thams cad
[\[161a.5\]]bsal ba dang /_sems can ye shes kyi 'byung gnas tshad med pas rab tu gang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul rgya chen po la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /_sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bstan [#]cing shin tu tshim par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
[\[161a.6\]]par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi [#]mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar [#]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bgrangs pa thams cad yongs su skyong ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po bdun pa mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[161a.7\]]thams cad dang bsam pa dang sbyor ba gcig par bya ba dang /_'gran zla med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsag par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang dmigs pa gcig pas mnyam pa nyid du bya ba dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par [#]byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs shing
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]mi 'bral bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba ci dgar bstan par bya ba dang /_rang gi sems bskyed par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu ye shes kyi mthu khong [#]du chud par bya ba dang /_ma nyams shing rjes su 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams
[\[161b.2\]]cad rnam par rgyu bar bya ba dang /_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang ba thob par bya ba dang /_skye ba thams cad du rang gi lus rjes su 'gro bar bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings
[\[161b.3\]]kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi [#]mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar [#]spyod pa bgrangs pa thams cad du theg pa chen po la 'dzud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po brgyad pa mngon par bsgrub po/_/'di lta ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i
[\[161b.4\]]'khor lo la yang dag par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bya ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las don yod par bya ba dang /_mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi chos nges par thob par bya ba dang /_dbyangs brjod ma thag tu ye shes khong du chud par bya ba dang /_dad par
[\[161b.5\]]gyur ma thag tu nyon mongs pa ldog par bya ba dang /_sman gyi rgyal po [#]lta bu'i lus thob par bya ba dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta [#]bu'i lus thob par bya ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa spyad pa'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i
[\[161b.6\]]khams kyi [#]mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar [#]spyod pa bgrangs pa thams cad don yod par rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po dgu pa mngon par bsgrub [#]po/_/'di lta ste/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
[\[161b.7\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bya ba dang /[ #]byis pa'i lam gcig dang tha mi [#]dad par byis pa'i lam thams cad du skye ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan par bya ba dang /_
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po mthu dang ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro bas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_sangs rgyas 'byung bar dal ba/_dal ba la rtogs par byed/_zhi bar byed/_thob par byed cing bstan par bya ba dang /_gcig
[\[162a.2\]]mngon du yang dag par rtogs pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad mya ngan las 'das pas rgyas par bya ba dang /_dbyangs gcig brjod pas sems can gyi khams [#]thams cad kyi sems tshim par bya ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan kyang spyod pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcad [#]pa
[\[162a.3\]]dang /_ye shes chen pos chos thams cad 'byung bar byed pa bstan par bya ba dang /_chos shes par bya ba [#]dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang sgyu ma'i mngon par shes pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_chos kyi dbyings kyis [#]klas par rgya che ba/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas
[\[162a.4\]]gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_bskal pa bgrang bar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bgrangs pa [#]thams cad du theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrub [#]pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i smon lam chen po bcu po mngon par bsgrub ste/_smon lam bcu po 'di dag mngon par bsgrub po/_/zhes
[\[162a.5\]]bya ba'o/_/'di bsgom pa'i tshe thams cad la yang yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya bar [#]sbyar ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par thar pa las gang [#]gsungs pa de yang 'di ltar bya ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad g.yang sa'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar
[\[162a.6\]]bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi rgyun las byung ba'i 'jigs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi bcing ba'i 'jigs pa bcad [#]pa dang /_sems can
[\[162a.7\]]thams cad kyi srog 'chad par byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yo byad dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi tshigs su bcad pa
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]med pa'i 'jigs pa las shin tu bzla ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi [#]'khor ba'i 'jigs pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 'khor gyi nang du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa
[\[162b.2\]]las shin tu bzlog [#]pa dang /_sems can thams cad ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa las rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad yang ba'i 'gro ba mun pa mun nag can bzlog pa la snang bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/sems can thams cad ris mi mthun pa
[\[162b.3\]]dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa dang shin tu bral bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa 'gag pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jigs pa bsal ba dang /_sems can thams cad lus la yongs su gnod pa'i
[\[162b.4\]]'jigs pa dang shin tu [#]bral bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad sems la [#]yongs su gnod pa'i 'jigs pa las thar bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrugs [#]pa las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o zhes bya ba'o/_/
[\[162b.5\]]mdor na bzang po spyod pa las tshigs su bcad [#]pa gnyis 'byung ba 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba bla na med pa ste/_'jam dpal dpa' bos [#]ji ltar mkhyen pa dang /_/kun du bzang po de yang [#]de bzhin te/_/de dag gi ni rjes su bdag slob cing /_/dge ba 'di dag thams cad yongs su bsngo[#]/_/
[\[162b.6\]]dus gsum gshegs pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis/_/bsngo ba gang la mchog tu bsngags pa des/_/bdag gis [#]dge ba 'di dag thams cad kyang /_/bzang po spyod pa mchog phyir bsngo bar bgyi/_/zhes bya [#]ba'o/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las le'u bcu drug pa'o//_//_
[\[162b.7\]]bam po bcu gsum pa[#]/_phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa bshags [#]pa des bsod nams 'phel bar 'gyur bar [#]ci mngon zhe na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi mdo las shes te/_de las 'di skad du/_ngas ni gang dag bstan pa yi/_/mi khom brgyad po de dag spong /_/sangs rgyas
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'byung ba rab mdzes pa/_/mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig_/mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang /_/mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/le lo can du de mi 'gyur/_/de ni phyug [#]cing nor cher 'gyur/_/
[\[163a.2\]]bsod nams ldan zhing brdzi [#]ba med/_/'jig rten sgron ma mnyes byas nas/_/yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/_/tshong dpon khyim ni [#]rgyas pa dang /_/phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur[#]/_/dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/_/lhug par gtong zhing ser sna med/_/ris bskor rgya mtsho
[\[163a.3\]]tshun chad kyi[#]/_/sa kun la ni de brten zhing [#]/_/de ni mnga' bdag gling bzhi yi/_/dbang phyug rgyas pa [#]chos ldan 'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la/_/yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/_/'di nas shi
[\[163a.4\]]'phos mtho ris su/_/song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dang /_/lhun po'i steng gi dbang phyug po/_/lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/_/mi gang skor [#]ba byed pa yi/_/bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang /_/brjod pas zad par bya mi nus/_/su zhig byang chub
[\[163a.5\]]sems bskyed nas/_/ston pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba/_/de ni bskal pa bye bar yang /_/nam yang long zhing 'theng [#]mi 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas nas ni/_/brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brten la/_/brten [#]zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang /_/de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur/_/gang
[\[163a.6\]]zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la/_/bskal pa bye ba gzhal byas bsti stang byas pa bas/_/gang zhig phyi ma mi bzang [#]bskal pa 'di la ni/_/mchod rten phyag 'tshal de yi bsod nams shin tu che/_/sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/_/spyod pa dam pa spyad
[\[163a.7\]]nas khyad par brnyes [#]gyur pa/_/mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na/_/rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur/_/mi yi [#]nang nas shi 'phos nas/_/sum cu gsum du 'gro bar 'gyur/_/der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi[#]/_/gzhal med khang pa thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]chod rten phreng ba 'dir phul na/_/khang bzang [#]dag dang khang brtsegs pa/_/lha yi bu mos bsnyen pa rnams/_/sum cu rtsa gsum spyod par 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing [#]/_/gser gyi bye ma bdal gyur pa/_/bai DUr+ya dang shel dag gi/_/lha yi rdzing bu thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[163b.2\]]der ni lha yi dga' spyad nas/_/mkhas pas tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/_/mi nang longs spyod ldan par [#]'gyur/_/mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/_/tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa[#]/_/kun du bkur sti [#]byas
[\[163b.3\]]par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bye [#]ba 'bul byed pa/_/de ni 'khor los sgyur rgyal 'gyur/_/brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/_/dar gyi dbul ba phul byas na/_/lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi/_/don rnams
[\[163b.4\]]thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/_/phreng ba'i khang pa byas nas ni/_/de yi g.yog 'khor mi byed [#]cing /_/rgyal po 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/_/'phags pa rnams kyis [#]gang spangs pa/_/sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis [# ]
[\[163b.5\]]bshad pa yi/_/dge ba'i las la rten par byed/_/lha'am 'on te klu rnams sam/_/'jig rten dag ni [#]gang mkhas pa/_/de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang /_/bsti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur/_/brtan pa de ni gar skyes par/_/bsod nams gzi yis shin tu brjid/_/yul
[\[163b.6\]]'khor dag dang grong khyer dang /_/rigs der bsti stang byas par 'gyur/_/gang gis spos chu [#]yungs 'bru tsam blangs te/_/bcom ldan mchod rten la ni bdug byed pa/_/de yi phan yon brjod kyis sems dang zhing /_/rdul [#]dang dri ma spangs la mnyan par gyis/_/de ni bsod nams ldan
[\[163b.7\]]zhing phyogs kun rgyu/_/nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yod ldan/_/spyad [#]pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul/_/skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong /_/rgyal srid thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/_/mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor los sgyur 'gyur te/_/gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]go cha can/_/'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri [#]ldan thob/_/bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/_/de ni btsas ma thag tu gos mchog thob/_/lha yi khyad 'phags dar gos rab bzang rnyed/_/btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde/_/gang zhig gos kyis
[\[164a.2\]]bcom ldan mchod rten dang /_/'dren pa mtshungs med rnams la mchod byed pa/_/de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus 'thob ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas/_/bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/_/lag mthil nas ni mu tig phreng mdzes pa/_/sna tshogs
[\[164a.3\]]dag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang /_/gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung /_/'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/_/de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur/_/byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod/_/rdul bsal
[\[164a.4\]]sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul/_/ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur/_/shes rab mtha' yas mdzod ni mang ldan yang [#]/_/sems chung mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur/_/de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed/_/sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan/_/
[\[164a.5\]]de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/_/skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na/_/'di nas bzung ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dzam gling gser gyis gang /_/de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/_/bcom
[\[164a.6\]]ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na/_/de yi lus ni mdog ngan yong mi 'gyur/_/gzugs mchog sra zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra/_/snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu/_/gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas zhing /_/yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang gyur pa/_/bgrang ba dang ni
[\[164a.7\]]gzhal zhing brjod par nus/_/bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min/_/rgyan gyis [#]brgyan pa'i gzugs mdzes blta sdug pa/_/su zhig bcom ldan mchod rten 'bul byed pa/_/de 'dir lus ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te/_/gang gis rgyal ba'i sku ni rab 'bar ba/_/sum cu
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi go bgos [#]'gyur/_/khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang gser 'dra dang /_/'dzam gling gser ltar rab mdzes blta [#]na sdug_/mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pas mngon du gang /_/mngon par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags/_/byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba
[\[164b.2\]]spyod[#]/_/de ni nams kyang [#]longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur/_/lhas kyang bsti stang bya zhing mchod par 'os/_/brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dga'/_/tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod/_/yi dam bcas nas nags dang nags 'dab [#]song /_/mngon shes 'thob
[\[164b.3\]]cing khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la gdugs 'bul ba/_/ji lta bur yang byang chub sems mi 'dor/_/byams la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyur/_/de yi shes pa rnams [#]kyang nyams pa med/_/rol mo sgra yis mi mchog mchod byas [#]na/_/
[\[164b.4\]]mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'gyur[#]/_/mi yi 'jig rten yid 'ong sgra ldan 'gyur/_/de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par [#]'ong /_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i [#]sgra byas na/_/shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni rnam dag 'gyur/_/rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dag_/sna yi dbang po
[\[164b.5\]]mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de yi lce ni rab mdzes blta na sdug_/thog mar rab mnyen mdzes shing sgra yid 'ong /_/dper na lha yi rin chen byi ru 'dra/_/sgra skad yan lag bye [#]ba dpag med 'byin/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i [#]sgra byas na/_/nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur lce med min/_/
[\[164b.6\]]zhar ba sgur po ya yo can mi 'gyur/_/lus ni khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i [#]sgra byas na/_/lha'am klu'am mi'am lto 'phye che/_/su yang de la ma dad skyed mi 'gyur/_/dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu/_/bcom ldan mya ngan [#]'das pa'i
[\[164b.7\]]mchod rten phyags/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/_/yan lag ma smad khyad 'phags lus thob cing /_/mdzes la mtshan gyis go char [#]byas par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/lha yi tsan+dan khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i/_/gzhal med khang mchog
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob/_/de ni de la nam yang sred mi skyed/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi [#]bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tshe/_/'dzam bu'i [#]gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten
[\[165a.2\]]spos byug phul byas na/_/dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnams/_/rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas/_/de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'di spyod/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris lha dbang 'gyur/_/ring por mi thogs don stong
[\[165a.3\]]rnams la rtog_/lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/khyad 'phags tshig ldan sgra dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur/_/skye bo mang po'i yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur/_/de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul
[\[165a.4\]]byas na/_/de ni ngan song sa rnams ma lus spong /_/de bzhin gshegs dang [#]nye ba 'thob par 'gyur/_/dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde ba dga'/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing /_/de ni dal 'gyur de ni khyad par 'phags/_/de ni sangs rgyas
[\[165a.5\]]mtshungs med mchod par [#]byed/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/bag yod blo gros brtan [#]la dpa' bor 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi bskyed/_/mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/de ni nams kyang
[\[165a.6\]]byang chub sems mi 'dor/_/tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur/_/rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos kyang 'thob/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/de ni mdog ngan dus rnams rtag tu spong /_/'chal ba'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong /_/shes rab rgya chen
[\[165a.7\]]gyur nas spyod la gnas/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur zhing /_/khyad 'phags kha dog ldan zhing blta sdug pa/_/reg dang ldan zhing [#]rab mdzes gos [#]rnams 'thob/_/dad pa'i shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten la/_/me tog
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]skam po nyal nyil phyags byas na/_/'dod pa smad pa sdug bsngal bye ba [#]spong /_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par byed/_/mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/_/de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur/_/skye bo mang pos mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur/_/de la rgyal po gnod
[\[165b.2\]]par sems mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis/_/me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas na/_/ngan song sa yi lam ngan thams cad gcod/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phung por gnas/_/mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/_/bag yod mya ngan
[\[165b.3\]]rnams dang skyon rnams spong /_/nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong /_/bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs 'byin 'thob/_/mchod rten me tog rnying pa su 'phyag pa/_/sbyin gnas mtshungs med sems rgyas 'thob par 'ong /_/mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur/_/
[\[165b.4\]]rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis [#]brgyan par 'gyur/_/lha yi me tog rab mdzes man+da [#]ra/_/mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul dang /_/mchod rten me tog nyal nyil su 'phyag pa/_/de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byar mos bskyed de/_/ston pa'i
[\[165b.5\]]mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/'jig rten dag na bla mar bkur sti [#]bya/_/de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur/_/de 'dir rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi/_/lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud/_/stong gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur/_/dbang phyug nyid du dbang
[\[165b.6\]]thob rgyal srid bsten/_/de yi yul la sems can gang gnas pa/_/de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs par 'god/_/des ni ngan song sa yang rnam par spong /_/de dag rnams kyis don mchog dam pa byed/_/bsod nams blo gros dran [#]ldan mchod 'os 'gyur/_/dbugs [#]phyin thob
[\[165b.7\]]nas 'jig rten kun du rgyu/_/de yi g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan/_/bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dga' ba bskyed[#]/_/gsal snyan ngag gis [#]sems can go bar byed/_/de srog dbang phyug sus kyang phan mi byed/_/skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur/_/de yi g.yog kyang dbyangs
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]ldan [#]yan lag dag_/sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/sbyin dang snyan par [#]smra dang don spyod [#]dang /_/don mthun pa dag skye bo mang la byed/_/spyos shing brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi bskyed[#]/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/mtho ris
[\[166a.2\]]'jig rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur/_/mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal po 'os/_/de ni nam yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/de ni nam yang ngan song phyis mi ltung /_/'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong /_/nor can nang na
[\[166a.3\]]phyug cing nor mang 'gyur/_/yon tan ldan la tshig gcig su smra ba/_/de ni nam yang mi rigs bsngags mi spyod[#]/_/mi yi 'jig rten gnas min spyod mi 'gyur/_/de la sems can mi ngoms [#]dga' bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/snying rje chen po pad ma dkar po'i mdo las kyang /_
[\[166a.4\]]kun dga' bo nga 'dug pa la mngon sum du bsti stong [#]byed pa dang bla mar byed pa nas mchod par byed pa'i bar lta zhog_/gang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stong [#]byed pa lta yang zhog_/nga'i phyir mchod rten byas pa la gang bsti stong [#]byed pa lta yang zhog
[\[166a.5\]]ste/_kun dga' bo gang dag kha cig sangs rgyas la dmigs nas tha na sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kyis me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor na/_bsod nams kyi phung po de'i rnam par smin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag [#]thams cad kyi [#]'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_tha ma
[\[166a.6\]]mya ngan las 'das par nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo gang dag kha cig sangs rgyas la dmigs nas tha na sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems kyis me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor na/_de'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni/_kun dga' bo gal te sems can 'ga' zhig bskal
[\[166a.7\]]pa gcig tu 'khor ba la 'di [#]ji srid par kun du brgyug cing 'khor yang /_'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi shes pa bzhin du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byas pa de'i mtha' de ni brgya byin nyid rnams kyis [#]rnyed par sla ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]kun dga' bo 'di ltar sangs rgyas la phul ba'i yon tan [#]ni 'khor ba na spyod pa'i bde ba thams cad kyi mthas gtugs [#]par sla ba ma yin te/_gzhan du na dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa nyid 'bras bu [#]yin pas tha ma mya ngan las 'da' bar nga smra'o/_/kun dga' bo
[\[166b.2\]]gang dag kha cig mngon du bsti stang byed pa lta yang zhog_/gang nga'i sku gdung dang ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la sku gdung gi mchod pa byed pa lta yang zhog_/gang nga'i phyir mchod rten byas pa rnams la bsti stang byed pa lta yang zhog_/gang sangs rgyas la dmigs nas tha na me tog
[\[166b.3\]]gcig nam mkha' la 'dor ba yang [#]lta yang zhog ste/_kun dga' bo gal te sems can mya ngan las 'das pa'i [#]skal pa med pa zhig gis [#]sangs rgyas la dmigs nas tha na [#]me tog gcig nam mkha' la 'dor na yang kun dga' bo dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i [#]'bras bu de yang mya ngan
[\[166b.4\]]las 'das pa'i 'bras bu yin te/_mya ngan las 'das pas klas pa [#]dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthas gtugs par nga smra'o zhes gsungs so/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa chen po las kyang /_klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos brgyad dang ldan na/_rtag tu rgyun mi
[\[166b.5\]]'chad par sangs rgyas dang phrad pa [#]'thob po/_/brgyad gang zhe na/_sems can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_de bzhin
[\[166b.6\]]gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa la [#]blta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra grag [#]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der smon lam 'debs pa dang /_rgyun zhum pa med pa dang /_rgyun rgya
[\[166b.7\]]chen por gyur nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes tshol ba'o zhes gsungs so/_/bsod nams 'phel bar 'dod pa la sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa ci dgos she na/_de'i mtha' ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pas mi shes te/_'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las ji skad bsngags pa lta bu'o/_/
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang /_/sangs rgyas sgra ni rab bkod [#]na/_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa'i mchog_/mthong bar 'gyur ba smos ci dgos/_/chos kun rtogs par thugs chud cing /_/'jig rten gsum gyi bsod nams stegs/_/sems can thams
[\[167a.2\]]cad rnam sbyong ba/_/'jig rten sgron ma mthong ba legs/_/bsod nams che las grub pa'i zhing /_/ye shes dkyil 'khor rab shar ba/_/'jig rten dpag med snang bar mdzad/_/bsod nams phung po rnam par 'phel/_/sdug bsngal dra ba gcod mdzad cing /_/ye shes phung po
[\[167a.3\]]sbyong [#]ba yi/_/rgyal ba gang gis [#]mnyes byas pa/_/de dag ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med/_/rkang gnyis dam pa mthong na ni/_/sems rgya chen po skye [#]'gyur zhing /_/shes rab stobs ni 'od gsal ba/_/grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_
[\[167a.4\]]sems can kun gyi [#]don gyi phyir/_/brtan zhing thugs rje che ldan la[#]/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor ba/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'byung /_don kun brtson [#]pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang /_/lus can dag ni thams cad kyis/_/lan du phan
[\[167a.5\]]gdags ji ltar nus/_/ngan song gsum po mi bzad du/_/bskal pa bye bar bsreg bla [#]yi/_/chags pa thams cad rnam bzlog pa/_/ston pa mi mthong de lta min/_/'jig rten ji snyed thams cad kyi[#]/_/ngan song 'gro ba so so der/_/shin tu yun ring gnas bla [#]yi/_/sangs rgyas mi
[\[167a.6\]]thos de lta min/_/ci yi phyir na ngan song du/_/yun ring gnas par 'dod ce na/_/gang phyir rgyal ba'i dbang po dag_/mthong na ye shes 'phel phyir ro/_/'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal mthong na/_/sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad 'gyur/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyis[#]/_/ye
[\[167a.7\]]shes la yang 'jug par 'gyur/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas mthong na ni/_/sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur/_/gang gis byang chub thob [#]'gyur ba'i/_/bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel/_/zhes gsungs so/_/bsod nams rab tu [#]'phel bar bya ba la sangs rgyas dang phrad [#]pa ni de ltar
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]dgos pa yod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku gzugs tsam mthong ba yang de tsam du 'bras bu dpag tu med na/_rang gi ngo bo mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo las/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la
[\[167b.2\]]la zhig gis[#]/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi rang sangs rgyas dag la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa byin pa dang de bzhin du lha'i gos rnams sbyin pa byin pa bas/_'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
[\[167b.3\]]mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas ri mor bris pa'am gzugs su byas pa mthong na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med pa bskyed [#]na/_thal mo sbyar ba'am me tog gam bdug pa'am spos sam mar me 'bul ba lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs
[\[167b.4\]]med pa [#]bskyed do zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las kyang /_bsod nams spel ba'i thabs [#]gsungs te/_gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phyag pa de smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog bzhi 'thob ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gzugs la smon lam rnam par
[\[167b.5\]]dag pa mchog dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa brtan pa la smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba la smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa la smon lam rnam par dag pa mchog ces bya ba'o/_/yang de nyid las/_de bzhin
[\[167b.6\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten rnams la me tog 'bul ba'am spos ris 'dri na ma tshang ba med pa brgyad 'thob ste/_brgyad gang zhe na/_gzugs ma tshang ba med par 'gyur ba dang /_longs spyod ma tshang ba med pa dang /_g.yog 'khor ma tshang ba med pa dang /_tshul khrims ma tshang ba med pa dang /_
[\[167b.7\]]ting nge 'dzin ma tshang ba med pa dang /_thos pa ma tshang ba med pa dang /_shes rab ma tshang ba med pa dang /_smon lam ma tshang ba med pa zhes gsungs so/_/rin po che'i phung po'i mdo las kyang /_gang dag srid pa gsum du gtogs pa'i sems can de dag thams cad so so nas de bzhin
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'phang du 'di lta ste/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab lta bu byed la de dag [#]la yang so so nas gang gA'i [#]klung gi bye ma snyed kyi [#]bskal par bsti stang bya ba thams cad kyis [#]bsti stang byed pa bas byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
[\[168a.2\]]dang ma bral bas me tog gcig 'dor na/_de ni bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad theg pa chen po la yang dag
[\[168a.3\]]par zhugs par gyur la/_thams cad 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang ldan par gyur te/_'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i rgyal po re res kyang mar me'i snod rgya mtsho chen po tsam byas te/_ri rab tsam gyi mar me'i snying pos mar me bus la/_so so nas de lta bu'i mar me'i mchod pas de bzhin gshegs
[\[168a.4\]]pa'i mchod rten rnams la mchod pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ba gang gis [#]mar me'i snying po 'bru mar gyis bskus te de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'dzin na/_ras 'bru mar gyis bskus pa'i mar me 'di la snga ma'i mar me phul ba des brgya'i char yang
[\[168a.5\]]mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i rgyal po de dag gis [#]sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i [#]dge slong gi dge 'dun la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis [#]phu dud byed pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba gang gis bsod snyoms blangs te/_
[\[168a.6\]]lhung bzed du chud pa de bzhin dag dang bgo bsha' byas te zan de ni de bas ches mang zhing ches rin che'o/_/gang yang rgyal po chen po dag gis ri rab tsam gyi gos kyi phung po sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba bas/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim [#]gyi gnas nas mngon
[\[168a.7\]]par [#]byung ba gang gis [#]phyi rol du byung ste/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la chos gos gsum phul na/_dge slong gi chos gos byin pa 'dis gos sbyin [#]pa snga ma de zil gyis non par
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/yang rgyal po de dag re res 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad me tog gis mdzes par byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phul ba bas/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi gnas nas byung ba gang gis [#]tha na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la me tog gcig phul na sbyin pa
[\[168b.2\]]'di la sbyin pa snga ma bas [#]des brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi phod do zhes gsungs so/_/mthar gyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i [#]le'u las kyang bstan te/_phan yon bzang po bzhi po 'di dag mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa la spro
[\[168b.3\]]bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis [#]sbyin gnas kyi mchog la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag mthong nas gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du slob par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pas byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_mngon sum du mthong bas
[\[168b.4\]]skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba sogs par 'gyur ba ste/_bzhi po 'di [#]dag go zhes so/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa bla na med pa ste/_blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las ji skad du/_blo gros rgya mtsho gsum po 'di dag ni de
[\[168b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa bla na med pa'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_gang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_gang dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/'phags pa dkon mchog sprin
[\[168b.6\]]las kyang bstan te/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bcu dang ldan na mngal gyi dri mas mi gos par skye'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs byed pa dang /_mchod rten zhig pa 'chos pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la spos kyi byug pa
[\[168b.7\]]'bul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la khrus kyi spos chu 'bul ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la phyag dar dang skyang nul bya ba 'bul ba dang /_pha ma la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon dag la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /_
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams la lus kyi rim gro byed pa dang /_de yang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis te zang zing dang bcas pas ma yin pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang 'di [#]ltar/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad mngal gyi dri mas ma gos par
[\[169a.2\]]skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo zhing de yang bsam pa thag pa nas sems pa ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag go zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/rjes su yi rang ba'i phan yon ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gsungs te/_gang theg pa la dang po yang dag par [#]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
[\[169a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyi sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rang bar bgyid/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi [#]phyir mi ldog pa'i chos de [#]nyid la
[\[169a.4\]]rjes su yi rang bar bgyis na/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i [#]bsod nams kyi phung po ji snyed cig bskyed par 'gyur/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen
[\[169a.5\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni srang tshad kyis gzhal bas tshad gzung bar nus kyi/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i mdo las skyes pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag gi bsod nams ni tshad gzung bar mi nus so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom
[\[169a.6\]]ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung [#]ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i
[\[169a.7\]]bar la rjes su yi rang ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams 'di ltar dpag tu med do zhes bya ba mi nyan pa dang ma 'tshal ba dang rjes su yi rang bar mi bgyid pa dang mi sems pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa lags so/_/sems can de dag ni [#]bdud kyi phyogs su 'gyur ba lags so/_/
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis sems bskyed pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag gis [#]myur du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
[\[169b.2\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur gyi mi mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i mdo las skyes pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der phu dud du bya bar 'gyur bla mar bya bar 'gyur ri mor bya bar 'gyur
[\[169b.3\]]mchod par bya bar 'gyur rjed [#]par 'gyur gsol bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i gzugs rnams mthong bar mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/de dag ni yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra rnams thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du dri dang ro rnams ma yin zhing reg bya rnams reg par mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni ngan
[\[169b.4\]]song du skye bar mi 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/de dag ni mtho ris su skye bar shes par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems can de dag gis sems can grangs med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems can de dag thams cad la bde ba skyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang ba'i phyir te/_de dag bla na
[\[169b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can grangs med pa dpag tu med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du byed par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o/_/yang de nyid las/_rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[169b.6\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par gyur la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas nas kyang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du dmigs pa'i 'du shes
[\[169b.7\]]kyis/_bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang thabs mkhas pas zin pa gang gis/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang /[ #]rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
[\[170a.2\]]phung po dang /_nyan thos kyi tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_bzlums shing gzhal la/_ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis [#]rjes su yi rang ba dang /_gtso bo dang dam
[\[170a.3\]]pa dang rab dang phul dang gya nom pa dang bla ma dang bla na med pa dang bla ma'i bla ma dang mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang dpe zla med pas rjes su yi rang la rjes su yi rang ba'i mod las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
[\[170a.4\]]yongs su bsngo na/_rab 'byor rjes su yi rang ba'i mod [#]las skyes pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/_byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can gyi [#]bsam gtan bzhi'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do zhes
[\[170a.5\]]gsungs so/_/tshul 'di nyid ni yongs su bsngo ba la yang gsungs so/_/gsol ba gdab pa'i phan yon ni drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_chos yongs su gzung [#]bar bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams su tshe yongs su bsgyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bslab
[\[170a.6\]]pa kun las btus pa las phyag 'tshal ba la sogs pa'i phan yon gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o/_/[#]bzang po spyod pa la sogs pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsod nams 'phel bar bshad zin to//_//[#]'di yang 'di'i rgyu gzhan yin te/_dad pa la sogs pa [#]rtag tu bsgom pa gang
[\[170a.7\]]yin pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams yongs su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o[#]/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po dad pa ni yongs
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]su mi nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba'o[#]/_/dad pa gang zhe na/_dad pa gang gis 'phags pa'i drung du nye bar 'gro ba dang mi bya ba mi byed pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po gus pa ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/_gus pa gang gis 'phags pa rnams kyis legs par bshad pa rnams
[\[170b.2\]]gus par nyan pa dang rna blags te chos nyan pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po nga rgyal med pa ni khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste/_nga rgyal med pa gang gis [#]'phags pa rnams la mngon par 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa la phyag 'tshal ba'o/_/rgyal po chen po brtson 'grus ni khyad par du 'gro bar
[\[170b.3\]]'gyur ba ste/_brtson 'grus gang gis lus [#]yang ba dang sems yang ba 'thob pa dang bya ba thams cad kyang nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa ste/_rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams yongs su mi [#]nyams shing khyad par du 'gro bar 'gyur
[\[170b.4\]]ba'o [#]zhes bya ba ste/_dad pa la sogs pa 'di dag la rtag tu goms par bya'o/_/yang na dad pa la sogs pa gzhan dag la ste/_'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las ji skad du/_btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po lnga rnams mi zad
[\[170b.5\]]pa ste/_de la dbang po lnga gang zhe na/_gang 'di dad pa'i dbang po dang /_btson 'grus kyi dbang po dang /_dran pa'i dbang po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po'o/_/de la dad pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_dad pa gang gis [#]chos bzhi la dad pa ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di
[\[170b.6\]]lta ste/_'khor ba na spyod pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba la dad pa ste/_de las kyi rnam par smin pa la ston [#]pa yin/_dge ba'am sdig pa'i las gang dang gang byas pa de dang de'i rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ro snyam ste srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i las mi byed pa dang /_byang chub
[\[170b.7\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa la dad pa ste/_spyod pa de la zhugs nas kyang theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi bskyed [#]pa dang /_chos thams cad la don dam pa nges pa'i don zab mo/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bdag med pa sems can med pa srog med pa gso ba med pa gang zag med par rnam par
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dpyod pa dang /_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du dad pa ste/_lta bar gyur pa thams cad bag la nyal bar mi byed pa dang /_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad pa ste/_dad pa'i phyir the tshom
[\[171a.2\]]dang nem nur dang bral bas sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag yang dag par sgrub pa [#]ste 'di ni dad pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la brtson 'grus kyi dbang po gang zhe na/_chos gang la dad pa'i dbang pos [#]dad par 'gyur ba'i [#]chos de dag brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par sgrub pa ste/_'di ni brtson
[\[171a.3\]]'grus kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la dran pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_chos gang brtson 'grus kyi dbang pos yang dag par bsgrub pa'i chos de dag dran pa'i dbang pos chud mi gson te/_'di ni dran pa'i dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po gang zhe na/_dran pa'i dbang pos
[\[171a.4\]]chos gang chud mi gson pa'i chos de dag ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byed de/_'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de la shes rab kyi dbang po gang zhe na/_chos gang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang pos rtse gcig tu byas pa'i chos de dag shes rab kyi dbang pos rab tu rtog cing shin tu rtog
[\[171a.5\]]par byed de/_gang chos de [#]dang de dag la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog [#]par shes shing so sor rang gis [#]shes pa 'di [#]ni shes rab kyi dbang po zhes bya'o/_/de ltar na dbang po lnga po 'di dag ni lhan cig tu 'grogs shing rjes su 'brel ba ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
[\[171a.6\]]byed do/_/lung bstan pa'i sar yang gzhog go zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/dad pa la sogs pa'i stobs rnams la yang rtag tu goms par bya ste/_'phags pa gtsug na rin po che'i mdo las ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa
[\[171a.7\]]gang zhe na/_gang dbang po de dag gis nye bar bstan [#]nas bdud thams cad kyis mi brdzi [#]bar 'gyur ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis kyis mi 'phrogs [#]par 'gyur ba dang /_theg pa chen po 'di las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]thul bar [#]'gyur ba dang /_sngon gyi dam bcas pa la brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_sems kyi stobs shin tu brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_lus kyi stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_dbang po rnams sbed par 'gyur ba dang /_dgra rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang /_phyir rgol ba thams
[\[171b.2\]]cad kyis mi bskyod par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa bzhin no/_/de ltar/_/re zhig bsod nams spel ba'i phyir/_/dad pa la sogs rtag tu bsgom[#]/_/gzhan yang byams dang zhes bya ba ni/_zla ba'i [#]sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/_/bye ba khrag khrig dkrigs [#]pa'i
[\[171b.3\]]zhing dag na/_/mchod pa rnam mang dpag med ji snyed pa/_/skyes mchog rnams la de yis rtag mchod pas/_/byams pa'i sems kyi grangs dang char mi phod/_/ces gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas stsogs [#]dran bya/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa rjes su dran pa de yang
[\[171b.4\]]gang zhe na/_'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i [#]mdo las bsngags pa ste/_mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal/_/gser mdog 'dra ba khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdul bral khyod 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis/_/mnyam med mkhyen can khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[171b.5\]]rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang /_/khyod kyi gtsug tor 'di na ri rgyal bzhin/_/gtsug tor [#]mi mthong khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spus mdzes/_/kun da zla ba kha ba dung ltar dkar/_/thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di
[\[171b.6\]]gzigs pa/_/spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra/_/rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ljags [#]yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba/_/de yis rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs/_/chos gsungs pas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyi/_/'jam [(]sdum [,]snum [)]gsung ldan
[\[171b.7\]]khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tshems bzangs [#]shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra/_/bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing thags bzang ba/_/'dzum pa mdzad nas [#]'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid/_/bden gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis/_/'od kyis [#]
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid/_/'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag_/bcom ldan khyod kyi 'od kyis [#]zil du brlag_/e na'i [#]byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das/_/glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs/_/bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing
[\[172a.2\]]gshegs/_/sa dang ri dang ngam pa g.yo bar mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis [#]brgyan pa ste/_/khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra/_/'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur/_/khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang ldan/_/khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni
[\[172a.3\]]dka' thub spyad/_/khyod gtong dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes/_/sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan/_/mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes/_/khyod ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dges rab brtan/_/khyod ni bsam gtan shes
[\[172a.4\]]rab 'od gzigs [#]mnga'/_/mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i tshogs can 'joms/_/khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs/_/khyod ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel/_/mchog tu dga' mdzad khyod [#]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/thub pa sku gsung
[\[172a.5\]]thugs ni rnam par dag_/pad ma chu ltar srid pa gsum mi gos/_/khyod ni tshangs dbyangs ka la ping ka'i skad/_/srid gsum pha rol gshegs [#]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khyod kyis [#]'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang /_/gar la lta dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang /_/bdag med sems can med cing srog 'gro
[\[172a.6\]]med/_/chos rnams smig rgyu chu zla 'dra bar mkhyen/_/stong pa zhi ba skye ba med pa'i tshul/_/ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'khyams 'gyur te/_/thugs rje [#]thabs tshul rig [#]pa brgya dag gis[#]/_/de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad pa lags/_/'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis/_/skrag
[\[172a.7\]]par 'gyur ba'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te/_/bde gshegs sems can brgya dag yongs 'grel [#]cing /_/zla med dman pa lta bu rnam par rgyu/_/skye dang rga dang 'chi dang mya ngan non/_/sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas/_/rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni/_/thub pa
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]thugs rjes yongs su 'grel zhing rgyu/_/dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'gro rnams su/_/'gro kun shing rta'i 'phang lo bzhin du 'khor/_/glen pa dmigs bu ma mchis mgon ma mchis/_/de la lam gyi dam pa ston mdzad pa/_gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan la/_/'phags
[\[172b.2\]]lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad kyi/_/chos kyi dbang phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa/_/rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs/_/'jam zhing mnyen la yid du 'ong ba'i mchog_/tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa/_/dri za mi ci lha yi bu mo mchog_/sgra de zil gyis [# ]
[\[172b.3\]]mnan nas gsung pa mdzad[#]/_/bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis/_/yongs sbyangs [#]yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung /_/de thos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag[ #]/theg pa gsum gyis zhi bar mchi bar bgyid/_/khyod la mchod pas lha yi bde ba ni/_/rnam pa mang
[\[172b.4\]]dang de bzhin mi yis [#]'thob/_/mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa/_/phyug [#]cing nor che 'byor ba chen por 'gyur/_/mtshungs med khyod la dad pa bskyed pa ni/_/gling bzhi bdag po 'khor los [#]sgyur ba mchog_/'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed [#]pa/_/rin chen rab bzangs [#]bdun ldan
[\[172b.5\]]thob par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pas ni/_/tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang /_/yongs su dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang /_/gzhan 'phrul ba [#]dang 'thab bral rab dgar 'gyur/_/'gro ba'i [#]sdug bsngal rnam mang sel mdzad pa/_/mnyam med khyod la
[\[172b.6\]]mchod dang mthong ba dang /_/thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis lags te/_/gnas mchog rga shi med pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan lam la mkhas shing lam mkhyen pa/_/'jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las zlog[ #]/bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam/_/
[\[172b.7\]]bde ba zhi ba rdul dang bral la 'god/_/bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i/_/bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te/_/byang chub dam pa ma thob bar du ni/_/bskal pa bye ba mang por [#]bas mi 'gyur/_/gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa/_/yongs su
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]dag cing mdzes pa thob par 'gyur/_/dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis/_/sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs/_/yon tan rnam pa du ma thob par 'gyur/_/mtho ris thar pa [#]mi yi bde ba dang /_/
[\[173a.2\]]'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur/_/khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po/_/phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis/_/rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags [#]pa'i phreng ba ni/_/bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag par sgrogs/_/rims nad bral zhing 'gro ba thar mdzad pa/_/
[\[173a.3\]]mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa/_/bcom ldan dbang po zhi ba zhi dges [#]pa/_/mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis [#]rgyal ba khyod kyi gsung thos nas/_/mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas/_/dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur [#]te/_/
[\[173a.4\]]dri med chos ni 'gro la rnam par dbye/_/lha dang mi dang klus [#]mchod bde bar gshegs/_/yon tan kun gyi mthar phyin deng [#]bstod pas/_/bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs [#]gyur pa 'dis/_/'gro ba sangs rgyas go 'phang thob par shog/_/ces bya'o/_/yang na chos yang dag par sdud pa'i
[\[173a.5\]]mdo las gsungs pa ste/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po mnga' ba/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po'i spyod yul can/_/sems can gyi phung po chen po'i skyabs su gyur pa/_mgon du gyur pa/_sman pa chen po zug [# ]
[\[173a.6\]]rngu 'byin pa/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/_rtag tu ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul pa/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las [#]'das pa las rnam par grol ba nas/_sems can thams cad kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa dgra zin la sems snyoms pa'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'jig
[\[173a.7\]]rten thams cad zil gyis gnon [#]pa/_'jig rten thams cad kyi snang bar gyur pa/_rnal 'byor chen po la rnal 'byor pa/_bsam gtan chen po'i [#]spyod yul ba/_rnam par grol ba phun sum tshogs pa/_bdag nyid chen po[#]/_/skye bo chen po'i zham 'bring ba dang ldan pa/_skye bo khyad
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]par can gyi zham 'bring ba dang ldan pa/_lta ba dang nyan pa dang brten pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa mi zlogs [#]pa/_bdag bde ba la mi lta ba/_gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa la dgyes pa/_chos la gzhol ba/_chos kyi nor can/_chos kyi zas [#]can/_chos kyi sman can/_chos kyi gter
[\[173b.2\]]chen[#]/_chos kyi dbang phyug_/chos kyi bdag po/_chos kyi sbyin bdag_/rtag tu gtong ba la mngon par dgyes pa/_rtag tu bag yod pa/_rtag tu dben pa la mngon par dgyes pa/_thams cad du stegs dang zam par gyur pa/_rgyal po'i lam chen po dang 'dra ba/_nyi ma chen po dang
[\[173b.3\]]'dra ba/_tshangs pa chen po dang 'dra ba/_ye shes chen po'i rdo rje 'chang ba/_chos chen pos dbugs 'byin pa/_gzugs lta [#]bas mi ngoms pa mthong bas mi ngoms pa ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de ltar rjes su dran no/_/de dag de ltar rjes su dran pas de dag gi yon
[\[173b.4\]]tan yongs su sgrub pa'i phyir sbyor ro/_/dran pa nye bar 'jog go/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/de'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa [#]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/'di nyid las chos rjes su dran pa gsungs
[\[173b.5\]]pa/_'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni yon tan mtha' yas mu med pa ste/_de dag [#]ni chos las skyes pa/_chos kyi bgo skal la spyod pa/_chos kyis [#]sprul pa/_chos [#]bdag por gyur pa/_chos las byung ba/_chos kyi
[\[173b.6\]]spyod yul/_chos la brten [#]pa/_chos kyis [#]grub pa ste/_gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po de dag kyang /_chos las skyes pa/_chos las rnyed pa chos kyis [#]grub pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
[\[173b.7\]]bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa chos las rnyed pa chos kyis [#]grub pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad po de dag kyang chos las skyes pa chos las rnyed pa chos kyis [#]grub pa'o/_/gang 'jig rten pa dang
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba'i yo byad de dag kyang chos las skyes pa chos las rnyed pa chos kyis [#]grub pa'o/_/de bas na bdag [#]sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bas chos gtso bor bya'o/_/chos spyod yul ba dang /_chos la brten [#]pa dang /_chos la gzhol ba dang /_
[\[174a.2\]]chos snying por byed pa dang /_chos [#]rjes su mthun pa'i chos bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos rjes su dran pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_chos ni sems can thams cad la mnyam par 'jug
[\[174a.3\]]pas chos ni tha ma dang 'bring dang rab mthong nas 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni phyogs su ma lhung bas chos ni ngor lta [#]zhing 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni dus chad pa
[\[174a.4\]]med pa/_'di mthong ba la don yod pa rang gi [#]rig pas chos ni dus la lta zhing 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni mthon [#]dman med pas chos ni rgya che ba la 'jug pa ma yin dman pa la 'jug pa ma yin te/_/de ltar bdag gis
[\[174a.5\]]kyang chos dang mthun pa'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni mchog dang tha ma dang bral bas chos ni rnam par dag pa la yang 'jug pa [#]ma yin nyams pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni zhing dang zhing ma yin pa'i lta ba dang
[\[174a.6\]]bral bas chos ni 'phags pa la 'jug pa yang ma yin so so'i skye bo la 'jug pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pas chos ni nyin mo 'jug pa ma yin mtshan mo 'jug pa ma yin/_mtshan
[\[174a.7\]]mo 'jug la nyin mo mi 'jug pa ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni gang la yang nam yang sdod pa ma yin pas chos ni 'dul ba'i dus las kyang mi 'da' ste/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]thams cad du 'dod pa med pas chos ni sdang ba rnams la zhe 'gras pa yang med dad pa rnams la rjes su chags pa yang med de/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni bri ba yang ma yin gang ba yang ma yin te dpag tu med grangs med pas nam mkha' ltar 'bri
[\[174b.2\]]ba yang ma yin 'phel ba yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni sems can rnams kyis srung [#]ba ma yin gyi chos kyis sems can rnams srung ba [#]ste/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni skyabs
[\[174b.3\]]yongs su tshol ba ma yin pas chos ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs yin te/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid pas chos ni gang la yang thogs pa med de/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/
[\[174b.4\]]chos ni bag la nyal med pas bag la nyal mi 'jug ste/_de ltar bdag gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o/_/chos ni rtag tu rnam par mi rtog pas chos ni 'khor bas 'jigs skrag pa yang ma yin mya ngan las 'das pa la rjes su chags pa yang ma yin te/_de ltar bdag
[\[174b.5\]]gis kyang chos dang 'dra ba'i sems su bya'o snyam mo/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos ltar dran pa nye bar 'jog pas de'i phyir chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chos rjes su dran pa [#]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya'o zhes so/_/
[\[174b.6\]]yang [#]de nyid las gsungs pa/_dge 'dun ni chos smra ba/_chos spyod pa/_chos sems pa/_chos kyi zhing /_chos 'dzin pa/_chos la ston [#]pa/_chos la mchod pa/_chos kyi bya ba byed pa/_chos kyi [#]spyod yul ba/_chos spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa/_rang bzhin
[\[174b.7\]]gyis [#]drang ba/_rang bzhin gyis [#]dag pa/_snying rje'i chos can/_snying rje dang ldan pa/_rtag tu dben pa'i spyod yul ba/_rtag tu chos la gzhol ba/_rtag tu dkar po spyod pa'o snyam mo zhes bya ba [#]la sogs pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa ni 'di lta bu yin te/_
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi yon tan yang dag pa gang yin pa de dag bdag gis[#]/_bdag dang sems can thams cad la bsgrub [#]par bya'o snyam pa ste/_'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan [#]pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ji skad du 'byung ba de lta
[\[175a.2\]]bur dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o/_/sems can kun gyi gzugs dang ni/_/skad dang dbyangs su gang brjod pa/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas rnams kyis/_/skad cig gcig la ston par byed/_/sgyu ma'i chos kyis [#]rnam rtsen pa/_/de dag sems can smin bya'i
[\[175a.3\]]phyir/_/rga ba dang ni na bar 'gyur/_/bdag nyid shi bar rab tu ston/_/sa rnams kun du [#]tshig par ni/_/bskal pas bsreg par kun ston te/_/sems can rtag par 'du shes pa/_/mi rtag par ni rab bstan to/_/sems can bye ba stong rnams kyang /_/yul gcig tu ni
[\[175a.4\]]mgron du gnyer/_/thams cad khyim du zan byin te/_/thams cad byang chub phyir bsngo'o/_/sngags dang rig [#]pa ci yod dang /_/bzo [#]gnas rnam pa mang po dag_/thams cad kyi yang pha rol phyin/_/sems can thams cad bde thob byed/_/'jig rten ya mtshan ji snyed pa/_/de dag
[\[175a.5\]]kun du rab byung nas/_/lta ba tha dad gyur pa yi/_/sems can rnams ni yongs su 'grol[#]/_/zla ba'am nyi mar de gyur te[#]/_/brgya byin tshangs pa skye dgu'i bdag[ #]/chu dang me yang rab 'gyur te/_/sa dang rlung du'ang de bzhin no/_/nad kyi bskal pa bar ma la/_/de ni rtsi mchog dam
[\[175a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/des ni sems can rnam grol zhing /_/nad rnams med cing bde bar 'gyur/_/mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma la/_/zas dang skom du bsgyur nas su/_/bkres shing skom pa med byas te/_/srog chags rnams la chos ston to/_/mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma la/_/de dag
[\[175a.7\]]byams pa bsgom 'gyur [#]te/_/sems can bye ba brgya mang po/_/gnod sems med la 'dzud par byed/_/g.yul chen 'dres pa'i nang du ni/_/de dag phyogs la [#]mnyam par 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnams/_/'dum zhing 'du bar dga' bar byed/_/sangs rgyas
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]zhing ni ji snyed pa/_/bsam gyis mi khyab dmyal bar yang /_/sems can rnams la phan bya'i phyir/_/bsams [#]bzhin du ni der 'gro'o/_/ji snyed dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi/_/'gro ba'i bar du [#]bstan pa ni/_/thams cad du yang chos ston te/_/de'i [#]phyir rnam par 'dren ces bya/_/
[\[175b.2\]]'dod pa'i longs spyod rnams kyang ston/_/bsam gtan pa la bsam gtan ston/_/bdud rnams rab tu 'joms byed cing /_/de dag glags su 'gyur mi byed/_/me dbus na ni pad ma ltar/_/byung ma myong ba de ston te/_/de bzhin 'dod dang bsam gtan yang /_/byung ma myong
[\[175b.3\]]ba de ston to/_/bsams bzhin smad 'tshong rnams su sgyur/_/skyes pa rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir/_/'dod chags lcags kyus drongs [#]nas su/_/de dag sangs rgyas ye shes 'god/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/grong mi dang ni ded dpon dang /_/mdun na 'don dang blon
[\[175b.4\]]po dang /_/blon po chen por rtag tu 'gyur/_/sems can dbul po rnams la ni/_/zad mi shes pa'i gter du gyur/_/gang la sbyin pa byin pa yang /_/de dag byang chub sems bskyed btsud[#]/_/nga rgyal khengs pa'i sems can la/_/de dag tshan [#]chen mchog gyur te/_/nga rgyal
[\[175b.5\]]kun kyang bcom nas su/_/bla med byang chub tshol du btsud/_/'jigs skrag sems can rnams la ni/_/rtag tu de yi mdun na 'dug_/de dag mi 'jigs byin nas kyang /_/byang chub tu ni smin par byed/_/de dag lnga mngon [#]shes pa yi/_/drang srong tshangs par spyod gyur te/_/
[\[175b.6\]]bzod dang des dang tshul khrims dang /_/sdom pa la ni sems can 'god/_/rim gro lhur byed sems can rnams/_/'jigs [#]pa med pas 'dir mthong nas/_/bran dang g.yog tu shin tu 'gyur/_/slob mar yang ni nye bar 'gro/_/yan lag gang dang [#]gang rnams kyis/_/sems can
[\[175b.7\]]chos la dgar gyur pa/_/thabs chen shin tu bslabs pa dag_/bya ba dag ni thams cad ston/_/de dag slob ma [#]mtha' yas shing /_/spyod yul rnams kyang mtha' yas te/_/ye shes mtha' yas rdzogs pas na/_/srog chags mtha' yas grol bar byed/_/[#]bskal pa bye ba phrag
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]brgyar ni/_/bcom ldan sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_/de yi yon tan mtha' brjod dka'/_/zhes bya ba'o[#]//_//bam po bcu bzhi pa ste tha ma[#]/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rnams ni/_dkon mchog ta la [#]la'i gzungs las ji skad
[\[176a.2\]]gsungs pa de ltar [#]bsgom par bya ste[#]/_me tog phal cher me tog bla re dang /_/me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/bdug pa phal cher bdug pa'i bla re dang /_/bdug pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab
[\[176a.3\]]bkye ste/_/bdug pa sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/phal cher spos dang spos kyi bla re dang /_/spos kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/sna tshogs spos rnams kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/
[\[176a.4\]]phreng ba phal cher phreng ba'i bla re dang /_/phreng ba bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/phreng ba sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/phye ma phal cher phye ma'i bla re dang /_/phye ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/phye ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas
[\[176a.5\]]shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/na bza' phal cher na bza'i bla re dang /_/na bza' bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/na bza' sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/phal cher gdugs dang gdugs kyi bla re dang /_/gdugs
[\[176a.6\]]kyi bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/sna tshogs gdugs rnams kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/rin chen phal cher rin chen bla re dang /_/rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/rin chen sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid
[\[176a.7\]]chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/pad ma phal cher pad+ma'i bla re dang /_/pad ma bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye ste/_/pad ma sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/rgyan phreng phal cher rgyan phreng bla re dang /_/rgyan phreng bkod pa'i 'od zer rab bkye
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]ste/_/rgyan phreng sna tshogs kun du bkram byas shing /_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal ba mchod/_/rgyal mtshan mchog bkod 'od zer rab bkye zhing /_/de dag rgyal mtshan dkar dmar ser po dang /_/sngo dang rgyal mtshan bkod pa sna tshogs pa/_/du mas rgyal ba'i zhing rnams brgyan [#]par byed/_/
[\[176b.2\]]nor bu'i dra ba sna tshogs bkod pa'i gdugs/_/dar gyi lda ldi ba dan rab dpyangs [#]shing /_/dril g.yer dra ba rgyal ba'i gsung sgrogs pa/_/de bzhin gshegs kyi dbu la de dag 'dzin/_/lag pa'i mthil nas mchod pa bsam byas [#]rnams/_/rgyal ba gcig la mchod pa byed pa ltar/_/
[\[176b.3\]]rgyal ba ma lus kun la'ang de bzhin te/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/de dag 'gro ba sdud pa'i ye shes kyis/_/rnam par 'phrul dang ting 'dzin mchog bsgrubs shing /_/bya ba dag dang bsnyen bkur kun gyi sgo[#]/_/thabs stong dag gis sems can 'dul bar byed/_/kha
[\[176b.4\]]cig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod sgo dang /_/sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong sgo dang /_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan tshul khrims srung [#]sgo dang /_/bzod pa mi zad mi 'khrugs [#]sgo dag dang /_/kha cig brtul zhugs dka' thub brtson sgo dang /_/bsam gtan rab tu zhi bar gnas sgo dang /_/don
[\[176b.5\]]la rnam nges shes rab sgo rnams dang /_/spyod pa kun ldan thabs kyi sgo dag dang /_/tshangs pa'i gnas pa dag dang mngon shes sgo/_/bsdu ba'i dngos pos phan par 'dod sgo dang /_/bsod nams bsags dang ye shes sgo dag dang /_/bden dang rten dang rnam thar sgo dag dang /_/kha cig
[\[176b.6\]]stobs dang dbang po lam sgo dang /_/nyan thos theg pas rnam par grol sgo dang /_/rkyen gyi theg pas rnam par dag sgo dang /_/theg pa mchog gi rnam par 'phrul sgo dang /_/kha cig mi rtag nyid dang sdug bsngal sgo/_/kha cig bdag med srog med sgo dag dang /_/mi sdug 'du shes 'dod chags
[\[176b.7\]]bral sgo dang /_/zhi 'gog ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo yis 'dul/_/'gro ba spyod pa'i sgo rnams ji snyed pa/_/de snyed chos kyi sgo la rab zhugs te/_/de dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/_/gang dag kun du rnam thar sgo dag nas/_/bsams [# ]
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul byed pa/_/de dag sus kyang mtshan mar gzung mi nus/_/ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa de 'dra'o/_/de dag dga' ba bkod pa [#]ting 'dzin mchog_/'gro ba thams cad yongs smin [#]mthun byed pa/_/dga' bde spro ba rab
[\[177a.2\]]dga' kun ldan rnams/_/bsams shing bstan zhing [#]sems can 'dul bar byed/_/gang du lo nyes 'jig rten yo byad gang /_/bde byed thams cad rab tu dkon gyur pa/_/der ni kun gyi bsams [#]bzhin bya ba yis/_/sbyin pa sbyin zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/_/de dag zas
[\[177a.3\]]skom mchog dang ro mchog dang /_/gos dang bgo ba rin chen sna tshogs dang /_/rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs gtong bas/_/sbyin la mos pa'i 'gro ba 'dul bar byed/_/brten [#]pa de dag mtshan mchog [#]lus spras shing /_/gos dang rgyan mchog bgos shing brgyan byas te/_/
[\[177a.4\]]phreng bas brgyan cing spos kyis [#]bskus pa yis[#]/_/gzugs rnams bstan pas sems can 'dul bar byed/_/mthong na dga' tshim rab tu dga' rnams la/_/blo mchog de dag mchog tu gzugs bzang ba/_/gzugs kyi dam pa yongs su ston byed cing /_/gzugs la mos pa'i
[\[177a.5\]]sems can 'dul bar byed/_/de dag ka la ping ka'i sgra snyan dang /_/khu byug kun la ngang pa'i sgra skad dang /_/rnga dang tshangs dang mi'am ci yi sgras/_/mos pa kun la de bzhin chos kyang ston/_/stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pas/_/rgyal ba gang dag 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i/_/
[\[177a.6\]]chos kyi bye brag sgo mo de dag gis/_/bsam pa ji bzhin 'jig rten sems can 'dul/_/de dag bde dang sdug bsngal grogs kyang byed/_/don dang gnod pa'i grogs kyang de bzhin byed/_/bya ba kun la grogs su 'gyur byas shing /_/grogs kyi sgo nas sems can 'dul bar byed/_/
[\[177a.7\]]sdug bsngal gnod pa 'dus byas skyon rnams la/_/grogs kyi don du de dag bzod byed cing /_/'gro ba kun la phan don bde don du/_/de dag grogs don gnod pa dang du len/_/gang na sngon byung med cing chos med de/_/dgon par 'gro dang thar pa mi dmigs pa/_/der ni rgyal srid
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]'byor pa rab spangs te/_/zhi ba'i yid kyis gnas med mngon par 'byung /_/de dag khyim dang 'ching dang bsreg [#]pa'i gnas/_/'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i rgyur/_/'dod pa'i dga' ba kun la mi gnas par/_/mngon par byung zhing thar pa rab tu brjod/_/de dag spyod pa bcu rnams
[\[177b.2\]]rjod byed cing /_/skyes chen rnams kyi chos spyod gang yin dang /_/drang srong rnams kyi spyod yul [#]ma lus par/_/yongs su brjod cing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/_/gang na sems can dpag med tshe ldan zhing /_/bde dang ldan la nyon mongs chung yod pa/_/der ni rga bas nyen cing nad bu can/_/
[\[177b.3\]]bdag la dbang med 'chi ba'i dbang gyur ston/_/'dod chags 'bar zhing zhe sdang rab 'bar la/_/'jig rten gti mug me chen rab 'bar zhing /_/rga dang na dang 'chi ba rab 'bar ba'i/_/'jig rten bstan gnas sems can 'dul bar byed/_/de dag sangs rgyas stobs bcu brtson
[\[177b.4\]]bzhi dang /_/chos kyi khyad par bco brgyad rnams kyis kyang /_/sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag nyid rjod byed cing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyis 'gro don byed/_/de dag kun brjod rdzu 'phrul rjes bstan pas/_/gzugs kyi byin rlabs [#]stobs kyis thams cad du/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[177b.5\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul ston byed cing /_/rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas sems can 'dul/_/de dag thabs tshul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/'jig rten rgyu zhing 'gro ba'i don rnams byed/_/'jig rten mi chags chu la pad ma bzhin/_/dga' zhing dad par byed la rnam par rgyu/_/de dag snyan
[\[177b.6\]]dngags mkhan rgyal snyan dngags sbyor/_/gar mkhan rnga mkhan gyad dang rol mo mkhan/_/bzhugs mdzes rgyan phreng thogs shing gar byed dang /_/sgyu ma mkhan po gzugs mang kun du ston/_/grong pa grong dpon kha lo sgyur [#]bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin ded dpon tshong dpon khyim bdag 'gyur/_/
[\[177b.7\]]rgyal po blon po mdun 'don pho nya dang /_/sman pa 'jigs med bstan bcos cho ga mkhan/_/de dag dgon par ljon shing chen por 'gyur/_/sman dang rin chen mi zad gter rnams dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu 'dod sbyin sdong po dang /_/lam gol dong ba rnams la lam ston 'gyur/_/
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]'jig rten byung nas mi ring shes gyur cig_/sems can lam gyi [#]tshul rnams mi shes pa/_/de dag kun la rmongs chos tshong thabs dang /_/sna tshogs bzo rnams 'jig rten rjod par byed/_/'tshe med gnod sems [#]med pa'i sbyor ba gang /_/sems can bde byed
[\[178a.2\]]mkhas pas rab bsngags pa/_/rig stobs sman dang bstan bcos sna tshogs kun/_/drang srong de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/_/gang la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs [#]'gyur ba/_/drang srong spyod mchog dam pa gang yin dang /_/brtul zhugs dka' spyad dka' thub spyod kun kyang /_/
[\[178a.3\]]mkhas pas de dag rnams kyis rab tu brjod/_/de dag spyod can kun rgyu mu stegs can/_/gdung ba gau [#]ta ma dang mi smrar spyod/_/gcer bu gos med lhur len dge sbyong la/_/mu stegs can gyi slob dpon mkhas par ston/_/de dag kun du 'tsho ba'i chos 'dzin dang /_/bla na yod dang
[\[178a.4\]]bla na med rnams dang /_/ral pa ring dang gzhon nu'i brtul zhugs can/_/de dag tu yang slob dpon 'gyur ba yin/_/nyi ma'i rjes lta dka' thub lnga ldan dang /_/khyi dang ba lang brtul zhugs ri dgas spyod/_/gle'u can dang mu stegs sum cu pa/_/de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/_/
[\[178a.5\]]lhag pa'i shes la 'jug par [#]dga' rnams dang /_/mu stegs nye reg yul du rgyu rnams su/_/rtsa ba 'bras bu chu spyod [#]gyur nas kyang /_/bsam yas chos la de dag dam pa mchog_/tsog pur 'dug dang gcig pur rgyu ba dang /_/tsher ma rtswa dang thal bar nyal ba dang /_/gang dag gtun shing
[\[178a.6\]]mal can gnas pa dang /_/de dag tu yang de dag slob dpon 'gyur/_/phyi rol mu stegs can rnams ji snyed pa/_/de dag bsam pa mos pa rtogs byas shing /_/bsnyen dka' mi bzad drag shul dka' thub kyis/_/mu stegs can gyi sdug bsngal spang bar 'dul/_/'jig rten lta
