[\[178a.7\]]bas 'khrug [#]pa shes byas nas/_/lta ba ngan la gnas pa'i mu stegs can/_/kun la phra ba'i gzhi dang thabs tshul gyis[#]/_/de dag rnams la bden pa ston par byed/_/la lar 'gro lding ba yi sngags kyi gzhi/_/shin tu gsang ba'i gzhi yis bden pa ston/_/la la dag la
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]gsal zhing drang tshig gis/_/la la dag la lha yi gsang tshig [#]gis/_/la la dag la yi ge dbye tshig dang /_/don la rnam nges rdo rje'i tshig [#]rnams dang /_/rgol ba 'dul bar shes pa'i tshig rnams dang /_/bstan bcos thub med thar pa'i tshig [#]rnams kyis/_/la la dag la mi skad tshig
[\[178b.2\]]rnams dang /_/kun la 'jug pa nges [#]tshig rnams kyis su[#]/_/la la dag la lha yi [#]nges tshig dang /_/klu yi nges tshig gnod sbyin nges tshig gis/_/la lar srin po 'byung po sha za dang /_/dri za grul bum lto 'phye che [#]tshig dang /_/mi ci lha min mkha' lding tshig rnams kyis/_/bden pa bstan
[\[178b.3\]]cing thar par 'dren par byed/_/de dag bden dang nges tshig tshul shes te/_/de ltar rgyal ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa'i/_/chos nyid bsam byas tshig lam shes par ston/_/de dag ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul de 'dra'o/_/de dag 'gro bde mchog gi ting nge 'dzin/_/'gro ba kun la mngon par
[\[178b.4\]]sgrub byed cing /_/'od zer bsam gyis mi khyab rab bkye [#]ste/_/'od zer bkye nas sems can 'dul bar byed/_/mthong na legs pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can ji snyed 'od zer de shes pa/_/de dag mthong legs don med ma yin te/_/bla na med pa'i ye shes mchog
[\[178b.5\]]gi rgyu/_/mi rnams kun la sangs rgyas yongs bstan dang [#]/_/chos kyang yongs su bstan de lam bstan cing /_/rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod rten bstan byas pas/_/des na mthong legs 'od zer grub par 'gyur/_/lha yi 'od zer zil gyis gnon pa yi[#]/_/'od zer 'od byed
[\[178b.6\]]ces bya rab gtong zhing /_/rdul dang mun pa thams cad bsal byas te/_/'jig rten phan pa'i 'od de rab tu snang /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron ma 'dzin/_/de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir sgron bzung [#]bas/_/'jig rten sgron ma
[\[178b.7\]]mdzad pa'i rgyal bar gyur[#]/_/'bru mar mar me mar gyi mar me dang /_/rtswa shing 'dam bu 'od ma'i sgron ma dang /_/spos dang bcud len rin chen sgron ma dag[ #]/rgyal ba rnams la phul nas 'od byed thob/_/sgrol zhes bya ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]bskul byas la/_/de dag sred spangs sred pa'i rgya mtsho las/_/sems can sgrol ba'i don du go cha gyon/_/gang dag sred spangs sred pa'i rgya mtsho las/_/sems can sgrol ba'i don du go gyon pa/_/de dag chu bo bzhi las rab tu sgrol/_/mya ngan med pa'i bde
[\[179a.2\]]ba'i grong khyer ston/_/stegs dang zam pa du ma byas pa dang /_/chu klung lam la sgrol ba'i gru byin te/_/'dus byas sun phyung zhi ba bsngags byas pas/_/des na sgrol ba'i 'od zer grub par 'gyur[#]/_/skom pa sel ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des
[\[179a.3\]]bskul byas pa/_/'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs shing /_/chos la mos pa'i ro ni don du gnyer/_/'dod pa'i yon tan skom pa rab spangs te/_/chos mos ro la don du gnyer gyur pas/_/bdud rtsi [#]char pa 'bebs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'jig rten skom pa'i sred
[\[179a.4\]]pa rnam par sel[#]/_/rdzing dang khron pa chu klung chu rdo dang /_/mtsho rnams byang chub don du byed btsud de/_/'dod pa smad cing bsam gtan bsngags byas pas/_/des na skom pa sel ba grub par 'gyur/_/dga' bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag
[\[179a.5\]]'od [#]des bskul byas pa/_/dga' bas rgyas shing byang chub mchog don du/_/rab 'byung 'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/_/thugs rje ldan pa'i sku gzugs mtshan brgyan pa/_/pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa rnams byas shing /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas yon tan rnams brjod pa/_/des
[\[179a.6\]]na dga' byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur/_/mgu bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas la ni dga' mgu zhing /_/chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu'o/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas dga' mgu zhing /_/
[\[179a.7\]]chos la dga' mgu dge 'dun dga' mgu nas/_/sangs rgyas chos dang 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams dang /_/rtag tu 'grogs thob bzod pa bla med 'thob/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran chos dang tshogs mchog la/_/sems can mang po bskul zhing dran byas te/_/byang chub
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]sems kyi yon tan rab brjod pas/_/des na mgu byed 'od zer grub par 'gyur/_/bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub don gnyer zhing /_/sbyin pa sna tshogs du ma sbyin par byed/_/gtan pa
[\[179b.2\]]med pa'i mchod pa [#]de byed tshe/_/slong ba rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byed de/_/bsam pa thams cad sbyin pa byin byas pas/_/bsod nams bsags pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur/_/ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/
[\[179b.3\]]chos gcig sgo mo nas ni du ma yi/_/chos kyi sgo rnams yud kyis [#]khong du chud/_/chos kyi dbye ba sems can 'dzin btsud de/_/don la nges pa'i ye shes rnams [#]phye zhing /_/chos kyi tshig don brjod pa byas pas [#]na/_/des na ye shes ldan pa'i 'od zer 'grub/_/shes rab sgron ma'i 'od
[\[179b.4\]]zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/stong pa bdag med ma skyes ma byung zhing /_/rang bzhin med pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug_/bdag po med chos stong pa byed med pa/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing /_/rmi lam mtshungs la gzugs
[\[179b.5\]]brnyan 'dra ba dag_/ston [#]pas shes rab sgron ma de grub po/_/chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/mi zad mdzod kyi [#]gzungs ni thob gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mdzod kyang 'dzin/_/chos 'dzin rnams la
[\[179b.6\]]yongs su phan btags te/_/drang srong rnams la chos kyis bsrung byas shing /_/'gro ba chos kyi rjes su gzung byas pas/_/chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'od zer grub par 'gyur[#]/_/gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can 'jungs pa gang dag des bskul ba[#]/_/
[\[179b.7\]]longs spyod mi rtag mi [#]brtan shes gyur nas/_/de dag rtag tu gtong la dga' mos 'gyur/_/ma dul gdul dka'i sems can ser sna can/_/nor rnams rmi lam sprin dang 'drar [#]shes nas/_/dga' ba'i yid kyis sbyin pa spel byas pas/_/des na gtong dang ldan pa'i 'od grub
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]po/_/yongs su gdung med 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/khrims 'chal sems can gang dag des bskul ba/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag la gnas gyur nas/_/rang 'byung [#]'gyur bar bya zhes sems bskyed do/_/dge ba'i las lam yongs su dag pa
[\[180a.2\]]dang /_/tshul khrims la yang sems can mang 'dzud cing /_/byang chub sems kyang yang dag 'dzin bcug pas/_/yongs gdung med pa'i 'od zer de grub po/_/bzod pa bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/mi bzod sems can gang dag des bskul ba/_/khro dang tha ba nga
[\[180a.3\]]rgyal yongs spongs shing /_/de ni rtag tu bzod mos dga' bar 'gyur/_/sdig ldan rnams kyis nyes byas bzod byas te/_/byang chub don du 'khrug pa ma byas shing /_/bzod pa'i yon tan rtag tu bsngags brjod pas/_/des na bzod pa bkod pa de [#]grub po/_/brtun dang [#]ldan
[\[180a.4\]]pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/le lo'i sems can gang dag des bskul ba/_/rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/_/sbyor ba skyo [#]med mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/rigs par brtson pa dkon mchog gsum rnams la/_/sbyor ba skyo ba med pas mchod
[\[180a.5\]]byas nas/_/de dag bdud bzhi'i lam las rab 'das te/_/byang chub bla med myur du reg par 'gyur/_/sems can mang po brtson 'grus 'dzin bcug ste/_/dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa rab byas nas/_/zad pa'i dus na dam chos yongs bzung bas/_/des na brtun
[\[180a.6\]]par ldan pa'i 'od thob [#]po/_/zhi bar byed pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/rnam 'khrug [#]sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/_/de dag chags dang sdang dang [#]rmong med cing /_/rtogs par gyur nas mnyam gzhag sems su 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i grogs po skyon ldan spyod [#]can dang /_/
[\[180a.7\]]'dre ba yongs su rnam par spangs byas te/_/dgon par rab zhi bsam gtan rab brjod pas/_/des na zhi bar byed pa'i 'od grub bo/_/shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/shes 'chal sems can ji snyed des bskul ba/_/bden dang rten dang rnam thar tshul rnams dang /_/
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]dbang po shes pa rtogs par khong chud cing [#]/_/nyi ma'i sgron [#]ma'i ting 'dzin thob gyur nas/_/shes rab snang bar mdzad pa'i rgyal bar 'gyur/_/rgyal srid nor dang bdag phangs yongs btang ste/_/byang chub don du chos gang btsal byas pa/_/chos de gus par byas nas rab bshad
[\[180b.2\]]pas/_/shes rab bkod pa'i 'od zer de grub po/_/sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/sangs rgyas stong phrag du ma bsam yas rnams/_/pad+ma dam pa rnams la bzhugs par mthong /_/sangs rgyas che
[\[180b.3\]]dang sangs rgyas rnam thar dang /_/sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul mtha' yas brjod byas shing /_/sangs rgyas stobs dang rdzu 'phrul rab brjod pas/_/des na sangs rgyas ldan pa'i 'od grub po/_/mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/'jigs nyen [#]sems can gang
[\[180b.4\]]la des reg pa/_/'byung po gza' [#]dang gsad brdeg bcing ba dang /_/nad 'go 'jigs pa kun las thar bar 'gyur/_/mi 'jigs sbyin pas sems can bskyab pa [#]dang /_/srog chags gsod las bzlog par byas pa dang /_/'jigs pa skyabs tshol rnams la skyabs
[\[180b.5\]]byas pas/_/mi 'jigs sbyin pa'i 'od zer de grub po/_/bde ba kun byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/nad pa na ba gang dag des reg pa/_/rnam pa kun du nad kyi sdug bsngal thar/_/bsam gtan ting 'dzin bde ba rnams kyang 'thob/_/nad gsos 'bras bu sman dang rtsa ba
[\[180b.6\]]dang /_/rin chen bcud len spos dang byug pa dang /_/bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar dag dang /_/'bru mar zas skom byin pas [#]de thob po/_/sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/tshe zad tha mar gang dag des bskul ba/_/sangs rgyas rjes dran sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/_/
[\[180b.7\]]de dag shi 'phos sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'gro/_/'chi ba'i dus su sangs rgyas dran byas te/_/dga' byed rgyal ba'i sku gzugs bstan byas shing /_/'chi kar sangs rgyas skyabs su gtang [#]brjod pas/_/sangs rgyas ston pa'i 'od zer de thob po/_/chos rab brjod pa'i 'od zer rab
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/chos nyan klog cing yi ger 'dri bar byed/_/de dag rtag tu chos la dga' mos 'gyur/_/chos kyi mu ge byung tshe chos brjod de/_/chos tshol rnams kyi bsam pa rdzogs byas shing /_/'dun pa bskyed
[\[181a.2\]]de chos la brtson gyis zhes/_/brjod pas chos rab brjod pa de thob po/_/sangs rgyas sras rnams yongs su bskul ba'i phyir/_/dbyangs dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/'jig rten gsum na sgra rgyun ji snyed pa/_/kun kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung du thos/_/gsang
[\[181a.3\]]bstod sgra yis [#]drang srong che bstod de/_/rgyal ba'i gsung sgra don du sil snyan dang /_/sgra chen dril bu sbyin rnams 'gro kun la/_/rab tu bsngags pas dbyangs ldan 'od grub po/_/'chi med sbyin pa'i 'od zer rab gtong [#]zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/
[\[181a.4\]]bag med spyod pa thams cad rab spangs te/_/yon tan kun la brtson pa nyams su len/_/'dus byas rtag tu bde ba med pa ste/_/sdug bsngal 'tshe ba du mas yongs su gang /_/'gog pa rtag tu bde zhing zhi spyod ces/_/brjod pas 'chi med sbyin pa de thob po/_/khyad par ldan
[\[181a.5\]]pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi tshul khrims khyad par dang /_/ting 'dzin khyad par shes rab khyad par thob/_/thub chen rgyal po khrims kyi [#]mchog gyur cing /_/ting 'dzin mchog dang shes rab mchog gyur
[\[181a.6\]]ces/_/byang chub don du bstod cing bsngags brjod pas/_/des na khyad par ldan pa'i 'od grub po/_/rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des bskul byas pa/_/rin chen mi zad gter rnams thob gyur nas/_/drang srong che la rin chen dam pas
[\[181a.7\]]mchod/_/rgyal dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten rin chen phul/_/skye bo nyon mongs rin chen rnams kyis bsdus/_/rgyal ba rnams la rin chen rab phul bas/_/rin chen bkod pa'i 'od zer grub par gyur[#]/_/spos rab snang ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sems can gang dag 'od des
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bskul byas pas/_/mi la med spos yid 'ong tshor gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la nges par 'gyur/_/mi dang lha yi spos dang byug pa yis/_/mi yi gtso la mchod pa rab byas te/_/spos las rgyal ba'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag_/byas pas spos rab snang ba de
[\[181b.2\]]grub po/_/sna tshogs bkod pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog sna tshogs dang /_/sil snyan bsgrags shing spos kyi bdug pa yis/_/pho brang dam pa mdzes byas me tog bkram/_/sil snyan dag gis rgyal ba rnams bsu zhing /_/me tog
[\[181b.3\]]bdug pa bdug spos phye ma dang /_/rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs mchog rnams kyis mchod/_/des na sna tshogs bkod pa grub par gyur/_/shin tu dang byed 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sa rnams lag mthil bzhin du gnas par byed/_/mchod rten drang srong gnas rnams
[\[181b.4\]]sbyang byas pas/_/des na shin tu dang byed 'od grub po/_/sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/spos kyi char 'bebs sprin rnams kun du gnas/_/mchod rten 'khor sar spos kyi [#]chus btang pas/_/sprin dang ldan pa'i 'od de rab tu 'thob/_/lhab lhub bkod pa'i
[\[181b.5\]]'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/gcer bu gos gyon rgyan dang ldan par 'gyur/_/gos dang bgo ba rgyan phreng sna tshogs dag_/sbyin pa byas pas lhab lhub bkod pa grub/_/ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/bkres pa kha zas ro mchog thob par 'gyur/_/zas dang skom
[\[181b.6\]]dang ro mchog sna tshogs rnams/_/byin pas ro mchog ldan pa'i 'od grub po/_/nor rnams ston pa'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dbul po dag gis rin chen gter rnams 'thob/_/dkon mchog gsum la gter gzhi mi zad pa/_/dbul ba byas pas nor ston 'od thob po/_/
[\[181b.7\]]mig rnams [#]sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/de tshe long bas sna tshogs gzugs rnams mthong /_/rgyal ba dag dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/mar me phul bas mig sbyong 'od zer grub/_/rna ba rnam sbyong 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/rna ba nyams pas sgra mang thos par 'gyur/_/
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/sil snyan phul bas rna [#]sbyong 'od grub po/_/sna rnams [#]sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sngon chad ma tshor dri zhim tshor bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/spos rab phul bas sna sbyong 'od
[\[182a.2\]]zer grub/_/lce rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sgra snyan yid 'ong rnams kyis [#]sangs rgyas bstod/_/mi snyan bslang [#]bar smra ba rnams [#]spongs te/_/'jam par smras pas [#]lce sbyong 'od zer grub/_/lus rnams [#]sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dbang po nyams pa
[\[182a.3\]]dbang po ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba rnams dang rgyal ba'i mchod rten la/_/lus btud [#]byas pas lus rnams [#]sbyong ba thob/_/sems rnams [#]sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/smyos [#]pa thams cad sems dang ldan par 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin dbang rjes sems 'gro byas
[\[182a.4\]]pas na/_/sems rnams sbyong ba'i [#]'od zer de grub po/_/gzugs rnams [#]sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/mi dbang rnams kyi bsam yas sku mthong ste/_/sku gzugs ri mo sna tshogs mang po dang /_/mchod rten brgyan byas [#]gzugs sbyong 'od grub po/_/sgra rnams sbyong
[\[182a.5\]]ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/sgra ni sgra min stong par rab tu shes/_/rkyen las [#]byung bas brag ca 'dra'o zhes/_/sgra rnams bstan pas 'od zer de grub po/_/dri rnams [#]sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dri nga thams cad dri zhim mchog tu 'gyur/_/spos rab mchog chus
[\[182a.6\]]rgyal ba'i mchod rten dag_/khrus byas byang chub zhing gi 'od de yin/_/ro bro sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/dug can dug med ro'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas nyan thos bcas dang pha ma la/_/ro mchog thams cad phul ba'i 'od de yin/_/reg rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer
[\[182a.7\]]rab gtong zhing /_/reg na rtsub pa 'jam zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/mdung thung rtse gsum ral gri mda' chen char/_/phreng ba 'jam pa pad+ma ut+pal 'gyur/_/bcos bu'i ras mang 'jam zhing reg bde rnams/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi gshegs shul bting bkram ste/_/me tog byug pa na bza'
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]'jam rnams dang /_/phreng ba bla re phul ba'i 'od de yis/_/chos rnam sbyong ba'i 'od zer rab gtong zhing /_/'jig rten phan mdzad rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/spu rnams kun nas chos rnams bsam mi khyab/_/byung ba thos nas mos pa thams cad tshim/_/rkyen las byung bas ma
[\[182b.2\]]skyes ngo bo nyid/_/rgyal ba rnams kyi sku ni chos sku ste/_/chos nyid [#]nam mkha' bzhin du [#]gnas so zhes/_/brjod pas chos rnam [#]sbyong ba thob par 'gyur/_/'od zer sgo mo de dag la sogs pa/_/drang srong rnams kyi spu yi sgo gcig nas/_/'od zer gang ga'i [#]bye ma snyed 'byung ste/_/
[\[182b.3\]]kun la sbyor ba [#]tha dad tshul can no/_/ji ltar sku yi spu yi sgo gcig nas/_/'od zer gang gA'i bye ma snyed 'byung ba/_/ma lus spu rnams kun nas de bzhin te/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/yon tan gang gis [#]'od zer gang 'grub pa'i/_/yon tan de grogs sngon chad
[\[182b.4\]]gang gyur pa/_/de dag nyid las 'od zer rab 'byung ste/_/drang srong ye shes rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/de dag bsod nams sngon grogs gang yin la/_/rjes su yi rang gsol ba sus btab dang /_/gang gis mthong ste dge ba bsags gyur pa/_/de dag kun gyis [#]'od zer de dag
[\[182b.5\]]shes/_/gang dag bsod nams byas shing dge bsags dang /_/gang dag yang yang sangs rgyas rnams mchod cing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan 'dun te don gnyer ba/_/de dag kun la 'od zer de dag bskul/_/dper na dmus long nyi ma mi mthong yang /_/de med ma yin
[\[182b.6\]]'jig rten kun du 'char/_/mig dang ldan pas shar bar shes gyur nas/_/kun kyang rang rang so so'i las la 'jug_/de bzhin skyes [#]chen 'od zer de dag kun/_/rab tu byung yang log pas nyen gyur cing /_/mos nyams phal pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/_/blo gros yangs pa
[\[182b.7\]]rnams la de dag mod[#]/_/dper rgyan nor bu bzhon [#]pa gzhal med khang /_/bcud kyis len dang rin chen byug pa spos/_/de dag skye bo che la yod mod kyi/_/phongs par gyur pa rnams la de dag med/_/de bzhin skyes chen 'od zer de dag kun/_/de dag yod kyang log pas nyen gyur cing /_/mos
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]pa nyams pa rnams kyis mi mthong ste/_/blo gros yangs pa rnams la de dag mod/_/gang dag 'od zer dbye ba 'di thos nas/_/dad cing mos la dang ba skyes gyur nas/_/bdag ni yon tan che [#]rgyur mi 'gyur zhes/_/de dag dogs [#]dang som nyi mi bskyed do/_/de dag g.yog
[\[183a.2\]]'khor bkod pa rnam 'phrul pa/_/ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par grub byed cing /_/phyogs bcu kun du do zla med rnams kyi/_/zham ring sangs rgyas sras rnams ston par byed/_/'od bkod de dag pad+ma sna tshogs pa/_/stong gsum tshad tsam byin gyis brlab [#]byas nas/_/skyil krung bcas
[\[183a.3\]]pa'i lus kyis kun khyab ste/_/ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/_/de dag zhing bcu'i rdul snyed pad+ma gzhan/_/'khor dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab [#]byas shing /_/sangs rgyas sras kyis [#]thams cad yongs su bskor/_/de dag ting 'dzin ting 'dzin med par gnas/_/drang
[\[183a.4\]]srong de yis sems can gang dag rnams/_/yongs su smin byas sangs rgyas legs bsgrubs pas/_/de dag pad+ma chen po de bskor zhing /_/kun kyang thal mo sbyar nas lta zhing 'khod/_/gang dag ting 'dzin gnas par rab zhugs pa/_/skyes chen rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin te/_/rang
[\[183a.5\]]gi [#]slob mas kun kyang yongs bskor nas/_/skar ma'i tshogs kyis zla ba bskor ba bzhin/_/de dag ji ltar phyogs gcig [#]rab 'jug cing /_/zham 'bring [#]sangs rgyas sras rnams ston byed pa/_/de bzhin gshegs [#]rnams ma lus kun du ston/_/ting 'dzin rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra'o/_/
[\[183a.6\]]de dag phyogs kyi dra ba khyab gnas pa'i/_/ting 'dzin dam pa mngon par sgrub byed cing /_/kha cig mnyam gzhag kha cig ldan par [#]yang /_/phyogs rnams kun du rang gi lus ston to/_/de dag shar gyi phyogs su mnyam gzhag cing /_/nub kyi phyogs su [#]dpa' bo rnam par ldang /_/nub kyi
[\[183a.7\]]phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/bdag nyid chen po shar gyi phyogs nas ldang /_/de bzhin phyogs bcu rnams su rab tu 'jug_/gzhan gyi phyogs su mnyam par bzhag gyur la/_/ye shes yon tan phyug po gzhan nas ldang /_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra'o/_/
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]shar phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang [#]yin pa/_/grangs med ma lus dag na rang byung ba/_/de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/_/zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam [#]par snang /_/phyogs der mnyam par gzhag pa brtan byas nas/_/dpa' bo nub kyi zhing khams [#]ma lus par/_/rnam par
[\[183b.2\]]ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/_/mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang /_/nub phyogs sangs rgyas zhing rnams gang yin pa/_/grangs med ma lus dag na bzhugs [#]sangs rgyas/_/de dag spyan sngar zhabs drung de dag rnams/_/zhi ba'i [#]ting nge 'dzin la gnas par snang /_/phyogs der
[\[183b.3\]]mnyam par gzhag pa brtan byas nas/_/dpa' bo shar gyi zhing rnams ma lus par/_/rnam par ldang zhing mngon sum rgyal kun la/_/mchod pa du ma rab tu byed par snang /_/de bzhin phyogs bcu dag gi zhing rnams su/_/phyogs rnams ma lus kun du brtan la 'jug_/kha cig mnyam
[\[183b.4\]]gzhag kha cig langs gyur cing /_/'jig rten sgron ma rnams [#]mchod byed par [#]snang /_/de dag mig gi lam la mnyam gzhag cing /_/gzugs kyi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ston pa na/_/de la lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs par 'gyur/_/
[\[183b.5\]]gzugs kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur la/_/mi [#]ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/mig gi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag rna ba'i lam la mnyam gzhag cing [#]/_/sgra yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gang la lhar bcas
[\[183b.6\]]'jig rten rmongs gyur pa/_/sgra dang skad rnams lan [#]la rab tu zhugs/_/sgra yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/rna ba ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/rna ba'i lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag sna yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing /_/
[\[183b.7\]]dri yi lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa[#]/_/dri mchog dam pa 'jug par rab tu zhugs/_/dri yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/sna ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/sna yi lam nas dran ldan
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]rnam par ldang /_/de dag lce yi lam la mnyam gzhag cing /_/ro mchog kun gyi lam nas rnam par ldang /_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa/_/bdag nyid chen po ro mchog rnam par ldang [#]/_/ro mchog rnams la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/lce ni ma
[\[184a.2\]]skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/lce yi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag lus kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing /_/reg pa'i lam nas bdag nyid chen po ldang /_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa/_/'jig rten bde ba bskyed pa'i
[\[184a.3\]]reg la bzhugs/_/reg pa'i lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/lus ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/stong pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/lus kyi lam nas dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag sems kyi lam la mnyam gzhag cing /_/chos kyi lam nas bdag
[\[184a.4\]]nyid chen po ldang /_/gang du lhar bcas 'jig rten rmongs gyur pa/_/chos la gnas pa'i 'jug par [#]rab tu zhugs/_/chos kyi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/sems ni ma skyes ma byung rang bzhin te/_/ston pa byed pa med par rab ston cing /_/sems kyi lam nas
[\[184a.5\]]dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/de dag byis pa'i lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/lang tsho shugs la gnas pa rnams las ldang /_/lang tsho shugs gnas [#]rnams la mnyam gzhag cing /_/rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus las [#]rnam par ldang /_/rgas shing 'khogs pa'i lus la mnyam
[\[184a.6\]]gzhag cing /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen ma yi lus las ldang /_/dge bsnyen dad pa'i lus la [#]mnyam gzhag cing /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus las rnam par ldang /_/dad pa'i dge bsnyen lus la [#]mnyam gzhag cing /_/dge slong ma yi lus las rnam par ldang /_/dge slong ma yi lus
[\[184a.7\]]la mnyam gzhag cing /_/dge slong mang du thos pa'i lus las ldang /_/dge slong mang thos lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/slob dang mi slob lus las rnam par ldang /_/slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/rkyen gyis sangs rgyas lus las rnam par ldang /_/rkyen gyis sangs
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]rgyas lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par ldang /_/sangs rgyas sku mchog rab la mnyam gzhag cing /_/lha yi lus gzugs las ni rnam par ldang /_/lha yi lus gzugs la ni mnyam gzhag cing /_/rdzu 'phrul chen po klu yi lus las ldang /_/
[\[184b.2\]]rdzu 'phrul klu yi lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/rdzu 'phrul [#]gnod sbyin lus las rnam par [#]ldang /_/'phrul chen gnod sbyin lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/'byung po kun gyi [#]lus las rnam par ldang /_/'byung po kun gyi [#]lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/spu yi sgo gcig nas ni rnam
[\[184b.3\]]par ldang /_/spu sgo gcig la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/spu sgo thams cad las [#]ni rnam par ldang /_/spu sgo kun la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/skra rtse gcig gi khyon las rnam par ldang /_/skra rtse gcig gi khyon la mnyam gzhag cing /_/skra rtse kun gyi khyon las rnam par
[\[184b.4\]]ldang /_/skra rtse kun gyi khyon las [#]mnyam gzhag cing /_/phra rab rdul gyi rdul las de dag ldang /_/rdul gcig la ni mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/ma lus rdul rnams kun las rnam par ldang /_/rdul rnams ma lus kun la mnyam gzhag cing /_/rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi las rnam par
[\[184b.5\]]ldang /_/rgya mtsho rdo rje'i gzhi la mnyam gzhag cing /_/nor bu'i shing thog dag las rnam par ldang /_/shing thog dag [#]la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/rgyal ba rnams kyi 'od zer sgo nas ldang /_/rgyal ba'i 'od zer sgo la mnyam gzhag cing /_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi chu klung rnams las ldang /_/
[\[184b.6\]]rgya mtsho'i chu klung rnams la mnyam gzhag cing /_/bdag nyid chen po me yi lam las ldang /_/me yi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/rlung gi lam las dran ldan rnam par ldang /_/rlung gi lam la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/bdag nyid chen po sa yi gzhi las ldang /_/sa yi
[\[184b.7\]]gzhi la mnyam par bzhag gyur cing /_/lha kun gzhal med khang las rnam par ldang /_/lha kun gzhal med khang la mnyam gzhag cing /_/dran ldan de ni mkha' las rnam par ldang /_/yon tan mtha' yas bsags pa de dag gi_/ting 'dzin rnam thar de dag bsam mi khyab/_/rgyal ba
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]kun gyis bskal pa bsam yas su/_/bshad pa mdzad kyang zad par mdzad mi spyod/_/'gro las rnam smin bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/rgyal ba kun gyis de dag gsungs pa ni/_/lha klu'i [#]rnam 'phrul sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul dang /_/bsam byed bsam gtan rnam 'phrul
[\[185a.2\]]bsam mi khyab/_/de dag la yang dpes ston brjod par bya/_/de dag 'dra ba'i dpe lta cang med de/_/mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo dpe rnams kyis/_/bstan na myur du don rnams shes par 'gyur/_/rnam thar brgyad kyi dbang la gnas pa yi/_/nyan thos gcig tu gyur nas mang por
[\[185a.3\]]'gyur/_/mang por gyur nas phyir yang gcig 'gyur te/_/mkha' la bsam gtan 'cha' zhing 'bar bar byed/_/smad nas me 'bar stod nas chu yi rgyun/_/stod nas me 'bar smad nas chu yi rgyun/_/'gro dang 'greng dang nyal dang 'dug pa dang /_/lus 'phrul skad cig gcig la
[\[185a.4\]]bsam mi khyab/_/de ni snying rje che dang mi ldan zhing /_/byang chub mi tshol 'jig rten yal 'dor yang /_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/_/'jig rten phan 'dod ci phyir ston mi byed/_/nyi zla mkha' las rnam par rgyu 'dod cing /_/phyogs rnams kun gyi chu yi ngogs dag dang /_/
[\[185a.5\]]mtsho mtshe'u mtsho bran snod dang rin chen dang /_/rgya mtsho chu klung rnams dang [#]gzugs brnyan ston/_/de bzhin gzugs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/skyes bu dpa' bo phyogs bcu kun du ston/_/ting 'dzin rnam thar kun gyi tshul la mkhas/_/de la de bzhin gshegs pa [#]rang byung dpang /_/dang
[\[185a.6\]]ba'i mtsho la yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag_/de dag so so'i rang gi [#]gzugs brnyan mthong /_/ral gri mda' chen gzhu dang mda' rnams dang /_/go gyon bzhon dang theg par bcas su mthong /_/gang gi gzugs gang gnas gang cha byad gang /_/de dang de dag de ltar chu las mthong /_/'on kyang
[\[185a.7\]]chu la byams sdang rnam rtog med/_/drang srong ting 'dzin rnam 'phrul 'di 'dra yi[#]/_/rgya mtsho'i lha mo sgra ldan zhes bya ba/_/sems can rgya mtshor ji snyed skyes rnams kyi/_/skra [#]yi yan lag dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas te/_/rang gi skad kyis [#]'gro kun tshim par byed/_/sgra ldan chags
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]sdang gti mug ldan [#]de yang /_/skad rnams kun gyi [#]sgra yi tshul mkhas na/_/gzungs [#]dang chos kyi stobs la dbang thob rnams/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten ci phyir mgu mi byed/_/tam bu ra [#]yi chung ma dbyangs ldan nam/_/tshangs pa'i bu mo yid la byung ba de/_/bden dang dam bcas mi
[\[185b.2\]]tshe [#]dga' rnams kyi/_/sems dang yid dang kha yi sgor 'jug ste/_/dbyangs ldan chags bcas zhe sdang can de yang /_/brtul zhugs grub mthun dbyangs kyi yan lag gis/_/yid 'ong skad kyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/_/ye shes yon tan phyug [#]rnams cis mi byed/_/rig sngags
[\[185b.3\]]tshul mkhas sgyu ma'i mkhan po ni/_/sna tshogs gzugs mang mtha' yas ston pa [#]byed/_/nyin mtshan yud dang zla ba lo brgya dang /_/khyim bzang rgyas pa shin tu mdzes pa ston/_/'dod chags sdang ldan sgyu ma'i mkhan po yang /_/sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyis 'jig rten mgu byed na/_/
[\[185b.4\]]bsam gtan mngon shes rnam thar rab bslabs pa/_/spyod tshul mkhas rnams ci phyir mgu mi byed/_/lha dang lha min dbang po 'thab pa'i tshe/_/rgyal ldan lha yis lha min pham byas na/_/de dag 'jigs pas gdugs bcas bzhon bcas shing /_/theg bcas dmag bcas go
[\[185b.5\]]gyon bzhin du 'byer[#]/_/'dod chags sdang ldan lha dbang de dag kyang /_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul bsam yas ston byed na/_/dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul dbang gnas dpa' ba rnams/_/lus kyi rnam 'phrul ci phyir ston mi byed/_/rdo rje 'chang ba'i glang pos srung [#]bu/_/dbang po'i 'khor gyur rdzu
[\[185b.6\]]'phrul chen po de/_/mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum mngon sprul zhing /_/mgo rnams kun la'ang mche ba drug drug ste/_/mche ba de dag so so re re la'ang /_/rdzing bu chus [#]gang bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/rdzing bu re re'ang [#]pad+ma sna tshogs pa/_/rnam par bkod pa bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/pad+ma re [#]la'ang
[\[185b.7\]]lha yi bu mo dag_/sgyu rtsal kun shes bdun bdun sprul pa byed/_/de dag rtsed mo glu gar tshul la mkhas/_/sum cu rtsa gsum dbang po de dang rtse/_/glang po de yang lus ni bsgyur [#]byas te/_/lha rnams kun dang 'grogs shing bde [#]bar byed/_/spyod pa'i tshul dang longs spyod kun kyang mthun/_/glang po
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]mchog gi rnam 'phrul de ltar snang /_/glang po chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang /_/'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul rab tu ston byed na/_/shes rab thabs kyis stobs la sbyangs pa rnams/_/ting 'dzin brgya yi rnam 'phrul cis mi byed/_/sgra gcan ji ltar 'dod bzhin lus sprul
[\[186a.2\]]te/_/rdo rje'i gzhi la rkang pa 'jog byed cing /_/rgya mtsho lte bar phyin pa tsam du ston/_/ri rab rtse dang nyid kyi mgo yang snyoms/_/sgra gcan [#]chags sdang gti mug ldan de yang /_/'di 'dra'i rdzu 'phrul kun du [#]ston byed na/_/'jig rten sgron ma bdud rnams rab 'byam [#]pa/_/rdzu 'phrul
[\[186a.3\]]mtha' yas ci ste ston mi byed/_/brgya byin rnam 'phrul bsam yas pa la ltos/_/lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/lha min bye ba 'byer ba ji snyed pa/_/de snyed brgya byin rang gi lus las sprul/_/lha min dbang dang lha min phal kun gyis/_/brgya byin rang rang mdun du 'dug
[\[186a.4\]]par shes/_/de ni rdo rje 'chang bas gzung [#]ngo zhes/_/lha min dbang po kun kyang mgo myos gyur/_/'jigs par byed pa'i mig stong rab bstan te/_/rdo rje me lce 'bar ba thogs byed cing /_/lus la go bgos gzi brjid bsnyen dka' ba'i/_/brgya byin mthong nas lha min dbang po 'byer/_/
[\[186a.5\]]de yang bsod nams phal pa'i mthu stobs kyis[#]/_/lha rgyal don du rnam par 'phrul byed na/_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi skyabs gyur pa/_/bsod nams mi zad rnams lta cis mi 'phrul/_/lha la skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/_/lha las rnam par smin pas grub gyur pa[#]/_/lha rnams
[\[186a.6\]]bag med gnas par shes gyur nas/_/rnga de nam mkha' las ni sgra sgrogs te/_/'dod pa thams cad mi rtag ther zug min/_/tha shal mi brtan dbu ba'i ngo bo nyid/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla mtshungs 'dra zhing [#]/_/srid pa thams cad rmi lam sprin dang mtshungs/_/bag med thams cad dgra
[\[186a.7\]]bcas mya ngan can/_/'chi ba'i lam yin mi 'chi'i lam ma yin/_/ji snyed su dag bag med gnas gyur pa/_/de dag 'chi bdag chu srin chen pos zin/_/sdug bsngal rtsa ba yongs 'dzin thams cad yin/_/skye ba thams cad 'phags pa rnams kyis [#]smad/_/'dod pa'i yon tan
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]rnams kyi yul la rmongs/_/chos kyi stobs la rtag dga' gyis zhes bskul/_/rnga des bskul nas brgya byin lha rnams dang /_/lha yi 'dun [#]sa chos bzangs [#]'dug nas su/_/gtam gang zhi zhing 'dod chags bral mthun pa/_/chos kyi gtam de lha rnams kun la brjod/_/rnga de
[\[186b.2\]]gzugs med bstan du mi rung yang /_/de ltar rnga sgras don chen rab byed na/_/bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs ni yongs ston rnams/_/'gro ba kun gyi don chen cis [#]mi byed/_/lha dang lha min dbang po g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/lha yi bsod nams khyad par [#]mthu stobs kyis/_/lha la
[\[186b.3\]]skul ma 'debs pa'i lha yi rnga/_/lha rnams ma 'jigs shig ces sgra 'byin te/_/rnga yis bskul nas lha rnams rab dga' zhing /_/skrag pa med de stobs kyang skyes par gyur[#]/_/lha min dbang po skrag pas nyen pa rnams/_/'jigs nas dmag bcas de yi mod la [#]'byer/_/
[\[186b.4\]]de ltar rnga [#]skad 'byin pa'i rnga 'dra ba/_/'gro ba kun gyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen po/_/nyon mongs bdud bcom snying rje che ldan rnams/_/zhi ba'i sgra bsgrags nyon mongs sel bar byed/_/dbang po lha yi bu mo dgu bcu gnyis/_/dbang po'i sprul pas kun kyang dga' bar
[\[186b.5\]]'gyur/_/gcig kyang bdag dang brgya byin rtse bar shes/_/gcig ltar lha mo kun kyang de bzhin no/_/lha mo kun dang dga' bar gnas snang zhing /_/chos bzangs 'dun [#]sa na yang de bzhin 'dug_/lha rnams kun la chos rab ston snang zhing /_/brgya byin skad cig gcig la rnam
[\[186b.6\]]par 'phrul/_/brgya byin chags sdang gti mug ldan pa yang /_/sprul pas rang gi 'khor rnams dga' byed na/_/'gro don mi skyo sbyor rnams ci yi phyir/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'jig rten mgu mi byed/_/bdud kyis [#]dkrugs ma 'gro ba'i dbang sgyur ba/_/de yi dbang du sems
[\[186b.7\]]can 'di kun 'dong /_/las dang nyon mongs kun du zhugs pa yis/_/so so'i skye bo thams cad bdud des bcings[#]/_/chags sdang gti mug ldan pa'i bdud de yang /_/'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur byed na/_/dbang bcu dbang thob rnams la ci rob ste/_/'gro ba thams cad rang gi
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]phyogs ma bzhag[ #]/stong gsum gnas kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang /_/stong gsum tshangs gnas ji snyed yod pa na/_/de dag kun na 'dug par rab snang zhing /_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs shin tu yid 'ong sgrogs/_/tshangs de 'jig rten pa yi tshangs lam gyi/_/bsam
[\[187a.2\]]gtan mngon shes rnam par 'phrul byed na/_/'jig rten rab 'das bla na med pa yi[#]/_/bsam gtan rnam thar gnas pa cis mi 'phrul/_/dbang phyug chen po'i shes pa'i rnam 'phrul ltos/_/rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis char thigs rab bkye ba/_/skad cig gcig la thams cad bgrang bar [#]byed/_/
[\[187a.3\]]thigs 'ga'i zer kyang ma shes de med na/_/bslabs [#]pa bskal pa bsam yas rab bslabs te/_/byang chub bla med ye shes thob pa rnams/_/ci phyir skad cig gcig la [#]sems kyis ni/_/'gro ba ma lus kun gyi [#]sems mi shes/_/sems can las smin bsam gyis [#]mi khyab pas/_/
[\[187a.4\]]'jig rten 'di kun rlung las yongs su byung /_/rgya mtsho ri dang lha yi gzhal med khang /_/rin chen rnam phyes [#]sa bon bkram pa'ang byung /_/rlung las byung gyur sprin gyis [#]char 'bebs shing /_/slar yang rlung nyid kyis ni sprin zhi byed/_/'jig rten gyi [#]ni lo tog rlung gis bskyed/_/'gro ba kun gyi
[\[187a.5\]]bde mang rlung gis byas/_/rlung des pha rol phyin lam bslabs shing /_/sangs rgyas yon tan rnams la ma bslabs [#]par/_/'jig rten rnam smin bsam mi khyab ston na/_/mchog thob pa dag ci ste ston mi byed/_/ces bya ba'o/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las dkon mchog gsum rjes su dran
[\[187a.6\]]pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//_//bsod nams 'phel ba'i don du rgyu gzhan yang bya ste/_gang zhig dus rnams kun du sems can don bya ba 'di yin no/_/'di ni dkon mchog sprin las/_de [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
[\[187a.7\]]la me tog gam bdug pa'am spos gsol na/_sems can thams cad kyi ngang tshul ngan pa'i dri nga ba bsal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri bro bar [#]yongs su bsngo'o/_/de phyag dar dang zhal zhal byed na sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam mi sdug pa med par 'gyur ba dang spyod
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]lam mdzes pa phun sum tshogs par yongs su bsngo'o/_/de me tog gi gdugs gsol na sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba med par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o/_/de gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'gro na 'di ltar sems can thams cad mya
[\[187b.2\]]ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du gzud do snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de phyir 'byung na 'di ltar [#]sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i btson ra nas gdon to snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de gnas khang gi sgo 'byed na 'di ltar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes kyi bde 'gro thams cad kyi sgo
[\[187b.3\]]dbye'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de sgo gcod na 'di ltar ngan 'gro thams cad kyi sgo rnams bcad do snyam [#]du sems bskyed do/_/de 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad byang chub kyi snying po la 'god do snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de glo g.yas pas nyal na 'di ltar sems can
[\[187b.4\]]thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de de nas ldang na 'di ltar sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba rnams las bslang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de lus kyi ched la 'gro na 'di ltar sems can
[\[187b.5\]]thams cad skyes bu chen po'i 'gros su 'gro bar gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de de ltar 'dug na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi zug rngu 'byung ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de bkru bshal byed na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi
[\[187b.6\]]nyon mongs pa'i dri ma'i skyon rnams bkru'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de lag pa bsnyal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba rnams bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de rkang pa 'khru na 'di ltar [#]sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rdul rnam pa sna
[\[187b.7\]]tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de gdong 'khru na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo yongs su sbyang ngo snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de so shing za na 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi dri ma rnam pa sna tshogs bsal lo snyam du sems bskyed do/_/de
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]lus kyi g.yo ba thams cad sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar yongs su bsngo'o/_/de [#]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la phyag 'tshal na 'di ltar sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis [#]phyag bya bar shog cig snyam du sems
[\[188a.2\]]bskyed do zhes ji skad gsungs [#]pa lta bu'o/_/yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gcan gzan khro bo'i dgon par song na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya [#]skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o/_/
[\[188a.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar des sems can thams cad kyi don du thams cad yongs su gzung [#]ba'i phyir te/_des 'di snyam du gal te gcan gzan dag gis [#]bdag zos na 'di ltar sbyin pa de byin par gyur cig_/bdag gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_
[\[188a.4\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na dud 'gro'i skye [#]gnas su song ba'i sems can yong ye med par 'gyur ba
[\[188a.5\]]de ltar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/_/shA ri'i bu rkun po'i dgon par song na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [#]de dag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su
[\[188a.6\]]gtong ba la mkhas pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus kyang yongs su btang ba yin/_yo byad dang 'tshog [#]chas kyang yongs su btang ba yin/_des 'di snyam du gal te sems can de dag gis [#]bdag gi yo byad dang 'tshog [#]chas rnams phrogs na de dag la
[\[188a.7\]]sbyin pa de byin [#]par gyur cig_/gal te de dag gis bdag gi srog bcad [#]par gyur kyang de la bdag gis [#]zhe sdang dang khong khro bskyed par mi bya/_bdag gis [#]de dag la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang nyes par [#]mi bya'o/_/de ltar na de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing /_bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la shin tu nye bar 'gyur te/_ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa 'di [#]dang
[\[188b.2\]]gzhan yang yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung zhing med par 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o/_/de ltar bsgrub po [#]snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu chu'i dgon par phyin na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dang bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i
[\[188b.3\]]phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mi 'jigs pa'i chos can yin te/_des 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi sred pa thams cad gcod par bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos skrag [#]par mi bya'o/_/gal
[\[188b.4\]]te bdag skom pas 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par bya ste/_kye ma 'di ltar 'jig rten na chu'i dgon pa 'di lta bu snang bas sems can 'di dag ni bsod nams chung ba dag ste/_ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[188b.5\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na chu'i dgon pa yong ye rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang mi snang bar 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o de ltar bsgrub po/_/ji ltar yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu rnyed par 'gyur ba de ltar bsod nams kyi las la sems can
[\[188b.6\]]rnams sbyar bar bya'o/_/ji ltar de'i tshe brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus brtan pa brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bkres pa'i dgon par song na/_byang chub
[\[188b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jigs par mi bya skrag par mi bya dngang bar mi bya'o/_/des 'di ltar 'dis go cha bgo ste/_ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bkres pa'i dgon
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]pa 'di lta bu yong ye rnam pa thams cad du [#]mi 'byung ba dang /_mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur zhing bde ba la dbang ba dang /_bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan po brtsam par bya ste/_de ltar rang gi [# ]
[\[189a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/ji [#]ltar na sems can de dag gang ci sems par 'gyur ba dang yid kyis gang dang gang 'dod pa de dang de 'byung bar 'gyur ba[#]/_'di lta ste dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi yid la bsam [#]pa thams cad 'grub pa dang /_yid
[\[189a.3\]]la bsam pa thams cad 'byung ba bzhin du de ltar bya'o/_/ji ltar sems can de dag chos dang ldan pa'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can thams cad thams cad du thams cad las 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar brtson 'grus brtan
[\[189a.4\]]po brtsam par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o zhes bya'o[#]/_/de ltar dus rnams rtag [#]tu sems can gyi don bya ba 'di ni bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu ste/_zhib tu ni [#]spyod yul yongs su dag pa'i mdo las blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang /_chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med/_/bsod
[\[189a.5\]]nams 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur te/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul [#]ba'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste/_byams pa gang zhig thob pa dang bkur sti mi 'dod par chos kyi sbyin pa byin na/_chos kyi sbyin pa zang zing med pa'i phan yon nyi shu ste/_nyi shu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_
[\[189a.6\]]dran pa dang ldan pa yin/_blo dang ldan pa yin/_blo gros dang ldan pa yin/_mos pa dang ldan pa yin/_shes rab dang ldan pa yin/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rjes su rtogs [#]par 'gyur pa yin/_'dod chags chung ba yin/_zhe sdang chung ba yin/_gti mug chung ba yin/_bdud kyis
[\[189a.7\]]de la glags mi rnyed pa yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin/_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis de srung [#]ba yin/_lha rnams de'i lus la mdangs 'jug pa yin/_mi mdza' [#]ba rnams kyis de la glags mi rnyed pa yin/_de mdza' bo rnams dang mi phyed pa yin/_tshig
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]gzung bar 'os pa yin/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa yin/_yid bde ba mang ba yin/_mkhas pas bsngags pa yin/_de chos kyi sbyin pa de rjes su dran par 'gyur ba yin te/_byams pa phan yon nyi shu po de dag go zhes bya ba'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang gsungs te/_gal
[\[189b.2\]]te kun dga' bo khyod kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag rnams la nyan thos kyi sa'i chos bstan la/_chos bstan pa des kyang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas par gyur kyang /_da dung nyan thos
[\[189b.3\]]khyod kyis nga la nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig gcig cig [#]bstan nam bshad na/_de ltar na nyan thos kyis nga mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[189b.4\]]chos bstan pa snga mas gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag [#]thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur [#]la/_dgra bcom pa de dag gi [#]sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i
[\[189b.5\]]dngos po dang /_bsgoms [#]pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de la kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems/_bsod nams kyi phung po mang ba yin nam/_gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[189b.6\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de lta bas kyang su zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/_nyan thos kyi theg [#]pa'i gang zag de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed de/_/kun [#]dga' bo de bas kyang gang su zhig
[\[189b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos tha na nyi ma gcig ston na de bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed do/_/kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog la tha na snga dro'am/_kun dga' bo snga dro lta zhog la tha na chu tshod gcig nas
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]skad cig gcig ces bya'o[#]/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_kun dga' bo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i chos sbyin pa ste/_nyan thos kyi theg pa thams cad dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis
[\[190a.2\]]mnan pa'o/_/kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di lta bu sems pa la ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med de/_gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[190a.3\]]chub las phyir ldog pa de ni gnas med do zhes bya ba'o[#]/_/chos kyi sbyin pa ji ltar sbyin par bya zhe na/_'phags pa dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las gsungs pa/_mkhas pa dus su sems par byed pa na/_/khang bur zhugs te de bzhin sgo bcad nas/_/chos 'di thams cad la ni
[\[190a.4\]]tshul bzhin blta/_/langs nas zhum pa med pa'i sems kyis shod/_/mkhas pa bde la rtag tu gnas par 'gyur/_/bde la 'dug nas de bzhin chos kyang ston/_/gtsang zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su/_/yangs pa'i stan [#]ni rab tu bshams bting ste/_/bzang po'i tshon
[\[190a.5\]]gyis legs par kha bsgyur ba/_/chos gos gtsang ma de ni rab bgos nas/_/rdul gzan nag po de bzhin bshams byas la/_/sham thabs che tshad legs par rab bgos nas/_/bcos bu'i ras rnams sna tshogs legs bting ba/_/rkang rten bcas pa'i khri la rab 'dug cing /_/
[\[190a.6\]]rkang pa legs par bkrus te steng 'dzegs nas/_/gdong dang bzhin gyi mdangs ni rab snum zhing /_/chos kyi stan de la ni rab 'dug nas/_/sems can lhags [#]pa rtse gcig gyur rnams la/_/gtam mang sna tshogs mang po smra ba dang /_/dge slong dag dang dge slong ma rnams dang /_/dge
[\[190a.7\]]bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma dag dang /_/rgyal po dag dang rgyal bu rnams la yang /_/mkhas de rtag [#]tu phrag dog med par ni/_/sna tshogs don ldan snyan pa'i gtam yang ston/_/le lo dag kyang rnam par rab spangs nas/_/skyo ba yi ni 'du shes bskyed mi bya/_/mkhas pas mi dga' thams
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]cad rnam par spang /_/byams pa'i stobs ni 'khor la bsgom [#]par bya/_/nyin mtshan du yang chos mchog rab tu bsgom[#]/_/mkhas pa de ni bye ba khrag khrig dpes/_/'khor rnams mgu zhing de bzhin dga' bar byed/_/de la nam yang 'dod pa chung zad med/_/zas dang skom dang bza' dang bca'
[\[190b.2\]]ba dang /_/gos dang mal cha chos gos rnams dang ni/_/na ba'i gsos sman dag kyang mi bsam ste/_/'khor rnams la ni ci yang mi bslang ngo /_/gzhan du mkhas pa rtag tu bdag nyid dang /_/sems can 'di dag sangs rgyas 'grub [#]par shog_/phan phyir 'jig rten chos gang bstan pa de/_/
[\[190b.3\]]bdag gi bde ba'i yo byad kun snyam sems/_/zhes bya'o/_/yang de nyid las/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu ston pa na/_chos kyi dga' ba snyoms [#]pa byed de tha na 'ga' tsam la yang chos kyi dga' bas lhag par phan 'dogs par mi byed do zhes gsungs so/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las kyang /_
[\[190b.4\]]chos kyi sbyin pa'i ched kyi phyir/_/gal te khyod la gsol 'debs na/_/rab rgyas dag gis ma brlabs [#]zhes/_/thog mar tshig de brjod par bya/_/khyod ni shes shing mkhas yin na/_/bdag nyid chen po'i mdun du ni/_/bdag gis [#]ji ltar bshad nus zhes/_/khyod kyis de skad brjod par bya/_/
[\[190b.5\]]'phral du brjod par mi bya yi/_/snod la brtag pa byas nas bya/_/gal te snod ni shes gyur na/_/gsol ma btab kyang bshad par bya/_/'khor ni mang po 'khor [#]nang du/_/gal te ngang tshul ngan mthong na/_/khyod kyi yo byad bsnyungs mi bshad/_/sbyin pa'i bsngags pa brjod par bya/_/gal te
[\[190b.6\]]'dod pa chung gyur te/_/tshul khrims dag par gnas yin na/_/khyod kyis [#]byams pa'i sems bskyed la/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam gyis shig_/gal te sdig 'dod nyung [#]gyur cing /_/tshul khrims ldan pa mang gyur la/_/gnyen po rnyed pa de yi tshe/_/tshul khrims bsngags pa [#]brjod par
[\[190b.7\]]bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las kyang /_'di lta ste/_sha me sha ma ba ti[#]/_sha mi ta sha tru [#]aM ku re/_maM ku re/_mA ra dzi te/_ka ro ti/_ke yU re/_U [#]ko hA ya ti/_bi sha tha ni rma le/_ma lA pa na [#]ya/_u kha re/_kha ro gra se/_gra sa ne[#]/_he mU [#]khI/_pa rA
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]#]mu khI/_A mA [#]khI/_sha mi tA ni[#]/_sarba gra ha ban+d+ha nA ni/_ni gr-i hI twa[#]/_sarba pa ra pra bA [#]di na pi mu k+tA mA ra pra [#]shA s+thA pi [#]tA/_bud+d+ha mu drA[#]/_sa mu d+g+ha ti tA sarba mA ra[#]/_a tsa li ta pa da pa ri shud+d+he[#]/_bi ga ts+tshan+tu[#]/_sarba mA[#] karma Ni/_blo gros rgya mtsho sngags kyi tshig 'di dag ni
[\[191a.2\]]bdud tshar gcad [#]pa'i tshig nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i tshig ste/_de dag chos smra ba des legs par kha ton du byas la chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/_byang chub kyi rnam pas [#]mngon par sgrub pa'i byams pas 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/_bdag la sman pa'i 'du shes bskyed de/_
[\[191a.3\]]chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang /_chos nyan pa la nad pa'i 'du shes dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang /_chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/_sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/_de [#]chos kyi gtam byed na/_de'i
[\[191a.4\]]khor [#]yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mtho btsam [#]par bya ba'i phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 'ong ba de dag gis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las gsungs pa[#]/_chos smra bas gtsang sbra dang /_kun du spyod pa gzob
[\[191a.5\]]pa dang /_legs par bkrus pa dang /_legs par gos bgo bar bya'o zhes so/_/de ltar chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_/byang chub sems ni mdor bsdu na/_/bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu yin no/_/dkon mchog za ma tog gi mdo las ji skad du 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na spos
[\[191a.6\]]kyi shing ljon pa sna tshogs ni khams bzhis bzung nas rnam par 'phel lo/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du tshogs sna tshogs bsags pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub kyi sems kyis [#]bzung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos na rnam par 'phel lo zhes
[\[191a.7\]]gsungs pa bzhin no/_/phyogs 'di ni las dang po pa rnams 'phral du byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dran par bya ba'i phyir bstan te/_rgya cher ni sangs rgyas kyi yul nyid yin no/_/'dir/_bslab pa ji ltar [#]brjod pa 'di'i/_/'grub pa yang dag spong rnams te/_/bag yod pa dang ma bral zhing /_/
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang /_/tshul bzhin du ni sems pas so/_/de la sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do 'bad do brtson 'grus rtsom [#]mo sems rab tu 'dzin to yang dag par rab tu 'jog go zhes bya ba 'dis ni bsrung ba'o/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i
[\[191b.2\]]chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed ces bya ba 'dis ni dag pa'o/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed [#]pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed pa dang /_skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir zhes bya ba 'dis ni 'phel ba bstan to/_/de dag kyang rtag tu bag yod pa dang
[\[191b.3\]]ma bral bar bya ste/_de ni dge ba thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las ji skad du/_tshul khrims thos dang gtong dang de bzhin bzod/_/dge ba'i chos su brjod pa ji snyed pa/_/kun gyi [#]rtsa ba bag yod 'di yin te/_/gter 'thob byed ces bde bar gshegs pas
[\[191b.4\]]bstan/_/zhes gsungs pa bzhin no/_/bag yod pa zhes bya ba 'di ji lta bu [#]zhe na/_'dod pa las nyams pa dang mi 'dod pa byung bar [#]dogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzob pa lhur len pa ste/_'di lta ste/_dper na rgyal po drag po [#]khro zhing mgu dka' ba'i bran sman gyi 'bru mar gyis [#]gang ba'i
[\[191b.5\]]snod thogs te/_stegs 'drod pa la 'gro bas bya ba bzhin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i mdo las gsungs te/_de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/_gang 'di dbang po sdom [#]pa'o/_/de mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin
[\[191b.6\]]pa nas/_yid kyis [#]chos rnams rnam par shes na mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin te/_chos rnams kyi ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang 'byung ba [#]yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa ste/_'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang bag yod
[\[191b.7\]]pa ni gang rang gi sems 'dul ba dang /_gzhan gyi sems rjes su srung ba dang /_nyon mongs pa la dga' ba sel ba dang /_chos la dga' ba'i rjes su 'jug pa la sogs pa 'di ni bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang ldan zhing bag yod pa dang ldan pa des ni
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]brtson 'grus gang gis bag yod par byed pa dang dad [#]par byed pa'i chos de dag yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pa des ni/_dran pa dang
[\[192a.2\]]shes bzhin gang gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi [#]chos rnams chud za bar mi 'gyur ba'i dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan par bya'o/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po su dad pa dang bag yod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa des tshul bzhin du sbyor [#]ba la brtson par bya'o/_/
[\[192a.3\]]gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gang [#]yod pa de yang yod par rab tu shes so/_/gang med pa de yang med par rab tu shes zhes bya ba nas/_kun rdzob tu mig la sogs pa yod do zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/de bzhin du de nyid las/_sems
[\[192a.4\]]can don brtson byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/tshul bzhin nyid kyis [#]dben sems gang yin dang /_/rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te/_/yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang smras pa/_bdag gzhan mnyam nyid goms byas pas/_/
[\[192a.5\]]byang chub sems ni brtan par 'gyur/_/bdag dang gzhan nyid ltos [#]pa ste/_/pha rol tshu rol ji bzhin brdzun/_/dogs de rang gis [#]pha rol min/_/gang la ltos [#]te tshu rol 'gyur/_/bdag nyid rang gis mi grub na/_/gang la ltos [#]te gzhan du 'gyur/_/gal te de la sdug
[\[192a.6\]]bsngal bas/_/bdag la mi gnod phyir mi srung /_/ma 'ongs sdug bsngal khyod la ni/_/gnod mi byed pas ci ste srung /_/de tshe'ang bdag nyid yin snyam pa'i/_/rnam rtog de ni log pa ste/_/gang phyir 'chi ba gzhan nyid la/_/der skye ba yang gzhan nyid yin/_/gal te gzhan
[\[192a.7\]]zhig der [#]skyes na/_/bsod nams kyis ni ci zhig dgos/_/ci phyir gzhon tshe lus rgas pa/_/bde bar bya phyir nor stsogs [#]byed/_/mngal na gnas pa zhig pa las/_/byis par gyur pa gzhan yin la/_/byis pa zhig nas gzhon nu nyid/_/de zhig nas ni dar la bab/_/de zhig nas
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]ni rgas gyur te/_/lus ni ji ltar gcig par 'dod/_/de ltar skad cig so so bas/_/lus gzhan sen mo skra tshogs [#]bzhin/_/ci ste byis pa'i tshang [#]bor nas/_/byis pa gzhon nu nyid gyur na/_/gang zhig gnas skabs bral gnas pa/_/lus kyi rang bzhin brjod par gyis/_/
[\[192b.2\]]lus ni sku gzugs 'dra zhe na/_/mar me thal ba la de med/_/gal te rags [#]spangs phra dngos su/_/de la rnam par gnas she na/_/rang nyid bstan pa tsam 'gyur bas/_/de ni lus zhes brjod mi bya/_/de la bdag ni bsam pa med/_/snang ba'i lus ni 'jig dang ldan/_/
[\[192b.3\]]gnas skabs rnams dang 'brel [#]gyur pa/_/kun rdzob nyid du snang ba yin/_/lung gis kyang ni de yod na/_/rigs pa dang ni lung gis bzlog_/'di ltar yon tan ma gtogs par/_/gtso bo yod pa ma yin la/_/gtso bo gsum yang yod ma yin/_/de bzhin yon tan yod na
[\[192b.4\]]yang /_/de ni [#]so so rnam gsum bdag_/'gro ba lhag ma rnam pa dgur[#]/_/sems pa med pa gos la sogs/_/de bde'i bdag nyid ji lta bu/_/snam stsogs las skyes bde sogs min/_/snam stsogs [#]las ni bde sogs yin/_/snam bu la sogs rgyu med phyir/_/med na de
[\[192b.5\]]bde ga la yod/_/de ltar lung dang rigs pa yis/_/'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa/_/de yi [#]rgyu 'bras 'brel ba ni/_/mngon sum yin pas mi gnod do/_/de ni rang gi [#]rgyud las mthong /_/rtag [#]pa la ni ji lta bur/_/phra rab rdul yang gcig min te/_/phyogs kyi dbye ba [# ]
[\[192b.6\]]mi 'thad phyir/_/mar me'i 'bru mar zad 'gyur ba/_/zad 'gyur tshe na mngon pa med/_/de ltar dngos po zad par yang /_/skad cig re re mi mngon no/_/rgyud [#]dang tshogs zhes bya ba yang /_/phreng ba dmag la sogs [#]bzhin brdzun/_/de la goms pas ngar 'dzin na/_/gzhan
[\[192b.7\]]la ci phyir skye mi 'gyur/_/de phyir skye mched tshogs bzhin du/_/'gro ba gcig tu shes par bya/_/ma byung nyid nas sdug bsngal de/_/gzhan gyi bdag las phyir bzlog bya/_/de yang mi rigs 'gyur zhe na/_/gzhan la'ang rang gi bdag nyid med/_/bdag gzhan mi
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]rigs gang yin de/_/ci rigs par ni bzlog bya yin/_/snying rjes [#]sdug bsngal mang gyur pas/_/ci phyir nan gyis skyed ce na/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal brtag byas na/_/ji ltar snying rje sdug bsngal mang /_/de ltar rgyud ni goms gyur pa/_/gzhan gyi
[\[193a.2\]]sdug bsngal zhi dga' bas/_/pad+ma'i nags su ngang pa ltar/_/mnar med par yang 'jug par 'gyur/_/sems can rnam par grol ba na/_/dga' ba'i rgya mtsho gang yin pa/_/de nyid kyis ni chog min nam/_/ro med thar pas ci zhig bya/_/de ltar gzhan gyi [#]don byas
[\[193a.3\]]pas/_/rlom sems dang ni ngo mtshar med/_/gcig tu gzhan don la dga' bas/_/rnam smin 'bras bu re ba med/_/phyogs bcu'i sems can phun tshogs de'i/_/bdag gi yin par gdon mi za/_/gzhan bde bdag gir 'du shes pas/_/bdag la phrag dog go skabs
[\[193a.4\]]med/_/sdig pa bshags [#]par bya ba dang /_/bsod nams rjes su yi rang dang /_/sangs rgyas bskul dang gsol gdab pa/_/gzhan dang bdag gi phyir byed do/_/yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin te/_/bye brag med par rab tu 'jug_/de ltar sems can khams bzhin du/_/
[\[193a.5\]]bsod nams mtha' yas rab tu 'byung /_/lam 'di dam pa mchog yin te/_/bde ba mtha' yas dus ston bzang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i ded dpon ches/_/gang zhig dga' ba 'phel ba yin/_/lag na rdo rje bsel [#]mchog rnams/_/bdud kyi gcan pa skrag byed cing /_/
[\[193a.6\]]sangs rgyas phyag brnyan rnams kyis kyang /_/rtag tu yongs su bsrung ba yin/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i [#]sras/_/byang chub sems kyi shing rtar zhugs/_/lha la sogs pas stod byed cing /_/lam de nas ni 'gro bar byed/_/de ltar sems can rnams la bdag_/_
[\[193a.7\]]goms byas tshul gyis sgro btags [#]te/_/bdag gzhan sdug bsngal zhi bya'i phyir/_/bdag la sogs pa rnam kun gtang [#]/_/gang zhig sred pas yongs zin pa/_/de yi sdug bsngal zhir mi 'gyur/_/'gyur bas rnam par chud zos nas/_/de ni 'di ltar sdug bsngal skyed[#]/_/
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]'jig rten sdug bsngal mes gdungs na/_/rang gi bde la dgar ci yod/_/kun nas tshig par gyur pa yi/_/lus la'ang bde ba ci zhig yod/_/bdag la chags par byed pa ni/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi rtsa ba mchog_/de ltar [#]sems can thams cad la/_/bdag nor gtang [#]zhing de
[\[193b.2\]]gzhom mo/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung bsam pa yis/_/bdag la ma chags dran byas te/_/'bad pa kun gyis de'i pho nya/_/dam pa shes khe 'dod pham [#]bya/_/gang gis 'jigs pas de mi gtong /_/de ma byin na 'jigs [#]pa yin/_/'di ltar bdag gi lus dang sems/_/
[\[193b.3\]]skad cig re res 'gro ba nyid/_/gal te mi rtag dri 'bab pa'i/_/lus kyis rtag cing dri med pa'i[#]/_/byang chub thob par 'gyur na ni/_/de ni rin med rnyed min nas[#]/_/rtsi sman gzugs dang 'dra bar ni/_/'jig rten chos la mi sems pas/_/da [#]ltar bdag kyang gtang byos
[\[193b.4\]]la/_/sems can kun gyi don du spyod/_/sems can kun phyir blon por ni/_/rang gi shes rab bkol bar bya/_/rigs pas nor de [#]bsrung byas te/_/sems can rnams la mkho bar spyad/_/bdag gi lus dang gzhan lus la/_/sdug bsngal mang sel sdug bsngal gang /_/
[\[193b.5\]]de bya bde ba'ang [#]de bzhin te/_/bde ba mang byed bskyed par bya/_/sems can longs spyod gegs byed phyir/_/bsgribs [#]te nyon mongs sbyangs [#]byas te/_/'jig rten 'tsho ba'i 'bab stegs nas/_/sprul gyi ro bsal bzhin du bya/_/bsod nams zhing 'di dag gyur na/_/phun sum
[\[193b.6\]]lo tog 'bras bu che/_/bde ba'i mu ges gdungs pa yi[#]/_/'gro ba dag ni tshim par 'gyur/_/'thob dang bkur sti lus la sogs/_/skyo la bdag gis [#]btang min nam/_/ci phyir da dung 'khrug par byed/_/bdag gis brdzun du de smras sam/_/rang don gnod byed la sdang na/_/
[\[193b.7\]]'o na snying rje gang du 'byung /_/gal te gzhan don 'jig [#]pa la/_/snying rje med pa'ang su zhig 'khrug_/gla rtsi bu ram shing la sogs/_/bdag pos mi shes bzhag nyes te/_/longs spyod du ni mi rung bas/_/spyod brgyad la sogs 'os yin bden/_/bdag po la ni phan 'dod
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]nas/_/rim gro bya bar sems pa med/_/de la bskul ba'ang mi byed de[#]/_/longs spyod phyir yang 'gro mi byed/_/ma rmos [#]ma btab rgyal sras rnams/_/de dag rjes 'brangs nyer song ste/_/sna tshogs mi bzad khams rnams dang /_/dbang po kun gyi
[\[194a.2\]]sman chen 'gyur/_/de dag shes byas dran byas te/_/khro ba dang ni gnod byed kyang /_/sdug bsngal rnams la zhim pa yi[#]/_/rang bzhin mi 'dor bde bar byed/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/nam mkha' zhes bya khams lnga po/_/sems can ji srid gnas srid du/_/kun
[\[194a.3\]]gyi don ni byed pa ste/_/nyes spyod kun gyis [#]de dag ni/_/sems can don las mi ldog go/_/de bzhin bdag gis [#]khams drug po/_/'di dag don med mi bya'o/_/nam mkha'i [#]mtha' ni ji tsam par/_/'jig rten mtha' ni srid gyur pa/_/de srid 'jig rten don byed
[\[194a.4\]]pas/_/ye shes sngon btang gnas par bgyi/_/bya ba bsrungs na [#]bdag la ni/_/bdag gis mi dri nan gyis su/_/slob dpon bdag gis rtag [#]par bdag_/slob ma mchog bzhin bslab par bya/_/bdag gi bla ma bdag 'dra bar[#]/_/bdag gi bag nyal skyon
[\[194a.5\]]sus shes/_/bdag sdug bsngal dang bdag 'jigs pas/_/su zhig de ltar sdug cing 'jigs/_/skyo bar mi 'gyur 'gros [#]mi 'gyur/_/snying rje yi yang yul gyur cig_/rtag tu nye bar gnas gyur pa/_/slob ma bdag 'dra ga la yod/_/nyon mongs kyis
[\[194a.6\]#]smyo gti mug ldongs/_/g.yang sa mang po'i lam du ni/_/gom pa re re rdeg 'cha' ba/_/bdag dang gzhan rtag mya ngan gzhi/_/'gro ba rnams ni sdug bsngal mtshungs/_/de bas 'khrul pa btsal [#]mi rigs/_/'di la yon tan mthong na ni/_/ngo mtshar chen po bya ba'i
[\[194a.7\]]rigs/_/nyes pa rgya mtsho bdag gcig pu[#]/_/blang bar nus pa ma yin pas/_/'di na bdag la gzhan yang dgos/_/nyes las thar byed gzhan gang yin/_/pha rol bskul la mkhas pa po/_/gsol ba ma btab phan byed kyi/_/tshig ni spyi bos blang bar bya/_/bdag ni
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]kun gyi slob par [#]bya/_/nyon mongs dgra ni mang po dang /_/gcig pu bdag ni g.yul 'gyed tshe/_/de na gcig dang 'thab pa na/_/gzhan ni bdag gi bde ba 'joms/_/sdang ngam mi sdang gyur kyang rung /_/de na la la rgyab nas sam[#]/_/gzhan nas 'jigs pa sgrogs
[\[194b.2\]]byed pa/_/de ni bdag la srog phangs sbyin/_/sdug bsngal kun gyi sman pa mchog_/bde ba'i dga' ston rab tshogs zhing /_/rnam pa kun du nyer 'tsho ba/_/'jam dbyangs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar bde bar gshegs kyi sras/_/rnam kun rmad du byung rnams
[\[194b.3\]]kyi/_/spyod pa nye bar bkod pa yi/_/dge ba bdag gis gang bsags pa[#]/_/bde gshegs go 'phang mtha' yas ni/_/nam mkha'i mtshams par dbang mdzad pa/_/de yi bde ba mtha' yas rnams/_/lus can dag gis thob par shog_/bsod nams spel ba
[\[194b.4\]]rdzogs so//_//bslab pa kun las btus pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba mdo sde du ma las btus pa/_slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_/rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA [#]ba ban de ye shes sdes
[\[194b.5\]]bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//slad kyi kha che'i paN+Di ta ti la ka ka la sha [#]dang /_lo tsA [#]ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab kyis sri mda'i dgon par zhu thug legs par byas pa'o//[ {D3941}]@#/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yi ge
[\[194b.6\]]brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga[ #]dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po brgyad stong bzlas na 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro/_/de yang gang zhe na/_na ma s+t+rai ya
[\[194b.7\]]d+h+wi kA nAM/_ta thA ga tA nAM/_sar+b+ba tra ya [#]pra ti ha tA bAp+ti[#]/_d+har+m+ma ta ba li nAn/_oM [#]a sa ma sa ma/_sa man+ta to\u0f85 nan+ta tA [#]bAp+ti shA sa ni/_ha ra ha ra sma ra sma ra Ne[#]/_bi ga ta rA ga bud+d+ha d+d+har+m+ma te/_sa ra sa ra/_sa ma ba lA[#]/_ha sa ha sa/_tra ya tra ya/_ga ga [#]na ma hA ba ra lak+Sha Ne/_dz+wa la dz+wa la na sA ga re swA hA/_
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku yin te/_'di la gus pa bla na med pa bya'o/_/'dis las dang po pa dag kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/'di nyid bdud la sogs pa dang ma rungs pa thams cad las srung bar byed pa'i
[\[195a.2\]]mchog yin no/_/thal mo brdab pa'am/_thal ba'am/_yungs kar ram/_chu'am/_blta ba'am/_yid kyis kyang mtshams gcod par byed do/_/nad kyis btab na sman gyi chu la sngags kyis btab ste btung ngo /_/yang na mchod rten nam/_sku gzugs sam/_dam pa'i
[\[195a.3\]]chos kyi glegs bam la nags kyi me tog sems mnyam par gzhag ste 'bul zhing zla ba phyed sbyor ba byas na nad chen po dag las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams cad la dmigs pa dang /_sems can thams
[\[195a.4\]]cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa'i sems kyis bzang po'i spyod pa sngon du byas pas bzlas brjod bya'o/_/cho ga 'di ni cho ga de'i mjug nas 'byung ba'o/_/dam tshig gsum gyi bzlas brjod byed pa ni khrus ma byas kyang nyes pa med do/_/lhag pa'i chos la [#]gtsang sbra ma byas kyang nyes
[\[195a.5\]]pa med do/_/phyag rgya 'dra ba dag mi bza'o/_/mi 'gom mo/_/khri la nyal bar mi bya'o/_/chang mi btung ngo /_/mos pas spyod pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi dag las mi g.yo ba dang the tshom med na sngon dang tshul ngan par gyur kyang 'grub bo/_/mkhas sam mi mkhas pa'i chos te [#]nges
[\[195a.6\]]par 'grub po/_/de skad du de nyid las/_gang zhig byang chub sems brtan zhing /_/blo gros chags pa med pa dang /_/the tshom dag kyang mi byed pa/_/de la nges par 'grub par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/byang chub kyi sems brtan [#]pa ni 'dir so so skye bo'i [#]stobs dang ldan par
[\[195a.7\]]nges par bya ba'i phyir gsungs kyi/_sar chud pa'i dbang du byas pa ni ma yin no/_/'di la ma shes na sngags rnams yi ge lhag par brjod kyang nyes pa med do/_/nyung yang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/cho ga nyams kyang nyes par mi 'gyur ro/_/'on kyang dad pa'i shugs dang /_byang
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]chub kyi sems kyi shugs dang /_rang gi don dor ba'i sems brtsan par bya ste/_rnam par mi rtog par brjod na gdon mi za bar tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang ci 'dod pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs
[\[195b.2\]]pa'i snying po'i yi ge brgya pa'i bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa'i cho ga_/slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//[{D3942}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shik+Sha sa muts+tsha ya a b+hi sa ma ya nA ma/_bod skad du/_bslab pa kun las
[\[195b.3\]]btus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs bcu ldan pa gang gi zhabs rdul la/_/lha rnams cod pan gyis gtugs de btud de/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs gtugs zhi ba'i lhas/_/bslab pa'i
[\[195b.4\]]gnas rnams mdo sde kun las btus/_/dang po gnyis ni phyi ma bdun gyis bshad/_/gnyis kyi don ni rnam dgur shes par bya/_/lnga yi 'og dang gnyis kyi gong ma ni/_/dang po yin te gzhan na gnyis pa yin/_/gnyis ka'i don ni zla ba tshes pa dang /_/nya dang sdig pa gser gyi
[\[195b.5\]]'khor lo dang /_/glang po gdugs dang thig le dang po dang /_/'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi phyag na ral gri 'dzin/_/rin po che ni khyad par gnyis dang bcas/_/dad dang bla ma'i tshogs dang go cha dang /_/byin rlabs phyir mi ldog dang spyod pa dang /_/lung bstan pa ni sku gsum yon tan
[\[195b.6\]]bcas/_/bzhi las 'bras bur gyur pa dang po ste/_/gsum ni yang dag spong bar rab tu gnas/_/gnyen po gang la de yi ngo bo ste/_/rten dang nyes pa spong ba dang po yin/_/sun 'byin pa ni de yi gnyis par brjod/_/gnyen po spyod pa gnyis pa'i dang po ste/_/spyod pa tha ma de yi gnyis
[\[195b.7\]]pa yin/_/mi mthun pa ni rnam pa brgyad yin te/_/las dang nyon mongs lta ba dag las ni/_/'gyur dang gyur pa'i khyad par rnam pa drug_/rang gi rtsa ba tha ma gnyis dang bcas/_/'gyur ba gsum ni dang po'i chos su gzhag_/gyur pa gsum ni dang po'i gnyis pa ste/_/rtsa ba
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]gnyis kyang de dang mthun pa yin/_/gyur pa gsum ni gnyis pa'i gnyis pa ste/_/rten gyi dang po'i chos kyang de yi yin/_/gyur pa dang po stobs kyi dang po ste/_/gyur pa gnyis pa phung po'i gnyis pa yin/_/gyur pa gsum pa phung po'i gsum pa ste/_/
[\[196a.2\]]mi mthun gnyen po'i khyad par de yis bstan/_/tshogs kyi lam la lnga ni dngos yin te/_/de las gzhan pa rjes su mthun pa yin/_/sbyor ba'i lam la bdun ni dngos yin te/_/de las gzhan pa lnga ni rjes mthun yin/_/mthong ba'i lam la bcu ni dngos yin te/_/
[\[196a.3\]]de las gzhan pa gnyis ni rjes mthun yin/_/tshogs kyi lam la bsrung ba gtso bo ste/_/chos gzhan gsum po mos pa mchog dang ldan/_/sbyor ba'i lam la spel ba gtso bo ste/_/gsum po dag la ji ltar 'tsham par zad/_/mthong ba'i lam la dag pa gtso bo ste/_/
[\[196a.4\]]gsum po dag gis bdag dang gzhan gyi don/_/bsgom pa'i lam la pha rol phyin pa ste/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po 'gro ba tshim par byed/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//dpal mar me mdzad ye shes dang /_dge
[\[196a.5\]]slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o/_/gser gling rgyal po dpal ldan chos skyong gis/_/bcom ldan 'jam pa'i rdo rje mnyes byas pas/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa'i mngon par rtogs/_/ka ma la dang mar me mdzad la gsungs//_//_
[\[196a.6\]{D3943}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shik+Sha ku su ma many+dza rI nA ma/_bod skad du/_bslab pa me tog snye ma zhes bya ba/_dpal 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shin tu g.yo ba'i kun rtog rlabs kyis mi 'khrugs pa yis zab gyur cing /_/rnam par 'phro ba'i sna tshogs
[\[196a.7\]]yon tan 'byung gnas nyid dang de bzhin du/_/sna tshogs thabs kyis ma lus 'gro don phun sum tshogs pas rgya che ba'i/_/mtsho 'dra'i sangs rgyas gang yin de la 'chi med don du skyabs su mchi/_/gal te lus dang longs spyod dang ni dge ba gsum/_/btang dang bsrung ba dang ni
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]dag dang spel ba rnams/_/gzhan don brtson pas nges par byed par 'dod 'gyur na/_/bla med bslab pa kun las btus pa la brten bya/_/mdo sde rin chen sna tshogs kyi/_/rgya mtsho chen po gcig pu yi/_/bslab kun bsdus pa 'di mthong na/_/sred pa kun nas gcod par
[\[196b.2\]]byed/_/shin tu rgyas pas 'jigs pas na/_/bdag 'dra'i sems kyi rgyud dag pa/_/de yi gzugs brnyan 'char ba ni/_/bde blag tu ni 'dir mi 'byung /_/de phyir rang gi sems kyi rgyud/_/dag pa tsam gyi don gyi phyir/_/bdag gi dran pa las 'ongs pa/_/cung zad btus
[\[196b.3\]]te bri bar bya/_/'phags pa zhi ba'i lha gang gis/_/bshad bya thams cad mtshon byed pa'i/_/gang zhig bslab btus 'grel pa ni/_/yod pa'i tshigs bcad gcig gsungs pa/_/'di lta ste/_bdag gi lus dang longs spyod dang /_/dge ba dus gsum bsags pa
[\[196b.4\]]rnams/_/sems can kun la btang ba dang /_/de bsrung dag pa spel ba'o/_/lus ni 'di la rab grags pa'i/_/'di ltar phung po lnga po'o/_/longs spyod nyer mkho thams cad de/_/de'i gnas pa yi rgyur gyur pa'o/_/dge ba legs pa thams cad de/_/'das dang
[\[196b.5\]]ma 'ongs da ltar ba'o/_/gtong ba la sogs rnam pa bzhi/_/de dag so so nas bstan te/_/snying po med pa snying blang phyir/_/gus pas sbyin par bya ba yin/_/lus sogs snying po med pa 'di/_/mngon sum dang ni lung gis grub/_/ji skad du/_gang zhig byin de nyams
[\[196b.6\]]min te/_/gang zhig khyim na gnas de nyams/_/gang de khyim nas mya ngan rgyu/_/gang zhig byin de bde 'byung byed/_/gang zhig byin de bde 'gro ba/_/mtho ris kyi ni skabs su gnas/_/gang de khyim nas ngan 'gro der/_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/gang de
[\[196b.7\]]khyim nas yun rings su/_/'khor ba'i lam du ltung bar byed/_/gang byin de ni thar pa yi/_/grong khyer lam na ston par byed/_/khyim gnas gang de 'khor ba yi/_/dug gi sdong bu 'phel bar byed/_/gang zhig byin de nyon mongs pa'i/_/dgra yi phyogs rnams sel
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]bar byed/_/khyim gnas gang de pha rol gyi/_/khang pa'i sgor ni 'gro ba'i rgyu/_/gang zhig khyim de 'dod pa yis/_/gang ba'i khang bzangs 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/ser snas bcings pa las byung ba'i/_/de ltar skyon rnams mthong nas ni/_/'gro
[\[197a.2\]]ba'i don ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sbyin pa la ni goms par bya/_/rim gyis goms pa 'phel ba las/_/byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje'i gter/_/gang zhig mgo dang rkang bar gyi/_/lus ni sbyin par byed pa na/_/de la rmi lam rgyu mtshungs pa'i/_/sdug pa'i bu la
[\[197a.3\]]sogs pa dang /_/de bzhin longs spyod thams cad la/_/sbyin mi bya ba yod dam ci/_/khyi dang wa dang stag sogs kyi/_/zas su 'di dag gsal bar ni/_/yang dag mthong bas 'dod rnams la/_/lus ni sbyin par cis mi bya/_/gzhan la gtang ba'i rang bzhin 'di/_/lam du
[\[197a.4\]]mkhas pa rnams kyis bsten/_/'gro ba'i don ni rab sgrub ched/_/gzhan dag de yis sngon ma gzigs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan tshogs/_/rin chen rgyan ni dran pa dang /_/ser sna'i nyes pa rnams mthong ba/_/gnyis po sbyin pa la 'jug rgyu/_/de dag ni sbyin pa'i
[\[197a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'o//_//de ni sbyin par gyur kyang ni/_/bsrung ba dag ni ma byas na/_/lus sogs longs spyod du mi 'gyur/_/des na bsrung ba rnams bya'o/_/'gro ba'i don rnams bsgrub don du/_/longs spyod nyid du bya ba'i phyir/_/lta mdzes shing gi sa bon bzhin/_/
[\[197a.6\]]snying rje'i bdag nyid can gyis bsrung /_/gzhan du dus mi shes pa yis/_/smin par ma gyur byang chub kyi/_/sems kyi myu gu nyams pa yis/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras ster 'gyur/_/lus kyi bsrung ba gang zhe na/_/gzhan la gnod pa spong ba ste/_/de ni bdag cag chags bral
[\[197a.7\]]bas/_/de ni dam chos yongs bzung dang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams/_/ji bzhin rtag tu bsten pa dang /_/sems can kun la brtse ba las/_/'byung bar mdor bsdus nas ni brjod/_/gnod par 'gyur ba gzhan rnams kyi/_/bya dang bya min blta ba dang /_/nyes
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]pa med par gnas pa la/_/lus dang sems dang ngag gis ni/_/nyes pa nye bar 'dogs pa dang /_/de bzhin gzhan la gnod sems dang /_/yang dag byang chub sems bskyed la/_/mi snyan rjod par byed pa dang /_/sdig can 'di ni blta min zhes/_/gang zhig ma dad khro sems kyis/_/
[\[197b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' la ni gdong /_/phyir phyogs par ni byed pa dang /_/chags pas 'dod rnams la zhen dang /_/sdig pa'i grogs po'i rjes 'jug dang /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba dang /_/'jig rten chos la 'dris byed dang /_/tshul bzhin ma yin rab ldan
[\[197b.3\]]pa'i/_/sbyin pa la sogs gnod pa nyid/_/sgrib pa thams cad yongs dag pa'i/_/mdo las rab tu rtogs bya ste/_/'di ltar/_sbyin pa gtong na bdag nyid ni/_/gcig pu kho na gtong byed ces/_/bdag nyid nga rgyal ldan pa yis/_/ser sna can la brnyas 'di
[\[197b.4\]]dang /_/tshul khrims srung bar byed pa na/_/tshul khrims 'chal rnams la brnyas shing /_/bdag nyid tshul khrims ldan rig phyir/_/de skyon 'jig rten la brjod dang /_/bzod pa goms par byed pa na/_/bzod med rnams la brnyas byed cing /_/bdag nyid kho na
[\[197b.5\]]sangs rgyas nyid/_/thob 'gyur zhes pa'i blo ldan dang /_/de bzhin brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang /_/de bzhin yang dag byang chub kyi/_/rgyur 'gyur dam chos gzhan la yang /_/gang zhig mdo sde gcig nyid la/_/legs zhes rab tu brjod pa dang /_/tshigs bcad gzhan
[\[197b.6\]]dang tshig gzhan dag_/gsal bar gang zhig brjod pa dang /_/shes rab nyid la sbyor byed kyi/_/lhag ma'i pha rol phyin la min/_/de lta'i shes rab 'chal rigs kyi/_/spyod pa yang ni blta bar bya/_/'dod yon lnga yi rol pa yis/_/byed pa'i chos ni smra ba la/_/spyod
[\[197b.7\]]pa ldan par gnas min zhes/_/gang zhig yid kyis sems byed pa/_/de lta'i gnod dang yang de yi/_/rnam smin ches ni rtsub pa la/_/sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa las/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis dang bar bya/_/dam chos dran pa nyer gzhag pa/_/la sogs mdo
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]sde rnams la ni/_/gus dang g.yo ba med pa yi/_/sems kyis nges par blta ba yis/_/gnod pa dang ni spong ba la/_/gus pa yang ni bsgrub par bya/_/rang ni ngan 'gros 'jigs skrag na/_/mthong dang ma mthong don sgrub phyir/_/sbas pa'i dge
[\[198a.2\]]ba'i bshes gnas pa'i/_/sems can rnams la thams cad du/_/nam yang khong khro bdag gi_/skabs ni rab tu dbye mi bya/_/gang phyir dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdor/_/gzigs pa nyams med sangs rgyas kyis/_/bla med byang chub chen po ru/_/sems can
[\[198a.3\]]thams cad lung bstan to/_/byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gi/_/spyod pa la ni smad mi bya/_/sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni/_/'phags min mig gi spyod yul min/_/gang zag gzhan gyis gang zag gzhan/_/tshad 'dzin par ni byed pa dag_/rang gis rang nyid
[\[198a.4\]]nyams byed par/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/mchod rten bskor ba bya ba dang /_/yon gnas rnams dang 'dris pa dang /_/de bzhin phyi ma'i dus na ni/_/dam pa'i chos ni 'dzin pa yi/_/sman pa nad pa sman dang ni/_/mi bzad nad kyi 'du shes
[\[198a.5\]]kyis/_/dge bshes bdag nyid dam chos dang /_/nyon mongs rnams la rig par bya/_/gnod pa yongs su spang don du/_/bag yod pa ni yongs su bzung /_/rnyed dang bkur sti mi 'dod par/_/brjod cing kun dga' ra sogs yang /_/de la bag ni yod pa ni/_/
[\[198a.6\]]bag yod pa ni mdor bsdu na/_/gang zhig rang sems 'dul ba dang /_/gzhan sems rjes su 'jug pa ste/_/phun sum tshogs pa kun gyi phyir/_/skye bo ngan pas bsten pa yi/_/rnyed dang bkur sti la gzhol yid/_/myur du 'bigs par byed pas na/_/tsher ma dang
[\[198a.7\]]mtshungs mkhas pas spang /_/'phral du bying bar byed nyid kyis/_/'dam gyi 'du shes kyis zhes bya/_/dran pa'i rin chen nyams byed phyir/_/chom rkun gyi ni 'du shes bya/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las gnod pa spang ba'o//_//gnod pa spang ba tshul
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]khrims te/_/de ni dran pa nyer gzhag las/_/zhi gnas mi nyams rgyar 'gyur ba'i/_/dran pa bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs/_/sangs rgyas bka' las 'das byung ba'i/_/rnam smin la grub dran pa dang /_/lus mi g.yo ba gnyis gnas pa'i/_/dran pa yang ni
[\[198b.2\]]gzhan yin no/_/shin tu ma dad pas byas pa'i/_/sbyin sogs dam pa'i dran pa dang /_/spyod lam dang ni thams cad la/_/gus par bya zhes dran pa dang /_/gzhan gyi don la mi mkho ba'i/_/yan lag dag ni 'dir mthong na/_/de tshe bsdus nas slar yang de/_/
[\[198b.3\]]gzhan gyi don sbyor dran pa dang /_/sems kyi glang chen myos pa ni/_/zhi gnas kyi ni ka ba la/_/rtag tu gdags pa'i dran pa yang /_/'di ni drug par gsungs pa yin/_/ji tsam bdag gi sgra yis ni/_/nyan pas don ni nges 'gyur ba/_/de las lhag pa don med pa'i/_/
[\[198b.4\]]sgra mi brjod pa'i dran pa yang /_/spyod lam lhag pa gang zhig la/_/bsrung ba'i don gyi dran pa gzhag_/dran pa lhag ma mdo yi ni/_/rjes su 'brangs nas shes par bya/_/gang zhig sgo srung gyur pas nyon mongs dang /_/bdud rnams dag gis zil gyis mi non cing /_/
[\[198b.5\]]lam min lam ngan dag tu mi ltung ba'i/_/yang dag dran pa zhi gnas kyi ni rgyu/_/dran pa gang zhig phul byung nyid/_/shes bzhin zhes ni brjod pa ste/_/gang zhig lus dang sems la ni/_/yang dang yang du rtog pa po/_/dran pa dang ni shes bzhin las/_/ting nge 'dzin
