[\[198b.6\]]kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin zhi gnas la gzhan min/_/tshul khrims de med par mi 'byung /_/gang phyir ting 'dzin tshul khrims las/_/'byung bas ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyu/_/sbyor bas gzhan dag gsungs pa rnams/_/thams cad tshul khrims khongs su
[\[198b.7\]]'dus/_/de phyir dran dang shes bzhin dag_/ldan pa ting 'dzin don gnyer bya/_/tshul khrims 'dod pas zhi gnas la/_/rtag tu gus pas 'bad par bya/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las lus bsrung ba'o//_//lus bsrung ba yang
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]bya ba'i phyir/_/longs spyod kyang ni bsrung bar bya/_/longs spyod rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/gos dang kha zas dbye bas so/_/de la zas srung gang zhe na/_/kha na ma tho med pa gang /_/de dang gzhan ni kha gsag dang /_/tshul 'chos dang bral bsod
[\[199a.2\]]snyoms so/_/gang tshe rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni/_/bsod snyoms la ni rgyu ba na/_/de tshe blo dang ldan pa des/_/blo ni rnam gsum bskyed bya ste/_/lus la chos 'dzin blo dang ni/_/lus kyi srin bu gso ba dang /_/gzhan yang sbyin bdag rjes su ni/_/gzung ba'i blo ni bskyed
[\[199a.3\]]par bya/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi don du ni/_/longs spyod byas na de bsrung yin/_/gang gis rang nyid kho na spyod/_/de las nyon mongs ltung bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang gzhan la zhen pa yi/_/sems kyi 'dod pas gzhan gyi nor/_/yongs su longs spyod byed pa gang /_/
[\[199a.4\]]nyon mongs min pa'i ltung bar 'gyur/_/gyi zhes nas ni rang gi nor/_/gang gis longs ni spyad gyur na/_/de ni rang lto 'gengs pa ste/_/brkus pa yi ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sems can don la ni/_/brtson pas dam chos 'dzin pa'i lus/_/'di ni gnas par bya ba'i
[\[199a.5\]]phyir/_/yongs su longs spyod byed pa yin/_/sangs rgyas kyis gnang chos gos las/_/lhag pa blo ldan gyis mi gzung /_/bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan bsrung don du/_/ma gnang blo ldan gyis mi gtang /_/'dir ni sems can mang po yis/_/smad pa yongs su bsrung ba'i
[\[199a.6\]]phyir/_/slong bar byed pa 'ga' la yang /_/chos gos gsum po sbyin mi bya/_/de dag ni longs spyod bsrung ba'o//_//rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pas/_/dge ba kun du bsrung bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten pa la bsgrags min par/_/byas te mi dge'i las bzhin no/_/
[\[199a.7\]]de bzhin du/_nga rgyal med kyang rtag par ni/_/rnyed dang bkur sti yongs spong dang /_/sems can kun la dang ba yis/_/dge ba kun du bsrung bar 'gyur/_/'di ltar yang /_khengs pa med par gyur na ni/_/bde gshegs yon tan ngang gis 'byung /_/ri bo yongs su spangs
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]nas ni/_/chu bo rgya mtshor 'bab pa bzhin/_/zhe sdang dbang du gang gyur pa/_/ngan 'gror 'gro dang dman pa yi/_/rigs su skye ba yongs 'dzin dang /_/mi khom pa rnams yongs su 'dzin/_/ma dad pha ni zhe sdang ste/_/khong khro zhes pa med gzhan no/_/gang zhig bskal pa
[\[199b.2\]]du ma ru/_/bsags pa'i dge ba 'joms pas so/_/de phyir 'joms par brtson pa yi/_/sems can la yang dang bya ste/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen bsdigs byed pa'i/_/rgyal po'i skyes bu gcig bzhin du/_/shin tu phyi thag lta byed pa/_/de yis 'di gcig la yang
[\[199b.3\]]mthong /_/gang phyir skye bo'i tshogs chen gyi/_/rgyal po che dpung de yi dpung /_/rgyal po khros pas 'dir ni dmyal bar byed nus sam/_/de bzhin gal te gus pas bde gshegs nyid mtshungs 'dir ster ram/_/de bzhin sems can mgu ba las byung sangs rgyas lta zhog gi/_
[\[199b.4\]]de ltar rang nyid snyan dang skal ba bzang ba ma mthong ngam/_/gang zhig mgu las srid gsum mtsho yi pha rol son gyur cing /_/sngon gyi rgyal ba'i yon tan yun mi ring bar rdzogs/_/blo dman rnams kyis gzhan dag mgu ma byas pas dmyal ba thob/_/des na legs 'dod
[\[199b.5\]]bdag ni sems can rnams la cis mi 'dud/_/de bzhin du/_sems can rnams la phan sems shing /_/snyan pa chen po smra byed la/_/rten pa zhes nas 'jug pa dang /_/bden pa smra bar dga' ba ni/_/skye ba kun du skyes tsam gyis/_/ngang gis 'byung ba dag dang ni/_/
[\[199b.6\]]yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems/_/'bad pa med par skye bar 'gyur/_/de dag ni dge ba bsrung ba'o//_//'dir yang da ni lus kyi yang /_/yongs su dag pa brjod par bya/_/de yang /_mdor na lus kyi sdig pa ni/_/zad dang nyon mongs sbyang ba'o/_/
[\[199b.7\]]bskal pa du mar bsags pa yi/_/sdig pa zad par byed pa'i rgyu/_/chos bzhi'i mdo las bsten pa yi/_/chos bzhi yongs su gzung bar bya/_/de la chos bzhi ni/_sun 'byin kun du spyod pa dang /_/gnyen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_/de nas nyes pa las ldog stobs/_/de nas
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]rten gyi stobs dag go/_/mi dge'i las ni byas pa na/_/sems ni 'gyod par byed pa nyid/_/sun 'byin kun du spyod pa ste/_/de nyid sdig pa bshags pa'o/_/de la sun 'byin pa kun du/_/spyod pa 'di ni bsgom par bya/_/lus dang sems dang ngag
[\[200a.2\]]rnams kyis/_/bdag gis mi shes gang bgyis pa/_/mgon po rnams kyi mdun gnas te/_/sdig pa de dag bshags par bgyi/_/mdo sde rgyal po gser 'od dam pa las/_/rab tu gsungs pa'i bshags pa de dag gis/_/bla ma sangs rgyas byang chub sems
[\[200a.3\]]dpa' la/_/'gyod pas bdag gi 'khrul pa'i sdig bshags bya/_/bral bar bya ba 'dod pa yis/_/ltung ba thams cad bshags par bya/_/dug dang bcas pa'i kha zas ni/_/ma skyugs bde ba'i rgyur mi 'gyur/_/de yang lci dang yang ba dang /_/'dir ni ltung
[\[200a.4\]]ba gnyis su 'dod/_/de la zhe sdang las byung ba/_/lci zhing chags las byung ba yang /_/rang bzhin kha na ma tho lci/_/bcas pa yi ni spong ba'o/_/gang phyir sdang dang chags pa las/_/sems can gtong dang 'dzin pa'i rgyu/_/zhe sdang las skyes rgyal sras kyi/_/thabs
[\[200a.5\]]su gyur pa ma yin gyi/_/gnod pa chen po'i rgyu yin par/_/'gyur ba nyid du the tshom med/_/gang phyir kun sdud shes pa ni/_/thabs su mdo rnams las ni mthong /_/shes rab kyis ni de yongs gcod/_/des ni de ltar gnyi ga min/_/gang tshe chags skyes sangs rgyas
[\[200a.6\]]nyid/_/myur du mi 'gyur chug na yang /_/gal te thabs la mkhas pa yis/_/sngon gyi sems can bsdus gyur na/_/tshangs pa yi ni 'jig rten du/_/skye bar 'gyur ba gang gis zlog_/gal te min na dus ring du/_/ngan song dag tu rab skye bar/_/gal te de tshe gzhan don
[\[200a.7\]]du/_/longs spyod kyis gzhan bud med dang /_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan can gzhan la/_/'dod pas log par spyod mi 'gyur/_/gal te dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang /_/bsran pa rang gis khas blangs pas/_/gzhan gyi srog ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/de tshe nyes pa 'byung mi
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]'gyur/_/ji ltar khye'u skar rgyal ni/_/snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa yis/_/chags pa'i skal ldan mchog la ni/_/srog bsrung don du zhugs pa bzhin/_/tshangs par spyod pa la sogs pa'i/_/chos kyi rgyal mtshan can rnams la/_/rnam pa gzhan du byas pa yis/_/de las
[\[200b.2\]]'jug pa rigs ma yin/_/gzhan la gnod pa bzlog pas na/_/khro ba 'di las thal ba min/_/bag chags sa bon bsags pa dang /_/skabs phye ba las snying rje nyams/_/gzhan yang /_mi dge ba la bzlog na'ang gal te na/_/byang chub sems dpa' la ni yid byung na/_/
[\[200b.3\]]rtag tu ngan 'gro'i sar ni 'gro 'gyur te/_/de yis bdag gzhan gnyi ga'i bya byas min/_/'on te thabs bral rang bzhin gyi/_/chags pa la yang skyon 'di yin/_/gang phyir bdag bde la zhen pas/_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal btang snyoms 'dor/_/de ni ma yin te/_gang
[\[200b.4\]]gis rang gi sdug bsngal bzhin du gzhan sdug bsngal/_/snying rje dman pas mtha' gcig tu ni goms ma byas/_/de ni rang gi bde la zhen pas gzhan sdug bsngal/_/dus mtha' yas su btang snyoms 'dor bar byed pa bden/_/de dag ni sun 'byin pa kun du spyod pa'o//_//_
[\[200b.5\]]sdig pa'i las ni byas gyur kyang /_/slar yang dge ba'i don brtson pa/_/sangs rgyas dmigs pa la sogs pa/_/gnyen po kun du spyod pa yin/_/'di lta ste/_byang chub sems ni bskyed pa dang /_/de bzhin rgyal ba'i gzugs brnyan dang /_/bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal dang /_/sangs
[\[200b.6\]]rgyas mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/mchod rten me tog 'bul ba dang /_/khyad par du ni khyim gnas las/_/nges 'byung tshul khrims rdzogs pa dang /_/bde gshegs la ni mchod byas pa'i/_/dman ma sel bar byed pa dang /_/byug pa'am mar me chu smyig gang /_/dbul ba'am me tog
[\[200b.7\]]gcig 'dogs pa/_/yang dag rgyal ba yis gsungs pa/_/rgyu rkyen dag dang ldan pa yi/_/chos rnams gal te shes gyur na/_/ngan song dag tu 'gro mi 'gyur/_/mig gnyis btsums nas yid kyis ni/_/mdun du sangs rgyas dmigs byas te/_/gsang sngags rgyal po
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]yi ge brgya/_/stong phrag brgyad du bzlas par bya/_/gang na rtse gcig yid kyis ni/_/skul byed ma yi gzungs sngags dag_/ji srid sdig pa zad pa'i rtags/_/rmi lam ma mthong bar du bzlas/_/'di lta ste/_zas ngan dag ni skyugs pa dang /_/zho dang 'o ma
[\[201a.2\]]za ba dang /_/nam mkha' la ni 'gro ba dang /_/nyi zla dag kyang mthong ba dang /_/rmi lam du ni mi dag las/_/rgyal na sdig pa zad shes bya/_/ma he dang ni de bzhin du/_/skyes bu nag po'ang mtshon byed yin/_/sman gyi bla ma bai DUr+ya/_/'od kyi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs/_/ji
[\[201a.3\]]bzhin yid la byed pa na/_/mi dge rnams ni zad par 'gyur/_/de dag ni gnyen po kun du spyod pa'o/_/slar yang sdom pa 'dzin pa ni/_/mi mthun las ldog stobs brjod do/_/gang zhig mi dge ba yi las/_/slar yang sdom pa'i bdag nyid do/_/de dag ni mi mthun pa'i
[\[201a.4\]]phyogs las ldog pa'i stobs so//_//de la rten stobs sangs rgyas dang /_/chos dang dge 'dun la brten dang /_/de bzhin mi phyed dad pa yis/_/byang chub sems la brten pa ste/_/dkon mchog gsum la cho ga yis ni skyabs su song gyur pa'i/_/ches mang 'bras bu gang
[\[201a.5\]]yin phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa las shes bya/_/gang zhig byang chub sems la brten pa las byung 'bras bu dag_/de ni sna tshogs mdo rnams dag ni bltas pa las shes bya/_/de dag ni sdig pa byang ba ste tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//_//gang phyir
[\[201a.6\]]mi bzod thos sogs la/_/brtson 'grus nyams par gyur pa yin/_/de phyir mi skyo brtson pa yis/_/thos pa spel phyir bzod pa bya/_/gang phyir thos pa ma gtogs par/_/bsam gtan spyod yul thabs ma gtogs/_/des na skyo ba med yid kyis/_/
[\[201a.7\]]'bad pas thos pa btsal bar bya/_/gang phyir gong dang 'dres pa na/_/spyod lam shes par gyur pa ni/_/mnyam gzhag yang dag skye min pa/_/de nas nags su gnas par bya/_/nags su'ang g.yeng ba zhi med na/_/sems ni mnyam par 'jog mi 'gyur/_/des na mkhas
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]pa dag gi ni/_/mnyam par gzhag la sbyar bar bya/_/nyon mongs sbyang ba las gzhan pa'i/_/mnyam gzhag 'bras bu yod ma yin/_/de phyir nyon mongs rnam sbyang phyir/_/mi sdug la sogs bsgom par bya/_/nyon mongs dag ni sbyang ba'i phyir/_/de ltar mdor bstan tshig
[\[201b.2\]]rnams gsungs/_/da ni nyon mongs sbyang ba'i phyir/_/rgyas par yang dag brjod par bya/_/gang zhig dngos po bzod pa ste/_/de yang rnam pa gsum du dbye/_/sdug bsngal gzhan gyis gnod byas dang /_/chos la yang ni skye bar 'gyur/_/phal cher mi 'dod byung ba dang /_/
[\[201b.3\]]sdug dang bral byung las sdug bsngal/_/gang zhig sdug bsngal la 'jigs pa/_/de bzod mi mthun phyogs su 'dod/_/de la sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa bsgom pa'i rim pa ni 'di yin te/_sdug bsngal rab sel byed pa yi/_/kun mkhyen rin chen 'dod pa na/_/chung ngu
[\[201b.4\]]bzod pas rim gyis ni/_/gnod pa drag po bzod 'gyur te/_/re zhig shin tu dman pa'i 'bras bu yi/_/dngos po la ni zhen pa'i sems/_/nya ba zhing pa la sogs pa/_/gnod pa bzod par byed mthong na/_/bdud kyi khar chud gyur pa yi/_/'gro ba bcings pa dgrol ba yis/_/
[\[201b.5\]]yang dag dam bcas byas pa dag_/sdug bsngal mthong bas ji ltar ldog_/gang zhig gnod ma byas kyang dgrar gyur zag pa yi/_/dgra bo gzhom phyir skad cig kyang ni khro ba ru/_/mi byed pa de bdag gi rigs pa'i dngos min zhing /_/gang zhig dgra ma thub pa nga rgyal can dngos
[\[201b.6\]]min/_/shin tu dus ring dag tu sdug bsngal gyis thob pa'i/_/dge ba'i nor ni 'phrog pa dag tu brtson gyur zhing /_/bsran pas bdag gi sdug bsngal tshor ba'i rgyur gyur la/_/gzhom par 'dod pa ci yi phyir na 'byung mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar mtha' gcig tu ni rim gyis goms pa
[\[201b.7\]]phul byung stobs dag las/_/mi rnams la ni sdug bsngal la yang bde bar 'du shes stobs ldan 'byung /_/de bzhin yang dag byang chub gzhol ba'i yid can 'di dag la/_/sdug bsngal la yang mtshungs med bde bar 'du shes 'byung bar 'gyur ba nyid/_/yab sras mjal ba'i
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]mdo las ni/_/de yi rgyu mthun 'bras bu gsungs/_/chos kun bde bar gnas pa zhes/_/bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/_/ting 'dzin de ni thob tsam gyis/_/dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad la/_/byang chub sems dpa' bde ba yi/_/tshor ba nyid 'byung gzhan
[\[202a.2\]]du min/_/'di ltar/_mgo bo gcod par byed pa'am/_/de bzhin rkang lag la sogs pa/_/sba yis gzhu ba byas kyang ni/_/bde ba'i 'du shes 'ba' zhig 'byung /_/dmyal ba dang ni mi yi 'am/_/sdug bsngal dag ni byed pa na'ang /_/gshed ma rnams la dga' ba ni/_/mngon du
[\[202a.3\]]byed pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bdag la lus can 'di kun gyis/_/gal te 'bigs sam gcod byed pa/_/de lta na yang gnod pa'i sems/_/bdag gis bya ba'i rigs min te/_/gang phyir bdag la sems can gyis/_/gnod byas dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal la/_/stong phrag dag
[\[202a.4\]]tu byas pa yi/_/char yang phod pa ma yin no/_/gnod sems dag ni 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/bdag nyid la chags bkur ba dang /_/chen por mngon par zhen pa ste/_/de yi gnyen po bzod par 'dod/_/bdag gi dgra dang bshes kyi dgra/_/dgra bo'i bshes las 'gyur ba yi/_/
[\[202a.5\]]gnod sems rgyu dgu las byung ste/_/re re dus gsum dbye bas so/_/de dag ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//_//de ltar bzod pa la gnas pas/_/thos pa la ni brtson 'grus brtsam/_/gang phyir thos las shes rab ste/_/shes rab las ni nyon mongs spong /_/
[\[202a.6\]]de yang rnam pa brgyad cu yis/_/thos pa gong du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de la 'dun pa'i rnam pa dang /_/gzhan yang rten gyi rnam pa dang /_/gzhan yang lhag bsam rnam pa dang /_/sbyor ba'i rnam pa zhes bya dang /_/sems ni dga' ba'i rnam pa dang /_/chog shes pa yi mtshan nyid
[\[202a.7\]]dang /_/dran pa bskyed pa'i rnam pa dang /_/gtong ba spel ba'i mtshan nyid dang /_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos kun la/_/mi ngoms pa yi rnam pa dang /_/ma thos nyams pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_/mngon shes nyan pa'i rnam pa dang /_/de bzhin sdug bsngal stong pa dang /_/mi
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]sdug bdag med zhi rnams dang /_/rang sems bsrung ba'i rnam pa dang /_/brtson 'grus spel ba'i rnam pa ste/_/'di yang rgyas pa 'phags pa ni/_/blo gros mi zad mdor shes bya/_/thos pa nyid la chos kyi ni/_/tshogs zhes bya ba ming gzhan yin/_/gang tshe yongs su smin
[\[202b.2\]]pa ni/_/de nyid ye shes tshogs yin te/_/chos kyi tshogs kyi sbyor ba yis/_/mthun rgyu dag tu brjod pa ni/_/don nyung bya ba nyung nyid dang /_/smra ba nyung la mngon dga' dang /_/yang dang yang du thos pa'i don/_/sems shing chos la gzhol nyid dang /_/sems dang ba
[\[202b.3\]]dang yo byad dag_/nyung la mngon par dga' ba dang /_/dgon par mngon par phyogs pa dang /_/gzhan yang gcig pur dga' ba dang /_/dran mi nyams dang rtag tu ni/_gtong dang tshul khrims phyogs dga' dang /_/chad pa lugs kyi bstan bcos sogs/_/gang
[\[202b.4\]]yang rol mo'i bstan bcos dang /_/'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa dag gi_/bstan bcos kun ni yongs spong ba'o/_/de dag ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//_//drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_/khyim sogs nyes pa'i phung por ni/_/mthong nas
[\[202b.5\]]thos pa ldan pa yis/_/de nas nags su gnas par bya/_/khyim gnas rmongs pa 'di ni bu dang nor dang chung ma la sogs pa/_/dga' ba'i sbyor bas sems g.yengs gyur pas rab tu zhi ba ga la 'gyur/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas rnams kyi rga dang 'chi med zhi zhing mtshungs med pa'i/_/
[\[202b.6\]]go 'phang bdag gzhan phan pa phun tshogs gnas gyur pa yang 'thob 'gyur ram/_/nor dang chung ma bdag nyid zhes pa 'chi ba dam pa'i gsum po 'di/_/zhen pa med cing lhan cig skyes pa rtogs pa'i gnas la gnas pa ste/_/'di rnams la ni gang zhig gang tshe gang gis ji ltar skye
[\[202b.7\]]bar 'gyur/_/min pas snying po med pa nyid du shes pa'i dpyod pa de stobs ldan/_/thos pa ldan yang rnyed sogs la/_/zhen na sems sbyong mi 'gyur te/_/de tshe lhar bcas 'jig rten na/_/de ni gcig tu bslus pa'i mchog_/ji ltar rgya mtsho chen por khyer ba yi/_/mi shes skye bo
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]skom pas dus byed ltar/_/de bzhin dal 'byor thob nas skad cig kyang /_/sems ma sbyangs na 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis byis pa rnams ni 'thab mos bskrad pa ma yin te/_/gang phyir mkhas pa rnams ni snying rjes bkur stir byas nas
[\[203a.2\]]de dag gtong /_/de bzhin sdug pa rnams la dang po mtshungs par bde ba nyer bstan nas/_/slar yang dgra byed gang yin de dang lhan cig dga' bar ga la 'gyur/_/de phyir nyon mongs spangs pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten pa dang 'dre ba yang /_/de dag nyid ni sems can gyi/_/dge ba mngon
[\[203a.3\]]par 'phel ba'i rgyu/_/yang ni gal te skal mi mnyam pa'i sems can gyi/_/tshogs la rjes su chags las 'khor 'dod yid 'byung zhing /_/rnyed dang grags pa'i rgyu phyir 'dud par gyur na ni/_/nags 'di yang ni khyim dang khyad par med min nam/_/bsod snyoms rgyu ba'i yul dag
[\[203a.4\]]dang /_/shin tu ring ba ma yin zhing /_/nye ba yang ni ma yin pa'i/_/nags de dag tu gnas bya ste/_/yul gang na ni dri ma srog chags las byung ba'i/_/skyon dang bral ba'i chu dag kyang ni yod pa dang /_/gang na 'bras bu'i lcid kyis dud pa'i shing yod cing /_/gdug pa'i sbrul dag dang ni
[\[203a.5\]]bral ba'i phug yod pa/_/de ru 'di ni nyin dang mtshan du yang ni gsung rab 'don pa dang /_/slar sngags gang yin de ni slar yang rigs pa'i tshogs kyis dpyod par byed/_/de nas bsod nams las byung mtshan ma rnams ni 'dzin par byed gyur cing /_/bying dang rgod pa'i dug dang bral bas
[\[203a.6\]]rang gi sems la dga' ba bskyed/_/rgyal po'am ni rgyal bu'am/_/bram ze'am blon po la sogs pa/_/dge slong dgon pa pa dag gi_/drung du 'ongs par gyur na ni/_/des ni de la gus pa yis/_/legs par byin nam zhes bya dang /_/ji ltar bshams pa'i stan dag la/_/rang
[\[203a.7\]]gis mkhyen bzhin bzhugs zhes bya/_/rgyal po 'greng na rang stan la/_/bdag nyid kyang ni 'greng bya la/_/bzhugs na 'dug par byas nas ni/_/dga' bar byed pa'i gtam bya ste/_/skal ldan khyod kyi yul du ni/_/thos mang tshul khrims ldan pa yi/_/dge sbyong bram ze la sogs pa/_/
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]rtag par bde bar gnas lags zhes/_/gal te brtan zhing dul ba dang /_/dbang po kun ni zhi gyur na/_/las dang rjes su mthun 'byung ba/_/rnam smin bcas pa'i gtam bya'o/_/gal te rgyal po yid byung ldan/_/yid byung rjes mthun brjod pa'am/_/zab dang rgya che'i mtshan nyid kyi/_/
[\[203b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi ni che brjod na/_/byang chub sems dpa' nags phyin na/_/yid ni 'di ltar bsam bya ste/_/bdag ni khyim gyi gnas spangs nas/_/ci yod don du nags su 'ong /_/lha la sogs pas mchod bya'i dge slong go 'phang ni/_/gal te nags su gnas pa tsam gyis 'dir 'byung
[\[203b.3\]]na/_/nags na rgyu ba'i spre'u dang chom rkun seng ge rnams/_/de dag kyang ni dge sbyong go 'phang yon tan gyis brgyan 'gyur/_/gzhan yang nga rgyal khengs pa'i yongs su gdung ba dang /_/ser sna sdang chags rtag tu 'jigs mang dang /_/reg gzugs ro dang dri yis 'jigs pa dang /_/
[\[203b.4\]]phung po bdud kyis 'jigs pas 'dar ba dang /_/nyon mongs bdud kyis 'jigs pa'i mes gdungs shing /_/lha yi bdud kyis 'jigs pas de bzhin skrag_/'chi bdag bdud kyis yang yang bltas pa yis/_/da lta bdag ni nags su 'ongs min nam/_/de phyir nags su gnas pa 'di/_/
[\[203b.5\]]bdag nyid dben pa'i phyir bsten nam/_/ji ltar bdag la 'jigs rnams yod/_/de ni ji ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'dir ni 'jigs pa rnams kyi rgyu/_/'jig tshogs lta ba gcig pu nyid/_/gang phyir 'jigs pa thams cad ni/_/de las kun du 'byung ba yin/_/ma rig nyer
[\[203b.6\]]bslad 'khrul pa dang /_/gnyis sbyor bdag tu rig pa rnams/_/phyin ci log las kun byung ba/_/'jig tshogs lta ba'i rnam grangs so/_/gzugs sogs phung po lnga rnams la/_/bdag ces yang dag mi 'dzin pa'i/_/'jig tshogs lta ba rtsa ba ni/_/srid pa'i lcug ma 'phel
[\[203b.7\]]ba'i rgyu/_/de phyir 'jigs pa kun gcad phyir/_/bdag tu zhen pa spangs pa la/_/da ni bdag gis bstan pa ru/_/rab tu 'thad pa dag tu bya/_/dgon pa chen por gnas pa yi/_/ljon shing gel pa lcug ma sogs/_/de dag su la'ang mi 'jigs na/_/bdag ni de las lhag
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]par sngar/_/'di na 'ga' zhig bdag gam ni/_/skyes bu'am ni gang zag gam/_/shed las skyes sam shed bu'ang /_/tshad mas dpyad na yod ma yin/_/de ltar 'jigs pa dag gi rgyu/_/yang dag ma yin kun rtog 'di/_/de phyir lung dang tshad ma yi/_/mig
[\[204a.2\]]gis de nyid gzhom par bya/_/gzhan yang /_dbye ba med pa'i chos rnams la/_/'byed 'di tshul bzhin ma yin pa/_/tshul bzhin ma yin rkyen can te/_/de yang skye ba med pa'i dngos/_/gzhan yang 'dir ni dgon gnas pa/_/chos rnams kun la 'dre med de/_/ma 'dres
[\[204a.3\]]rab tu mi gnas dang /_/dpyod med rjes su 'dzin byed pa'o/_/gal te yon tan ma thob par/_/gcan gzan khro bo nyer 'ongs nas/_/'jigs pa spangs pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/des ni 'di ltar sems gdul bya/_/sngar ni sems can don bsgrub phyir/_/lus 'di bdag
[\[204a.4\]]gis btang ba yin/_/sbyin pa byin nas mi shes pas/_/de la ji ltar bdag gdung byed/_/gang las kyang 'jigs mi bya ste/_/rang gi nyes byas kyis 'jigs bya/_/gang phyir 'jigs kun 'di las te/_/thams cad de yi sprul par gsal/_/skye ba dang ni 'jig pa dag_/_
[\[204a.5\]]ji ltar bdag med gel pa dang /_/lcug ma la sogs skye dang ni/_/'jig 'gyur de bzhin bdag gi yang /_/skye ba dang ni 'jig pa yi/_/rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa las/_/rtswa dang 'khri shing skye ba dang /_/'jig pa de bzhin bdag gi yang /_/skye dang 'jig ste don dam min/_/de
[\[204a.6\]]dag ni dgon pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o//_//nags tshal nyid la brten nas ni/_/ting nge 'dzin la sbyar bya ste/_/gang phyir mi g.yeng med par ni/_/'jig rten phun tshogs kyang med pas/_/dang por 'dun pa'i ming can gyi/_/sems bskyed nye bar bzung
[\[204a.7\]]nas ni/_/byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/_/gnod pa spang phyir 'bad par bya/_/'di ltar/_spyod yul gzugs ni mthong ba na/_/brnab sems yid mi bde ba'am/_/gzhan yang mi dge ba yi chos/_/sems la skad cig byung gyur na/_/de tshe bsdams phyir de dag gi_/_
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]mig gi dbang pos tshar gcad bya/_/tshar gcad pa ni mtshan ma dag_/gsal bar rjes su gzung las byung /_/de bzhin rna ba sna dang ni/_/lce dang lus kyi dbang po rnams/_/rtag tu sems ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/so so dag tu bsdam par bya/_/sad pa dang ni nyal ba dang /_/
[\[204b.2\]]'dug dang 'gro dang smra ba dang /_/mi smra gyur dang kun du yang /_/mnyam par gzhag pa 'dor mi bya/_/rnyed dang ma rnyed bstod smad dang /_/bde dang sdug dang snyan mi snyan/_/yid bde byed dang gzhan pa rnams/_/sprul pa bzhin du bsam par bya/_/des na 'di ni mi rgod cing /_/lus
[\[204b.3\]]zhi sems ni ma 'khrul zhing /_/rtag tu dbang po mi g.yeng zhing /_spyod lam dge ba'i spyod yul dang /_/dmigs pa gsal bar rgyu ba ni/_/gang tshe sems la ma mthong zhing /_/bying na gzengs ni bstod pa'i phyir/_/yid la dga' ba bsgom par bya/_/rgod pa 'jig rten chos
[\[204b.4\]]rnams la/_/gal te bdag med pa skyes na/_/kun mkhyen gyis gsungs mi rtag pa/_/myur du mngon du bya ba dang /_/gnyi ga'i don du gnyen po ni/_/rnyed dka' dal ba phun tshogs pa/_/dran bya de bzhin bskal pa ni/_/bye bar rnyed dka'i rgyal byung ba'o/_/gzhan yang sdug
[\[204b.5\]]dang phrad pa 'di ni nyi ma 'ga' zhig dag tu bde ster te/_/phyis ni dran par gyur nas mtshungs pa med pa'i gdul ba skyed byed pa/_/de bzhin skye dang skye bar dran pa'i yul du gyur nas 'jig rten pa/_/ji ltar srid pa'i 'khrul pa spong bar mi nus 'gyur ba de ltar byed/_/rga dang nad dang 'chi bdag
[\[204b.6\]]rgud pa zhes bya bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/gnod pa chen por skrag pa'i yid kyis nyin mtshan so so dran bya ste/_/gang phyir nad kyis bde dang 'chi bdag gis ni srog ni 'phrog byed cing /_/rgud las phun tshogs nyams byed lang tsho dag ni rga ba dag gis so/_/gnad rnams gcod par byed pa dang /_/
[\[204b.7\]]grogs med gcig pur gyur pa dang /_/'jig rten 'di ni yongs spangs shing /_/'jig rten gzhan du 'pho 'gyur te/_/'chi bdag khar ni zhugs pa la/_/dge ba'i las las gzhan pa yi/_/chung ma nor dang grogs dang gnyen/_/srung bar byed pa yod ma yin/_/snabs dang kha chu
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]dri ma gcin gos shing /_/dbugs kyi lhag ma 'dzin par byed pa'i lus/_/yang srid pa ni dmigs par byed pa na/_/legs byas ma gtogs skyob byed 'ga' yod min/_/grang bas nyen la me dang ni/_/skom pas nyen la chu ji bzhin/_/ji ltar ngal la grib ma ste/_/de
[\[205a.2\]]bzhin chos ni gzhan dag kyang /_/de phyir skyes bu rnams kyi 'khor dang nor dang lang tsho dag_/glog dang mtshungs par mthong nas 'jig pa'i chos can du/_/skye dang ldan pas ma lus de ltar rtogs nas ni/_/srid pa'i 'ching ba 'jigs las grol phyir 'bad par bya/_/yang ni g.yeng ba chen po'i rgyu/_/
[\[205a.3\]]'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum/_/byams pa rten 'brel bsgom pa ste/_/rtag tu sgyu yang spong byed cing /_/gnyen po yang ni bsgom par bya/_/'dod chags dag ni skye ba'i rgyu/_/bud med gcig pu kho na'o/_/mi sdug bsgom pa gang zhe na/_/mi gtsang la sogs 'du shes kyis/_/mgo
[\[205a.4\]]bo nas ni rkang pa'i bar/_/gang zhig bsdus nas spyod pa ste/_/'di ltar skra dang ba spu dang /_/sen mo so dang pags pa rtsa/_/sha rus rgyus pa snying dang mchin/_/rgyu ma zhag dang dri ma dang /_/gzhungs pa mchi ma chu ser rngul/_/tshil dang snabs dang glo ba dang /_/glad pa dang ni glad rgyas dang /_/
[\[205a.5\]]gcin dang rnag dang khrag dag gis/_/dang po 'di dag la rmongs pa'i/_/shes rab 'chal pa gzhan dag ni/_/gcig la sogs pa rlom pa las/_/dge ba dga' bar ga la 'gyur/_/'byung ba bzhi las grub pa'i rang gi lus po 'di la slar yang ni/_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung zhes so so
[\[205a.6\]]dag tu rtog byed la/_/de nas ji ltar sna tshogs 'bru yis gang ba'i phur ma bzhin/_/de bzhin lus 'di yang ni brtan pa'i blo yis rnam par blta bya ste/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni dur khrod zhugs nas su/_/gang tshe ro yi ngo bo yongs su lta byed pa/_/de tshe des ni nyin zhag 'das las byung
[\[205a.7\]]ba yi/_/rul dngos dag tu rang gi lus dang mtshungs par rtog_/shin tu 'phongs gdangs kha ni zangs ltar gyur pa yi/_/sa steng ltung bar gyur pa'i ro yi lus po ni/_/srid pa'i bde la zhen pa'i sems ldan mi rnams la/_/rang gi mi sdug dngos po ston par byed pa 'dra/_/de dag ni
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]'dod chags la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po'o//_//gzhan la phan dang bde sred dang /_/'dod dang smon dang dga' ba yi/_/rnam pa 'dir skye gang yin pa'i/_/byams de rnam gsum du dbye ste/_/de la sems can la dmigs shing /_/chos la dmigs pa yang ni gzhan/_/
[\[205b.2\]]ngang gis 'byung zhing dmigs med pa/_/byams pa chen po rab tu gsungs/_/dang po'i sems la dang po ste/_/gzhan ni spyod la dga' ba yin/_/dmigs pa med pa mi skye ba'i/_/chos la bzod thob spyod yul lo/_/de dag kun la goms bya'i phyir/_/bsgom bya'i rim pa bshad
[\[205b.3\]]par bya/_/de la dang po sdug pa bzhin/_/bar ma rnams la bsgom par bya/_/gang phyir sdug bzhin shes pa ni/_/lhag ma rnams la skye bar 'gyur/_/de tshe goms pa phyi nas yang /_/dgra yi phyogs la bsgom par bya/_/gang tshe rnal 'byor pa yis ni/_/phyogs gcig
[\[205b.4\]]tu ni dgra dag kyang /_/grogs po bzhin du snang gyur na/_/de tshe phyogs kun la bsgom bya/_/ji ltar sems can la dmigs pa/_/bsgoms las nye ba skye 'gyur ba'i/_/ngal ba chos la dmigs pa dag_/la sogs pa ni yod ma yin/_/de bzhin du/_gal te rang gi dge
[\[205b.5\]]ba skye bo gzhan rnams kyis/_/bde gshegs nyid thob bya phyir yongs su sngo byed na/_/de yi byams pa 'di ni shin tu mchog 'gyur zhing /_/rang gi byang chub sems ni rdo rje ltar brtan byed/_/gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi dge ba dang /_/de bzhin rgyal sras dang ni
[\[205b.6\]]sems can gzhan gyi yang /_/de dag ma lus pa yang 'gro ba srid pa'i btson ra yi/_/bcings pa grol bar bya phyir yongs su sngo byed pa/_/sna tshogs snying rje'i snying po can/_/yongs su bsngo ba gang dag yin/_/de kun byams pa nyid kyi ni/_/rjes su 'jug par the tshom med/_/de
[\[205b.7\]]dag ni zhe sdang la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po'o//_//gzhan yod pa la brten nas ni/_/me long gi ni gzugs brnyan bzhin/_/gang gi dngos po snang gyur pa/_/de la rang dngos ga la yod/_/de phyir rkyen las byung ba yi/_/dngos po rnams ni dngos med nyid/_/rang gi
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]mtshan nyid ma skyes pa/_/stong nyid shin tu zab pa nyid/_/dngos po de dag mi spong zhing /_/des kyang dngos po mi spong ste/_/med na mi 'byung nges pa'i phyir/_/me dang sreg par byed pa bzhin/_/rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis 'di/_/phyi ma phyi ma 'bras bu
[\[206a.2\]]dang /_/snga ma snga ma rgyu yin par/_/ma rig la sogs rim shes bya/_/ma rig pa ni gang zhe na/_/yang dag min pas khams lnga la/_/gcig dang bdag dang rtag sogs su/_/ma rig skye ba gang yin pa'i/_/'du byed yul ni 'di dag la/_/'dod chags la sogs 'jug
[\[206a.3\]]pa'o/_/rnam shes 'di las skyes pa yi/_/dngos po brtags pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/gzugs min phung po bzhi dang ni/_/'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams la/_/gcig tu mngon par bsdus pa nyid/_/'di la ming dang gzugs zhes brjod/_/de skyes mig la sogs pa ni/_/skye mched
[\[206a.4\]]drug gi ming can no/_/gsum rnams 'dus pa dag la ni/_/reg pa zhes su mngon par brjod/_/reg pa myong ba ma lus pa'i/_/bde sogs rnam pa'i rang bzhin can/_/tshor ba zhen pa sred pa ste/_/de ni 'dod pa'i rnam pa'o/_/sred pa nyid ni 'phel ba la/_/len pa zhes ni brjod pa
[\[206a.5\]]yin/_/len pa las ni srid pa ste/_/de la phung po dngos 'byung skye/_/phung po rnyings pa rga ba ste/_/yang ni nyams pa 'chi ba'o/_/rang nyid ces las shi 'dod pas/_/nang gi gdung ba mya ngan te/_/bde ba dran pa las byung ba'i/_/smre ba gang yin smre sngags 'don/_/sdug
[\[206a.6\]]bsngal rnam shes lnga po yi/_/lus 'byung mi bde tshor ba'o/_/de ltar mtha' gnyis las grol ba'i/_/rten cing 'brel ba'i mtshan nyid ni/_/sna tshogs mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar/_/phan tshun rgyu yis 'khor ba yi/_/sA lu ljang sogs mdo las ni/_/phyi dang nang gi dbye ba yis/_/
[\[206a.7\]]rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de/_/rnam pa gnyis su blta bya ste/_/rgyu dang rkyen gyi rgyu las ni/_/de ni slar yang rnam pa gnyis/_/de la dang po nang gi ni/_/rnam pa gnyis su dbye bya ste/_/ma rig la sogs phan tshun du/_/rgyu yi dngos por gnas pa dag_/de ni rgyu yi rgyur ni 'dir/_/bdag
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gis gong du bshad zin to/_/yang ni rkyen gyi rgyu dag nyid/_/sa dang chu dang me dang ni/_/rlung dang nam mkha' rnam shes rnams/_/gcig tu 'dus par gyur pa ste/_/lus la sa khams gang zhe na/_/sra ba 'dzin pa gang yin pa'o/_/rlan la sogs pa rjes 'dzin gang /_/de ni chu yi
[\[206b.2\]]khams su brjod/_/zos dang 'chos dang 'thungs pa dang /_/thams cad rim gyis 'ju byed pa'i/_/lus 'di dro ba'i mtshan nyid can/_/de ni me yi khams su bshad/_/bya ba bdun la rab 'jug pa'i/_/dbugs 'byung rngub pa'i bya ba dang /_/lus 'di la ni byed pa gang /_/de
[\[206b.3\]]ni rlung gi khams su bstan/_/lus 'di la ni yongs mthong ba'i/_/gang gi stong pa'i rang bzhin gang /_/kun gyi go skabs 'byed pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i khams zhes rjod par byed/_/rnam shes khams ni gang zhe na/_/'dir ni zag bcas yid gang dang /_/de bzhin rnam
[\[206b.4\]]shes lnga yi ni/_/tshogs na kun du sbyor ba'o/_/ming dang gzugs kyi myu gu yi/_/sa bon ngo bor gnas pa yi/_/nang gi bdag nyid rang bzhin la/_/rkyen gyi rgyu zhes brjod pa yin/_/de bzhin du/_rnam shes sa bon rang bzhin te/_/las ni zhing gi rang bzhin no/_/sred
[\[206b.5\]]pas rnam shes rlan byed de/_/ma rig pa ni sa bon 'debs/_/las ni 'di ltar bdag gi ni/_/'du byed las byung rang bzhin gyi/_/rnam shes sa bon dag bya dang /_/zhing gi bya ba byas mi sems/_/sred pa'ang 'di ltar bdag gis ni/_/rnam shes rlan zhes shes pa med/_/ma rig
[\[206b.6\]]pa yang 'di ltar bdag_/sa bon de ni gdab mi sems/_/sa bon rnam shes de la yang /_/rkyen 'di dag gis 'bad pa yis/_/bdag ni bskyed pa yin zhes pa'i/_/de lta'i shes pa yod ma yin/_/'on kyang rnam shes sa bon ni/_/las kyi zhing gis brten pa dang /_/srid
[\[206b.7\]]pa'i rlan gyis brlan pa dang /_/sa bon ma rig gis btab pas/_/skye ba de dang de dag dang /_/rim pa de dang de dag gis/_/ma yi dkur ni dus kyis su/_/ming gzugs myu gu bskyed pa ni/_/bdag las ma yin gzhan las min/_/dbang phyug gis kyang sprul min la/_/ming
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]dang gzugs kyi myu gu 'di/_/rgyu med las kyang skye ba min/_/de ltar bdag med chos rnams ni/_/sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid dag tu 'byung /_/rgyu dang rkyen ni tshogs pa las/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung 'gyur te/_/mig dang gzugs dang snang ba dang /_/de bzhin
[\[207a.2\]]nam mkha' de skyed yin/_/rgyu lnga dag ni tshogs pa las/_/mig gi rnam shes 'byung 'gyur la/_/rkyen 'di dag ni med pa na/_/mig gi rnam shes 'byung min ming /_/'di dag so so dag la ni/_/btsal na rnyed pa ma yin no/_/de ltar dbang po lhag ma las/_/skyes pa rnam shes
[\[207a.3\]]rim pa 'di/_/nam mkha' 'ja' tshon dag mtshungs par/_/rkyen ma rig las shes par bya/_/yang ni rkyen las byung ba de/_/mtshan nyid lnga ru shes bya ste/_/rtag dang chad dang bral ba dang /_/de bzhin 'pho ba spangs pa dang /_/yang ni rgyu ni chung ba las/_/'bras bu chen por
[\[207a.4\]]'byung ba dang /_/'dra ba dag dang ldan pa yi/_/rgyu mthun 'bras bu 'byung ba'o/_/gang phyir skye ba la phyogs pa'i/_/phung po dag ni 'chi ba la/_/phyogs pa 'byung ba de yi phyir/_/rtag pa min par 'di shes bya/_/chad min gang phyir phung po rnams/_/rgyu rnams yod pa dag dang ni/_/
[\[207a.5\]]med pa dag las skyed min phyir/_/srang mda'i mthon dman ci bzhin no/_/gang phyir phung po rigs mthun phyir/_/slar yang skye ba gzhan du ni/_/rigs mi mthun par skye 'gyur ba/_/de phyir 'pho ba las kyang min/_/gang phyir las chung byas pa las/_/'bras bu chen po 'byung 'gyur te/_/
[\[207a.6\]]de phyir rgyu ni chung ngu las/_/'bras bu chen por 'byung ba yin/_/gang phyir ci 'dra'i las byas pa/_/de yi gzugs brnyan mi 'dor ba/_/de 'dra'i rgyu ni 'byung bas na/_/des na rgyu dang 'dra bar brjod/_/chos gang 'jig rten 'di nas ni/_/gzhan du 'phel ba 'ga' med kyang /_/'on
[\[207a.7\]]kyang las dang 'bras bu dang /_/yod pa ru ni brtags pa yin/_/ma rig len pa sred pa zhes/_/byas pa nyon mongs bsdus pa ste/_/'du byed srid pa zhes bya ba/_/las kyi ming du shes par bya/_/rnam shes ming dang gzugs dang ni/_/de bzhin skye dang reg pa dang /_/rga shi dang ni
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]lhag ma dag_/sdug bsngal ming can 'du shes bya/_/stong pa nyid ni ston pa che/_/'og nas ston par 'gyur bas na/_/zlos pa'i skyon du thal 'gyur phyir/_/phyi yi mtshan nyid ma bstan to/_/gang gis 'gro ba'i rang bzhin rkyen las byung ba ru/_/ji lta ba bzhin 'di dag shes rab
[\[207b.2\]]kyis rtogs pa/_/phra ba'i blo ldan de yis de bzhin gshegs pa ni/_/kun gzhi dag dang yang dag ldan pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/'di dag ni gti mug la kun du spyod pa'i gnyen po'o//_//de ltar sems ni las rung bas/_/lus dang tshor ba nyid dang ni/_/sems dang de
[\[207b.3\]]bzhin chos rnams la/_/dran pa nyer gzhag gus pas bsgom/_/rkang lag byin pa brang dang sum mdo mgrin pa phrag pa lto ba brang /_/'gram pa rgyab dang nang khrol dang ni mgo bo'i tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i lus 'di ni/_/de bzhin slar yang kun nas nyon mongs so so'i dug can gnas su gyur
[\[207b.4\]]pa 'di/_/mi rtag pa zhes ku sha'i tse 'dra'i blo can rnams kyis legs pa'i don du spyad/_/yang dag min la brtags las gzhan/_/lus po 'di ni sngon gyi mtha'/_/gang zhig nas kyang 'ong ba yin/_/phyi ma'i mtha' yang 'gro min pas/_/thog ma tha ma dbus rnams su/_/gang yang
[\[207b.5\]]gnas pa med par brtag_/des na rtsad nas med pa yi/_/lus po 'di la yongs 'dzin med/_/de ltar cha yi tshogs 'di la/_/lus po don dam du med pas/_/mkhas pas lus po nam mkha' bzhin/_/rjes su dran pa rtag par gzhag_/de yang 'jig rten pa yi tha snyad du/_/grub
[\[207b.6\]]pa'i lus po dang ni phung po dang /_/khog pa dang ni gnas 'di zhes bya ba/_/'di dag ma lus glo bur ba yin no/_/lus la rjes dran bsgom pa las/_/sems can rnams kyi lus gzhan la/_/rang lus dang mtshungs bstan pa ru/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'du shes skye/_/snying po med pa'i
[\[207b.7\]]lus po las/_/lus dang longs spyod snying po dang /_/de bzhin 'tsho ba'i snying po ste/_/snying po gsum ni blang bar bgyi/_/bdag gi lus 'di mi rtag ces/_/sems can rnams kyi slob ma ru/_/'gyur bar bsgrub pa gang yin pa/_/de la lus kyi snying por brjod/_/lus gsob yin phyir
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]longs spyod la/_/gang zhig dga' bar mi byed pa/_/de ni thams cad gtong dang ldan/_/de yis longs spyod snying po 'thob/_/snying po med pa'i lus dran na/_/'tsho ba'i don du bdag nyid kyis/_/sdig pa'i las rnams byed min pa/_/de yis 'tsho ba'i
[\[208a.2\]]snying po 'thob/_/lus 'di rtag tu yongs su ma bskyangs na/_/'phel mi nus pas byis pa rnams dang mtshungs/_/khang pa rnying pa dang mtshungs lus po 'di/_/'bad pas legs par bskyangs nas gzung bar bya/_/bka' stsal mang bas rgyal po rnams dang mtshungs/_/
[\[208a.3\]]slu bar byed pa'i rang bzhin grib ma bzhin/_/shin tu 'bad pa'i sgo nas gzem dgos pas/_/lus 'di so ma btang ba'i bum pa mtshungs/_/chu bo chen po tshogs kyi rgyun 'bab bzhin/_/lus kyi tha ma 'chi ba'i mtsho la gtugs/_/mdung thung bzhin du sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i
[\[208a.4\]]rgyu/_/rtag tu phan mi byed pas dgra dang mtshungs/_/nam yang yid ches rdul phran tsam gyi yang /_/gnas med pas na rkun ma rnams dang mtshungs/_/reg pa'i bsran mi bzod pas rma dang mtshungs/_/sgyu ma bzhin du stong pa'i bdag nyid yin/_/ji ltar 'o ma yis ni bkrus gyur kyang /_/
[\[208a.5\]]sol ba nam yang dkar por 'gyur ma yin/_/gtsang zhing dag pas byi dor byas gyur kyang /_/de ltar lus kyi rang bzhin 'dor mi byed/_/des na bdag po med pa yi/_/'khrul 'khor lta bu'i lus po 'di/_/bza' btung sogs las byung ba'o/_/zhes rgyas par yang dang yang du brtag_/_
[\[208a.6\]]de dag ni lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o//_//de ltar rab tu bsgoms pa'i mthus/_/lus g.yeng rab tu zhi ba des/_/tshor ba dran pa nyer gzhag pa/_/brtan pa yis ni rnam par bsgom/_/de la log par mngon zhen las/_/tshor ba rnam pa gsum yin te/_/bde dang sdug
[\[208a.7\]]bsngal dang gzhan ni/_/bde min sdug bsngal min rig bya/_/'di la tshor byed 'ga' med cing /_/tshor ba'i dngos po yod min pas/_/rten cing 'brel ba las byung ba'i/_/tshor ba 'di ni bdag med pa'o/_/de ltar nam mkha'i dngos gyur pa/_/gang zhig la ni zhen byed pa/_/de ni rmongs
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pas chu nang gi_/zla ba len par 'dod pa yin/_/de bzhin sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa/_/gang zhig phyir zhing 'joms byed pa/_/de ni rmongs pas mig nang gi_/gzugs brnyan kha la 'o byed yin/_/rmongs pa gang zhig bde min zhing /_/sdug bsngal yang min rig pa ste/_/'gro tshe rtsal
[\[208b.2\]]reg pa la/_/gzung bar mngon par rlom dang mtshungs/_/gzhan yang tshor ba thams cad la/_/ming gzhan du byas 'khor ba ste/_/chos yang dag par bsdus pa'i mdor/_/kun mkhyen rang nyid kyis gsungs pa/_/nyer len dang ni phyin ci log_/nye bar dmigs dang yongs su 'dzin/_/
[\[208b.3\]]tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed pa/_/tshor ba yin zhes nges par gsungs/_/'di ltar gang tshe sdug bsngal gyis/_/byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa/_/de tshe sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i/_/sems can rnams la brtse bas dmigs/_/gang gi tshe na thugs rje can/_/tshor ba bde ba myong
[\[208b.4\]]byed pa/_/de tshe chags pas gdungs rnams la/_/de yi brtse ba cher drag skye/_/gang tshe bde min sdug bsngal min/_/rgyal ba'i sras pos myong byed pa/_/de tshe rmongs par bying rnams la/_/'di yi brtse ba shas cher 'phel/_/'ga' zhig byang chub sems dpa' la/_/mngon du gyur par skye
[\[208b.5\]]gyur pa/_/de nyid kyi tshe dmigs med pas/_/dmigs pa byas pa lta bur skye/_/mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin pas na/_/tshor ba nyid la sred par brjod/_/gang tshe de nyid mi gnas pa/_/de tshe mya ngan 'das par brjod/_/de dag ni tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o//_//de ltar
[\[208b.6\]]gus par tshor ba la/_/dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom byas te/_/de yi rjes la 'bad pa yis/_/sems rjes dran pa nyer gzhag bsgom/_/mi gtsang gtsang bar 'du shes pas/_/sems ni sbrang ma rnams dang mtshungs/_/sdug bsngal thams cad bskyed pas na/_/sdang ba'i dgra bo dang
[\[208b.7\]]yang mtshungs/_/'dod pa sngar bag yud tsam la/_/bde ba nyid du 'du shes dang /_/mchil pa'i gzan la chags pa yi/_/nya yi lce dang de yang mtshungs/_/gzhan dag rnams la glags tshol phyir/_/mdangs 'phrog gnod sbyin dang yang mtshungs/_/dge ba'i nor rnams 'phrog
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/de ni chom rkun dang yang mtshungs/_/sems ni skad cig nyid tsam gyis/_/'jig pa'i phyir na glog dang mtshungs/_/rkyen la rag las skyes pa'i phyir/_/mar me'i 'od kyi rgyun dang mtshungs/_/sems ni sdod pa ma yin pas/_/chu bo chen po'i
[\[209a.2\]]rgyun dang mtshungs/_/nyon mongs glo bur ba rnams kyi/_/bsgribs pas sems ni mkha' dang mtshungs/_/'di ltar gzugs la dmigs nas gzugs rnams la/_/dga' ba phye ma leb kyi mig dang mtshungs/_/sgra la dga' bas sems ni mngon pa yi/_/klu la snyan pa'i e na ya
[\[209a.3\]]dang mtshungs/_/sems ni mar nag snod kyis reg pa la/_/dga' bas chags pa'i sbrang ma rnams dang mtshungs/_/ro la dga' bas zas kyi lhag ma la/_/brkam zhing chags pa'i bran mo rnams dang mtshungs/_/dri la dga' bas mi gtsang phung po la/_/shugs drag rgyug pa'i phag
[\[209a.4\]]phrug rnams dang mtshungs/_/de lta na yang brtags shing dpyad pa na/_/sems de gang nas kyang ni rnyed ma yin/_/'das pa'i sems ni 'gags pa yin pas med/_/ma 'ongs sems ni ma thob pas yod min/_/da ltar gnas pa bcings nas yod min te/_/gang ltar yang de tshad
[\[209a.5\]]ma'i dpyad byar med/_/sems de shin tu 'bad pas btsal gyur kyang /_/'das pa yod min da lta ba yang med/_/ma 'ongs pa yang yod min de ltar na/_/de ni dus gsum dag las 'das par 'dod/_/gang zhig dus gsum las ni 'das pa de/_/yod pa nyid ma yin zhing med pa'ang
[\[209a.6\]]min/_/de ltar mtha' gnyis las ni rnam grol ba/_/de ni gang gi'ang spyod yul ma yin no/_/sems ni gang na'ang dga' med cing /_/gang na'ang mi dga' yod min te/_/nam mkha' bzhin du ma skyes pa/_/sun phyung ma yin rmongs bya min/_/slar yang 'di yi rang bzhin 'bad
[\[209a.7\]]btsal na/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rnams la ni/_/gang yang gang du'ang nam yang ma mthong ba'i/_/sems kyi rgyun de 'dod par bya ba'am ci/_/dmigs pa las ni sems skye ba/_/re zhig 'di ltar brtag bya ste/_/dmigs pa las ni tha dad dam/_/tha mi dad ces yongs
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]su brtag_/tha dad mngon par khas len na/_/khams gsum thams cad sems med 'gyur/_/tha mi dad na bdag nyid la/_/nang gi bya ba bzlog par dka'/_/'dzub mo'i rtse mo de nyid kyis/_/de nyid la reg nus ma yin/_/de bzhin ral gri'i so de yis/_/de nyid gcod par nus ma
[\[209b.2\]]yin/_/legs par bslabs kyang rang nyid kyis/_/phrag pa la ni 'gong min ltar/_/sems kyis sems ni reg min zhes/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/drag la 'khor zhing 'tshubs pa'i rlung dmar ltar/_/yid kyi rgyu ba shin tu rtogs dka' 'di/_/gang gis de
[\[209b.3\]]las bde gshegs dpal 'byung ba'i/_/zhi gnas la ni 'bad pas rnam par bsgrubs/_/rtse gcig rnam par ma 'phros dang /_/ma yengs pa dang rab tu zhi/_/zhi gnas kun du gnas pa'o zhes/_/sems rjes dran pa rgyas par bsgom/_/sems kyi chos nyid mi spong zhing /_/de
[\[209b.4\]]bzhin rnam par sbyong ba'ang min/_/sems 'di sgyu ma lta bu zhes/_/bya ba sems kyi chos nyid do/_/gang dag dngos kun yongs btang nas/_/sangs rgyas zhing du yongs dag par/_/rab tu bsngo ba de rang gi_/sems kyi rnam par sbyor bar gsungs/_/de dag ni sems dran pa nye bar
[\[209b.5\]]gzhag pa'o//_//de ltar sems rjes dran pa nyer gzhag la/_/yang dag gnas nas chos dran nyer gzhag bsgom/_/de ni mdor na chos rnams thams cad la/_/spong len spangs nas 'bad med rtogs pa yin/_/nyon mongs rnams la yang dag tu snang ba/_/'dod chags yod
[\[209b.6\]]min zhe sdang yod ma yin/_/gti mug yod min zhi ba yod ma yin/_/'dus pa yod min phung po'ang yod ma yin/_/de ltar rtogs pas don dam du spyad na/_/kun nyon mongs med rnam byang yod min pa/_/de ltar chos rnams yin zhes nges pa gang /_/de 'dir chos rjes dran par yang dag
[\[209b.7\]]brjod/_/de ltar chos rnams sus thos pa/_/de yis chos dang sangs rgyas dang /_/byang chub dang ni lam rnams dang /_/chos kun tha dad mthong ma yin/_/slar yang nyon mongs kun la 'di/_/bcos ma'i 'du shes skyed byed pa/_/de bzhin chos gzhan rnams la yang /_/sgyu ma'i rnam par
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]rab tu brtag_/nges 'byed de bzhin nyid kyi bcud kyis ni/_/phug nas chos rnams thams cad yongs su rtog_/rab rib sgrib pa ma lus rnams spangs pa/_/de ni thugs rje chen pos rgyan du byed/_/ji ltar me dang 'bru mar sdong bu dang /_/kong bu rnams las mi
[\[210a.2\]]yis me mar mthong /_/de ltar rkyen rnams las skyes chos rnams la/_/stong nyid snying po can zhes tha snyad byed/_/chos rnams thams cad mdor bsdu na/_/phung po khams dang skye mched de/_/rkyen la rag las skye bzhin du/_/'pho ba spangs nas yod ma yin/_/ji ltar rgya
[\[210a.3\]]la brten nas ni/_/gang du rgya yi rjes mthong ba/_/rgya de 'phos pa ma yin zhing /_/de med par yang med bzhin no/_/bdag dang gang zag shed bu gso ba po/_/srog dang shed skyes byed pa tshor ba po/_/gang yang cung zad mtha' gcig tu med pa'i/_/nyon mongs des gang 'ching
[\[210a.4\]]byed grol bar byed/_/'di rnams thams cad ming gis stong pa'i phyir/_/chos rnams thams cad ming des stong pa yin/_/sna tshogs rang bzhin ming gis gang brjod pa/_/de ni kun rdzob bden par 'phags pas gsungs/_/rang bzhin gang zhig ming gis brjod pa de/_/rdzogs
[\[210a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyis ma gsan gzigs ma yin/_/skye med 'gag pa med pa'i rang bzhin phyir/_/'jig rten 'di ni brda tsam las la min/_/de dag ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so//_//de ltar sems las rung nas des/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtshor bying ba yi/_/
[\[210a.6\]]'gron gdon pa yi bsam pa yis/_/stong nyid rab tu gsal byas pa'i/_/yon tan dpag tu med pa ni/_/mdo sde zla ba sgron ma las/_/yon tan rin chen gyis rab brtan/_/stong nyid mthong ba bde bar gshegs pa yi/_/bslab pa'i lam la nges par ldog ma yin/_/rang
[\[210a.7\]]bzhin gyis ni dbang por gyur pas na/_/nam yang bud med dbang du 'gyur ma yin/_/yun mi ring bar lhar bcas 'jig rten 'dir/_/'di nyid rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur/_/yang dag chos rnams nges par shes nas ni/_/ngan song du ni ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/mngon par shes pa lnga yang thob par 'gyur/_/chos rnams la bdag med pa dang /_/de bzhin rang bzhin med pa dang /_/las dang 'bras bu ji lta bar/_/'brel pa la yang 'gal ba med/_/byang chub sems kyi spyod pa dang /_/mthong ba'i chos la 'gal med ces/_/
[\[210b.2\]]de skad yab sras mjal ba las/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis gsungs/_/khams drug reg pa'i skye mched drug_/yid kyis nye bar spyod pa ni/_/bco brgyad po rnams 'dus pa la/_/re zhig skyes bu zhes brjod do/_/rnam shes nam mkha' rlung dang me/_/chu dang sa rnams
[\[210b.3\]]ma lus pa/_/lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis/_/sna tshogs 'dzin par byed phyir khams/_/rnam par shes las skye zhes brjod/_/de ni rgyun du mched byed pa'i/_/mig la sogs pa rnam drug po/_/de dag skye mched du brjod do/_/gzugs rnams mthong ba'i
[\[210b.4\]]mig la ni/_/reg pa'i skye mched du 'dod de/_/rang rang gis don gsal byed phyir/_/skye mched lhag ma'ang de bzhin no/_/mig la sogs pa rang rang gis/_/reg pa drug 'dir skyed par byed/_/so sor yid bde la sogs pa'i/_/dbye ba de ni rnam pa drug_/de ltar yid
[\[210b.5\]]kyi nye ba ni/_/spyod pa bco brgyad gsal bar brjod/_/'di rnams kun du tshogs pa dang /_/'dus pa skyes bu zhes bya'o/_/gang zhig nang gi sra ba nyid/_/lus 'di la ni dmigs pa yi/_/sen mo so sogs dbye ba ni/_/nang gi sa yi khams yin no/_/gang yang phyi yi 'jam
[\[210b.6\]]pa dang /_/cung zad sra ba nyid mthong ba'i/_/sa 'dzin sogs byed gang yin pa/_/de ni spyi yi khams yin no/_/nang gi bdag nyid skye bzhin pa/_/'di ni gang nas kyang 'ongs min/_/de bzhin 'gag pa'i tshe na yang /_/gang du'ang nyams par 'gyur ba med/_/de ltar bud med
[\[210b.7\]]rnams kyis slar/_/nang du bud med nga zhes rtog_/brtags nas slar yang phyi rol du/_/skyes pa'o zhes mngon par rlom/_/de nas yang dag chags sems de/_/skyes pa dang ni lhan cig tu/_/phrad par 'dod cing rtse ba dang /_/za bar 'dod na shas cher spro/_/skyes pa'ang de bzhin
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]nang 'di la/_/skyes pa'o zhes rtog byed cing /_/ma rig stobs kyis bskyed pa yi/_/grong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa 'byung /_/des na de gnyis bde ba ni/_/'dod pas dben par song nas ni/_/gang gis nur nur po bskyed pa'i/_/sbyor ba de 'dra byed par 'gyur/_/de la
[\[211a.2\]]brtags pa gang yin dang /_/rtog pa las byung kun rtog gang /_/yang dag min par brtags las gzhan/_/de dag rang bzhin gyis grub min/_/de bzhin mo la bud med med/_/skyes pa la yang skyes pa med/_/snyoms par 'jug na snyoms pa med/_/nur nur la yang nur nur med/_/
[\[211a.3\]]nur nur rang bzhin med gyur pa/_/de tshe yang dag ji bzhin rig_/de gnyis yod par ma gyur phyir/_/skye ba med pa yin zhes gnas/_/ma skyes pa yis ji ltar na/_/sra ba nyid ni skye bar 'gyur/_/des na yod min kun rtog las/_/sra nyid 'byung bar shes par bya/_/phyi rol gyi ni
[\[211a.4\]]sa yi khams/_/lcags ri dang ni ri dbang po/_/ri bo mchog rab la sogs pa/_/'jig rten khams rnams ma lus pa'o/_/de yi srid pa nyid gang de/_/'ongs pa med cing 'gro ba med/_/khams yin no zhes 'jig rten pa'i/_/tha snyad byed pa tsam du zad/_/gang gi tshe na sa
[\[211a.5\]]chen 'di/_/me yis yongs su bsregs nas ni/_/chu rnams kyis ni rnam par bkrus/_/rlung gis shin tu gtor gyur pa/_/de tshe mar nag bsregs pa'am/_/mar gsar bsregs la ji bzhin du/_/sdong ro yi ni phye ma'am/_/thal rjes tsam yang med par rung /_/de ltar sa yi
[\[211a.6\]]khams kyi ni/_/skye ba stong pa nges pa ltar/_/de bzhin gnas dang stongs pa yang /_/rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa yin/_/yang ni chu khams gang zhe na/_/lus kyi rngul dang mchi ma gcin/_/snabs mkhris khrag tshil 'o ma rnag_/gzhan yang gsher ba gang yod pa'o/_/de la
[\[211a.7\]]mya ngan zug rngu dang /_/byams dang phrad las mchi ma 'byung /_/bsod nams ldan pa la la la/_/chos kyi shugs kyis 'byung ba yin/_/de yang gang nas kyang 'ongs min/_/bskams tshe gang du'ang song ba med/_/byung ngo bskams so zhes pa yang /_/tha snyad 'jug pa tsam du bas/_/
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]gang tshe sprin stug chu rgyun gyis/_/'jig rten 'di ni 'jig byed cing /_/sa chen tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar/_/rgya mtsho gcig tu byas gyur pa/_/de tshe de 'dra'i chu yi tshogs/_/gang zhig nas ni 'ongs par 'gyur/_/nyi ma bcu gnyis me yis ni/_/bskams nas brlag tshe gang du
[\[211b.2\]]song /_/gzhan la ltos nas byung ba yi/_/khams gzhan rnams kyi skye ba dang /_/gnas pa dang ni 'jig pa yang /_/de ltar dngos med shes par bya/_/sa sogs 'byung ba bzhi po la/_/brten pa'i dang ba gang yin pa/_/mched cing 'di gsal byed pa'i phyir/_/mig gi skye
[\[211b.3\]]mched du brjod do/_/sa yi khams kyi dang ba 'dir/_/mig gi skye mched du mi 'dod/_/de bzhin chu dang me dang ni/_/rlung khams dang ba 'dod ma yin/_/de ltar de ni brtag bzod pa'i/_/mig gi skye mched 'ga' yang med/_/tha snyad tsam las ma gtogs pa/_/'di dag bya
[\[211b.4\]]ba dang bral yin/_/khams rnams so so snang ba la/_/dang ba 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa'i phyir/_/dang ba de dngos gang zhig yin/_/des na mig gi skye mched la/_/thog ma med cing tha ma med/_/rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyis na/_/gnas kyang
[\[211b.5\]]dmigs pa ma yin no/_/gang zhig rang bzhin dang bral te/_/skyes pa ma yin bud med min/_/rlom sems rlom sems min pa yang /_/rang bzhin gyis ni dgag pa nyid/_/mdo rjes 'brangs nas rigs pa 'dis/_/rna ba sogs la'ang shes bya ste/_/de dag rnams kyi rtogs
[\[211b.6\]]pa'ang mthar/_/chos kyi dbyings la thug phyir ro/_/mig ni yul gzugs las min zhes/_/gsungs pa yin pa de yi phyir/_/gzugs rnams nyid la dmigs pa'i mig_/gzugs rnams la ni thogs dang bcas/_/de ltar sgra la sogs pa la/_/dmigs pa'i rna ba la
[\[211b.7\]]sogs pa/_/rang rang yul la thogs bcas zhes/_/yul dngos rim pas shes par bya/_/mthun pa la sogs dbye ba tha dad pa'i/_/gzugs rnams la ni dmigs par byed pa'i mig_/mthun pa las ni sdug par 'du shes shing /_/mi mthun pa la mi sdug par 'du shes/_/mthun
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]pa ma yin mi mthun pa yang min/_/gzugs la btang snyoms tshul byas 'du shes te/_/de ltar yid kyis chos rab rim bzhin du/_/rang blo rab tu gsal ba las mtshon bya/_/de ltar drug la so sor gsum gsum du/_/phye ba las 'dir yid kyis nye ba ru/_/spyod pa rab
[\[212a.2\]]tu brtags pa'i yid kyis ni/_/nyes par spyod pa bco brgyad du gsungs so/_/de ltar khams sogs rang bzhin gyis/_/sgyu ma lta bur shes byas nas/_/kun la chags pa las grol ba/_/sprul pa'i glang chen bzhin du spyad/_/rmi lam gzhon nu ma dang phrad pa yi/_/dga' bde nyams
[\[212a.3\]]myong gnyid log sad pa'i tshe/_/'di na byis pa'i rigs can las gzhan min/_/de ltar zhen cing kun du chags pa des/_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dbye ba yis/_/'dod chags las ni rab tu skyes pa'i las/_/rnam pa bcu ni mngon par 'du byed do/_/gang zhig mngon par 'dus
[\[212a.4\]]byas pa/_/de kun gdod nas rab mi gnas/_/gang phyir phyi rol nang dag la/_/ma brten pas na gnas pa med/_/gzhan yang ji ltar tha mar 'gag pa yi/_/rnam shes de ltar dang po'i rnam shes skyed/_/las dang dmigs pa'i dbang por gyur pa ni/_/nyin mtshan 'gro ba rnams
[\[212a.5\]]la so sor sbyar/_/rang bzhin mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir/_/sems kyi rgyun ni rab tu 'jug na yang /_/gang du bde dang sdug bsngal spyod pa yi/_/rnam par smin pa yang dag myong bar byed/_/shes 'gag tha ma gang yin pa/_/de la 'chi 'phor 'dod pa yin/_/dang po'i rnam
[\[212a.6\]]shes 'byung ba la/_/'dir ni skye bar 'dod pa'ang yin/_/de lta bas na shes pa'i dang po ni/_/skye ba'i tshe na gang nas kyang 'ongs min/_/de ni nges par 'gag pa'i tshe na yang /_/gang du song ba'ang spungs nas yod ma yin/_/de ltar dang po'i rnam shes dang /_/las rnams
[\[212a.7\]]kyis ni skye ba dag_/rang bzhin stong phyir gang nas kyang /_/'ongs pa'am gang du'ang song ba med/_/thog ma tha ma gnyis kyi ni/_/shes pa shes pa nyid kyis stong /_/de bzhin du ni 'chi 'pho yang /_/'chi 'pho'i rang bzhin nyid kyis stong /_/de lta'ang bde sdug sogs kyi ni/_/
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]dbye bas bkag pa med pa yi/_/sna tshogs las kun rnam smin dang /_/so sor rig pa shes par byed/_/'jig rten pa yi spyod pa yi/_/ming dang brda tsam nyid las gzhan/_/yang dag brtag byar bzod pa yi/_/byed po med cing za po med/_/ji ltar rmi lam spyod yul
[\[212b.2\]]du/_/dgra dang g.yul ngor dgye nas ni/_/sad tshe zhen par gyur zhe na/_/de 'di mkhas par brjod dam ci/_/de bzhin shes rab 'chal pa yi/_/rigs can mig gi spyod yul ni/_/yid mi bde bar brten pa la/_/bltas nas mngon zhen dang ldan 'gyur/_/de nas rab tu
[\[212b.3\]]rlag pa yi/_/ngan pas 'dod chags las byung las/_/rnam pa bcu gnyis sngar bzhin du/_/slar yang mngon par 'du byed do/_/btang snyoms gnas la bltas nas ni/_/gang zhig gzugs la zhen pa yi/_/rmongs pa de yis sngar bzhin du/_/las ni rnam bcu
[\[212b.4\]]sog par byed/_/de bzhin so sor rnam pa gsum/_/sgra la sogs pa'ang shes par bya/_/gang gi rmi lam snang ba bzhin/_/snang ba 'di ni skye ba med/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam dbye ba yis/_/'dir ni bden pa rnam gnyis rgyal bas gsungs/_/stong nyid legs par
[\[212b.5\]]mthong ba gang yin pa/_/de la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces brjod/_/'jig rten pa yi spyod pa la/_/mgon pos 'jig rten kun rdzob gzigs/_/don dam sna tshogs shes pa yi/_/spyod pa las ni shin tu 'das/_/rgyu med rnam par shes pa med/_/brda yod ma yin
[\[212b.6\]]rten yod min/_/phung po lnga min de las gzhan/_/don dam pa yi mtshan nyid min/_/shin tu zab par gyur don stong nyid de/_/rim gyis yang dag sgrol ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid/_/'gro ba dang ba bskyed phyir 'di kun rdzob/_/thugs rje cher grags thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs/_/gzhan yang
[\[212b.7\]]rten med pas na 'jig rten pa'i/_/chos rnams kyis kyang dga' bar mi byed de/_/skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin brgyad po yis/_/stong nyid gang yin dngos su ston par byed/_/mdor na sems ni sbyang ba'i phyir/_/gzhan la gus par bya ba dang /_/bdag nyid la ni brnyas pa ste/_/gzhan
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]yang 'di gnyis 'bad pas bsgom/_/gzhan bde gzhan ni ma yin na/_/gzhan la dngos su brnyas byed ltar/_/gom pa gnyi ga de lta bur/_/nus par 'gyur ba dka' ba med/_/gal te rtag tu phung po rnams/_/mnyam pa nyid du yod 'dod na/_/de tshe gcig
[\[213a.2\]]la bdag nyid dang /_/gzhan nyid ji ltar sbyar bar bya/_/yod min pa yi dmigs pa la'ang /_/de ltar yul can spyod pa ni/_/thog ma med pa nas rtogs pa/_/goms pa'i phyir na dka' ba med/_/chags la rag las skyes pa ni/_/khong khro rjes chags yin pa'i phyir/_/chags
[\[213a.3\]]pa spangs las myur du ni/_/sems kyi dga' ba rab tu skye/_/gang la khong khro chags yod pa/_/de la gzhan la smod pa dang /_/ser sna brkam chags nga rgyal sogs/_/thams cad 'bad med 'byung mi khegs/_/de dag ni bdag gi lus dag pa'o//_//yang dag
[\[213a.4\]]'tsho ba sbyangs pa yis/_/'dir ni longs spyod dag par 'dod/_/chos kyi longs spyod tshol ba ni/_/yang dag 'tsho ba sbyong ba ni/_/mkhas pas sbyin bdag las legs len pa ni/_/rnyed pa'i don du spyod lam 'chos mi byed/_/gnya' shing gang tsam las ni mi blta zhing /_/gom pa
[\[213a.5\]]rim gyis bdal nas 'dor mi byed/_/byang chub sems dpas ngag kyang gcam bu dang /_/'jam par bskyungs shing nam yang smra mi byed/_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti'i don dag tu/_/de ni mthun 'jug nam yang byed ma yin/_/tshig tu 'dod pa chung bar byas nas ni/_/sems la
[\[213a.6\]]sred pa chen po skyed na ni/_/nang du gdung bar byed pa 'di las gzhan/_/'dir ni lhag pa yod pa ma yin no/_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti'i rgyu mtshan du/_/dbang po sdom par byed pa tshul 'chos yin/_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti'i rgyu mtshan du/_/gsong por snyan par smra byed kha gsag yin/_/
[\[213a.7\]]tshul 'chos kha gsag spangs pa ni/_/'tsho ba dag pa nyid yin pas/_/g.yo zol sgyu thabs spangs pa las/_/longs spyod dag par shes par bya/_/de dag ni longs spyod dag pa'o//_//gang tshe sbyin pa la sogs lnga/_/stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can/_/rnam pa kun nas
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]byed gyur pa/_/de tshe bsod nams dag pa yin/_/rgyu dang ldan pa mtshan ma dang /_/yid nyid rnam par dag pa dang /_/bdag dang bdag gir byed pa rnams/_/dag pas sbyin pa dag pa yin/_/gtong ba'i tshe na yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/kun mkhyen nyid du yongs su sngo byed cing /_/'bras bu la ni
[\[213b.2\]]phyogs par mi byed na/_/sbyin pa'i dag pa mkha' dang mnyam skyed yin/_/brtse bas gang sbyin sbyin pa dag pa yin/_/rang lag gis sbyin sbyin pa dag pa yin/_/gzhan phan gang sbyin sbyin pa dag pa yin/_/dug mtshon min gang sbyin pa dag pa yin/_/'o na drag shul can zhus las/_/gang
[\[213b.3\]]gis gang zhig gang gi tshe/_/mkho ba de la de sbyin zhes/_/gsungs pa dang ni 'gal zhe na/_/de min spyi mdo las gzhan par/_/de ni bkag pa yin phyir ro/_/thugs rje can gyi sems can ni/_/bsdu bar bya phyir bkag pa gnang /_/thugs rje dang ni ldan pa yis/_/dad pa bskyed thabs
[\[213b.4\]]gzhan med na/_/gang gis bsdu ba'i sems can la/_/mthong nas chang sogs sbyin pa gnang /_/gang zhig gzhan la gnod de sbyin ngan yin/_/gang zhig dus min byin de sbyin ngan yin/_/de dag ni sbyin pa dag pa'o//_//sems can kun la rlom byed pas/_/tshul khrims brtul
[\[213b.5\]]zhugs mchog 'dzin dang /_/lta ba rnam par dag pa yis/_/yang ni tshul khrims dag pa bskyed/_/nyan thos bse ru la sogs rnams spangs te/_/rnam par ma nyams sems kyis ni/_/chos rnams kun la mkha' dang mnyam pa yi/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[213b.6\]]khong khro rnam par spangs pa las/_/bzod pa'i dag pa skye bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad la/_/mnyam pa nyid kyis sems pa la/_/thang shing gi ni nags bcad kyang /_/khro med mun pa med pa ltar/_/byang chub sems dpa' bcad kyang ni/_/bzod pa dag pas de bzhin no/_/
[\[213b.7\]]gzugs brnyan dang ni mtshungs pa ru/_/rang gi lus la yang dag lta/_/ngag la'ang brjod du med par lta/_/de bzhin shin tu zhi ba yi/_/shes par sems la lta byed na/_/brtson 'grus dag pa rab tu 'thob/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung sbyor ba yis/_/brtson 'grus dag pa bla na med/_/de
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]bzhin brtse ba chen po'i sems/_/byin gyi rlabs kyis byin brlabs pa'i/_/byams pa'i go cha'i tshogs kyis ni/_/dgra yi dpung tshogs rnam par 'joms/_/rnam kun med na mi 'byung ba'i/_/de bzhin nyid don mthong ba las/_/bsgrim mi dgos par bstan gyur pas/_/
[\[214a.2\]]bsam gtan dag pa bla na med/_/rnam kun mchog dang ldan pa yi/_/stong nyid gang zhig yin par 'dod/_/ce na byang chub phyogs kyi chos/_/thams cad ma spangs gang yin dang /_/tshad med rnam pa bzhi dang ni/_/bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam dgu dang /_/pha rol phyin pa rnam drug dang /_/mtshan
[\[214a.3\]]dpe rnams kyang ma spangs pa'o/_/rang bzhin zhi ba nyid yin yang /_/nyon mongs las kyis zhi ma yin/_/chos rnams btang snyoms nyid yin yang /_/rang mtshan de bzhin nyid la rmongs/_/'gro don bya bas 'brel gyur kyang /_/bya ba snying po yod ma yin/_/rang bzhin bsil
[\[214a.4\]]ba nyid gyur kyang /_/rab tu 'bar bar sems can 'tshed/_/de ltar phyogs tsam bstan pa yis/_/bsam gtan dag pa yongs su brjod/_/shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/_/dag pa de ltar rnam par bsgom/_/de dag ni bsod nams dag pa mdor bsdus pa'o//_//_
[\[214a.5\]]len par byed pa rab mang la/_/bsags pa 'di ni nyung gyur na/_/da ni gsum gyi spel ba yang /_/nyung zad rnam par bshad pa ni/_/'di ltar sangs rgyas mdzad tshim byed/_/sangs rgyas nyid 'dir 'dod pa yin/_/gzhan du dag pa tsam gyis ni/_/nyan thos rnams dang
[\[214a.6\]]mtshungs par 'gyur/_/bdag lus spel ba gang zhe na/_/stobs dang brtson 'grus spel ba'o/_/stobs ni mi nus med pa ste/_/rgyu bcu las ni stobs de 'byung /_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' yis/_/lus dang srog la bab gyur kyang /_/dam chos nam yang mi gtong ba/_/
[\[214a.7\]]de ni stobs kyi rgyu gcig yin/_/rgyal ba 'phel ba med par ni/_/sems can kun la phyag byed dang /_/nyam chung rnams la bzod pa yis/_/kha zas rab mchog ster ba dang /_/nad pa rnams ni gso ba dang /_/sems can phongs par gyur rnams la/_/longs spyod
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]gtong bar byed pa rnams/_/de bzhin bde gshegs mchod rten la/_/rdo thal 'byug par byed pa dang /_/sems can kun la thams cad nas/_/dga' bas smra bar byed pa dang /_/phongs pas sdug bsngal gyur rnams la/_/longs spyod dgod par byed pa dang /_/sems can
[\[214b.2\]]ngal dub can rnams kyi/_/khur bu khur bar byed pa po/_/phyag na rdo rje stobs mthong bas/_/ngo mtshar skyes nas ma skyes dgras/_/zhus nas thub pas stobs kyi rgyu/_/rnam pa bcu ni gsungs pa yin/_/brtson 'grus spel bar gang brjod de/_/le lo med par spel ba yin/_/'di
[\[214b.3\]]la yang dag rdzogs pa yi/_/bla med byang chub thob mi dka'/_/snyom las can gyis nyan thos kyi/_/mya ngan 'das pa'ang mi 'grub na/_/'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs pa yi/_/sangs rgyas myang 'das smos ci dgos/_/de dag ni bdag gi lus spel ba'o//_//stong nyid
[\[214b.4\]]snying rje'i snying po can/_/sbyin las longs spyod spel ba ste/_/rdo rje gcod pa la sogs su/_/sbyin pa de ltar rgyas par gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpas gang gi tshe/_/rab tu mi gnas sbyin btang ba/_/bsod nams de yi phung po'i tshad/_/gzung bar nus pa ma yin no/_/yang
[\[214b.5\]]dag rab tu rtsol ba dang /_/bsam pa brtan par byas nas ni/_/thog mar snying rje bskyed nas su/_/dge ba 'bad pas spel bar bya/_/rtag par rab tu ngu ba ltar/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa ni/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi chos kyi rgyu/_/rtsol ba 'di ltar shes par bya/_/'phags pa gzhon
[\[214b.6\]]nu nor bzangs kyis/_/'jig rten pa yi dam pa'i las/_/sngon bsags bye ba snyed bzung nas/_/'phags pa byams pa'i drung phyin ltar/_/'das pa'i lus ni bye ba snyed/_/'bras bu med min bsams nas ni/_/de ltar byung ba'i lus po yang /_/rnam par dag pa bla med bsam/_/dga'
[\[214b.7\]]ba rgya chen dang ba yi/_/shugs kyis rgya mtsho rab 'phel zhing /_/khyad par du ni 'gro ba'i phyir/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan par byed/_/'gro don rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyur/_/grogs med gnyis pa med kyang ni/_/go cha chen po'i sbyor bar ldan/_/gzhan
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]yang /_'di na bdag nyid gcig pu ste/_/gzhan yang stobs bcas bdud kyi tshogs/_/bdag gis byang chub chen po'i lam/_/'thob la gal te gags 'byung srid/_/de lta'ang de dag sems kyi ni/_/skad cig gcig gis nges bcom nas/_/rdo rje'i rang bzhin sa gzhi la/_/bdag
[\[215a.2\]]gis slar yang bsdad par bya/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/rtsa ba bsam pa yin par gsungs/_/bsam pa med na bde gshegs kyi/_/yon tan rnams ni thag bsrings nas/_/lag pa dang ni rkang pa dag_/med na 'gro 'ong med pa dag_/yan lag mchog gi mgo med na/_/
[\[215a.3\]]'gro ba rnams kyi srog med dang /_/bud shing med par gyur na yang /_/me yi 'bar ba med pa ltar/_/de bzhin bsam pa med na yang /_/sangs rgyas chos dang phrad pa med/_/bsam pa yang dag dag gyur pa'i/_/chos kyi sgra ni nam mkha'i dkyil nas 'byung /_/bsam pa dag na shing dang ni/_/rtsig
[\[215a.4\]]pa las kyang gdams ngag rjes bstan 'byung /_/'dir ni dge ba spel ba yi/_/yang ni snying rje rab bsgom par/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams ma lus pa'i/_/sngon du 'gro bar deng 'dod do/_/de lta yin pas rgyal ba yi/_/sras po mkhas pa yis ni chos/_/mang po la ni mi bslab ste/_/chos
[\[215a.5\]]gcig la ni bslab bya zhing /_/chos gcig la ni legs par brten/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams mtha' yas pa/_/de las kun du 'byung ngo zhes/_/chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_/gcig pu brtse chen ldan pas gsungs/_/ji ltar 'khor los sgyur ba de'i/_/dpung tshogs yan lag
[\[215a.6\]]bzhi pa ni/_/'khor lo rin chen rjes 'brang bzhin/_/sangs rgyas chos ni brtse rjes 'brang /_/yon tan dang ldan bu gcig pa'i/_/rkang la thug par pha brtse ba/_/de bzhin lus can rnams la yang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i brtse bas khyab/_/'khor ba'i rgyun las sems can rnams/_/
[\[215a.7\]]kun nas gdon par 'dod pa yi/_/dmigs pa'i dbye bas snying rje de/_/slar yang rnam pa gsum du dbye/_/byung nas 'byung dang 'byung bzhin pa'i/_/sdug 'jigs bdag nyid mi 'dod pa/_/bsgoms nas dga' ba la sogs pa/_/snying rje byams pa bzhin du bsgom/_/snying rje la
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]sogs de dag de lta bur/_/phan tshun rjes su 'brel pas bsod nams 'phel/_/phung po gsum pa rtag par bton pas kyang /_/bsod nams rab 'phel spungs phyir phung po yin/_/sdig pa bshags dang sangs rgyas la/_/gsol 'debs bsod nams rnams la ni/_/rjes yi
[\[215b.2\]]rangs rnams bsod nams kyi/_/phung po yin phyir phung po gsum/_/sangs rgyas la ni phyag 'tshal nas/_/sdig pa bshags zhes 'byung bas na/_/phyag 'tshal sdig pa bshags pa las/_/log par tha snyad mi bya'o/_/nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las/_/'thad pa dang bcas
[\[215b.3\]]rab brtan phyir/_/gsol ba 'debs dang bskul ba yi/_/don ni gcig pa nyid yin no/_/yo byad med pas mchod pa ni/_/nges med phyir na ma bstan to/_/ngag yid mchod pa gsungs pa ni/_/mdo sde rnams su rab tu grags/_/rgyal ba gang zag zla med pa'i/_/sangs
[\[215b.4\]]rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang /_/zhes pa la sogs tshigs bcad bzhis/_/phyag btsal ba ni yongs su bsgrags/_/bzang spyod la sogs tshigs bcad dang /_/bstod pa blo la gang yod dang /_/dkon mchog sprin sogs mdo sde ru/_/gsungs pa bzung la mchod par
[\[215b.5\]]bya/_/'di lta ste/_gang zhig 'di na bdag gir ma byas gzung med pa'i/_/'bras bu lo tog 'bru yi bye brag gang skyes pa/_/de dag ma lus rgyal ba byang chub sems dpa' yi/_/tshogs la sogs la bdag gis phyag 'tshal mchod par bgyi/_/bzang spyod du gsungs tshigs bcad
[\[215b.6\]]kyis/_/de bzhin rjes su yi rang bya/_/rdo rje rgyal mtshan las gsungs pa'i/_/bsngo ba gus pas yongs su bsngo/_/smon lam ji ltar gdab pa yang /_/mdo sde sa bcur blta bar bya/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni rnam sbyang phyir/_/rtag par yongs su bsngo bar bya/_/bsod nams gang
[\[215b.7\]]las shes par bya/_/zhe na mdo sde kun na snang /_/phan yon bcas par rab gsungs phyir/_/phyag 'tshal la sogs rnams kyis so/_/bsam pa dag pas yang nas yang /_/sangs rgyas la ni phyag byas las/_/mi khom brgyad po rnam spangs nas/_/dal zhing khom pa thob par
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]byed/_/de la mi khom pa brgyad ni/_/sa stengs su ni rgyal bas dam chos bstan kyang byol song yi dgas 'gro ba dang /_/gzhan yang lha ni tshe ring po yi nang du skye dang 'gro gzhan dmyal ba dang /_/mtha' 'khob yul du skyes pa dang ni lkugs pa nyid dang log par lta ba
[\[216a.2\]]dang /_/mi yi bzang po yongs su zin kyang thub pa dang bral de dag mi khom brgyad/_/de dag ni phyag btsal ba la sogs pa'i cho ga bsod nams 'phel ba'o//_//dad dang gus dang nga rgyal spangs/_/brtson 'grus shes bya 'di rnams kyis/_/yongs su nyams par mi byed
[\[216a.3\]]cing /_/khyad par du yang 'gro bar byed/_/de la dad pa gang zhig gis/_/'phags pa rnams dang nyer sprod cing /_/de bzhin bya bar mi 'os pa/_/mtha' dag gang gis mi byed pa'o/_/gus par 'di ni khyad par du/_/bsod nams skyed par byed pa dang /_/gang zhig gis ni dam pa'i
[\[216a.4\]]chos/_/mnyam par gzhag pas nyan pa'o/_/nga rgyal spangs pas yon tan rnams/_/'phel ba'i rgyur gsungs gang yin dang /_/gang gis yon tan lhag pa yis/_/'phags par sems shing phyag byed pa'o/_/brtson 'grus de bzhin khyad par rnams/_/'thob phyir yongs su
[\[216a.5\]]mi nyams shing /_/lus sems las su rung 'di dag_/gang gis myur du thob pa'o/_/de dag ni dad pa la sogs pa bzhi'o//_//de bzhin bsod nams 'phel ba'i rgyu/_/dang po rnam pa lnga gsungs pa/_/dad brtson dran pa ting 'dzin dang /_/shes rab rnams la rim bzhin
[\[216a.6\]]bshad/_/dad pa'i dbang po gang yin pa'i/_/dad pa de ni chos bzhin byed/_/de la gang gis dkar po dang /_/nag po'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu/_/bde sdug rang bzhin so so ru/_/'byin par byed pa chos dang po/_/rgyal ba'i sras po rnams kyis ni/_/spyod pa gnyis pa yin
[\[216a.7\]]par gsungs/_/gsum pa'ang 'dir ni gang zhig gis/_/chos rnams thams cad mi spong zhing /_/lta ba kun la yang dag par/_/de bzhin zhen par mi byed pa'o/_/gang zhig thub pa rnams kyi chos/_/mi 'jigs la sogs mtha' yas la/_/dad par byed pa bzhi pa ste/_/de dag
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]dad pa'i dbang por 'dod/_/dad pa'i dbang po'i chos rnams gang /_/nges par dad par byas nas ni/_/gang gis yang dag 'phel byed pa/_/de ni brtson 'grus dbang po yin/_/brtson 'grus dbang pos chos rnams gang /_/gsal por 'phel bar byas nas ni/_/gang gis
[\[216b.2\]]nyams par mi byed pa/_/de ni dran pa'i dbang por brjod/_/dran pa'i dbang pos chos rnams gang /_/nyams pa ru ni ma byas la/_/gang gi rtse gcig tu byed pa/_/de ni ting 'dzin dbang por 'dod/_/ting 'dzin dbang pos chos rnams gang /_/slar yang rtse gcig byas nas ni/_/
[\[216b.3\]]bdag nyid so sor shes byed pa/_/de la shes rab dbang por brjod/_/de dag ni dbang po lnga'o//_//dad brtson dbang po lnga po nyid/_/stobs kyi rang bzhin nyid gyur nas/_/gang tshe bdud rnams kyis rgyal bas/_/mi nus de ni stobs 'phel ba'i/_/stobs
[\[216b.4\]]kyi nyan thos la sogs kyis/_/theg dman 'dod par mi byed cing /_/snga na theg pa chen po la/_/dam bcas mi ldog bstan par 'gyur/_/de dag ni stobs lnga'o//_//bsod nams spel phyir dkon mchog gsum/_/slar yang rjes su dran par bya/_/sangs
[\[216b.5\]]rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/_/yul 'khor skyong gis zhus par gsungs/_/sku gsum ye shes lnga bdag nyid/_/sangs rgyas che ba nges bsam pas/_/sems la gzugs brnyan bzhin shar na/_/dge ba mngon par rab tu 'phel/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bstan
[\[216b.6\]]pa'o//_//yon tan mtha' yas sgrub byed pa'i/_/chos la rjes su dran par bya/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan mtha' yas gang /_/chos 'ba' zhig las rab tu skye/_/de bzhin 'jig rten pa dag dang /_/'jig rten 'das pa'i bde ba kun/_/chos la rdzogs par 'grub pas na/_/
[\[216b.7\]]de phyir gus pas spyad par bya/_/ji ltar sems can thams cad la/_/chos rnams snyoms par rab tu 'jug_/de bzhin sems can thams cad la/_/de ni bdag gis mnyam par bsgrub/_/ji ltar nyin dang mtshan mo ru/_/chos ni mtshungs par rab 'jug pa/_/chos bzhin mtshungs
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]pa'i sems kyis ni/_/da ni bdag kyang 'jug par bya/_/'phags pa 'phags min mi mtshungs shes/_/zhing du lta ba rnam spangs te/_/chos ni rab tu 'jug pa bzhin/_/bdag kyang mtshan nyid gcig tu 'jug_/sems can rnams kyis chos mi bsrung /_/chos
[\[217a.2\]]kyis sems can srung bar byed/_/'gro ba'i skyabs ni chos yin gyi/_/chos kyi skyabs ni 'gro ba min/_/chos ni srid pas mi 'jigs shing /_/mya ngan 'das la rjes mi 'gal/_/de bzhin bdag kyang 'jigs pa dag_/spong zhing de dag rjes su gzhol/_/de dag ni chos rjes su dran pa'o//_//_
[\[217a.3\]]bye dge 'dun chos kyi smra ba po/_/don du chos gnyer chos la sems/_/chos kyi zhing ste chos kyi mchog_/des na dge 'dun rjes dran bya/_/de dag ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o//_//de ltar bdag gis lus sogs gsum/_/byang sems bzung ba sngon 'gro can/_/kun mkhyen nyid
[\[217a.4\]]du yongs bsngos pas/_/khyad par du ni rnam par 'phel/_/bdag nyid dran par bya phyir dang /_/dang po'i las can sems can la/_/bdag gis phyogs tsam 'di bstan byas/_/bye brag 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin/_/rgyal ba'i bslab bcu de dag bsdus byas las/_/dri med ston
[\[217a.5\]]ka'i zla zer ltar 'bar ba'i/_/'dir ni dge ba cung zad ci bsags pa/_/de yis 'gro ba'i bslab pa'i rgyan gyur cig_/bslab pa kun bsdus ljon shing las/_/phyogs cha tsam zhig blangs pa yi/_/bslab pa'i me tog snye ma 'di/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi rna bar zung /_/
[\[217a.6\]]bslab pa'i me tog snye ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//bi kra ma la shI la'i paN+Di ta chen po bai ro tsa na rak+Shi ta'i zhal snga nas sbyar ba'o/_/dbang phyug dam pa'i mnga' bdag bod rje lha btsan po bkra shis nam mkha' dbang phyug btsan gyi bka' lung gis rgya gar gyi mkhan
[\[217a.7\]]po su ma ti kIrti dang /_bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong zha ma seng rgyal dang /_glog skya gzhon nu 'bar gyis bsgyur ba las/_slad nas bod kyi lo tsA ba ban de mar pa chos kyi dbang phyug gis zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//_
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]{D3944}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_pA ra mi tA sa mA sa nA ma/_bod skad du/_pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song bas/_/
[\[217b.2\]]ston pa gzhan la phyogs pa yi/_/ser sna'i dogs pa yongs su spang /_/bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas sku/_/dpal ldan skyes chen mtshan 'chang la/_/ci nas shigs par mi nus pa/_/thob rtsol sangs rgyas skyabs song yin/_/'jig rten skyabs med skyob pa'i phyir/_/
[\[217b.3\]]spyod cing rang gi don btang ste/_/sangs rgyas bsgrub phyir blo brtan na/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin/_/rga shi nad dang 'chi ba las/_/sems can mgon med bskyab pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub smon na/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin/_/mthong thos dran
[\[217b.4\]]dang reg pa dang /_/dri tshor ro myang cis kyang rung /_/'gro ba kun la bde smon na/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin/_/sems can rnams la snying brtse zhing /_/bde gshegs yon tan thob mos na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la/_/mdor bsdus skyabs su song ba
[\[217b.5\]]yin/_/byang chub mchog tu smon byed de/_/rang gi don la mi lta zhing /_/gzhan don brtson yang nga med na/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod chen la/_/gang zhig skyo med zhum med cing /_/mos pa chen po skyed byed pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas skyabs
[\[217b.6\]]song yin/_/skyabs kyi mchog ni stobs bcu dang /_/stobs bcu'i chos zhes de tshol zhing /_/yon tan tshogs la dad skyed na/_/sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin/_/'jig rten 'di dag skyabs med pa/_/skyabs su bya zhes dam brtan na/_/de ni 'gro ba'i skyabs yin te/_/
[\[217b.7\]]sangs rgyas skyabs su song ba yin/_/nyon mongs bcas pa'i sems ldan pa'i/_/sems can gang tshe mthong gyur pa/_/de tshe mos pa che bskyed cing /_/gcig las rnam mang sprul byas te/_/'jig rten dpag yas thams cad la/_/phan pa kun stobs lus dang sems/_/bdag
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]gis bsgrub par bya'o zhes/_/su sems sangs rgyas skyabs song yin/_/skyabs su 'gro ba dang po'o//_//dam chos 'khor los sgyur ba yi/_/rgyal por gyur te 'chi med pa'i/_/lam gyis 'gro ba skyabs smon na/_/chos la skyabs su song
[\[218a.2\]]ba yin/_/bdag kyang 'jig rten mtha' med kyang /_/snying rjes yongs su mi gtong zhing /_/dam chos bstan par gang mos pa/_/de ni chos la skyabs song yin/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/_/bdag gis dam chos bstan bya zhes/_/sems can don la
[\[218a.3\]]sems mnyen na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/mang thos nan tan rgyan ldan dang /_/gzhan la bstan pa'i don bsgrub na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/mtshan ma shin tu gsal ba yin/_/'jig rten ma lus thams cad la/_/chos 'di skyabs kyi mchog yin
[\[218a.4\]]zhes/_/rtog cing dam chos tshol byed na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/chos kyi slob dpon bsnyen byed cing /_/nyan 'dod tshul bzhin yid byed la/_/ston cing nan tan lhur byed na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/dam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/_/spyod pas
[\[218a.5\]]yang dag spyod byed cing /_/lus dang srog la mi lta na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/byang chub mchog gi phyogs kyi chos/_/bdag don ma yin gzhan don du/_/snying rje chen pos spyod byed na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/gang zhig bde la chags med la/_/sdug
[\[218a.6\]]bsngal rnam pas mi 'jigs shing /_/'jig rten phan spyod chos shes na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/dam chos tshul 'di ma thos pas/_/'jig rten 'di dag dman 'gyur zhes/_/ston cing nan tan don byed na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/'gro ba ma lus thams
[\[218a.7\]]cad kyang /_/bdag gis chos la dgod bya zhes/_/sems bskyed nan tan spyod byed na/_/chos la skyabs su song ba yin/_/skyabs su 'gro ba gnyis pa'o//_//mos pa shin tu rnam dag pas/_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun drung 'gro ba/_/gang gis bsam pa mi bzlog
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]pa/_/de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin/_/nges par lhung bar gyur pa yi/_/nyan thos theg la gnas pa rnams/_/byang chub sems ni skyed byed na/_/dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin/_/dge 'dun yon tan dran byas shing /_/dge 'dun bzhin du bkur gnas su/_/'jig rten thams cad
[\[218b.2\]]bkur mos na/_/de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin/_/byang chub go cha brtan byed cing /_/dge 'dun rnams la cher mos pas/_/dge 'dun bsnyen bkur gang dad pa/_/dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang /_/rnam grol de shes ston la sogs/_/dge
[\[218b.3\]]'dun yon tan rin chen gyis/_/'jig rten brgyan par mos pa dang /_/dge 'dun dag la dad brtan pas/_/'gro ba mang po kun gyis kyang /_/dad pas bzlog par mi nus na/_/de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin/_/skyes bu dam pa rin po ches/_/bcas pa'i mu stegs gtsang ma ste/_
[\[218b.4\]]bdud la shin tu dpa' ba yin/_/skyes mchog de ni dge 'dun yin/_/yang dag ji bzhin smra byed cing /_/de la chung phul yongs 'gyur zhes/_/de 'dra'i rnam dag sems 'chang na/_/dge 'dun skyabs su song ba yin/_/byang chub mchog sems mi ldog dang /_/dbang dang
[\[218b.5\]]tshad med yon tan gyis/_/brgyan pa'i yon tan gang tshol ba/_/de ni dge 'dun skyabs song yin/_/dkon mchog gsum la skyabs song ba/_/sems can 'jigs med don 'gyur bas/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs ldan ni/_/de phyir mi 'jigs sbyin bdag yin/_/
[\[218b.6\]]skyabs song bsod nams gzugs yod na/_/khams gsum 'di yang snod du chung /_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu yi gter/_/phul gyis bcal bas gzhal mi nus/_/skyabs su 'gro ba gsum pa'o//_//skyabs 'gro gsum byas phyin chad sbyin pa la/_/ci nas lus
[\[218b.7\]]kyi yan lag bslangs gyur kyang /_/tshul ngan gtong la zhum par mi 'gyur bar/_/'jig rten phan par brtson pas sbyor ba bya/_/ser sna'i skyon ni gang gis 'phel 'gyur ram/_/yongs su gtong sems 'phel bar mi 'gyur ba'i/_/yongs 'dzin bgegs su 'gyur ba'i slu ba
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]dag_/byang chub sems dpas ma lus yongs su spang /_/gang zhig gtor sems gnyen por 'gyur ba dag_/yang dag byang chub lam la sgrib byed na/_/de 'dra'i nor ram rin chen rgyal srid kyang /_/byang chub sems dpas blang bar 'os pa min/_/thub pa
[\[219a.2\]]rnams kyi spyod mchog dran byas shing /_/de gzhol rang gi dam bcas bsam byas te/_/yongs 'dzin chags pa rnam par brtsal ba'i phyir/_/sems la rtogs pa'i dam pa 'di dag rtogs/_/'gro ba kun la bdag gi lus btang ste/_/de btang chos kyang 'di lhag bdag gis spang
[\[219a.3\]]bya na/_/phyi rol dngos la bdag gis chags bya ba/_/glang po'i khrus bzhin bdag la reg pa min/_/sha la don gnyer sha 'di bskur bar gyis/_/rkang 'dod sems can rkang yang brus te khyer/_/bdag gi lus 'di 'di ltar bskur ba yang /_/'jig rten don na phyi rol
[\[219a.4\]]dngos ci smos/_/ji ltar sman gyi sdong po skyes gyur la/_/lo ma me tog skye bo 'thog byed kyang /_/'di dag bdag la blangs shing khyer byed ces/_/rnam par rtog pa de la rgyu ba med/_/de bzhin 'jig rten don la brtson pa yis/_/drin med rtag tu mi gtsang sdug bsngal ba'i/_/
[\[219a.5\]]lus 'di gzhan la phan zhing mkho gyur na/_/bdag gir bya snyam rnam rtog chung mi skyed/_/nang gi sa dang chu la sogs pa dang /_/phyi rol 'byung ba chen po'i tshogs mtshungs na/_/'di ni bdag gi 'di ni gzhan gyi zhes/_/ma rig 'dam gyi rtog bskyed tshul ma yin/_/bdag gi lus
[\[219a.6\]]kyang ci bder blang bar gyis/_/'di la gzhan gyi yin snyam blo ma bskyed/_/'di dag thams cad khyed kyi dngos yin te/_/'di la bdag gis nga rgyal bdag la med/_/de 'dra'i rmad byung bsam pa rnams dang yang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rjes 'brang ba/_/gang la
[\[219a.7\]]yod pa byang chub sems dpa' zhes/_/sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab skyes mchog gsungs/_/de ltar sbyin la nan tan brtson pa de/_/lus la nam yang chags par mi byed pas/_/de yi ngag lus yid kyi las rnams kyang /_/lhun gyis grub par rnam par dag par 'dod/_/rnam
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]dag las can gzhan la phan byed na/_/tshegs su 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal med par byed/_/de ltar rigs pa'i tshul la mngon zhugs pa/_/tshul dang tshul min mkhas pa dngos su thob/_/sbyin pa'i 'bras bu spangs pa thob gyur nas/_/srid pa'i mun nang 'thoms pa'i skye bo la/_/
[\[219b.2\]]dam pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa rgya chen gyis/_/nyi ma shar ba'i 'od pas gsal bar byed/_/'jig rten phan pa'i don sgrub snyam pa de/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'grub gzhir gyur pas/_/nyi shar zer bkye 'od chen mi zad bzhin/_/de yi bsod nams yun du zad mi shes/_/de 'dra
[\[219b.3\]]rmad byung sbyin pa'i yon tan tshogs/_/de dag byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan gyur pas/_/de phyir sbyin pa snying rje sngon 'gro la/_/yongs su sbyong ba'i yon tan rnam pa mang /_/tshe dang spobs pa sangs rgyas stobs la sogs/_/'gro ba kun la bdag gis bsgrub bya zhing /_/zang
[\[219b.4\]]zing sbyin pas bsdus pa'i sems can dag_/bdag gi dam chos snod du 'gyur ro zhes/_/de ltar kha zas skom rnams gtong bar byed/_/rang gi phun sum tshogs pa bsgrub phyir min/_/nyon mongs skom pa gzhil phyir btung ba dag_/'jig rten phan byed 'jig rten rnams la gtong /_/
