[\[219b.5\]]sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che ba'i rnam pa dang /_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba thams cad kyang /_/'jig rten 'di dag ji ltar thob 'gyur zhes/_/theg chen smos pa theg pa yongs su gtong /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sku mdog gser 'dra dang /_/khrel ltas rgyu las byung ba'i gos sgrub par/_/
[\[219b.6\]]gos kyi rnam pa grangs med mang po dag_/lus la bde bar rim gro sbyin par byed/_/snying po byang chub gnas phyir stan gtong ste/_/mal gsum don du mal gyi sbyin pa byed/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyan mchog bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/mchod rten gtsug lag khang du mar me dbul/_/lha yi rna ba
[\[219b.7\]]thob phyir rol mo dang /_/sangs rgyas tshul khrims bsgrub phyir spos kyang 'bul/_/skyabs su 'gro ba yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/khyim dang btung gnas ra ba gnas rnams gtong /_/bro ba ro mchog yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/shin tu zhim sbyar ro rnams gtong bar byed/_/'jig
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]rten 'di dag rga shi med stobs par/_/sman gyi mchog rnams grangs med sbyin par byed/_/nyon mongs tshogs kyis 'khor ba'i 'jig rten rnams/_/rab byung bdag nyid mnyam par bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/de ni rtag tu bran dag gtong byed cing /_/sems can bla
[\[220a.2\]]med chos kyi rjer yang bsgrub/_/mtshan rab bzang po phun sum tshogs bsgrub par/_/mu tig byi ru gser la sogs pa gtong /_/dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/rin chen sgron ma rgyan gyi sbyin pa byed/_/bsam gtan bsgrub phyir brtul zhugs nags tshal dang /_/
[\[220a.3\]]chos mdzod thob phyir nor mdzod yongs su gtong /_/thub dbang rgyal po thob phyir skyon med par/_/rgyal srid bkas brgyan sbyin pa gtong bar byed/_/byang chub mchog la mos phyir skyon med par/_/bu dang bu mo sdug pa'i sbyin pa byed/_/gcig tu chos la dga' zhing mos pa'i
[\[220a.4\]]phyir/_/dga' ba'i rgyur gyur rtsed mo sna tshogs gtong /_/'khor los brgyan pa'i rkang pa mchog thob ste/_/byang chub snying por gnas pas mos pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten don chen bsgrub par brtson pa de/_/rtog pa med par rkang pa yongs su gtong /_/sdug bsngal rgya mtshor
[\[220a.5\]]skye shi'i chus g.yengs pa'i/_/'jig rten chos kyi lag pas bskyab po zhes/_/lag pa pad+ma rgyas 'dra gtong bar byed/_/dbang po lnga dag rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_/sna dang rna ba skyon med yongs su gtong /_/'jig rten thams cad sgrib pa kun spangs te/_/rnam dag mig ldan
[\[220a.6\]]bsgrub phyir mig kyang gtong /_/sa chu me dang rlung ltar rtog med cing /_/'jig rten nyer 'tshor bdag gi lus sgrub ces/_/sha bcad khrag dang bcas pa gtso bo de/_/snying rje chen pos yongs su gtong bar byed/_/rmad du byung ba'i spyod pa brtan pa de/_/rdo rje lta bu'i char pa bab
[\[220a.7\]]gyur kyang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mchog mi shigs pa/_/'jig rten kun gyis thob phyir rkang yang gtong /_/'jig rten blar gyur ye shes mnyam bzhag phyir/_/skye bo slong du 'ongs pa thams cad la/_/lus kyi dam pa mgos kyang mchod byed na/_/lus kyi yan lag gzhan
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]lta ci zhig smos/_/de la sogs pa rgyun du skyon med par/_/byang chub sems dpa' spyod las yongs btang ba'i/_/sbyin pa'i char gyis 'gro ba tshim byas shing /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgya mtshor mngon par 'gro/_/de ni mi rigs btsal zhing sbyin pa dang /_/gzhan la gnod pa btsal
[\[220b.2\]]zhing sbyin mi bya/_/de la gzhan la btang bas dma' ba med/_/de ni sbyin pas snyems pas bdag mi bstod/_/gzhan la smod pa nam yang byed pa med/_/log pa'i sbyor ba yongs su mi gtong ste/_/lhag pa'i bsam pas ma zin sbyin mi byed/_/khro ba'i skyon gyis dma' bar mi gtong
[\[220b.3\]]ste/_/byin nas de la rjes su 'gyod mi byed/_/gcam byas sgur zhes mang du sbyin mi byed/_/khrel gyis dogs sam 'jigs pa'i rgyu phyir ram/_/sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur phyir gtong ba min/_/bzang po yod bzhin ngan pa gtong ba'am/_/sbyin pa'i gnas min zhes te brnyas
[\[220b.4\]]pa'am/_/rnam smin re bas dogs par byas pa'am/_/rim gro med cing smad par de mi gtong /_/tshul khrims ldan la phul bas mi mthong zhing /_/khengs shing brnyas byed nyung bar gtong ba med/_/gang gis log pa'i nan tan rgyur gyur dang /_/slong ba rnams la gnod par sbyin mi
[\[220b.5\]]byed/_/de ni dus min sbyin par mi byed de/_/dus dang mi mthun sbyin pa'ang de mi byed/_/lhar smon ma yin rgyal por smon phyir min/_/theg pa dman smon tshul gyis gtong mi byed/_/de ni ngor bltas gtong bar mi byed de/_/grags pa'i sgra dang bzhad gad don phyir min/_/bdag gis
[\[220b.6\]]nus su zad ces mi rlom zhing /_/gzhan gyi srog la gnod phyir sbyin mi byed/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ma bsngos pa'am/_/skyes bu dam pas smad par gtong mi byed/_/de phyir pha rol phyin pa'i ming 'thob cing /_/shin tu rnam dag sbyin par yang dag 'gro/_/de yi sbyin las byung ba'i
[\[220b.7\]]bsod nams tshogs/_/'jig rten kun gyi bsod nams yongs bsdus kyang /_/de dag kun gyis zil gnon mi 'gyur bas/_/de phyir 'jig rten kun gyi gtso bor 'gyur/_/mngon shes lnga la shin tu nges 'gyur zhing /_/'jig rten kun la sbyin pa'i char 'bebs pas/_/phyogs rnams kun
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]du de yi tshad mi zin/_/rtag par rgyun du 'byung bas zad mi shes/_/de bas mi zad 'gro la phan par 'gyur/_/ye shes mi zad rgya chen rgyu yang yin/_/khams gsum zad par 'gyur ba'i dngos po dang /_/mkha' dang sprin ltar rtag tu 'dre ba med/_/de ni stong nyid
[\[221a.2\]]rnam par mnyam gzhag cing /_/mtshan ma'i skyon rnams yongs su spang ba dang /_/nyon mongs bsal zhing dman pa med pas na/_/thub dbang chen po rnams kyis mi zad gsungs/_/skyes bu dam pas ched du brjod byas shing /_/bde ba rgya chen rgyu yi sbyin pa ni/_/byed par 'dod pas
[\[221a.3\]]mi rtag rnal 'byor dang /_/'jig rten rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed/_/longs spyod rnam pa mi rtag mthong gyur cing /_/snying rje chen po rang gi ngang gyur na/_/byin pa bdag gi khyim bzhag gzhan gyi bar/_/shin tu rig pa'i tshul khrims rtogs par 'gyur/_/gang byin de las 'jigs
[\[221a.4\]]pa skye mi 'gyur/_/khyim na gang bzhag de las 'jigs pa 'byung /_/mi chog thun mong rtag tu bsrung dgos te/_/byin na nyes pa de dag gnod mi 'gyur/_/byin pas 'jig rten pha rol bde ba bsgrub/_/ma byin tshe 'di nyid la'ang sdug bsngal bskyed/_/mi yi nor rnams skar
[\[221a.5\]]mda'i rang bzhin ltar/_/yongs su ma btang de dag med par 'gyur/_/ma byin nor rnams mi rtag med 'gyur te/_/byin pas de dag yod pa'i gter du 'gro/_/sems can phan par gzhol bas gang byin pa'i/_/nor rnams snying po med pa'ang yod par 'gyur/_/gang zhig
[\[221a.6\]]yongs su btang ba mkhas pas bsngags/_/skye bo byis pa de dag sog la dga'/_/yongs su bzung bas mi 'bral gang yang med/_/byin pas rtag tu phun sum tshogs pa 'byung /_/btang bas nyon mongs yongs su 'dzin mi 'gyur/_/'jungs pa 'phags pa'i lam min nyon
[\[221a.7\]]mongs bskyed/_/gang zhig byin pa de ni lam gyi mchog_/de las gzhan gyur 'phags pas lam ngan gsungs/_/slong ba sngon du 'ongs na rgyal sras des/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs ni spel ba'i phyir/_/des gzhan 'du shes bdag la gzhag byas shing /_/dge ba'i
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bshes gnyen 'du shes de la skyed/_/slong ba 'ongs pa thos na che ba rnams/_/nyon mongs mi dga' rnam par srab 'gyur bas/_/dga' ba'i ston mo chen po 'byung ba bas/_/slong ba sngon du 'ongs la de dag dga'/_/ci ste slong ba sngon du 'ongs gyur kyang /_/shin tu mthu chung sbyin par
[\[221b.2\]]ma nus na/_/ci nas slong ba sma bab ma gyur pa/_/'jam pa'i tshig gis de yi yid kyang bzho/_/phyin chad slong ba drung du 'ongs gyur na/_/ci nas kho chad dma' bar mi 'gyur bar/_/'jungs pa'i skyon rnams rnam par bsal ba dang /_/srid pa yongs su spang phyir nan tan bya/_/gang zhig
[\[221b.3\]]zang zing nor la chags byed pa/_/de la byang chub mchog sems skye ba med/_/sems mchog de ni skyon dang mi 'grogs te/_/rgya mtsho chen po ro dang mi 'grogs bzhin/_/de bas rtag tu skyon rnams kun spangs te/_/byang chub tshol bas rtag tu thams cad sbyin/_/'jig rten thams cad
[\[221b.4\]]gcig pu ngas bskyab pa'i/_/sems dang spyod dang zhum pa'i ngang mi mthun/_/sbyin pa de 'dra'i rtsa ba byang chub sems/_/de 'dra'i sbyin pa gtong 'dod de mi gtang /_/'jig rten nang na gtong 'dod sems ldan pa/_/gtong ba'i nang na mchog ces rgyal bas gsungs/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol
[\[221b.5\]]tu phyin pa'i le'u'o//_//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims brgyan ldan par/_/'gro ba thams cad bsgrub don gang brtson pa/_/rang gi tshul khrims thog mar yongs su sbyangs/_/tshul khrims dag pa'i mthu yi stobs kyang bskyed/_/ci nas rmi lam rmi yang 'tshe med
[\[221b.6\]]par/_/'jig rten kun la byams pa bskyed par bya/_/gzhan la phan par gcig tu brtson pa des/_/gzhan gyi longs spyod sbrul bzhin reg mi bya/_/kha ton spyod pa'i blo las phyir log pas/_/thog mar gzhan gyi bud med bslu ba'i blo/_/yongs su gtang bya 'jig rten phan byed pas/_/
[\[221b.7\]]lus kyi spyod pa skyes bu mchog ltar bsgrub/_/snyan cing yid 'ong dus dang ldan pa'i tshig_/dbyen du mi 'gyur bden dang mthun pa dag_/dam chos yang dag khong du chud 'gyur ba/_/gnyen pos btsal zhing rtag tu brjod par bya/_/gzhan gyi bde ba phun sum thob gyur na/_/bdag gi zho
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]shas gang zhig bsgrub bya ba/_/de dag kho bdag nyid kyis rnyed gyur ces/_/dga' sems bskyed bya chags sems yongs su spangs/_/nyon mongs dbang gyur bdag phan mi reg par/_/'di ni bdag nyid mthu chung zhan pa'i mtha'/_/gzhan gyi nyes pa kun kyang de bzhin
[\[222a.2\]]zhes/_/gnod sems me 'bar gzhi la phyir nan tan bya/_/log lta'i 'du shes mun nag thibs po dag_/ye shes snang bas yid la gsal byas te/_/lha mi phul gyi yon tan bsgom byas shing /_/dad pa mi 'phrogs rtsa ba brtan par gzugs/_/mtho ris thar pa'i bde lam gyur pa
[\[222a.3\]]de/_/las lam bcu po 'di las nyams mi bya/_/'di la gnas pa 'gro la phan bsam pa'i/_/bsam pa'i khyad par 'bras bu yod par 'gyur/_/ngag lus yid rnams yang dag bsdam bya ba/_/mdor bsdus tshul khrims yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs/_/tshul khrims ma lus 'dul
[\[222a.4\]]ba'i gzhi yin pas/_/de phyir 'di dag rnam par sbyang bar gyis/_/srog gcod spangs pa des pa'i ngang 'chang ba/_/'gro ba thams cad bsten zhing phebs par 'gyur/_/de yi bag chags sems la skyon gyur pa/_/nan tan ma byas rang gis yongs su 'chad/_/byams pa'i khyad par rjes
[\[222a.5\]]mthun sems ldan zhing /_/khon gcugs rnam pa yongs su zhi 'gyur na/_/mya ngan rnam pa'i nyes pa kun spangs shing /_/bde bar de nyal bde bar sad par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin srin po dag kyang phan par byed/_/lam ngan rgyud kyis de la 'jigs pa med/_/nad med yon tan rgyan dang
[\[222a.6\]]ldan pa yi/_/bde lam brten pa'i tshe ring thob par 'gyur/_/de nyid rgyu yin byang chub brnyes pa yis/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi sku tshe dpag yas shing /_/'jig rten bde ba skyed cing don mdzad pa/_/dgongs pa'i rjes su snyegs pa yongs su 'grub/_/gzhan gyi longs
[\[222a.7\]]spyod ma byin ma blangs pas/_/'jig rten gzhan du longs spyod rgya chen dag_/bud med dbugs kyis ri rab mi sgul ltar/_/bgo skal ba dang 'phrogs pas mi 'phrogs 'grub/_/spyod pa dag pas kun gyis yid 'ong zhing /_/ston pa'i snod du tshe 'di nyid la 'grub/_/de phyir pha
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]rol du yang dogs med cing /_/lam gyi gegs su gyur pa'i rnam pa med/_/skyid longs yengs la snying po med rtogs pas/_/ched du ma bsgrubs sbyin pa'i ngang du 'gyur/_/de phyir nye ba'i nyon mongs rnam dag pas/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub ngang gis thob/_/'dod pa rnams la
[\[222b.2\]]log par spyod spangs pas/_/dbang po thul phyir rab tu zhi la mos/_/'jig rten bstod pas phyogs rnams kun gyi mthar/_/grags pa khyab 'gro gsal ba kun thob 'gyur/_/bud med kun la ma ltar bltas pas na/_/nyon mongs 'dod chags gang la'ang mi 'byung ste/_/
[\[222b.3\]]de phyir de yi bsod nams bsags pas na/_/thub dbang skyes chen dbang po mtshan ldan 'grub/_/tshig tu gang smras brdzun las phyir bzlog pas/_/rab tu dga' ldan g.yo sgyu rnam dag sems/_/tshig rnams kun gyis blang bar grub gyur pas/_/sems can mang po
[\[222b.4\]]chos gzhom kun gyis 'grub/_/bden dang ldan la lha rnams byams gyur pa/_/lha yi rang bzhin yon tan phyogs byed pa/_/de yi spyod pa kun la mngon sum pas/_/'di 'dra de la ngo mtshar che ba med/_/'jig rten gzhan byams tshad mar byed pa ni/_/'jig rten phal cher yon
[\[222b.5\]]tan mi 'chang la/_/rang gi tshad kyis gzhan la tshod 'dzin kyang /_/de 'drar gyur pa de ni ngo mtshar che/_/me tog ut+pal yi nags bor zhing /_/bde ldan kha ni pad+mo 'phags tshul du/_/dri zhim sim byed yid du 'ong ba dang /_/de yi mkha' la gnas 'cha' rten par 'gyur/_/
[\[222b.6\]]ye shes 'bar ba ngan 'gro'i skar lta bu/_/rigs dang mi rigs rnam par shes gyur pas/_/ci dga' sdug pa'i rnam rtog byung gyur na/_/bdag nyid dbang du gyur pa khrel gyis 'dzem/_/de ltar rang bzhin rnam dag tshul gyur pas/_/gzhan la dogs med gzhan gyi dogs mi bya/_/
[\[222b.7\]]de phyir de yi bden pa'i rjes bsnyegs tshig_/sangs rgyas grub tshe bsrung ba med par 'gyur/_/phra ma dbyen spangs g.yog 'khor mi 'phrogs shing /_/gzhan gyi gnod pas lus la mi tshugs te/_/nan tan lhur byed dad pa dbyer med 'gyur/_/byams pa slu med 'jigs pa
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]mi 'gyur dang /_/'gro don mi gtong snying rje mi nyams thob/_/thub dbang grub tshe slob ma'i dge 'dun yang /_/tshe rabs bskal pas phye bar mi 'gyur 'grub/_/khro ba'i rdul mang dpung du gyur pa la/_/rnam rtog rlung gis kun du 'tshub pa rnams/_/grags
[\[223a.2\]]pa'i lus la grib mar 'gyur ro zhes/_/zhe gcod rnam pa byams pa'i chus bkrus shing /_/de las phyi rol tshig snyan 'jam pa yis/_/'jig rten bsam pa bde ba'i dbang du 'gyur/_/'jig rten dga' ba rtsa ba zug gyur pas/_/de yi tshig ni kun gyis blang zhing gzung /_/de phyir 'jig
[\[223a.3\]]rten rnam pa brgyar btul zhing /_/de dag sdug bsngal lam ngan gcad bya ste/_/bsod nams las ldan 'di dang pha rol du/_/chos kyi tshul bsrungs ngan 'gror 'gro mi 'gyur/_/rgyang ring gnas nas zab gsal grags pa dang /_/dpal ldan nye na rang bzhin bde skye ba/_/de bzhin
[\[223a.4\]]'brug sgra zab la gsal ba yi/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs kha yi rgyan kyang byed/_/'khyal pa'i tshig las phyir log gyur pas na/_/mkhas pa rnams la shin tu dben par 'gro/_/de yi blo yang bden par smra mos pas/_/skyon med che ba nyid kyang des thob po/_/bsod nams des na thub
[\[223a.5\]]pa'i rgyal gyur tshe/_/dka' zhing zab pa yongs su bris pa yi/_/zhu ba rnam mang grangs med dus gcig tu/_/thogs pa med pa'i tshig gis lung yang ston/_/chags sems don med 'di dang pha rol du/_/gnod pa'i 'bras bu sgrub byed blos gsal te/_/phrag dog med pas bsam pa ji bzhin
[\[223a.6\]]du/_/phun sum tshogs pa'i longs spyod rgyas pa thob/_/rnam shes dag pas de la brten pa yi/_/lus ngag yid kyi las kyang shin tu gtsang /_/dus dang mthun pas gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la/_/skar tshogs dri med dkyil 'khor ji bzhin 'bar/_/de yi longs spyod mchog rnams
[\[223a.7\]]bsod nams la/_/rtag tu sbyar ba de yi blo 'jug ste/_/khengs pa nga rgyal can gyis glags med cing /_/rgyal po dag gis de ni bstan par 'gyur/_/de yi las dges bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bas/_/dbang po nam yang nyams par 'gro ba med/_/de phyir 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod 'os pa'i/_/
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]'khor lo zlog byed ston pa'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gnod sems gdung ba'i rims nad yongs bsal zhing /_/rang bzhin dge tshul phun sum tshogs pas na/_/shin tu zhi zhing gsal ba'i ngang tshul gyis/_/yid kyis mos pa shin tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/byams pa'i ro bde khyad par
[\[223b.2\]]thob pas na/_/'tshe ba'i tshul lam 'thab mo 'khrug ldan dang /_/'phags min spyod pa las ngan rnam pa la/_/de yi blo ni nam yang 'jug mi 'gyur/_/las rung 'jam pa'i yid kyi las ldan pa/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten de la dkon pa med/_/'jig rten kun du 'phags dang mnyam
[\[223b.3\]]'gyur zhing /_/'gro bas lha bzhin gus pas mchod par 'gyur/_/sems can kun la phan dga' yang dang yang /_/dbyar gyis bsnyogs pa'i chu klung chu bo dag_/ston dus gsal bar dngas par bya ba bzhin/_/'gro ba kun gyi yid la dang ba bskyed/_/kun gyis blta na yid 'ong
[\[223b.4\]]bzang ba dang /_/ye shes rgyus byung tshul mchog rmad byung ba/_/'jig rten rnam shes so sor bsgrub pa dag_/sangs rgyas bsgrub tshe rnam pa gcig tu bsgrub/_/log par lta ba'i 'dam la mi 'dug na/_/de bas bsgrub pa'i grogs dang phrad par 'gyur/_/rang gi las bzhin 'gyur bar
[\[223b.5\]]lam mthong bas/_/sdig pa'i las rnams de ni yongs su spongs/_/rgyal ba rnams la dad pa mi bzlogs shing /_/ngo mtshar bkra shis rnams kyis nyon mongs med/_/'phags pa'i lam la gnas pa de 'thob ste/_/de phyir de ni khyad par 'gro ba 'thob/_/'jig tshogs lta bas
[\[223b.6\]]yang dag 'phags pas na/_/rgyu rnams zad phyir ngan 'gror de mi 'gro/_/chags med ye shes mchog dang de ldan pas/_/sa dang mtho ris chags pa med par 'gro/_/'gro ba'i don la mthu che dpa' ba yi/_/thams cad mkhyen myur rgyal dbang chos kyi rnams/_/rang rgyal la sogs
[\[223b.7\]]thob par ma gyur pa'ang /_/thams cad de la de phyir mngon du 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i longs spyod yon tan rgyan ldan zhing /_/rang la dbang yod bsgom 'os de dga'i rgyu/_/mkhas pa su zhig yang dag len mi byed/_/sems can phan dga' de len ci zhig smos/_/lha rdzas dga' rgyu
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]mi yi longs spyod dang /_/bde mchog ro mchog lha yi phun sum tshogs/_/tshul khrims rgyus byung ci zhig ngo mtshar che/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams de las byung ba ltos/_/tshul khrims nyams pas rang don mi nus na/_/gzhan don tshul la mthu yod ga la 'ong /_/
[\[224a.2\]]de phyir gzhan don legs par brtson pa yis/_/'di la rim gro glod par rigs pa min/_/de bas mi bzad 'jigs pa mthong bya zhing /_/spang 'os chung yang rnam par spang bar gyis/_/byang chub sems dpas lung bstan tshul khrims dag_/rang gi bde la brkam pas bral
[\[224a.3\]]mi bya/_/bud med lus dang tshul spyad mthong stsogs pa'i/_/skabs kyi nyes pas shag shig tshul mi bcang /_/mi srun skye bo nyon mongs rnam pas kyang /_/tshul khrims 'dran 'dren rnam pa yongs su spangs/_/gcig tu dkar chos tshogs ni bsags byas shing /_/rnyog dang
[\[224a.4\]]rnam bral tshul khrims bsten par bya/_/rang dbang gyur las nyams su bde ba dang /_/mkhas pas bsngags pa'i rgyan ldan tshul khrims bsrung /_/bslab pa'i gnas skabs tshang bar yongs rdzogs pas/_/kun rdzob bsnyems med tshul khrims yang dag bsten/_/rnam dag
[\[224a.5\]]sems la gzugs brnyan gyur pa yi/_/gzhan don ro gcig sbyor bas de dag bsrung /_/dran pa'i gzhi ldan dbang po bsdams byas shing /_/tshul khrims bsrung la shin tu brtson par bya/_/'jig rten tshul khrims 'chal pa mang po'i mun/_/nyi ma'i 'od kyis gsal ba ji bzhin
[\[224a.6\]]gsal/_/sdug bsngal gnyen po'i don du bsten pa yang /_/lus kyi rma bsku'i rdul la sogs pa dang /_/rigs pas 'thob pas cho ga bsam byas shing /_/gzhan gdong lta ba'i re ba med par bya/_/tshul dang mthun zhing yon tan 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/yid bzhin dga' ba kun gyi spyod gyur kyang /_/
[\[224a.7\]]ngo mtshar med pas nga rgyal spang bya zhing /_/de las byung ba'i grags pa bsnyems mi bya/_/thob pa'i yon tan rnam pa gzugs brnyan dag_/mdza' ba'i tshul gyis dgra dang nye ba bzhin/_/pad+ma'i nags la zla ba'i 'od gsal ltar/_/brtul zhugs lhod pa rnams la bde ba gnod/_/tshul
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]khrims yon tan bsgom pa'i tshul du gsungs/_/yon tan ma lus byang chub sems la gnas/_/byang chub mchog sems snying rje'i rgyu las byung /_/de bas snying rje'i ngang tshul ldan par bya/_/gang zhig 'dod pa'i khams la mi gnas shing /_/gzugs kyi khams la'ang de bzhin mi
[\[224b.2\]]gnas te/_/gzugs med khams la'ang de bzhin mi brten pa/_/de ni tshul khrims yang dag yin par brjod/_/gang zhig 'jig rten dpag yas sems can dag_/mtha' dag tshul khrims dag la dgod mos shing /_/'jig rten rngan phyir tshul khrims sten byed pa/_/de ni tshul
[\[224b.3\]]khrims pha rol phyin par gsungs/_/de bas ngan song 'jigs dang rgyal srid dang /_/mtho ris phun sum tshogs pa smon btsal te/_/tshul khrims dri med yang dag bsrung bya zhing /_/'jig rten don la brtson pas tshul khrims bsten/_/tshul khrims de ni khyad par thob pa'i lam/_/
[\[224b.4\]]snying rjes ngang can rnams dang mnyam par bsgrub/_/ye shes gtsang ma lus kyi rang bzhin te/_/skyon bral rgyan du 'gyur ba'i mchog ces bya/_/khams gsum kun du yid 'ong dri bsung dang /_/rab tu byung dang mi 'gal byug pa yin/_/cha lugs mthun yang tshul khrims ldan gyur na/_/
[\[224b.5\]]mi yi nang na de ni 'phags par 'gyur/_/tshig tu ma brjod tshigs su ma gyur kyang /_/nyams su mkho ba'i longs spyod rim gro 'du/_/sdig pa med par 'jig rten kun sdud de/_/chags med ma bsgrubs dbang phyug thob par 'gyur/_/brjod du mi 'os rigs su 'byung ba dang /_/phan
[\[224b.6\]]zhing dben pa gang yang ma byas shing /_/sngon chad mi shes skye bo thams cad dang /_/tshul khrims ldan pa'i skye bo de la 'dud/_/rkang pas bkra shis gyur pa'i rdul dag kyang /_/spyi gtsug dam pas blangs shing lha dang mi/_/phyag 'tshal mgos gtugs thob pa kun du khyer/_/de phyir
[\[224b.7\]]tshul khrims dpal ldan rigs mchog yin/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o//_//bdud rnams thams cad yongs su rmongs byed cing /_/rnam thar thob byed bde bar gang gsungs pa'i/_/bzod pa shin tu phan pa sgrub byed pa/_/de la su zhig nan tan mi byed
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]yod/_/gzhan la gnod byed nam yang mi shes pa/_/brtan pa rnams kyi yid 'ong ngang tshul te/_/'jig rten don byed snying rje'i tshul bsnyems pa/_/yon tan mthun pa'i ming ni bzod pa yin/_/gzhan don mthun pa'i yid dang ldan pa la/_/tshul gyi dam pa bzod
[\[225a.2\]]pa yin zhes gsungs/_/'jig rten legs pa phun sum tshogs pa dag_/khro ba'i skyon la bzod pas yongs su skyob/_/mthu ldan rnams kyi rgyan gyi dam pa ste/_/dka' thub tshul 'chang rnams la stobs kyi tshul/_/gnod sems 'brog gi me la chu yi rgyun/_/'di la gzhan la
[\[225a.3\]]gnod dgu bzod pas sel/_/skye bo mchog gi bzod pa'i go cha la/_/mi srun skye bo'i tshig gi mdas rdugs pas/_/de dag bstod pa'i me tog bzang 'gyur zhing /_/grags pa'i phreng ba yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/skye bo gdug pa'i ngag gi mtshon gyi rma/_/ye shes zla ba bzhin du sim
[\[225a.4\]]par byed/_/brtul zhugs 'chang ba brtan pa'i rang bzhin te/_/bzod pa de ni yon tan tshogs kyi gnas/_/zab cing brtan pa'i snying por gyur pa ste/_/khro ba'i gdung ba gzhil ba dbyar dang 'dra/_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis brlabs pa yi/_/sgra snyan khyab pa bzod pa'i mthu
[\[225a.5\]]las byung /_/tshangs ris 'jig rten dag tu 'dzegs pa la/_/skas kyi them bzhin skyo ba'i skyon dang bral/_/yon tan mdzes ldan mtshan rab brgyan pa yi/_/gzugs bsgrub bzo yi gnas kyang bzod pa yin/_/skyon gyi shing chen khon bzod chu bo bzhin/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub
[\[225a.6\]]sems kyis spel ba yin/_/bsod nams chu yi tshogs dang rtag tu mthun/_/'jig rten gzhan du phan dge rdzogs par bsgrub/_/'gro la phan don 'phel ba'i mchog kyang yin/_/grags pa'i snyan pa'i rang bzhin phul gyi rgyu/_/yon tan yid bsgrub gnas kyang bzod pa yin/_/
[\[225a.7\]]snying rjes sems can dben par mthong bas na/_/'khor ba'i nyes pas de ni skyo mi 'gyur/_/rang gi las dge 'jig rten phan byed pas/_/'jig rten kun du grags pa'i tshogs su 'gyur/_/ye shes mchog gis sbyangs pa'i bzod ldan na/_/mtshar 'dzin dpya ba kun gyis 'go
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]ba med/_/mi rtag bzod pa'i mthu dang ldan pas na/_/bde ba'i rnam pas dga' bar 'gyur ba med/_/gnod pa'i rnam pa mi bzad mang pos kyang /_/skyes mchog de dag yid ni 'gyur ba med/_/bzod pa'i stobs kyis shin tu brtan pa na/_/byang chub mchog sgrub mos pa mang
[\[225b.2\]]bar 'gyur/_/bzod pas brtan pa'i spyod pa dam pa des/_/dka' thub dka' ba kun du ston byed cing /_/mu stegs dregs pas mtho ba'i bsam pa dag_/phan pa'i bsam pas bcil zhing dma' bar byed/_/'jig rten rmongs pa bdag snyam chags gyur te/_/lhag ma gzhan
[\[225b.3\]]snyam nga rgyal 'chang ba dag_/de yi gnod pas zil gnon sems gyur cing /_/bzod dang mi ldan yongs su gdung bar 'gyur/_/skyes mchog bsam pa snying rje'i mgon ldan zhing /_/bzod pas bkra shis bsgrub pa 'chang ba dang /_/bdag tu lta ba yongs su spangs pa la/_/gnod
[\[225b.4\]]byed gzhan dang nye yang gnod pa med/_/brtan pa nyam chung sems kyi skyon gyur pa'i/_/khro ba log pa rnam par rtog las byung /_/yang dag rtog pa yid la zhi skye zhing /_/bzod pa'i rnam pa mnyam par gzhog par byed/_/chu la zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yod 'dra ba'i/_/bzod pa'i rnam
[\[225b.5\]]rtog zhi la brten pa las/_/'phags pas rtag tu skabs med 'phags par bya/_/rnam rtog zhi ba don dam bzod pa zhes/_/bzod pa'i yang dag nyid mkhyen de dag gsungs/_/de bas 'jig rten mi 'dra rtogs bya zhing /_/rnam rtog nye bar zhi la nan tan gyis/_/mig ni mig tu zad na
[\[225b.6\]]ci ste khro/_/rna ba la sogs der zad khro med ces/_/de ltar gang bzod skye mched ltos pa ste/_/de ni don dam nyid du bzod pa min/_/sgra dang tshig ni mi rtag rang bzhin te/_/sgra dang rnam rtog 'di yang mi [(]rteg [,]rtag [)]ces/_/gang bzod de ni mi rtag rtog pa ste/_/bzod pa'i mchog tu de yang gsungs
[\[225b.7\]]pa min/_/nyes pa byed pa gang la'ang yod pa min/_/gang la bya ba de yang med do zhes/_/gang bzod de ni bdag med sbyar ba ste/_/de yang bzod pa'i phul du phyin pa min/_/bde dang sdug bsngal bstod dang smad pa dag_/kun kyang rten cing 'brel 'byung dngos po zhes/_/gang bzod de ni
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]rten 'brel rtogs bya'i sa/_/bzod pa shin tu mnyam bzhag de ma yin/_/'di ni yongs su rmongs pas bslus gyur pas/_/bsam pa log gyur de 'dra bdag min zhes/_/gang bzod de ni mthon dman bsam pa ste/_/bzod pa'i phul gyi go skabs de la med/_/sgra skad
[\[226a.2\]]yi ge sgra snyan ji bzhin te/_/re re brjod cing de bzhin 'jig pas na/_/su la su zhig ji ltar gnod 'gyur zhes/_/bzod pa de yang bzod pa'i phul ma yin/_/'di ni bdag gi sdig pa zad bya'i phyir/_/rang gi chos la gnod pa'ang mi lta na/_/bde gshegs dam pa ci rob ma
[\[226a.3\]]yin zhes/_/gang bzod de ni ming tsam bzod pa min/_/rang gi las bzhin 'gyur ba rtogs bya zhing /_/de yi yon tan rdzogs pas bzod byed pa/_/de 'dra'i bzod pa'ang rnam rtog sbyor can te/_/bzod pa'i mthar phyin mchog ni de ma yin/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal mi gtsang
[\[226a.4\]]bdag med pa/_/bdag la bzod kyi bzlog pa ma yin zhes/_/gang yin de ni gnyen po zhi bzod kyi/_/gnyis kyi rjes 'brang don dam bzod pa min/_/skye bo 'di ni yang dag mi shes pas/_/de phyir gzhan la gnod par dga'o zhes/_/gang bzod de yang mnyam nyid mnyam mi 'gro/_/
[\[226a.5\]]bzod pa de yang rnam rtog skyon can yin/_/mtho dman mnyam pa'i rnam rtog rnam pa dag_/gang tshe ma lus yang dag zhi gyur pa/_/de ni bzod pa bla med dam pa zhes/_/gnyis med lam la spyod pa de dag gsungs/_/rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las/_/dngos po gang yang
[\[226a.6\]]'byung ba med pa dang /_/rang dang gzhan dang gnyi ga rgyu med las/_/dngos po gang yang 'jig par 'gyur ba med/_/yod dang med la skye ba med pas na/_/skye ba med phyir gang yang 'gag pa med/_/dngos po'i rnam rtog rang bzhin stong pa nyid/_/yang dag mthong na bzod pa'i phul
[\[226a.7\]]zhes bya/_/de thob gyur na rgyal ba 'dir 'gyur zhes/_/rgyal ba rnams kyis rnam mang lung yang bstan/_/de ni rtag tu yang dag mnyam gzhag kyang /_/'jig rten phan 'dod grangs med kun du 'byung /_/chos dang smon lam las la dbang thob ste/_/mos pa rdzu 'phrul skye ba'i dbang
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]yang thob/_/de bzhin sems dang yo byad rnam pa dang /_/ye shes mchog dang tshe la dbang ba thob/_/dbang gi nor mchog yun du mi zad cing /_/gzhan don tshe sgrub de 'dra thob gyur nas/_/'gro ba mi bde'i rgyun du ltung ba dag_/yongs su bzung phyir dbang ldan de dag skye/_/
[\[226b.2\]]de phyir gzhan don phal cher bkur spro bas/_/bzod pa thabs tshul 'di 'dra bsnyen par bya/_/de la gnas la gzhan don che bsam pa'i/_/spyod yul yon tan 'bras bu'i rgyan ldan 'gyur/_/'di la dad pa rtsa ba brtan gyur na/_/des kyang thub rgyal nges par 'gyur zhes
[\[226b.3\]]gsungs/_/chos kyi lam la dad pa rgyun chags na/_/bsam pa yid bzhin shing rta chag mi 'gyur/_/bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o//_//thams cad bzod pa'i mthu ni skyes gyur nas/_/spyod pa'i mthu chen mtha' dka' brtson 'grus kyis/_/dpa'
[\[226b.4\]]bo brtul zhugs thams cad rtsom byed pas/_/lha'am bdud rnams las kyang 'phags par 'gro/_/tshe 'dir mthar phyin 'jig rten don dag kyang /_/brtson 'grus med pas mthar phyin bya ba dka'/_/yongs su skyo med brtson 'grus che ldan na/_/mi 'thob mi 'grub rnam pa gang yang
[\[226b.5\]]med/_/skye bo ma rabs thog mar brtsams mi mos/_/brtsams nas dbus su sgyid lug brtson 'grus gtong /_/gzhan don ngal med brtson 'grus ldan pa ni/_/mya ngan 'das stong spyod pa rgya chen rtsom/_/le los bslus pa'i 'gro ba phal cher ni/_/brtson 'grus rang dbang yod kyang
[\[226b.6\]]bdag don gtong /_/brtson 'grus che ldan gzhan la ltos med ni/_/gzhan don khur chen skyo ba med par 'khyer/_/snga phyi 'khor ba'i mtha' dang mnyam tsam du/_/rgya che ring ba'i nyin dang mtshan gyur la/_/de 'dra bsags pas lo gyur dus ring ba'i/_/bskal pa rgya mtsho'i chu thigs
[\[226b.7\]]grangs snyed kyis/_/byang chub mchog gi sems gcig skye 'gyur ba/_/de 'dra'i rnam pas tshogs gzhan de re zhing /_/bsgrub dgos gyur kyang snying rjes skyo bsal te/_/byang chub dam pa sgyid lug med par bsgrub/_/'khor tshe rang gi sdug bsngal sems gtang zhing /_/go cha brtan pa dpag
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]yas de bskyed na/_/brtul zhugs dpa' bo snying rje'i ngang can la/_/yang dag blangs pa dang po yin par brjod/_/'jig rten mes bkang rkang gis 'bog bya zhing /_/sa chen mtshon gyis dkrigs pas gzigs byas te/_/bde gshegs lta bar mos dang gang
[\[227a.2\]]ldan zhing /_/chos kyi bdud rtsi zhi ba mchog bsrung dang /_/'khor ba'i 'dam nas skye bo 'di dag kun/_/bdag gis bton te byang chub bde dgod ces/_/goms pa bteg cing bor ba'i dus dag tu/_/gang zhig de 'drar mnyam 'jog sems 'chang dang /_/'jig rten phan phyir brtson
[\[227a.3\]]'grus che bskyed cing /_/gzhan la phan pa'i bsod nams mang bsgrubs pa/_/de ni mi zad pa yi brtson 'grus te/_/dpal ldan yang dag blangs pa gnyis zhes bya/_/bsod nams rnam pa ci sgrub dus na yang /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du sngo byed na/_/de ni mi zad yang dag
[\[227a.4\]]bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/yang dag len pa'i mchog ces thub pas gsungs/_/rgya mtsho chen por chu thigs gcig bor ba/_/rgya mtsho ma zad dus su zad mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin byang chub mchog tu bsngos pa yi/_/bsod nams rnam pa zad par 'gyur ba med/_/de yang snying rje rnam dag sems
[\[227a.5\]]ldan zhing /_/'gro ba rgyu dang mi rgyu ma lus kun/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par bsgrub bya zhes/_/sems can dam pa bsod nams de dag rtsom/_/stong gsum chen po'i 'gro ba ji snyed pa/_/nyi ma gcig gis la la sgrol byed la/_/bskal pa du mar de bzhin bsgral byas kyang /_/sems
[\[227a.6\]]can khams las mang po ma bsgral zhes/_/sems can mi zad de 'dra thos gyur kyang /_/ma lus sems can bsgral bar rab mos shing /_/sgyid lug skyon gyis ma bzung brtson ldan na/_/don gyi snying po de la ring ba min/_/'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gcig bsgrub pa/_/
[\[227a.7\]]de snyed bcu 'gyur bsgyur bas bde gshegs kyi/_/ba spu'i khung gcig mngon par 'grub 'gyur la/_/spu rnams gcig nas re rer mngon 'grub cing /_/ba spu mngon sgrub bsod nams de dag tshogs/_/brgya 'gyur dag tu bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/_/dpe byad bzang gcig
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]'grub cing de bzhin du/_/dpe byad bzang po'i lhag ma kun 'grub cing /_/dpe byad bzang pos bsdus pa'i bsod nams tshogs/_/de snyed stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams kyis/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par sangs rgyas tshe/_/mtshan ni sna tshogs re re 'grub 'gyur la/_/
[\[227b.2\]]mtshan rab bskyed pa'i bsod nams rgyur gyur te/_/stong du bsgyur ba'i bsod nams phung po las/_/zla ba nya ltar mdzes shing gsal ba yi/_/mdzod spu mdog bzang yid 'ong 'grub 'gyur ba/_/mdzod spu mngon sgrub bsod nams de snyed tshogs/_/brgyar 'gyur stong du bsgyur ba'i
[\[227b.3\]]bsod nams kyis/_/spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba'i mtshan ldan pa'i/_/gtsug tor rgyan mdzes sangs rgyas dbu 'grub ste/_/de 'dra'i bsod nams sgrub tshul de dag kyang /_/bdag gis bsgrub ces byang chub sems mthong na/_/brtson 'grus 'dor ba de la gang gi sgor/_/
[\[227b.4\]]sgyid lug le lo'i cha shas skabs su 'gyur/_/'jig rten khams kun sems can ma lus par/_/rang rgyal rnams dang thams cad 'drar gyur kyang /_/bzod la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig_/ye shes dam pas de dag kun pas 'phags/_/de snyed bzod pa'i
[\[227b.5\]]stobs la gnas pa bas/_/mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' gcig 'phags te/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/dge la bsgrub pa de ni ngal mi shes/_/mi ldog byang chub sems dpa' de snyed pas/_/skye ba gcig thogs rgyal sras de 'phags te/_/brtson
[\[227b.6\]]'grus brtan dang ldan pa'i nang na yang /_/byang chub shing drung phyin pa ci zhig smos/_/rnam pa de 'dra'i ye shes rnam dag dang /_/'jig rten ma lus sems can kun ldan yang /_/byang chub snying po'i shing drung phyin gyur la/_/bdud 'dul skye ba tha ma'i char mi 'gro/_/de 'dra'i ye
[\[227b.7\]]shes rnam pa dag ldan pas/_/'jig rten ma lus khams kun gang gyur kyang /_/yon tan rnam mang de dag gcig sogs pas/_/bde gshegs stobs kyi cha la'ang mnyam mi 'gro/_/de 'dra'i ye shes rgya mtsho rmad byung ba/_/gzhan sems shes pa'i mthu la thogs med cing /_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]ye shes snang ba mkha' ltar yangs pa la/_/snying rje ldan pa gcig pu pha rol rgal/_/sems can ma lus kun la khyab pa yi/_/snying rje chen po 'jig rten kun du 'byung /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi rnam pa dag_/rmad byung ma lus de phyir yang dag grub/_/
[\[228a.2\]]de 'dra'i sems can dma' bas mnyan dga' ba'i/_/yang dag blang ba'i yon tan kun ldan na/_/yang dag nyid lam yan lag brgyad ldan zhing /_/brtson 'grus phul byung shin tu rnam par mdzes/_/brtson 'grus rnam gsum dge ba sbyor ba ste/_/lus dang ngag yid brtson
[\[228a.3\]]'grus rnam pa las/_/'jug dang gnas dang mnyam par bzhag pa yi/_/brtson 'grus phul byung yid las byung ba yin/_/byang chub sems la mos shing zhi ba dang /_/snying rje che dang bdag med bzod pa dang /_/'gro ba sdug bsngal bsdu ba rnam bzhi dang /_/chos rnams kun la yongs
[\[228a.4\]]su 'dzin med dang /_/'khor ba'i 'dam na yongs su skyo med dang /_/khams gsum thams cad nye bar mi dmigs shing /_/bdog pa kun gtong nga rgyal 'gyur med dang /_/bslab pa kun la yang dag slob pa dang /_/gzhan gyi gnod pas mi 'gyur brtan ldan zhing /_/sems la
[\[228a.5\]]rnam 'khrug nam yang mi 'byung dang /_/dge ba'i las la brtson pa brtan pa dang /_/dben la dga' ba'i ro gcig sems ldan dang /_/bsam gtan bzhi por mnyam par gzhog pa dang /_/bdag med nges par rtogs pa'i sems ldan dang /_/thos pa mang pos ngom par mi
[\[228a.6\]]'gyur zhing /_/rigs par 'jug cing de la rtog pa dang /_/ji ltar thob pa yang dag ston byed cing /_/brjod med chos nyid yang dag shes pa dang /_/mngon shes lnga la mthu chen ldan pa dang /_/mngon shes drug la sgom tsam byed pa dang /_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa mngon par sgrub pa
[\[228a.7\]]dang /_/spyod pa tshegs med shin tu gsal ba dang /_/yang dag spong la sbyor ba byed pa dang /_/dge dang mi dge'i phyogs las rnam grol zhing /_/dbang po nges par bya la mkhas pa dang /_/chos rnams dbang po med par shes gyur cing /_/las kyi tshogs rnams yongs su
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]tshol byed kyang /_/gar yang 'gro med rmad byung zab pa dang /_/de la sogs pa sems spangs brtson pa'i lus/_/gzud cing dgod pa'i khyad par 'phags pa can/_/de nyid mi zad yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir/_/dgon pa'i brtson 'grus khyad par rgyu yang yin/_/ye shes
[\[228b.2\]]mchog gi las la gnas 'cha' yang /_/mtshan ma'i las la de ni 'jug pa med/_/snying rje chen pos 'dus byas mi gtong zhing /_/brtson 'grus che yang 'dus byas med mi ltung /_/sngon chad ma thos chos thos gnod pa med/_/cis kyang mi tshugs thos pa'i chos kyang 'dzin/_/
[\[228b.3\]]mi min kun kyang de la phan par dga'/_/ting 'dzin rnam pa kun kyang thob par 'gyur/_/nyin mtshan dus rnams 'bras bu yod par zla/_/yon tan tshogs kyis dma' bar 'gyur ba med/_/mi yi chos las 'phags pa'i don rnams kyis/_/me tog ut+pal bzhin rnam par
[\[228b.4\]]'phel/_/grags pa yang dang bde ba thob par 'gyur/_/ser sna dogs spangs yid tshul mchog kyang 'thob/_/tshe 'di'i yon tan ji snyed snang ba kun/_/brtson pa'i tshul 'byung yon tan che ba med/_/yon tan che mnga' rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/_/khams gsum mchod 'os
[\[228b.5\]]nyid kyang de las grub/_/brtson 'grus chen po'i yon tan de 'dra na/_/brtson 'grus che la gang zhing brtson mi byed/_/brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o//_//de nas ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir/_/bsam gtan tshul la brtson par bya/_/'jig rten phan pa'i rnam
[\[228b.6\]]pa dag_/ye shes snang bas bde bar 'grub/_/bsam gtan tshul gyis sems dag na/_/ston gyi dus kyi sprin bsal ba'i/_/mkha' la zla ba gsal ba ltar/_/ye shes khyad du dang bar 'gyur/_/rnam dag tshul khrims ldan byas shing /_/dge phan grogs dang brten byas te/_/bya ba nyung
[\[228b.7\]]zhing zhi ba'i ngang /_/dran pas byin rlabs tshul bcang ste/_/shing drung brtul zhugs gnas dag gam/_/ne'u gsing sdug gu'i sa gzhi'am/_/ched du ma byas mdangs dga' ba'i/_/nags kyi me tog dri zhim pa'am/_/bsam gtan rkyen du 'os pa yi/_/chog shes 'gro ba'i gnas dag
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]gam/_/'gro ba'i sgra skad mi 'byung bar/_/zab mor gnas pa'i gnas dag gam/_/dgon pa'i sa gzhi bzang po'am/_/stong pa'i gnas dang khyim dag gam/_/sman ljongs ri khrod dben pa dag_/seng ge'i nga ro grags gnas sam/_/'du 'dzi nyon mongs
[\[229a.2\]]dben gyur pa'i/_/gang yang rung ba'i gnas dag tu/_/skyil mo krung du bder 'dug ste/_/drang po'i lus ni bsrang byas shing /_/drang ba'i bsrung ba sems gzhi la/_/nye bar yang dag gzhag bya ste/_/snying rjes log par rtogs pa rnams/_/skabs med tshul du dam bcas shing /_/shes
[\[229a.3\]]par rab shes bya ba'i dus/_/'di yin mya ngan 'das dus min/_/sems can mya ngan ma 'das su/_/mya ngan 'da' bar mos med ces/_/de ltar 'jig rten phan bsams te/_/sangs rgyas nyid du mos bskyed cing /_/rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/bsam gtan bsgrub la
[\[229a.4\]]brtson par bya/_/yang dang yang zhing ngal bso na/_/gtsubs pas me phyin me 'gyur te/_/rnal 'byor tshul la'ang de bzhin du/_/khyad par ma thob gtong mi bya/_/dmigs pa gcig la brtan tshul du/_/yid kyi bsam pa brtan par bya/_/dmigs pa mang po brgyud pa las/_/'di
[\[229a.5\]]ni nyon mongs 'khrug par 'gyur/_/lhag mthong brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthus/_/zhum par gyur na gzengs yang bstod/_/rgod par gang tshe gyur pa'i yid/_/zhi gnas tshul gyis bzlog par bya/_/ting 'dzin mthu ni mi g.yo zhing /_/yang dag gyur na btang snyoms gzhag_/bde
[\[229a.6\]]gshegs ting 'dzin thob bya'i phyir/_/de la chags par yod mi bya/_/bsam gtan dga' ba'i ro myang bas/_/rang dbang med pa'i nyam mi blang /_/bdag gi bde tsam thob don du/_/brtsam pa rgya chen 'di sgrub min/_/lus dang srog la lta ba yi/_/zhum pas non gyur sems gyur
[\[229a.7\]]cing /_/rang gi mgo bo tshig gyur kyang /_/brtson 'grus lhod par des mi bya/_/mtshan ma'i rnam pa shes byas shing /_/yid ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir/_/dmigs las bsam pa nyams gyur na/_/dran pas phyir yang bsdu bar bya/_/sgrib pa rnams las rang gi yid/_/glang
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]po rang dbang thob 'gyur na/_/lcags kyus bzlog par bya ba bzhin/_/log pa'i phyogs las bzlog par bya/_/de nas sgrib pa'i nad kyi rnams/_/bsal bas sos pa'i yid gyur cing /_/dbul po nyam thag phongs pa las/_/longs spyod skyid thob thar pa bzhin/_/bde dang
[\[229b.2\]]ldan pa'i yid kyis ni/_/'dod pa'i skyon rnams bsal bar bya/_/de dang bral bas dmigs pa yi/_/bde ba gcig nas gcig brgyud kyang /_/glog ltar mi rtag 'gyur ba dang /_/dbu ba gsog ltar bdag med pa'i/_/rmi lam bzhin du don med par/_/bslu ba'i don du 'ongs
[\[229b.3\]]'dra dor/_/pha rnams bu la byams pa dang /_/bu rnams pha la de bzhin te/_/mdza' la mdza' bo byams pa dang /_/'gro rnams phan tshun byams pa dag_/yon tan tshogs kyis bsgrub byas shing /_/brtan pa'i snying pos brtan byas te/_/g.yul du gru gdong 'dren bzhin gyi/_/
[\[229b.4\]]mdza' byams sa mtshams 'jigs byed kyang /_/'di tshe brtsal ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_/gzhan du ngan 'gro skyed byed pa'i/_/rgyur gyur 'dod pa'i rnam pa yin/_/de bas 'dod pa bsten mi bya/_/rnam rtog rnams kyi gzhir gyur cing /_/bdag dang gzhan rnams kun gyi yang /_/
[\[229b.5\]]shes rab mig ldongs byed pa'i rgyu/_/mi bde sna tshogs skyed pa yang /_/bdag 'dod don la brtson par bya/_/rnam pa kun du yongs spangs pa'i/_/'dod pa de dag gzhan don la/_/brtson pas dran byar 'os pa min/_/'dod pa de dag thob pa dang /_/nyin gcig bzhin du bsten pa dang /_/
[\[229b.6\]]mang du bsags pas mi ngoms na/_/de las nad chen gang zhig yod/_/btsal tshe ro med nyon mongs la/_/bsrung tshe 'jigs pa skyed byed cing /_/med 'gyur mya ngan che bskyed na/_/de la 'dod byed su zhig yod/_/gang gi ro la myos gyur na/_/rang don nyid kyang mi rigs te/_/myos
[\[229b.7\]]'gyur smyon chu ji bzhin pa'i/_/'dod pa sems ldan su zhig bskyed/_/de ltar rnam pa thams cad du/_/'dod pa skyon ldan shes gyur na/_/de las sems ni ldog 'gyur te/_/'byung lam chos la mos par 'gyur/_/dben las skyes pa'i dga' dang bde/_/bag yangs thob las skyes pa 'byung /_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]yan lag de dang ldan pas na/_/bsam gtan dang po thob pa yin/_/der ni rnam rtog rnam dpyod dag_/'dod ldan skyon ldan mthong 'gyur zhing /_/de dag zhi ba tshol byed pas/_/ting 'dzin dga' skyes bde ba thob/_/nang ni yongs su dang gyur zhing /_/de sems
[\[230a.2\]]rtse gcig gyur pa ni/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bsam gtan zhes/_/gnyis med drang srong mchog gis gsungs/_/yid kyi 'khrug long yin shes nas/_/dga' las 'dod chags bral gyur pa/_/dran pa btang snyoms ldan pa yi/_/bsam gtan gsum pa thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[230a.3\]]bde ba'i bsam pa yongs btang bas/_/bde dang sdug bsngal med gyur cing /_/btang snyoms dran pas rnam dag pa'i/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/de nas mngon shes lnga thob ste/_/chos rgyal rgyal srid gnas pa na/_/dpal ldan grags pa khrel dang gzungs/_/
[\[230a.4\]]de yi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi don du mngon bsgrubs pas/_/rang rgyal nyan thos yon tan la/_/de dag shin tu 'das gyur cing /_/shin tu khyad 'phags mthu dang ldan/_/gtong ba 'jungs pa 'god byed cing /_/tshul khrims med pa tshul la 'god/_/khro ba bzod cing
[\[230a.5\]]des pa dang /_/sgyid lug brtson 'grus chen po dang /_/'khrug pa'i sems ldan bsam gtan dang /_/shes rab 'chal pa shes rab la/_/snying rje chen po skyo med par/_/brtson 'grus spyod pas sbyor ba byed/_/de nas mtha' yas spyod yul can/_/nyi ma 'od chen ji bzhin du/_/mi nyams
[\[230a.6\]]gsal ba'i 'od chen gyis/_/'jig rten thams cad snang bar byed/_/de nas sems can sdig can dag_/ngan 'gror ltung bar gyur pa dang /_/bsod nams tshe dag zad gyur cing /_/lha las ltung bar gyur pa dang /_/'jig rten sdug bsngal de dang des/_/yongs su gdung bar
[\[230a.7\]]gyur pa dag_/'jig rten khams na gang yod pa/_/lha mig gsal bas mthong gyur cing /_/snying rje chen po skye 'gyur te/_/snying rje ldan pas bag med spong /_/gzhan don sgrub la bag yod pas/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mthu dang ldan/_/de nas 'jig rten khams mang na/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mang bzhugs dang /_/sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan dag dang /_/dge 'dun phun sum tshogs mthong zhes/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyu mchog gi_/rnam dag spyod yul spyod mthong ste/_/sems can gzhan la phan don du/_/dpal ldan spyod pa mthong gyur pas/_/
[\[230b.2\]]de la smon lam che skyed cing /_/smon lam dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur te/_/gzhan don rgya chen sngo byed pas/_/rgyal sras tshul mchog yongs su 'grub/_/mi las 'das pa'i rna ba ste/_/lha yi rna ba rnam dag pas/_/rgyang ring sgra rnams nye ba bzhin/_/che chung rnam pa kun thos shing /_/
[\[230b.3\]]snying brtse med pas gang smras pa'i/_/zhe gcod ro med tshig gi rnams/_/khro ba'i me las byung ba yi/_/me stag rgal 'dra thos 'gyur zhing /_/lha mo'i glu ru snyan pa dang /_/rgyan gyi phar phur sil khrol dang /_/lha rdzas rol mo'i sgra snyan pas/_/mi rtag tshul thos sgra thos shing /_/
[\[230b.4\]]'jigs dang sdug bsngal rnam pa las/_/mi bzad mya ngan drag po'i sgra/_/nyon mongs nyams bab thos pa dag_/mi dga'i rnam pa thos gyur na/_/skul ma drag pos bskul ba bzhin/_/byang chub sems dpa' mthu ldan zhing /_/khong nas snying rje che ldan te/_/brtson 'grus mchog
[\[230b.5\]]ni rtsom par byed/_/'jig rten sna tshogs 'jig pa yi/_/bde gshegs rnams las chos thos te/_/mya ngan 'das la mos pa'i blos/_/sems can don mang sgrub par byed/_/gzhan sems tshul la de mkhas shing /_/bag la nyal dang bsam shes pas/_/ye shes yo byad
[\[230b.6\]]ldan pa de/_/bsod nams myu gu gsar yang bskyed/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po yi/_/sngon gyi gnas rnams rjes dran zhing /_/'jig rten bsod nams rnam pa dang /_/stobs dang stobs med mthong gyur nas/_/de dag bsam pa'i tshul bzhin du/_/rdzu 'phrul rnam pas lus bsgyur cing /_/
[\[230b.7\]]snod bzhin ston par byed pas na/_/don yod rjod byed mchog tu 'gyur/_/la lar gzugs mdzes yun ldan zhing /_/nyi ma brgya lta'i 'od ldan te/_/ri mo gsal ba'i mtshan rgyas pa/_/thub rgyal mtshan ldan sku mchog gis/_/'gro ba'i mig la bde skyid cing /_/yid la khyab par sim byed pas/_/
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]rgyal dbang mos pa byang chub tu/_/bsgrub phyir 'chi med ston par byed/_/thub dbang zhi tshul dpal ldan pa'i/_/spyod pa rnam par spyod byed cing /_/la lar 'dul dbang ji bzhin du/_/slob ma'i tshul gyis 'dul bar byed/_/la lar lha dbang brgya byin bzhin/_/lha
[\[231a.2\]]yi spyi bo zhabs la thug_/nor sbyin ji bzhin nor mang gtong /_/la lar tshangs ltar gzugs mchog 'dzin/_/la lar spyan gsum phye ba ste/_/dri med zla ba'i rgyan ldan ston/_/la lar lha mi'i rgyal po dang /_/klu yi dpal chen khyer ba ston/_/la lar gnod sbyin rgyal po ltar/_/rdo rje 'bar
[\[231a.3\]]ba thogs pa ston/_/yon tan 'od ldan thub zla ltar/_/la lar g.yang gzhi mtshan bstan ston/_/la lar brgya byin nor bu yis/_/brang la 'od 'bar mdzes pa ston/_/la lar chu yi lha gzugs dang /_/la lar 'dod pa'i lha ltar ston/_/la lar bud med gzugs mdzes dang /_/la lar pho
[\[231a.4\]]smos dga' ba ston/_/la lar brtul zhugs nor ldan te/_/'dod las 'dod chags bral ba ston/_/la lar mi rnams yid 'phrog cing /_/slob dpon slob ma rgyal po byed/_/la lar mthu chen byin rlabs kyis/_/ngan song sdug bsngal rnam mang sel/_/'gro ba'i dad pa
[\[231a.5\]]tshul bzhin du/_/sna tshogs spyod pa las bstan zhing /_/snying rje'i yon tan rgya che bas/_/'jig rten phan pa grangs med byed/_/bsam gtan 'di 'dra'i gnas thob cing /_/khyad par phun sum tshogs thob pas/_/gter gyi mtshan ma slu med bzhin/_/khyad par gong nas gong
[\[231a.6\]]brtson bya/_/de la gnas 'cha' yan bor cing /_/brtul zhugs lhod pa'i tshul bor te/_/dge ba spel phyir brtson par bya/_/de las bzlog pa dman par 'gro/_/ting 'dzin rtsom pa med pa ste/_/rjes su bsgrub pa dkon pas na/_/rnam par rgyal ba 'dod rnams kyis/_/zhi ba'i gnyen po
[\[231a.7\]]tshugs med bsten/_/yid tshul spang ba'i mchog gyur kyang /_/sa ltar mi g.yo brtan pa yi/_/sa mchog mi g.yo ma thob tu/_/de la yid brtan g.yo mi bya/_/mngon par 'dus byas lam byas pa/_/ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'ang 'jig par 'gyur/_/de bas rnam rtog rnam spangs te/_/
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]lam gyi dam pa bsgom par bya/_/bde gtsang rtag pa'i rnam rtog dag_/'dus byas slu ba'i chos can du/_/yang dag rtogs par shes bya ste/_/dngos po'i rnam rtog yongs su spang /_/dmigs pa chung yang byung gyur na/_/nyon mongs mdas gtsag gzhir yang 'gyur/_/de
[\[231b.2\]]'dra'i gnod pa kun bcil na/_/bdud kyi spyod yul 'das par 'gyur/_/gnas pa'i skyon dang ldan gyur na/_/bsam gtan rnam dag tshul mi 'gyur/_/gnas pa'i rjes 'brangs nyams pa ste/_/dong skam bcas zhes de phyir brjod/_/tha snyad tshul dag 'grub don du/_/de ni 'jig rten
[\[231b.3\]]lam zhes bya/_/yod dang med byung gtang med pas/_/gang na'ang ci yang skye ba med/_/nam mkha'i dbyings 'dra yid ldan na/_/srid pa gsum gyi gnas dang bral/_/tshul 'chos bral ba'i spyod brtan la/_/kha gsag med pa'i tshul ldan na/_/'jig rten spyod pa de byed kyang /_/'gro ba
[\[231b.4\]]gcig tu phan pa spyod/_/sems la dbang gyur thob pas na/_/ting 'dzin stobs las nyams pa med/_/de thob yan chad rmad byung ba'i/_/ting 'dzin 'bras bu mang ldan pas/_/dbyar dus rgya mtsho chu klung dag_/chu gsar byung bas skye zhing 'phel/_/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[231b.5\]]pa'i le'u'o//_//sbyin la sogs pa'i bsod nams 'di dag ni/_/shes rab mgon bcas lhag par mthu ldan 'gyur/_/gser gyi rgyan bzangs rnam pa sna tshogs la/_/rin chen phra bkod 'od kyis gsal ba bzhin/_/so so'i don la de dag yon tan mthu/_/shes
[\[231b.6\]]rab 'di nyid rgya chen sgrub par byed/_/dbang po rang rang yul gyi bye brag la/_/mthu zhen yid kyis gsal bar bstan pa bzhin/_/lus 'di srog dang bral na mthu med cing /_/rang gi dgos pa bsgrub pa mi mdzes pa/_/de bzhin shes rab med pas blo gyur na/_/don sgrub 'jig
[\[231b.7\]]rten dag na mdzes pa med/_/dad la sogs pa'i dbang po'i rnam pa yang /_/dbang po gzhan la blo 'dzin shes rab gtso/_/de yi mgon ldan yon tan skyon shes pas/_/nyon mongs zad pa'i tshul la mkhas par 'gyur/_/shes rab med na 'bras bu don gnyer la/_/sbyin pa bdag nyid
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]rnam par dag mi 'gyur/_/gzhan don btang ba sbyin pa'i mchog ces gsungs/_/lhag ma nor spel don gyi sbyor ba yin/_/shes rab mi gsal rnam par bying gyur na/_/byang chub sems dpas rang gi sha byin na/_/sman gyi shing ltar rnam par mi rtog par/_/
[\[232a.2\]]mtho'am dma' bar 'gyur ba de la med/_/de bas 'jig rten 'das pa don gyi gzhi/_/khro med dga' bas phun sum tshogs pa'i sems/_/sbyin pa chen pos 'gro don bsgrub mos pa/_/rgyal sras sa yi dang po 'thob par 'gyur/_/de la gnas pa phal cher byang chub tu/_/mi 'phrogs blo
[\[232a.3\]]'chang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/shes rab mthus bstan lam mchog bde ba des/_/rim gyis dri med rgyal sras sa yang thob/_/de nas rang bzhin rnam dag tshul 'chang zhing /_/gling bzhi 'khor los sgyur bar de 'gyur te/_/rgyal po kun gyi spyi bos bka' blang zhing /_/thub dbang
[\[232a.4\]]rgyal ba bzhin du mchod par 'gyur/_/de dag yan chad 'dod pa'i lha ris dang /_/'jig rten byur bu stong gnyis stong gsum gyi/_/dbang phyug thob 'gyur de dag yan chad du/_/shes rab 'od kyis rgyu rnams sbyangs pas 'thob/_/shes rab snang bas mun pa ma bsal na/_/tshul khrims dag
[\[232a.5\]]dang ldan par de mi 'gyur/_/phal cher shes rab med pas tshul khrims dag_/shes pa'i skyon gyis nyon mongs rnyog bcas 'gyur/_/rang gi don du tshul khrims mi bsgrub na/_/blo ldan srid pa'i btson ra'i skyon mthong zhing /_/de nas 'jig rten ma lus gdon mos pa/_/srid pa'i don du mi
[\[232a.6\]]sgrub smos ci dgos/_/shes rab log pa'i skyon gyis sems rnyog na/_/bzod pa'i yon tan de la gnas ci smos/_/legs par rtogs la mi dga'i tshul 'chang zhing /_/yon tan med pa'i rgyan la grags pa bzhin/_/shes rab ldan pa rnams la gnod pa dag_/bzod pa'i yon tan yod
[\[232a.7\]]pas gnod mi 'gyur/_/shin tu dul ba'i glang po mchog rnams la/_/las kyi khyad par rnam mang bzod pa bzhin/_/brtson 'grus gcig pu byas pa ngal ba'i mtha'/_/shes rab grogs kyis bstangs na don chen 'grub/_/bsgrubs byas rjes la de yi yon tan 'thob/_/de las byung
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]ba'i dub pa yongs su sel/_/mkhas pa rnams la phul du bsngags 'gyur zhing /_/de las phra zhing zab pa gzhan med pas/_/'dod pa'i skyon gyis yongs su ma bsgribs pa'i/_/yid lam drang por shes rab med mi 'gyur/_/de 'dra'i bsam gtan bde dga' mchog ldan pa/_/
[\[232b.2\]]skyon bsags nyes pa chen po grags gyur pa'i/_/lam gol rigs pa'i tshul las brten pa ni/_/skye bo ma rabs yid la ji ltar 'grub/_/shes rab tshul la brtson med blo 'chang na/_/de yi lta ba yongs su dag mi 'gyur/_/de med tshul khrims mi 'dag de med pas/_/ting
[\[232b.3\]]'dzin mi 'thob sdug bsngal zad mi 'gyur/_/shes rab ldan pas skyon las bag byed cing /_/yon tan tshogs las rgyun du bde thob pas/_/nyon mongs 'gro ba'i don la rab brtson zhing /_/yon tan tshogs kyi bde ba'i lam du 'jug_/yang dag rtogs pas ting 'dzin 'thob
[\[232b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/ngag yid lus rnams rnam par dag pa 'grub/_/de phyir skyon med mthu dang ldan gyur pa/_/'jig rten phan pa phun sum tshogs la 'jug_/sbyin pas ci 'dod yid bzhin sgrub pa byed/_/tshig snyan bdud rtsi shin tu gsal ba dang /_/rgyu med mthu dang
[\[232b.5\]]ldan pa'i sdom pa yis/_/gzhan gyi don la mnyam par kun du spyod/_/don la thun mong yang dag bstan byas shing /_/byams pas de dag yid ni dbang bskur te/_/shes rab stobs kyis 'khor lo thogs med de/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'god par byed/_/shes
[\[232b.6\]]rab sngon 'gro mthu chen 'di dag gis/_/byin gyis brlabs shing yongs su bsrungs pas na/_/mtsho med ngan 'gro 'chi dang smad pa dang /_/dogs pa'i stobs kyis 'jigs pa nyer mi 'ong /_/'jigs pa thams cad skyon las byung ba ste/_/shes rab skyon dang lhan cig mi
[\[232b.7\]]'grogs pas/_/ston gyi nam mkha'i sprin tshogs med pa la/_/nyi 'od gsal ba mun dang mi 'grogs bzhin/_/nyi ma 'od chen shar bar gyur bzhin du/_/'gro ba'i rgyud rnams mun nag gang 'gebs pa/_/shes rab 'od kyi mthu chen 'byung bas na/_/thams cad gsal
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]'gyur ming tsam 'ba' zhig lus/_/gang la shes rab 'od chen shar gyur pa/_/de la bya ba'i lhag ma las pa med/_/bskal pa'i mes bsregs 'jig rten gsal ba'i tshe/_/bsreg bya'i lhag ma yod par brjod med bzhin/_/snang ba thams cad gcig tu
[\[233a.2\]]'dus gyur kyang /_/shes rab 'od la bskrun du nyer mi 'gro/_/de bas khe chen de las mchog gzhan med/_/yongs su mnyam pa med par 'ang gzhan med do/_/shes rab tshul brtson bslab pa bde tshul du/_/yongs su rdzogs 'gyur tshul khrims zhi bar 'gyur/_/de bas rang gi mthu
[\[233a.3\]]rnams kun gtugs te/_/de 'dra'i shes rab tshul la brtson par bya/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rgyu dag dang /_/bden pa'i gnas la som nyir mi 'gyur zhing /_/dus gsum de 'drar bsdus pa'i rigs pa ni/_/shes rab shin tu sbyangs pa'i yul 'jug yin/_/shes rab dag
[\[233a.4\]]sbyangs spyod pa'i rnam pa dag_/yid ches dka' zhing yon tan snang la yang /_/skyi g.ya' ngo mtshar thob pa'i dbang gyur pas/_/rgyal sras grags pa chen pos khyab par 'gyur/_/shin tu mthu 'bar shes rab stobs kyi phul/_/bdud dang dpung bcas tshogs kyis bzod mi nus/_/
[\[233a.5\]]shes rab 'od kyis de dag mig rmongs pas/_/de dag mgo 'degs lta bar mos pa med/_/'dod pa'i ltas 'phangs mda' la mgo thub pa'i/_/shes rab go cha sems kyis brtan bgos na/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i dmag mang tshogs kyi rnams/_/gcig pu 'jigs med
[\[233a.6\]]zil gyis mnan cing 'gro/_/mi brtan ngang tshul 'jigs shing rtabs pa'am/_/glen pa'i ngang tshul mya ngan 'dzin pa'am/_/mthu zhan sems la rtsa ba zug gyur pa'i/_/khro dang chags dang dman zil gnon pa'am/_/phan byed rnams la 'jungs pa'i dri ma dag_/'dod chags ldan
[\[233a.7\]]la rten 'cha' rgod pa'am/_/gzi brjid mthu chung le lo'i bsam pa dang /_/shin tu g.yeng bas ma zhi 'char tshul dag_/so so'i rkyen gyi bsam pa thibs po la/_/gnas 'cha' nyes pa'i rnam pa de dang de/_/'gro la phan don dam bcas shes rab can/_/shes rab chen pos
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ma lus yongs su sel/_/skyon bral brtan zhing ngang des de mkhyen nas/_/dga' bde skyid phyir legs par de gzigs shing /_/dbang bskur bdud rtsi shin tu sim byed pas/_/thub dbang rnams kyis de ni dbang yang bskur/_/bde gshegs mdzod spu mtshan rab thon pa yi/_/'od
[\[233b.2\]]chen zla ba gsal bzhin sim byed pas/_/rgyal sras de yi mgo nas dbang bskur na/_/mchod sbyin me la mar khus blugs ltar mdzes/_/chos rgyal rgyal tshab thabs de thob gyur na/_/phyogs bcu kun du sprul pa'i lus bkye zhing /_/sprin chen char gyi rgyun gyis rdul bsal bzhin/_/
[\[233b.3\]]'jig rten sdug bsngal lhun gyis grub par sel/_/rgyal sras mthu mchog de 'dra rmad byung dag_/thams cad shes rab de yi mthu las byung /_/bu la byams pa'i ma 'dra shes rab las/_/de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs 'byung ci mtshar gyi/_/bde gshegs stobs bcu stobs kyi phul
[\[233b.4\]]byung ba/_/mtshungs med mchog tu bya ba thams cad dang /_/yon tan tshogs gzhan ma lus thams cad kyang /_/de 'dra'i shes rab rgyu la brten zhing 'byung /_/'jig rten dag na sgyu rtsal gter mchog dang /_/gtsug lag mig 'dra ci snyed yod pa dang /_/yongs su skyob byed blo
[\[233b.5\]]dang sngags la sogs/_/rnam bkod chos kyi khyad par tha dad dang /_/rnam grangs rnam mang rnam thar sgo dag dang /_/'jig rten phan pa'i rnam pa de dang des/_/rgyal sras mthu chen rnam par ston byed pa/_/de dag thams cad shes rab mthu las 'byung /_/dbang po'i yul rnams lha
[\[233b.6\]]rdzas 'dra bdog pa'i/_/rgyal srid che ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag_/rang bzhin tshul min 'gyur ba med pa yang /_/shes rab yon tan blon po ldan pa'i mthus/_/gzhan la phan byed ro gcig byams pa la/_/'dod chags 'go ba yongs su spang ba dang /_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal mi
[\[233b.7\]]bzod snying rje la/_/mya ngan khur gyi le los mi dma' dang /_/dga' mchog dang ldan yang dag g.yeng med dang /_/'gro don mi g.yel btang snyoms chen po dang /_/yon tan de dang de dag gnyen po'i lam/_/shes rab chen pos bkag pas rnam par mdzes/_/bsam pa bag la nyal la
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]bka' brtsan pa'i/_/shes rab nyi 'od 'bar ltar de med na/_/su zhig yun ring 'jig rten rkyen 'byung ba'i/_/rang bzhin tshul gyur mun nag sel nus yod/_/brtan 'os bla ma rim gro bsnyen bkur te/_/shes rab bsgrub phyir thos pa btsal bar bya/_/rnam pa sum cu
[\[234a.2\]]gnyis kyis shes bya ste/_/yang dag mnyam gzhag yid kyis rnam par sel/_/thos nyung dmus long bsgom pa'i tshul mi shes/_/de med des ko ci zhig bsam par bya/_/de bas thos la brtson bya de rgyu las/_/bsams bzhin bsgoms pas shes rab yangs pa 'byung /_/dri ma rtsod
[\[234a.3\]]med sgo dang brtan pa dang /_/don tshol rtogs pa'i mthu yod rtogs pa dang /_/bsam gtan de yi yon tan skyed pa bas/_/shes rab bsgrub la mngon par brtson par bya/_/shes rab thob pa'i tshul la thabs kyi mdo/_/bsam gtan de don nges pa'i thos mang ba/_/yon tan
[\[234a.4\]]tshogs rgyu shes rab snang ba ni/_/gnyis po de las gtsub shing me ltar 'byung /_/mkhas pa'i skye bos spyod pa'i lam bsten te/_/gti mug rgyur gyur thibs po spang bar bya/_/de bsgribs gyur na zla ba shar gyur kyang /_/char sprin cher bsgribs mi snang mtshungs mi snang /_/le lo snyom
[\[234a.5\]]dang rten ngan brten pa dang /_/gnyid kyi dbang gyur mi rtog ngang tshul dang /_/thub pa'i ye shes mchog la mos med dang /_/log pa'i nga rgyal non pas don 'dri dang /_/dma' sems ngag la zhen pas byung ba'i rgyus/_/mkhas pa'i skye bo bsten par ma dad dang /_/log pa'i rnam rtog dus tshe
[\[234a.6\]]log lta dag_/gti mug rgyu yin de bsal gnyen po ni/_/phung po khams dang skye mched bden pa dang /_/rig pa dag dang rgyu byung tshul brtag dang /_/chos la mkhas pa'i rnam pa de dag ni/_/shes rab thabs kyi yul brgyad rnam pa yin/_/gzugs rnams dbu ba'i tshogs 'dra snying po
[\[234a.7\]]med/_/tshor ba rnam gsum chu yi chu bur tshul/_/'du shes 'dod pa'i yon tan zhugs pa ni/_/smig rgyus ri dgas slu bzhin byis pa slu/_/'du byed rnam pa chu shing rang bzhin 'dra/_/sgyu ma'i tshul las rnam shes gtad pa med/_/de la brten zhing ro 'dra'i lus 'di nyid/_/rnam mang bskyod
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]cing lam rgyud kun du 'khyam/_/bdag dang bdag gi 'di la gang yang med/_/mi gtsang sna tshogs 'dus pa'i tshogs 'di ste/_/rang dbang yod ltar 'khrul 'khor byas pa bzhin/_/sems can 'du shes byis pa slu ba byed/_/mig 'di skad cig 'jig ste bdag ma yin/_/
[\[234b.2\]]mig ldan de min mig la bdag kyang med/_/bdag la mig med skye mched lhag ma yang /_/de dang tshul 'dra gtad med bdag gi med/_/lus la gnas pa'i khams dang phyi rol khams/_/mtshan nyid mi mtshungs 'gal ba gang yang med/_/rnam shes khams kyang mi rtag bdag
[\[234b.3\]]ma yin/_/de las gzhan yang nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/de ltar 'di ni sred rmongs yid ldan la/_/sdug bsngal 'ba' zhig byung bar gyur pa yin/_/sred dang bral na zhi ba'i mchog thob ste/_/tshul khrims ting 'dzin sred sel lam yang thob/_/de dang de dag rten 'brel byung ba
[\[234b.4\]]zhes/_/lta ba rnam dag yod med gnyis mi dmigs/_/'gro ba 'di dag de la sgyu ltar snang /_/de phyir bde la sogs pas 'gyur med bstan/_/'das gyur byung gyur rtog pa log lta ste/_/byung gyur gang yin srid las bde 'gyur zhes/_/de ltar 'das pa'i yul la 'dod bral zhing /_/
[\[234b.5\]]byung dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba smon pa med/_/sdug bsngal tshul gyis mngon par mi bde zhing /_/mi bzad mig phye mngon pa'i tshul yod na/_/de dag don bsgrub phongs dor tshul bsams shing /_/shes ldan su zhig dgar gnas sla snyam sems/_/de ltar rnam grol blo ldan snying rje can/_/
[\[234b.6\]]'gro ba mgon med nyon mongs gzir mthong na/_/thams cad byang chub mchog la ma bkod du/_/dma' las byams btang mya ngan 'dar mi mos/_/'jig rten don sgrub tshul la mthu med pa'i/_/theg pa gnyis po gtan du spang byas shing /_/thub rgyal theg pa snying rjes bstan pa'i lam/_/
[\[234b.7\]]gzhan phan ro gcig rang bzhin de dag 'jug_/dma' 'os tshul la legs pa'i blo mi gzhol/_/che la che min nam yang gnas mi 'gyur/_/gtsang ma'i rang bzhin gtsang dang rtag tu 'brel/_/gzhan yang mthun dang mthun gyur chos nyid tshul/_/bde dang mi bde rmi lam 'drar 'brangs shing /_/
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gti mug skyon gyis dma' ba'i 'gro mthong na/_/las kyi dam pa gzhan don dga' bor zhing /_/rang gi don la de ko ci ste brtson/_/gang zhig 'jig rten phan phyir kun spyod cing /_/mngon pa'i nga rgyal bdag lta yongs spangs te/_/kun la byams pas mi gnyis lam rgyu ba/_/
[\[235a.2\]]de ni mya ngan 'das kyang 'jig rten spyod/_/shes rab rnam dag mngon sgrub theg pa'i mchog_/thub chen thams cad mkhyen nyid de las 'byung /_/de ni 'jig rten rnams kyi mig bzhin te/_/'od ldan nyi ma shar ba'i 'od dang 'dra/_/'khor ba'i skyon gyi khur gyis ngal chad kyang /_/shes rab rnam
[\[235a.3\]]par dbye la skyon med pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas legs bsgrub theg pa la/_/bdag nyid yongs su skyo bar 'gyur ba med/_/bde gshegs mthu can rmad byung mthong 'gyur bas/_/yan lag thams cad spu g.yo dga' gyur cing /_/de bsgrub theg pa'i dam pa spong byed pa/_/g.yo sgyu spyod min rgyu
[\[235a.4\]]ni gzhan med do/_/bdud kyi 'khrug pas ma non su zhig ko_/dkon mchog gsum gyi 'byung gnas theg pa ste/_/gnod pa'i mda' 'byin bde gshegs theg pa la/_/smod par su byed de ni 'gro ba'i sgra/_/shes rab mig zums 'gros 'khyar gyur pa la/_/'jig rten don sgrub rgyal ba'i rgyal
[\[235a.5\]]rigs na/_/snying rje mi skyed skyes bu gang zhig yod/_/de dag rmongs bsal brtson 'grus su mi rtsom/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u'o//_//pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus pa Ar+ya shU ras mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//lo tsA ba A tsAr+ya bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas bsgyur ba'o//_//_
[\[235a.6\]{D3945}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ya ti karmi b+hU mi ka ri pa ri/_bod skad du/_las dang po pa'i sa sbyang ba/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi ma lta bur gzi ldan sku/_/sangs rgyas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_/las ni dang po pa yi sa/_/sbyang ba 'dir ni bshad par bya/_/lam ma sbyangs pa'i nyes
[\[235a.7\]]pa dang /_/lam gyi sbyang ba gang zhe na/_/lam ma sbyangs pa'i skye bo dag_/byes bgrod ngal dub tsha grang dang /_/lci dang rtsub dang skyo ba dang /_/bkres skom gdung shing brnyas pa dang /_/'jig dang yi mug nyams su myong /_/mya ngan 'tshor 'grib bcas pa dang /_/kha cig spyi'u tshugs dmyal ba
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]dang /_/dud 'gro yi dgas rnams su bsten/_/nor dang bza' btung grags pa dang /_/'dod pas byes 'grod sdug bsngal can/_/re ba 'bras bu med pa dang /_/sdug dang bral dang mi sdug phrad/_/mi bzad na rgas 'dzoms bzhin du/_/'chi bdag drung du myur 'gro ba/_/ma tshor
[\[235b.2\]]ga zhar bcas shing brtse/_/tshe 'di don med myur du 'da'/_/yang dang yang du skye ba yi/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa grangs med bsten/_/kyi hud lam las nyams pa yi/_/skye bo dag ni nyam ngar gnas/_/mi bzad mya ngan 'brog dgon du/_/lam gol gyur pa dag dang mtshungs/_/mig
[\[235b.3\]]ldan lam log 'gro ba ltar/_/lam las nyams pa'i skye bo smad/_/de la lam sbyangs pa gang zhe na/_'dir las dang po pa'i sa ni lam gyi dang po ste/_de sbyang ba ni dbye ba rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa'i dkon mchog gsum legs par shes nas phyag 'tshal ba dang /_rgya cher mchod
[\[235b.4\]]pa dang /_yon tan brjod pas bstod pa dang /_snying thag pa nas skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_rjes su dran pa bsgoms pas bslab pa la slob pas skyabs phun sum tshogs pa yin/_mi dge ba bcu'i nyes pa shes pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i yon tan shes pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i
[\[235b.5\]]sdom pa len pa dang /_blangs pa slar mi gtong ba dang /_lan 'ga' nyams na yang chos bzhin du slar 'chos pas sdom pa la gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems kyi phan yon legs par shes pa dang /_de skye ba'i rgyu la gnas pa dang /_sems de yang dag par bskyed pa dang /_bskyed
[\[235b.6\]]pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs ring du spong ba dang /_sems de 'phel zhing mi brjed pa'i chos la gnas pas byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yin pas/_de ltar chos rnam pa gsum la rnam pa bco lngar phye ba 'di ni 'dir sa sbyang ba'i gzhi dang /_rten dang /_gnas zhes bya'o/_/de gzhi de lta bu
[\[235b.7\]]la brten nas/_lam gyi dngos gzhi gang /_ji ltar sbyang zhe na/_gzhi de dag la legs par gnas pas 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems blang ba byas nas/_ji ltar blangs pa'i sdom pa las mi 'da' bar byams pa tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi bsgom zhing /_
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas par bya ste/_'di ni las dang po pa'i sa'i dngos gzhi yid la bya bas/_rim gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa la 'jug par bya'o/_/de yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba bzhi grub nas/_ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo rdzu
[\[236a.2\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas pa na/_sa de nyid kyi khyad par thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin te/_bdag dang gzhan gyi 'byor pa dang /_/'dun dang tshul khrims dbang po dang /_/de bzhin zas dang mi nyal dang /_/shes bzhin du ni mi spyod dang /_/de bzhin dge
[\[236a.3\]]ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_/dam chos nyan dang sems pa dang /_/bar chad med dang gtong ba dang /_/dge sbyong brgya ni tha ma yin/_/dad ldan g.yo med nad nyung dang /_/brtson 'grus shes rab 'dod chung dang /_/chog shes gso sla dgang sla dang /_/sbyangs dang mdzes dang drod rig dang /_/skyes
[\[236a.4\]]bu dam chos mkhas rtags dang /_/bzod dang des dang gya nom pa'o/_/zhes bya ba'i yon tan dang ldan la/_de las gzhan pa theg pa chen po'i tshogs lam gyi khyad par lus la dbang ba la sogs pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i sgo sngon du gyur pas sdug bsngal ba mthong ba na rang dbang med
[\[236a.5\]]par mchi ma'i rgyun 'bab pa la sogs pa 'byung ngo /_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang /_byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi po snga ma'i rten dang bcas pa 'di ni/_tshogs kyi lam dang /_
[\[236a.6\]]las dang po pa'i sa dang /_dad pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/da ni 'dir nyin mtshan gyi cha las yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas pas lam sbyang ba brjod pa/_tho rangs mal nas langs nas ni/_/bzhi gsum dran pas brtul zhugs mchog_/bdag gzhan brje dang 'jig rten gyi/_/chos brgyad
[\[236a.7\]]mnyam par mos pa bskyed/_/de nas yid ni bsdus pa yi/_/kye ma sems can bde 'gyur bsam/_/de nas lus dang tshor ba dang /_/sems dang chos ni mi gtsang dang /_/sdug bsngal mi rtag bdag med ces/_/phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen po bsgom/_/re re'am yang na rim gyis kyang /_/nam
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]langs bar du 'bad pas bsgom/_/gang zhig lus can grol 'gyur ba'i/_/lam gyi dang po 'di nyid yin/_/de nas nam ni langs pa dang /_/ci rigs gtsang sbra byas nas ni/_/mchod rten phyag 'tshal maN+Dal bya/_/sdig bshags la sogs rgyas byas te/_/lhag par skyabs su
[\[236b.2\]]'gro ba dang /_/byang chub sems ni brtan po bskyed/_/ci rigs bskor ba byas nas ni/_/bla ma dang ni rgan po dang /_/chos smra ba la'ang phyag byas te/_/'dzum zhing snyan par smra ba dang /_/de dag dgos pa 'bad de bsgrub/_/bar der dus ni nyer gnas na/_/chos bshad la sogs sems
[\[236b.3\]]can don/_/rang bde btang la 'bad pas bsgrub/_/khye'u sus la sogs zas la spyod/_/dkon mchog sprin las gsungs pa bzhin/_/cha bzhir bgos te bza' bar bya/_/lhag par phongs la bza' btung bgo_/snga dro yi ni dus dag tu/_/bri dang klog pa la sogs pa'i/_/
[\[236b.4\]]chos spyod bcu la 'bad pa'am/_/tsha tsha bya'am 'gro phan gdags/_/dus kyi dam pa snga dro ni/_/don med 'da' bar mi bya'o/_/nyi ma'i gung la byams pa dang /_/dran pa nyer gzhag cung zad bsgom/_/de nas yang ni phyag 'tshal sogs/_/snga ma bzhin du rgyas par bya/_/
[\[236b.5\]]phyi dro skye bo dam pa dang /_/'grogs shing ngal so bden don la/_/'gro zhing srid las yid 'byung ba'i/_/legs bshad ro ni myang bar bya/_/phyi 'phred slar yang snga ma bzhin/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgom pa dang /_/mchod rten phyag 'tshal la sogs bya/_/dmar thag chad nas
[\[236b.6\]]mtshan mo ni/_/bla ma'i bsnyen bkur tshul bzhin bya/_/rang gi rkang pa bkrus nas ni/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong bsgom pa'am/_/don chen ldan pa'i kha ton bya/_/nam gyi cha stod 'das pa dang /_/tshul bzhin yid la byed pa yis/_/rigs pa bzhin du nyal bar bya/_/nyin par dang ni mtshan
[\[236b.7\]]mo yang /_/lag bzangs kyis ni zhus pa dang /_/rin chen phreng ba las bshad ltar/_/sna tshogs dge ba'i phyogs la 'bad/_/de nas tshe 'di nyid la yang /_/drod la sogs pa thob par 'gyur/_/de ltar thos pa dang bsam pa la gnas pas tshogs kyi lam phal pa dang khyad par can sbyang
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]ngo /_/de las gong du bsgom pa la byang bas mos pas spyod pa'i sa dag la dbang po dang stobs kyi bden pa dag bsgoms pa'i sa sbyang ba ni dkon mchog sprin la sogs par blta zhing /_rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i sa sbyang ba ni sa bcu'i le'u las
[\[237a.2\]]bstan to/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyi sa yi dang po pa/_/tshogs kyi sa ste de sbyangs mdor bsdus pa/_/cung zad bshad las dge ba gang thob pa/_/des ni 'gro rnams dag pa'i sa thob shog_/las dang po pa'i sa sbyang ba zhes bya ba slob dpon mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dgra
[\[237a.3\]]las rgyal gsang ba'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po kr-iSh+Na pa dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3946}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo ng+hisatwa tsar+ya su tri kr-i [#]ta pa
[\[237a.4\]]bA ra/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdo tsam gdams ngag tu byas pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nges par legs pa'i byang chub dang /_/mngon par mtho ba thob 'dod pas/_/dkon mchog gsum la lhar
[\[237a.5\]]bzung nas/_/dang po snying rje kun la lta/_/de nas byang chub sems bskyed de/_/thabs dang ldan pa'i spyod pa yis/_/rang gi sems nyid dang por gdul/_/dang po rang nyid ma 'dul [#]bar/_/gzhan dag gdul bar ji ltar nus/_/ji ltar 'dab gsheg ma tshang ba'i/_/bya yis mkha' la
[\[237a.6\]]'phur mi nus/_/de bzhin lta spyod med pa yi/_/gang zag dag ni ji ltar grol/_/de phyir de gnyis 'grub pa'i phyir/_/dka' ba'i 'bad pa chen pos bya/_/dka' bas sbyang ba ma byas par/_/sla bas goms par ji ltar 'gyur/_/go bgos khur khyer rgyal sras des/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen
[\[237a.7\]]bsten byas te/_/shes rab gsum la gzhi bcas nas/_/go 'phang mchog tu 'gro ba yi/_/lta ba nyid la gtsor sbyangs te/_/tshul khrims gtsang ma'i gos gyon nas/_/sgrub la nan tan gces [#]su bya/_/chos kyi rjes su bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/dus dang gnas skabs kun du yang /_/sbyor ba dngos gzhi
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]rjes gsum gyi/_/las rnams dran pas zin par bya/_/skyon spangs [#]legs sgrub don yod bya/_/spyod lam don med du mi bya[#]/_/rtag tu rang gi yon tan sbyangs[#]/_/dge ba'i phyogs kyi sbyor ba la/_/spro bya zhum dang sems mi gsad/_/nyes spong yon tan dge 'phel ba'i/_/grogs
[\[237b.2\]]btsal mthun pas de sems bzung [#]/_/yon tan can la gus phyag bya/_/nyon mongs skye 'gro [#]thabs kyis spang /_/mtho dman grogs kun dag la yang /_/chu las 'o ma len pa bzhin/_/nyes pa dor la legs pa blang /_/byas pa [#]drin gzo slar phan gdags/_/gzhan gyi sdig rkyen mi bya
[\[237b.3\]]zhing /_/dge ba'i bar chad mi bya'o/_/mtho la phun tshogs phrag dog med/_/grogs dang dman la brnyas thabs dang /_/khyad du gsad [#]pa nyid mi bya/_/rang skyon gzhan gyi yon tan bsgrag_/gzhan skyon mi gleng rang mi bstod/_/'di bas phyi ma gtsor gzung ste/_/byed dgu chos dang bstun
[\[237b.4\]]te bya/_/'di yi zang zing rnam spangs te/_/'phags pa'i nor gyis lus brgyan bya/_/sdug bsngal dag la bder mi bzung [#]/_/gnyid rmugs le lo g.yeng spangs te/_/nges par 'chi ba'i dus [#]shes bskyed/_/dge ba chung yang 'bad pas bsgrub/_/sdig pa chung yang rnam par spang /_/
[\[237b.5\]]chos kyi ched du ma gtogs par/_/kha zas gos sogs don mi gnyer/_/'dod pa chung dang chog [#]shes bya/_/'jig rten chos brgyad rnam par spang /_/ngo dga' gzhogs [#]slong sogs mi bya/_/rang la skyon yod mi tshor bar/_/gzhan gyi skyon la dpyad mi bya/_/smra dga' khas len dpa' [# ]
[\[237b.6\]]byas nas/_/de bzhin mi sgrub spang bar bya/_/g.yo dang sgyu dag mi bya zhing /_/log pa'i 'tsho ba rnam par spang /_/chos dang mthun pas bsgrub par bya/_/nye du 'brel ba la sogs la/_/zhen par [#]chags par mi bya zhing /_/phyogs ris zhen phyogs med par bya/_/gzhan la re ba chung bar
[\[237b.7\]]bya/_/mi dge'i las [#]la mi bstod smad/_/dgos pa med pa'i 'du 'dzi spang /_/bre mo'i gtam la dga' mi bya/_/zhes pas 'dod pa'i yid smon dgag_/yon tan thob dang tshogs 'phel ba'i/_/las la zhum dang ngo tsha spang /_/nga rgyal khengs pa gnyen pos gzhom/_/zhe gdug kheng [# ]
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]grags rnam par spang [#]/_/dngos dang brgyud pas sems can kun/_/nye du 'brel bar gyur pa [#]na/_/lus ngag yid gsum dri med pas/_/de dag kun la bu bzhin blta/_/snying rjes bzhin 'dzum gsong por smra/_/dga' ba'i mig gis kun la blta/_/'gror grogs
[\[238a.2\]]mtho dman nye ring snyoms/_/bstod dang bkur stis [#]mi dregs shing /_/smod dang brnyas la zhe mi sdang /_/phongs pa rnams la snying rje yis/_/phan ni gdags pa nyid du bya/_/gang la chags pa spang bya ste/_/dman pa rnams la snying rje dang /_/phan pa'i bsam pas gdams ngag bya/_/sems can
[\[238a.3\]]bsam pa tha dad pas/_/bya ba don chen brtags te bya/_/thams cad mgu bar su yis nus/_/'on kyang 'gyod pa med pa yis/_/sdug bsngal khyad bsad bde ma chags/_/rang gi sems sbyang [#]gzhan sems gzung [#]/_/brnyas dang nyes pa byung la sogs/_/gnyen po las dang brdzun pas sbyang /_/
[\[238a.4\]]de ltar blta zhing byang chub kyi/_/spyod pa yi dam brtan par bya/_/mi lus rin chen chud mi gsan/_/nges par 'chi bas long med srid/_/brtson 'grus me bzhin drag tu spyod/_/mngon zhen bdag lta'i rtsa ba chod/_/dug gsum 'khor ba gnyen pos chom/_/phyin ci log gi g.yang sa dor/_/
[\[238a.5\]]'khor ba'i rgyun chod las chu skoms[#]/_/ngan song gsum po sgo chod la/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyi nad gzhil ste[#]/_/mtho ris thar pa'i skas la 'dzegs/_/sgrib pa gnyis sbyong [#]tshogs gnyis rdzogs/_/sku dang ye shes sa 'thob [#]ste/_/'bad pa med par gzhan don sgrubs[#]/_/byang chub
[\[238a.6\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa mdo tsam gdams ngag tu byas pa/_slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3947}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi pA tha [#]pra dI paM/_bod skad du/_byang chub lam gyi sgron ma/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[238a.7\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad dag dang de'i chos dang /_/dge 'dun rnams la gus pa chen pos phyag byas te/_/slob ma bzang po byang chub 'od kyis bskul gyur pas/_/byang chub lam gyi sgron ma rab tu gsal bar bya/_/chung ngu
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]'bring dang mchog gyur pas/_/skyes bu gsum du shes par bya/_/de dag mtshan nyid rab gsal ba/_/so so'i dbye ba bri bar bya/_/gang zhig thabs ni gang dag gis/_/'khor ba'i bde ba tsam dag la/_/rang nyid don du gnyer byed pa/_/de ni skyes bu tha mar shes/_/srid pa'i bde
[\[238b.2\]]la rgyab phyogs shing /_/sdig pa'i las las ldog bdag nyid/_/gang zhig rang zhi tsam don gnyer/_/skyes bu de ni 'bring zhes bya/_/rang rgyud gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi sdug bsngal kun/_/yang dag zad par kun nas 'dod/_/skyes bu de ni mchog yin
[\[238b.3\]]no/_/sems can dam pa byang chub mchog_/'dod par gyur pa de dag la/_/bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa yi/_/yang dag thabs ni bshad par bya/_/rdzogs sangs bris sku la sogs dang /_/mchod rten dam pa mngon phyogs nas/_/me tog bdug spos dngos po dag_/ci 'byor pa yi
[\[238b.4\]]mchod pa bya/_/kun bzang [#]spyod las gsungs pa yi/_/mchod pa rnam pa bdun dag kyang /_/byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par/_/mi ldog pa yi sems dag gis/_/dkon mchog gsum la rab dad cing /_/pus mo [#]lha nga sar btsugs nas/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas nas ni/_/dang por
[\[238b.5\]]skyabs 'gro lan gsum bya/_/de nas sems can thams cad la/_/byams pa'i sems ni sngon 'gro bas/_/ngan song gsum du skye sogs dang /_/'chi 'pho sogs kyis sdug bsngal ba'i/_/'gro ba ma lus la bltas te/_/sdug bsngal gyis ni sdug bsngal ba/_/sdug bsngal
[\[238b.6\]]sdug bsngal rgyu mtshan [#]las/_/'gro ba thar par 'dod pa yis/_/ldog [#]pa med par dam 'cha' ba'i/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya[#]/_/de ltar smon pa'i sems dag ni/_/bskyed pa'i yon tan gang yin pa/_/de ni sdong po bkod pa yi/_/mdo las byams pas rab tu bshad/_/
[\[238b.7\]]de yi mdo klog pa'am bla ma la mnyan te/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi [#]yon tan mtha' med pa/_/rnam par shes par byas la de nas rgyu mtshan du/_/de ltar yang dang yang du sems ni bskyed par bya/_/dpa' sbyin gyis zhus mdo dag las/_/'di yi bsod nams rab bstan pa/_/
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]gang de tshigs bcad gsum tsam du/_/mdor bsdus 'dir ni bri bar bya/_/byang chub sems kyi bsod nams gang /_/de la gal te gzugs mchis na[#]/_/nam mkha'i khams ni kun gang ste/_/de ni de bas ltag par 'gyur/_/gang+gA'i bye ba [#]grangs snyed kyi/_/
[\[239a.2\]]sangs rgyas zhing rnams mi gang gis/_/rin chen dag gis kun bkang ste/_/'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/_/gang gis [#]thal mo sbyar bgyis te/_/byang chub tu ni sems btud na/_/mchod pa 'di ni khyad par 'phags/_/de la mtha' ni ma mchis so/_/byang chub smon pa'i
[\[239a.3\]]sems dag bskyed nas ni/_/'bad pa mang pos kun du spel bya zhing /_/'di ni skye ba gzhan du'ang dran don du/_/ji skad bshad pa'i bslang ba'ang yongs su bsrung /_/'jug sems bdag nyid sdom pa ma gtogs par/_/yang dag smon pa 'phel bar 'gyur ma yin/_/rdzogs pa'i
[\[239a.4\]]byang chub smon pa 'phel 'dod pas/_/de phyir 'bad pas 'di ni nges par blang /_/so sor thar pa rigs bdun gyi/_/rtag tu sdom gzhan ldan pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi/_/skal pa yod kyi gzhan du min/_/so sor thar pa ris [#]bdun dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[239a.5\]]bshad pa la/_/tshangs spyod dpal ni mchog yin te/_/dge slong sdom pa dag tu bzhed/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa dag gi_/tshul khrims legs [#]gsungs cho ga yis/_/yang dag mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/_/bla ma bzang las sdom pa blang /_/sdom pa'i cho ga la mkhas dang /_/bdag
[\[239a.6\]]nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas/_/sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan/_/bla ma bzang por shes par bya/_/de la 'bad pas 'di 'dra ba'i/_/gal te bla ma ma rnyed na/_/de las gzhan sdom nod pa yi/_/cho ga yang dag bshad par bya/_/de la sngon tshe 'jam pa'i dpal/_/a ba rA [#]dzar gyur
[\[239a.7\]]pa yis/_/ji ltar byang chub thugs bskyed pa/_/'jam dpal gyi ni sangs rgyas zhing /_/rgyan gyi mdo las bshad pa ltar/_/de bzhin 'dir ni rab gsal bri/_/mgon po rnams kyi spyan snga ru/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed cing /_/'gro ba thams cad mgron du gnyer/_/de
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]dag 'khor ba las bsgral lo/_/gnod sems khro ba'i sems nyid dang /_/ser sna dang ni phrag dog nyid/_/deng nas bzung nas byang chub mchog_/thob kyi bar du mi bya'o/_/tshangs par spyod pa spyad bya zhing /_/sdig dang 'dod pa spang bar bya/_/tshul khrims sdom pa la dga' bas/_/
[\[239b.2\]]sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya/_/bdag nyid myur ba'i tshul gyis ni/_/byang chub thob par mi spro zhing /_/sems can gcig gi rgyu yis ni/_/phyi ma'i mu mthar gnas par bgyi/_/tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/zhing dag rnam par sbyang bar bya/_/ming nas gzung ba byas
[\[239b.3\]]pa dang /_/phyogs bcu dag tu rnam par gnas/_/bdag gi lus dang ngag gi las/_/thams cad du ni dag par byas/_/yid kyi las kyang dag bya ste/_/mi dge'i las rnams mi bya'o/_/rang gi lus ngag sems ni rnam dag rgyu/_/'jug pa'i sems kyi bdag nyid sdom gnas pa/_/
[\[239b.4\]]tshul khrims bslab pa gsum la legs bslabs pas/_/tshul khrims bslab pa gsum la gus cher 'gyur/_/de bas rnam dag rdzogs byang chub/_/sems dpa'i sdom pa'i sdom dag ni/_/'bad par byas pas rdzogs byang chub/_/tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[239b.5\]]bsod nams ye shes rang bzhin gyi/_/tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs pa yi/_/rgyu ni sangs rgyas thams cad dag_/mngon shes skyed pa nyid du bzhed/_/ji ltar 'dab gshog ma skyes pa'i/_/bya [#]ni mkha' la 'phur mi nus/_/de bzhin mngon shes stobs bral bas/_/sems can
[\[239b.6\]]don byed nus pa min/_/mngon shes ldan pa'i nyin mtshan gyi/_/bsod nams dag ni gang yin te/_/mngon shes dag dang bral gyur la/_/skye ba brgyar yang yod ma yin/_/myur du rdzogs pa'i byang chub tshogs/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'dod gyur pa/_/des ni 'bad byas mngon shes
[\[239b.7\]]dag_/'grub par 'gyur gyi [#]le los min/_/zhi gnas grub pa ma yin pas/_/mngon shes 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas/_/de phyir zhi gnas bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/yang dang yang du 'bad par bya/_/zhi gnas yan lag rnam nyams pas/_/rab tu 'bad de bsgoms [#]byas kyang /_/lo na [# ]
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]stong phrag dag gis kyang /_/ting 'dzin 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir ting 'dzin tshogs le'u las/_/gsungs pa'i yan lag la legs gnas/_/dmigs pa gang rung gcig [#]la yang /_/yid ni dge la gzhag par bya/_/rnal 'byor zhi gnas grub gyur
[\[240a.2\]]na/_/mngon shes dag kyang 'grub par 'gyur/_/shes rab pha rol phyin sbyor dang /_/bral bas sgrib pa zad mi 'gyur/_/de phyir nyon mongs shes bya yi/_/sgrib pa ma lus spang ba'i phyir/_/shes rab pha rol phyin rnal 'byor/_/rtag tu thabs bcas bsgom par bya/_/thabs dang
[\[240a.3\]]bral ba'i shes rab dang /_/shes rab bral ba'i thabs dag kyang /_/gang phyir 'ching ba zhes gsungs pa/_/de phyir gnyis ka spang mi bya/_/shes rab gang dang thabs gang zhes/_/the tshom dag ni spang bya'i phyir/_/thabs rnams dang ni shes rab kyi/_/yang dag dbye ba gsal bar bya/_/
[\[240a.4\]]shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs/_/dge ba'i tshogs rnams thams cad dag_/rgyal ba rnams kyi [#]thabs su bshad/_/thabs bsgoms [#]dbang gis bdag nyid kyis/_/gang zhig shes rab rnam bsgom pa/_/de ni byang chub myur du thob/_/bdag
[\[240a.5\]]med gcig pu bsgoms [#]pas min/_/phung po khams dang skye mched rnams/_/skye ba med par rtogs gyur pa'i/_/rang bzhin stong nyid shes pa ni/_/shes rab ces ni yongs su bshad/_/yod pa skye ba rigs min te/_/med pa'ang nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/nyes pa gnyis kar
