[\[240a.6\]]thal 'gyur phyir/_/gnyis ka dag kyang 'byung ba min/_/dngos po rang las mi skye zhing /_/gzhan dang gnyis ka las kyang min/_/rgyu med las min de yi phyir/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med/_/yang na chos rnams thams cad dag_/gcig dang du mas rnam dpyad na/_/ngo bo nyid ni mi
[\[240a.7\]]dmigs pas/_/rang bzhin med pa nyid du nges/_/stong nyid bdun cu'i rigs pa dang /_/dbu ma rtsa ba sogs las kyang /_/dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi/_/stong pa nyid ni grub bshad pa/_/gang phyir gzhung ni mangs 'gyur bas/_/de phyir 'dir ni ma spros la/_/grub pa'i grub mtha'
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]tsam zhig tu/_/bsgom pa'i phyir ni rab tu bshad/_/de bas chos rnams ma lus pa'i/_/rang bzhin dag ni mi dmigs pas/_/bdag med par ni bsgom gang yin/_/de nyid shes rab bsgom pa yin/_/shes rab kyis ni chos rnams kun/_/gang gi rang bzhin ma mthong zhing /_/shes
[\[240b.2\]]rab de nyid rig bshad pa/_/rnam rtog [#]med par de bsgom bya/_/rnam rtog las byung srid pa 'di/_/rnam par rtog [#]pa'i bdag nyid de/_/de phyir ma lus rtogs spangs pa/_/mya ngan 'das pa mchog yin no/_/de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/_/rnam rtog ma rig chen po ste/_/'khor
[\[240b.3\]]ba'i rgya mtshor ltung bar byed/_/rtog [#]med ting [#]'dzin la gnas pa[#]/_/nam mkha' bzhin du rtog med gsal/_/zhes gsungs so/_/rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jug pa'i gzungs las kyang /_dam chos 'di la rgyal ba'i sras/_/rnam par mi rtog bsams [#]gyur na/_/rnam rtog
[\[240b.4\]]bgrod dka' rnams 'das te/_/rim gyis mi rtog thob par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/lung dang rigs pa dag gis ni/_/chos rnams thams cad skye med pa'i/_/rang bzhin med pa nges byas nas/_/rnam par rtog med bsgom par bya/_/de ltar de nyid bsgom byas nas/_/rim
[\[240b.5\]]gyis drod sogs thob byas nas/_/rab dga' la sogs thob 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yun mi ring /_/sngags mthu nyid las grub pa yi/_/zhi dang rgyas sogs las rnams kyis/_/bum pa bzang grub la sogs pa/_/grub chen brgyad sogs stobs kyis kyang /_/bde
[\[240b.6\]]ba yis ni byang chub tshogs/_/yongs su rdzogs par 'dod pa dang /_/bya ba spyod sogs rgyud gsungs pa'i/_/gal te gsang sngags spyod 'dod na/_/de tshe slob dpon dbang bskur [#]phyir/_/bsnyen bkur rin chen sogs sbyin dang /_/dka' sgrub [#]la sogs thams cad kyis/_/bla
[\[240b.7\]]ma dam pa mnyes par bya/_/bla ma mnyes par gyur pa yis/_/yongs rdzogs slob dpon dbang bskur bas/_/sdig kun rnam dag bdag nyid ni/_/dngos grub sgrub pa'i skal ldan 'gyur/_/dang po sangs rgyas rgyud chen las/_/rab tu 'bad pas bkag pa'i phyir/_/gsang ba
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]shes rab dbang bskur ni/_/tshangs par spyod pas blang [#]mi bya/_/gal te dbang bskur de 'dzin na/_/tshangs spyod dka' thub la gnas pas/_/bkag pa spyad par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/dka' thub sdom pa de nyams te/_/brtul zhugs can de pham pa yi/_/
[\[241a.2\]]ltung ba dag ni 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/de ni ngan song nges lhung bas/_/grub pa yang ni yod ma yin/_/rgyud kun nyan dang 'chad pa dang /_/sbyin sreg [#]mchod sbyin sogs byed pa/_/slob dpon dbang bskur rnyed 'gyur zhing /_/de nyid rig la nyes pa med/_/gnas brtan mar me mdzad dpal
[\[241a.3\]]gyis[#]/_/mdo sogs chos las bshad mthong ba/_/byang chub 'od kyis gsol btab nas/_/byang chub lam bshad mdor bsdus byas/_/byang chub lam gyi sgron ma slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po
[\[241a.4\]]de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa/_chos 'di ni zhang zhung gi tho ling gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa'o[#]//[ {D3948}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi mArga [#]dI paM pany+tsi [#]ka nA ma/_bod skad du/_byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i dka'
[\[241a.5\]]'grel zhes bya ba/_'phags ma rje btsun sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde mchog 'khor lo dam tshig gsum rgyal po/_/'jig rten dbang phyug sgrol ma phyag 'tshal 'dud/_/byams pa thogs med bla ma gser gling pa/_/
[\[241a.6\]]'jam dbyangs zhi ba'i lha dang byang chub bzang /_/bla ma rnams la dang bas phyag byas nas/_/nyi zer lta bu'i dka' 'grel bri bar bya/_/byang chub snying por bgrod pa'i lam bzang po/_/zla zer lta bu'i lam sgron 'di yin te/_/'di na cung zad mi gsal gang yin pa/_/nyi zer lta bu'i
[\[241a.7\]]'grel pas lam gsal bya/_/bstan bcos rtsom pa'i tshad dang mi ldan yang /_/'dun cing gus pa'i slob mas bskul ba dang /_/sangs rgyas bstan pa rab tu 'phel bya dang /_/gzhung rnams mi mthun rtsod pa zhi bya'i phyir/_/nyi zer lta bu'i 'grel pa bri bar bya/_/mkhas rnams ngo mtshar
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bskyed pa dang /_/mnyam rnams go bar sla ba dang /_/dman rnams bag chags gzhag pa'i phyir/_/dka' 'grel 'di ni bri bar bya/_/gzhung nyung ba la don mang ba'i/_/bstan bcos 'di ni rtogs par dka'/_/dam pa rnams dang bral bas na/_/thams cad du ni rnam par 'khor/_/de bas
[\[241b.2\]]skyes bu blo ldan pas/_/bla ma yongs su mnyes byas la/_/bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa'i/_/yang dag man ngag zhu bar bya/_/'dir bla ma dam pa gser gling pa dang bla ma dam pa rje btsun dpal byang chub bzang po'i zhal rin po che bum pa lta bu nas/_bdud rtsi lta bu dang /_sbrang
[\[241b.3\]]rtsi lta bu'i man ngag gi thigs [#]pa rgyal rigs kyi slob ma byang chub 'od dang /_dus yun ring por nye bar bstan [#]pa'i slob ma dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba gnyis kyis yang dang yang du gsol ba btab pa'i ngor man ngag gi thigs pa 'thor ba rnams 'dir bla ma'i zhal snga nas dang /_
[\[241b.4\]]mdo sde la sogs pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas bsdu bar bya'o/_/byang chub 'od kyis [#]dus rtag tu/_/bdag la tshig ni bdun dris pas/_/rtsa bar don de ma gsal zhes/_/bskul ba'i don du bri bar bya/_/sngon gyi slob dpon mkhas pa chen po nor gyi rtsa lag gi zhal nas/_mdo don smra ba rnams la
[\[241b.5\]]ni/_/man ngag cung zad sbyin par bya/_/dgos pa bcas dang bsdus don bcas/_/tshig don bcas dang mtshams sbyor bcas/_/brgal lan bcas pas [#]bsnyad par bya/_/zhes bshad pas 'dir yang shes rab dang ldan pa dang /_bla ma mkhas pa la brten pa dag gis tshul ji lta ba
[\[241b.6\]]bzhin du sbyar ba byas na theg pa chen po'i lam bzang po skye bo chen po'i chos lugs shing rta chen po'i lam chen po 'di myur du rtogs par 'gyur ro/_/mdo sogs lung dang bstan bcos dang /_/bla ma rnams kyi [#]gsung bzhin du/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam/_/bdag
[\[241b.7\]]gis nges par bshad par bya/_/de gang yin zhe na/_dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad dag dang de'i chos dang /_/dge 'dun rnams la gus pa chen pos phyag bya ste/_/slob ma bzang po byang chub 'od kyis bskul gyur pas/_/byang chub lam gyi sgron ma rab tu gsal bar bya/_/zhes bya ba
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]la sogs pa'i gzhung 'di yin no/_/gzhung de dag gang yin zhe na/_dus gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_dus gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rkang pa gcig ni rtogs par sla'o/_/slob ma bzang po zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod yin pas
[\[242a.2\]]so/_/de gang yin zhe na/_byang chub 'od ces bya ba 'di yin no/_/bskul gyur pas zhes bya ba ni des bdag la 'di skad du/_bod kyi yul 'di na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa chen po'i lam 'di la log par rtog pa'i gang zag bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa
[\[242a.3\]]dag phan tshun rtsod cing rang rang gi rtog ges zab pa dang rgya chen po'i don la rang gi rtog pa dpyod [#]cing so so nas mi mthun pa dag mang du mchis pas de dag the tshom bsal du gsol zhes bdag la yang dang yang du bskul bar gyur pas/_de'i don du bdag gis [#]mdo la sogs pa'i rjes
[\[242a.4\]]su 'brangs nas byang chub lam gyi sgron ma rab tu gsal bar bya'o/_/byang chub lam gyi sgron ma de gang yin zhe na/_sems can dam pa byang chub mchog_/ces bya ba nas/_de nyid rig [#]la nyes pa med/_/ces pa'i bar gyi [#]gzhung 'di [#]yin no/_/de la chung dang zhes pa nas mchog yin no
[\[242a.5\]]zhes pa'i gzhung gis theg pa chen po'i snod dang snod ma yin pa bstan te/_skyes bu tha ma dang /_skyes bu 'bring ni zhar la bshad pa yin no/_/tshig don rnams ni rtogs par sla'o/_/rang rgyud gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis/_/gang zhig gzhan gyi sdug bsngal kun/_/yang dag zad
[\[242a.6\]]par kun nas 'dod/_/skyes bu de ni mchog yin no/_/zhes pas ni theg pa chen po'i snod bstan pa yin no/_/don 'di la dgongs nas ji skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems can la/_/bu gcig pa la bya ba bzhin/_/rkang gi [#]gting nas byams pa ste/_/de ltar rtag tu byed par
[\[242a.7\]]'dod/_/yang ji ltar phug ron rang gi bu mchog byams/_/rang gi bu de pang na 'khyud nas 'dug_/de 'dra ba la khong khro 'gal ba ltar/_/brtser bcas lus can bu la [#]'ang de dang 'dra/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po nor gyi rtsa lag gis kyang ji skad du/_dman
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]pa de dang de'i thabs kyis [#]rang gi rgyud du gtogs pa'i bde ba don du gnyer/_/'bring po sdug bsngal ldog pa kho na'o bde min gang phyir de ni sdug bsngal gnas yin phyir/_/dam pa rang gi rgyud la yod pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis gzhan dag la ni bde ba dang /_/sdug bsngal gtan
[\[242b.2\]]ldog kho na don gnyer gang phyir de yi sdug bsngal gyis de sdug bsngal phyir/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang gang gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyis [#]sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /_gzhan gyi bde bas yid bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur gyi/_bdag gi ni ma yin pa de lta
[\[242b.3\]]bu'i rigs can la yin te/_de dag ni rang gi bde ba la mi lta ba dang /_de dag ni gzhan dag sdug bsngal gyi chu bo chen po las yongs su bskyab par nus so snyam du 'bad pa byed do/_/rang bzhin gyis snying rje che ba dag ni snying rje la goms pa'i stobs kyis rang sdug
[\[242b.4\]]bsngal yang gzhan bde ba la mngon par dga' ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na skyes bu gang zhig rang bzhin gyis pha rol po nyam [#]thag pa dag mthong na mi bzod cing bdag dang gzhan brje [#]bar sems shing bu gcig pa g.yang sar lhung ba dang /_chu bo chen pos khyer
[\[242b.5\]]ba dang /_me 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug pa mthong ba na de mi bzod pa bzhin du/_'gro ba mtha' dag la bu gcig pa ltar lta ba de ni 'dir theg pa chen po'i snod du bsngags so/_/de lta bu'i sems can chen po de la ji ltar bya snyam pa la/_bla ma rnams kyis bstan pa yis/_/yang dag
[\[242b.6\]]thabs ni bstan par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni 'di yin no/_/de la bla ma rnams ni rje btsun dpal byang chub bzang po dang /_rje btsun su war+N+Na dwI [#]pa la sogs pa'o/_/yang dag thabs zhes bya ba ni/_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis dang /_mngon par shes
[\[242b.7\]]pa bskyed nas gzhan don khyad par can bya ba'i thabs dang /_thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i tshogs gnyis bsag [#]pa'i thabs dang /_bdag dang gzhan don myur du rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i theg pa chen po'i chen po gsang sngags kyi lugs kyi [#]thun mong ma yin pa'i tshogs
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]gnyis bsags pa'i thabs rnams so/_/de lta bu'i thabs de dag rgyas par bshad par 'dod nas/_rdzogs sangs bris sku la sogs dang /_/zhes pa nas/_de nyid rig la nyes pa med pa'i bar ro/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba ni thar pa'i grong khyer chen por 'jug pa'i
[\[243a.2\]]sgo lta bur gyur pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems kyi gzhi lta bur gyur pas de bstan par 'dod nas/_rdzogs sangs bris sku la sogs dang /_/mchod rten dam chos mngon phyogs nas/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshig rkang bcu gnyis kyis bstan te/_mngon phyogs nas zhes pa ni de bzhin
[\[243a.3\]]gshegs pa'i sku mngon du phyogs par byas shing mthong ba las byang chub kyi sems skye'o [#]zhes theg pa chen po'i mdo rgyal po la gdams pa'i sngon gyi rtogs pa brjod pa las kyang mthong ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag kyang gsung ngo /_/cho ga rgyas pa ni 'og nas ston par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar
[\[243a.4\]]byug ris kyi dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa bdun du dkon mchog gsum gyi gzugs brnyan so sor bzhugs su gsol la/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i dkon mchog gsum yang gnas so so de dag tu spyan drang ba'am/_yang na zhing khams de dag nyid du
[\[243a.5\]]bdag nyid 'dug par mos te lus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' re re'i mdun du bdag nyid 'dug par bsam [#]la pug pug por ram sor mo bsnol la spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas mchod pa'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang /_phung po gsum pa byas la bla ma la yon phul
[\[243a.6\]]te skyabs su 'gro ba bya'o/_/de yang dkon mchog gsum ni 'di lta bu yin te/_de kho na nyid kyi dkon mchog gsum dang /_mdun du bzhugs pa'i dkon mchog gsum ste/_de lta bu shes pa sngon [#]du 'gro bar bya'o/_/me tog bdug spos dngos po dag_/ces pa ni zang zing gi mchod pa mtshon
[\[243a.7\]]pa'o/_/mchod pa rnam pa bdun dag kyang /_/zhes pa ni sgrub pa'i mchod pa mtshon pa'o/_/'dir byang chub sems dpa' tshogs kyi lam pa slob dpon du gyur pa des bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag [#]pa'i phyir/_mchod pa la mkhas par bya ba yin te/_de smra ba [#]'dod nas/_kun bzang spyod las gsungs
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa yi[#]/_/mchod pa rnam pa bdun dag kyang /_/zhes bya ba 'di yin te/_kun bzang spyod [#]ces bya ba ni 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las 'byung ba'i 'phags pa bzang po spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po yin te/_'di ni phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen pos
[\[243b.2\]]chen po la bzhugs pa kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i [#]brnyes pa rnams kyi [#]kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dang /_kun du bzang po'i smon lam yin pas 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sde snod [#]kyi mar me lta bu yin no zhes bla ma
[\[243b.3\]]dam pa mkhas pa chen po dag gsungs pa [#]yin no/_/gsungs pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun/_/zhes bya ba ni bla ma kha cig gi zhal nas 'phags pa bzang po [#]spyod pa'i smon lam las mchod pa bdun gsungs te/_ji snyed su dag phyogs bcu'i zhes pa sh+lo kas ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyis [#]phyag
[\[243b.4\]]'tshal ba'i mchod pa bstan to/_/bzang por spyod la dad pa'i zhes pa la sogs pa'i sh+lo kas ni lus dbul ba'i mchod pa bstan to/_/rdul gcig steng na zhes pa'i sh+lo kas ni de dag yul du byas te dang ba'i mchod pa bstan to/_/de dag bsngags pa mi zad rgya mtsho rnams/_/zhes pa la sogs
[\[243b.5\]]pas ni bstod pa'i mchod pa bstan to/_/me tog dam pa zhes pa la sogs pas ni bla na yod pa'i mchod pa bstan to/_/mchod pa gang rnams bla med rgya che ba/_/zhes pas ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa bstan to/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ces pas ni phung po gsum pa'i mchod pa bstan to/_/
[\[243b.6\]]gzhung gzhan gyis mi [#]mchod pa de dag gi [#]bsngo ba bstan pa yin no zhes gsungs so[#]/_/yang bla ma dam pa kha cig gi zhal nas/_'phags pa bzang po [#]spyod pa'i smon lam las mchod pa bdun gsungs te/_'di ltar me tog dam pa dang /_phreng ba dam pa dang /_sil snyan dam pa dang /_byug pa dam
[\[243b.7\]]pa dang /_mar me dam pa dang /_bdug spos dam pa dang /_na bza' dam pa rnams so/_/dri mchog dam pa dang /_phyi ma'i phur ma gnyis ni byug pa dam pa dang /_bdug pa gnyis kyi nang du 'dus pa nyid yin la bkod pa'i khyad par zhes pa ni snga ma de dag re re zhing yang brjod du med pa'i bkod pa bya'o
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]zhes gsung ngo [#]/_/bla ma mkhas pa gzhan dag ni 'phags pa bzang po [#]spyod pa'i smon lam las mchod pa bdun du gsungs pa ni 'di ltar yan lag bdun par 'dus te/_sgrub pa'i mchod pa yin no zhes gsungs te/_de nyid las bdun po de dag rdzogs pa'i rjes la
[\[244a.2\]]'di skad du/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang da ltar gyi/_/phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs mchod par gyur/_/zhes mchod pa nyid yin par gsal bar gsungs so zhes gsung ngo /_/de dag ni gar yang 'gal ba med pa de rang nyid gang la mos pa de gzung bar bya'o/_/'di ltar
[\[244a.3\]]mchod pa ni rnam pa gnyis te/_zang zing gi [#]mchod pa dang /_sgrub pa'i mchod pa'o/_/zang zing gi mchod pa ni gnyis te/_mngon sum pa nyid dang /_yid kyis byas pa'o/_/mngon sum pa ni gnyis te/_me tog la sogs pa dang /_bdug pa la sogs pa dang /_rol mo la sogs pa dang /_rgyal
[\[244a.4\]]srid dang /_nor bu rin po che la sogs pa bdag nyid la yod pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni sems rten dang bcas pa dang /_bu dang bu mo dang /_chung ma dang bran la sogs pa'o/_/yid kyis [#]byas pa la gnyis te/_dang po ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kyi [#]bdag po med cing /_gzhan gyis [# ]
[\[244a.5\]]yongs su ma bzung ba'i rdzas phul du byung ba ma lus pa ste/_ji ltar 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin dang /_'phags pa dgongs pa rgyud kyi phreng ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i mdo dang /_dkon mchog ta la la'i mdo dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa las gsungs pa
[\[244a.6\]]lta bu'o/_/gnyis pa ni yid kyi [#]rnam par 'phrul pa las byung ba'i bkod pa nam mkha'i mdzod las byung ba ste/_'di ltar 'khor los [#]sgyur ba'i rgyal srid rin po che bdun dang /_nor bu rin po che gser dang /_dngul dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_chu shel dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po
[\[244a.7\]]dang /_mu tig dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_man shel dang /_pad+ma rA ga dang /_asma gar+b+ha [#]dang /_mu sa la gal [#]pa dang /_dun las dang /_in+d+ra nI la dang /_mar ka ta dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shaM ka shi la dang /_byi [#]ru dang /_ke ke ru dang /_ke ke ru chen po la sogs pa'i nor bu de dag gi char pa 'bab pa
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]dang /_de dag gi gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gzhal yas khang dang /_dra ba'i tshogs brjod du med pa dag gzhan yang dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs las 'byung ba lta bu ste/_me tog phal cher me tog bla re dang /_/me tog bkod pa'i 'od zer rab 'gyed cing /_/
[\[244b.2\]]me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram byas te/_/bdag nyid chen po de dag rgyal bas [#]mchod/_/ces gsungs te/_de bzhin du bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_rin po che dang /_pad+ma dang /_rgyan phreng [#]dang /_rgyal mtshan te/_de dag kyang kha dog sna tshogs
[\[244b.3\]]pa'o/_/sngar gyi tshigs su bcad pas kun la sbyar bar bya'o/_/de bzhin du gdugs bzo legs pa yu ba rin po che las grub pa kha dog sna tshogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa khebs pa brjod du med pa dang /_de bzhin du rgyal mtshan yang de bzhin te/_thams cad gdugs
[\[244b.4\]]bzhin no/_/ba dan dang rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan yang tshad dang rgyu dang grangs snga ma bzhin no/_/gzhan yang me tog kha dog dang dbyibs dang dri phun sum tshogs pa'i char dang /_de'i phreng ba dang /_de'i gdugs dang /_de'i rgyal mtshan dang /_de'i ba dan dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i ba dan
[\[244b.5\]]dang /_gzhal med khang bkod pa sna tshogs pa du ma brjod du med pa dang /_mar me yang tshul de bzhin pa dang /_spos kyi char la sogs pa yang snga ma'i tshul dang ldan pa dang /_zhal zas bza' ba dang /_btung ba kha dog dang dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa dang /_na bza' dri zhim pos bsgos
[\[244b.6\]]pa dang /_rol mo'i sgra dbyangs snyan cing yid 'phrog par byed pa'i pi wang dang /_gling bu dang /_rnga dang /_rnga pa Ta ha dang /_rnga bo che dang /_rnga zlum dang /_rdza rnga dang /_dung dang /_zangs dung dang /_cha lang dang /_ting ting shag dang /_Da [#]ma ru dang /_lha dang /_mi'i glu snyan pa yid 'phrog par byed pa dang /_
[\[244b.7\]]dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan cing don dang ldan pa dang phye ma'i phur ma ri rab bye ba phrag brgya gcig tu bsdoms [#]pa tsam la sogs pa'o/_/de yang 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las 'byung ba bzhin no/_/sgrub pa'i mchod pa ni gnyis te/_sgrub pa'i mchod pa nyid
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]dang /_bla na med pa'i [#]mchod pa'o/_/dang po la bdun te/_phyag 'tshal ba'i mchod pa dang /_zang zing gi mchod pa'i mchod pa dang /_sdig pa bshags pa'i mchod pa dang /_rjes su yi rang pa'i mchod pa dang /_de bzhin du bskul ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_yongs
[\[245a.2\]]su bsngo ba'i mchod pa zhes bya ba dag go/_/de la phyag 'tshal ba'i mchod pa la yang gnyis te/_lus kyi mchod pa dang /_ngag gi mchod pa'o/_/lus kyi mchod pa ni 'phags pa bzang po [#]spyod pa las/_ji snyed su dag ces pa la sogs pa dang /_bzang po'i spyod la dad pa'i stobs dag
[\[245a.3\]]gis/_/zhes pa la sogs pa dang /_rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed ces pa la sogs pa'o/_/de dag gis [#]ni dmigs pa'i yul du bya ba dang /_lus dbul ba dang /_phyag bya ba de gsungs so/_/don de nyid 'phags pa phung po gsum pa'i mdo las gsungs te/_de pus mo g.yas pa
[\[245a.4\]]sa la 'dzugs pa na zhes pa dang /_de pus mo g.yon pa sa la 'dzugs pa na zhes pa dang /_de lag pa g.yas pas la 'dzugs pa na sems can thams cad g.yas phyogs kyi lam la gnas par gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed do zhes pa dang /_de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa dang mgo sa la gtugs
[\[245a.5\]]pa na zhes pa'i tshul de bzhin du shes par bya/_de'i bsngo ba de nyid las 'di skad du bdag gi yan lag lngas phyag btsal ba 'dis sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa lnga sel bar gyur cig_/mig lnga yongs su dag par gyur cig_/dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/lam lnga la gnas
[\[245a.6\]]par gyur cig_/mngon par shes pa nyams pa med pa lnga thob par gyur cig_/sems can 'gro ba lngar skyes pa dag 'gro ba lnga las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_tshul khrims khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_shes rab khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rnam par
[\[245a.7\]]grol ba khyad par du 'phags pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba khyad par du 'phags pa thob par gyur cig_/sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /_chos nyan pa dag [#]dge 'dun dang 'grogs pa thob par gyur cig ces gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/ngag gis [#]mchod pa yang lus kyis [#]phyag byed pa'i
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]dus de nyid kyi cho ga rtogs pa ci yod pas dkon mchog gsum gyi bstod pa glu dbyangs kyis tshig tu 'don cing phyag byed pa'o/_/zang zing gi mchod pa ni sngar brjod zin to//_//[#]sdig pa bshags pa'i mchod pa ni gser 'od dam pa'am/_ltung ba bshags pa'am/_phung po gsum
[\[245b.2\]]pa'i mdo'am/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa la sogs pa'o/_/sdig pa bshags pa de yang mchod pa nyid yin te/_ji skad du 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las/_bdag dang gzhan gyi sdig pa bshags pa yang bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/
[\[245b.3\]]rjes su yi rang ba'i mchod pa yang 'phags pa zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las 'byung ba bzhin te mchod pa nyid yin no/_/bskul ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa'i mchod pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba'i mchod par 'gyur ba'i tshul yang mdo nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/bla na med pa'i mchod pa la
[\[245b.4\]]gnyis te/_dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang dmigs pa med pa'o/_/de la dmigs pa dang bcas pa ni 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las/_blo gros rgya mtsho gsum po 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa bla na med pa ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_byang chub
[\[245b.5\]]tu sems bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/de bzhin du 'phags pa mthar gyis [#]yang dag 'phags pa'i mdo las/_bzang po phan yon bzhi po 'di dag mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin
[\[245b.6\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa yin te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sbyin gnas mchog la dad par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag la bzlas [#]bltas te sems can gzhan yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas byang chub kyi sems brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_skyes bu chen
[\[245b.7\]]po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mthong nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsdus par 'gyur ba ste bzhi po 'di dag go zhes gsungs so/_/sems can mgu bar byed pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bla na med pa yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ba tsha'i [#]chu klung gi mdo las ji skad gsungs pa dang /_
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]slob dpon zhi ba [#]lhas kyang /_gang dag bde na thub dbang rnams dgyes shing /_/gang la gnod na thub dbang mi dgyes pa/_/de dag mgu bas thub dbang thams cad dgyes[#]/_/de la gnod byas thub la gnod byas 'gyur/_/zhes pa dang /_yang de nyid las/_de bzhin
[\[246a.2\]]gshegs rnams mnyes par bgyi slad du/_/'jig rten bran du deng nas mchi bar bgyi/_/skye bo'i tshogs kyis [#]bdag mgo rkang bcad dam/_/gsod kyang rung ste 'jig rten mgon dgyes mdzod/_/thugs rje ldan pa dag gis [#]'gro 'di kun/_/bdag gir mdzad pa 'di la dogs ma mchis/_/sems
[\[246a.3\]]can gzugs su snang ba 'di dag kun/_/mgon po min nam [#]ci na 'dir mi gus/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes bya'ang de nyid yin/_/zhes pa dang /_yang de nyid las/_byams pa'i bsam ldan mchod pa gang /_/de ni sems can che ba nyid/_/sangs rgyas dad pa'i bsod nams gang /_/de ni sangs rgyas
[\[246a.4\]]che ba nyid/_/ces bslab pa kun las btus pa las gsungs so/_/spyod 'jug las kyang /_sems can mgu bya ma gtogs pa/_/rgyal ba mnyes pa'i thabs gzhan med/_/ces gsungs pa dang /_yang de nyid las don 'di rgyas par bshad de de nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang mdo nyid na
[\[246a.5\]]rgyas pas mdo [#]nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de la dmigs pa med pa'i mchod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yin te/_de la ni mchod par bya ba dang /_mchod par byed pa dang /_mchod pa'i rdzas med de/_de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las/_gang gis [#]nga la gzugs su mthong /_/gang gis
[\[246a.6\]]nga la sgrar shes pa/_/de dag log par mthong pa ste/_/skye bo 'di yis [#]nga mi mthong /_/sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku/_/'dren pa rnams ni chos nyid blta/_/chos nyid mthong bar bya min pas/_/de ni rnam par shes mi nus/_/zhes gsungs so/_/don 'di ni 'phags pa rtag tu ngu'i le'u las
[\[246a.7\]]gsal bar gsungs pas der blta bar bya'o/_/de bas na 'phags pa seng ge sgra'i mdo las/_sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa la sangs rgyas mthong ba med na/_sangs rgyas la mchod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos de ni gnas med do/_/de la sangs rgyas la mchod pa gang zhe na/_gang 'du shes kyi
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]mtshan ma mi skyed pa'o/_/gang la sems med pa dang /_sems las byung ba med pa dang /_sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa med pa dang /_chos su 'du shes pa med pa dang /_dge 'dun du 'du shes pa med pa dang /_gang zag dang /_bdag dang /_pha rol por 'du shes pa med pa ni de bzhin
[\[246b.2\]]gshegs pa la mchod pa yin no zhes gsungs te/_'di'i don rgyas par mdo nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de bas na 'phags pa thogs med kyi [#]zhal snga nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ni sgrub pa'i mchod pas mnyes par 'gyur gyi/_zang zing gi mchod pas ni de mnyes par mi
[\[246b.3\]]'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yang legs par drangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na sangs rgyas ni chos kyi skus gnas pa yin te/_sangs rgyas phal po che'i le'u las/_sangs rgyas rnams ni chos kyi sku/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba med/_/rnam dag nam mkha' lta bu ste/_/zhes gsungs
[\[246b.4\]]pa dang /_'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las kyang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chos nyid du yang mi dmigs na/_gzugs dang mtshan nyid du lta dmigs par ga la 'gyur zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal nas kyang /_chos rnams [# ]
[\[246b.5\]]thams cad stong pa la/_/gang la bstod cing gang gis bstod/_/skye dang 'jig pa rnam spangs shing /_/gang la mtha' dang dbus med pa/_/gzung dang 'dzin pa mi mnga' ba'i/_/'dir ni khyed bstod nus pa gang /_/zhes gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i mchod pa'i bye brag ni byang chub sems dpa'
[\[246b.6\]]dbang po rtul po dang rnon po'i bye brag gis de dang de shes par bya'o/_/rtsa ba nyid la 'jug par bya ste/_byang chub snying po'i mthar thug par/_/mi ldog pa yi sems kyis [#]su/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_byang chub snying po ni drang ba'i don du dpal rdo rje'i gdan byang chub chen po'i gnas dang /_
[\[246b.7\]]'og min gyi gnas dpal stug po bkod pa'i zhing ngo /_/de dag tu rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pas na snying po'o/_/nges pa'i don du ting nge 'dzin de brnyes pa'i gnas 'di yin bya ba med de/_don dam par chos thams cad kyi dbyings nyid yin pas so/_/'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]mdo las/_byang chub snying po nam mkha' ste/_/byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid yin[#]/_/zhes gsungs so/_/mi ldog pa yi sems kyis [#]su/_/zhes bya ba ni 'dir phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam pa gsum ste/_sbyor ba'i lam nas mi ldog pa dang /_bden
[\[247a.2\]]pa mthong ba nas mi ldog pa dang /_sa brgyad pa nas mi ldog pa'o/_/'di'i don ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las rgyas par blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang so so'i [#]skye bo nyid nas phyir mi ldog pa dang /_bden pa mthong
[\[247a.3\]]ba nas phyir mi ldog pa dang /_sa bdun pa nas phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/'di'i [#]don slob dpon dpal ye shes grags pas mdzad pa'i de kho na nyid la 'jug pa'i bstan bcos chen por gsal bar mdzad pa der blta bar bya'o/_/yang na phyir mi ldog pa ni bzhi ste/_sems bskyed pa
[\[247a.4\]]nas phyir mi ldog pa dang gsang ste phyir mi ldog pa dang /_bzod pa thob nas [#]phyir mi ldog pa'o/_/dang por skyabs 'gro lan gsum bya zhes bya ba ni dkon mchog gsum re re la lan gsum gsum bya ba'o[#]/_/skyabs su 'gro ba'i don bsdus nas smras pa/_gnas dang rten dang bsam pa
[\[247a.5\]]dus/_/bslab pa rang bzhin tshad dang tshul/_/bya ba dbye ba [#]nges tshig dbye/_/nyes dmigs dgos pa phan yon yin/_/'dir skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul brjod par bya ste/_skyes bu 'ga' zhig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yid nges par byung ba/_rtag tu 'chi ba rjes su dran pa/_
[\[247a.6\]]rang bzhin gyis [#]snying rje dang shes rab che ba/_so sor thar pa'i ris bdun po las gang yang rung ba'i tshul khrims la skyon med par gnas pa de gal te khyim pa zhig yin na ni dge bsnyen gyi bslab par gyur pa bslab pa'i gzhi lnga dang /_de'i phyogs su gtogs pa bslab pa bzhi bcu rtsa
[\[247a.7\]]lnga dang ldan pa dang /_de rab tu byung [#]ba zhig yin na ni rang gi [#]bslab pa'i tshul dang /_ji ltar nyan thos kyi sar bshad pa'i dge sbyong gi rgyan dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_gzhan yang rten bzhi dang /_tshul bzhi la sogs pa dang /_gzhan yang cho ga dang /_spyod lam dang /_'tsho ba dang /_
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]tshul khrims dang /_lta ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_gzhan yang nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang /_zas kyi tshod rig pa dang /_dbang po rnams kyi sgo bsdams [#]pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs par lta ba'i skyes bu de 'di
[\[247b.2\]]snyam du ma la so sor thar pa'i tshul khrims 'di tsam gyis [#]ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par mi 'gyur na/_ji ltar na bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par 'gyur zhig gu/_'di ltar theg pa chen po zhes bya ba bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par byed pa zhig yod ces grag gi[#]/_
[\[247b.3\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa cig las btsal bar bya'o zhes bsams nas bla mar 'os pa'i dam pa de yun ring du yongs su mnyes par byas te/_de mnyes par gyur nas de'i zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa khyod bdag la thugs [#]brtse bar mdzad du
[\[247b.4\]]gsol/_bdag la bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par byed pa'i thabs theg pa chen po'i lam de stsal du gsol zhes g.yo sgyu dang bral ba'i sems kyis [#]zhu bar bya'o/_/de nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen des slob ma de brtag pa gsum gyis brtags te[#]/_'di ltar spyod lam dang /_
[\[247b.5\]]rmi lam dang /_'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i pra dbab pas brtags la de snod du 'dug par shes nas bla ma de yid dga' ba dang /_bzhin 'dzum pa dang /_zang zing dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang bral ba'i sems dang slob ma de la snying brtse ba'i sems kyis sdig pa can
[\[247b.6\]]gyi skye bos dben pa'i sa phyogs su sa gzhi legs par 'thas par byas la gtsang ba der ba'i rnam lngas skyang [#]nul dang byug pa byas la/_tsan+dan la sogs pa'i dri phul du byung bas kyang byugs shing [#]der dri zhim po'i me tog sil mas [#]gtor bar bya'o/_/der dkon mchog gsum gyi gzugs
[\[247b.7\]]brnyan lugs ma la sogs pa dang /_po ti la sogs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams khri'am stegs bu la bzhugs par bya'o/_/der bla re la sogs pa dang /_me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i yo byad ji ltar 'byor pa dang /_rol mo'i bye brag dang /_zhal zas dang /_rgyan cha la
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]sogs pa sta gon byed du bcug la/_de nas slob ma des gdan khri me tog gis brgyan pa'i steng du dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs su gsol la/_'di snyam du 'di ni 'gro ba ma lus pa'i skyabs dang dpung gnyen yin no snyam du bla ma la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed
[\[248a.2\]]la/_khrus byas te gos gtsang ma bgos la bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_bdag 'khor ba'i gnas 'dir thog ma med pa'i dus nas sdug bsngal du mas gtses shing shin tu nyam thag par gyur te/_mgon ma mchis pa/_
[\[248a.3\]]skyabs ma mchis pa/_dpung gnyen ma mchis pa/_bdag gi [#]mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen mdzad du gsol zhes lan gsum du bya'o/_/de nas bla ma des 'di skad du skyes bu khyod 'khor ba las skyo zhing yid byung bas shing rta chen po'i lam la 'jug par 'dod pa shin tu legs so/_/'di
[\[248a.4\]]ltar shes par gyis shig_/dkon mchog gsum zhes bya ba mgon med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa dag gi [#]mgon dang /_skyabs dang dpung gnyen du gyur pa yod kyi[#]/_khyod dang ba'i yid dang /_shin tu spro ba'i yid kyis 'gro ba mtha' dag yul du byas te/_de las
[\[248a.5\]]skyabs su 'gro ba gyis shig_/de la sri [#]zhu dang /_bsnyen bkur tshul bzhin du bya ba'i phyir mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor pa ci yod pas tshogs par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o/_/de nas slob ma des pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs shing thal mo sbyar nas me tog phul te/_/'di skad du/_skyes
[\[248a.6\]]bu gtso bo dgongs su gsol/_/thog ma med nas 'di bar du/_/bdag ni 'khor bar 'khor gyur te/_/sdug bsngal rnams kyis [#]shin tu dub/_/gang gis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa'i/_/lam de khyod kyis bstan du gsol/_/zhes lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bla ma des
[\[248a.7\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dkon mchog thams cad yul du byas la/_lus kyi bkod pa brjod du med par mos la/_lus re re la mgo brjod du med pa dang [#]/_mgo re re la lce brjod du med par mos te/_sngar brjod pa'i lus dang ngag gi mchod pa dang /_zang zing gi mchod pa rgya
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]che ba dang /_sdig pa bshags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bskul ba dang /_gsol ba gdab pa dang /_yongs su bsngo ba dag ni mchod pa rnam pa bdun zhes bya ba yin la/_mchod pa rnam pa bdun po de'i rjes la skyabs su 'gro ba bya'o/_/de ltar skyabs su song ba des skyabs su 'gro
[\[248b.2\]]ba'i bslab pa bsrung bar bya ste/_lha gzhan la phyag mi btsal ba dang /_gzhan la gnod pa dang 'tshe ba spang ba dang /_mu stegs can dang mi 'grogs shing de dag la bsnyen bkur mi bya ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi khyad par dang /_yon tan rjes su dran pas yang dang yang du
[\[248b.3\]]skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_bka' drin chen po rjes su dran pas dus rtag tu mchod pa la brtson zhing bza' ba dang btung ba'i phud kyang dbul ba dang /_snying rje rjes su dran pas 'gro ba gzhan yang tshul 'di lta bu la nye bar dgod pa dang /_bya ba gang byed pa dang /_dgos pa ci yod pa na
[\[248b.4\]]dkon mchog gsum la mchod nas gsol ba 'debs shing 'jig rten pa'i thabs gzhan spang ba'o[#]/_/phan yon ni gsum 'thob ste/_'di ltar rgyu'i dus dang /_lam gyi dus dang /_'bras bu'i dus so/_/dang po ni tshe rabs 'di dang gzhan gyi phan yon te bla ma las shes par bya'o/_/de
[\[248b.5\]]ltar skyabs su song ba'i phan yon shes pa des nyin lan gsum dang mtshan lan gsum du skyabs su 'gro bar bya zhing /[ #]dkon mchog gsum tha na bzhad gad kyi phyir ram/_srog gi phyir gtang [#]bar mi bya zhing bsrung bar bya'o/_/de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can bstan nas/_da ni
[\[248b.6\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bstan pa'i phyir/_de nas sems can thams cad la zhes pa la sogs pa tshig rkang sum cu rtsa bzhis bstan te/_de nas zhes pa ni skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas zhes bya'o/_/sems can thams cad ces pas ni sems bskyed pa'i dmigs pa bstan te/_de yang
[\[248b.7\]]sems can ni 'di tsam du zad do zhes tshad gzung [#]bar mi nus te/_mdo las gal te phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi [#]khams thams cad chu'i dkyil 'khor du gyur la/_skyes bu zhig gis [#]lo brgya phrag stong stong na spu'i rtse mo zhig gis [#]chu de las 'thor bar byed na chu'i dkyil 'khor [#]ni zad par
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]'gyur gyi[#]/_sems can gyi khams ni zad par 'gyur ba med do zhes gsungs pa dang /_'phags pa kun du bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi rgyal po las kyang /_nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ji tsam par/_/sems can ma lus mtha' yang de tsam mo/_/zhes
[\[249a.2\]]gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i sems can yul du byas nas sems bskyed par bya'o/_/byams pa'i sems ni sngon 'gro bas/_/zhes pa ni mar 'du shes pa las drin du gzo ba'i [#]sems 'byung ba ni byams pa'o/_/byams pa'i sems las snying rje'i sems 'byung la snying rje'i sems
[\[249a.3\]]las byang chub kyi sems 'byung bas na bdag gis 'dir/_byams pa'i sems ni sngon 'gro bas/_/zhes smras so/_/tshig rkang pa bdun ni dkyus ji lta ba nyid do/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par bya/_/zhes bya ba ni gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba byas pa'i rjes [#]la yang bdag la 'byor pa
[\[249a.4\]]ci yod pas dkon mchog gsum dang bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mchod pa dbul ba tshul bzhin du byas la/_bla ma'i spyan sngar maN+Dal byas te/_bsam pa bzang po g.yo sgyu dang bral bas bla ma 'di ni sangs rgyas mngon sum na bzhugs pa nyid yin no snyam du bsams la/_dus
[\[249a.5\]]gsum gyi [#]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mdzad pa de dag ma lus par bdag gis rdzogs par bya'o zhes bsams la/_pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs pas me tog phul la/_thal mo legs par sbyar la 'di skad du/_kun mkhyen ye shes phung po can/_/srid pa'i 'khor lo rnam
[\[249a.6\]]sbyong ba/_/khyod zhabs pad+ma spangs nas ni/_/gtso bo gzhan la skyabs ma mchis/_/'gro ba'i dpa' bo thub chen gyis/_/bdag la bka' drin stsal du gsol/_/byang chub sems mchog bla med pa/_/dam pa de ni bdag la stsol/_/zhes lan gsum du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bla ma
[\[249a.7\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa chen po la bzhugs pa thams cad dang /_sngon dang da ltar gyi [#]bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag spyan drangs te/_de dag gi spyan sngar
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'phags pa bzang po spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i cho gas rgyud legs par dag par bya'o/_/de ltar snod shin tu sbyangs nas bla ma la slob ma des yang lag pa me tog dang bcas pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/bla ma des rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti
[\[249b.2\]]dang /_grags pa dang /_sgra dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_zang zing dang bcas pa'i sems med pas 'di snyam du/_e ma ngo mtshar ro/_/'jigs pa chen po'i dus 'dir 'di lta bu'i sems can dam pa 'byung ba ni ngo mtshar ro zhes bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang pos
[\[249b.3\]]cho ga bya'o/_/de yang 'dzam bu'i gling ni sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyi dgongs pa tha dad par gyur te/_slob dpon rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU [#]ti dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa shAn ta de ba dang /[ #]slob dpon 'phags pa tsan+d+ra go mi dang /_slob dpon daMSh+T+ra [#]se
[\[249b.4\]]na dang /_slob dpon dpa' bo dang /_slob dpon shAn [#]ta ra te la sogs pa mkhas pa chen po de dag gi [#]dgongs pa ni 'di ltar tha dad par 'gyur te/_dang por ni byang chub kyi sems de nyid la tha dad par gyur to/_/gnyis par ni byang chub kyi sems de'i cho ga la tha dad par gyur to/_/gsum
[\[249b.5\]]par ni byang chub kyi sems de skye ba'i tshul la'o/_/bzhi par ni sems de'i bslab bya'i tshul la tha dad par gyur te/_don dang po de la slob dpon kha cig gi zhal nas mos pas spyod pa pa [#]'jig rten pa'i lam gyis bsdus pa'i sems de ni smon pa'i sems yin no zhes gsungs so/_/la la'i
[\[249b.6\]]zhal nas ni [#]ji srid dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems de ni kun rdzob kyi rnam pa ste/_smon pa'i sems so zhes bzhed do/_/gzhan ni tshogs kyi lam pa thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems de ni smon pa'i sems yin no zhes bzhed do/_/kha cig ni bsod nams
[\[249b.7\]]mngon par 'du bya ba dang mi ldan pa'i sems ni smon pa'i sems yin no zhes bzhed do/_/la la ni/_'gro bar 'dod dang 'gro ba yi/_/zhes pas rdzogs pa'i byang chub yul du byed pa tsam de ni smon pa'i sems yin no zhes bzhed do/_/de ma yin pa gzhan yang yod de gzhung mangs par
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa'i don la yang tha dad par gyur te/_de dag nyid kyis mdzad pa'i gzhung de dang der blta bar bya'o/_/gsum pa'i don la yang kha cig ni gang zag gi drung du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas kyang de skye bar bzhed do/_/la la ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar
[\[250a.2\]]ma yin par sems bskyed par mi bya'o zhes bshad do/_/gzhan dag ni 'di skad du/_/byang chub kyi sems skye ba ni rnam pa bzhi'i tshul gyis skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bzhed do/_/don 'di [#]bzhi pa la yang tha dad par gyur te/_kha cig gi zhal nas byang chub sems dpa' ni lnga ste/_sems
[\[250a.3\]]dang po bskyed pa dang /_spyod pa la 'jug pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'o/_/de la snga ma gnyis kyi bslab pa ji snyed pa'i zhes bzhed do/_/la las [#]ni mdo las gsungs pa thams cad bsrung bar bya ba yin no zhes bzhad
[\[250a.4\]]do/_/la la ni tshogs kyi lam pa'i bslab pa ji snyed pa bsrung bar bya'o zhes bzhad do/_/gzhan dag ni bslab pa 'di dang 'di lta bu zhes mi bzhed do/_/kha cig ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i bslab [#]pa'i thog tu sdong po bkod [#]pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i mdo dang /_dad pa'i stobs
[\[250a.5\]]bskyed pa'i mdo la sogs par yang bshad mod kyi/_re zhig 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ba dang /_brjed par mi 'gyur ba'i chos brgyad bsrung bar bya'o zhes bzhed do/_/de dag ni mtshon pa tsam dang /_'di ltar sngon gyi mkhas
[\[250a.6\]]pa chen po de dag gi lugs thams cad 'dir bkod par gyur na ni gzhung shin tu mangs par 'gyur ro/_/slob dpon chen po de rnams ni theg pa chen po'i lam la tshad ma'i skyes bur gyur pa/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po la goms pa/_byang chub kyi sems rnam pa gnyis la thugs brtan
[\[250a.7\]]pa'o/_/de la slob dpon kha cig gis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa'o/_/la las ni bden pa gzigs pa'o/_/la las ni 'jig rten chos mchog chen po brnyes nas sprul pa'i sku las gdams ngag thob pa dag yin pa dang /_mdo nyid na [#]yang de dag ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin du bcom
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pas/_de dag ni lam chen po nyid yin no zhes khong du chud par bya'o/_/'on kyang rang rang gi bla ma dag gis ji ltar gnang ba'i lugs de gzung bar bya'o zhes bdag gi bla ma dag gsung ngo /_/de la 'dir re zhig slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_slob
[\[250b.2\]]dpon 'phags pa thogs med dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa shAn ta de ba dag smon pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i cho ga'i tshul 'di la tha dad pa med cing mthun pa dang /_da ltar bdag gi bla ma rje btsun dpal byang chub bzang po dang /_bla ma rje btsun su wa r+N+Na dwI pa dag kyang 'phags
[\[250b.3\]]pa de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba dang /_bdag kyang bla ma rje btsun de dag gi rjes su 'brang ba yin pas bdag la slob ma'i tshogs kyis gsol ba btab nas byas pa'i cho ga'i thabs cung zhig bdag gis [#]bkod pa ni 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_'phags pa thogs med dang /_'phags pa
[\[250b.4\]]shAn ta de ba dag gi lugs yin no zhes khong du chud par bya'o/_/de dag ni zhar la bshad pa'o/_/de la byang chub kyi sems kyi ljon shing skye ba la chu'i rlan lta bu'i chos gnyis sngon du 'gro ba yin te/_'di ltar sems sbyang ba [#]dang /_bla ma la yon dbul ba'o/_/bla ma la yon dbul ba
[\[250b.5\]]yang 'phags pa bskal pa bzang po'i mdo dang /_snying rje chen po las ji ltar 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/sems sbyang ba ni 'phags pa kun du bzang po'i smon lam sngar ji skad [#]brjod pa dang [#]/_yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis bya ba yin no/_/de nas skye bo chen po'i
[\[250b.6\]]chos lugs shing rta chen po'i lam bla ma gcig [#]nas gcig tu brgyud pa slob dpon chen po shAn ta de ba'i cho ga'am/_slob dpon chen po thogs med kyi cho gas tshad med pa bzhi po bsgom pa sngon du song bas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub tu sems
[\[250b.7\]]bskyed pa'i slob ma'i rgyud de las/_sems kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhig skye zhe na/_don 'di la dgongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa'i mdo las gsungs te/_ji skad du/_blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_btsun pa shA ra dwa [#]ti'i bu byang chub sems
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]dpa' rnams kyi sems dang po bskyed pa de ni mi zad pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro/_/sems de ni nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres par skyes so/_/theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa med pas sems de ni ma 'brel bar skyes so/_/phas kyi rgol
[\[251a.2\]]ba thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pas sems de ni sra bar skyes so/_/sems de ni bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed par skyes so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas sems de brtan par skyes so/_/'dus byas thams cad mi rtag par shin tu rig pas sems de ni rtag
[\[251a.3\]]par skyes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pas sems de ni mi g.yo bar skyes so/_/log par sgrub pa thams cad dang bral bas sems de ni mi brdzi [#]bar skyes so/_/mi bskyed pas sems de ni rtag par skyes so/_/gnyen po med pas sems de ni dpe med
[\[251a.4\]]par skyes so/_/chos thams cad 'bigs pas sems de ni rdo rje lta bur skyes so/_/bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas sems de ni mu med par skyes so/_/sems can thams cad la sems de ni mnyam par skyes so/_/rang bzhin gyis [#]kun nas nyon mongs pa
[\[251a.5\]]med pas sems de ni rnam par dag par skyes so/_/shes rab kyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir sems de ni dri ma med par skyes so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ma bor bar sems de ni shin tu nges par skyes so/_/byams pa nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pas na sems de ni yangs par skyes so/_/
[\[251a.6\]]sems can thams cad go 'byed pas sems de ni rgya che bar skyes so/_/sems [#]chags pa med pa'i ye shes la btang bas sems de ni sgrib pa med par skyes so/_/snying rje chen po rgyun ma chad pas na sems de ni thams cad kyi rjes su song bar skyes so/_/yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes
[\[251a.7\]]pas na sems de ni rgyun ma chad par skyes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pas rab tu ston pas na sems de ni sngon du 'gro bar skyes so/_/theg pa gzhan la ma zhugs pas na sems de ni blta bar 'os pa'o/_/de ni sems can [#]thams cad kyis [#]bltar mi mthong bar skyes so/_/de ni bsod nams kyi
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]tshogs kyis brgyan par skyes so/_/de ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis rab tu rtogs te skyes so/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon du skyes so/_/de ni chos thams cad kyis mi shigs [#]par skyes so/_/de ni bde ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi gnas su skyes so/_/de ni sbyin pa'i tshogs
[\[251b.2\]]kyis [#]bsags te skyes so/_/de ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyis smon lam gyi [#]'phags par skyes so/_/de ni bzod pa'i tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bar skyes so/_/de ni brtson 'grus kyi tshogs kyis rgyal bar dka' bar skyes so/_/de ni bsam gtan gyi tshogs kyis zhi pa'i mtshan nyid du skyes
[\[251b.3\]]so/_/de ni shes rab kyi tshogs kyis thogs pa med par skyes so/_/byams pa chen po bsags pas de ni gnod pa med par skyes so/_/snying rje chen po bsags pas de ni rtsa ba brtan par skyes so/_/de ni dga' ba chen po bsags te mgu ba dang mos pa dang mchog tu dga' ba la gnas par
[\[251b.4\]]skyes so/_/de ni btang snyoms chen po gnas pa ste bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyis [#]mi bsgul bar skyes so/_/de ni sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brlab [#]par skyes so/_/dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi bcad pa'i phyir tshul rgyun mi 'chad par skyes so/_/de ni phyogs bcu'i
[\[251b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi 'khor du rab tu grags par skyes so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'di 'dra ba la/_zad pa gang yang yod dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin te/_gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems 'di lta bu zad par 'dod
[\[251b.6\]]pa ni nam mkha' zad par 'dod do/_/blo gros mi zad pas smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni mi zad pa ste/_byang chub kyi sems de ni de'i rtsa bar skyes pas na de'i phyir de ni mi zad pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/yang mdo de
[\[251b.7\]]nyid las bsam pa de ni ma byas pas na bcos ma ma yin pa'o/_/g.yo ba med pas na ma byas pa'o/_/rab tu rtogs pas g.yo ba med pa'o/_/sgyu med pas rab tu rtogs pa'o/_/sgyu med pas rab tu drang ba'o/_/dag pas [#]sgyu med pa'o/_/gsal bas gya gyu med pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]rgyas par gsungs te/_mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/de lta bu'i thun mong ma yin pa'i sems/_'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sems/_sems can thams cad ma btang ba'i sems de ni sa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[252a.2\]]chen po rnams kyis de nyid sbyangs shing dag par byas/_de ma nyams par byas shing bsrungs/_de sa nas [#]sar spel te/_de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs yin pas de bskyed phan chad byang chub sems dpa' de la bstan pa la dga' ba'i lhas bsrung ba dang /_'chi ba'i dus su yid
[\[252a.3\]]dga' bar 'chi ba dang /_bar ma do dang ma'i mngal dang bu chung gi dus su yang lha dag gis [#]bsrung ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad chud mi za ba dang /_sems bsod nams kyi rgyun dang ldan pa yin te/_slob dpon zhi ba'i lhas spyod 'jug las/_dge ba gzhan kun chu shing bzhin
[\[252a.4\]]du ni/_/'bras bu smin nas zad par 'gyur ba nyid/_/byang chub sems kyi ljon shing rtag par yang /_/'bras bu mi zad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na byang chub kyi sems de mi zad pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi chos thams cad dang /_
[\[252a.5\]]'bras bu sangs rgyas kyi sa'i chos thams cad mi [#]zad pa yin no/_/de bas na dus der sems de lta bu skyes [#]pas na/_de ltar smos [#]pa'i sems dag ni/_/bskyed pa'i yon tan gang yin pa/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_de lta bu'i sems de'i phan yon smra bar 'dod nas/_de ni sdong po [#]bkod
[\[252a.6\]]pa'i mdo las 'phags pa byams pas nor bzangs [#]la 'di skad du bshad de/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/'gro ba thams cad kyi chos dkar po rnam par 'phel bar byed pas zhing lta bu'o/_/'jig rten pa thams cad rten
[\[252a.7\]]pas sa lta bu'o/_/dbul ba thams cad yang dag par 'joms pas rnam thos kyi bu lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su bsrung bas [#]pha lta bu'o/_/don thams cad yang dag par sgrub pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu'o/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]rdzogs par byed pas bum pa bzang po lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad pham par byed pas mdung thung lta bu'o/_/tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rab tu 'gebs [#]pas go cha lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i mgo ltung bar byed pas ral gri lta bu'o/_/nyon mongs pa'i
[\[252b.2\]]shing gcod par byed pas sta re lta bu'o/_/'tshe ba thams cad las skyob pas mtshon cha lta bu'o/_/'khor ba'i chu bo'i nang nas steng du 'byin pas mchil pa lta bu'o/_/sgrib pas khebs pa thams cad 'thor bar byed pas [#]rlung gi dkyil 'khor lta bu'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod
[\[252b.3\]]pa dang smon lam thams cad mdor bsdus pas mdor bstan pa lta bu'o/_/lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad la mchod rten lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub kyi sems ni yon tan de dang yon tan gyi bye brag tshad med pa gzhan dang yang ldan no zhes gsungs te/_
[\[252b.4\]]de bzhin du rab tu bshad do/_/de bzhin du khyim bdag dpa' sbyin gyis [#]zhus pa'i mdo'i tshig 'og na bkod pa yang 'dir drang bar bya'o/_/gzhan mdo du ma dang /_'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_slob dpon zhi ba'i lha la sogs pas kyang phan yon mang du gsungs pa yod kyang 'dir yi ge mangs pa'i
[\[252b.5\]]'jigs pas ma bkod do/_/yang de nyid bstan pa'i phyir/_de yis mdo bklag pa'am bla ma las mnyan [#]te/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyi yon tan tshad med pa/_/rnam par shes par byas la de gnas rgyu mtshan du/_/yang dang yang du sems ni [#]bskyed par bya/_/zhes bya ba smras te/_
[\[252b.6\]]mdo bklag pa'am zhes bya ba ni bslab pa kun las btus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams ni phal cher mdo sde dag las snang ste/_mdo sde de dang de dag las byang chub sems dpa'i kun du spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams bcas pa'o/_/
[\[252b.7\]]de lta bas na de ma bltas na ltung ba byung na yang mi shes na spong bar 'gyur du 'ong bas rtag tu mdo sde lta ba la gus par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang de nyid kyi rtsa ba las/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtang [#]zhing /_/mdo sde dag la rtag blta bas/_/zhes pa dang /_slob dpon zhi ba'i
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]lhas 'di skad du/_mdo sde dag ni blta bar bya/_/nam mkha'i snying po'i mdo sde ni/_/thog ma nyid du blta bar bya/_/'phags pa klu sgrub [#]kyis mdzad pa'i/_/mdo rnams kun las btus pa yang /_/de yi 'og tu blta [#]bar bya/_/zhes gsungs pas [#]thog mar mdo
[\[253a.2\]]sde blta ba la goms par bya'o/_/bla ma las mnyan te zhes bya ba ni bla ma ni sems skyed [#]par byed pa de nyid de/_de yang 'di ltar 'phags pa thogs med nas brgyud pa dang /_slob dpon zhi ba'i lha nas brgyud pa'i bla ma'o/_/de yang bla ma bsten pa la dgos pa ci yod snyam pa la yod par
[\[253a.3\]]mthong ste/_ji skad du/_'phags pa sdong po bkod pa las/_dpal 'byung ba 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis [#]yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni ngan 'gror mi 'gro'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bskyangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[253a.4\]]ni bslab pa 'gal bar mi byed do/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis [#]bsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig rten pa las mngon par 'phags so/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spyod pa thams cad la ma brjed par gnas so/_/
[\[253a.5\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis thub par dka'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bya ba ma yin pa [#]rnams khong du chud par byed do/_/bag med pa'i gnas las bzlog pa'o/_/'khor ba'i grong khyer nas
[\[253a.6\]]'don pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na de ltar yin la rgyun ma chad par dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar bya'o/_/khur thams cad khur bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i phyir sa lta bu'i sems dang /_mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bu'i sems dang /_mi khro bas khyi lta bu'i sems dang /_
[\[253a.7\]]sdug bsngal thams cad kyis mi bsgul ba'i phyir khor yug lta bu'i sems dang /_las thams cad la mi smod pas bran lta bu'i sems dang /_nga rgyal dang che ba'i nga rgyal rnam par spong bas [#]phyag dar ba lta bu'i sems dang /_khur lci ba khur bas theg pa lta bu'i sems dang /_'gro zhing 'ong
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]bas mi skyo bas gru lta bu'i sems dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi ngor blta bas bu mdzangs [#]pa lta bu'i sems kyis [#]dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bskur [#]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis [#]bdag la ni nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o[#]/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sman pa'i 'du shes
[\[253b.2\]]dang /_rjes su bstan pa la ni sman gyi 'du shes dang /_nan tan nyams su len pa la ni nad 'tsho ba'i 'du shes dag bskyed par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /_gzhan yang 'phags pa nor bzangs kyis [#]dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi skabs nas 'byung ba dang /_'phags pa drag shul can gyis [#]zhus pa
[\[253b.3\]]las kyang khyim bdag gal te byang chub sems dpa' lung nod [#]pa'am/_kha ton bya ba'am/_sbyin pa dang ldan pa'am/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_bzod pa dang ldan pa'am/_brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'am/_bsam gtan dang ldan pa'am/_shes rab dang ldan pa'am/_byang chub
[\[253b.4\]]sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs sogs [#]pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa su las mnyan tam/_lung nos sam blangs pa'i slob dpon de la de chos kyis [#]gus par bya'o/_/ming dang tshig dang yi ge ji snyed pa de snyed kyis bskal par gal te slob dpon la g.yo med par [#]rnyed pa dang /_
[\[253b.5\]]bkur stis rim gro dang /_bkur sti byas kyang khyim bdag da dung du slob dpon de la gus par bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa ma yin na/_chos ma yin pa gus par bya ba [#]lta ci smos zhes gsungs pa dang /_de bzhin du lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa [#]'phags
[\[253b.6\]]pa rtag tu ngu'i le'u dang /_'phags pa legs par sbyin pas ji ltar bla ma bsten pa rnams ni de dang der blta bar bya'o/_/'phags pa thogs med kyis kyang bla ma bsten pa gsungs te/_ji skad du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las/_de la rnam pa du dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dge
[\[253b.7\]]ba'i bshes gnyen du rig [#]par bya/_rnam pa du zhig gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen don yod pa yin/_rnam pa du zhig dang ldan na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dad pa'i gzhi la gnas pa yin/_byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa'i 'dul ba rnams dge ba'i bshes
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]gnyen gyi bya ba ni du zhig yod/_byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa ni rnam pa du zhig yod/_'du shes dus ni byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen la chos mnyan par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes
[\[254a.2\]]gnyen la chos nyan pa na gang zag chos smra ba de la gnas du zhig ni yid la mi byed par bya zhe na/_de la rnam pa brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i
[\[254a.3\]]tshul khrims rnams la gnas shing ma nyams pa dang skyon med par byed pas tshul khrims la gnas pa yin/_blo ma byang ba ma yin pas mang du thos pa yin/_bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba gang yang rung ba thob cing rtogs pa dang ldan pa yin/_snying rje [#]ldan pas snying brtse [# ]
[\[254a.4\]]ba can yin/_de tshe 'di la rang gi bde ba bor nas gzhan gyi don la sbyor ba yin/_de gzhan la chos ston pa na bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pas dran pa dang spobs pa nyams pa med pas 'jigs pa med pa yin/_gzhan dag gis brnyas pa dang 'phya ba dang bsting ba dang ngan du brjod pa mi
[\[254a.5\]]'dod pa'i tshig rnams dang sems can log par zhugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa rnams bzod pa yin/_'khor bzhi po dag chos bstan pa la stobs dang ldan zhing ngal ba med pas yid [#]yongs su mi skyo ba yin/_tshig chos nyid las ma nyams shing gsal la tshig bya ba dang ldan pa
[\[254a.6\]]yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen de lta bu'i yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad [#]ldan pa ni rnam pa lnga [#]lngas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba don yod pa yin te/_de ni snga nas kyang gzhan dag la [#]phan pa dang bde bar 'dod pa yin te/_phan pa dang bde ba de ji lta bar
[\[254a.7\]]shes pa yin/_de blo phyin ci ma log pa yin/_thabs gang dang chos bstan pa'i tshul gang gis sems can gang 'dul nus pa de la nus shing mthu yod pa dang /_yid yongs su mi skyo ba yin/_sems can tha ma dang 'bring po dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa la phyogs 'dzin pa med par
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]snying rje snyoms pa yin no/_/de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de ni rnam pa lngas dad pa'i gzhi la gnas pa yin te/_gang gi phyir gtam thos pas kyang shin tu dang bar byed na mngon sum du mthong na lta ci smos te/_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dang /_spyod lam dang ldan pa dang /_yan lag dang /_
[\[254b.2\]]nying lag mi 'gyur bas spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' la god pa med cing 'gyur ba med pas brtan pa yin/_gzhan dag la tshul 'chos pa'i phyir spyod lam brtan pa ltar mi 'chos pas tshul 'chos pa med pa yin/_gzhan gyi
[\[254b.3\]]chos kyi gtam mam/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la bdag dga' ba dang /_rang gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti yang gzhan la stobs par byed pas phrag dog med pa yin/_yo byad bsnyungs shing yo byad bsnyungs pas 'tshog [#]chas rnyed do cog thams cad la gtod pas yo byad bsnyungs pa yin
[\[254b.4\]]no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa de ni rnam pa lngas gdul [#]ba gzhan dag la dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba byed de/_gleng bar byed pa yin/_dran par byed pa yin/_'doms par byed pa yin/_rjes su ston par byed pa yin/_chos ston par byed pa
[\[254b.5\]]yin/_tshig 'di dag gi dbye ba ni nyan thos kyi sar rig par bya'o/_/gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni stobs kyi le'u las rig par bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ni rnam pa bzhis [#]yongs su rdzogs te/_dus dus su nad g.yog dang /_
[\[254b.6\]]tha mal pa'i g.yog [#]byas pa dang /_gus pa dang /_dga' ba dang /_dus dus su gus par smra ba dang /_phyag bya ba [#]dang /_mngon du ldang ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba dang /_'dud par bya ba dang /_mchod par [#]bya ba dang /_chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad pa'i
[\[254b.7\]]gsos sman dang /_yo byad sbyin pas mchod pa dang /_gnas bcas nas gzud pa [#]dang /_nyes pa dag 'chags pa dang /_drung du 'gro ba dang /_dri ba dang nyan pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen las chos nyan par 'dod pas 'du shes rnam pa lngas chos mnyan par bya
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]ste/_dkon pa'i don gyis [#]rin po che'i 'du shes dang /_shes rab rgya chen po 'thob pa'i rgyu'i don gyis mig gi 'du shes dang /_chos thams cad yang dag par ston pas snang ba'i 'du shes dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i rgyu'i don gyis phan yon che ba'i
[\[255a.2\]]'du shes dang /_tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi dga' ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rgyu'i don gyis kha na ma tho ba med pa'i 'du shes so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen la chos nyan pa na/_
[\[255a.3\]]de la gnas lngar yid la mi byed de/_de tshul khrims nyams pa [#]nyams so snyam du yid la mi byed de/_'di ni tshul khrims nyams shing sdom pa la mi gnas pas bdag gis 'di las chos mnyan par mi bya'o snyam du yid la mi bya'o/_/rigs dma' ba la yang 'di la
[\[255a.4\]]bdag gis chos mnyan par mi bya'o snyam du yid la mi bya'o/_/chos la rton pas [#]bya'i gang zag la rton par mi bya'o/_/don la rton par bya'i tshig 'bru la rton par mi bya'o/_/byad dang gzugs ngan pa dang /_tshig 'bru ngan pa la yang yid la mi bya ste/_gus pa dang bcas pas chos
[\[255a.5\]]mnyan par bya'o/_/chos ni nams kyang gang zag gi skyon gyis mi gos shing skyon can du mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rtul po gang /_gang zag gi skyon rnams la sems mngon par ldang [#]zhing /_chos nyan par mi 'dod pa de ni bdag nyid kho na la
[\[255a.6\]]gnod cing shes rab yongs su nyams par gyur par [#]rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/[#]de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bla ma la rag las pas na byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas bla ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen mkhas pa rtag tu bsten par bya'o/_/phan yon gzhan yang
[\[255a.7\]]bshad de/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim gyi nang na gnas pa dbang po rtul po kha cig la ni smon pa'i sems 'di nyid la brten nas rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur bar [#]gsungs te/_ji skad du bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las/_rgyal po chen po khyod ni 'di
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]ltar bya ba mang ba [#]byed pa mang ba ste thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du sbyin pa la bslab pa [#]nas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar la bslab par mi nus kyi[#]/_de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dun pa dang /_dad pa dang /_
[\[255b.2\]]don du gnyer ba dang /_smon pas 'gro yang rung /_'greng yang rung /_'dug kyang rung /_nyal yang rung /_sad kyang rung /_za yang rung /_'thung yang rung /_rtag par rgyun du dran par gyis la yid la zung ste sgoms shig_/sangs rgyas dang po [#]so so'i skye bo thams cad dang /_bdag gi
[\[255b.3\]]'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus shing gzhol te rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/rjes su yi rang ba mchog dang /_nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang mtshungs pas rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/rjes su yi
[\[255b.4\]]rangs [#]nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod par bya ba [#]phul cig_/phul nas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyis shig_/de nas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar du thob
[\[255b.5\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bar nyin gcig [#]bzhin du dus gsum du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sngos shig_/rgyal po chen po khyod de ltar zhugs nas [#]rgyal po yang byed la rgyal po'i bya ba yang nyams
[\[255b.6\]]par mi 'gyur zhing /_byang chub kyi tshogs kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon zhi ba'i lha'i zhal nas bslab pa kun las btus pa las don 'di gsungs te/_'di skad du spyod pa dang mi ldan pa yang byang chub kyi sems ni 'khor ba'i bde ba mtha'
[\[255b.7\]]yas pa bskyed pa'i phyir de la brnyas par mi bya'o zhes gsungs so/_/de'i nus pa yang mdo las gsungs te/_byams pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sdong po bkod pa las/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang gser gyi rgyan khyad par [#]du 'phags pa thams cad zil
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]gyis gnon cing rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi 'dor la dbul ba thams cad kyang rnam par bzlog go/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che nan tan dang bral yang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi gser
[\[256a.2\]]gyi rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dor la/_'khor ba'i dbul ba thams cad kyang rnam par bzlog go zhes 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po la gdams pa'i mdo las kyang don de nyid gsungs te/_rgyal po chen po khyod yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[256a.3\]]chub kyi sems kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des/_lan du mar lha'i nang du skyes pa nas gang de ltar mang du bya ba byed pa lta ci smos zhes 'byung ste mdo de [#]nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/rtsa ba nyid la 'jug par bya ste/_byang chub smon pa'i sems ni bskyed nas ni/_/'bad pa mang
[\[256a.4\]]pos kun tu spel bya zhing /_/'di ni skye ba gzhan du'ang dran don du/_/ji skad bshad pa'i bslab pa yongs su bsrung /_/zhes smras te/_de ltar sems bskyed cing de'i phan yon shes pa des de spel bar bya ba'i phyir/_'bad pa mang pos kun du spel bya zhing /_/zhes smras te/_'di'i don ni
[\[256a.5\]]bdag gis byas pa'i sems bskyed pa'i cho gar gsal bar byas te/_'di skad du de ltar sems bskyed pa'i gang zag gis byang chub kyi sems spel bar bya ba'i phyir/_tha na nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/_sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/_/byang chub bar
[\[256a.6\]]du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/bdag gis sbyin sogs byas pa 'di dag gis/_/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/ces byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o zhes pa'o/_/'di ni skye ba gzhan du'ang dran don du/_/ji skad bshad pa'i bslab pa yongs su bsrung [#]/_/zhes pa 'di'i
[\[256a.7\]]don yang bdag gis 'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo las blangs nas cho ga de nyid du bkod de 'di ltar byang chub kyi sems nyams par byed pa'i chos bzhi las ldog par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_sbyin gnas la bslu ba dang /_gzhan 'gyod pa
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]med pa la 'gyod pa nye bar bsgrub pa dang /_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i gang zag la bsngags [#]pa ma yin pa dang /_mi snyan pa dang brjod pa ma yin pa'i sgra tshigs su bcad pa 'byin pa dang /_g.yo dang sgyu gzhan la nye bar spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin pa'o/_/
[\[256b.2\]]byang chub kyi sems nyams par [#]mi byed pa'i chos bzhi la bslab [#]par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_srog gi phyir ram tha na bzhad gad kyi phyir yang brdzun [#]gyi tshig mi smra ba dang /_g.yo dang sgyu med par sems can thams cad kyi drung na [#]lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang /_byang chub
[\[256b.3\]]sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes bskyed cing de dag gi [#]yang dag pa'i bsngags pa phyogs bzhir brjod pa dang /_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can gang yongs su smin par byed pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
[\[256b.4\]]'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/khyad par du mngon par shes pa myur du thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis zhus pa'i chos bdun pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo la bslab par bya'o/_/sngar bstan pa'i/_'bad pa mang pos kun du spel bya
[\[256b.5\]]zhing /_/zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don 'di yin te/_rje btsun dag gi zhal nas spel ba rnam pa gsum las rgyas par spel ba ni/_'jug sems bdag nyid sdom pa ma gtogs pa/_/yang dag smon pa 'phel bar 'gyur ma yin/_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sdom pas spel 'dod pas/_/de
[\[256b.6\]]phyir 'bad pas 'di ni nges par blang [#]/_/zhes smras te/_'jug sems bdag nyid ces bya ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa yin te/_de yang 'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdo las ji skad du/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems [#]zhes bya ba'i byang chub kyi
[\[256b.7\]]sems de chos gang gis bsdus/_ji ltar phyir mi ldog par kun du gnas/_/nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub kyi sems ni chos rnam pa gnyis kyis [#]bsdus pas phyir mi ldog par gnas so/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/bsam
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa gang gis [#]bsdus/_bsam pa ni g.yo med pa dang sgyu med pas bsdus pa'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni de la ma chags pa dang khyad par du 'gro bas bsdus so/_/bzhi po de dag gang gis bsdus[#]/_chos brgyad kyis bsdus te/_g.yo med pa ni drang po
[\[257a.2\]]dang gsal bas bsdus pa'o/_/sgyu med pa ni bcos ma ma yin pa dang bsam pa dag pas bsdus so/_/de la ma chags pa ni sems ma gong ba dang brtson 'grus ma gong bas bsdus so/_/khyad par du 'gro ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus so zhes bya ba la
[\[257a.3\]]sogs pa chos brgya nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis bsdus te rgyas par mdo nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo las kyang 'di skad du/_yon tan khyad par can 'dod pa ni lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni srog chags 'byung po rnams la
[\[257a.4\]]des pa'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams pa'o/_/'phags pa thams cad la gus pa'o/_/'jig rten pa rnams la snying brtse ba'o/_/bla ma la rim gro byed pa'o/_/skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang gling med pa dang mgon med pa'i mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen dang gling ngo zhes bya ba
[\[257a.5\]]la sogs pa gsungs te/_rgya cher de nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang mdo de las byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dag pa la ni nam mkha' dang rtsig pa dang shing dang chu bo dang nags tshal la sogs pa dag las kyang chos 'byung la/_rang nyid kyi spyod pa nyid las kyang gdams
[\[257a.6\]]ngag dang rjes su bstan pa 'byung ngo zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa blo gros mi zad pa'i mdo las kyang /_btsun pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mi zad pa yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad lhag par
[\[257a.7\]]dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/tha na gang byang chub sems dpa' gang ci sems pa de thams cad dge ba'i bsam pa las lhag pa'i bsam pas dmigs par 'gyur te/_sa nas sar bzhag pa'i phyir 'pho ba ni lhag pa'i bsam pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang [#]/_yang btsun
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]pa sha ra dwa [#]ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mi zad pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/'di skad du bstan par 'gyur te/_'di ltar sa gzhi bzang po las nags tshal dang lo tog phun sum tshogs pa skye ba bzhin du/_tshul khrims bzang po'i sa gzhi las
[\[257b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skye zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes shes par 'gyur ro/_/'dir 'di dpyad do/_/smon pa byang chub kyi sems dang 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems de gnyis kyi don la/_sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po rnams dang /_da ltar gyi mkhas pa chen po dag rnam pa du
[\[257b.3\]]mar 'chad de/_de dag gi 'dod pa de dag la bdag gi blo 'phro bar nus mod kyi yi ge mangs par 'gyur bas gzhag go/_/'di gnyis kyi don mdo nyid na gsal bar gsungs te/_sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
[\[257b.4\]]chub tu sems bskyed [#]pa de dag kyang dkon no/_/de bas kyang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu chas pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu dkon no zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon zhi ba lha'i zhal nas kyang /_byang chub kyi sems de ni rnam pa gnyis te/_byang chub tu smon pa'i
[\[257b.5\]]sems dang /_byang chub tu 'jug pa'i sems so zhes bslab pa kun las btus pa las gsungs pa dang /_spyod 'jug las kyang /_'gro bar [#]'dod dang 'gro ba yi/_/bye brag ji ltar shes pa ltar/_/de bzhin mkhas pas 'di nyid [#]kyi/_/bye brag rim bzhin shes par bya/_/zhes gsungs so/_
[\[257b.6\]]yang slob dpon gyi zhal nas/_de la smon pa'i sems ni ngas sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o zhes smon pa las skyes pa'o zhes bslab pa kun las btus pa las gsungs so/_/de bas na 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i byang chub yul du byed cing dmigs pa ni smon pa'i sems yin te/_ji skad du
[\[257b.7\]]mgon po byams pas kyang /_sems bskyed pa ni gzhan don phyir/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod/_/ces mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan las gsungs so/_/lam gyi chos yul du byed cing dmigs pa ni 'jug pa'i sems yin te/_mgon po byams pa'i zhal nas/_rang
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]gzhan don dang de nyid don[#]/_/mthu dang rang gi [#]sangs rgyas kyi/_/zhing dang sems can yongs smin dang /_/bdun pa byang chub mchog yin no/_/zhes mdo sde rgyan las gsungs so/_/de bas na byang chub kyi sems de nyid rgyu'i dus dang /_'bras bu'i dus thams cad du de nyid
[\[258a.2\]]yin te/_gnas skabs kyi bye brag gis de ltar 'gyur ro/_/de yang mgon po byams pa'i zhal nas rgyas par bshad de/_ji skad du/_de yang sa gser zla ba me[#]/_/gter dang rin chen 'byung gnas mtsho/_/rdo rje ri sman bshes gnyen dang /_/yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma klu[#]/_/rgyal po
[\[258a.3\]]mdzod dang lam po che/_/bzhon pa bkod ma'i chu dang ni/_/sgra snyan chu bo sprin rnams kyis/_/rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de la gnyis ni rgyu'i byang chub kyi sems so/_/bcu bdun ni lam gyi byang chub kyi sems so/_/gsum [#]ni 'bras bu'i byang chub kyi sems so/_/
[\[258a.4\]]gnyis ni smon pa'i sems so/_/nyi shu ni 'jug pa'i sems so/_/rnam grangs gzhan yang gsum ni rgyu'i dus kyi sems so/_/bcu drug ni lam gyi dus kyi sems so/_/tha ma gsum ni 'bras bu'i dus kyi sems so/_/de dag gi don rgyas pa ni mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan de nyid du blta bar
[\[258a.5\]]bya'o/_/de ltar byang chub kyi sems rin po che de khyad par du spel bar bya ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi sdom pa nges par blang bar bya'o zhes bstan nas/_da ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i rten khyad par can bstan [#]par 'dod nas/_so sor [#]thar ba ris bdun gyi/_/rtag tu sdom gzhan ldan pa
[\[258a.6\]]dag_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yi/_/skal ba yod kyi gzhan du min/_/zhes smras te/_'dir smras pa/_khyod kyis dang por/_de ni skyes bu mchog yin no/_/sems can dam pa byang chub mchog_/'dod par gyur pa de dag la/_/zhes ma smras sam/_yang 'dir 'di skad du brjod pa de
[\[258a.7\]]ji lta bu smras pa bden te/_snga ma ni ma dag pa'i rten du bzhag la 'di ni dag pa'i rten du 'dod pa yin no/_/'di'i [#]don bla ma rje btsun dpal byang chub bzang pos sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel par gsungs te/_'di skad du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa yin
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]te/_phyogs gcig nyid du shes par bya'o/_/de'i phyir so sor [#]thar pa'i sdom pa gzhan dang ldan pa 'dis byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yang dag par len pa'i snod du gyur pa la/_bslab pa'i tshig 'di yang sbyin par bya zhes pa'i don to/_/'di la srog gcod pa la sogs pa las ldog pa'i cho ga
[\[258b.2\]]gzhan pa nyid ma yin zhing de rnams las kyang ldog pa yin pa la ni byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa len pa'i snod du gyur pa yang yod pa ma yin no zhes gsungs so/_/re zhig theg pa chen po'i bag chags med pa de'i rigs med pa so sor [#]thar pa'i gtan gyi bar chad can nam/_byang chub sems
[\[258b.3\]]dpa'i sdom pa med pa'i gong du de la pham pa byung ba'am bslab pa phul ba'am dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa'am/_sdom pa de ma blangs pa ni so sor [#]thar pa'i sdom pa yang med na/_cig shos lta ga la yod du rung /_'dir smras pa/_srog gcod pa la sogs pa las ma log pa'i byang chub
[\[258b.4\]]sems dpa' yod par 'gyur ram/_smras pa de ni med de de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' la rtsa ba'i ltung ba yin par mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de lta bas na so sor [#]thar pa'i sdom pa de dang por dgos shing sngon du 'gro ba nyid do/_/yang na rigs la gnas pa dar skye ba gzhan du theg
[\[258b.5\]]pa chen po la goms par byas pa [#]ni de rang bzhin gyis sdig pa mi spyod pas byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa de nyid dang po nyid du blangs kyang nyes pa med do/_/yang na theg pa chen po dbu ma chen po'i grub mtha' brtsan [#]par byas na ni/_'di ltar theg pa chen po'i snod du ma gyur pa 'ga' yang
[\[258b.6\]]med do/_/sems can thams cad rigs gcig nyid yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no [#]zhes bya ba dang /_sa stengs [#]skal med yod min te/_/thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur ba yin/_/de'i phyir rdzogs sangs sgrub pa la/_/sgyid lug par ni mi bya'o/_/zhes gsungs
[\[258b.7\]]pa'o/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rgyud chen po las kyang /_kye bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag mi 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/_/slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal nas/_dang por
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gang dang gang 'dod pa/_/de la de dang de nyid sbyin/_/dam pa'i chos la snod [#]min pa/_/'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas sems can thams cad rigs gcig nyid yin pas/_mgon po mi pham pa'i zhal nas/_chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med
[\[259a.2\]]phyir/_/rigs ni tha dad rung ma yin/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal nas kyang /_chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/_/gtso bo theg dbyer ma mchis na/_/khyod kyis [#]theg pa gsum bstan pa/_/sems can 'jug par bya phyir yin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'o na mdo las
[\[259a.3\]]kyang [#]sems can gyi tshogs gsum du gsungs shing /_rdo'i rigs la dper mdzad pa de ji lta bu/_sems can gyi rigs kyang rnam pa lngar bshad pa de ji lta bu/_smras pa de ni re zhig pa la dgongs pa yin te/_rje btsun gser gling pa'i zhal snga nas/_rigs ni rnam pa gnyis te/_chos nyid kyi
[\[259a.4\]]rigs can dang /_sgrub pa'i rigs can no zhes gsungs pas [#]sgrub pa'i rigs can la ni re zhig de ltar gnas so/_/chos nyid kyi rigs can gyi dbang du byas na ni dbye ba gang yang med do/_/'di ltar mkhas pa dag gis ni so so thar pa'i sdom pa de nges par gtso bor [#]bya dgos pa yin te/_de yang
[\[259a.5\]]'di ltar chos kyi sku ni dus thams cad dang /_dngos po thams cad la khyab pa yin pa dang /_yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de yang 'khor lor [#]bzhugs la/_de yang sa bcu'i dbang phyug chen po rnams kho na'i spyod yul yin zhing de yang theg pa chen po'i chos zab pa dang /_rgya che ba 'ba'
[\[259a.6\]]zhig gsungs pa yin no/_/sprul pa'i sku ni 'di ltar u dum bA [#]ra'i me tog dang 'dra bas dus res [#]'ga' ba yin te/_mdo las bskal pa de'i rjes la sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba'i bskal pa drug cu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na des gsungs pa'i so sor [#]thar pa'i sdom
[\[259a.7\]]pa 'di yang dus res 'ga' ba yin pas dkon pa'i phyir dang /_bde 'gror bgrod pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa sdig pa las log pa yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni ji srid so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gnas pa de [#]srid du gnas
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]shing de la rag lus pa yin pas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa de dang po kho nar bstan to/_/'di ltar 'jug pa'i go rims su [#]byas na yang /_sngon chad theg pa chen po'i bag chags med pa dag la ni so sor thar pa ris bdun gang yang rung ba'i sdom pa de sngon du 'gro ba yin no/_/sngon chad theg
[\[259b.2\]]pa chen po'i bag chags med pa'i gang zag dag la ni sdom pa de mi skye ba nyid kyang yin no/_/de bas rtsa ba las skal ba yod kyi gzhan du min zhes pa yang legs par smras par 'gyur ro/_/dkyus nyid la 'jug par bya ste/_so sor thar pa'i ris bdun du/_/de bzhin gshegs pas
[\[259b.3\]]gsungs pa la/_/tshangs spyod dpal ni mchog yin te/_/dge slong sdom pa dag tu bzhed/_/ces smras te ris bdun las dge slong gi sdom pa ni thun mong ma yin no zhes bdag gis bsams so/_/smras pa 'dul ba'i gzhung thams cad dang 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyis
[\[259b.4\]]mdzad pa ye shes la 'jug pa la sogs pa dang /_gzhan de dag gis mdzad pa'i bye brag tu bshad mdzod chen po dang /_de'i don gces spras su bya ba mdor bsdus pa mngon pa mdzod dag tu ris brgyad du bkod la 'dir bdun du bshad pa de ji lta bu smras pa bden te/_gzhung der de ltar
[\[259b.5\]]bshad mod kyi 'on kyang 'phags pa thogs med kyis rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i gzhung thams cad dang /_tshul khrims kyi le'u las ris bdun du bkod de/_'phags pa thogs med ni chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin thob cing sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin pa dang /_'phags
[\[259b.6\]]pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las lung bstan pas ji skad du/_thogs med skyes bu dam pa des/_/bstan bcos kyi ni de nyid rig_/ces pa dang /_yang mgon po mi pham pa la mngon sum du sde snod ma lus pa gsan pa yin pa 'di la su zhig the tshom za/_de lta bu'i sems can
[\[259b.7\]]chen po de la yid sdang zhing the tshom za na rang nyid phung bar zad do/_/rje btsun bla ma dpal byang chub bzang pos kyang sdom pa nyi shu pa'i 'grel pa las/_ji [#]skad du/_de la sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni so sor thar pa'i ris bdun gyi sdom pa blangs pa'o/_/de la dge slong dang dge tshul dang /_dge
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]slong [#]ma'i rab tu dbye bas rab tu byung ba'i phyogs ni rnam pa lnga'o/_/khyim pa'i phyogs gnyis te/_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma'i dbye bas so/_/nyin zhag gi [#]bslab pa ni dka' ba spyod pa ma yin pa dang /_'dod pa las g.yem pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /_yun ring
[\[260a.2\]]por rjes su [#]'brel pa'i phyir 'di ni so sor [#]thar pa'i ris su mi 'os pas ma bstan to zhes gsungs te/_bla ma de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi 'dul ba 'dzin pa chen po yin pa dang /_'phags pa klu sgrub dang slob dpon shAn ta de ba'i gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bka'i gdams
