[\[280a.5\]]pa'i don rnam par rig pa tsam du gsungs shing /_da ltar bla ma su war+N+Na dwI pa dang /_bla ma shAn ti pa yang de ltar dgongs so/_/slob dpon klu sgrub kyis ni bstan pa'i snying po bshad de/_des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don yod pa dang med pa las 'das pa'i dbu ma chen po'i
[\[280a.6\]]don thugs su chud cing /_mkhas pa gzhan gyi rgyud la yang de ltar gsungs so/_/de ltar bla ma byang chub bzang po dang /_rje btsun ku su lu pa yang de ltar dgongs so/_/'phags pa klu sgrub zhal gyi bdud rtsi des/_/Ar+ya de ba zla grags b+ha bya dang /_/zhi ba'i lha dang byang chub bzang po'i
[\[280a.7\]]bar/_/tshim par gyur ba bdag la'ang cung zhig 'thor/_/de ltar gtan tshigs chen po bzhi dag gis/_/chos rnams thams cad skye med bsgrub byas te/_/sngon gyi slob dpon rnams kyi rjes 'brangs [#]nas/_/dbu ma chen po'i grub mthar gnas par bya/_yang na 'di lta bu yin te/_
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]deng [#]sang sems can dus dang nyon mongs dang /_/lta ba tshe yi snyigs mar gyur pa ste/_/gzhung rnams mnyan par dgos pa med pas na/_/snying po don gyi rnal 'byor bsgom [#]par bya/_/ding sang dus su gzings dang 'dra ba yi/_/gzhung rnams rgya chen mnyan pa'i dus med pas/_/yid
[\[280b.2\]]'khrugs [#]byed pa thams cad spangs byas la/_/dam pa'i nyer bstan 'ba' zhig bsgom par bya/_/tshe ni yun thung shes bya'i rnam pa mang /_/tshe yi tshad kyang 'di tsam mi shes pas/_/ngang pas chu las [#]'o ma len pa ltar/_/'dod pa'i dngos po dang las [#]blang bar bya/_/rtsa ba nyid
[\[280b.3\]]bshad par bya ste/_dbu ma'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba ni dbu ma'i rtsa ba shes rab bo/_/sogs zhes pas ni ga las [#]'jigs med dang /_rigs pa drug cu pa dang /_rtsod pa bzlog [#]pa dang /_stong pa nyid bdun cu pa dang /_rin po che'i phreng ba dang /_theg pa chen po nyi shu pa dang /_tshig
[\[280b.4\]]brgya pa dang /_sA [#]lu ljang pa'i 'grel pa la sogs pa'o/_/yang na sogs zhes pa ni slob dpon 'phags pa'i dngos kyi slob ma rje btsun Ar+ya de ba dang /_slob dpon zla grags dang /_slob dpon b+ha bya snang bral dang /_slob dpon zhi ba'i lha la sogs pas mdzad pa'i bstan
[\[280b.5\]]bcos te/_de yang rje btsun Ar+ya de bas ni dbu ma rnam par 'thag pa chen po dang /_lag pa'i tshad dang /_sor mo lta bu'i bshad pa dang /_ye shes snying po kun las btus pa la sogs pa mdzad do/_/slob dpon zla grags kyis/_dbu ma la 'jug pa dang /_rigs pa drug
[\[280b.6\]]cu pa'i 'grel pa dang /_dbu ma phung po lnga pa dang /_tshig don gsal ba la sogs pa mdzad do/_/slob dpon b+ha bya snang bral gyis [#]dbu ma rtog ge 'bar ba dang /_shes rab sgron ma [#]la sogs pa mdzad do/_/de la dbu ma'i rtsa ba shes rab la 'grel pa brgyad yod de/_slob dpon
[\[280b.7\]]nyid kyis mdzad pa'i ga las [#]'jigs med dang /_slob dpon zla grags kyis mdzad pa'i tshig don gsal ba dang /_slob dpon b+ha bya snang bral gyis mdzad pa'i shes rab sgron ma dang /_gnas brtan bud+d+ha pA li tas mdzad pa'i bud+d+ha pA li ta dang /_slob dpon blo brtan gyis mdzad
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]pa dang /_slob dpon gu Na ma ti dang /_slob dpon gu Na shrI [#]dang /_A tsAr+ya [#]gu Na da tas mdzad pa rnams so/_/de la shes rab sgron ma la TI ka chen po gnyis yod de/_A tsAr+ya [#]spyan ras gzigs brtul [#]zhugs kyis mdzad pa dang /_A tsAr+ya [#]de ba
[\[281a.2\]]sharmas mdzad pa'i dbu ma dkar po 'char ba'o/_/gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling na slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa mkhas pa chen po bdag dang gzhan gyi [#]grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu thugs su chud pa rnams kyis [#]mdzad pa'i gzhung gi gtan tshigs
[\[281a.3\]]dag gis/_dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin gyi/_/stong pa nyid ni grub bshad pa/_/zhes te de dang der chos thams cad stong pa nyid du rgyas par bsgrubs zin la/_gal te bdag gis [#]gtan tshigs chen po bzhis gzhan dag gi log par rtogs pa bsal bar [#]gyur na ni gzhung
[\[281a.4\]]shin tu mangs par [#]'gyur bas na/_de phyir bdag gis 'dir nyung ngun [#]du byas shing ma spros pa yin no/_/'dir bdag cag dbu ma chen po'i grub pa'i mtha' ni 'di ltar yin no zhes smos pa [#]tsam du zad kyi/_grub pa'i mtha' rgyas bar ni ma bris te/_rnal 'byor pa nyams su
[\[281a.5\]]len 'dod pa dag la nyung ngun [#]du bsdus nas bstan pa yin pas/_bsgom pa'i don du rab tu bshad/_/ces bya ba de yin no/_/'dir don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bsgom pas/_nyams su blang ba'i thabs ni bdag gis ma bris/_bla ma yongs su mnyes par byas nas bla
[\[281a.6\]]ma la [#]zhu bar bya'o/_/de bas chos rnams ma lus pa/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa la/_de dag ni dkyus ji lta ba bzhin no/_/gang gi rang bzhin ma mthong [#]zhes pa ni chos gang yang mthong ba med pa [#]nyid de kho na nyid mchog mthong ba'o zhes mdo sde du mar gsungs pa yin no/_/'di'i don la
[\[281a.7\]]slob dpon Ar+ya de bas mdzad pa'i dbu ma 'khrul pa 'joms par blta bar bya'o/_/rtog ge 'bar ba dang /_dbu ma la 'jug pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs brtul zhugs dag tu yang blta bar bya'o/_/chos gzhan thams cad lta yongs su grub pa med na rang gi sems 'di
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]yod dam zhe na/_shes rab de nyid rigs [#]bshad pa/_/zhes smras te/_so sor rtog [#]pa'i shes rab de nyid ga la yod de med do/_/ji ltar med pa yin zhe na/_rigs bshad pa zhes te/_de nyid kyang gtan tshigs [#]chen po bzhis bshad cing gzhigs [#]na grub par mi 'gyur
[\[281b.2\]]te/_don 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i mdo las gsal bar gsungs te/_ji skad du don dam par ni chos thams cad kyi shes rab rnam par dpyad nas btsal yang shin tu med cing mi dmigs pa'o/_/shes rab de yang don dam
[\[281b.3\]]par ni shin tu med cing mi dmigs pas na kun rdzob tu shes rab can zhes bya ba ste/_shes rab de yang don dam par [#]na shin tu ma skyes shing med pa yin no/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal [#]nas kyang don 'di la dgongs nas/_sems ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/_/
[\[281b.4\]]ma gzigs gzigs pa ma yin te/_/rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo la/_/ji lta bu zhig gzigs par 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon 'phags pa lha'i zhal nas kyang /_rnam shes de yang don dam par/_/de ni mkhas rnams mi bzhed de/_/gcig dang du ma bral ba'i
[\[281b.5\]]phyir/_/nam mkha'i pad+ma nyid dang mtshungs/_/zhes ye shes snying po kun las btus pa las gsungs so/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/_bdag tu 'dzin pa bzlog don du/_/phung po khams la sogs pa bstan/_/sems tsam nyid du rnam gnas nas/_/skal chen rnams kyis [#]de
[\[281b.6\]]dag gzhom/_/'di dag thams cad sems tsam zhes/_/thub pa yis ni gang gsungs pa/_/byis rnams skrag pa spang phyir te/_/yang dag tu ni de nyid min/_/zhes pa dang /_yang de nyid las chos bdag med pa 'di lta bu/_/theg chen dag la dga' rnams kyi/_/rang sems gdod nas ma
[\[281b.7\]]skyes pa/_/mdor bsdus [#]nas ni de yin no/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na [#]phyi rol pas brtags pa'i bdag la sogs pa dang /_rang gi sde pas brtags pa'i phung po la sogs pa dang /_sems dang sgyu ma la sogs pa'i rtog pa bsal bar byas nas de lta bu'i don la dus rtag tu
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]gnas nas rnam par rtog pa spang bar bya'o/_/de bas na 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/_bdag dang phung po la sogs dang /_/rnam shes rtog pas ma bsgribs pa/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems/_/stong pa'i mtshan nyid dag tu bzhed/_/ces gsungs
[\[282a.2\]]pa yin no/_/de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa spangs pa [#]ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchog yin no zhes smras so/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyi man ngag gis dngos grub brnyes nas 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi gnang ba thob pa/_mngon par shes pa brnyes pa/_rgyud thams cad
[\[282a.3\]]dang /_mdo sde [#]thams cad dang /_'dul ba'i lung ma lus pa'i dgongs pa dus gcig tu thugs la gsal ba bden pa gzigs pa des na gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i bla ma ni dpal byang chub bzang po 'di yin pas 'da'i rjes su 'brang par bya'o/_/sngar bkod pa'i
[\[282a.4\]]gzhung de dag gi don ni 'di yin te/_yang dag nyid du rnam dpyad na/_/snang ba'i chos can thams cad dang /_/grub mtha' sogs kyis brtags pa kun/_/'khrul te brdzun pa yin par 'dod/_/dper na mig nad nad skyon gyis/_/khab 'dzag pa dang skra shad dang /_/zla gnyis
[\[282a.5\]]sbrang ma'i phung po mthong /_/der 'dzin pa yi shes pa'ang yod/_/dper na gnyid log gnyid [#]dbang gis/_/bag chags kyis ni bde sdug dang /_/gzugs la sogs pa nyams su myong /_/der 'dzin pa yi shes pa'ang yod/_/de bzhin thog ma med pa nas/_/ma rig mig nad nad
[\[282a.6\]]skyon gyis/_/phyi dang nang gi dngos po myong /_/der 'dzin pa yi shes pa'ang yod/_/yang na thog ma med pa nas/_/ma rig gnyid mthug [#]chen po log_/bag chags bzhi yi rmi lam de/_/der 'dzin nyams su myong pa yod/_/don dam nyid la rnam dpyad na/_/chos rnams kyi ni chos
[\[282a.7\]]nyid pas/_/log par rtog [#]pa de dag gis/_/yod dang med par sgrub mi nus/_/dper na mig nad ma rung bar[#]/_/skra shad med par bya mi nus/_/gang tshe mig nad rung ba na/_/skra shad yod par bya mi nus/_/dper na ma rig gnyid sangs na/_/rmi lam mthong bar bya mi nus/_/
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]ji srid gnyid ni ma sangs par/_/rmi lam med par bya mi nus/_/gang tshe rab rib nad sangs dang /_/gnyid log pa las sad tsa na/_/skra shad sogs dang rmi lam dang /_/der 'dzin pa yi shes pa'ang med/_/de bzhin ma rig mig nad dang /_/ma rig gnyid mthug [#]sad pa na/_/snang
[\[282b.2\]]dang brtags pa'i thams cad dang /_/nyams su myong ba'i shes pa'ang med/_/rgyun chad ma chad ces brjod pa/_/gang zhig yod pa de rgyun chad/_/chos nyid la ni de med de/_/glo bur byis pas brtags par zad/_/de bas slob dpon zhi ba'i lha/_/rgyun chad par ni 'dir mi bzhed/_/
[\[282b.3\]]de yi gdams ngag med pa dang /_/rgyun chad pa yi gzhung yin zer/_/'di la bsal bya ci yang med/_/gzhag par bya ba cung zad med/_/yang dag nyid la yang dag blta/_/yang dag mthong bas rnam grol 'gyur/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha'/_/kha cig chos
[\[282b.4\]]rnams yod par bsgrub/_/gzhan dag chos rnams med ces zer/_/yang dag nyid la rnam dpyad na/_/yod ces pa dang med ces pa/_/yang dag mtha' la de dag med/_/de bas gar yang bsgrub mi nus/_/bla ma'i brgyud pa bral ba dag_/rjes su dpag pa'i shes rab kyis/_/
[\[282b.5\]]yod med rtag chad sogs bsgrubs kyang /_/ngal 'gyur don la reg mi 'gyur/_/chos grags chos mchog la sogs pas/_/gzhung mang byas pa ji lta bu/_/mu stegs rgol ba bzlog pa'i phyir/_/mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa yin/_/de bas don dam bsgom pa la/_/
[\[282b.6\]]tshad mas dgos pa med do zhes/_/bdag gis gzhan du bkod pas [#]na/_/re zhig 'dir ni brjod mi dgos/_/de bas rjes dpag gtsor byed pa'i/_/rtog ge'i gzhung rnams dor byas la/_/'phags pa klu sgrub gzhung lugs kyi[#]/_/brgyud pa'i man ngag bsgom par bya/_/yod min
[\[282b.7\]]med min yod med min/_/gnyi ga min pa'ang ma yin pa'i/_/mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i/_/de nyid dbu ma pa yis rig_/rtag min chad min rtag chad min/_/gnyi ga min pa'ang ma yin pa'i/_/mu bzhi las ni rnam grol ba'i/_/de nyid dbu ma pa yis rtogs/_/
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]yod med lta bu las 'das shing /_/rtag dang chad pa rnam par spangs/_/shes dang shes bya las rab grol/_/'di ni dbu ma chen po'i gzhung /_/rjes su dpag pa gtsor byas nas/_/yod med [#]rtag chad sogs smras kyang /_/chos nyid de yi rjes mi
[\[283a.2\]]'brang [#]/_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur bar zad/_/dper na gser dang nam mkha' dang /_/chu sogs rang bzhin dag mod kyi/_/skyon dang 'grogs pa ltar snang yang /_/de dag skyon gyi rjes mi 'brang /_/sgro 'dogs skur 'debs rnam spangs shing /_/sgro btags kun las
[\[283a.3\]]nges grol ba'i/_/de nyid kho na bsgom byas la/_/grub pa'i mtha' la gnas mi bya/_/'phags pa klu sgrub 'phags pa'i lha/_/zla grags b+ha bya zhi ba'i lha/_/brgyud pa'i man ngag 'ba' zhig bsgom/_/gal te brgyud pa med gyur na/_/de dag rnams kyis bkod pa yi/_/
[\[283a.4\]]gzhung rnams yang dang yang du blta/_/chos kun a yi sgo can te/_/gdod nas skye med 'gag pa'ang med/_/ngo bo nyid kyis mya ngan 'das/_/rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag_/mthong na'ang mthong ba ma yin te/_/mthong bar bya dang mthong byed dang /_/mthong ba shes [#]bya gang
[\[283a.5\]]yang med/_/thub pa rtag tu mnyam par gzhag_/rnam par rtog pa kun spangs shing /_/chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa na/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i ye shes la/_/'byung dang 'jug pa de mi 'dod/_/de bas mnyam gzhag rjes thob dag_/sangs rgyas pa la nged mi 'dod/_/sa la
[\[283a.6\]]gnas pa yin par ni/_/rnam par mi rtog gzungs las bshad/_/'di don 'dir ni rgyas ma byas/_/bdag gi gzhung 'dzin bla ma la/_/bsnyen bkur sogs kyis mchod byas te/_/yang dang yang du zhu bar bya/_/thams cad mkhyen pas lung bstan pa'i/_/'phags pa klu sgrub
[\[283a.7\]]nas brgyud pa'i/_/byang chub bzang po'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/grub mtha' gang yang gzung mi bya/_/de ltar rigs pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad skye ba med par bsgrubs nas/_da ni lung gi sgo nas chos thams cad skye ba med par bstan pa ni/_de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]kyis shes pa la sogs pa ste/_rtsa ba nyid du brtag [#]par bya'o/_/der ma zad kyi don 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde gzhan du yang gsungs te/_ji skad du 'phags pa chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dbyer med par bstan pa'i mdo las/_de la chos kyi dbyings tshad mar byas
[\[283b.2\]]na [#]don dam pa yang med kun rdzob kyang med do zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal por gsungs pa dang /_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las kyang bden pa ni gcig ste/_'di ltar 'gog pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas don 'di rgyas par gsungs so/_/'phags pa
[\[283b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang ba'i rgyan gyi mdo las kyang ji skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu skye med chos/_/chos rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs dang 'dra/_/byis pa'i blo can log par 'khrul pa rnams/_/'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod/_/
[\[283b.4\]]ces gsungs pa dang /_'phags pa zla ba sgron ma las kyang /_thams cad stong pa'i rang bzhin don dam ni/_/chos can mi dmigs chos nyid yod pa min/_/zhen pa bzlog phyir rkyen bshad ma rtogs pa/_/chos kyi ngang la tshig med brjod du med/_/ces gsungs so/_/
[\[283b.5\]]'phags pa 'dul ba rgya mtsho las kyang /_sngon gyi mtha' stong phyi ma'i mtha' yang [#]stong /_/srid pa thams cad yong ye stong pa ste/_/phyogs gcig [#]stong pa mu stegs can rnams kyi/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa las kyang /_kun rdzob tu ni thams
[\[283b.6\]]cad yod/_/dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med/_/rang bzhin med la 'khrul pa gang /_/de ni yang dag kun rdzob bshad/_/ces gsungs so/_/'phags pa shes rab [#]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi rtsal gyis [#]rnam par gnon pa las kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis [# ]
[\[283b.7\]]ni ci yang mi gzigs te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar ye shes la yul mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang /_'phags pa rgyal ba skyed mar mdzad pa chen po las kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs [#]pa'i zhing gi khyad par brjod par mdzad pas 'khor
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]rnams kyis [#]bcom ldan 'das la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs [#]pa'i zhing de bdag cag la bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]'jig rten gyi khams de bstan par mdzad nas phyir yang mi snang bar mdzad do/_/
[\[284a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs [#]pa'i zhing de mig lam du mi snang ba bzhin du gzugs mig lam du mi snang ba'o/_/tshor ba mig lam du mi snang ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyas par gsungs so/_/don 'di 'phags pa rtag [#]tu
[\[284a.3\]]ngu'i le'u las kyang gsal bar gsungs so/_/de bzhin du rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal [#]ba'i mdo las kyang don 'di gsal [#]bar gsungs so/_/gzhan yang 'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba'i mdo dang /_'phags pa sor mo'i [#]phreng can gyi mdo dang /_'phags
[\[284a.4\]]pa ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i mdo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i [#]gsang ba'i mdo dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa nam mkha' mdog gis [#]'dul ba'i mdo dang /_
[\[284a.5\]]'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo dang /_'phags pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi mdo dang /_'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa [#]bstan pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po bstan
[\[284a.6\]]pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i mdo dang /_'phags pa da ltar gyi [#]sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs [#]pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa sku gsum bstan pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa dri ma med pas byin pas zhus pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus
[\[284a.7\]]pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa bu mo rnam dag dang bas zhus pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa chos nyid rang gi ngo bo nyid las mi g.yo bas tha dad par bstan pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa de nyid dang /_'phags pa bden pa gnyis bstan pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa nam
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]mkha'i snying po'i mdo dang /_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo dang /_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo ma lus pa thams cad dang /_'phags pa gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdo la
[\[284b.2\]]sogs pa mdo sde thams cad nas don 'di shin tu gsal bar gsungs pas mdo de dang de nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/'dir de dag gi sh+lo ka bkod na ni gzhung shin tu mangs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na theg pa chen po'i mdo sde ma lus pa thams cad blta ba la shin tu brtson par bya'o/_/gzhan
[\[284b.3\]]yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i don phyin ci ma log par ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pa [#]slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa Ar+ya de ba dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa zla grags dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa shAn ta de ba dang /_slob dpon
[\[284b.4\]]'phags pa b+ha bya snang bral dang /_slob dpon rta dbyangs dang /_slob dpon 'phags pa dge bsnyen zla ba la sogs pas mdzad pa'i gzhung de dag ni mdo'i don gsal bar bkrol ba yin pas de dag kyang legs par blta ba la brtson par bya'o/_/'dir de dag gi gzhung bkod pa [#]na
[\[284b.5\]]ni yi ge shin tu mangs par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar 'phags pa klu sgrub ni mdo sde phal che ba dang /_'dzam bu'i gling na mkhas pa dag kyang 'di skad du sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin no zhes brjod cing grags mod kyang /_bdag gis [#]mdo'i nang nas sa brgyad pa'i
[\[284b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' yin par legs par mthong ba yin no/_/slob dpon Ar+ya de ba yang [#]'phags pa klu sgrub kyi man ngag gis sa brgyad pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin par legs par mthong ngo /_/slob dpon zla grags kyang 'phags pa [#]klu sgrub kyi man ngag gis
[\[284b.7\]]bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs [#]mnga' ba chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur thugs su chud pa 'dzam bu'i gling du lo bzhi brgyar bzhugs [#]nas gzhan gyi don 'ba' zhig mdzad pa yin no/_/slob dpon shAn ta de ba yang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi man ngag gis [#]'phags pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]gnang ba thob par byas te bden pa gzigs pa yin no/_/slob dpon b+ha bya yang 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi man ngag gis sku tshe de nyid la rig [#]'dzin gnas su gshegs pa yin no/_/slob dpon rta dbyangs ni slob dpon Ar+ya de ba'i man ngag gis[#] bden pa gzigs pa yin no/_/
[\[285a.2\]]'phags pa dge bsnyen zla ba yang de lta bu'o/_/de bas na de lta bu'i lung dang rigs pa rgya chen po bstan pa de dag shes par byas shing de'i don la nges par byas te/_the tshom med par byas nas lhag mthong zhes bya ba rnam par mi rtog pa de bsgom par bya'o/_/ji ltar bsgom [#]zhe na/_re zhig
[\[285a.3\]]dngos po ni gnyis te/_gzugs can dang gzugs can ma [#]yin pa'o/_/de gnyis ka yang gtan tshigs chen po rnams kyis bsal te bsgom par bya'o/_/de yang ji skad du chos thams cad sems la bsdus shing /_sems kyang lus la bsdus la/_lus kyang chos kyi dbyings su
[\[285a.4\]]gtang [#]ba 'di ni man ngag go zhes bla ma'i zhal nas ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs kyi le'u las gsungs so/_/de lta bu la [#]shes pa cir yang mi rtog_/cir yang mi 'dzin/_dran pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad spangs te/_ji srid mtshan ma'i dgra ma langs pa'i bar de srid du de lta bu la
[\[285a.5\]]gnas par bya'o/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/_kun du rtogs [#]pas ma brtags shing /_/yid ni rab tu mi gnas la/_/dran med yid la byed pa med/_/dmigs med de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes gsungs so/_/[#]'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal nas/_mkhas pa stong pa nyid la
[\[285a.6\]]yang /_/stong pa nyid du blta mi 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang /_dmigs pa dang ni bral ba'i sems/_/nam mkha'i mtshan nyid la gnas te/_/nam mkha' sgom par byed pa ni/_/stong pa nyid ni sgom pa'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/slob dpon zhi ba lha'i zhal nas/_gang tshe yod dang med
[\[285a.7\]]pa gnyis/_/blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa/_/de tshe rnam pa gzhan med pas/_/dmigs pa med pas [#]rab tu zhi/_/zhes gsungs so/_/goms na ni de'i stobs su 'gyur te/_slob dpon zhi ba lha'i zhal nas/_stong pa nyid la goms pa yis/_/dngos po'i bag chags spong bar 'gyur/_/zhes
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]gsungs pa dang /_slob dpon dpal sbas kyis kyang /_'ga' zhig bsgom pa goms pa yi/_/mthu yis [#]chos kun ngo bo nyid/_/med pa de yi bdag nyid du/_/'gyur te dngos po mthong ba bzhin/_/zhes gsungs so/_/des ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa bstan to/_/de ltar stong
[\[285b.2\]]nyid bsgom byas nas/_/rim gyis [#]drod sogs thob byas nas/_/rab dga' la sogs thob 'gyur te/_/sangs rgyas byang chub yun mi ring /_/'dir mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnal 'byor dang /_spyod lam gyi rnal 'byor la gnas nas gong du ji ltar bshad pa'i theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i don pha
[\[285b.3\]]rol tu phyin pa'i lam la legs par gnas pa des/_mgon po byams pa'i zhal nas gsungs shing /_'phags pa thogs med kyis 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par spel pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi skabs brgyad kyi rim pa 'phags pa rnam par
[\[285b.4\]]grol ba'i sde dang /_slob dpon dpal seng ge bzang pos bkrol [#]zhing bshad pa de shes par byas la gnas par bya'o/_/de lta ma yin na lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa la rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rnal 'byor pa de kho na nyid la gnas pas tshogs kyi lam la gnas nas/_thar
[\[285b.5\]]pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas sbyor ba'i lam la reg par 'gyur te/_rim gyis drod sogs zhes pa drod rnam pa gsum dang /_rtse mo rnam pa gsum dang /_bzod pa rnam pa gsum dang /_chos mchog rnam pa gsum la gnas nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang
[\[285b.6\]]mthun [#]pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing ting nge 'dzin bzhis mthong ba'i lam la sogs pa skye ba ni/_rab dga' la sogs thob 'gyur te/_/zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas byang chub ces pa ni 'di ltar sa bcu rdzogs par byas nas skad cig ma gcig la mngon par [#]rdzogs par byang chub
[\[285b.7\]]par gyur nas/_sku gsum dang ye shes lnga la sogs pa yun mi ring bar myur du 'thob [#]pa yin no/_/drod nas bzung ste sbyor ba'i lam/_/mthong ba'i lam sogs sa bcu dang /_/sku gsum la sogs rnam gzhag ni/_/gzhung mangs [#]'jigs pas 'dir ma bris/_/mdo dang bstan
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]bcos rnams na gsal/_/rab tu bsgrims te blta bar bya/_/yang na/_sangs rgyas byang chub yun mi ring /_/zhes bya ba la/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' le lo can dag spro ba bskyed [#]pa'i don yin no[#]/_/gang bskal pa grangs med pa [#]gsum zhes gsungs pa de
[\[286a.2\]]yang yun mi ring ste/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba mtha' dag gi don du gnas pa ste/_ji skad du am+ba rA dzas/_bdag ni byang chub ring tshul du/_/'tshang rgyar mos shing spro pa med/_/phyi mthar thug gi bar du ni/_/sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya/_/zhes
[\[286a.3\]]gsungs so/_/dpal mchog dang po las kyang /_ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/_/mkhas mchog gnas par gyur pa ni/_de srid mtshungs med sems can don/_/mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/_/zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa klu sgrub kyis kyang smon lam las/_ji srid
[\[286a.4\]]sems can 'dir 'ga' zhig_/sems can gcig grol ma gyur pa/_/bla med byang chub thob gyur kyang /_/de srid de don dpyad [#]par bgyi/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mdo las/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad chu'i dkyil 'khor du gyur la/_de la skyes bu zhig
[\[286a.5\]]gis [#]lo stong phrag brgya brgya na spu'i rtse mo zhig gis chu de las 'thor bar byas na/_chu'i dkyil 'khor de ni zad par 'gyur la/_sems can gyi khams la zad pa med do zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa bzang po spyod pa las kyang /_nam mkha'i mthar thug gyur pa ci tsam par/_/sems
[\[286a.6\]]can ma lus mtha' yang de tsam mo/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rdul phra rab tu bshig [#]pa'i rjes la byang chub thob par bya'o snyam na yang de ni le lo can yin par bshad do/_de bas na am+ba [#]rA dzas kyang /_'khor ba'i thog ma med pa yi/_/skye ba tha ma ji srid du/_/de srid
[\[286a.7\]]sems can phan don du/_/spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bgyi/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de bas na sems can gyi khams la zad pa yang med 'phel ba yang med pa'i sdug bsngal can de dag yal bar bor nas/_bdag nyid myur du 'tshang rgya bar ni 'dod par mi bya ste/_byang chub sems
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]dpa' dpa' bo dbang po rnon po brtson 'grus rab dang ldan pa/_sems snying rje'i dbang du gyur ba/_sems can ma lus pa la snying rje ba can de lta bu ni mi 'dod du zin kyang myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni zhar la byung [#]ba'o/_/smon lam dang ni 'jug pa dang /_/de bzhin
[\[286b.2\]]zab dang rgya che dang /_/mi ldog 'bras bu thob pas kyang /_/theg pa chen po khyad par 'phags/_/zhes slob dpon tri bi Ta ka ma [#]la'i zhal snga nas tshul gsum pa'i sgron mar gsungs te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa bas pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa khyad par [#]du 'phags so zhes khong du chud par bya'o/_/
[\[286b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa rdzogs so//_//da ni bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa chen po gsang sngags kyi theg pa brjod par bya'o/_/de yang slob dpon chen po rje btsun tre bi Ta ka ma [#]la'i zhal snga nas/_don gcig yin na'ang ma rmongs dang /_/thabs mang dka' [#]ba med
[\[286b.4\]]phyir dang /_/dbang po rnon po'i dbang byas pas/_/sngags kyi bstan bcos khyad par 'phags/_/zhes [#]shes rab kyi [#]pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa bas gsang sngags kyi theg pa khyad par [#]du 'phags so zhes bya ba ni gzhung lugs so/_/'di ltar don dam pa'i byang chub kyi sems dngos phyin ci ma log
[\[286b.5\]]pa de ni gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpas bskyed par bya'o/_/'on kyang 'dir ni de lta bu'i gzhung gi don ni bdag gis [#]ma brjod do/_/'dir ni bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i thabs cung zhig rtsa bar yang
[\[286b.6\]]bkod cing 'dir yang rtsa ba la brten pa tsam zhig bri bar [#]bya'o/_/de lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi lugs kyis thun mong [#]ma yin pa'i tshogs gnyis myur du rdzogs par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/_sngags mthu nyid las byung ba yi/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras te/_sngags mthu zhes pa ni spyir
[\[286b.7\]]gzungs kyi cho ga thams cad kyang bya ba'i rgyud yin pas gzungs la sogs pa'i sngags rgyud thams cad nas 'byung ba'i sngags kyi bzlas brjod kyi nus pas dngos grub 'byung ste/_de gang zhe na/_zhi dang rgyas la sogs pa yi/_/zhes pa dbang dang mngon spyod kyi cho ga rnam pa brgyad do/_/
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]bum pa bzang grub la sogs pa/_/grub chen brgyad ces pa ni 'di ltar bum pa bzang po dang /_rkang mgyogs dang /_ral gri dang /_mngag gzhug pa dang /_sa 'og dang /_mi snang ba dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing dang /_rgyal srid rnams so/_/sogs pa [#]zhes pa ni
[\[287a.2\]]mig sman dang /_ri lu dang /_nam mkha' la 'phur ba dang /_'bru'i char 'bebs [#]pa dang /_yungs kar bsgrubs [#]nas gzugs sna tshogs byed pa dang /_pra phab nas mngon par shes pa bskyed pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa brgyud [#]nas rjes su gzung ba dang tshar gcad pa'i las kyi
[\[287a.3\]]dngos grub ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag ni bzlas [#]brjod dang ting nge 'dzin gyis zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang /_dbang dang mngon spyod dang /_'jig rten gyi dngos grub chen po brgyad la sogs pa dag bsgrubs nas 'bad pa med par myur du bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byed
[\[287a.4\]]do/_/de lta bu'i dngos grub 'bad pa med par myur du 'byung ba'i gsang sngags kyi theg pa zhes pa de gang yin zhe na/_bya ba spyod sogs rgyud ces bya ba dang /_bya ba'i rgyud dang /_spyod pa'i rgyud dang /_rtog pa'i rgyud dang /_gnyi ga'i rgyud dang /_rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang /_rnal 'byor chen po'i
[\[287a.5\]]rgyud dang /_rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud rnams so/_/de yang rgyud de dag ni re re zhing yang dpag tu med de[#]/_de yang dpal ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa'i rgyud chen po las bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad du rgyud so so'i grangs gsungs te/_bya ba'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/_/spyod pa'i rgyud
[\[287a.6\]]stong phrag brgyad do/_/rtog pa'i rgyud stong phrag bzhi'o/_/gnyis ka'i rgyud stong phrag drug go/_/rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud stong phrag bcu gnyis te/_de dag rgyas par byas na grangs med do zhes gsungs so/_/de la bya ba'i rgyud ni gzungs thams cad dang /_rig pa mchog dang /_gar mkhan
[\[287a.7\]]mchog dang /_rab tu grub par byed pa dang /_dpung bzangs dang /_'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po dang /_'jam dpal gsang ba'i rgyud dang /_rdo rje gtsug tor dang /_a mo g+ha pA sha dang /_rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud chen po la sogs pa stong phrag bzhi bzhugs so/_/spyod pa'i rgyud ni rnam par snang
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i rgyud dang /_lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud la sogs pa rgyud sde stong phrag brgyad bzhugs so/_/rtog pa'i rgyud ni sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud dang /_dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_rtog pa kun las btus pa la sogs pa rgyud sde stong phrag bzhi
[\[287b.2\]]bzhugs so/_/gnyis ka'i rgyud ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang /_pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug la sogs pa rgyud sde stong phrag drug bzhugs so/_/de la rnal 'byor gyi rgyud ni ta ta twA saM gra ha dang /_dpal mchog dang po dang /_'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang /_yang yo ga rnam par
[\[287b.3\]]rgyal ba dang /_rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa grangs med do/_/de la rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud ni dpal gsang ba 'dus par bshad rgyud dang bcas pa dang /_zla gsang thig le dang /_gshin rje'i gshed nag po dang /_dpal mchog dang po dang /_lha thams cad 'dus pa dang /_thams
[\[287b.4\]]cad gsang ba dang /_'dul ba don yod pa dang /_ye shes rdo rje kun las btus pa dang /_rnam par snang mdzad sgyu 'phrul dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa chung ngu dang /_gnyis su med pa rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyud dang /_rdo rje gtsug tor rgyud la sogs pa rgyud sde stong phrag bcu
[\[287b.5\]]gnyis te rgyas par bya na grangs med do/_/rnal 'byor bla na med pa'i rgyud ni dpal nam mkha' dang mnyam pa 'bum pa chen po 'khor lo sdom pa dang /_rdo rje mkha' 'gro dang /_rdo rje gdan bzhi pa dang /_ma hA mA [#]yA dang /_sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor dang /_sangs rgyas thod pa dang /_
[\[287b.6\]]dgyes pa'i rdo rje 'bum phrag lnga pa la sogs pa rgyud sde stong phrag bcu bzhi [#]bzhugs te rgyas par byas [#]na grangs med do/_/de ltar rgyud sde re re zhing yang grangs med pas na gsang sngags kyi theg pa ni shin tu rgyas shing mthar thug pa med pa yin no/_/'di ltar yi dgas kha nas
[\[287b.7\]]me 'bar ba'i gzungs dang /_rma bya chen mo'i gzungs la sogs pa gzungs ma lus pa thams cad kyang bya ba'i rgyud yin no zhes bla ma dag gsung ngo [#]/_/gsungs pa'i zhes pa ni ji ltar gsungs she na/_'di skad du/_gal te gsang sngags spyod 'dod pas/_/de tshe slob dpon dbang
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bskur phyir/_/zhes gsungs te/_'di ltar gal te bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi theg pa la spyod par 'dod pa yin na ni slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba bum pa'i dbang thob par ma byas par smon pa dang 'jug pa'i sems bskyed pa tsam la ltos [# ]
[\[288a.2\]]par mi bya ste/_gsang sngags rang nyid len par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de yang rgyud las/_slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing /_/dbang rnams thob [#]par ma byas par/_/nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa yang /_/'bras bu med pa nyid du 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs pa dang /_yang rgyud las/_
[\[288a.3\]]dbang bskur rjes gnang med par yang /_/gsang sngags rang nyid len par byed/_/ces gsungs te/_dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang /_dbang bskur ba dang /_bla ma de nyid kyi rjes su gnang ba ma byas par theg pa chen po'i [#]mdo sde'i don pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi cho ga la brten
[\[288a.4\]]nas gzungs kyi cho ga byed pa dang /_gzhan yang rje btsun sgrol ma la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs dag mnyan nas bsgom [#]pa dang /_bzlas pa dang /_sbyin sreg [#]dang /_gtor ma dang /_dkyil 'khor la sogs pa byed pa ni gsang sngags rang nyid lon pa yin te/_dkyil 'khor du
[\[288a.5\]]'jug pa dang /_dbang bskur ba byas te/_slob dpon gyis 'di skad du khyod kyi lha ni 'di yin no/_/bzlas pa 'di bya dgos so zhes rjes su gnang ba ma thob pa'i phyir ro/_/de bas na rgyud las/_gsang sngags rang nyid len pa ni/_/'gro ba dmyal ba 'ba' zhig ste/_/sngags kyang
[\[288a.6\]]'grub par mi 'gyur zhing /_/lus nyon mongs pa kho nar zad/_/ces gsungs so/_/de dag ni gsungs pa'i tshig gi don yin te/_rgyud thams cad dang /_sngon gyi slob dpon thams cad dang /_da lta [#]nyid kyi bla ma ma lus pas 'di skad du gsungs zhes pa'o/_/yang na 'jig rten pa
[\[288a.7\]]dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lha'i pra phab pa dang /_rmi lam dag tu gang zag 'di ni skye ba snga ma la gsang sngags spyod spyod pa dag yin no zhes zer na/_des bla ma yongs su mnyes par byas la byin gyis brlab pa byas te/_'di ltar sgrubs [#]shig ces gnang ba byin la/_sgrub pa'i cho ga'i
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]thabs sbyin par bya'o/_/cho ga de yang 'di yin te/_'phags pa dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i cho ga dang /_bcom ldan 'das nor bu rgyas pa'i gzhal med khang gi cho ga dang /_bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po'i cho gas sdig pa sbyong ba dang /_tshogs bsags
[\[288b.2\]]pa byas la ltas bzang po byung ba na gang zag des gsang sngags kyi theg pa la 'jug par gnang gi 'di ltar skye ba snga ma la gsang sngags spyad pa ma yin pa dang /_yang na gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_smon pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang /_'jug pa byang chub kyi sems
[\[288b.3\]]bskyed pa byas pa tsam la ni gsang sngags bstan pa dang /_des bsgrub pa dang blta ba dang mnyan pa [#]bya bar ma gnang ste/_'jug pa'i lam so so ba yin pa dang /_theg pa dag ni rnam par thar pa bsre bar mi bya ba yin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]gang zag gi [#]dbang po dang khams dang
[\[288b.4\]]bag la nyal mkhyen pas [#]theg pa'i lam so sor gsungs pa yin no/_/de bas na rtsa ba nas smras pa de lta bas na/_gal te gsang sngags spyod 'dod pas/_/de tshe slob dpon dbang bskur [#]phyir/_/zhes smras te/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam du 'jug cing spyod 'dod na ni sngar ji ltar brjod
[\[288b.5\]]pa bzhin du bslab pa rnam pa gsum la bslab par bya ba yin la/_gal te gsang sngags spyod cing rje btsun sgrol ma la sogs pa sgrub par 'dod na ni slob dpon gyi dbang zhes pa bum pa'i dbang bskur ba [#]zhu bar bya'o zhes pa ni sh+lo ka'i don yin no/_/'o na dbang bskur ba'i bla ma de la
[\[288b.6\]]bla chos [#]dang yo byad med par bya ba'am zhe na ma yin te/_bsnyen bkur rin chen la sogs zhes so/_/'o na yo byad kyis [#]phongs shing dbul po dag gis ji ltar bya zhe na/_bka' sgrub la sogs [#]zhes pa'o/_/'dir skye bo 'byor pa can dag gis ni rgyal srid rin po che bdun la
[\[288b.7\]]sogs pa tha na bdag nyid kyi lus kyang dbul bar bya ste/_ji ltar slob dpon sangs rgyas ye shes zhabs la rgyal po de ba pA las rgyal srid thams cad phul ba'i rjes su btsun mo dang rang nyid kyang phul nas phyis rgyal po dang btsun mo gnyis gser de gnyis dang mnyam pas bslus
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]pa lta bu'o/_/dbul po dag gis bka' bsgrub pa dang /_lus kyi bsnyen bkur dang /_dkyil 'khor dang /_me tog yang dang yang du dbul ba la sogs bya'o/_/de lta bu'i tshul gyis bla ma dam pa mnyes par bya'o/_/de ltar bla ma mnyes shing dges par
[\[289a.2\]]gyur pa dang /_dbang bskur ba thob par byas nas lus la sogs pa'i sdig pa thams cad las grol nas/_des sdig pa dag pa'i rgyus 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gsang sngags kyi theg pa la gnas
[\[289a.3\]]nas 'bad pa med par myur du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/_gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par bya ba'i thabs bstan nas/_da ni gsang sngags kyi theg pa la log par rtog pa dag dgag pa'i phyir/_dang po sangs rgyas rgyud chen las/_/zhes pa la sogs pa smras te/_
[\[289a.4\]]'dir gsang sngags la log par rtog pa ni gnyis te sgro 'dogs par byed pa dang skur pa 'debs par byed pa'o[#]/_/snga ma ni tshar gcad par bya'o/_/phyi ma ni rjes su gzung bar bya'o/_/'di ltar 'di na kha cig gsang sngags kyi rgyud chen po mtha' dag gi [#]dgongs pa yang mi shes/_
[\[289a.5\]]bla ma dam pas kyang ma zin cing /_sdig pa'i bshes gnyen la [#]brten pas gsang sngags kyi tshul ji lta bar ma shes pa [#]dgongs pa can gyi bka' la brten nas 'di skad du bdag cag ni gsang sngags pa'o/_/bdag cag ni spyod pa thams cad bag yangs su byed cing phyag rgya chen po'i
[\[289a.6\]]dngos grub kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs shing gnas pa de dag ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la skur pa btab pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa dag sbags pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par byas pa dang /_mngon spyod drag po byas pa dang /_
[\[289a.7\]]bud med dag bsten pas pham pa byung ba'i phyir ro/_/dpal ye shes grags pa'i zhal nas 'di skad du bdag cag rnal 'byor pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis [#]gnang ba yin no zhes zer zhing sgra gsang cher sgrogs pa dang /_gzhan yang spyod pa thams cad kyang bag yangs su byed pa de
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]dag ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bdag gi bla ma dge slong bsod snyoms pa ya ba dI [#]pa'i zhal nas kyang /_gal te dbang bskur ba de gnyis 'dzin par byed na/_slob dpon dang slob ma dang bcas pa ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/bcom ldan
[\[289b.2\]]'das kyis [#]dgongs pa lung bstan pa'i rgyud chen po las/_rnal 'byor man ngag med pa dag_/lcags kyu med pa bzhin du spyod/_/bdag ni rnal 'byor pa zhes zer/_/chos ni g.yo yis byed par 'gyur/_/sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis/_/'tsho ba dag kyang sgrub par byed/_/nyes pa
[\[289b.3\]]cung zad tsam la yang /_/mngon spyod drag po byed bar 'gyur/_/'di ltar sgrub pa'i thabs tsam zhig_/shes nas rgyud chen 'chad par byed/_/gang du rnyed pa thob 'gyur bar/_/dam pa'i chos ni ston par byed/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa mang du gsungs so/_/de bzhin du dpal
[\[289b.4\]]pad+ma rdo rjes kyang de lta bu'i nyes dmigs mang du gsungs nas/_de lta bu dang de dag nyid/_/kun kyang sdig pa'i las can te/_/dam pa min pa'i lam zhugs nas/_/dmyal ba dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/khungs mang du yod mod kyi yi ge mangs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[289b.5\]]de lta bu dag ni snying rje'i sems kyis [#]tshar gcad par bya'o/_/yang 'di na la la dag 'di skad du gsang sngags kyi tshul chen po ji lta bar mi shes par [#]gsang sngags kyi theg pas [#]ci zhig bya/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gtsang ba de nyid la 'jug
[\[289b.6\]]par bya'o/_/'di ltar bud med bsten pas ni mi tshangs par spyod pa'i pham pa 'ong la/_mngon spyod drag po byas pas ni srog bcad [#]pa'i pham pa 'ong bas de la 'jug par mi bya'o zhes rgyud kyi dgongs pa mi shes par skur pa 'debs pa de dag ni zab cing rgya che ba dbang po rnon po'i spyod
[\[289b.7\]]yul sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i snying por gyur pa skal pa dang /_bag chags dang /_las 'phror ldan pa 'ga'i spyod yul du gyur pa yin pas de lta bu la skur pa 'debs pa de ni nges par sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka'
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]la skur pa btab ba dang /_chos zab mo spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/chos spangs ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa ni 'phags pa rnam par 'thag pa'i mdo las 'di skad du chos la la ni bzang zhes pa dang /_chos la la ngan no zhes zer na chos spangs pa'o zhes pa la
[\[290a.2\]]sogs pa chos du ma mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/bla ma dge slong bsod snyoms ba'i zhal nas kyang /_de'i phyir gsang sngags theg pa la/_/bdud kyis smras zhes brnyas mi bya/_/theg pa kun la spangs [#]pa yang /_/'di gnas phyag rgya chen po thob/_/ces gsungs so/_/de lta bu'i
[\[290a.3\]]gang zag ni snying rje'i sems kyis [#]rjes su gzung bar bya'o/_/skur ba 'debs pa de yang gnyis te/_chos la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa'o/_/de la chos la skur pa 'debs par mi bya ste/_'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa las 'di skad du/_
[\[290a.4\]]chos zab mo gang dag blos mi rtogs pa de la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni mtha' yas shing sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos [#]bstan pa la 'jug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen [#]gyi bdag gis ni mi shes te/_de bzhin
[\[290a.5\]]gshegs pas mngon sum mo zhes bya ba la sogs pa [#]gsungs te/_mdo nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang mdo dang rgyud thams cad du don 'di bdag [#]gis mthong ngo /_/gang zag la yang skur pa gdab par mi bya ste/_'phags pa lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul [#]ba dang /_
[\[290a.6\]]'phags pa chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa dag las nga'am nga dang 'dra ba ma gtogs par gang zag gis gang zag gi tshod gzung [#]bar mi bya ste nyams par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de'i nyes pa ni mdo las gzhan yang mang du mthong ngo /_/dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud
[\[290a.7\]]chen las/_/zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig rkang pa bcu gnyis kyi don bdag gis bdag gi bla mar gyur pa dge slong bsod snyoms pa dang [#]gser gling pa'i gdams ngag la brten pa yin te/_bla ma'i zhal nas dbang bskur ba nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba las 'di skad du/_de la dbang
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]ni rnam pa gnyis te/_khyim pa'i phyogs la brten pa dang /_tshangs par spyod pa'i phyogs la brten pa'o/_/khyim pa'i phyogs la brten pa gang zhe na/_ji snyed rgyud las gsungs pa thams cad do/_/tshangs par spyod pa'i phyogs la brten pa [#]gang zhe na/_de dag nyid las gsang ba dang /_
[\[290b.2\]]shes rab ye shes spangs pa'o/_/de [#]ci'i phyir de gnyis spangs she na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos la brten nas dge ba ji snyed cig 'byung ba de dag thams cad ni bstan pa gnas pa las 'byung ba yin la/_bstan pa gnas pa yang tshangs par spyod pa kho [#]la ltos shing /_dbang
[\[290b.3\]]bskur ba gnyis ni tshangs par spyod pa'i mi mthun pa'i gnas su mthong ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na dbang bskur ba gnyis ni tshangs par spyod pa zad par byed pa yin la/_tshangs par spyod pa zad na sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa nub par 'gyur zhing /_de nub pas bsod nams mngon par 'du
[\[290b.4\]]bya ba rnams rgyun chad par 'gyur la/_gzhi de las dge ba ma yin pa dpag tu med pa 'byung ba'i phyir de gnyis tshangs par spyod pa rnams la spangs so zhes gsungs so/_/de ltar yin na tshangs par spyod pa dag gis [#]gsang sngags la 'jug tu mi rung ngo zhe na/_rgyud kun nyan dang
[\[290b.5\]]'chad pa dang /_/sbyin sreg [#]mchod sbyin sogs byed pa/_/slob dpon dbang bskur rnyed gyur pa/_/zhes bya ba 'di smos so/_/gal te tshangs par spyod pa'i sngags pas rgyud la sogs pa nyan pa dang /_gzhan la 'chad pa dang /_blta ba dang /_sbyin sreg [#]dang /_gtor ma dang /_
[\[290b.6\]]bzlas brjod dag byed par 'dod na ni slob dpon dbang bskur zhes pa bum pa'i dbang gis rung ba [#]rgyud thams cad dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad nas gsal bar gsungs so/_/'di'i don bla ma dge slong bsod snyoms pa ya ba dI [#]pas gsungs te/_'di skad du de lta
[\[290b.7\]]yin na tshangs par spyod pa rnams ni theg pa chen po'i yang theg pa [#]chen po'i skal ba can ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na/_de ni 'dir nges par 'khrul par spyad par bya ste/_gang gis bum pa dang /_slob dpon dang rjes su gnang ba thob pa nyid kyi rgyud la sogs pa bsgrub pa dang /_bshad
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]pa dang mnyan pa dang blta ba la dbang bskur [#]ba'i phyir skal ba can yin no/_/de lta na khyim pa dag la yang gsang ba dang /_shes rab kyi dbang dgos pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na/_de mi dgos pa yang yin la/_de las bzlog pa yang yin no zhes bya ba la sogs
[\[291a.2\]]pa rgyas par gsungs so/_/de nyid rig la nyes pa med/_/ces pa 'di'i don ni bdag la bla ma dag gis [#]nye bar bstan pa gnang ba mang du yod de/_bla ma dam pa kha cig gi zhal nas snying rjes sems can gyi don rig cing sems snying rje'i dbang du song ba'i byang chub sems
[\[291a.3\]]dpas ci byas kyang de'i rgyud la nyes pa med cing de'i rjes la yang bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/_/de ni bzod pa chung ngu thob pa yin no/_/dam pa la la'i zhal nas chos thams cad sgyu mar shes shing de'i de kho na nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor pa
[\[291a.4\]]las nyes par 'gyur ba gang yang med de/_'di skad du/_chu yi zla ba lta bur ni/_/rnal 'byor pa ni gang gis [#]shes/_/de ni sdig dang bsod nams sogs/_/nam yang gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/nang dang phyi rol gnas 'di kun/_/sems yin sgyu ma lta bu ste/_/de yang rtag
[\[291a.5\]]min chad pa min/_/gnyi ga [#]dag tu'ang mi rtog cing /_/dngos 'dzin dug gis ma gos pas/_/de lta bu ni sus mthong ba/_/sgyu mar rig la nyes pa med/_/ces gsungs te/_chos kyi mchog chung ngu thob pa la nyes pa med pa'o/_/bla ma dge slong bsod snyoms pa'i nyes par mi
[\[291a.6\]]'gyur ba ni bla ma'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i gzhung de nyid du blta bar bya'o/_/'di ni las dang po pa da lta nyid na yang nyes pa med pa'o/_/dam pa gzhan ni 'di skad du 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo dang [#]/_bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa'i mdo dang /_dpal mchog dang
[\[291a.7\]]po'i rgyud dang /_'dul ba don yod pa'i rgyud dang /_rgyud gzhan de ma yin pa dag dang /_'phags pa klu sgrub dang /_slob dpon Ar+ya de ba la sogs pa'i gzhung de dag gi tshul gyis nyes par [#]mi 'gyur zhing /_don de ni de kho na nyid rig pa la nyes pa med de rtse mo chung ngu thob pa na'o
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]zhes gsung ngo /_/dam pa gzhan ni 'di skad du chos thams cad kyi skye ba med pa don dam pa byang chub kyi sems bskyed cing /_de rgyud la skyes pa la yang nyes pa med de/_chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid rig pa la nyes pa med do zhes gsung ste[#]/_'di ni bden pa mthong ba dag la nyes pa [# ]
[\[291b.2\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na lam la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa des nyes pa med pa dang /_nyes par 'gyur pa dag shes par bya'o/_/yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sprul pa'i sku/_/'das shing 'phags pa klu sgrub la sogs pa'i/_/mkhas pa chen po rnams kyang med pa na/_/
[\[291b.3\]]thub pa'i dam chos nub tu nye ba yi/_/ding sang dus na smyon pa lta bu yi/_/log par rtogs pa'i gang zag mang po byung /_/bla ma brgyud pa'i gdams ngag bral ba yi/_/mdo dang bstan bcos glegs bam mthong ba yis/_/gsung rab rgya mtsho zab mo'i don la spyod/_/de dag
[\[291b.4\]]long ba lta bur gyur pa ste/_/theg chen lam mchog de yis shes pa min/_/de bas log rtogs rjes su 'brang mi bya/_/legs pa'i 'byung gnas theg pa chen po'i lam/_/bla ma [#]mig dang 'dra ba med pa yis/_/ma mthong mi mthong mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/theg pa chen po rgya
[\[291b.5\]]mtsho ltar zab cing /_/nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rgya che ba/_/bla ma dang bral rang dga' smra ba yis[#]/_/mdo dang bstan bcos dag gi [#]glegs bam de/_/mthong bas tshim ste bla ma sten mi byed/_/de dag gis ni theg pa chen po yi/_/gtam gyi rim pa tsam yang mi shes na/_/zab dang rgya
[\[291b.6\]]che'i don lta ga la yod/_/theg chen bag chags bzang po yod pa yi[#]/_/bla ma dam pas zin pa'i skye bo ni/_/mkhas pa su zhig de yi rjes su 'brang /_/ding sang bstan pa nub kar gyur pa yi/_/'jigs pa chen po'i dus 'di byung bas na/_/rtogs ldan mkhas pa dag gis bag yod
[\[291b.7\]]kyis[#]/_/bla ma bzang po brgyud pa'i gang zag ni/_/yul dang sa phyogs gang na yod pa dri/_/rnyed nas zla ba'am lor yang bsten byas la/_/bsnyen bkur tshul bzhin byas la mnyes par bya/_/skyes bu de yi lus dang ngag dag gi/_/spyod tshul shin tu ngan par spyod na yang /_/de la
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]mi blta dam chos blang bar bya/_/dper na bung bas me tog 'dzin pa'i tshe/_/sbrang rtsi khyer nas me tog lus pa dang /_/mkhas pa des kyang de dang 'dra bar spyad[#]/_/spyod tshul mi blta de yi gdams ngag mnyan/_/nyer bstan de la sems ni goms pas na/_/tshe 'di
[\[292a.2\]]nyid la byang chub thob bya'i phyir/_/'khor lo sdom pa la sogs gsang sngags kyi[#]/_/gdams ngag bla ma brgyud [#]pa can la zhu/_/dbang bskur [#]gnyis pa spangs pa yi/_/gsang sngags gzhung lugs mi shes na/_/rnam rtog du mas bcings gyur pas/_/myur du sangs rgyas 'grub mi
[\[292a.3\]]'gyur/_/yang smras pa/_thub pa'i bstan pa mdangs nyams gyur pa yi/_/ston pa'i dam chos rnam par 'jig pa ni[#]/_/ding sang dus na bstan pa 'jig pa na[#]/_/sangs rgyas nyid kyi slob ma ma gtogs par/_/pha rol pa dang tha mal skye bo yis/_/thub pa'i bstan pa sus kyang
[\[292a.4\]]'jig mi nus/_/khyad par du ni rab tu byung bas 'jig_/kha cig gsang sngags rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/_/log par spyod cing gzhan la'ang log par ston/_/kha cig shes rab pha rol phyin pa yi/_/ji bzhin yang dag don ni mi shes par/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs kun rdzob pa/_/
[\[292a.5\]]'gog cing rang bzhin rnam par dag ces smra[#]/_/kha cig so sor thar pa 'dul ba yi[#]/_/bslab pa ji snyed gsungs pa btang byas nas/_/zhing dang khe sogs khyim pa dang 'dre zhing /_/gtsug lag khang na'ang sna tshogs gtam [#]gyis spyod/_/'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa
[\[292a.6\]]las/_nga yi bstan pa sun 'byin pa/_/ngur smrig gi ni gos bgos shing /_/'bras bu yod dang med smra ba/_/ma 'ongs pa na 'byung bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/yang de nyid las/_rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/_/'jig rten dam chos mi bsgom mo/_/zhes gsungs so/_/mkhas
[\[292a.7\]]pa chen po nor gyi rtsa lag gi zhal [#]nas kyang /_ston pa 'jig rten mig ni zum gyur cing /_/dbang gyur skye bo phal cher zad pa na/_/de nyid ma mthong rang dgar spyod pa yi/_/ngan rtog rnams kyis [#]bstan pa 'di dkrugs so/_/rang byung rang 'byung bstan pa gces 'dzin rnams/_/mchog tu
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]zhir [#]gshegs 'gro mgon med pa na/_/'doms med yon tan 'joms par byed pa yi/_/dri mas dga' mgur ding sang 'di na spyod/_/de ltar thub pa'i bstan pa nyams dga' 'di/_/lkog mar srog 'byin 'dra dang dri ma rnams/_/stobs dang ldan pa'i dus su rig [#]nas ni/_/thar
[\[292b.2\]]pa [#]'dod pa dag gis [#]bag yod kyis/_/zhes gsungs so/_/dam pa'i gdams ngag rgyas par bkod pa 'di/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa ji srid gnas kyi bar/_/snying rje byang chub sems dang ldan pa de/_/brtson 'grus kyis ni nyin mtshan spyod gyur cig_/byang chub lam gyi [#]sgron
[\[292b.3\]]ma'i dka' 'grel zhes bya ba b+haM ga la'i rgyal po'i rigs rgyud shAkya'i dge slong mkhas pa chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mdzad pa dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//dad pa'i sa gzhi tshul khrims sa bon bsten/_/byams pa'i myu gu ting 'dzin chus
[\[292b.4\]]brlan pa'i/_/rtsa ba snying rje chu ba byang chub sems/_/yal ga phar phyin [#]lo ma bsdu ba'i dngos/_/me tog nor bdun 'bras bu rjes dran drug_/dge bcu'i dris khyab slob ma'i bya tshogs 'du/_/shing mchog de 'dra'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/b+haM ga lar 'khrungs mar me mdzad dpal
[\[292b.5\]]zhabs/_/ding sang dus na sangs rgyas gdung 'tshob pa/_/skye bo [#]dbus na nyi ma bzhin du lham[#]/_/snyan par rab grags chos lugs bzang po shes/_/sdom pas rab bsdams mkhas dang nus par ldan/_/rigs can rnams kyi bla mar 'os pa ste/_/de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras
[\[292b.6\]]gcig pu/_/bsam dang lhag bsam gser dang zla tshes 'dra/_/pha rol 'gro ba dag gi bsam pa dang /_/spyod lam mthun [#]zhing chos kyi bshad pa'ang ston/_/nam yang gang zag pha rol mi dad pa/_/dug dang 'dra bar spong byed bsam rjes 'jug_/bya ba ngan spangs spyod lam nyams pa
[\[292b.7\]]med/_/skad cig skad cig gnyen po'i stobs dang ldan/_/phrin las bzang pos yul phyogs [#]dbus su 'khrungs/_/skye ba bzang po rgyal po'i rigs su 'khrungs/_/rigs brgyud [#]bzang po theg chen rigs su 'khrungs/_/smon lam bzang pos sangs rgyas sras su 'khrungs/_/de
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]'dra'i bla ma byang chub sems dpa' ni/_/mar me mdzad dpal ye shes snying rje can/_/skyes mchog de la 'dun pa'i slob ma ni/_/shAkya'i dge slong tshul khrims rgyal ba des[#]/_/dad cing gus pas bsnyen bkur tshul bzhin du/_/byas pa nyid kyis thugs dam snying po ni/_/
[\[293a.2\]]'khor lo sdom pa rnal 'byor rgyud rgyal po/_/chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong las/_/snying po'i snying por gyur pa 'di yin te/_/nyin mtshan kun du yid la 'di bsgom zhes/_/de yis nyer bstan nyams pa med par gnang /_/nags tsho bdag nyid gcig pu ma gtogs pa/_/bod kyi
[\[293a.3\]]slob ma gzhan la yod re skan/_/bla ma de la dad cing gus pa yis/_/lus ngag yid kyis rtag tu phyag 'tshal lo//_//[#]rgya gar gyi mkhas pa chen po bla ma byang chub sems dpa' b+haM ga la pa/_dpal mar me mdzad ye shes zhabs dang /_lo tsA [#]ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal
[\[293a.4\]]bas bsgyur cing zhus//[ {D3949}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_saM gra ha gar+b+ha nA ma/_bod skad du/_snying po bsdus pa zhes bya ba/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho che'i/_/dba' rlabs shin tu 'khrugs
[\[293a.5\]]pa ni/_/dge dang mi dge la sogs pa'i/_/zag bcas las las nges par 'byung /_/de dag chags sdang la sogs pa'i/_/nyon mongs rgyu yis bskyed pa ste/_/de dag 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid kyang /_/yid du 'ong dang mi 'ong sogs/_/gnyis su 'dzin pa nyid las byung /_/thams cad 'byung
[\[293a.6\]]ba'i rgyu nyid ni/_/rtag dang khyab dang gcig pu sogs/_/dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon yin te/_/de bas skal ldan skyes bu ni/_/bdag gzhan grol ba don gnyer bas/_/rten cing 'brel 'byung la sogs pa'i/_/rigs pa gang la goms pa yis/_/dngos por 'dzin pa bzlog par bya/_/
[\[293a.7\]]phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kun/_/mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'i/_/nam mkha' lta bur shes byas la/_/dngos 'dzin gdon gyis brlabs pa yi[#]/_/'gro kun yul du byas nas ni/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa/_/snying rje chen po sngon 'gro bas/_/bdag gzhan don kun
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]'byung ba yi/_/rin chen byang chub sems bskyed bya/_/byang chub spyod pa rlabs chen pos/_/pha rol phyin drug la sogs la/_/mnyam gzhag langs pa'i sbyor ba yis/_/lam snga rim gyis bgrod byas te/_/sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis bsal na[#]/_/tshogs gnyis yongs su rdzogs pa
[\[293b.2\]]las/_/'bras bu sku gsum bsgrub par bya/_/sku gsum 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/stong nyid nam mkha' lta bu las/_/brtsal med thugs rje'i sprin 'byung zhing /_/sku gnyis bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/_/khams gsum tha ma'i rgyud brlan te/_/byang chub snying po'i sa bon las/_/
[\[293b.3\]]dge ba'i lo thog smin par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ste/_/'di ni snying po bsdus pa yin/_/tha ma'i dus su gyur pas na/_/tshe thung nad mang longs spyod dman/_/rkyen ngan bar chad mang ba yis/_/yun rings [#]gnas pa'i mthu med pas/_/tshig rjes gcad par mi nus kyi/_/
[\[293b.4\]]bshes gnyen dam pa bsten bya ste/_/shin tu brtson pa'i sems ldan pas/_/g.yang sa rab tu dran byas te/_/bdag gzhan grol bar bya ba'i phyir/_/snying po myur du bsdu ba yin/_/brtse bas 'di byas bsod nams kyis/_/skal ngan sems can thams cad kyang /_/byang chub
[\[293b.5\]]sems dang ldan gyur nas/_/snying po myur du sdud par shog_/snying po bsdu ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta de nyid dang /_lo tsA [#]ba dge slong tshul khrims 'byung gnas deb rtses bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
[\[293b.6\]]phab pa//[ {D3950}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_hr-i [#]da ya ni krip+ta nA ma/_bod skad du/_snying po nges par bsdu ba zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mngon mtho nges par 'byung ster ba/_/dkon mchog gsum la gus btud nas/_/'khor ba'i
[\[293b.7\]]'jigs pa sel ba yi/_/snying po bsdu ba bshad par bya/_/'khor ba'i mtshan nyid sdug bsngal dang /_/las dang nyon mongs rnam rtog [#]ste/_/de dag rgyu 'bras go rims can/_/'khor ba bsdus nas bstan pa yin/_/thar pa'i mtshan nyid byang chub ste/_/shes rab thabs dang spyod pa dang /_/
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]lam lnga dang ni tshogs gnyis las/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gsum 'byung /_/de yang rgyu 'bras go rims can/_/thar pa bsdus te [#]bstan pa'o/_/khams gsum sdug bsngal rgya mtsho che/_/dba' rlabs shin tu 'khrugs pa ni/_/dge dang mi dge la sogs pa'i/_/
[\[294a.2\]]zag bcas las las nges par 'byung /_/de dag gti mug chags sdang sogs/_/nyon mongs rgyu yis bskyed pa ste/_/yid 'ong mi 'ong la sogs pa/_/gnyis su 'dzin pa nyid las byung /_/thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu nyid ni/_/nga dang bdag tu 'dzin las byung /_/gzhan yang 'byung
[\[294a.3\]]ba'i rgyu nyid ni/_/rtag dang gcig pu khyab la sogs/_/dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon yin te/_/shes rab ldan pas spang bar bya/_/de bas skal ldan skyes bu ni/_/bdag gzhan ma lus grol bya'i phyir/_/mi slu ba yi lung dag dang /_/rten cing 'brel 'byung la sogs pa'i/_/rigs
[\[294a.4\]]pa gang la goms pa yis/_/dngos por 'dzin pa'i gdon chen po/_/ma lus par ni bzlog par bya/_/'di ltar phyi nang chos rnams ni/_/mtshan ma kun bral rang bzhin ni/_/nam mkha' lta bur shes byas la/_/rtag tu goms [#]par bsgrub par bya/_/'khor ba thog [#]ma med pa nas/_/dngos
[\[294a.5\]]'dzin gdon gyis brlabs [#]gyur pa'i/_/'gro kun yul du byas nas ni/_/thams cad rjes su 'dzin pa yis/_/byams chen tshad med sngon 'gro bas/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa'i/_/snying rje chen po tshad med pas/_/bdag la gzhan don 'grub pa yi/_/byang chub sems
[\[294a.6\]]ni rin po che/_/yang dag brtan pa bskyed par bya/_/bdag gzhan 'byor pa bcud ldan pas/_/'khor ba'i chos la yid 'byung bya/_/'jigs pa kun las skyob [#]pa yi/_/skyabs gsum po dang ldan pa des/_/so sor thar la legs gnas bya/_/tshul khrims bzang po dang
[\[294a.7\]]ldan zhing /_/theg [#]chen rigs yod skyes bu des/_/'gro ba skyabs med bskyab [#]pa'i phyir/_/skyabs su 'gro ba sngon 'gro ba/_/smon pa'i sems ni bskyed [#]par bya/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pas/_/'jug pa'i sems ni bskyed byas pas/_/sngar gyi smon pa'i sems de nyid/_/rgya
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]cher rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni/_/rlabs chen pha rol phyin drug sogs/_/mnyam gzhag [#]langs pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/_/tshogs kyi lam 'di bstan [#]par bsgrub/_/lam lnga rim gyis [#]bgrod byas te/_/sgrib pa gnyis ni bsal byas nas/_/
[\[294b.2\]]'di ltar tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas te/_/'bras bu sku gsum 'grub par bya/_/sku gsum sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang /_/chos sku nam mkha' lta bu las/_/brtsal med thugs rje'i sprin byung bas/_/sku gnyis bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun gyis/_/khams gsum tha ba'i rgyud brlan te/_/
[\[294b.3\]]byang chub snying po'i sa bon las/_/dge ba'i lo tog smin par 'gyur/_/dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis [#]gsungs pa'i/_/snying po 'dir ni bsdus pa yin/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal spang [#]'dod na/_/de la brtson 'grus 'bad par bya/_/rtsod pa'i dus kyi tha ma la/_/tshe thung nad mang longs
[\[294b.4\]]spyod dman/_/rkyen ngan bar chad mang ba [#]yis/_/yun rings [#]gnas pa'i mthu med pas/_/tshig rjes gcad par mi nus kyis/_/rigs la gnas pa'i gang zag des/_/bshes gnyen dam pa bsten byas la/_/shin tu brtson pa'i sems kyis ni/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dran byas la/_/
[\[294b.5\]]bdag gzhan grol bar bya ba'i phyir/_/snying po myur du bsdu bar bya/_/brtse bas 'di byas dge ba yis/_/skal ldan sems can ma lus kun/_/byang chub sems kyis [#]rgyud brlan te/_/snying po myur du sdud par shog_/snying po nges par bsdu ba zhes bya ba/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal
[\[294b.6\]]mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas dbus kyi gnye [#]thang gtsug lag khang du mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//_
[\[294b.7\]{D3951}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bod+hi satwa ma N+ya [#]ba li/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i phreng ba/_thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dad pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/the tshom thams cad rnam spangs shing /_/sgrub la nan tan gces [# ]
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]su bya/_/gnyid rmugs le lo spang [#]bya zhing /_/rtag tu brtson [#]'grus 'bad par bya/_/dran dang shes bzhin bag yod pas/_/dbang po'i sgo rnams rtag tu bsrung /_/nyin mtshan dus gsum yang dang yang /_/sems kyis rgyud la brtag par bya/_/bdag gi [#]nyes pa
[\[295a.2\]]bsgrag [#]bya zhing /_/gzhan gyi 'khrul pa btsal mi bya/_/gzhan gyi yon tan bsgrag bya zhing /_/bdag gi yon tan sba bar bya/_/rnyed dang bkur sti spang bya zhing /_/khengs grags rtag tu spang bar bya/_/byams dang snying rje bsgom bya zhing /_/byang chub sems ni brtan [#]par bya/_/mi dge bcu po
[\[295a.3\]]spang bya zhing /_/rtag tu dad pa brtan par bya/_/'dod pa chung zhing chog shes dang /_/byas pa drin du gzo ba dang /_/khro dang nga rgyal gzhom bya zhing /_/dman pa'i sems dang ldan par bya/_/log pa'i 'tsho ba rnam spang zhing [#]/_/chos kyi 'tsho bas 'tsho bar bya/_/zang zing thams cad
[\[295a.4\]]rnam spang zhing /_/'phags pa'i nor gyis [#]brgyan par bya/_/dad pa'i nor dang tshul khrims nor/_/khrel yod ngo tsha shes pa'i nor/_/thos pa'i nor dang gtong ba'i nor/_/shes rab nyid kyi nor bdun po/_/nor gyi rnam pa 'di dag ni/_/mi zad pa yi gter bdun de[#]/_/mi ma yin la
[\[295a.5\]]brjod mi bya/_/rtag tu 'du 'dzi spang bya zhing /_/dgon pa la ni gnas par bya/_/'khyal pa'i tshig [#]rnams spang bya zhing /_/ngag rnams rtag tu bsdam par bya/_/bla ma mkhan po mthong ba'i tshe/_/gus pas rim gro bskyed par bya/_/gang zag chos kyi mig can dang /_/las dang po pa'i
[\[295a.6\]]sems can la/_/ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya/_/sems can thams cad mthong ba'i tshe/_/pha ma bu tsha'i 'du shes bskyed/_/sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya zhing /_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten par bya/_/sdang dang mi bde'i sa spang zhing /_/gang du bde bar 'gro bar bya/_/gang
[\[295a.7\]]la chags pa spang bya zhing /_/chags pa med par gnas par bya/_/chags pas bde 'gro mi thob cing /_/thar pa'i srog kyang gcod par byed/_/gang du dge ba'i chos mthong ba/_/der ni rtag tu 'bad par bya/_/thog ma brtsams pa gang yin pa/_/dang po de nyid bsgrub bya ste/_/de lta
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]na ni kun legs byas/_/gzhan du gnyis ka 'grub mi 'gyur/_/rtag tu sdig la dga' bral bya/_/gang du mtho ba'i sems 'byung tshe/_/de tshe nga rgyal bcag bya zhing /_/bla ma'i gdams ngag dran par bya/_/zhum pa'i sems ni byung ba'i tshe/_/sems kyi gzengs ni bstod par bya/_/rtag tu
[\[295b.2\]]stong nyid bsgom par bya/_/gang du chags sdang [#]yul byung tshe/_/sgyu ma sprul pa bzhin du blta/_/mi snyan tshig rnams thos pa'i tshe/_/brag ca bzhin du blta bar bya/_/lus la gnod pa byung ba'i tshe/_/sngon gyi las su blta bar bya/_/bas mtha' dgon par rab gnas shing /_/ri dgas shi
[\[295b.3\]]ba'i ro bzhin du/_/bdag gis [#]bdag nyid sba bya zhing /_/chags pa med par gnas par bya/_/rtag tu yi dam brtan bya zhing /_/le lo rnyog pa'i sems byung tshe/_/de tshe bdag la brngan bgrang zhing /_/brtul zhugs snying po dran par bya/_/gal te gzhan dag mthong ba'i tshe/_/zhi des
[\[295b.4\]]gsong por smra ba dang /_/khro gnyer [#]ngo 'dzum spang bya zhing /_/rtag tu 'dzum zhing gnas par bya/_/rtag tu gzhan dag mthong ba'i tshe/_/ser sna med cing sbyin la dga'/_/rtag tu phrag dog spang bar bya/_/gzhan gyi sems ni bsrung ba'i phyir/_/rtsod pa thams cad spang bya zhing /_/rtag tu bzod
[\[295b.5\]]dang ldan par bya/_/ngo dga' med cing gsar [#]'grogs med/_/rtag tu zungs ni thub par bya/_/gzhan la brnyas pa spang bya zhing /_/gus pa'i tshul gyis gnas par bya/_/gzhan la gdams ngag byed pa'i tshe/_/snying rje phan sems ldan par bya/_/chos la skur ba gdab mi bya/_/gang mos 'di
[\[295b.6\]]la 'dun par bya/_/chos spyod rnam bcu'i [#]sgo nas ni/_/nyin mtshan med par 'bad par bya/_/mang po'i nang du ngag la brtag_/gcig pu 'dug na sems la brtag_/dus gsum dge rtsa ci bsags pa/_/bla med byang chub chen por bsngo/_/bsod nams sems can rnams la bdar/_/rtag tu
[\[295b.7\]]yan lag bdun pa yi/_/smon lam chen po gdab par bya/_/de ltar byas na bsod nams dang /_/tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs 'gyur te/_/sgrib pa gnyis kyang zad par 'gyur/_/mi lus thob pa'i don yod pas/_/bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dang dpal mar
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i nor bu'i phreng ba rdzogs so//[ {D3952}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_bo d+hi satwa karmA di margA ba tA ra de sha na/_bod skad du/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa'i [#]lam la 'jug pa bstan pa/_
[\[296a.2\]]bla ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngan 'gro 'khor ba 'joms pa dang /_/mngon mtho nges 'byung rtsol mdzad pa/_/phyogs bcu'i dkon mchog thams cad dang /_/bla ma'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di na gang dag rang bzhin [#]gyis snying rje dang shes rab che ba theg pa chen po'i rigs
[\[296a.3\]]can dang /_yang gang dag skye ba snga ma dag tu theg pa chen po la goms par byas pa'i skyes bu/_'khor ba la yid legs par byung ba 'chi ba rjes su dran pa/_phyi nang gi dngos po thams cad la zhen pa chung ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes [#]gnyen dam pa cig la theg pa [#]chen po'i lam
[\[296a.4\]]phyin ci ma log pa cig thos par gyur na ci ma rung /_bdag gis dam pa cig [#]btsal bar bya'o snyam du sems pa des/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rung ba'i bla ma btsal te/_gzhan du bstan pa bzhin du gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba khyad par can dang /_'gro ba mtha' yas pa
[\[296a.5\]]yul du byas te bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pas bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por sems thun mong ma yin pa bskyed pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa bzang po dang ldan pas g.yo sgyu dang bral ba'i 'jug pa byang chub kyi sems chen pos/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa
[\[296a.6\]]gsum legs par blang bar bya'o/_/de nas khyi dang gdol pa dang /_bran gyi 'du shes [#]dang ldan pa/_g.yo sgyu dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de tshogs kyi [#]lam pa yin pas nyin dang mtshan du lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bya ba thams cad don med par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar sems
[\[296a.7\]]des zas tshod rig par bya ba dang /_dbang po'i sgo rnams bsdam [#]pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba phra rab tsam la yang 'jigs [#]par lta ba dang /_nyin dang mtshan du rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/_/de nas dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba yang gzhan gyi don du 'gyur bar 'dod pa des tho rangs kyi thun
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]la langs te/_bshang ba dang gci ba dor ba la sogs pa'i spyod lam legs par byas nas/_yul dbus dang yul mtha' 'khob kyi bye brag gis [#]khrus byas la/_'gro ba mtha' dag la dmigs te tshad med pa bzhis byang chub tu sems bskyed la/_dkon mchog
[\[296b.2\]]gsum gyi gzugs brnyan gyi spyan sngar byug ris legs par byas te me tog dri zhim po sil ma legs par gtor nas/_de dag gi spyan sngar pus mo gnyis sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang [#]chos
[\[296b.3\]]thams cad dang /_theg pa chen po'i dge 'dun gyi spyan sngar lus kyi bkod pa grangs med cing [#]brjod du med par sprul te/_de dag re re'i zhabs la legs par phyag bya'o/_/de dag la zang zing gi mchod pa tshad med pa rgya che ba dpag tu med pas mnyes par bya'o/_/de nas lus re re la
[\[296b.4\]]mgo brjod du med pa mgo re re la lce brjod du med par sprul te bdag dang gzhan gyi sdig pa ma lus par bshags par bya'o/_/bdag dang gzhan gyi dge ba la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa
[\[296b.5\]]rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor [#]bar bskul ma gdab bar bya'o/_/gang dag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas tshe'i 'du byed gtong ba dag la 'khor ba ji srid pa'i bar du yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad bla na
[\[296b.6\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bar bya'o/_/ji ltar mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du yan lag de dag re re la tshig shin tu rgyas par brjod par bya'o/_/de nas mchod pa bdun po'i rjes la 'gro ba mtha' dag la dmigs te/_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshig lan gsum
[\[296b.7\]]gyi bar du brjod par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste/_ji ltar cho ga las 'byung ba bzhin du bya'o/_/tha na yang 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la/_/byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi/_/bdag gis [#]sbyin sogs bgyis pa 'di
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]dag gis/_'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub par shog_/ces lan gsum brjod par bya'o/_/de nas bdag gi lus dbul ba dang /_de nas skyes bu chen po'i chos lugs shing rta chen po'i lam [#]la gnas par dam bca' bar bya'o/_/de nas rang gi mal du skyil
[\[297a.2\]]mo krung gis 'dug la/_bla ma rje btsun dpal byang chub bzang pos bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u las gsungs pa'i yan lag dgu po shes par byas la/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya ste/_de yang bying ba dang rgod pa la sogs pa'i skyon du gyur pa
[\[297a.3\]]thams cad bsal te bsgom par bya'o/_/de nas mig phye la dbugs phyung ste/_phyi dang nang gi dngos po mthong ba na/_e ma'o re mtshar/_e ma'o re mtshar/_nam mkha' lta bu'i skye ba med pa las rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i stobs kyis [#]sna tshogs su snang zhing gnas pa 'di/_
[\[297a.4\]]e ma'o [#]ngo mtshar ro snyam du sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad kyi tshul du shes par bya'o/_/de nas snying rje chen po'i yid kyis [#]mi snang ba'i sems can thams cad la chos bshad pa'i phyir rtog [#]pa ci yod pas theg pa chen po'i mdo sde kha ton du gdon par bya'o/_/de nas zas kyi [#]bya ba'i dus su mi gtsang
[\[297a.5\]]ba'i rdzas sum cu rtsa drug gis gang ba'i lus snying po med pa mthar 'jig pa 'dis sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku'i snying po de btsal bar bya'o zhes bsams [#]la rgyags pa'i phyir ma yin la/_ro la chags pas kyang ma yin te/_gru lta bu'i blos bza' bar bya'o/_/zas kyi tshod rig par
[\[297a.6\]]yang bya ste/_gso ba rig pa'i rgyud yan lag brgyad pa las/_lto yi [#]sum cha zas kyis te/_/cha gnyis pa ni skom gyis so/_/rlung la sogs pa'i gnas su ni/_/[#]cha gcig stong par gzhag par bya/_/zhes bshad do/_/zas de la cha bzhir bgo [#]bar bya/_cha dang po dkon mchog
[\[297a.7\]]gsum dang bla ma la dbul bar bya'o/_/cha gcig rang nyid longs spyad [#]par bya'o/_/cha gcig byis pa dang mgon med pa dag la sbyin par bya'o/_/cha [#]gcig ni khyi dang bya rog [#]la sogs pa'i byol song la sbyin par bya'o/_/gang dag gis spyod pa bsdus par ni gzhan du yang brjod
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]do/_/tshul gzhan [#]ni spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma las bshad pa bzhin no/_/de nas snga dro'i thun la yang tho rangs kyi thun la ji skad brjod pa ltar thams cad bya'o/_/gung gi thun dang /_dgongs mo'i thun dang /_srod kyi thun dang /_mtshan mo'i gung gi thun thams cad du ji ltar brjod
[\[297b.2\]]pa'i cho ga thams cad rdzogs par bya'o/_/de ltar [#]rnal 'byor pa de la ni gnyid log pa dang nyal ba'i dus la nges pa med do zhes bla ma dag gsung ngo /_/de lta bu'i rnal 'byor pa tshogs kyi lam pa/_thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed [#]'dod pa'i las dang po pa nyin dang
[\[297b.3\]]mtshan du don med par mi gnas pa de lta bu la ltung ba'i nyes pa ga la 'byung /_gal te bag chags ngan pa'i stobs kyis ltung ba byung bar gyur na/_'di ltar myur du gso bar byed de/_de yang 'di ltar thun drug po [#]dag dum bu bco brgyad du bgos nas skad cig ma lnga bcu rtsa bzhir
[\[297b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang rab 'bring dgur 'gyur ro/_/bla ma'i man ngag gis gso ba'i thabs rnams shes par bya'o/_/dam pa rnams kyis [#]bshad pa'i lam bzang po/_/byang chub 'od sogs slob mas bskul byas pa/_/theg chen rigs can rnams kyis
[\[297b.5\]]bgrod byas nas/_/rkang gnyis dbang po'i gnas su 'gro bar shog_/rje btsun bla ma byang chub sems dpa' la/_/dge slong byang chub 'od kyis gsol ba btab/_/dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas zhus nas bsgyur/_/theg pa chen po pa rnams spyod gyur cig_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[297b.6\]]las dang po pa'i lam la 'jug pa bstan pa/_slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur//[ {D3953}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sa ra NaM [#]gats+tshA mi de sha/_/bod skad du/_
[\[297b.7\]]skyabs su 'gro ba bstan pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ngan song gsum dang 'gro ba lnga'i/_/sdug bsngal ma lus sel mdzad cing /_/mtho ris mya ngan 'das pa yi/_/bde ba stsol [#]mdzad de la 'dud/_/'dir skyabs su 'gro ba bshad par bya ste/_sdom la/_rten dang
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]gnas dang bsam pa dang /_/dus dang rang bzhin tshad dang ni/_/tshul dang bslab pa nges pa'i tshig_/las dang dpe dang dbye ba dang /_/nyes dmigs dgos pa phan yon te/_/rnam pa bco lnga dag tu brjod/_/de la rten gyi gang zag ni gnyis te/_theg pa chen po'i
[\[298a.2\]]rigs can dang /_theg pa chung ngu'i rigs can no/_/gnas ni rnam pa gnyis te/_theg pa che chung gi bye brag gis so/_/de la theg pa chen po'i [#]gzhung gis ni dkon mchog gsum 'di lta bu yin te de kho na nyid kyi [#]dkon mchog gsum dang /_mngon par rtogs pa'i dkon mchog
[\[298a.3\]]gsum dang /_mdun du bzhugs pa'i dkon mchog gsum mo/_/de yang 'di ltar shes bya phyin ci ma log par mkhyen pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes/_chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
[\[298a.4\]]nyid dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa'i dus su chos thams cad nam mkha'i dkyil lta bur shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sa chen po la gnas pa dang /_yang 'di ltar gzugs kyi sku rnam pa gnyis dang bden pa bzhi dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang /_
[\[298a.5\]]sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i chos rgyud la gnas pa dang /_sbyor ba'i lam gyi [#]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_yang 'di ltar ri mor [#]bris pa dang /_'bur du btod [#]pa dang /_lugs ma dang /_lder so la sogs pa dang /_gsung rab yan lag dgu'i bdag nyid
[\[298a.6\]]po ti dang /_glegs bam la sogs pa dang /_tshogs kyi lam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'o/_/theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung ni/_gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro ba/_/sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos/_/mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang /_/mya ngan 'das la skyabs su
[\[298a.7\]]'gro/_/zhes bya ba yin no/_/de la bsam pa ni theg pa chen po pa'i ni sems can ma lus pa'i don du sems pa'o/_/gcig ni bdag 'ba' zhig gi don du sems pa'o/_/de la dus ni theg pa chen po pa'i ni byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du'o/_/gcig ni ji srid
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]'tsho'i bar du dam 'cha' ba'o/_/de la rang bzhin ni [#]ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan pa dang /_rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skyes pa'o/_/de la tshad ni khas [#]blangs pa dang /_skyabs byed pa dang /_rnam par rig byed skyed [#]pa'o/_/de la tshul ni skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga yin
[\[298b.2\]]te de ni bla ma la zhu bar bya'o/_/de la bslab pa ni thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/_bla ma'i zhal snga nas shes par 'gyur ro/_/de la nges pa'i tshig [#]ni 'bangs yin pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i jo bo mi tshol bas skyabs su song ba'o/_/de la las ni byang chub kyi sems kyi ljon shing skye
[\[298b.3\]]ba'i rtsa bar gyur pa dang /_thar pa'i grong khyer chen po'i sgor 'jug pa dang /_bsnyen gnas la sogs pa'i sdom pa thams cad kyi rten byed pa'o/_/de la dpe ni rgyal po'am blon po'i 'bangs dag de'i bka' las mi 'da' zhing ci nas kyang de mgu bar byed pa bzhin no/_/
[\[298b.4\]]de la dbye ba ni thun mong ba dang /_thun mong [#]ma yin pa'i bye brag go/_/de la nyes dmigs ni gnyis te/_skyabs nyams pa'am mi shes pa'o/_/spangs pa'am nyams pa ni 'di [#]skad du/_zla grags kyi zhal snga nas/_rten gyi dam pa blangs nas ni/_/slar yang dman la
[\[298b.5\]]brten gyur na/_/nyams bcas phyogs la gnas pas na/_/de ni dam pa'i bzhad gad 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs te mtshon pa tsam mo/_/de la dgos pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du/_'jigs pas skrag pa'i mi rnams ni/_/phal cher ri dang nags tshal dang /_/kun
[\[298b.6\]]dga' dang ni mchod gnas kyi/_/ljon shing rnams la skyabs su 'gro/_/skyabs de gtso bo ma yin zhing /_/skyabs de mchog gyur ma yin la/_/skyabs de la ni brten [#]nas su/_/sdug bsngal kun las mi grol zhing /_/gang tshe gang zhig sangs rgyas dang /_/chos dang dge 'dun
[\[298b.7\]]skyabs song na/_/sdug bsngal sdug bsngal kun 'byung dang /_/sdug bsngal yang dag 'das pa dang /_/'phags lam yan lag brgyad bde ba/_/mya ngan 'das par 'gro 'gyur dang /_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag_/shes rab kyis [#]ni lta byed pa/_/skyabs de gtso
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]bo yin pa ste/_/skyabs de mchog tu gyur pa yin/_/skyabs de la ni brten [#]nas kyang /_/sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/zhes gsungs so/_/skyabs su 'gro ba'i dgos pa ni de lta bu'o/_/de la phan yon ni gsum ste/_rgyu'i dus kyi phan yon dang /_
[\[299a.2\]]lam gyi dus kyi phan yon dang /_'bras bu'i dus kyi phan yon no/_/rgyu'i dus kyi la tshe 'di'i dang /_tshe rabs gzhan gyi'o/_/tshe 'di'i phan yon ni 'jigs pa chen po brgyad las thar bar byed pa dang /_bar chad med pa dang /_bstan pa la dga' ba'i lha dag bstang [#]grogs byed
[\[299a.3\]]pa dang /_'chi ba'i dus su yid dga' ba la sogs pa'o/_/tshe rabs gzhan gyi ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_ngan song gi sdug bsngal las 'dren par mdzad pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_mtho ris kyi [#]bde ba stsol ba'o/_/lam gyi [#]phan yon bden pa bzhi dang /_
[\[299a.4\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la sogs pa la sbyor bar [#]mdzad pa'o/_/'bras bu'i phan yon mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis dang /_sku gsum thob par byed pa'o/_/'di dag ni mdor bsdus pa yin la rgyas par gzhung dang bla ma
[\[299a.5\]]las shes par bya'o/_/skyabs su 'gro ba bstan pa zhes bya ba/_bla ma byang chub sems dpa' dI paM ka ra shrI dz+nyA nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ {D3954}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA yA na pa thA sA d+ha na [#]war+N+Na saM gra ha/_bod skad du/_theg pa chen po'i lam
[\[299a.6\]]gyi sgrub thabs yi ger bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam gyis mi khyab che ba mnga'/_/bla med byang chub thob 'dod na/_/byang chub bsgrub [#]la rag las pas/_/sgrub pa lhur blang snying por bya/_/dal 'byor
[\[299a.7\]]phun sum tshogs pa'i lus/_/shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed gyur cing /_/phyis kyang shin tu rnyed dka' bas/_/sgrub la 'bad pas don yod bya/_/sangs rgyas 'byung dang dge slong dang /_/mi lus rnyed dka' rnyed gyur cing /_/dge bshes phrad dka' phrad gyur nas/_/don med par
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]ni ma byed gsungs[#]/_/rlung gi nang gi mar me bzhin/_/tshe 'di gnas pa'i gdeng [#]med phyir/_/mgo'am lus la me 'bar bzhin/_/sgrub la myur du [#]brtson 'grus brtsam[#]/_/'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi[#]/_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang /_/sgrub pa'i mthu las byung rig
[\[299b.2\]]mdzad/_/sgrub pa gtsor mdzad blo ldan rnams/_/'di dang gzhan du bde ba la/_/mkhas pa su zhig the tshom za/_/de nyid phyir na blo ldan rnams/_/sgrub pa snying por [#]bya bar rig[ #]/'dod pa'i gzhi [#]la chags pa'i rgyus/_/sgrub pa'i spyod lam nyams pa'i mi/_/'jig rten 'das
[\[299b.3\]]dang 'jig rten gyi/_/phun sum tshogs pa thams cad las/_/shin tu ring ba kho nar 'gyur/_/'khor ba'i btson ra nyam nga ru/_/nyon mongs 'ching ba sna tshogs kyis/_/rab tu bsdams pas nyam thag cing /_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag med kyis/_/de nyid rgyud gdung mi
[\[299b.4\]]bder 'gyur/_/de nyid phyir yang blo ldan dang [#]/_/'dod pa'i gzhi la chags spangs te/_/chos sgrub gtso bor bya ba'i rigs/_/'dod la chags bral bya ba'i phyir/_/'dod pa'i nyes pa dpag med pa/_/gzhung las 'byung ba rtogs byas la/_/rtag tu tshul bzhin yid la bya/_/
[\[299b.5\]]mnog chung nyes pa che ba ni/_/btung ba dug can lta bur blta/_/chos min sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pas/_/rtsa ba'i [#]me bzhin shes par bya/_/'dod pa ngoms par mi byed cing /_/skom pa'i sred pa 'phel byed pa/_/lan tshwa'i chu 'thungs lta bu zhes/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i lung las 'byung /_/
[\[299b.6\]]'dod pa gnod pa mang ba ni/_/shing gi rtse mo'i shing tog dang /_/lam ka'i [#]shing gi shing tog 'dra/_/byis pa rnams ni lan mang du/_/'dod pa'i gzhi la chags pas phung [#]/_/'dod pa'i skyon du ma gyur pa/_/de ni 'ga' yang med rig bya/_/de yi las ni sdug bsngal bskyed/_/
[\[299b.7\]]thog ma med pa'i dus nas kyang /_/'dod la chags pas rtag tu 'khor/_/'dod pa'i chu bo'i shugs kyis ni/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lor 'khor byed cing /_/de yis [#]nyes pa grangs med skyed/_/'khor ba'i skyon ni mtha' yas kyis/_/sngon mtha' da ltar phyi mtha' ru/_/gdung
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]byas gdung byed gdung byed 'gyur/_/de don rtag tu bsgom bya zhing /_/btson ra lta bu'i 'khor ba la/_/btson ltar skyo ba goms par bya/_/ji ltar btson ni btson ra yi/_/sdug bsngal mang myong de dran pas/_/skyo sems rtag tu ngang gis 'byung /_/ji ltar btson
[\[300a.2\]]ni btson ra las/_/'bros pa'i glags ni byung ba'i tshe/_/ched ka gzhan dang mi snyoms par/_/de yi gnas nas 'bros pa ltar/_/'khor ba'i rgya mtsho che 'di las/_/rgal [#]ba'i glags dag byung gyur na/_/ched dka' gzhan dang mi snyoms [#]par/_/srid pa'i khyim nas [#]'byung bar bya/_/
[\[300a.3\]]bdag gzhan 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag_/mthar dbyung phyir yang blo ldan dag_/'dod pa me bzhin myur spangs te/_/chos sgrub gtsor bya mi rigs sam/_/sgrub par 'dod pa'i gang zag gis/_/sa ltar chos nyid gzhir gyur pas/_/dang po skyabs su legs 'gro zhing /_/de yi
[\[300a.4\]]bslab pa'i chos la bslab/_/rjes su dran drug rtag tu bsgom/_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas pa/_/sgrub pa pos ni dran byas la/_/de la dad pa brtan par bya/_/chos kun rtsa ba dad pa yin/_/rtswa rtse'i zil thigs lta bur ni/_/ring du mi gnas tshe 'di'i phyir/_/mkhas pas sdig
[\[300a.5\]]pa yong [#]mi spyod/_/de 'bras ngan 'gro'i sdug bsngal 'byung /_/dge bcu tshul khrims dag bya zhing /_/so sor thar pa'i sdom dag kyang /_/ci nus rim gyis dag par bsrung /_/de ni 'phags nor kun gyi rgyu/_/mang thos nor yin de ldan bya/_/tshul khrims nor nyams gyur pa bzhin/_/
[\[300a.6\]]mang thos nor las nyams pa'i mi/_/phyi phyir 'gyod par gdon mi za/_/rang la nga rgyal gzhom pa dang /_/chos smra ba la'ang gus par bya/_/theg chen chos sgor 'jug 'dod pas/_/mun sel gdung ba zhi byed pa/_/nyi zla lta bu'i byang chub sems/_/bskal par 'bad pas skye
[\[300a.7\]]yang rung /_/dang por de bskyed rab sbyangs pas/_/ri rab lta bur brtan par bya/_/de bskyed sbyong bar 'dod pa yis/_/byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po/_/'bad pas ring du bsgom byas pas/_/chags dang phrag dog spang bya zhing /_/yang dag cho ga byas pas skye/_/bag
[\[300b\]]
