[\[300b.1\]]yod chos las nyams pa'i mi/_/chos kun las ni nyams par 'gyur/_/chos de rnal 'byor nyid du bya/_/bu gcig pha ma bu bsrung [#]dang /_/zhar ba mig gcig mig bsrung dang /_/lam zhugs rnams kyi [#]ded dpon dang /_/sman shing chen po'i 'bras bu ltar/_/bag yod chos kyis [# ]
[\[300b.2\]]sems de bsrung /_/sems de byang chub rtsa bar gsungs/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi/_/dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad kyang /_/byang chub sems kyi mthu las byung /_/sems mchog de dang mi ldan pas/_/sbyin las shes rab bar dag gi_/spyod pa drug la slob byed kyang /_/
[\[300b.3\]]rten dang bral ba nyid kyi [#]phyir/_/pha rol phyin pa'i ming yang med/_/nyan thos bse ru drug po bzhin/_/bsod nams thams cad sdud pa yi/_/ting 'dzin sems de ma bskyed na/_/bsam gtan bzhi dang gzugs med bzhi/_/ting 'dzin lan mang thob 'gyur kyang /_/srid pa'i mtsho
[\[300b.4\]]las rgal mi nus/_/byang chub sems kyi bzhon [#]pa la/_/brten [#]nas 'chi ba rjes dran gyi/_/lcag [#]ni yang dang yang brdab cing /_/srid lam 'jigs pa che ba [#]yi/_/lam 'di myur du 'da' byas la/_/'jigs med sangs rgyas sar phyin bya/_/skyabs 'gro lhag pa'i tshul khrims
[\[300b.5\]]dang /_/smon pa'i gzhi la [#]gnas pa yis/_/sems pa'i sdom pa rab bzung zhing /_/pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa/_/sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la/_/ci nus rim gyis tshul bzhin spyad/_/'jug pa'i spyod pa gtsor ston pa'i/_/mdo sde blta zhing bstan bcos [#]mnyan/_/
[\[300b.6\]]chos kyis [#]mi ngoms mtsho 'dra'i mis/_/rin chen nor bu'i rgya mtsho bzhin/_/yon tan kun 'byung 'byung gnas gang /_/theg chen gzhung las bsngags pa yi/_/bshes [#]gnyen ring du tshul bzhin bsten/_/rgya mtsho chen por chu bo bzhin/_/de yi rten la yon tan 'du/_/sems dpa'i
[\[300b.7\]]spyod la de mkhas 'gyur/_/sems dpa' spyod pa che ba la/_/dad pa shin tu brten [#]par bya/_/bag yod dran dang shes bzhin dang /_/tshul bzhin yid la byed pa yis/_/kun nas nyon mongs dmigs pa la/_/rang sems yan pa phyir bzlog ste/_/sangs rgyas chos kyi dmigs pa la/_/
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]rtag tu gzhag pa nyid du bya/_/de ltar slob pa'i rgyal sras gang /_/de yi spyod las nyams mi 'gyur/_/dge ba'i bshes kyi [#]gdams pa bzhin/_/rtsom pa dag ni thams cad kun/_/theg chen gzhung dang bstun de tsam[#]/_/gros kyi phugs ni chos la gtad/_/chos
[\[301a.2\]]dang 'gal na gang yang spang [#]/_/chos dang mthun pa'i spyod pa spyad/_/blo ldan gang zhig rtsom pa kun/_/chos gtsor byed pa dpal ldan po/_/de la 'di dang gzhan du yang /_/bde bar 'gyur bar the tshom med/_/thos pa nyung dang 'khor spangs shing /_/bas mtha' dgon par
[\[301a.3\]]gnas par bya/_/zhi ba dang ni dul ba yi/_/sbyor ba de la brtson 'grus brtsam/_/khyim ni gang la'ang [#]mi blta zhing /_/gzhan skyon mi brtag rang skyon blta/_/gzhan gyi snying la mi 'bab pa'i/_/tshig [#]kyang mkhas pas ring du spang /_/'di dag dang ldan rgyal sras gang /_/phyi
[\[301a.4\]]mtha' dus su mi nyams par/_/bde bar thar zhes thub pas gsungs/_/gzhan brnyas khyad du gsod cing smod/_/de yis bdag nyid nyams par 'gyur/_/kun la ston pa'i 'du shes sbyang /_/chos sgor zhugs dang rgyal sras la/_/khyad par du yang blo de sbyang /_/rang [#]byung
[\[301a.5\]]'ching ba dam po gang /_/rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti [#]ste/_/de yis [#]gzhi la chags pa spang [#]/_/'ching ba de [#]las grol ba gang /_/me yi nang gi pad+ma bzhin/_/mkhas pa'i ngo mtshar gnas su 'gyur/_/rab tu byung ba'i sgrub pa pos/_/sangs rgyas chos kun 'byung ba'i rgyu/_/'phags
[\[301a.6\]]pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pas/_/'dod pa chung zhing chog shes bya[#]/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la/_/de yis bslab par thub pas gsungs/_/yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing /_/yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la/_/rgyab kyis phyogs te gnas par bya/_/rgyus med
[\[301a.7\]]yul du grong rgyu zhing /_/bya bzhin 'tsho ba 'phral btsal bya/_/rang sems sbyong ba lhur len pa/_/ngo mtshar thub pa'i mdo las gsungs/_/gdul dka' sems rgyud yin [#]btang nas/_/grags sogs 'jig rten chos kyi phyir/_/nyin mtshan gyi [#]ni dus kun du/_/rtsod pa slob
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]phyir rtsod pa sbyong /_/nyan bshad la sogs chos la 'jug_/tshe ni don med myur du 'da'/_/mchog gi lam las de nyams 'gyur/_/'chi bdag nye bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/'gyod pas de rgyud gdung bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten chos la mnyam sems bslab/_/de yis byis pa slu bar
[\[301b.2\]]byed/_/'jig rten gang gi blo la yang /_/bdag gi [#]ming yang mi gnas shing /_/bdag gi lus kyi rus pa'i rdul/_/shin tu phra ba'ang 'jig rten na/_/gnas par mi 'gyur de dus 'byung /_/de tshe rnyed dang bkur sti dang /_/grags sogs med 'jigs [#]smos ci dgos/_/de tshe bdag la
[\[301b.3\]]gang dben pa/_/blo dang ldan pas dpyad pa thob/_/las dang po yi gang zag gis/_/lus dben pa la ma brten par/_/sems dben rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir/_/'dre spangs nang du [#]gnas par bya/_/'dres pas 'dris shing chags par byed/_/de yis 'khor ba'i 'khor lo bskor/_/
[\[301b.4\]]de ltar 'dre ba spangs pa la/_/rtag tu bag dang ldan par bya/_/gnyid la dga' spangs chos kun phyir/_/der gnas de yis brtson 'grus brtsam/_/de yis chos kun rdzogs par byed/_/dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi bsgom zhing /_/phyin ci log bzhi rab tu spang [#]/_/smra la dga' yang [#]don
[\[301b.5\]]bsam bya/_/bu ram shing shun snying po ci yang med/_/dga' bar bya ba'i ro ni nang na 'dug_/shun pa zos pas mis ni bu ram ro/_/zhim po rnyed par nus pa ma yin no/_/shun pa de bzhin 'di la smra ba ste/_/ro lta bu ni 'di la don sems yin/_/de lta bas na mi rigs [#]smra spangs te/_/
[\[301b.6\]]rtag tu bag yod kyis la don soms [#]shig_/nam mkha'i mtha' klas sems can gyi[#]/_/ched du go bgos rig mdzod la/_/'ga' yi ched du sgrub pa yi/_/spyod pa dag la nyams mi bya/_/'khor dang rnyed pa bkur sti dang /_/grogs 'dod pa yi blos bskyed nas/_/smra la dga' ba'i
[\[301b.7\]]sems byung na/_/sgrub pa'i bar chad byed pa'i gdon/_/rang gi sems de yin rig [#]mdzod/_/mdza' bshes la sogs gang la yang /_/gces dgos mkho ba chung bar bya/_/mkho ba'i sgo nas nyams 'gyur zhing /_/chos la'ang bar chad mang du 'byung /_/las la dga' ba rab spangs te/_/
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]gdul dka'i sems gdul dge ba spyad/_/spros la dga' ba rab spangs te/_/bzod la des pas bdag nyid brgyan/_/bzod pa'i che ba dpag tu med/_/rnyed dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i/_/chos drug nyes pa mthong bar bya/_/sems dpa'i spyod pa grangs med
[\[302a.2\]]kyang /_/bsdu na thabs dang shes rab gnyis/_/thabs dang shes rab pha ma yis/_/sangs rgyas sras ni skyed par byed/_/bder [#]gshegs sras ni don gnyer bas/_/thabs dang shes rab pha ma yin[#]/_/sgrub pa 'di gnyis 'brel par bya/_/sgrub pa 'di gnyis bral gyur na/_/sangs
[\[302a.3\]]rgyas sras skyed mi nus te/_/skyes pa dang ni bud med dag_/gcig la gcig ni zla med bzhin/_/gang phyir ya bral 'ching ba [#]gsungs/_/chos kun rtsa bar rab bstan pa'i/_/'dun pa rtag tu bsgom bya zhing /_/zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du/_/sgrub blo rtag tu 'phel bar bya/_/stobs
[\[302a.4\]]dang ldan pa nyid du bya/_/sgrub pa'i blo ni 'phel 'gyur [#]na/_/rlan ldan ri rtse'i rtsa [#]shing bzhin/_/sgrub pa 'phel bar gdon mi za/_/sgrub blo [#]stobs dang ldan gyur na/_/spyod pa'i khur lci yun ring du/_/khur yang skyo [#]zhing ngal mi 'gyur/_/chos spyod rnam bcu la sogs pa'i/_/tshogs bsag [# ]
[\[302a.5\]]sgo ni thams cad nas/_/tshogs gnyis bsag [#]pa lhur blang bya/_/slob pa'i dus na che ba gang /_/de yi rten la chos kun skye[#]/_/sems can don la mthu ldan 'gyur/_/sku dang ye shes 'bras bu 'byung /_/thabs dang shes rab snying po gang /_/zhi gnas lhag mthong rnal 'byor bsgom/_/'jig
[\[302a.6\]]rten 'das dang 'jig rten gyi[#]/_/chos kun de gnyis 'bras bur gsungs/_/mngon shes mthu dang ldan bya dang /_/zag med lam ni bskyed pa'i phyir/_/dang po zhi gnas bskyed par bya/_/zhi gnas tshogs ni nyams pa yis/_/ring du 'bad kyang 'grub mi 'gyur/_/ting 'dzin tshogs la
[\[302a.7\]]legs par bslab/_/ting 'dzin gnod pa kun spangs te/_/mthun pa'i dmigs pa gang yin pa[#]/_/spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad ldan par/_/de don gnyer bas gtsub [#]shing ltar/_/chags pa'i rlan dang bral ba yis/_/rtag tu rgyun dang ldan par bsgom/_/nyon mongs g.yul las rgyal
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]bya'i phyir/_/zhi gnas la brten [#]lhag mthong bsgom/_/lhag mthong grub par gyur pa yis/_/mnyam gzhag langs pa'i dus dag tu/_/sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur ni/_/chos kun lta ba goms byas pas/_/rjes kyis rtogs pa sbyang ba dang /_/thabs la slob pa gtso bor bya/_/
[\[302b.2\]]mnyam par gzhag pa'i dus dag tu/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong cha mnyam zhing /_/de rgyun rtag tu goms par bya/_/de ltar [#]tshul bzhin bslabs [#]pa'i mthus/_/drod sogs nges 'byed bzhi thob [#]nas/_/sa bcu'i ye shes rim gyis skyed[#]/_/de yis myur du de 'tshang rgya/_/nor bu
[\[302b.3\]]bzhin du gzhan gyi don/_/lhun gyis grub par de byed 'gyur/_/shin tu bsdus na go mi 'gyur/_/shin tu spros na gzhung mangs [#]'gyur/_/blo dang ldan pas legs dpyad na/_/go ba'i tshad du bdag gis gdams/_/bdag gi bla ma yon tan mang mnga' rgya mtsho che dang mtshungs/_/'jig
[\[302b.4\]]rten chos la mi gzigs nyid gzhan don phyir sgrub pa snying por 'dzin/_/'jig rten ma rig gis long shes rab mig 'byed mthu mnga' du ma yis/_/gdams pa'i don dang gtsug lag bstan bcos las bshad bslab dgos zhes/_/gzhan la phan pa 'byung srid bsam pas
[\[302b.5\]]yi ger gnas par byas/_/dad dang shes rab nor ldan sgrub pa snying por byed 'dod gang /_/theg pa lam gyi sgrub thabs yang dag yi ger bsdus 'di la/_/gal te mos pa yod srid 'di bzhin byas te rang gzhan don du 'gyur/_/theg pa chen po'i lam gyi sgrub thabs yi ger bsdus
[\[302b.6\]]pa/_slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3955}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA yA na pa
[\[302b.7\]]thA [#]sA d+ha na saM gra ha/_bod skad du/_theg pa chen po lam gyi sgrub thabs shin tu bsdus pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das dang da ltar bde gshegs kun/_/skyed pa'i yab dang yum gyur pa/_/sgrub pa'i chos la rab gus shing /_/ngag
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]yid dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/_/bsam gyis mi khyab che ba mnga'/_/bla ma byang chub thob 'dod na/_/byang chub bsgrub [#]la rag las pas/_/sgrub pa lhur blang snying por bya/_/de yis gsum la skyabs 'gro zhing /_/mi dge kun las ldog pa yis[#]/_/lhag pa'i tshul
[\[303a.2\]]khrims dag par bsrung /_/byang chub sems kyi bzhon pa la/_/brten nas 'chi ba rjes dran gyi[#]/_/lcag ni yang dang yang brdab cing /_/srid lam 'jigs [#]pa che sa yi/_/lam 'di myur du 'das byas la/_/'jigs med sangs rgyas sar phyin bya/_/smon pa'i gzhi la gnas pa
[\[303a.3\]]yis/_/sems dpa'i [#]sdom pa rab bzung [#]zhing /_/pha rol phyin drug la sogs pa/_/sems dpa'i [#]spyod pa tshul bzhin spyad[#]/_/de bsdus thabs dang shes rab la/_/mi gnas mya ngan 'das phyir bslab/_/de yi snying po rnam pa gnyis/_/me don gnyer bas gtsub [#]shing ltar/_/
[\[303a.4\]]chags pa'i ldan [#]dang bral ba yis/_/rtag tu rgyun [#]ldan gus par bsgom[#]/_/de yis myur du de 'tshang rgya/_/nor bu bzhin du gzhan gyi don/_/lhun gyis grub par de byed 'gyur/_/theg chen sgrub thabs bsdus 'di la/_/skal ldan rnams kyis legs par bslab/_/snying la
[\[303a.5\]]bdud rtsi'i thigs pa chags/_/blo ma sbyangs pas blos reg dka'/_/'di bsdus dge bas 'gro ba kun/_/theg chen sgrub pa lhur len shog_/bdag kyang sangs rgyas sa thob nas/_/'gro ba'i 'dren pa byed par shog_/theg pa chen po lam gyi sgrub thabs shin tu bsdus pa/_slob
[\[303a.6\]]dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3956}]@/_/rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa bzhugs/_/[#]
[\[303a.7\]]@##/_/rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor ba thog ma med pa nas[#]/_/nyon mongs bag chags tshad med pas/_/yul ngan rkyen dang phrad pa las/_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]skye ba'i tshe/_/rang gi dran pa'i phyir du 'di/_/byas pas de tshe dran par shog_/nang gi sems ni dul gyur na/_/phyi yi dgra 'dis gnod mi nus/_/rang gi nang sems g.yo ba na/_/phyi yi dgra 'dis rkyen byas nas[#]/_/nang gi dgra 'dis rang rgyud bsreg_/des na nang gi dgra 'di gzhom/_/dug
[\[303b.2\]]can snod kyis zas brlag bzhin/_/nang gi dri mas dge tshogs brlag_/gnyen po chu yis khrus byas nas/_/dag pas bde ba chen po 'thob/_/gang na gnas tshe gang gi tshe/_/gang gi dri ma ldang ba dang /_/nang gi dgra 'di 'byung ba'i tshe/_/thabs ni sna tshogs gsungs pas
[\[303b.3\]]spang [#]/_/dgra gzhom dri ma bkru ba'i phyir/_/de tshe 'bad pa chen po bya/_/gang gis rang gi [#]rgyud 'di la/_/nang du bltas te rang sems brtag_/de tshe yul la shes pa skye/_/shes pa skye ba'i yul rnams [#]gsum/_/nyon mongs bar ma dge ba skye/_/rgyu rkyen yul gyi bye brag
[\[303b.4\]]gis/_/nyon mongs skye ba dag la gsum/_/chen po 'bring dang chung ngu'o/_/gnyen po'i rim pa'ang de bzhin te/_/chen po skye ba'i yul de la/_/brten te tshogs chen 'bad pas skye/_/'bring gi [#]yul la 'bring yin te/_/chung ngu la ni chung ngu'o/_/chen po kun la skyes na
[\[303b.5\]]mchog_/bar ma lung ma bstan pa yang /_/dran pas zin pa'i sems de yis/_/kun slong rjes kyis dge bar bsgyur/_/thabs sgo sna tshogs pa yis so/_/dge ba che 'bring chung ngu dag_/ngang gis skyes pa'i yul de la/_/sbyor ba dngos dang rjes dag las/_/khyad 'phags
[\[303b.6\]]bsod nams kun bsngo bya/_/shes na gang la'ang tshogs 'phel 'gyur/_/thog med dus nas ji srid du/_/bdag ni dug gsum zhen pas 'khor/_/ji [#]srid skye shi [#]kha brgyud pas/_/de srid las rnams chud re zos/_/ji srid dge sems 'phel 'gyur ba/_/de srid sangs
[\[303b.7\]]rgyas mngon sangs rgyas/_/bdag ni gti mug mun pas bsgribs/_/mun nag glog 'gyu snang ba tsam/_/ci zhig ltar stes dran rnyed tshe/_/de tshe 'bad pas bsgrub par bya/_/'chi bar nges pa [#]cha yod cing /_/gnas pa'i dbang ster med mod kyi/_/bdag ni re zhig mi 'chi snyam/_
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]dran pa btang ste byang chub bsgrub[#]/_/gzhan dag la yang sgrub par gyis/_/dper na byis pa rig [#]med pas/_/me dang g.yang sogs 'jigs pa med/_/de bzhin 'gro ba gti mug rnams/_/ngan song dag la'ang [#]'jigs pa med/_/dper na zas mchog ro dang ldan/_/
[\[304a.2\]]nad pa dag la byin pa'i tshe/_/zas la smod cing mi 'dod bzhin/_/thabs kyi bye brag 'di dag kyang /_/rmongs pa nyon mongs ldan pa la/_/bstan kyang de 'dra nyid du'o/_/dper na bza' la dga' ba'i mi/_/zos brlag bsags phan cha yod kyang /_/'dod pas mi tshugs za ba bzhin/_/
[\[304a.3\]]snga phyi rgyu 'bras cha yod kyang /_/nyon mongs zhen pa stobs cha yod/_/dge med sdig pa sna tshogs spyod/_/dper na kha bya mkhan dag gis/_/kha la bya dgos kun bsgrub zer/_/gzhan gyi dran pa bskyed pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin dge ba bya dgos zer/_/kha cig kha la gleng byed cing /_/zhe la don
[\[304a.4\]]du sgrub [#]mi byed/_/kha cig 'bras bu don chen po/_/btang nas bya ba chung ngu sgrub/_/de yang byis pa'i spyod pa can/_/kha cig bsam pa rlung bzhin g.yo/_/rung dang mi rung gnyis ka byed/_/kha cig kha dog dkar po bzhin/_/rkyen gang ldan pa de ltar 'gyur/_/kha cig rang nyid ngang gis
[\[304a.5\]]dge/_grogs kyis rbad pas nyon mongs skyed[#]/_/kha cig rkyen med rgyu dang ldan/_/dam pa'i grogs kyis zin pa na/_/sdig spong dge byed de la bskul/_/kha cig dge la bskul mi dgos/_/rang gi bya ba'i rim pa bskul ba dang bcas pa yi ger bris pa/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen
[\[304a.6\]]po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3957}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sU trA r+tha sa muts+tsha yo [#]ba de sha/_
[\[304a.7\]]bod skad du/_mdo'i sde'i don kun las btus pa'i man ngag_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgya mtsho nam mkha' ltar zab rgya che ba/_/mdo sde'i sde snod ma mo kun bltas shing /_/dpal ldan bla ma'i zhal nas byung ba yi/_/rnyed par dka' ba'i don rnams bri bar
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]bya/_/'dir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi [#]nor lta bu'i chos ni lnga bcu ste/_srog lta bu la sogs pa'o/_/de rnams cung zad bshad par bya ste/_ji skad du/_srog ni tshe yin drod dang ni/_/rnam shes rten nyid yin pa'o/_/zhes so/_/de ltar sems can rnams [#]la srog gces shing
[\[304b.2\]]srog la brten pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la yang srog lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems gces shing de la brten pa'o/_/pha ma lta bu'i chos ni stong pa nyid dang /_snying rje yin te/_des ma bskyed [#]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/byan [#]mo lta bu ni 'chi ba
[\[304b.3\]]dang /_bslab [#]pa dang /_las kyis [#]bsags pa bgrang ba rnams te/_nyin mtshan lan gsum du 'grogs dgos pa'o/_/khang pa lta bu ni dge ba bcu po yin te/_'di ni khang pa nyid de ngan 'gro dag gi sgo gcod pa'i phyir/_nor lta bu ni 'phags pa'i nor bdun dang /_'dod pa
[\[304b.4\]]chung ba dang /_chog shes pa'o/_/grogs po lta bu ni sbyor ba khams gsum na byed kyang bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_sbyin pa rgya chen po gtong yang rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med par shes kyang las kyi rnam par smin pa mi 'dor ba dang /_
[\[304b.5\]]chos thams cad bdag med par shes kyang sems can la snying rje bskyed pa'o/_/rtsa ba lta bu ni dad pa dang /_thos pa dang /_gtong ba dang /_bzod pa'o/_/zhing lta bu ni tshul khrims so/_/nye du lta bu ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o/_/slob dpon lta bu ni rjes su dran pa drug go/_/mkhan
[\[304b.6\]]po lta bu ni 'phags pa 'od srungs kyis zhus pa'i mdo'i byang chub kyi sems mi brjed par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o/_/tshong dpon lta bu ni bslab pa kun las btus kyi [#]gnod pa bcu bzhi'i gnyen po rnams so/_/sring mo lta bu ni tshad med pa bzhi'o/_/bran lta bu ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'o/_/
[\[304b.7\]]'bangs lta bu ni khyi dang bran dang gdol pa lta bur nga rgyal bcag pa'o/_/mig lta bu ni bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'o/_/ma ma lta bu ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin no/_/rgyal po lta bu ni dkon mchog gsum yin no/_/chu lud lta bu ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]pa yin no/_/lam mkhan lta bu ni dran pa dang /_shes bzhin dang /_tshul bzhin sems pa dang /_bag yod pa dang /_phyin ci log bzhi'i gnyen po bsten pa'o/_/pags [#]pa lta bu ni sems can mi gtong zhing rjes su 'dzin pa'o/_/rgyan lta bu ni dad pa dang /_
[\[305a.2\]]tshul khrims dang /_gtong ba dang /_thas [#]pa dang /_shes rab po/_/nad dang zug rngu lta bu ni phyi nang gi dngos po la zhen pa'i sems so/_/skyes bu mnar sems can lta bu ni khyim pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du bdag nam zhig na tshangs par spyod par 'gyur zhig gu zhes pa dang /_
[\[305a.3\]]rab tu byung ba 'di [#]snyam du nam zhig na bdag gis [#]'gro ba rnams sdug bsngal las thar bar nus zhes pa'o/_/le lo can lta bu ni khyim pas zhing la sogs pa ma spangs pa'o/_/rab tu byung [#]bas tshul 'chos la sogs pa ma spangs pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi [#]phung po'i mdo las/_
[\[305a.4\]]dge slong dag rab tu byung bas glang po che 'thab pa la bltas na yang log pa'i 'tsho ba yin no zhes gsungs so/_/gshis [#]bzang po lta bu ni tshul bzhin sems pa dang ldan pa'o/_/dig pa lta bu ni gzhan gyi [#]nyes pa dang 'khrul pa mi brjod pa dang /_rang gi yon tan mi brjod pa dang /_
[\[305a.5\]]gzhan la mi smod pa'o/_/long ba lta bu ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la mi blta ba'o/_/rkun ma zin pa lta bu ni dam pa'i chos 'jig [#]pa na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'o/_/byis pa lta bu ni bka' blo bde ba dang /_nga lo yang ba dang /_'grogs na bde ba dang /_mgu sla ba dang /_gso sla ba
[\[305a.6\]]dang /_dgang sla ba dang /_chog shes pa'o/_/pho nya lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' don mang ba dang /_bya ba mang ba dang snying las che ba'o/_/blon po lta bu ni dam bca' brtan pa'o/_/mdzangs [#]pa lta bu ni sems can dang zhe [#]'gras pa med pa dang bcos su btub pa'o/_/slob ma lta bu ni nyin
[\[305a.7\]]lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du bla ma la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs bsag [#]pa dang /_sdom pa gso ba'o/_/bsu skyel ba lta bu ni sems can thams cad sangs rgyas par byas nas gdod bdag nyid 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'o/_/long khrid [#]lta bu ni bdag
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]sangs rgyas par byas nas gdod gzhan gyi don byed pa'o/_/bskal pa dang po'i mi lta bu ni spyod lam dang /_tshul khrims dang /_'tsho ba dang /_cho ga dang /_lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'o/_/skyes bu 'dod pa can lta bu ni spyod lam thams cad gzhan la bsngo ba ste/_'phags pa dkon mchog sprin
[\[305b.2\]]las 'byung ba lta bu'o/_/mun pa lta bu ni dbu ma chen po'i don la rtag tu gnas pa'o/_/gshed ma lta bu ni log par lta ba skyes pa de [#]spang bar bya'o/_/chom rkun lta bu ni bag med pa dang /_ma gus pa ste spang bar bya'o/_/dgra lta bu ni ngo tsha med pa dang bag med pa'o/_/glen pa lta
[\[305b.3\]]bu ni dran pa dang shes bzhin med pa'o/_/ra ro ba lta bu ni nag por gyur pa bzhi'o/_/byol song lta bu ni bslab pa'i tshul rnams mi shes pa'o/_/shan pa lta bu ni snying rje dang bral ba'i spyod lam can no/_/byas pa la drin du mi gzo ba lta bu ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa bzhag pa'o/_/
[\[305b.4\]]dwa phrug lta bu ni thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba'o/_/smon [#]pa lta bu ni bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa mi shes pa'o/_/bdud kyis brlams pa lta bu ni bar du gcod pa'i chos lnga bcu rtsa lnga dang /_sum cu rtsa gnyis mi shes pa'o/_/lnga bcu rtsa lnga po yang gang zhe na/_'phags pa byang chub
[\[305b.5\]]sems dpa'i sde snod las byung [#]ba lta bu ste 'di ltar bar du gcod pa'i chos ni gcig ste bag med pa'o/_/bar du gcod pa'i chos ni gnyis te/_ngo tsha med pa dang /_khrel med pa'o/_/gsum ste 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug go/_/bzhi ste/_dam pa ma yin pa'i
[\[305b.6\]]'gro ba bzhi'o/_/lnga ste/_srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_chang 'thung ba'o/_/drug ste/_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun dang /_tshul khrims dang /_slob dpon dang /_rgan pa rnams la ma
[\[305b.7\]]gus pa'o/_/bdun te/_nga rgyal rnam pa bdun no/_/brgyad de log pa brgyad do/_/dgu ste/_kun nas mnar sems kyi [#]dngos po rnam pa dgu'o/_/bcu ste/_mi dge ba bcu'o zhes 'byung ngo [#]/_/bar du gcod pa'i chos sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang /_'phags pa theg pa chen po'i man ngag gi mdo
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]las 'byung ba lta bu ste/_ji skad du/_bu mo theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'i chos ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_bar du gcod pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen par myur du nges par mi 'byung ngo /_/sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang rang
[\[306a.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /_brgya byin dang tshangs pa 'dod pa dang /_skye ba la gnas te tshangs par spyod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig la chags pa dang /_longs spyod bdog pa rnams la [#]ser sna byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la mnyam par mi sbyin pa dang /_tshul
[\[306a.3\]]khrims la lhod pa dang /_gzhan gyi [#]sems mi bsrung [#]ba dang /_gnod sems dang /_khong khro ba'i bag la nyal byed pa dang /_des sems zhum pa dang /_brjed ngas pa dang /_thos pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /_dpyod pa med pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa'i spyod pa
[\[306a.4\]]dang /_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal 'phel ba dang /_lus dang ngag dang sems kyi las yongs su ma dag pa dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su mi bsrung ba dang /_slob dpon chos 'chab pa dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams 'dor ba dang /_yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba'i
[\[306a.5\]]chos gtong ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa dang /_byang chub tu yongs su mi bsngo ba ste phung po gsum dang mi mthun pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngus [#]rlom sems su byed pa dang /_thabs med par lhung ba'i blo dang /_phyir zhing dkon mchog gi bsngags pa mi smra ba
[\[306a.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par sems pa dang /_ma thos pa'i chos spong ba dang /_bdud kyi las khong du mi chud pa dang /_'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mi byed pa dang /_'khor bas [#]yongs su mi skyo ba ste/_
[\[306a.7\]]bu mo sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'i yang dag pa'i phul yin te/_bar du gcod pa de dag gis [#]thams cad mkhyen par nges par mi 'byung ngo /_/de lta mod kyi 'on kyang bu mo theg pa chen po'i [#]yon tan ji tsam pa de tsam du bar du gcod [#]pa yang de
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]tsam mo zhes gsungs so/_/gzhan yang bar du gcod pa'i chos dpag tu med pa dag mdo sde du mar mthong mod kyi/_'dir gzhung mangs par 'gyur bas ma bkod de/_lam 'di la ched cher byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas mdo de dang der blta [#]bar bya zhing nyams su blang pa [# ]
[\[306b.2\]]la brtson par bya'o/_/gtam du bya ba gzhan yang mang du yod de/_rtsub cing drag la yun ring [#]sdug bsngal bzod dka' bzod par byed pa [#]ngo mtshar che/_/chu bo bzhis g.yengs yang dang yang du keng rus bzhon pa zhon pa de yang ngo mtshar che/_/chung ma khyim spangs brtul zhugs bzang [# ]
[\[306b.3\]]blangs rtag tu lus ngag yid g.yengs 'di yang ngo mtshar che/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu tsam yang med par de nyid don gyi [#]sangs rgyas ye shes rtsad gcod tshol ba 'di yang ngo mtshar che/_/so sor thar pa'i bslab pa med par theg chen byang chub mchog gnyis rtsad gcod tshol ba 'di yang
[\[306b.4\]]ngo mtshar che/_/de la sogs pa ngo mtshar che ba mang du yod mod kyi/_/'dzam gling skye bo'i rtog dang spyod [#]pa smra bar ga la nus/_/de bas thar 'dod mkhas pa khyed cag smyon pa de dag dang /_/lhan cig 'dre bar ma byed bag yod gnas par gyis/_/'di ltar de dag snying rje'i yul du ma byas [# ]
[\[306b.5\]]ma gtogs par/_/lam mchog bshad kyang de la 'jug par mi 'gyur bdag gis [#]ji ltar bya/_/ji srid mngon par shes pa ma thob bar du gzhan dag smin par mi nus bse rur gnas par bya/_/bla ma bzang po btsal bya rtag tu mdo sde dag la blta bar bya/_/mdo sde'i don kun las btus pa'i
[\[306b.6\]]man ngag_/slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis [#]mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[ {D3958}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_da shA ku sha [# ]
[\[306b.7\]]la karma pa thA[#]/_bod skad du/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig bde 'gro thob par 'dod pas spang bar [#]bya ba'i mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rang bzhin gyis [#]kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa 'di lta ste/_lus kyi las ni rnam gsum
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum po dang /_/'di bcu mi dge ba ru gsungs/_/'di rnams rab tu phye nas bshad par bya ste/_de la re zhig lus kyi [#]ni srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par [#]len pa dang /_'dod pas log par spyod pa'o/_/ngag gi ni brdzun [# ]
[\[307a.2\]]du smra ba dang /_phra ma dang /_ngag rtsub po dang /_tshig 'khyal pa'o/_/yid kyi ni brnab [#]sems dang /_gnod sems dang /_log par lta ba'o/_/de la srog gcod pa ni srog chags su gyur pa dang /_srog chags su 'du shes par gyur pa [#]dang /_gsod pa'i sems nye bar gnas
[\[307a.3\]]par gyur pa dang /_de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang /_srog 'gags [#]par gyur pa ste/_yan lag lnga po de dag dang ldan na srog gcod pa yin no/_/de la ma byin par len pa gang zhe na/_gzhan gyir gyur pa dang /_pha rol gyis yongs su bzung bar yang 'du shes pa dang /_rku ba'i sems kyang
[\[307a.4\]]nye bar gnas par gyur pa dang /_de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang /_gnas nas bskyod pa ste yan lag lnga po de dag dang ldan na ma byin par len par 'gyur ro/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa ni [#]rnam pa bzhi ste/_yul ma yin pa dang /_dus ma yin pa dang /_yan lag ma yin pa dang /_'gro bar [#]bya ba ma
[\[307a.5\]]yin pa'o/_/de la yul ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dam pa'i chos dang /_sku gzugs la sogs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i gnas dang /_slob dpon dang /_mkhan po dang /_sbyin gnas dang /_pha ma la sogs pa dang /_bla ma dang nye bar gyur pa'o/_/dus ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni nyin par dang /_
[\[307a.6\]]zla mtshan dang ldan pa dang /_sbrum ma dang /_bu chung 'tsho ba dang /_mi 'dod pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde bas nye bar gdungs pa dang /_bsnyen [#]gnas yan lag brgyad la gnas pa'o/_/yan lag ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni kha dang bshang ba'i lam dang /_khye'u dang bu mo'i mdun dang
[\[307a.7\]]rgyab kyi bug pa dang rang gi lag pa'o/_/'gro bar [#]bya ba ma yin pa ni/_gzhan gyi bud med thams cad dang /_chos dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_rigs kyis [#]bsrungs pa dang /_rgyal pos bsrungs pa dang /_gzhan gyis blangs pa'i smad 'tshong ma dang /_gnyen 'brel can dang /_byol song ngo /_/de ltar rang
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]gi chung ma la brten nas 'dod pas log par g.yem par 'gyur ro/_/de la brdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba ni dngos por yang ma gyur pa dang /_dngos po'i gnas skabs las nyams par gyur pa dang /_log par 'du shes par gyur pa dang /_log pa'i thabs kyang nye bar gnas par gyur pa
[\[307b.2\]]dang /_de'i thabs kyang byed pa dang /_brdzun [#]gyi tshig kyang smras pa ste/_yan lag lnga po 'di dag dang ldan na brdzun [#]du smra bar 'gyur ro/_/phra ma zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i sems kyis gzhan 'byed pa'i tshig go/_/tshig rtsub po zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi gnad la phog pa'i sdang tshig go/_/
[\[307b.3\]]tshig 'khyal pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa dang nye bar ldan pas sam/_chags pa dang nye bar ldan pas smra bar bya ba ma yin pa smra ba'o/_/brnab sems zhes bya ba ni pha rol gyi rdzas dang /_dbang phyug dang longs spyod rnams la chags pa'i sems mi bzad pa'o/_/gnod sems zhes bya
[\[307b.4\]]ba ni sems can la rnam par sdang ba dang /_sems can 'di dag gsad do/_/bcing ngo /_/brdeg go/_/btag [#]go zhes sems pa'o/_/log par lta ba zhes bya ba ni [#]sbyin pa med/_sbyin sreg med/_'jig rten 'di med/_'jig rten pha rol med/_dge sbyong med/_bram ze med/_lha med/_
[\[307b.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das med/_dgra bcom pa med/_rang sangs rgyas med/_legs par spyad pa med/_nyes par spyad pa med/_legs par byas pa dang nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa med ces pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[307b.6\]]'phags pa dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa zhes bya ba dang /_theg pa chen po'i mdo las 'byung ba/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di ni dmyal ba chen po'i rgyu [#]yin te/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsten pas sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/mi dge ba bcu'i
[\[307b.7\]]las kyi lam bstan pa/_slob dpon chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]{D3959}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_karma bi b+haM ga [#]nA ma/_bod skad du/_las rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ding sang dus kyi skye bo 'di dag gis/_/mtho ris bde ba dag kyang thob dka' na/_/mya ngan 'das la re ba yod min pas/_/bdag nyid kho na dran
[\[308a.2\]]phyir bri bar bya/_/yod med rtag chad dang bral ba/_/bde ba'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs/_/'gro rnams yongs su smin mdzad pa/_/dam pa'i skyes mchog de la 'dud/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chen po las kyang phul du [#]byung zhing khyad par du 'phags
[\[308a.3\]]pa de la phyag 'tshal nas/_ji ltar bya zhe na/_las dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam par dbye bar bya ste/_mngon par mtho ba mtho ris lha dang mi/_/thob par byed pa sdom pa'i tshul khrims yin/_/de nyams gyur pas ngan song 'gro ba ni/_/dmyal ba yi dgas byol song 'di dag go/_/lha dang mi'i gtam
[\[308a.4\]]rgyas pa 'di ni 'jig rten gzhag pa dang /_'jig rten gdags pa dang /_bye brag tu bshad pa chen po'i nang nas che long du btus pa mdzod kyi gnas gsum pa la sogs par blta bar bya'o/_/'di ltar tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i 'og na dpag tshad khri phrag
[\[308a.5\]]gnyis na sems can dmyal ba chen po gnas so/_/gzhan bdun ni de'i steng na rim pa bzhin du gnas so/_/de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyi rim pa ni mi rnams kyi lo'i rim pa rnams la/_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang /_yang sos la sogs pa dmyal ba rnams kyi nyin zhag dang zla ba dang lo'i
[\[308a.6\]]rim pa rnams bsgres nas shes par bya ste/_'di ltar mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu la sogs pa las bsgyur nas shes par bya'o zhes bshad pas so/_/grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba yang ni ti se'i 'og na snga ma de dag gi thad ka na gnas pa ste/_de dag gi tshe'i tshad kyang yul dbus kyi bres
[\[308a.7\]]bcal ba'i til khal brgyad cus byur bur bkang ba'i nang nas/_skyes bu zhig gis lo brgya brgya na til re re phyung bas zad par gyur pa na sems can dmyal ba chu bur can gyi tshe zad pa yin te/_'og ma rnams kyi tshe ni nyi shur bsgyur ro/_/'di dag gi don yang cung zad tsam zhig mdo las bshad pa
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]bri bar bya'o/_/de ltar de dag dmyal ba ni/_/bcu drug ces bya rgal bar dka'/_/drag po'i las kyis [#]kun du gang /_/re re la yang lhag bcu drug_/rtsig pa bzhi dang ngos bzhi ste/_/rnam phye ris su chad pa yin/_/lcags kyi ra bas kun nas bskor/_/lcags dag gis ni gang ba
[\[308b.2\]]yin/_/dpag tshad brgya phrag du mar ni/_/me lce dag gis [#]khyab par gnas/_/zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/_/mdzod las kyang /_de dag gi [#]ni ngos bzhin/_/me mar mur dang ro myags dang /_/spu gri lam sogs chu bo yin/_/zhes bshad do/_/sngon gyi mkhas pa chen po
[\[308b.3\]]kha cig na re tsha ba la sogs pa bdun po de dag ni mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba'i g.yas ngos dang g.yon ngos na gnas so zhes zer ro/_/nyi tshe ba dang nye 'khor ba'i sems can dmyal ba dag la ni gnas kyi nges pa med de/_chu bo dang ri dang mya ngam [#]la sogs pa'i thang dang steng
[\[308b.4\]]na gnas so/_/gtam rgyas par ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_'jig rten gzhag pa dang /_'jig rten gdags pa la sogs par blta'o/_/yi dgas kyi rtsa ba'i gnas ni rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i 'og dpag tshad lnga brgya na yod de/_de na yi dgas kyi rgyal po gshin rje
[\[308b.5\]]gnas so/_/gzhan ni de las 'phros pa yin no/_/gtam rgyas par ni yi dgas kyi rtogs pa brjod par blta bar bya'o/_/byol song gi rtsa ba'i gnas ni rgya mtsho chen po yin no/_/thang dang /_chu dang /_ri dang /_dur khrod la sogs pa na ni de las 'phros pa yin te/_rgyas par ni de dang de dag tu
[\[308b.6\]]blta bar bya'o/_/gnas gsum po na bde ba med/_/sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa'i gtam/_/mdo dang bstan bcos dag na gsal/_/blo dang ldan pas blta bar gyis/_/dmyal ba dang /_yi dgas dang /_byol song gi sdug bsngal rgyu dang bcas pa mdo dang bstan bcos dag na gsal lo/_/mi'i
[\[308b.7\]]sdug bsngal brgya rtsa bcu dag ni 'phags pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i yo ga tsAR+yar [#]blta bar bya'o/_/lha dag la ni sdug bsngal gzhan ni med kyi 'on kyang 'chi ltas lnga dang nye ba'i 'chi ltas lnga 'byung ste/_'di ltar gos dri ma 'chags pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba rnyings [#]pa dang /_mchan khung
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]nas rdul 'byung ba dang /_lus la dri ma 'byung ba dang rang gi stan la mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/nye ba'i ltas lnga ni gos dang rgyan dag las yid du mi 'ong ba'i sgra 'byung ba dang /_lus kyi 'od chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_khrus byas pa'i chu'i thigs pa lus la 'chags
[\[309a.2\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_g.yo ba'i bdag nyid can yang blo yul gcig la 'chags par 'gyur ba dang /_mig 'byed pa dang 'dzums [#]pa srid par 'gyur ba dag ste/_nye ba lnga ni ma nges pa'o/_/sdug bsngal de dag ci las byung zhe na/_las ni lci dang yang ba dag[ # ]/yul dang bsam pa'i dbye ba
[\[309a.3\]]yis/_/nyan thos theg pa chen po'i lugs/_/rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya/_/lci ba ni gnyis te/_yul gyis lci ba dang /_bsam pas lci ba'o/_/yang ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de yang nyan thos dang theg pa chen po'i lugs kyis [#]lci ba dang yang ba so sor tha dad par shes par bya'o/_/de la
[\[309a.4\]]nyan thos kyi yul gyis lci ba ni 'di ltar mtshams med pa lnga las pha bsad pa ma gtogs pa bzhi'o/_/de las kyang dge 'dun gyi 'khor lo'i dbyen lci ba'o/_/gzhan yang byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_srid pa'i rtse mo'i ting nge
[\[309a.5\]]'dzin las langs pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_pha dang ma dang /_srid pa tha ma'i [#]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nad pa dang /_chos smra ba [#]dang /_nges pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa dang /_lan cig
[\[309a.6\]]phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba dang /_dgra bcom pa dag gsod pa dang /_de dag [#]la rdeg pa dang /_lcags sgrog [#]la sogs pas sdom pa dang /_de dag gi yo byad rku ba dang /_mchod rten gyi dang /_dge 'dun gyi dang /_chos kyi dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yo byad rku ba dang /_gang zag snga ma de dag dang /_
[\[309a.7\]]dkon mchog gsum la brdzun [#]smra ba dang /_tshig rtsub po dang /_de dag phan tshun 'byed pa dang /_tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa smra ba ni yul gyis lci ba'o/_/bsam pas lci ba ni log par lta ba chen po [#]skyes pa dang yid kyis [#]nyes pa chen po'o/_/yul gyis yang ba ni byol song dang /_dur
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]khrod kyi sha za gsod pa la sogs pa'o/_/bsam pas yang ba ni de las gzhan pa rnams so/_/de la theg pa chen po'i yul gyis lci ba ni 'di ltar bla ma rnams dang /_sems dang po bskyed pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_pha dang ma dang de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor pa dang /_
[\[309b.2\]]rang gi lha dang /_dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa la snga ma'i tshul rnams bzhin du byed pa'o/_/don 'di nyid la dgongs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gtsug tor [#]zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las 'di skad du/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyes par spyod pa de dag ni lci bar
[\[309b.3\]]gyur pa dang /_tha mal par gyur pa'o/_/de la pha mar gyur pa la sogs pa gsod pa dang /_rdeg pa ni lus kyi [#]nyes par spyod pa lci ba'o/_/srog gcod pa la sogs pa gzhan gsum ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa tha mal pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_lha rnams la tshig rtsub ngo smra
[\[309b.4\]]ba dang /_pha ma dang /_bla mar gyur pa la sogs pa la tshig ngan pa smra ba ni dag gi nyes par spyod pa lci ba'o/_/skyes bu 'ga' zhig dad pas dge ba nyams su len cing rtsom pa'i gtam gyi skabs [#]su 'jig rten pha rol med do zhes bya ba'i tshig 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brdzun du [#]smra
[\[309b.5\]]ba ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa lci ba'o/_/dge ba'i bar chad byed pa'i tshig 'khyal pa smra ba dang /_lkog 'phyas [#]byed pa dang /_mi dge ba'i las kyi gtam rnams ni ngag gi nyes par spyod pa tha mal pa'o/_/yid kyi nyes par spyod pa ni gsum ste/_de nyid las sems kyi nyes pa dang /_
[\[309b.6\]]sems las byung ba'i nyes pa dang /_ma rig pa'i nyes pa'o/_/de dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de nyid la ma chags pa nyid ni sems kyi nyes par spyod pa'o/_/dregs pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_khro ba dang /_sems can rnam par 'jig pa dang /_'dod chags kyi sems kyis [# ]
[\[309b.7\]]gzhan gyi bud med la chags pa dang /_gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa [#]dang /_bla mar gyur pa la sems gya gyu zhing rab tu sdang ba ni sems las byung ba'i nyes pa'o/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'dor zhing brjed ngas pa dang /_som nyir gyur pa dang /_yid
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]shin tu rmongs par gyur pa ni ma rig pa'i nyes pa [#]spyod pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/de la bsam pas lci ba ni/_theg pa chen po pa sems [#]snying rje'i dbang du gyur pa/_sems can thams cad mi gtong bar rjes su 'dzin pas [#]lci ba ni/_'di ltar zhe sdang kho na yin te/_slob
[\[310a.2\]]dpon zhi ba lha'i zhal nas/_bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi[#]/_/sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs/_/legs spyad gang yin de kun yang /_/khong khro gcig gis 'joms par byed/_/ces gsungs so/_/'di kho na nyid lci ba yin pa'i khungs mang du yod mod kyi re zhig gzhag
[\[310a.3\]]go/_/yang ba'i las kyang tshul 'di las shes par bya'o/_/theg pa gnyis po 'di dag tu/_/lci dang yang ba'i las rnams bshad/_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis/_/rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ba'o/_/de la srog gcod pa 'dod chags las skyes pa ni 'di ltar lus kyi yan lag gi
[\[310a.4\]]phyir ram/_nor gyi phyir ram/_rtsed [#]mo'i phyir ram/_bdag dang mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir srog gcod pa'o/_/zhe sdang las byung ba ni rtsod pa dang khon [#]gyis byas pa'o/_/gti mug las byung ba ni mchod sbyin byed pa dang /_rgyal [#]po'i chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas chos kyi
[\[310a.5\]]blos gsod pa dang /_mi mi bgrungs [#]pa dag la chad pas bcad [#]na rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi snod du 'ong zhes zer nas gsod pa lta bu dang /_sen d+ha pa dag 'di skad du/_pha dang ma rgas sam nad tshabs po ches thebs na gsad [#]do/_/sbrul dang sdig pa dang sbrang bu tre ma bu ka la sogs pa ni mi
[\[310a.6\]]rnams la gnod pa byed pas gsad do/_/ri dgas dang /_phyugs dang /_bya dang /_ma he la sogs pa ni longs spyod pa'i phyir gsad do zhes zer ba lta bu'o/_/ma byin par len pa chags pa las byung ba ni/_gang zhig gang don du gnyer ba des 'phrog pa'am/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa'am/_
[\[310a.7\]]bkur sti'am[#]/_grags pa'i phyir ram/_bdag dang mdza' bo yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir 'phrog pa'o/_/zhe sdang las skyes pa ni sngar bzhin no/_/gti mug las byung ba ni rgyal po'i chos 'don pa tshad mar byas nas mi bgrungs [#]pa dag chad pas bcad [#]nas 'phrog pa lta bu dang /_bram
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]ze dag na re 'di thams cad tshangs pas bram ze rnams la byin pa yin pa las/_da ltar bram ze rnams nyams pas rigs gzhan spyod du zad mod/_de bas bram ze 'phrog pa na/_rku ba ma yin gyi bram ze bdag nyid kyi [#]len par byed par zad pas bdag nyid kyi [#]za ba dang /_bdag nyid kyi [# ]
[\[310b.2\]]'thungs pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi [#]gyon pa dang /_bdag nyid kyi [#]sbyin pa yin no zhes zer ba lta bu'o/_/de la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa 'dod chags las byung ba ni gzhan gyi chung ma la chags pa'am/_rnyed pa'am/_bkur sti'i phyir ram/_bdag gam mdza' bo yongs su bskyab
[\[310b.3\]]pa'i phyir mi tshangs par spyod pa'o/_/zhe sdang las byung ba ni snga ma bzhin no/_/gti mug las byung ba ni par sig [#]pa dag na re ma la sogs pa la nyal ba dang /_ba lang phreng gi mchod sbyin la cho ga can gyi chu 'thung ngo /_/rtswa gcod do/_/ma'i gan du nyal po la 'gro ba'o/_/sring mo'i
[\[310b.4\]]gan du dang /_rus gcig pa'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o zhes bya ba dang /_ba lang la sogs pa la yang spyad par bya'o zhes zer ba lta bu'o/_/de lta bas na 'di lta bu byung ba na ni/_rgyal po bzhad gad lta bu byed pa dang /_/bag ma len pa'i tshe dang gsod pa dang /_/nor kun 'phrog tshe brdzun [# ]
[\[310b.5\]]smras gnod med de/_/brdzun [#]lnga ltung bar byed pa min zhes bshad/_/ces zer ba dang /_gang yang log par lta ba'i brdzun [#]du smra ba'o/_/mi dge ba lhag ma dag kyang snga ma bzhin no/_/yid kyi gsum ni 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum gyi mjug [#]tu skyes pa'o/_/srog gcod pa ni
[\[310b.6\]]bsams [#]bzhin du/_/ma nor bar ni gzhan bsad na'o/_/ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor/_/mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed/_/log g.yem bgrod min pa la 'gro[#]/_/'du shes gzhan bsgyur brdzun [#]tshig don/_/nyon mongs sems kyis [#]pha rol 'byed[#]/_/tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa'o/_/
[\[310b.7\]]ngag 'khyal klu dang zlos gar dang /_bstan bcos ngan dang 'du 'dzi'i gtam/_/brnab sems gzhan gyi nor la chags/_gnod sems sems can la sdang ba'o/_/rgyu 'bras med zer log lta'o/_/de ltar theg pa chen po'i 'di ltar yin te/_de yang rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]pa'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_byang chub sems dpa' ched du bsams nas srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bya'o/_/dbyung ba spang zhing khon du 'dzin pa yang spang bar bya'o/_/des bdag nyid la ji lta ba de bzhin du gzhan gyi srog kyang yongs
[\[311a.2\]]su bsrung bar bya'o/_/ma byin par len pa las slar ldog par bya ste/_des gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i longs spyod la chags pa bskyed par yang mi bya na/_gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i longs spyod la ma byin par len pa lta ci smos/_'dod pas log par g.yem pa las ldog par
[\[311a.3\]]bya ste/_des gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba'i chung ma dang /_rigs dang /_mtshan ma dang /_chos kyis [#]bsrungs pa rnams la chags pa bskyed [#]par yang mi bya na/_yan lag ma yin par [#]spyod pa dang /_dbang po gnyis sprod pa lta ci smos/_brdzun [#]du smra ba las ldog par bya ste/_des ched du bsams
[\[311a.4\]]nas gang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub slu bar 'gyur ba'i brdzun gyi [#]tshig srog gi phyir yang smra bar mi bya'o/_/tshig rtsub po las ldog par bya ste des sems can rnams la mnyen pa dang /_'jam pa dang /_yid la 'bab pa de lta bu'i tshig smra bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang pa'i bdag po byang
[\[311a.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi [#]don bya ba'i thog mar 'gro ba ni tshig snyan pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/phra ma las ldog par bya ste/_de ci nas kyang dbyen du mi [#]'gyur ba'i tshig de [#]dang /_gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i tshig de ltar bsgrub par bya'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can [#]dbye ba la
[\[311a.6\]]zhugs [#]pa ma yin no/_/tshig 'khyal pa las [#]ldog par bya ste/_des yul dang dus dang don dang ldan pa'i rjes su 'jug pas sems can thams cad la yid du 'ong ba dang ran par spyod pa'i tshig smra bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig bzang po dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/brnab
[\[311a.7\]]sems las ldog par bya ste/_des gzhan gyi longs spyod [#]dang gzhan gyi [#]nor la chags pa'i sems kyang bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems ma chags pa yin no/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' bdag sems chags na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo'i phyogs
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]gcig las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'i [#]rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa des 'di ltar bsam par bya ste/_gang dag [#]gis bya dgos pa de dang des rang 'byor par gyur pa de legs so snyom nas sems can de dag gi [#]longs spyod de dag chud mi za ba la yang dang yang du dga' ba
[\[311b.2\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang gnod sems las ldog par bya ste/_des thams cad du bzod pa dang ldan pa dang /_byams pa dang /_khong khro ba med cing sems snyoms par bya'o/_/des mdza' bo la ji lta ba bzhin du dgra la yang de bzhin du bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems
[\[311b.3\]]dpa' ni yid kyi gnas ngan len dang ldan pa ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni rang bzhin gyis bsam pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/gsang ba'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gnod sems dang bral bar bya'o/_/gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' log par lta [#]ba
[\[311b.4\]]las ldog par bya ste/_des yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par lta ba dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_gya gyu med pa dang /_drang ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dag la bsam pa nges par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gsang ba'i [#]bdag po log par lta ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[311b.5\]]kha na ma tho ba chen po ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi phyi mo'o/_/gsang ba'i bdag po de lta bas na tha na bzhad gad tsam du yang log par lta ba skyed [#]par mi byed pa'o zhes gsungs so/_/yul dang bsam pa nyon mongs dang /_/dus dang grangs dang
[\[311b.6\]]yan lag sogs/_/chung dang 'bring dang [#]chen po ste/_/rnam pa gsum du shes par bya/_/las kyi lam bcu po de dag kyang yul la sogs pa de dag gi [#]dbang gis chung ngu dang 'bring po dang chen por 'gyur ro/_/de la yul gyis 'gyur ba ni sngar ji skad brjod pa'i tshul de las shes par bya'o/_/de la bsam
[\[311b.7\]]pas gsum du 'gyur ba ni/_/mi shes pas byas pa ni chung ngu'o/_/bag med pas byas pa ni 'bring po'o/_/ma gus pas byas pa ni chen po'o/_/de la nyon mongs pas gsum du 'gyur ba ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen pos srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las kyang de bzhin
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]du byed pa'o/_/de la dus kyis [#]'gyur ba ni sbyor ba dang /_dngos gzhi dang /_mjug rnams las gcig dang ldan pa ni chung ba'o/_/gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'bring po'o/_/de dag gsum ga rdzogs pa ni chen po'o/_/de la las kyi lam bcu po de dag grangs kyis [#]'gyur ba ni lan gcig [#]byas pa 'di [#]chung
[\[312a.2\]]ba'o/_/lan gnyis byas pa ni 'bring po'o/_/lan gsum phan chad byas pa ni chen po'o/_/de la yan lag gi 'gyur ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa de dag gi yan lag phal cher ma tshang ba ni chung ba'o/_/phal cher tshang ba ni 'bring po'o/_/thams cad rdzogs shing tshang ba ni chen po'o/_/sogs zhes bya ba ni
[\[312a.3\]]srog gcod pa la sogs pa [#]de dag las gang yang rung ba lan cig byas pa tsam ni chung ba'o/_/de la 'gyod pa med pa ni 'bring po'o[#]/_/de la gnyen po [#]bsten pa ni chen po'o/_/bsdam par bya ba ni chung ngu'o/_/bshags par bya ba ni 'bring po'o/_/pham pa ni chen po'o/_/rtsed mo dang gzhan gyi g.yam [#]la rgyugs kyis byas pa
[\[312a.4\]]ni chung ngu'o/_/rang nyid la nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa med kyang dpya zhing gzhan gyi sdig pa byed pa'i rkyen byed [#]pa ni 'bring po'o/_/rang nyid la nyes pa yod cing gzhan gyis spyad pa ni chen po'o/_/gzhan yang sdig pa'i grogs po dang mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang gis rang dbang med par byas pa ni chung ngu'o[#]/_/
[\[312a.5\]]grags pa snyan pa'i phyir byas pa ni 'bring po'o/_/rnam par smin pa la mi 'jigs pa ni chen po'o/_/gzhan yang las kyi lam bcu po 'di dag gi don rgyas pa ni 'phags pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa'i mdo sde dang /_slob dpon bram ze chos ldan rab 'byor dbyangs kyis mdzad pa dang /_'phags [# ]
[\[312a.6\]]pa thogs med kyis mdzad pa'i rnam par gtan la dbab pa bsdu ba la sogs pa'i yo ga tsAr+ya'i [#]sa chen por blta'o/_/gzhan yang /_bsams [#]bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang /_/mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang /_/'khor dang rnam par smin pa las/_/bsags pa'i las zhes bya ba yin/_/yang 'khor ba'i
[\[312a.7\]]las ni lci gang dang /_/nye ba gang dang goms pa gang /_/sngon byas de dag gang yin las[#]/_/snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur/_/yang /_shin tu yid la gcags pa dang /_/las de gsar du byas pa dang /_/yang dang yang du byas pas goms/_/de las gang rung sngar myong 'gyur/_/mthong ba'i chos las
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]myong 'gyur dang /_/skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_/lan grangs gzhan du myong 'gyur dang /_/myong par 'gyur bar ma nges pa'o/_/las ni dkar dang gnag pa dang /_/'dres ma'i las dang rnam pa gsum/_/mdo dang bstan bcos dag na gsal/_/de bas na/_las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/_/chud mi za ba nges bsags
[\[312b.2\]]nas/_/smin nas lus can rnams la ni/_/'bras bu nyid du ston par byed/_/ces bya ste de lta bu la yang nges par yid ches par bya'o/_/'gro ba rgyud lnga'i sems can thams cad dag_/'dzam gling 'dir skyes dge ba bcu spyad de/_/mthar gyis [#]bla ma bzang po bsten [#]byas nas/_/zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims thob gyur cig_/las
[\[312b.3\]]rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba/_slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis [#]mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang /_zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D3960}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tsAr+ya saM gra ha [#]pra dI pa/_bod skad du/_
[\[312b.4\]]spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma/_'jig rten dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi gsung gi 'od zer gyis/_/bdag sogs rmongs pa ma lus pa'i/_/snying gi pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i/_/dam pa'i skyes mchog de la 'dud/_/gsang sngags pha rol phyin pa la/_/brten nas byang chub bsgrub [#]bo zhes/_/bla ma sangs rgyas gsungs
[\[312b.5\]]pas na/_/de don bdag gis bri bar bya/_/gsang sngags 'di ru brjod mi bya/_/pha rol phyin lugs spyod pa yi[#]/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dag_/mdo tsam bdag gis bshad par bya/_/sems bskyed sngon du song ba yis/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa blang /_/mdo sde ma lus kun blta zhing /_/bstan bcos mtha' dag
[\[312b.6\]]mnyan par bya/_/lus dang ngag dang yid gsum gyis/_/ji skad bshad pa'i sdom pa rnams/_/ma nyams gtsang mar bsrung [#]byas la/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag par bya/_/zas kyi tshod kyang rig par bya/_/dbang po rnams kyi sgo yang bsdams/_/nam gyi cha stod cha smad la/_/mi nyal rnal 'byor brtson par bya/_/
[\[312b.7\]]kha na ma tho phra rab la'ang /_/shin tu 'jigs pa bskyed par bya/_/mtshan mo cha gsum bgo bya ste/_/tha ma'i cha la ldang bar bya/_/gdong la sogs pa bkru ba'am/_/yang na ma bkrus pa yang rung /_/bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni/_/chos rnams chos nyid dran par bya/_/mtshan mas g.yengs pas ma nus na/_/langs
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]la dngos po snang ba kun/_/sgyu ma lta bur nye bar brtag_/bar skabs der yang dge sbyor yang /_/yan lag bdun pa rdzogs par bya/_/smon lam shin tu rgya chen gdab/_/yang na sngar gyi sgom la bsgom/_/de nas zas kyi dus dag tu/_/snying po med pa'i lus 'di yis/_/snying po dam pa btsal bya zhes/_/lus la
[\[313a.2\]]gru yi blo gzhag la/_/rgyags pa skyed phyir mi bza' zhing /_/ro la chags pas mi bza'o/_/zas la cha bzhir bgo bya ste/_/dang po lha la bshos gtsang dbul/_/de rjes chos kyi srung ma la/_/gtor ma shin tu rgya chen btang /_/rang gis zos shing 'thungs pa yi[#]/_/lhag ma 'byung po kun la sbyin/_/bar skabs der yang sgrung rgyud [# ]
[\[313a.3\]]dang /_/ngo mtshar can gyi gtam yang bya/_/de nas langs la cung zhig bcag_/yang na rten la bskor ba bya/_/bzlas brjod glegs bam bklag pa'am/_/yang na bde gshegs gzugs brnyan bya/_/ji srid rdul ni ma byung bar/_/de srid bskor [#]ba ma yengs par/_/byas la smon lam rgya chen gdab/_/mdor na mgon po
[\[313a.4\]]byams pa yis/_/bshad pa'i chos spyod bcu po rnams/_/yid ni rab tu ma yengs shing /_/sgyu ma lta bur dran pas spyad/_/gal te yod na dge 'dun mchod/_/yang na byis pa'i ston mo bya/_/mgon med dag la sbyin pa ni/_/rnal 'byor bsod nams tshogs su 'gyur/_/nyin mo'i bya ba rdzogs pa dang /_/mtshan mo'i cha ni dang po
[\[313a.5\]]ru/_/chos nyid spros pa dang bral ba/_/shes pa'ang spros dang bral bar gzhag_/mtshan mo'i gung la bab pa na/_/ldang dang snang ba'i 'du shes kyis/_/seng ge ji ltar nyal ba ltar/_dge ba'i gnyid ni log par bya/_/spyir na mnyam gzhag sems brtan na/_/lus ngag dge ba gtsor mi bya/_/yang na mnyam gzhag mi gsal
[\[313a.6\]]na/_/'jig rten mthun 'jug bya ba'i phyir/_/lus ngag dge ba ci nus bya/_/'jig rten sems dang ma mthun na/_/'di ni bdag gi chos min zhes/_/bsam pa bzang po sngon btang la/_/'jig rten yul chos dri bar bya/_/ne pa la yi yul du ni/_/rang gi [#]grogs pos bskul nas byas/_/gsang sngags lugs la mi mos na/_/
[\[313a.7\]]'di ltar mdzod cig s+tha bi [#]ra/_/spyod pa bsdus pa'i sgron ma slob dpon mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta dI paM [#]ka ra shrI dz+nyA na de nyid dang /_lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//_//_
